ASY: ܠܵܐ. ܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ ܠܵܐ ܪܘܼܦܹܐ ܠܹܗ ܠܥܲܡܹܗ، ܗ̇ܘ ܕܡ̣ܢ ܩܵܕ݇ܡܵܝܬܵܐ ܝ݇ܕܝܼܥ ܠܹܗ. ܠܹܐ ܝܬܘܿܢ ܒܝܼܕܵܥܵܐ ܡܘܿܕܝܼ ܐ݇ܡܝܼܪܹܗ ܟܬܵܒ݂ܵܐ ܒܘܼܬ ܐܹܠܝܼܵܐ؟ ܟܲܕ ܒܸܩܒ݂ܵܠܵܐ ܝܗ݇ܘܵܐ ܐܹܠܝܼܵܐ ܠܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ ܒܘܼܬ ܝܼܣܪܵܝܹܠ، ܐ݇ܡܝܼܪܹܗ:
TRL: La. Alaha la roepe-leh l'ameh, haw dmin qamayta dee' leh. Le ytoon beeda'a moodee meereh ktawa boet eleea? Kad biqwala ywa eleea lalaha boet eesrayel, meereh:
ENG: God did not cast off his people which he foreknew. Or wot ye not what the scripture saith of Elijah? how he pleadeth with God against Israel,

ASY: ܝܵܐ ܡܵܪܝܵܐ، ܩܛܝܼܠ ܠܗܘܿܢ ܠܢܒ݂ܝܼܘܼ̈ܟ݂ ܘܬܠܝܼܚ ܠܗܘܿܢ ܠܡܲܕܒܚܘܼ̈ܟ݂. ܦܝܼܫܵܐ ܝܘܸܢ ܐܵܢܵܐ ܒܢܲܦ̮ܫܝܼ، ܘܓ̰ܲܪܘܼܒܹܐ ܝܢܵܐ ܕܐܘܼܦ ܐܸܠܝܼ ܩܵܛܠܝܼ.
TRL: Ya Marya, qṭeel-lhoon lnweeoekh o tleekh-lhoon lmadbkhoekh. Peesha ywin ana bnawshee, o jaroebe yna doep ilee qaṭlee.
ENG: Lord, they have killed thy prophets, they have digged down thine altars: and I am left alone, and they seek my life.

ASY: ܐܝܼܢܵܐ ܡܘܿܕܝܼ ܝܗ݇ܘܵܐ ܓ̰ܘܼܘܵܒ ܕܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ ܐܸܠܹܗ؟ ܫܒ݂ܝܼܩܵܐ ܝܘܸܢ ܩܵܐ ܓܵܢܝܼ ܫܲܒ݂ܥܵܐ ܐܲܠܦܹ̈ܐ ܐ݇ܢܵܫܹ̈ܐ، ܐܵܢܝܼ ܕܠܹܐ ܝܢܵܐ ܣܓ݂ܝܼܕܹܐ ܠܒܲܥܠܵܐ.
TRL: Eena moodee ywa joewab dalaha ileh? Shweeqa ywin qa ganee shaw'a alpe nashe, anee dle yna sgheede lba'la.
ENG: But what saith the answer of God unto him? I have left for myself seven thousand men, who have not bowed the knee to Baal.

ASY: ܐܘܼܦ ܐܵܕܝܼܵܐ ܐܝܼܬ ܚܲܕ ܣܵܗܡܵܐ ܕܝܼܠܹܗ ܦܝܼܫܵܐ ܓܘܼܒܝܵܐ ܒܝܲܕ ܫܵܦܵܩܲܬ.
TRL: Oep adeea eet khad sahma deeleh peesha goebya byad shapaqat.
ENG: Even so then at this present time also there is a remnant according to the election of grace.

ASY: ܒܲܣ ܐܸܢ ܝܼܠܹܗ ܒܫܵܦܵܩܲܬ، ܐ݇ܚܹܪ݇ܢܵܐ ܠܹܐ ܝܠܹܗ ܒܦܘܼܠܚܵܢܵܐ. ܘܐܸܢ ܝܼܠܹܗ ܒܦܘܼܠܚܵܢܵܐ، ܫܵܦܵܩܲܬ ܐ݇ܚܹܪ݇ܢܵܐ ܠܹܐ ܝܠܵܗ̇ ܫܵܦܵܩܲܬ.
TRL: Bas in eeleh bshapaqat, khena le-yleh bpoelkhana. O in eeleh bpoelkhana, shapaqat khena le-ylaha shapaqat.
ENG: But if it is by grace, it is no more of works: otherwise grace is no more grace.

ASY: ܒܲܣ ܕܵܐܟ݂ܝܼ؟ ܡܸܢܕܝܼ ܕܒܸܛܥܵܝܵܐ ܝܗ݇ܘܵܐ ܐܸܠܹܗ ܝܼܣܪܵܝܹܠ ܠܵܐ ܡܘܼܫ݇ܟ̰ܸܚ ܠܹܗ، ܐܝܼܢܵܐ ܐܵܢܝܼ ܕܝܼܗ݇ܘܵܘ ܓܘܼܒܝܹ̈ܐ ܡܘܼܫ݇ܟ̰ܸܚ ܠܗܘܿܢ. ܘܐܵܢܝܼ ܐ݇ܚܹܪ̈݇ܢܹܐ ܦܝܼܫ ܠܗܘܿܢ ܡܘܼܩܫܝܼܹܐ ܠܸܒܲܝܗܝ.
TRL: Bas dakhee? Mindee dbiṭ'aya ywa ileh eesrayel la moechikh-leh, eena anee deewaw goebye moechikh-lhoon. O anee khene peesh-lhoon moeqshee-e libayhy.
ENG: What then? That which Israel seeketh for, that he obtained not; but the election obtained it, and the rest were hardened:

ASY: ܐܲܝܟ݂ ܕܝܼܠܹܗ ܟܬܝܼܒ݂ܵܐ: ܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ ܝܘܼܗ݇ܒܸܠ ܠܹܗ ܐܸܠܲܝܗܝ ܪܘܼܚܵܐ ܕܫܸܢܬܵܐ، ܘܥܲܝܢܹ̈ܐ ܕܠܵܐ ܚܵܙܝܼ، ܘܢܵܬܝܵܬܹ̈ܐ ܕܠܵܐ ܫܵܡܥܝܼ، ܗܲܠ ܐܵܗܵܐ ܝܵܘܡܵܐ.
TRL: Aykh deeleh kteewa: Alaha yoebil-leh ilayhy roekha dshinta, o 'ayne dla khazee, o natyate dla sham'ee, hal aha yawma.
ENG: according as it is written, God gave them a spirit of stupor, eyes that they should not see, and ears that they should not hear, unto this very day.

ASY: ܐܘܼܦ ܕܵܘܝܼܕ ܐ݇ܡܝܼܪܹܗ: ܗܵܘܹܐ ܦܵܬܘܿܪܲܝܗܝ ܦܲܚܵܐ ܘܢܸܫܒ݂ܵܐ، ܘܗܵܘܹܐ ܦܘܼܪܥܵܢܲܝܗܝ ܟܹܐܦܵܐ ܕܬܲܪܩܲܠܬܵܐ.
TRL: Oep daweed meereh: hawe patoorayhy pakha o nishwa, o hawe poer'anayhy kepa dtarqalta.
ENG: And David saith, Let their table be made a snare, and a trap, And a stumblingblock, and a recompense unto them:

ASY: ܚܲܫܟܸܢܝܼ ܥܲܝܢܲܝ̈ܗܝ ܕܠܵܐ ܚܵܙܝܼ، ܘܚܲܨܲܝܗܝ ܗܵܘܹܐ ܟܝܼܦܵܐ ܒܟܠ ܙܲܒ݂ܢܵܐ.
TRL: Khashkinee 'aynayhy dla khazee, o khaṣayhy hawe keepa bkl zawna.
ENG: Let their eyes be darkened, that they may not see, And bow thou down their back alway.

ASY: ܡܸܢܕܪܸܫ ܒܲܩܘܼܪܹܐ ܝܘܸܢ: ܢܦܝܼܠ ܠܗܘܿܢ ܒܢܲܝ̈ ܝܼܣܪܵܝܹܠ، ܘܠܹܐ ܡܵܨܝܼ ܕܵܝܪܝܼ ܐ݇ܚܹܪ݇ܢܵܐ؟ ܚܵܣ ܠܝܼ، ܐܝܼܢܵܐ ܒܢܦܵܠܬܵܐ ܕܝܼܲܝܗܝ ܗܘܹܐ ܠܹܗ ܦܘܼܪܩܵܢܵܐ ܠܐܸܡܘܵܬܹ̈ܐ، ܕܐܵܢܝܼ ܒܲܚܸܠܝܼ.
TRL: Mindrish baqoere ywin: npeel-lhoon bnay eesrayel, o le maṣee dayree khena? Khas-lee, eena bnpalta dee-ayhy hwe-leh poerqana limwate, danee bakhilee.
ENG: I say then, Did they stumble that they might fall? God forbid: but by their fall salvation is come unto the Gentiles, for to provoke them to jealousy.

ASY: ܐܸܢ ܓܢܵܗܲܝܗܝ ܗܘܹܐ ܠܵܗ̇ ܒܘܼܪܟܬܵܐ ܠܥܵܠܡܵܐ، ܘܚܘܼܣܪܵܢܲܝܗܝ ܗܘܹܐ ܠܹܗ ܒܘܼܪܟܬܵܐ ܠܐܸܡܘܵܬܹ̈ܐ، ܟܡܵܐ ܙܵܘܕܵܐ ܡܸܠܝܘܼܬܲܝܗܝ ܒܸܬ ܡܲܝܬܝܵܐ ܒܘܼܪܟܬܵܐ!
TRL: In gnahayhy hwe-laha boerkta l'alma, o khoesranayhy hwe-leh boerkta limwate, kma zawda milyoetayhy bit maytya boerkta!
ENG: Now if their fall is the riches of the world, and their loss the riches of the Gentiles; how much more their fulness?

ASY: ܗܲܡܙܘܼܡܹܐ ܝܘܸܢ ܐܸܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܐܸܡܘܵܬܹ̈ܐ، ܣܵܒܵܒ ܐܵܢܵܐ ܫܠܝܼܚܵܐ ܝܘܸܢ ܠܐܸܡܘܵܬܹ̈ܐ، ܘܟܹܐ ܡܝܲܩܪܸܢ ܠܚܸܠܡܲܬܝܼ،
TRL: Hamzoeme ywin ilawkhoon imwate, sabab ana shleekha ywin limwate, o ke myaqrin lkhilmatee,
ENG: But I speak to you that are Gentiles. Inasmuch then as I am an apostle of Gentiles, I glorify my ministry:

ASY: ܕܩܵܘܡܵܐ ܕܡܲܥܒܸܪܸܢ ܒܩܲܝܪܲܬ ܠܒܢܲܝ̈ ܥܲܡܝܼ، ܘܦܲܪܩܸܢ ܚܲܕ݇ܟܡܵܐ ܡܸܢܲܝܗܝ.
TRL: Dqawma dma'birin bqayrat lbnay 'amee, o parqin khakma minayhy.
ENG: if by any means I may provoke to jealousy them that are my flesh, and may save some of them.

ASY: ܣܵܒܵܒ ܐܸܢ ܡܲܣܠܵܝܬܲܝܗܝ ܗܘܹܐ ܠܵܗ̇ ܣܲܙܓܲܪܬܵܐ ܠܥܵܠܡܵܐ، ܡܘܿܕܝܼ ܒܘܼܬ ܩܵܒܲܠܬܲܝܗܝ، ܠܹܐ ܗܵܘܝܵܐ ܚܲܝܹ̈ܐ ܡ̣ܢ ܡܝܼܬܹ̈ܐ؟
TRL: Sabab in maslaytayhy hwe-laha sazgarta l'alma, moodee boet qabaltayhy, le hawya khaye min meete?
ENG: For if the casting away of them is the reconciling of the world, what shall the receiving of them be, but life from the dead?

ASY: ܐܸܢ ܪܹܫܝܼܬܵܐ ܕܠܲܝܫܵܐ ܕܩܘܼܪܒܵܢܵܐ ܩܲܕܝܼܫܬܵܐ ܝܠܵܗ̇، ܐܘܼܦ ܓܒ݂ܝܼܠܬܵܐ ܕܡܸܢܘܼܗ̇ ܩܲܕܝܼܫܬܵܐ ܝܠܵܗ̇. ܘܐܸܢ ܥܸܩܪܵܐ ܩܲܕܝܼܫܵܐ ܝܠܹܗ، ܐܘܼܦ ܦܲܥܘܵܢܹ̈ܐ ܩܲܕܝܼܫܹ̈ܐ ܝܢܵܐ.
TRL: In resheeta dlaysha dqoerbana qadeeshta-ylaha, oep gweelta dminoeha qadeeshta-ylaha. O in 'iqra qadeesha-yleh, oep pa'wane qadeeshe yna.
ENG: And if the firstfruit is holy, so is the lump: and if the root is holy, so are the branches.

ASY: ܐܝܼܢܵܐ ܐܘܼܦ ܐܸܢ ܕܚܲܕ݇ܟܡܵܐ ܦܲܥܘܵܢܹ̈ܐ ܦܝܼܫ ܠܗܘܿܢ ܫܡܝܼܛܹܐ، ܘܐܲܢ݇ܬ ܕܝܼܘܸܬ ܙܲܝܬܵܐ ܕܒܲܪܝܼܵܐ ܦܝܼܫ ܠܘܼܟ݂ ܦܘܼܛܪܸܡܵܐ ܓܵܘܲܝܗܝ، ܘܗܘܹܐ ܠܘܼܟ݂ ܫܲܪܝܼܟܵܐ ܒܥܸܩܪܵܐ ܘܛܥܘܼܢܬܵܐ ܕܐܝܼܠܵܢܵܐ ܕܙܲܝܬܵܐ.
TRL: Eena oep in dkhakma pa'wane peesh-lhoon shmeeṭe, o at deewit zayta dbareea peesh-loekh poeṭrima gawayhy, o hwe-loekh shareeka b'iqra o ṭ'oenta deelana dzayta.
ENG: But if some of the branches were broken off, and thou, being a wild olive, wast grafted in among them, and didst become partaker with them of the root of the fatness of the olive tree;

ASY: ܠܵܐ ܥܵܒ݂ܕܹܬ ܫܘܼܒ݂ܗܵܪܵܐ ܥܲܠ ܦܲܥܘܵܢܹ̈ܐ. ܐܸܢ ܥܵܒ݂ܕܹܬ ܫܘܼܒ݂ܗܵܪܵܐ، ܕܟ݂ܘܿܪ ܕܠܹܐ ܝܘܸܬ ܐܲܢ݇ܬ ܛܥܝܼܢܵܐ ܠܘܲܪ̈ܝܼܕܹܐ ܐܝܼܢܵܐ ܘܲܪ̈ܝܼܕܹܐ ܛܥܝܼܢܘܼܟ݂ ܝܼܢܵܐ.
TRL: La 'awdet shoewhara 'al pa'wane. In 'awdet shoewhara, dkhoor dle ywit at ṭ'eena lwareede eena wareede ṭ'eenoekh eena.
ENG: glory not over the branches: but if thou gloriest, it is not thou that bearest the root, but the root thee.

ASY: ܐܲܢ݇ܬ ܒܸܬ ܐܵܡܪܹܬ، ”ܦܲܥܘܵܢܹ̈ܐ ܦܝܼܫ ܠܗܘܿܢ ܫܡܝܼܛܹܐ ܕܐܵܢܵܐ ܗܵܘܹܝܢ ܗ݇ܘܵܐ ܦܘܼܛܪܸܡܵܐ.
TRL: At bit amret, ”pa'wane peesh-lhoon shmeeṭe dana haweyn wa poeṭrima.
ENG: Thou wilt say then, Branches were broken off, that I might be grafted in.

ASY: ܪܵܒܵܐ ܨܦܵܝܝܼ. ܐܵܢܝܼ ܫܡܝܼܛ ܠܗܘܿܢ ܣܵܒܵܒ ܠܵܐ ܗܘܼܡܸܢܗܘܿܢ، ܘܐܲܢ݇ܬ ܟܠܹܐ ܠܘܼܟ݂ ܣܵܒܵܒ ܗܘܼܡܸܢܘܼܟ݂. ܠܵܐ ܥܵܒ݂ܕܹܬ ܫܘܼܒ݂ܗܵܪܵܐ ܐܸܠܵܐ ܙܕܸܥ،
TRL: Raba ṣpayee. Anee shmeeṭ-lhoon sabab la hoeminhoon, o at kle-loekh sabab hoeminoekh. La 'awdet shoewhara ila zdi',
ENG: Well; by their unbelief they were broken off, and thou standest by thy faith. Be not highminded, but fear:

ASY: ܣܵܒܵܒ ܐܸܢ ܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ ܠܵܐ ܚܣܝܼܟ݂ ܠܹܗ ܠܦܲܥܘܵܢܹ̈ܐ ܐܲܨܠܵܝܹ̈ܐ، ܐܘܼܦ ܐܸܠܘܼܟ݂ ܠܹܐ ܚܵܣܹܟ݂.
TRL: Sabab in Alaha la khseekh-leh lpa'wane aṣlaye, oep iloekh le khasekh.
ENG: for if God spared not the natural branches, neither will he spare thee.

ASY: ܚܙܝܼ ܗܲܕܟ݂ܵܐ ܒܲܣܝܼܡܘܼܬܵܐ ܘܩܸܫܝܘܼܬܵܐ ܕܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ. ܩܸܫܝܘܼܬܵܐ ܠܐܵܢܝܼ ܕܢܦܝܼܠ ܠܗܘܿܢ، ܐܝܼܢܵܐ ܒܲܣܝܼܡܘܼܬܵܐ ܐܸܠܘܼܟ݂ ܐܸܢ ܟܵܠܹܝܬ ܒܒܲܣܝܼܡܘܼܬܹܗ. ܘܐܸܢ ܠܵܐ ܟܵܠܹܝܬ، ܐܘܼܦ ܐܲܢ݇ܬ ܒܸܬ ܦܵܝܫܹܬ ܦܪܝܼܡܵܐ.
TRL: Khzee hadkha baseemoeta o qishyoeta dalaha. Qishyoeta lanee dnpeel-lhoon, eena baseemoeta iloekh in kaleyt bbaseemoeteh. O in la kaleyt, oep at bit payshet preema.
ENG: Behold then the goodness and severity of God: toward them that fell, severity; but toward thee, God’s goodness, if thou continue in his goodness: otherwise thou also shalt be cut off.

ASY: ܐܘܼܦ ܐܵܢܝܼ، ܐܸܢ ܠܵܐ ܥܲܪܩܸܠܝܼ ܒܠܲܝܬܵܝܘܼܬܵܐ ܕܗܲܝܡܵܢܘܼܬܲܝܗܝ ܒܸܬ ܦܵܝܫܝܼ ܦܘܼܛܪܸܡܹܐ، ܣܵܒܵܒ ܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ ܡܵܨܹܐ ܦܲܛܪܸܡ ܠܗܘܿܢ ܚܕܵܐ ܓܵܗܵܐ ܐ݇ܚܹܪ݇ܬܵܐ.
TRL: Oep anee, in la 'arqilee blaytayoeta dhaymanoetayhy bit payshee poeṭrime, sabab Alaha maṣe paṭrim-lhoon khda gaha kheta.
ENG: And they also, if they continue not in their unbelief, shall be grafted in: for God is able to graft them in again.

ASY: ܐܸܢ ܐܲܢ݇ܬ ܦܝܼܫܵܐ ܝܘܸܬ ܗ݇ܘܵܐ ܦܪܝܼܡܵܐ ܡ̣ܢ ܐܝܼܠܵܢܵܐ ܕܒܟܝܵܢܹܗ ܙܲܝܬܵܐ ܕܒܲܪܝܼܵܐ ܝܠܹܗ، ܘܦܝܼܫ ܠܘܼܟ݂ ܦܘܼܛܪܸܡܵܐ ܕܲܠܩܘܼܒ݂ܠ ܕܟܝܵܢܵܐ ܥܲܠ ܐܝܼܠܵܢܵܐ ܛܵܒ݂ܵܐ ܕܙܲܝܬܵܐ، ܟܡܵܐ ܒܘܼܫ ܙܵܘܕܵܐ ܐܲܢܹܐ ܦܲܥܘܵܢܹ̈ܐ ܟܝܵܢܵܝܹ̈ܐ ܒܸܬ ܦܵܝܫܝܼ ܦܘܼܛܪܸܡܹܐ ܥܲܠ ܐܝܼܠܵܢܵܐ ܐܲܨܠܵܝܵܐ ܕܙܲܝܬܵܐ.
TRL: In at peesha ywit wa preema min eelana dbkyaneh zayta dbareea-yleh, o peesh-loekh poeṭrima dalqoewl dkyana 'al eelana ṭawa dzayta, kma boesh zawda ane pa'wane kyanaye bit payshee poeṭrime 'al eelana aṣlaya dzayta.
ENG: For if thou wast cut out of that which is by nature a wild olive tree, and wast grafted contrary to nature into a good olive tree: how much more shall these, which are the natural branches, be grafted into their own olive tree?

ASY: ܩܵܐ ܕܠܵܐ ܗܵܘܹܝܬܘܿܢ ܚܲܟܝܼܡܹ̈ܐ ܒܚܘܼܫܵܒ݂ܵܐ ܕܓܵܢܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ، ܝܵܐ ܐܲܚܘܿܢܘܵܬܝܼ̈، ܒܵܥܹܝܢ ܕܝܵܕܥܝܼܬܘܿܢ ܠܐܵܗܵܐ ܐ݇ܪܵܙܵܐ، ܕܩܸܫܝܘܼܬܵܐ ܕܠܸܒܵܐ ܗܘܹܐ ܠܵܗ̇ ܠܚܲܕ ܣܵܗܡܵܐ ܕܒܢܲܝ̈ ܝܼܣܪܵܝܹܠ ܗܲܠ ܕܦܵܐܹܫ ܬܘܼܡܸܡܵܐ ܡܸܢܝܵܢܵܐ ܕܐܸܡܘܵܬܹ̈ܐ.
TRL: Qa dla haweytoon khakeeme bkhoeshawa dganawkhoon, ya akhoonwatee, ba'eyn dyad'eetoon-laha raza, dqishyoeta dliba hwe-laha lkhad sahma dbnay eesrayel hal dpaesh toemima minyana dimwate.
ENG: For I would not, brethren, have you ignorant of this mystery, lest ye be wise in your own conceits, that a hardening in part hath befallen Israel, until the fulness of the Gentiles be come in;

ASY: ܗ̇ܝܓܵܗ ܟܠܲܝܗܝ ܒܢܲܝ̈ ܝܼܣܪܵܝܹܠ ܒܸܬ ܦܵܝܫܝܼ ܦܘܼܪܩܹܐ. ܐܲܝܟ݂ ܕܝܼܠܹܗ ܟܬܝܼܒ݂ܵܐ: ܒܸܬ ܐܵܬܹܐ ܦܵܪܘܿܩܵܐ ܡ̣ܢ ܨܸܗܝܘܿܢ، ܘܒܸܬ ܡܲܕܸܪ ܥܵܘܠܵܐ ܡ̣ܢ ܝܲܥܩܘܿܒ݂.
TRL: Haygah klayhy bnay eesrayel bit payshee poerqe. Aykh deeleh kteewa: bit ate parooqa min ṣihyoon, o bit madir 'awla min ya'qoow.
ENG: and so all Israel shall be saved: even as it is written, There shall come out of Zion the Deliverer; He shall turn away ungodliness from Jacob:

ASY: ܐܵܗܵܐ ܝܠܹܗ ܘܲܥܕܝܼ ܥܲܡܲܝܗܝ، ܐܝܼܡܲܢ ܕܦܲܚܠܸܢܗܘܿܢ ܚܛܝܼܵܬܲܝ̈ܗܝ.
TRL: Aha-yleh wa'dee 'amayhy, eeman dpakhlinhoon khṭeeatayhy.
ENG: And this is my covenant unto them, When I shall take away their sins.

ASY: ܡ̣ܢ ܐܹܘܲܢܓܲܠܝܼܘܿܢ ܓܹܒܵܐ ܕܸܫܡܸܢܹ̈ܐ ܝܢܵܐ ܒܘܼܬ ܕܝܼܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ، ܘܡ̣ܢ ܓܲܒܵܝܬܵܐ ܓܹܒܵܐ ܡܘܼܚܸܒܹ̈ܐ ܝܢܵܐ ܒܘܼܬ ܒܵܒܵܘܵܬܹ̈ܐ.
TRL: Min ewangaleeoon geba dishmine yna boet deeawkhoon, o min gabayta geba moekhibe yna boet babawate.
ENG: As touching the gospel, they are enemies for your sake: but as touching the election, they are beloved for the fathers’ sake.

ASY: ܣܵܒܵܒ ܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ ܠܹܐ ܕܵܐܹܪ ܒܡܵܘܗܲܒ݂ܬܹܗ ܘܐܘܼܦ ܠܵܐ ܒܟ̰ܝܵܕܬܹܗ.
TRL: Sabab Alaha le daer bmawhawteh o oep la bchyadteh.
ENG: For the gifts and the calling of God are without repentance.

ASY: ܐܲܝܟ݂ ܕܝܼܬܘܿܢ ܗ݇ܘܵܘ ܐܲܚܬܘܿܢ ܡ̣ܢ ܩܵܕ݇ܡܵܝܬܵܐ ܠܵܐ ܡܲܨܝܸܬܵܢܹ̈ܐ ܠܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ، ܐܝܼܢܵܐ ܐܵܕܝܼܵܐ ܩܘܼܒܸܠ ܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܪ̈ܲܚܡܹܐ ܒܝܲܕ ܥܵܨܝܼܘܼܬܵܐ ܕܝܼܲܝܗܝ،
TRL: Aykh deetoon waw akhtoon min qamayta la maṣyitane lalaha, eena adeea qoebil lawkhoon rakhme byad 'aṣeeoeta dee-ayhy,
ENG: For as ye in time past were disobedient to God, but now have obtained mercy by their disobedience,

ASY: ܗܲܕܟ݂ܵܐ ܐܘܼܦ ܐܵܢܝܼ ܐܵܕܝܼܵܐ ܠܹܐ ܝܢܵܐ ܡܲܨܝܸܬܵܢܹ̈ܐ ܕܩܲܒܠܝܼ ܪ̈ܲܚܡܹܐ ܐܲܝܟ݂ ܪ̈ܲܚܡܹܐ ܕܐܲܚܬܘܿܢ ܩܘܼܒܸܠ ܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܡ̣ܢ ܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ.
TRL: Hadkha oep anee adeea le yna maṣyitane dqablee rakhme aykh rakhme dakhtoon qoebil lawkhoon min Alaha.
ENG: even so have these also now been disobedient, that by the mercy shewn to you they also may now obtain mercy.

ASY: ܣܵܒܵܒ ܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ ܚܒ݂ܝܼܫܲܝ ܠܹܗ ܟܠܲܝܗܝ ܐ݇ܢܵܫܹ̈ܐ ܓܵܘ ܥܵܨܝܼܘܼܬܵܐ ܕܥܵܒܹܕ ܪ̈ܲܚܡܹܐ ܥܲܠ ܟܠܲܝܗܝ.
TRL: Sabab Alaha khweeshay-leh klayhy nashe gaw 'aṣeeoeta d'abed rakhme 'al klayhy.
ENG: For God hath shut up all unto disobedience, that he might have mercy upon all.

ASY: ܝܵܐ ܥܘܼܡܩܵܐ ܕܥܘܼܬܪܵܐ ܕܚܸܟ݂ܡܬܵܐ ܘܝ݇ܕܲܥܬܵܐ ܕܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ! ܐ݇ܢܵܫܵܐ ܠܹܐ ܡܵܛܹܐ ܠܕܝܼܘܵܢܘܼ̈ܗܝ، ܘܐܘܼܪ̈ܚܵܬܹܗ ܠܹܐ ܐܵܬܝܼ ܠܨܲܚܨܘܼܝܹܐ.
TRL: Ya 'oemqa d'oetra dkhikhmta o da'ta dalaha! nasha le maṭe ldeewanoehy, o oerkhateh le atee lṣakhṣoeye.
ENG: O the depth of the riches both of the wisdom and the knowledge of God! how unsearchable are his judgments, and his ways past tracing out!

ASY: ܡܵܢܝܼ ܟܹܐ ܝܵܕܹܥ ܪܸܥܝܵܢܵܐ ܕܡܵܪܝܵܐ؟ ܝܲܢ ܡܵܢܝܼ ܗܘܹܐ ܠܹܗ ܐܸܠܹܗ ܡܵܠܘܿܟ݂ܵܐ؟
TRL: Manee ke yade' ri'yana dmarya? Yan manee hwe-leh ileh malookha?
ENG: For who hath known the mind of the Lord? or who hath been his counsellor?

ASY: ܝܲܢ ܡܵܢܝܼ ܝܠܹܗ ܝܘܼܗ݇ܒ݂ܵܐ ܠܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ، ܕܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ ܡܲܕܸܪ ܐܸܠܹܗ؟
TRL: Yan manee-yleh yoewa lalaha, dalaha madir ileh?
ENG: or who hath first given to him, and it shall be recompensed unto him again?

ASY: ܣܵܒܵܒ ܟܠ ܡܸܢܕܝܼ ܡܸܢܹܗ ܝܠܹܗ، ܘܒܝܼܹܗ ܝܠܹܗ، ܘܐܸܠܹܗ ܝܠܹܗ. ܐܸܠܹܗ ܫܘܼܒ݂ܚܵܐ ܠܥܵܠܲܡ ܥܵܠܡܝܼܢ، ܐܵܡܹܝܢ.
TRL: Sabab kl mindee mineh-yleh, o bee-eh-yleh, o ileh-yleh. Ileh shoewkha l'alam 'almeen, ameyn.
ENG: For of him, and through him, and unto him, are all things. To him be the glory for ever. Amen.

ASY: ܒܘܼܬ ܐܵܗܵܐ، ܦܲܪܦܘܼܠܹܐ ܝܘܸܢ ܒܝܼܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܐܲܚܘܿܢܘܵܬܝܼ̈ ܒܪ̈ܲܚܡܹܐ ܕܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ، ܕܡܲܩܪܸܒ݂ܝܼܬܘܿܢ ܦܲܓ݂ܪ̈ܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܕܒ݂ܝܼܚܬܵܐ ܚܵܝܬܵܐ ܘܩܲܕܝܼܫܬܵܐ ܘܩܘܼܒܸܠܬܵܐ ܠܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ، ܕܝܼܠܵܗ̇ ܣܓ݂ܵܕܬܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܪܘܼܚܵܢܵܝܬܵܐ.
TRL: Boet aha, parpoele ywin beeawkhoon akhoonwatee brakhme dalaha, dmaqriweetoon paghrawkhoon dweekhta khayta o qadeeshta o qoebilta lalaha, deelaha sghadtawkhoon roekhanayta.
ENG: I beseech you therefore, brethren, by the mercies of God, to present your bodies a living sacrifice, holy, acceptable to God, which is your reasonable service.

ASY: ܘܠܵܐ ܦܵܝܫܝܼܬܘܿܢ ܡܘܼܕܡܝܼܹܐ ܠܐܵܗܵܐ ܙܲܒ݂ܢܵܐ ܐܸܠܵܐ ܦܘܼܫܘܼܢ ܫܘܼܚܠܸܦܹܐ ܒܚܵܕܲܬܬܵܐ ܕܪܸܥܝܵܢܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܕܡܵܨܹܝܬܘܿܢ ܦܵܪܫܝܼܬܘܿܢ ܨܸܒ݂ܝܵܢܵܐ ܕܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ، ܕܝܼܠܹܗ ܛܵܒ݂ܵܐ ܘܒܲܣܝܼܡܵܐ ܘܓܡܝܼܪܵܐ.
TRL: O la paysheetoon moedmee-e-laha zawna ila poeshoen shoekhlipe bkhadatta dri'yanawkhoon dmaṣeytoon parsheetoon ṣiwyana dalaha, deeleh ṭawa o baseema o gmeera.
ENG: And be not fashioned according to this world: but be ye transformed by the renewing of your mind, that ye may prove what is the good and acceptable and perfect will of God.

ASY: ܒܫܵܦܵܩܲܬ ܕܦܝܼܫܬܵܐ ܝܠܵܗ̇ ܝܘܼܗ݇ܒܸܠܬܵܐ ܐܸܠܝܼ ܒܹܐܡܵܪܵܐ ܝܘܸܢ ܠܟܠ ܚܲܕ ܡܸܢܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ، ܠܵܐ ܠܸܚܫܵܒ݂ܵܐ ܙܵܘܕܵܐ ܡ̣ܢ ܕܘܵܠܹܐ ܝܠܵܗ̇ ܕܚܵܫܒ݂ܝܼܬܘܿܢ، ܐܸܠܵܐ ܗܵܘܹܝܬܘܿܢ ܒܸܚܫܵܒ݂ܵܐ ܒܢܲܟ݂ܦܘܼܬܵܐ، ܟܠ ܚܲܕ ܐܲܝܟ݂ ܕܦܘܼܠܸܥ ܠܹܗ ܐܸܠܹܗ ܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ ܟܝܘܼܠܵܐ ܕܗܲܝܡܵܢܘܼܬܵܐ.
TRL: Bshapaqat dpeeshta-ylaha yoebilta ilee bemara ywin lkl khad minawkhoon, la likhshawa zawda min dwale-ylaha dkhashweetoon, ila haweytoon bikhshawa bnakhpoeta, kl khad aykh dpoeli' leh ileh Alaha kyoela dhaymanoeta.
ENG: For I say, through the grace that was given me, to every man that is among you, not to think of himself more highly than he ought to think; but so to think as to think soberly, according as God hath dealt to each man a measure of faith.

ASY: ܣܵܒܵܒ ܕܵܐܟ݂ܝܼ ܕܟܠ ܚܲܕ ܡܸܢܲܢ ܐܝܼܬ ܠܹܗ ܦܲܓ݂ܪܵܐ، ܐܝܼܢܵܐ ܪܵܒܵܐ ܗܲܕܵܡܹ̈ܐ ܐܝܼܬ ܠܲܢ ܓܵܘ ܐܵܗܵܐ ܦܲܓ݂ܪܵܐ، ܘܐܲܢܹܐ ܗܲܕܵܡܹ̈ܐ ܐܝܼܬ ܠܗܘܿܢ ܦܘܼܠܚܵܢܹ̈ܐ ܦܪ̈ܝܼܫܹܐ،
TRL: Sabab dakhee dkl khad minan eet-leh paghra, eena raba hadame eet lan gaw aha paghra, o ane hadame eet-lhoon poelkhane preeshe,
ENG: For even as we have many members in one body, and all the members have not the same office:

ASY: ܗܲܕܟ݂ܵܐ ܐܘܼܦ ܐܲܚܢܲܢ، ܕܪܵܒܵܐ ܝܘܲܚ، ܚܲܕ ܦܲܓ݂ܪܵܐ ܝܘܲܚ ܒܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ، ܘܗܲܕܵܡܹ̈ܐ ܝܘܲܚ ܚܲܕ ܕܗ̇ܘ ܐ݇ܚܹܪ݇ܢܵܐ.
TRL: Hadkha oep akhnan, draba ywakh, khad paghra ywakh bmsheekha, o hadame ywakh khad dhaw khena.
ENG: so we, who are many, are one body in Christ, and severally members one of another.

ASY: ܐܝܼܬ ܠܲܢ ܡܵܘܗܒ݂ܵܬܹ̈ܐ ܦܪ̈ܝܼܫܹܐ، ܐܲܝܟ݂ ܫܵܦܵܩܲܬ ܕܦܝܼܫܬܵܐ ܝܠܵܗ̇ ܝܘܼܗ݇ܒܸܠܬܵܐ ܐܸܠܲܢ. ܐܸܢ ܢܒ݂ܝܼܘܼܬܵܐ، ܢܲܒܲܚ ܐܲܝܟ݂ ܟܝܘܼܠܵܐ ܕܗܲܝܡܵܢܘܼܬܲܢ؛
TRL: Eet lan mawhwate preeshe, aykh shapaqat dpeeshta-ylaha yoebilta ilan. In nweeoeta, nabakh aykh kyoela dhaymanoetan;
ENG: And having gifts differing according to the grace that was given to us, whether prophecy, let us prophesy according to the proportion of our faith;

ASY: ܘܐܸܢ ܚܸܠܡܲܬ، ܥܵܒ݂ܕܲܚ ܚܸܠܡܲܬ؛ ܐܸܢ ܡܲܠܦܵܢܵܐ ܝܠܹܗ، ܒܝܘܼܠܦܵܢܹܗ؛
TRL: O in khilmat, 'awdakh khilmat; in malpana-yleh, byoelpaneh;
ENG: or ministry, let us give ourselves to our ministry; or he that teacheth, to his teaching;

ASY: ܐܸܢ ܝܵܗ݇ܒ݂ܵܢܵܐ ܕܠܸܒܵܐ ܝܠܹܗ، ܒܝܲܗ݇ܒܲܠܬܵܐ ܕܠܸܒܵܐ؛ ܐܸܢ ܗܲܝܸܪܵܢܵܐ ܕܣܢܝܼܩܹ̈ܐ ܝܠܹܗ، ܗܲܝܸܪ ܒܦܫܝܼܛܘܼܬܵܐ؛ ܘܐܸܢ ܡܗܲܕܝܵܢܵܐ ܝܠܹܗ، ܡܗܲܕܹܐ ܒܚܦܝܼܛܘܼܬܵܐ؛ ܘܐܸܢ ܥܵܒ݂ܕܵܢܵܐ ܕܪ̈ܲܚܡܹܐ ܝܠܹܗ، ܥܵܒܹܕ ܪ̈ܲܚܡܹܐ ܒܦܨܝܼܚܘܼܬܵܐ.
TRL: In yawana dliba-yleh, byabalta dliba; in hayirana dsneeqe-yleh, hayir bpsheeṭoeta; o in mhadyana-yleh, mhade bkhpeeṭoeta; o in 'awdana drakhme-yleh, 'abed rakhme bpṣeekhoeta.
ENG: or he that exhorteth, to his exhorting: he that giveth, let him do it with liberality; he that ruleth, with diligence; he that sheweth mercy, with cheerfulness.

ASY: ܠܵܐ ܗܵܘܹܐ ܚܘܼܒܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܥܲܠܕܝܼܵܢܵܐ؛ ܗܵܘܹܝܬܘܿܢ ܒܸܣܢܵܝܵܐ ܠܒܝܼܫܬܵܐ ܘܒܸܬܒܵܥܵܐ ܠܛܵܒ݂ܬܵܐ.
TRL: La hawe khoebawkhoon 'aldeeana; haweytoon bisnaya lbeeshta o bitba'a lṭawta.
ENG: Let love be without hypocrisy. Abhor that which is evil; cleave to that which is good.

ASY: ܗܵܘܹܝܬܘܿܢ ܡܲܚܘܼܒܹܐ ܚܲܕ ܠܗ̇ܘ ܐ݇ܚܹܪ݇ܢܵܐ ܒܚܘܼܒܵܐ ܕܐܲܚܘܿܢܘܼܬܵܐ. ܡܝܲܩܪܘܼܢ ܠܐ݇ܚܹܪ̈݇ܢܹܐ ܒܘܼܫ ܙܵܘܕܵܐ ܡ̣ܢ ܕܠܓܵܢܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ.
TRL: Haweytoon makhoebe khad lhaw khena bkhoeba dakhoonoeta. Myaqroen lkhene boesh zawda min dlganawkhoon.
ENG: In love of the brethren be tenderly affectioned one to another; in honour preferring one another;

ASY: ܗܵܘܹܝܬܘܿܢ ܚܲܦܛܵܢܹ̈ܐ ܘܠܵܐ ܡܲܟܣܸܠܵܢܹ̈ܐ، ܗܵܘܹܝܬܘܿܢ ܒܸܪܬܵܚܵܐ ܒܪܘܼܚܵܐ، ܗܵܘܹܝܬܘܿܢ ܒܸܦܠܵܚܵܐ ܠܡܵܪܝܵܐ.
TRL: Haweytoon khapṭane o la maksilane, haweytoon birtakha broekha, haweytoon biplakha lmarya.
ENG: in diligence not slothful; fervent in spirit; serving the Lord;

ASY: ܗܵܘܹܝܬܘܿܢ ܒܸܚܕܵܝܵܐ ܒܗܹܒ݂ܝܼܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ، ܗܵܘܹܝܬܘܿܢ ܒܸܚܡܵܠܵܐ ܒܐܘܼܠܨܵܢܵܘ̈ܟ݂ܘܿܢ، ܘܗܵܘܹܝܬܘܿܢ ܐܲܡܝܼܢܵܐܝܼܬ ܒܨܠܘܿܬܵܐ.
TRL: Haweytoon bikhdaya bheweeawkhoon, haweytoon bikhmala boelṣanawkhoon, o haweytoon ameenaeet bṣloota.
ENG: rejoicing in hope; patient in tribulation; continuing stedfastly in prayer;

ASY: ܗܵܘܹܝܬܘܿܢ ܫܲܪ̈ܝܼܟܹܐ ܒܣܢܝܼܩܘܼܬܵܐ ܕܩܲܕܝܼܫܹ̈ܐ، ܗܵܘܹܝܬܘܿܢ ܡܪ̈ܲܚܡܵܢܹܐ ܠܢܘܼܟ݂ܪ̈ܵܝܹܐ.
TRL: Haweytoon shareeke bsneeqoeta dqadeeshe, haweytoon mrakhmane lnoekhraye.
ENG: communicating to the necessities of the saints; given to hospitality.

ASY: ܒܲܪܟ݂ܘܼܢ ܠܐܵܢܝܼ ܕܟܲܡܪܝܼ ܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ، ܒܲܪܟ݂ܘܼܢ ܘܠܵܐ ܠܵܝܛܝܼܬܘܿܢ.
TRL: Barkhoen lanee dkamree lawkhoon, barkhoen o la layṭeetoon.
ENG: Bless them that persecute you; bless, and curse not.

ASY: ܚܕܹܝܡܘܼܢ ܥܲܡ ܐܵܢܝܼ ܕܚܵܕܝܼ ܘܒܟܹܝܡܘܼܢ ܥܲܡ ܐܵܢܝܼ ܕܒܵܟ݂ܝܼ.
TRL: Khdeymoen 'am anee dkhadee o bkeymoen 'am anee dbakhee.
ENG: Rejoice with them that rejoice; weep with them that weep.

ASY: ܗܵܘܹܝܬܘܿܢ ܒܚܲܕ ܪܸܥܝܵܢܵܐ ܚܲܕ ܥܲܡ ܗ̇ܘ ܐ݇ܚܹܪ݇ܢܵܐ. ܠܵܐ ܗܵܘܹܝܬܘܿܢ ܫܲܒ݂ܗܸܪ̈ܵܢܹܐ، ܐܸܠܵܐ ܗܘܹܝܡܘܼܢ ܥܲܡ ܐܵܢܝܼ ܕܝܼܢܵܐ ܡܲܟܝܼܟܹ̈ܐ. ܠܵܐ ܗܵܘܹܝܬܘܿܢ ܚܲܟܝܼܡܹ̈ܐ ܒܪܸܥܝܵܢܵܐ ܕܓܵܢܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ.
TRL: Haweytoon bkhad ri'yana khad 'am haw khena. La haweytoon shawhirane, ila hweymoen 'am anee deena makeeke. La haweytoon khakeeme bri'yana dganawkhoon.
ENG: Be of the same mind one toward another. Set not your mind on high things, but condescend to things that are lowly. Be not wise in your own conceits.

ASY: ܠܵܐ ܦܵܪܥܝܼܬܘܿܢ ܠܐ݇ܢܵܫܵܐ ܒܝܼܫܬܵܐ ܡ̣ܢ ܓܹܒܵܐ ܕܒܝܼܫܬܵܐ، ܘܥܒ݂ܘܿܕܘܼܢ ܛܵܒ݂ܵܬܹ̈ܐ ܩܵܕ݇ܡ ܟܠܲܝܗܝ ܐ݇ܢܵܫܹ̈ܐ.
TRL: La par'eetoon lnasha beeshta min geba dbeeshta, o 'woodoen ṭawate qam klayhy nashe.
ENG: Render to no man evil for evil. Take thought for things honourable in the sight of all men.

ASY: ܘܐܸܢ ܡܵܨܝܵܐ، ܟܡܵܐ ܕܡ̣ܢ ܠܟܸܣ ܠܵܘ݂ܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܗܵܘܝܵܐ، ܗܘܹܝܡܘܼܢ ܒܫܠܵܡܵܐ ܥܲܡ ܟܠܲܝܗܝ ܐ݇ܢܵܫܹ̈ܐ.
TRL: O in maṣya, kma dmin lkis law݂khoon hawya, hweymoen bshlama 'am klayhy nashe.
ENG: If it be possible, as much as in you lieth, be at peace with all men.

ASY: ܠܵܐ ܫܵܩܠܝܼܬܘܿܢ ܬܘܼܥܠܵܐ ܕܓܵܢܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ، ܡܘܼܚܸܒܝܼ̈، ܐܝܼܢܵܐ ܫܒ݂ܘܿܩܘܼܢ ܕܘܼܟܵܐ ܩܵܐ ܟܲܪܒܵܐ ܕܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ، ܣܵܒܵܒ ܟܬܝܼܒ݂ܵܐ ܝܠܹܗ: ܫܩܵܠܬܵܐ ܕܬܘܼܥܠܵܐ ܕܝܼܝܼ ܝܠܵܗ̇، ܐܵܢܵܐ ܒܸܬ ܦܵܪܥܹܢ، ܒܹܐܡܵܪܵܐ ܝܠܹܗ ܡܵܪܝܵܐ.
TRL: La shaqleetoon toe'la dganawkhoon, moekhibee, eena shwooqoen doeka qa karba dalaha, sabab kteewa-yleh: shqalta dtoe'la deeee-ylaha, ana bit par'en, bemara-yleh Marya.
ENG: Avenge not yourselves, beloved, but give place unto wrath: for it is written, Vengeance belongeth unto me; I will recompense, saith the Lord.

ASY: ܐܝܼܢܵܐ ܐܸܢ ܟܵܦܹܢ ܕܸܫܡܸܢܘܼܟ݂ ܡܲܐܟܸܠ ܠܹܗ، ܘܐܸܢ ܨܵܗܹܐ ܡܲܫܬܝܼ ܠܹܗ، ܣܵܒܵܒ ܐܸܢ ܥܵܒ݂ܕܹܬ ܐܲܢܹܐ ܐܸܠܹܗ، ܓܘܼܡܪܹ̈ܐ ܕܢܘܼܪܵܐ ܒܸܬ ܓ̰ܲܡܥܸܬ ܥܲܠ ܩܲܪܩܲܦܬܹܗ.
TRL: Eena in kapen dishminoekh makil-leh, o in ṣahe mashtee-leh, sabab in 'awdet ane ileh, goemre dnoera bit jam'it 'al qarqapteh.
ENG: But if thine enemy hunger, feed him; if he thirst, give him to drink: for in so doing thou shalt heap coals of fire upon his head.

ASY: ܠܵܐ ܓ݂ܵܠܒܵܐ ܠܘܼܟ݂ ܒܝܼܫܬܵܐ، ܐܝܼܢܵܐ ܓ݂ܠܘܿܒ ܠܒܝܼܫܬܵܐ ܒܛܵܒ݂ܬܵܐ.
TRL: La ghalba-loekh beeshta, eena ghloob lbeeshta bṭawta.
ENG: Be not overcome of evil, but overcome evil with good.

ASY: ܟܠ ܚܲܕ ܫܵܠܹܡ ܠܫܘܼܠܛܵܢܹ̈ܐ ܥܸܠܵܝܹ̈ܐ، ܣܵܒܵܒ ܠܲܝܬ ܫܘܼܠܛܵܢܵܐ ܐܸܠܵܐ ܡ̣ܢ ܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ. ܘܫܘܼܠܛܵܢܹ̈ܐ ܕܐܝܼܬ، ܦܝܼܫܹܐ ܝܢܵܐ ܝܘܼܗ݇ܒܹܐ ܒܝܲܕ ܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ.
TRL: Kl khad shalem lshoelṭane 'ilaye, sabab layt shoelṭana ila min Alaha. O shoelṭane deet, peeshe yna yoebe byad Alaha.
ENG: Let every soul be in subjection to the higher powers: for there is no power but of God; and the powers that be are ordained of God.

ASY: ܒܘܼܬ ܐܵܗܵܐ، ܡ̇ܢ ܕܩܵܐܹܡ ܕܲܠܩܘܼܒ݂ܠ ܕܫܘܼܠܛܵܢܵܐ ܒܸܩܝܵܡܵܐ ܝܠܹܗ ܕܲܠܩܘܼܒ݂ܠ ܕܦܘܼܩܕܵܢܵܐ ܕܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ، ܘܐܵܢܝܼ ܕܩܵܝܡܝܼ ܕܲܠܩܘܼܒ݂ܠ ܕܦܘܼܩܕܵܢܵܐ ܕܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ ܒܸܬ ܩܲܒܠܝܼ ܕܝܵܢܬܵܐ ܥܲܠ ܓܵܢܲܝܗܝ.
TRL: Boet aha, man dqaem dalqoewl dshoelṭana biqyama-yleh dalqoewl dpoeqdana dalaha, o anee dqaymee dalqoewl dpoeqdana dalaha bit qablee dyanta 'al ganayhy.
ENG: Therefore he that resisteth the power, withstandeth the ordinance of God: and they that withstand shall receive to themselves judgment.

ASY: ܫܲܠܝܼܛܹ̈ܐ ܠܹܐ ܝܢܵܐ ܙܕܘܼܥܬܵܐ ܠܐܵܢܝܼ ܕܥܵܒ݂ܕܝܼ ܛܵܒ݂ܵܬܹ̈ܐ، ܐܸܠܵܐ ܠܐܵܢܝܼ ܕܥܵܒ݂ܕܝܼ ܒܝܼܫܵܬܹ̈ܐ. ܒܵܥܹܝܬ ܕܠܵܐ ܙܵܕܥܹܬ ܡ̣ܢ ܫܘܼܠܛܵܢܵܐ؟ ܥܒ݂ܘܿܕ ܛܵܒ݂ܬܵܐ، ܘܒܸܬ ܗܵܘܹܐ ܠܘܼܟ݂ ܚܸܩܪܵܐ ܡܸܢܹܗ.
TRL: Shaleeṭe le yna zdoe'ta lanee d'awdee ṭawate, ila lanee d'awdee beeshate. Ba'eyt dla zad'et min shoelṭana? 'wood ṭawta, o bit hawe-loekh khiqra mineh.
ENG: For rulers are not a terror to the good work, but to the evil. And wouldest thou have no fear of the power? do that which is good, and thou shalt have praise from the same:

ASY: ܣܵܒܵܒ ܥܵܒ݂ܕܵܢܵܐ ܕܚܸܠܡܲܬ ܕܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ ܝܠܹܗ ܐܸܠܘܼܟ݂ ܠܛܵܒ݂ܬܵܐ. ܐܝܼܢܵܐ ܐܸܢ ܥܵܒ݂ܕܹܬ ܒܝܼܫܬܵܐ، ܙܕܸܥ، ܣܵܒܵܒ ܫܘܼܠܛܵܢܵܐ ܠܹܐ ܝܠܹܗ ܫܩܝܼܠܵܐ ܣܲܝܦܵܐ ܒܣܪܝܼܩܘܼܬܵܐ. ܗ̇ܘ ܥܵܒ݂ܕܵܢܵܐ ܕܚܸܠܡܲܬ ܕܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ ܝܠܹܗ، ܘܫܵܩܠܵܢܵܐ ܕܬܘܼܥܠܵܐ ܕܟܲܪܒܵܐ ܡ̣ܢ ܗ̇ܘ ܕܥܵܒܹܕ ܒܝܼܫܬܵܐ.
TRL: Sabab 'awdana dkhilmat dalaha-yleh iloekh lṭawta. Eena in 'awdet beeshta, zdi', sabab shoelṭana le-yleh shqeela saypa bsreeqoeta. Haw 'awdana dkhilmat dalaha-yleh, o shaqlana dtoe'la dkarba min haw d'abed beeshta.
ENG: for he is a minister of God to thee for good. But if thou do that which is evil, be afraid; for he beareth not the sword in vain: for he is a minister of God, an avenger for wrath to him that doeth evil.

ASY: ܗܲܕܟ݂ܵܐ ܘܵܠܹܐ ܝܠܵܗ̇ ܕܗܵܘܲܚ ܫܵܠܡܵܢܹ̈ܐ، ܠܵܐ ܐܲܚܟ̰ܝܼ ܕܒܸܬ ܦܵܝܫܲܚ ܕܝܼܢܹܐ ܒܟܲܪܒܵܐ، ܐܝܼܢܵܐ ܐܘܼܦ ܒܘܼܬ ܐܸܢܝܲܬܲܢ.
TRL: Hadkha wale-ylaha dhawakh shalmane, la akhchee dbit payshakh deene bkarba, eena oep boet inyatan.
ENG: Wherefore ye must needs be in subjection, not only because of the wrath, but also for conscience sake.

ASY: ܒܘܼܬ ܐܵܗܵܐ ܟܹܐ ܦܵܪܥܝܼܬܘܿܢ ܙܘܼܙܵܐ ܕܪܹܫܝܼܬܵܐ، ܣܵܒܵܒ ܫܘܼܠܛܵܢܹ̈ܐ ܥܵܒ݂ܕܵܢܹ̈ܐ ܕܚܸܠܡܲܬ ܕܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ ܝܢܵܐ، ܘܟܹܐ ܕܵܒ݂ܚܝܼ ܥܕܵܢܲܝܗܝ ܠܐܵܗܵܐ ܫܘܼܠܵܐ.
TRL: Boet aha ke par'eetoon zoeza dresheeta, sabab shoelṭane 'awdane dkhilmat dalaha yna, o ke dawkhee 'danayhy-laha shoela.
ENG: For for this cause ye pay tribute also; for they are ministers of God’s service, attending continually upon this very thing.

ASY: ܦܪܸܥܡܘܼܢ ܠܐ݇ܢܵܫܵܐ ܕܕܲܝܢܵܢܹܐ ܝܬܘܿܢ ܐܸܠܹܗ. ܠܡ̇ܢ ܕܪܹܫܝܼܬܵܐ، ܪܹܫܝܼܬܵܐ، ܘܠܡ̇ܢ ܕܡܲܟ݂ܣܵܐ، ܡܲܟ݂ܣܵܐ، ܘܠܡ̇ܢ ܕܙܕܘܼܥܬܵܐ، ܙܕܘܼܥܬܵܐ، ܘܠܡ̇ܢ ܕܐܝܼܩܵܪܵܐ، ܐܝܼܩܵܪܵܐ.
TRL: Pri'moen lnasha ddaynane ytoon ileh. Lman dresheeta, resheeta, o lman dmakhsa, makhsa, o lman dzdoe'ta, zdoe'ta, o lman deeqara, eeqara.
ENG: Render to all their dues: tribute to whom tribute is due; custom to whom custom; fear to whom fear; honour to whom honour.

ASY: ܠܵܐ ܗܵܘܹܝܬܘܿܢ ܕܲܝܢܵܢܹ̈ܐ ܠܐܘܼܦ ܚܲܕ، ܫܒ݂ܘܿܩ ܡ̣ܢ ܕܡܲܚܸܒܝܼܬܘܿܢ ܚܲܕ ܠܗ̇ܘ ܐ݇ܚܹܪ݇ܢܵܐ، ܣܵܒܵܒ ܡ̇ܢ ܕܡܲܚܸܒ ܠܚܲܕ ܐ݇ܚܹܪ݇ܢܵܐ، ܬܲܡܘܼܡܹܐ ܝܠܹܗ ܢܵܡܘܿܣܵܐ.
TRL: La haweytoon daynane loep khad, shwooq min dmakhibeetoon khad lhaw khena, sabab man dmakhib lkhad khena, tamoeme-yleh namoosa.
ENG: Owe no man anything, save to love one another: for he that loveth his neighbour hath fulfilled the law.

ASY: ܦܘܼܩܕܵܢܹ̈ܐ ܒܹܐܡܵܪܵܐ ܝܢܵܐ: ܠܵܐ ܙܵܢܹܝܬ، ܠܵܐ ܩܵܛܠܹܬ، ܠܵܐ ܓܵܢܒܹܬ، ܠܵܐ ܫܲܗܘܸܬܸܬ. ܘܐܸܢ ܐܝܼܬ ܦܘܼܩܕܵܢܵܐ ܐ݇ܚܹܪ݇ܢܵܐ، ܦܝܼܫܵܐ ܝܠܹܗ ܚܒ݂ܝܼܫܵܐ ܓܵܘ ܐܵܗܵܐ ܦܘܼܩܕܵܢܵܐ: ܡܲܚܸܒܸܬ ܠܫܒ݂ܵܒ݂ܘܼܟ݂ ܐܲܝܟ݂ ܓܵܢܘܼܟ݂.
TRL: Poeqdane bemara yna: la zaneyt, la qaṭlet, la ganbet, la shahwitit. O in eet poeqdana khena, peesha-yleh khweesha gaw aha poeqdana: makhibit lshwawoekh aykh ganoekh.
ENG: For this, Thou shalt not commit adultery, Thou shalt not kill, Thou shalt not steal, Thou shalt not covet, and if there be any other commandment, it is summed up in this word, namely, Thou shalt love thy neighbour as thyself.

ASY: ܚܘܼܒܵܐ ܠܹܐ ܦܵܠܹܚ ܒܝܼܫܬܵܐ ܠܫܒ݂ܵܒܹܗ. ܗܲܕܟ݂ܵܐ ܚܘܼܒܵܐ ܬܵܡܲܡܬܵܐ ܕܢܵܡܘܿܣܵܐ ܝܠܹܗ.
TRL: Khoeba le palekh beeshta lshwabeh. Hadkha khoeba tamamta dnamoosa-yleh.
ENG: Love worketh no ill to his neighbour: love therefore is the fulfillment of the law.

ASY: ܗܵܐ ܟܹܐ ܝܵܕܥܝܼܬܘܿܢ ܕܐܵܕܝܼܵܐ ܝܠܵܗ̇ ܥܕܵܢܵܐ ܕܪܵܥܫܝܼܬܘܿܢ ܡ̣ܢ ܫܸܢܬܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ، ܣܵܒܵܒ ܦܘܼܪܩܵܢܲܢ ܐܵܕܝܼܵܐ ܒܘܼܫ ܩܘܼܪܒܵܐ ܝܠܹܗ ܐܸܠܲܢ ܡ̣ܢ ܕܗܘܼܡܸܢܲܢ ܒܫܘܼܪܵܝܵܐ.
TRL: Ha ke yad'eetoon dadeea-ylaha 'dana dra'sheetoon min shintawkhoon, sabab poerqanan adeea boesh qoerba-yleh ilan min dhoeminan bshoeraya.
ENG: And this, knowing the season, that now it is high time for you to awake out of sleep: for now is salvation nearer to us than when we first believed.

ASY: ܠܲܝܠܹܐ ܒܸܥܒ݂ܵܪܵܐ ܝܠܹܗ، ܘܐܝܼܡܵܡܵܐ ܩܲܪܒܘܼܢܹܐ ܝܠܹܗ. ܫܵܒ݂ܩܲܚ ܠܗܘܿܢ ܦܘܼܠܚܵܢܹ̈ܐ ܕܚܸܫܟܵܐ ܘܠܵܒ݂ܫܲܚ ܙܲܝܢܵܐ ܕܒܲܗܪܵܐ.
TRL: Layle bi'wara-yleh, o eemama qarboene-yleh. Shawqakh-lhoon poelkhane dkhishka o lawshakh zayna dbahra.
ENG: The night is far spent, and the day is at hand: let us therefore cast off the works of darkness, and let us put on the armour of light.

ASY: ܚܵܕܪܲܚ ܒܢܲܟ݂ܦܘܼܬܵܐ ܐܲܝܟ݂ ܕܒܝܵܘܡܵܐ ܒܸܚܕܵܪܵܐ ܝܘܲܚ، ܠܵܐ ܒܫܪܝܼܚܘܼܬܵܐ ܘܒܪܵܘܵܝܘܼܬܵܐ، ܘܒܕܡܵܟ݂ܵܐ ܛܲܢܦܵܐ، ܘܒܦܲܚܙܘܼܬܵܐ، ܘܒܡܲܩܲܪܵܨܘܼܬܵܐ، ܘܒܒܲܚܸܠܵܢܘܼܬܵܐ،
TRL: Khadrakh bnakhpoeta aykh dbyawma bikhdara ywakh, la bshreekhoeta o brawayoeta, o bdmakha ṭanpa, o bpakhzoeta, o bmaqaraṣoeta, o bbakhilanoeta,
ENG: Let us walk honestly, as in the day; not in revelling and drunkenness, not in chambering and wantonness, not in strife and jealousy.

ASY: ܐܝܼܢܵܐ ܠܒ݂ܘܿܫܘܼܢ ܠܡܵܪܲܢ ܝܼܫܘܿܥ ܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ، ܘܠܵܐ ܬܲܚܡܸܢܝܼܬܘܿܢ ܠܣܲܦܘܼܝܹܗ ܦܲܓ݂ܪܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܠܗܲܕܟ݂ܵܐ ܫܲܗܘܲܬܝܵܬܹ̈ܐ.
TRL: Eena lwooshoen lmaran eeshoo' msheekha, o la takhmineetoon lsapoeyeh paghrawkhoon lhadkha shahwatyate.
ENG: But put ye on the Lord Jesus Christ, and make not provision for the flesh, to fulfill the lusts thereof.

ASY: ܩܲܒܠܘܼܢ ܠܗ̇ܘ ܕܝܼܠܹܗ ܙܲܒܘܼܢ ܒܗܲܝܡܵܢܘܼܬܵܐ، ܠܵܐ ܒܕܝܵܢܬܵܐ ܕܚܘܼܫܵܒܹ̈ܐ.
TRL: Qabloen lhaw deeleh zaboen bhaymanoeta, la bdyanta dkhoeshabe.
ENG: But him that is weak in faith receive ye, yet not to doubtful disputations.

ASY: ܚܲܕ ܟܹܐ ܗܲܡܸܢ ܕܐܵܟܹܠ ܟܠܲܝܗܝ ܡܹܐܟ݂ܘܼܠܝܵܬܹ̈ܐ، ܗ̇ܘ ܐ݇ܚܹܪ݇ܢܵܐ ܕܝܼܠܹܗ ܙܲܒܘܼܢ ܒܗܲܝܡܵܢܘܼܬܵܐ ܟܹܐ ܗܲܡܸܢ ܕܐܵܟܹܠ ܐܲܚܟ̰ܝܼ ܝܲܪ̈ܩܹܐ.
TRL: Khad ke hamin dakel klayhy mekhoelyate, haw khena deeleh zaboen bhaymanoeta ke hamin dakel akhchee yarqe.
ENG: One man hath faith to eat all things: but he that is weak eateth herbs.

ASY: ܗ̇ܘ ܕܐܵܟܹܠ ܟܠ ܡܹܐܟ݂ܘܼܠܬܵܐ ܠܵܐ ܡܲܣܠܹܐ ܠܗ̇ܘ ܕܠܹܐ ܐܵܟܹܠ. ܗ̇ܘ ܕܠܹܐ ܐܵܟܹܠ ܟܠ ܡܹܐܟ݂ܘܼܠܬܵܐ ܠܵܐ ܡܲܣܠܹܐ ܠܗ̇ܘ ܕܐܵܟܹܠ، ܣܵܒܵܒ ܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ ܩܘܼܒܠܹܗ ܝܠܹܗ.
TRL: Haw dakel kl mekhoelta la masle lhaw dle akel. Haw dle akel kl mekhoelta la masle lhaw dakel, sabab Alaha qoebleh-yleh.
ENG: Let not him that eateth set at nought him that eateth not; and let not him that eateth not judge him that eateth: for God hath received him.

ASY: ܡܵܢܝܼ ܝܘܸܬ ܐܲܢ݇ܬ ܕܕܵܝܢܹܬ ܠܪܹܓܵܐ ܕܚܲܕ ܐ݇ܚܹܪ݇ܢܵܐ؟ ܐܸܢ ܨܦܵܝܝܼ ܝܠܹܗ، ܩܵܐ ܡܵܪܹܗ ܝܠܹܗ ܨܦܵܝܝܼ؛ ܘܐܸܢ ܚܸܪܒܵܐ ܝܠܹܗ، ܩܵܐ ܡܵܪܹܗ ܝܠܹܗ ܚܸܪܒܵܐ. ܒܸܬ ܗܵܘܹܐ ܨܦܵܝܝܼ ܣܵܒܵܒ ܡܵܪܲܢ ܒܸܬ ܥܵܒܹܕ ܠܹܗ ܨܦܵܝܝܼ.
TRL: Manee ywit at ddaynet lrega dkhad khena? In ṣpayee-yleh, qa mareh-yleh ṣpayee; o in khirba-yleh, qa mareh-yleh khirba. Bit hawe ṣpayee sabab Maran bit 'abed-leh ṣpayee.
ENG: Who art thou that judgest the servant of another? to his own lord he standeth or falleth. Yea, he shall be made to stand; for the Lord hath power to make him stand.

ASY: ܚܲܕ ܐ݇ܢܵܫܵܐ ܟܹܐ ܚܵܫܹܒ݂ ܕܚܲܕ ܝܵܘܡܵܐ ܒܘܼܫ ܡܩܘܼܕܫܵܐ ܝܠܹܗ ܡ̣ܢ ܟܠܲܝܗܝ ܝܵܘܡܵܢܹ̈ܐ، ܘܗ̇ܘ ܐ݇ܚܹܪ݇ܢܵܐ ܟܹܐ ܚܵܫܹܒ݂ ܕܟܠܲܝܗܝ ܝܵܘܡܵܢܹ̈ܐ ܡܐܲܝܟ݂ ܥܘܼܕܵܠܹ̈ܐ ܝܢܵܐ. ܫܒ݂ܘܿܩ ܟܠ ܚܲܕ ܗܵܘܹܐ ܒܚܘܼܫܵܒ݂ܵܐ ܕܓܵܢܹܗ.
TRL: Khad nasha ke khashew dkhad yawma boesh mqoedsha-yleh min klayhy yawmane, o haw khena ke khashew dklayhy yawmane maykh 'oedale yna. Shwooq kl khad hawe bkhoeshawa dganeh.
ENG: One man esteemeth one day above another: another esteemeth every day alike. Let each man be fully assured in his own mind.

ASY: ܗ̇ܘ ܕܟܹܐ ܡܝܲܩܸܪ ܠܚܲܕ ܝܵܘܡܵܐ ܒܘܼܫ ܙܵܘܕܵܐ ܡ̣ܢ ܟܠܲܝܗܝ ܝܵܘܡܵܢܹ̈ܐ، ܒܘܼܬ ܡܵܪܝܵܐ ܟܹܐ ܡܝܲܩܸܪܹܗ. ܗ̇ܘ ܕܐܵܟܹܠ، ܩܵܐ ܡܵܪܝܵܐ ܟܹܐ ܐܵܟܹܠ، ܣܵܒܵܒ ܟܹܐ ܫܲܟܸܪ ܠܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ. ܗ̇ܘ ܕܠܹܐ ܐܵܟܹܠ ܩܵܐ ܡܵܪܝܵܐ ܠܹܐ ܐܵܟܹܠ، ܘܟܹܐ ܫܲܟܸܪ ܠܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ.
TRL: Haw dke myaqir lkhad yawma boesh zawda min klayhy yawmane, boet Marya ke myaqireh. Haw dakel, qa Marya ke akel, sabab ke shakir lalaha. Haw dle akel qa Marya le akel, o ke shakir lalaha.
ENG: He that regardeth the day, regardeth it unto the Lord: and he that eateth, eateth unto the Lord, for he giveth God thanks; and he that eateth not, unto the Lord he eateth not, and giveth God thanks.

ASY: ܣܵܒܵܒ ܐܘܼܦ ܚܲܕ ܡܸܢܲܢ ܠܹܐ ܚܵܝܹܐ ܠܓܵܢܹܗ، ܘܐܘܼܦ ܚܲܕ ܡܸܢܲܢ ܠܹܐ ܡܵܐܹܬ ܠܓܵܢܹܗ.
TRL: Sabab oep khad minan le khaye lganeh, o oep khad minan le maet lganeh.
ENG: For none of us liveth to himself, and none dieth to himself.

ASY: ܣܵܒܵܒ ܐܸܢ ܚܵܝܲܚ ܠܡܵܪܝܵܐ ܒܸܬ ܚܵܝܲܚ، ܘܐܸܢ ܡܵܝܬܲܚ ܠܡܵܪܝܵܐ ܒܸܬ ܡܵܝܬܲܚ. ܗܲܕܟ݂ܵܐ، ܐܸܢ ܚܵܝܲܚ ܘܐܸܢ ܡܵܝܬܲܚ، ܕܡܵܪܝܵܐ ܝܘܲܚ.
TRL: Sabab in khayakh lmarya bit khayakh, o in maytakh lmarya bit maytakh. Hadkha, in khayakh o in maytakh, dmarya ywakh.
ENG: For whether we live, we live unto the Lord; or whether we die, we die unto the Lord: whether we live therefore, or die, we are the Lord’s.

ASY: ܒܘܼܬ ܐܵܗܵܐ، ܐܘܼܦ ܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ ܡܝܼܬ ܠܹܗ ܘܩܝܼܡ ܠܹܗ ܕܗܵܘܹܐ ܡܵܪܵܐ ܕܡܝܼܬܹ̈ܐ ܘܕܚܵܝܹ̈ܐ.
TRL: Boet aha, oep msheekha meet-leh o qeem-leh dhawe mara dmeete o dkhaye.
ENG: For to this end Christ died, and lived again, that he might be Lord of both the dead and the living.

ASY: ܩܵܡܘܿܕܝܼ ܒܸܕܝܵܢܵܐ ܝܘܸܬ ܠܐܲܚܘܿܢܘܼܟ݂ ܝܲܢ ܡܲܣܠܘܼܝܹܐ ܝܘܸܬ ܐܸܠܹܗ؟ ܣܵܒܵܒ ܟܠܲܢ ܒܸܬ ܟܵܠܲܚ ܩܵܕ݇ܡ ܟܘܼܪܣܝܵܐ ܕܕܝܼܘܵܢ ܕܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ.
TRL: Qamoodee bidyana ywit lakhoonoekh yan masloeye ywit ileh? Sabab klan bit kalakh qam koersya ddeewan dalaha.
ENG: But thou, why dost thou judge thy brother? or thou again, why dost thou set at nought thy brother? for we shall all stand before the judgment-seat of God.

ASY: ܐܲܝܟ݂ ܕܝܼܠܹܗ ܟܬܝܼܒ݂ܵܐ: ܕܵܐܟ݂ܝܼ ܕܐܵܢܵܐ ܚܵܝܵܐ ܝܘܸܢ، ܒܹܐܡܵܪܵܐ ܝܠܹܗ ܡܵܪܝܵܐ، ܟܠ ܒܘܼܪܟܵܐ ܒܸܬ ܒܵܪܟܵܐ ܐܸܠܝܼ، ܘܟܠ ܠܸܫܵܢܵܐ ܒܸܬ ܡܵܘܕܹܐ ܒܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ.
TRL: Aykh deeleh kteewa: dakhee dana khaya ywin, bemara-yleh Marya, kl boerka bit barka ilee, o kl lishana bit mawde balaha.
ENG: For it is written, As I live, saith the Lord, to me every knee shall bow, And every tongue shall confess to God.

ASY: ܗܲܕܟ݂ܵܐ ܟܠ ܚܲܕ ܡܸܢܲܢ ܒܸܬ ܝܲܗ݇ܒܸܠ ܓ̰ܘܼܘܵܒ ܒܘܼܬ ܓܵܢܹܗ ܠܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ.
TRL: Hadkha kl khad minan bit yabil joewab boet ganeh lalaha.
ENG: So then each one of us shall give account of himself to God.

ASY: ܒܘܼܬ ܐܵܗܵܐ ܠܵܐ ܕܵܝܢܲܚ ܚܲܕ ܠܗ̇ܘ ܐ݇ܚܹܪ݇ܢܵܐ، ܐܸܠܵܐ ܟܠ ܚܲܕ ܬܲܚܡܸܢ ܕܠܵܐ ܡܲܬܸܒ݂ ܡܸܢܕܝܼ ܕܗܵܘܹܐ ܬܲܪܩܲܠܬܵܐ ܝܲܢ ܥܵܒܹܕ ܠܐܲܚܘܿܢܘܼܗܝ ܕܢܵܦܹܠ.
TRL: Boet aha la daynakh khad lhaw khena, ila kl khad takhmin dla matiw mindee dhawe tarqalta yan 'abed lakhoonoehy dnapel.
ENG: Let us not therefore judge one another any more: but judge ye this rather, that no man put a stumblingblock in his brother’s way, or an occasion of falling.

ASY: ܐܵܢܵܐ ܟܹܐ ܝܵܕܥܹܢ ܘܗܲܡܘܼܢܹܐ ܝܘܸܢ ܒܡܵܪܲܢ ܝܼܫܘܿܥ، ܕܠܲܝܬ ܡܸܢܕܝܼ ܛܲܡܐܵܐ ܡ̣ܢ ܓܵܢܹܗ. ܐܸܢ ܚܲܕ ܐ݇ܢܵܫܵܐ ܚܵܫܹܒ݂ ܚܲܕ ܡܸܢܕܝܼ ܛܲܡܐܵܐ ܝܠܹܗ، ܗ̇ܝܓܵܗ ܗ̇ܘ ܡܸܢܕܝܼ ܛܲܡܐܵܐ ܝܠܹܗ ܩܵܐ ܗ̇ܘ ܐ݇ܢܵܫܵܐ.
TRL: Ana ke yad'en o hamoene ywin bmaran eeshoo', dlayt mindee ṭama min ganeh. In khad nasha khashew khad mindee ṭama-yleh, haygah haw mindee ṭama-yleh qa haw nasha.
ENG: I know, and am persuaded in the Lord Jesus, that nothing is unclean of itself: save that to him who accounteth anything to be unclean, to him it is unclean.

ASY: ܐܝܼܢܵܐ ܐܸܢ ܦܵܐܹܫ ܡܘܼܦܫܸܡܵܐ ܐܲܚܘܿܢܘܼܟ݂ ܒܡܹܐܟ݂ܘܼܠܬܵܐ، ܠܹܐ ܝܘܸܬ ܐ݇ܚܹܪ݇ܢܵܐ ܒܸܚܕܵܪܵܐ ܒܚܘܼܒܵܐ. ܠܵܐ ܛܲܠܩܸܬ ܒܡܹܐܟ݂ܘܼܠܬܘܼܟ݂ ܠܗ̇ܘ ܕܒܘܼܬ ܕܝܼܹܗ ܡܝܼܬ ܠܹܗ ܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ.
TRL: Eena in paesh moepshima akhoonoekh bmekhoelta, le ywit khena bikhdara bkhoeba. La ṭalqit bmekhoeltoekh lhaw dboet dee-eh meet-leh msheekha.
ENG: For if because of meat thy brother is grieved, thou walkest no longer in love. Destroy not with thy meat him for whom Christ died.

ASY: ܠܵܐ ܫܵܒ݂ܩܹܬ ܕܗܲܡܙܸܡܝܼ ܐ݇ܢܵܫܹ̈ܐ ܒܝܼܫܬܵܐ ܒܘܼܬ ܛܵܒ݂ܬܘܼܟ݂.
TRL: La shawqet dhamzimee nashe beeshta boet ṭawtoekh.
ENG: Let not then your good be evil spoken of:

ASY: ܡܲܠܟܘܼܬܵܐ ܕܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ ܠܹܐ ܝܠܵܗ̇ ܐ݇ܟ݂ܵܠܬܵܐ ܘܫܬܵܝܬܵܐ، ܐܝܼܢܵܐ ܙܲܕܝܼܩܘܼܬܵܐ، ܘܫܠܵܡܵܐ، ܘܚܲܕܘܼܬܵܐ ܒܪܘܼܚܵܐ ܕܩܘܼܕܫܵܐ.
TRL: Malkoeta dalaha le-ylaha khalta o shtayta, eena zadeeqoeta, o shlama, o khadoeta broekha dqoedsha.
ENG: for the kingdom of God is not eating and drinking, but righteousness and peace and joy in the Holy Ghost.

ASY: ܣܵܒܵܒ ܡ̇ܢ ܕܗܲܕܟ݂ܵܐ ܥܵܒܹܕ ܚܸܠܡܲܬ ܠܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ ܒܐܲܢܹܐ، ܩܒܝܼܠܵܐ ܝܠܹܗ ܒܝܲܕ ܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ ܘܫܦܝܼܪܵܐ ܝܠܹܗ ܩܵܕ݇ܡ ܒܢܲܝ̈ܢܵܫܵܐ.
TRL: Sabab man dhadkha 'abed khilmat lmsheekha bane, qbeela-yleh byad Alaha o shpeera-yleh qam bnaynasha.
ENG: For he that herein serveth Christ is well-pleasing to God, and approved of men.

ASY: ܒܘܼܬ ܐܵܗܵܐ ܬܵܒܥܲܚ ܠܡܸܢܕܝܼܵܢܹ̈ܐ ܕܥܵܒ݂ܕܝܼ ܫܠܵܡܵܐ ܘܡܸܢܕܝܼܵܢܹ̈ܐ ܕܒܵܢܝܼ ܚܲܕ ܠܗ̇ܘ ܐ݇ܚܹܪ݇ܢܵܐ.
TRL: Boet aha tab'akh lmindeeane d'awdee shlama o mindeeane dbanee khad lhaw khena.
ENG: So then let us follow after things which make for peace, and things whereby we may edify one another.

ASY: ܠܵܐ ܡܲܚܪܸܒܸܬ ܦܘܼܠܚܵܢܵܐ ܕܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ ܒܘܼܬ ܡܹܐܟ݂ܘܼܠܬܵܐ. ܟܠ ܡܸܢܕܝܼ ܕܸܟ݂ܝܵܐ ܝܠܹܗ، ܐܝܼܢܵܐ ܚܸܠܛܵܐ ܝܠܹܗ ܕܚܲܕ ܐ݇ܢܵܫܵܐ ܐܵܟܹܠ ܡܸܢܕܝܼ ܕܗܵܘܹܐ ܥܸܠܬܵܐ ܕܬܲܪܩܲܠܬܵܐ ܩܵܐ ܚܲܕ ܐ݇ܚܹܪ݇ܢܵܐ.
TRL: La makhribit poelkhana dalaha boet mekhoelta. Kl mindee dikhya-yleh, eena khilṭa-yleh dkhad nasha akel mindee dhawe 'ilta dtarqalta qa khad khena.
ENG: Overthrow not for meat’s sake the work of God. All things indeed are clean; howbeit it is evil for that man who eateth with offence.

ASY: ܨܦܵܝܝܼ ܝܠܵܗ̇ ܕܠܵܐ ܐܵܟ݂ܠܹܬ ܒܸܣܪܵܐ ܘܠܵܐ ܫܵܬܹܝܬ ܚܲܡܪܵܐ، ܘܠܵܐ ܡܸܢܕܝܼ ܐ݇ܚܹܪ݇ܢܵܐ، ܕܒܝܼܹܗ ܬܲܪܩܸܠܸܬ ܠܐܲܚܘܿܢܘܼܟ݂.
TRL: Ṣpayee-ylaha dla akhlet bisra o la shateyt khamra, o la mindee khena, dbee-eh tarqilit lakhoonoekh.
ENG: It is good not to eat flesh, nor to drink wine, nor to do anything whereby thy brother stumbleth.

ASY: ܟܠ ܕܵܐܟ݂ܝܼ ܕܗܲܡܸܢܸܬ ܒܘܼܬ ܐܲܢܹܐ، ܫܒ݂ܘܿܩ ܠܵܗ̇ ܒܹܝܠܘܼܟ݂ ܘܒܹܝܠ ܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ. ܛܘܼܒ݂ܵܐ ܠܐ݇ܢܵܫܵܐ ܕܠܵܐ ܕܵܐܹܢ ܠܓܵܢܹܗ ܒܡܸܢܕܝܼ ܕܓܲܒܹܐ.
TRL: Kl dakhee dhaminit boet ane, shwooq-laha beyloekh o beyl Alaha. Ṭoewa lnasha dla daen lganeh bmindee dgabe.
ENG: The faith which thou hast, have thou to thyself before God. Happy is he that judgeth not himself in that which he approveth.

ASY: ܐܝܼܢܵܐ ܗ̇ܘ ܕܐܝܼܬ ܠܹܗ ܫܸܟܘܼܬܵܐ ܘܐܵܟܹܠ ܒܸܬ ܦܵܐܹܫ ܕܝܼܢܵܐ، ܣܵܒܵܒ ܠܹܐ ܝܠܹܗ ܒܹܐܟ݂ܵܠܵܐ ܒܗܲܝܡܵܢܘܼܬܵܐ. ܟܠ ܡܸܢܕܝܼ ܕܠܹܐ ܝܠܹܗ ܡ̣ܢ ܗܲܝܡܵܢܘܼܬܵܐ ܚܛܝܼܬܵܐ ܝܠܹܗ.
TRL: Eena haw deet-leh shikoeta o akel bit paesh deena, sabab le-yleh bekhala bhaymanoeta. Kl mindee dle-yleh min haymanoeta khṭeeta-yleh.
ENG: But he that doubteth is condemned if he eat, because he eateth not of faith; and whatsoever is not of faith is sin.

ASY: ܐܲܚܢܲܢ ܕܝܼܘܲܚ ܚܲܝܠܵܢܹ̈ܐ ܘܵܠܹܐ ܝܠܵܗ̇ ܕܛܵܥܢܲܚ ܝܘܼܩܪܵܐ ܕܙܲܒܘܼܢܹ̈ܐ ܘܠܵܐ ܫܵܦܪܲܚ ܠܓܵܢܲܢ.
TRL: Akhnan deewakh khaylane wale-ylaha dṭa'nakh yoeqra dzaboene o la shaprakh lganan.
ENG: Now we that are strong ought to bear the infirmities of the weak, and not to please ourselves.

ASY: ܫܒ݂ܘܿܩ ܟܠ ܚܲܕ ܡܸܢܲܢ ܫܵܦܹܪ ܠܫܒ݂ܵܒܹܗ ܠܛܵܒ݂ܬܹܗ ܩܵܐ ܒܢܵܝܬܹܗ.
TRL: Shwooq kl khad minan shaper lshwabeh lṭawteh qa bnayteh.
ENG: Let each one of us please his neighbour for that which is good, unto edifying.

ASY: ܐܘܼܦ ܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ ܠܵܐ ܫܦܝܼܪܹܗ ܠܓܵܢܹܗ، ܐܲܝܟ݂ ܕܝܼܠܹܗ ܟܬܝܼܒ݂ܵܐ: ܠܵܘܡܵܐ ܕܠܵܝܡܵܢܘܼ̈ܟ݂ ܢܦܝܼܠ ܠܹܗ ܥܲܠܝܼ.
TRL: Oep msheekha la shpeereh lganeh, aykh deeleh kteewa: lawma dlaymanoekh npeel-leh 'alee.
ENG: For Christ also pleased not himself; but, as it is written, The reproaches of them that reproached thee fell upon me.

ASY: ܡܸܢܕܝܼܵܢܹ̈ܐ ܕܦܝܼܫܹܐ ܝܗ݇ܘܵܘ ܟܬܝܼܒܹܐ ܡ̣ܢ ܩܵܕ݇ܡܵܝܬܵܐ ܦܝܼܫܹܐ ܝܗ݇ܘܵܘ ܟܬܝܼܒܹܐ ܠܡܲܠܲܦܬܲܢ، ܕܗܵܘܹܐ ܠܲܢ ܗܹܒ݂ܝܼ ܒܝܲܕ ܚܡܵܠܬܵܐ ܘܝܲܗ݇ܒܲܠܬܵܐ ܕܠܸܒܵܐ ܡ̣ܢ ܟܬܵܒܹ̈ܐ ܩܲܕܝܼܫܹ̈ܐ.
TRL: Mindeeane dpeeshe ywaw kteebe min qamayta peeshe ywaw kteebe lmalaptan, dhawe lan hewee byad khmalta o yabalta dliba min ktabe qadeeshe.
ENG: For whatsoever things were written aforetime were written for our learning, that through patience and through comfort of the scriptures we might have hope.

ASY: ܘܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ ܕܝܼܠܹܗ ܡܲܒܘܼܥܵܐ ܕܚܡܵܠܬܵܐ ܘܕܝܲܗ݇ܒܲܠܬܵܐ ܕܠܸܒܵܐ ܥܵܒܹܕ ܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܕܚܵܫܒ݂ܝܼܬܘܿܢ ܚܲܕ ܡܸܢܕܝܼ ܚܲܕ ܠܗ̇ܘ ܐ݇ܚܹܪ݇ܢܵܐ ܐܲܝܟ݂ ܒܝܼܫܘܿܥ ܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ،
TRL: O Alaha deeleh maboe'a dkhmalta o dyabalta dliba 'abed lawkhoon dkhashweetoon khad mindee khad lhaw khena aykh beeshoo' msheekha,
ENG: Now the God of patience and of comfort grant you to be of the same mind one with another according to Christ Jesus:

ASY: ܕܗܵܘܹܝܬܘܿܢ ܒܚܲܕ ܠܸܒܵܐ ܘܒܚܲܕ ܩܵܠܵܐ ܫܲܒܘܼܚܹܐ ܠܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ ܕܝܼܠܹܗ ܒܵܒܵܐ ܕܡܵܪܲܢ ܝܼܫܘܿܥ ܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ.
TRL: Dhaweytoon bkhad liba o bkhad qala shaboekhe lalaha deeleh baba dmaran eeshoo' msheekha.
ENG: that with one accord ye may with one mouth glorify the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ.

ASY: ܒܘܼܬ ܐܵܗܵܐ ܩܲܒܠܘܼܢ ܚܲܕ ܠܗ̇ܘ ܐ݇ܚܹܪ݇ܢܵܐ ܕܵܐܟ݂ܝܼ ܕܐܘܼܦ ܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ ܩܘܼܒܸܠ ܠܹܗ ܐܸܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܩܵܐ ܫܘܼܒ݂ܚܵܐ ܕܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ.
TRL: Boet aha qabloen khad lhaw khena dakhee doep msheekha qoebil-leh ilawkhoon qa shoewkha dalaha.
ENG: Wherefore receive ye one another, even as Christ also received you, to the glory of God.

ASY: ܣܵܒܵܒ ܒܹܐܡܵܪܵܐ ܝܘܸܢ ܐܸܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܕܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ ܗܘܹܐ ܠܹܗ ܥܵܒ݂ܕܵܢܵܐ ܕܚܸܠܡܲܬ ܠܝܗܘܼܕܵܝܹ̈ܐ ܒܘܼܬ ܫܪܵܪܵܐ ܕܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ، ܕܡܲܩܘܹܐ ܩܵܘܠܹ̈ܐ ܝܘܼܗ݇ܒܹܐ ܠܒܵܒܵܘܵܬܹ̈ܐ،
TRL: Sabab bemara ywin ilawkhoon dmsheekha hwe-leh 'awdana dkhilmat lyhoedaye boet shrara dalaha, dmaqwe qawle yoebe lbabawate,
ENG: For I say that Christ hath been made a minister of the circumcision for the truth of God, that he might confirm the promises given unto the fathers,

ASY: ܘܕܐܸܡܘܵܬܹ̈ܐ ܫܲܒܚܝܼ ܠܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ ܒܘܼܬ ܪ̈ܲܚܡܘܼܗܝ، ܐܲܝܟ݂ ܕܝܼܠܹܗ ܟܬܝܼܒ݂ܵܐ: ܒܘܼܬ ܐܵܗܵܐ ܒܸܬ ܡܵܘܕܹܝܢ ܐܸܠܘܼܟ݂ ܓܵܘ ܐܸܡܘܵܬܹ̈ܐ، ܘܒܸܬ ܙܵܡܪܹܢ ܠܫܸܡܘܼܟ݂.
TRL: O dimwate shabkhee lalaha boet rakhmoehy, aykh deeleh kteewa: boet aha bit mawdeyn iloekh gaw imwate, o bit zamren lshimoekh.
ENG: and that the Gentiles might glorify God for his mercy; as it is written, Therefore will I give praise unto thee among the Gentiles, And sing unto thy name.

ASY: ܘܡܸܢܕܪܸܫ ܐ݇ܡܝܼܪܹܗ: ܚܕܹܝܡܘܼܢ، ܝܵܐ ܐܸܡܘܵܬܹ̈ܐ، ܥܲܡ ܥܲܡܹܗ.
TRL: O mindrish meereh: khdeymoen, ya imwate, 'am 'ameh.
ENG: And again he saith, Rejoice, ye Gentiles, with his people.

ASY: ܘܡܸܢܕܪܸܫ: ܫܲܒܚܘܼܢ ܠܡܵܪܝܵܐ ܟܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܐܸܡܘܵܬܹ̈ܐ ܘܫܲܒܚܘܼܢ ܠܹܗ ܟܠܲܝܗܝ ܥܲܡܡܹ̈ܐ.
TRL: O mindrish: shabkhoen lmarya klawkhoon imwate o shabkhoen-leh klayhy 'amme.
ENG: And again, Praise the Lord, all ye Gentiles; And let all the peoples praise him.

ASY: ܐܹܫܲܥܝܵܐ ܡܸܢܕܪܸܫ ܐ݇ܡܝܼܪܹܗ: ܒܸܬ ܦܵܠܹܛ ܘܲܪܝܼܕܵܐ ܡ̣ܢ ܐܝܼܫܲܝ، ܒܸܬ ܥܵܒܹܕ ܫܘܼܠܛܵܢܵܐ ܥܲܠ ܐܸܡܘܵܬܹ̈ܐ، ܘܐܸܡܘܵܬܹ̈ܐ ܒܸܬ ܗܵܘܝܼ ܠܗܘܿܢ ܗܹܒ݂ܝܼ ܒܝܼܹܗ.
TRL: Esha'ya mindrish meereh: bit paleṭ wareeda min eeshay, bit 'abed shoelṭana 'al imwate, o imwate bit hawee-lhoon hewee bee-eh.
ENG: And again, Isaiah saith, There shall be the root of Jesse, And he that ariseth to rule over the Gentiles; On him shall the Gentiles hope.

ASY: ܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ ܕܗܹܒ݂ܝܼ ܡܵܠܹܐ ܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܟܠܵܗ̇ ܚܲܕܘܼܬܵܐ ܘܫܠܵܡܵܐ ܒܗܵܡܲܢܬܵܐ ܒܝܼܹܗ، ܕܗܹܒ݂ܝܼܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܙܵܝܕܵܐ ܒܚܲܝܠܵܐ ܕܪܘܼܚܵܐ ܕܩܘܼܕܫܵܐ.
TRL: Alaha dhewee male lawkhoon klaha khadoeta o shlama bhamanta bee-eh, dheweeawkhoon zayda bkhayla droekha dqoedsha.
ENG: Now the God of hope fill you with all joy and peace in believing, that ye may abound in hope, in the power of the Holy Ghost.

ASY: ܐܵܢܵܐ ܒܓܵܢܝܼ ܗܲܡܘܼܢܹܐ ܝܘܸܢ ܒܝܼܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܐܲܚܘܿܢܘܵܬܝܼ̈، ܕܡܸܠܝܹܐ ܝܬܘܿܢ ܛܵܒ݂ܬܵܐ ܘܟܠܵܗ̇ ܝ݇ܕܲܥܬܵܐ، ܘܡܵܨܹܝܬܘܿܢ ܡܲܠܦܝܼܬܘܿܢ ܚܲܕ ܠܗ̇ܘ ܐ݇ܚܹܪ݇ܢܵܐ.
TRL: Ana bganee hamoene ywin beeawkhoon akhoonwatee, dmilye ytoon ṭawta o klaha da'ta, o maṣeytoon malpeetoon khad lhaw khena.
ENG: And I myself also am persuaded of you, my brethren, that ye yourselves are full of goodness, filled with all knowledge, able also to admonish one another.

ASY: ܐܝܼܢܵܐ ܒܩܲܫܕܲܪܬܵܐ ܓܘܼܪܬܵܐ ܟܬܝܼܒ݂ ܠܝܼ ܐܸܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܠܡܲܕܟ݂ܘܼܪܹܐ ܚܲܕ݇ܟܡܵܐ ܢܘܼܩܙܹ̈ܐ، ܒܝܲܕ ܫܵܦܵܩܲܬ ܕܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ ܕܦܝܼܫ ܠܵܗ̇ ܝܘܼܗ݇ܒܸܠܬܵܐ ܐܸܠܝܼ،
TRL: Eena bqashdarta goerta kteew-lee ilawkhoon lmadkhoere khakma noeqze, byad shapaqat dalaha dpeesh-laha yoebilta ilee,
ENG: But I write the more boldly unto you in some measure, as putting you again in remembrance, because of the grace that was given me of God,

ASY: ܕܗܵܘܹܝܢ ܥܵܒ݂ܕܵܢܵܐ ܕܚܸܠܡܲܬ ܕܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ ܝܼܫܘܿܥ ܩܵܐ ܐܸܡܘܵܬܹ̈ܐ، ܒܸܥܒ݂ܵܕܵܐ ܚܸܠܡܲܬ ܠܐܹܘܲܢܓܲܠܝܼܘܿܢ ܕܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ ܐܲܝܟ݂ ܟܵܗܢܵܐ، ܕܐܘܼܦ ܐܸܡܘܵܬܹ̈ܐ ܗܵܘܝܼ ܩܘܼܪܒܵܢܵܐ ܩܘܼܒܠܵܐ ܠܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ، ܡܩܘܼܕܫܵܐ ܒܪܘܼܚܵܐ ܕܩܘܼܕܫܵܐ.
TRL: Dhaweyn 'awdana dkhilmat dmsheekha eeshoo' qa imwate, bi'wada khilmat lewangaleeoon dalaha aykh kahna, doep imwate hawee qoerbana qoebla lalaha, mqoedsha broekha dqoedsha.
ENG: that I should be a minister of Christ Jesus unto the Gentiles, ministering the gospel of God, that the offering up of the Gentiles might be made acceptable, being sanctified by the Holy Ghost.

ASY: ܒܘܼܬ ܐܵܗܵܐ ܐܝܼܬ ܠܝܼ ܫܘܼܒ݂ܗܵܪܵܐ ܒܝܼܫܘܿܥ ܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ ܠܟܸܣ ܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ.
TRL: Boet aha eet-lee shoewhara beeshoo' msheekha lkis Alaha.
ENG: I have therefore my glorying in Christ Jesus in things pertaining to God.

ASY: ܣܵܒܵܒ ܠܹܐ ܩܲܫܕܸܪܸܢ ܕܗܲܡܙܸܡܸܢ ܥܲܠ ܡܸܢܕܝܼ ܕܠܵܐ ܬܘܼܡܸܡ ܠܹܗ ܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ ܒܝܲܕ ܕܝܼܝܼ، ܕܥܵܒ݂ܕܹܢ ܕܐܸܡܘܵܬܹ̈ܐ ܡܲܨܝܸܬܝܼ ܒܗܹܡܸܙܡܵܢ ܘܒܦܘܼܠܚܵܢܵܐ. ܐܵܢܵܐ ܥܒ݂ܝܼܕ ܠܝܼ ܐܵܗܵܐ،
TRL: Sabab le qashdirin dhamzimin 'al mindee dla toemim-leh msheekha byad deeee, d'awden dimwate maṣyitee bhemizman o bpoelkhana. Ana 'weed-lee aha,
ENG: For I will not dare to speak of any things save those which Christ wrought through me, for the obedience of the Gentiles, by word and deed,

ASY: ܒܚܲܝܠܵܐ ܕܢܝܼܫܲܢܩܹ̈ܐ ܘܕܕܘܼܡܵܪܹ̈ܐ، ܘܒܚܲܝܠܵܐ ܕܪܘܼܚܵܐ، ܗܲܕܟ݂ܵܐ ܡܘܼܟܪܸܙ ܠܝܼ ܐܹܘܲܢܓܲܠܝܼܘܿܢ ܕܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ ܒܡܸܠܝܘܼܬܵܐ، ܡ̣ܢ ܐܘܿܪܸܫܠܸܡ ܘܚܵܕܸܪ̈ܘܵܢܘܼܗ̇ ܗܲܠ ܐܹܠܘܿܪܝܼܩܘܿܢ.
TRL: Bkhayla dneeshanqe o ddoemare, o bkhayla droekha, hadkha moekriz-lee ewangaleeoon dmsheekha bmilyoeta, min oorishlim o khadirwanoeha hal elooreeqoon.
ENG: in the power of signs and wonders, in the power of the Holy Ghost; so that from Jerusalem, and round about even unto Illyricum, I have fully preached the gospel of Christ;

ASY: ܚܘܼܦܛܵܐ ܝܘܸܢ ܒܟܠ ܙܲܒ݂ܢܵܐ ܕܡܲܟܪܸܙܸܢ ܐܹܘܲܢܓܲܠܝܼܘܿܢ ܐܲܝܟܵܐ ܕܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ ܠܹܐ ܝܠܹܗ ܦܝܼܫܵܐ ܝ݇ܕܝܼܥܵܐ، ܕܠܵܐ ܗܵܘܝܵܐ ܕܒܵܢܹܝܢ ܥܲܠ ܒܸܢܝܲܬ ܕܚܲܕ ܐ݇ܚܹܪ݇ܢܵܐ.
TRL: Khoepṭa ywin bkl zawna dmakrizin ewangaleeoon ayka dmsheekha le-yleh peesha dee'a, dla hawya dbaneyn 'al binyat dkhad khena.
ENG: yea, making it my aim so to preach the gospel, not where Christ was already named, that I might not build upon another man’s foundation;

ASY: ܐܝܼܢܵܐ ܐܲܝܟ݂ ܕܝܼܠܹܗ ܟܬܝܼܒ݂ܵܐ: ܐܵܢܝܼ ܕܠܹܐ ܝܗ݇ܘܵܘ ܦܝܼܫܹܐ ܡܘܼܕܸܥܹܐ ܒܘܼܬ ܕܝܼܹܗ ܒܸܬ ܚܵܙܝܼ، ܘܐܵܢܝܼ ܕܠܹܐ ܝܢܵܐ ܫܡܝܼܥܹܐ ܒܸܬ ܦܲܪܡܝܼ.
TRL: Eena aykh deeleh kteewa: anee dle ywaw peeshe moedi'e boet dee-eh bit khazee, o anee dle yna shmee'e bit parmee.
ENG: but, as it is written, They shall see, to whom no tidings of him came, And they who have not heard shall understand.

ASY: ܒܘܼܬ ܐܵܗܵܐ ܪܵܒܵܐ ܓܵܗܹ̈ܐ ܦܝܼܫ ܠܝܼ ܡܘܼܟܠܝܼܵܐ ܡ̣ܢ ܠܹܐܬܵܝܵܐ ܠܟܸܣ ܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ.
TRL: Boet aha raba gahe peesh-lee moekleea min letaya lkis lawkhoon.
ENG: Wherefore also I was hindered these many times from coming to you:

ASY: ܐܝܼܢܵܐ ܐܵܕܝܼܵܐ ܣܵܒܵܒ ܠܲܝܬ ܠܝܼ ܦܝܵܫܵܐ ܕܘܼܟܵܢܹ̈ܐ ܪܵܒܵܐ ܠܸܦܠܵܚܵܐ ܓܵܘ ܐܲܢܹܐ ܐܲܬܪ̈ܵܘܵܬܹܐ، ܘܣܵܒܵܒ ܫܘܼܗܘܸܬ ܠܝܼ ܪܵܒܵܐ ܓܵܗܹ̈ܐ ܡ̣ܢ ܩܵܕ݇ܡ ܚܲܕ݇ܟܡܵܐ ܫܸܢܹ̈ܐ ܕܐܵܬܹܝܢ ܗ݇ܘܵܐ ܠܟܸܣ ܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ،
TRL: Eena adeea sabab layt-lee pyasha doekane raba liplakha gaw ane atrawate, o sabab shoehwit-lee raba gahe min qam khakma shine dateyn wa lkis lawkhoon,
ENG: but now, having no more any place in these regions, and having these many years a longing to come unto you,

ASY: ܐܝܼܡܲܢ ܕܐܵܙܹܠ݇ܢ ܠܐܸܣܦܵܢܝܼܵܐ، ܒܵܥܹܝܢ ܕܐܵܬܹܝܢ ܠܟܸܣ ܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ. ܐܝܼܬ ܠܝܼ ܗܹܒ݂ܝܼ ܕܚܵܙܹܝܢܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܒܐܘܼܪܚܝܼ، ܘܡܲܦܫܸܛܝܼܬܘܿܢ ܠܝܼ ܠܬܵܡܵܐ، ܡ̣ܢ ܒܵܬ݇ܪ ܕܚܵܕܹܝܢ ܒܚܙܵܝܬܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܩܵܐ ܚܲܕ ܡܸܬܚܵܐ ܟܸܪܝܵܐ.
TRL: Eeman dazen lispaneea, ba'eyn dateyn lkis lawkhoon. Eet-lee hewee dkhazeynawkhoon boerkhee, o mapshiṭeetoon-lee ltama, min bar dkhadeyn bkhzaytawkhoon qa khad mitkha kirya.
ENG: whensoever I go unto Spain (for I hope to see you in my journey, and to be brought on my way thitherward by you, if first in some measure I shall have been satisfied with your company)—

ASY: ܐܝܼܢܵܐ ܐܵܕܝܼܵܐ ܒܹܐܙܵܠܵܐ ܝܘܸܢ ܠܐܘܿܪܸܫܠܸܡ ܕܥܵܒ݂ܕܹܢ ܚܸܠܡܲܬ ܠܩܲܕܝܼܫܹ̈ܐ ܕܝܼܢܵܐ ܬܵܡܵܐ.
TRL: Eena adeea bezala ywin loorishlim d'awden khilmat lqadeeshe deena tama.
ENG: but now, I say, I go unto Jerusalem, ministering unto the saints.

ASY: ܣܵܒܵܒ ܒܣܝܼܡ ܠܵܗ̇ ܠܗܘܿܢ ܐܵܢܝܼ ܕܓܵܘ ܡܵܩܹܕܘܿܢܝܼܵܐ ܘܐܵܟ݂ܵܐܝܼܵܐ ܕܗܲܝܸܪܝܼ ܙܘܼܙܵܢܵܐܝܼܬ ܠܡܸܣܟܹܢܹ̈ܐ ܕܩܲܕܝܼܫܹ̈ܐ ܕܓܵܘ ܐܘܿܪܸܫܠܸܡ.
TRL: Sabab bseem-laha-lhoon anee dgaw maqedooneea o akhaeea dhayiree zoezanaeet lmiskene dqadeeshe dgaw oorishlim.
ENG: For it hath been the good pleasure of Macedonia and Achaia to make a certain contribution for the poor among the saints that are at Jerusalem.

ASY: ܒܫܲܪܝܼܪܘܼܬܵܐ ܒܣܝܼܡ ܠܵܗ̇ ܠܗܘܿܢ ܕܗܲܝܸܪܝܼ، ܘܕܲܝܢܵܢܹ̈ܐ ܝܢܵܐ ܕܥܵܒ݂ܕܝܼ ܗܲܕܟ݂ܵܐ. ܐܸܢ ܐܸܡܘܵܬܹ̈ܐ ܩܘܼܒܸܠ ܠܗܘܿܢ ܒܘܼܪ̈ܟܵܬܹܐ ܪ̈ܘܼܚܵܢܵܝܹܐ ܡ̣ܢ ܝܗܘܼܕܵܝܹ̈ܐ، ܒܲܣ ܐܸܡܘܵܬܹ̈ܐ ܕܲܝܢܵܢܹ̈ܐ ܝܢܵܐ ܠܝܗܘܼܕܵܝܹ̈ܐ ܕܥܵܒ݂ܕܝܼ ܠܗܘܿܢ ܚܸܠܡܲܬ ܒܒܘܼܪ̈ܟܵܬܹܐ ܗܘܼܠܵܢܵܝܹ̈ܐ.
TRL: Bshareeroeta bseem-laha-lhoon dhayiree, o daynane yna d'awdee hadkha. In imwate qoebil-lhoon boerkate roekhanaye min yhoedaye, bas imwate daynane yna lyhoedaye d'awdee-lhoon khilmat bboerkate hoelanaye.
ENG: Yea, it hath been their good pleasure; and their debtors they are. For if the Gentiles have been made partakers of their spiritual things, they owe it to them also to minister unto them in carnal things.

ASY: ܒܘܼܬ ܐܵܗܵܐ ܡ̣ܢ ܒܵܬ݇ܪ ܕܬܲܡܸܡܸܢ ܠܐܵܗܵܐ ܫܘܼܠܵܐ، ܘܗܵܘܹܝܢ ܚܵܬܸܪܓ̰ܲܡܥ ܕܩܲܒܠܝܼ ܠܐܵܗܵܐ ܛܥܘܼܢܬܵܐ، ܒܸܬ ܐܵܙܹܠ݇ܢ ܠܐܸܣܦܵܢܝܼܵܐ ܘܒܐܘܼܪܚܝܼ ܒܸܬ ܚܵܙܹܝܢܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ.
TRL: Boet aha min bar dtamimin-laha shoela, o haweyn khatirjam' dqablee-laha ṭ'oenta, bit azen lispaneea o boerkhee bit khazeynawkhoon.
ENG: When therefore I have accomplished this, and have sealed to them this fruit, I will go on by you unto Spain.

ASY: ܒܝܼܕܵܥܵܐ ܝܘܸܢ ܐܝܼܡܲܢ ܕܐܵܬܹܝܢ ܠܟܸܣ ܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ، ܒܸܬ ܐܵܬܹܝܢ ܒܡܸܠܝܘܼܬܵܐ ܕܒܘܼܪܟܬܵܐ ܕܐܹܘܲܢܓܲܠܝܼܘܿܢ ܕܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ.
TRL: Beeda'a ywin eeman dateyn lkis lawkhoon, bit ateyn bmilyoeta dboerkta dewangaleeoon dmsheekha.
ENG: And I know that, when I come unto you, I shall come in the fulness of the blessing of Christ.

ASY: ܦܲܪܦܘܼܠܹܐ ܝܘܸܢ ܒܝܼܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܐܲܚܘܿܢܘܵܬܝܼ̈، ܒܝܲܕ ܡܵܪܲܢ ܝܼܫܘܿܥ ܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ ܘܒܚܘܼܒܵܐ ܕܪܘܼܚܵܐ، ܕܫܲܪܸܟܝܼܬܘܿܢ ܥܲܡܝܼ ܒܦܘܼܠܚܵܢܵܐ ܩܸܫܝܵܐ ܒܝܲܕ ܨܠܵܘܵܬܹ̈ܐ ܠܟܸܣ ܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ ܒܘܼܬ ܕܝܼܝܼ.
TRL: Parpoele ywin beeawkhoon akhoonwatee, byad Maran eeshoo' msheekha o bkhoeba droekha, dsharikeetoon 'amee bpoelkhana qishya byad ṣlawate lkis Alaha boet deeee.
ENG: Now I beseech you, brethren, by our Lord Jesus Christ, and by the love of the Spirit, that ye strive together with me in your prayers to God for me;

ASY: ܨܲܠܹܝܡܘܼܢ ܕܦܵܝܫܹܢ ܦܘܼܪܩܵܐ ܡ̣ܢ ܐܵܢܝܼ ܕܠܹܐ ܝܢܵܐ ܡܗܘܼܡܢܹ̈ܐ ܓܵܘ ܝܼܗܘܼܕ، ܘܕܦܵܝܫܵܐ ܩܒܝܼܠܬܵܐ ܚܸܠܡܲܬܝܼ ܒܝܲܕ ܩܲܕܝܼܫܹ̈ܐ ܕܓܵܘ ܐܘܿܪܸܫܠܸܡ،
TRL: Ṣaleymoen dpayshen poerqa min anee dle yna mhoemne gaw eehoed, o dpaysha qbeelta khilmatee byad qadeeshe dgaw oorishlim,
ENG: that I may be delivered from them that are disobedient in Judaea, and that my ministration which I have for Jerusalem may be acceptable to the saints;

ASY: ܕܒܚܲܕܘܼܬܵܐ ܐܵܬܹܝܢ ܠܟܸܣ ܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܒܨܸܒ݂ܝܵܢܵܐ ܕܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ، ܘܕܩܲܒܠܲܚ ܢܝܵܚܵܐ ܥܲܡ ܥܘܼܕܵܠܹ̈ܐ.
TRL: Dbkhadoeta ateyn lkis lawkhoon bṣiwyana dalaha, o dqablakh nyakha 'am 'oedale.
ENG: that I may come unto you in joy through the will of God, and together with you find rest.

ASY: ܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ ܕܫܠܵܡܵܐ ܗܵܘܹܐ ܥܲܡ ܟܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ، ܐܵܡܹܝܢ.
TRL: Alaha dshlama hawe 'am klawkhoon, ameyn.
ENG: Now the God of peace be with you all. Amen.

ASY: ܣܲܦܘܼܝܹܐ ܝܘܸܢ ܒܝܼܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܠܚܵܬܲܢ ܦܹܘܒܹܐ، ܕܝܼܠܵܗ̇ ܫܲܡܵܫܬܵܐ ܓܵܘ ܥܹܕܬܵܐ ܕܩܵܢܟܪܹܐܘܿܣ.
TRL: Sapoeye ywin beeawkhoon lkhatan pewbe, deelaha shamashta gaw 'edta dqankreoos.
ENG: I commend unto you Phoebe our sister, who is a servant of the church that is at Cenchreae:

ASY: ܩܲܒܠܘܼܢ ܠܵܗ̇ ܒܡܵܪܲܢ ܐܲܝܟ݂ ܕܝܼܠܵܗ̇ ܚܫܝܼܚܬܵܐ ܠܩܲܕܝܼܫܹ̈ܐ، ܘܗܲܝܸܪܘܼܢ ܠܵܗ̇ ܒܟܠ ܡܸܢܕܝܼ ܕܣܢܝܼܩܬܵܐ ܝܠܵܗ̇ ܡܸܢܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ، ܣܵܒܵܒ ܗܘܼܝܸܪܬܵܐ ܝܠܵܗ̇ ܠܪܵܒܵܐ، ܐܘܼܦ ܐܸܠܝܼ.
TRL: Qabloen-laha bmaran aykh deelaha khsheekhta lqadeeshe, o hayiroen-laha bkl mindee dsneeqta-ylaha minawkhoon, sabab hoeyirta-ylaha lraba, oep ilee.
ENG: that ye receive her in the Lord, worthily of the saints, and that ye assist her in whatsoever matter she may have need of you: for she herself also hath been a succourer of many, and of mine own self.

ASY: ܗܲܒ݂݇ܠܘܼܢ ܫܠܵܡܵܐ ܠܦܪܝܼܣܩܸܠܵܐ ܘܠܐܵܩܸܠܘܿܣ ܕܝܼܢܵܐ ܦܲܠܵܚܹ̈ܐ ܥܲܡܝܼ ܒܝܼܫܘܿܥ ܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ،
TRL: Haloen shlama lpreesqila o laqiloos deena palakhe 'amee beeshoo' msheekha,
ENG: Salute Prisca and Aquila my fellow-workers in Christ Jesus,

ASY: ܐܵܢܝܼ ܕܡܘܼܬܸܒ݂ ܠܗܘܿܢ ܚܲܝܲܝ̈ܗܝ ܓܵܘ ܩܹܘܲܢܕܹܢܘܿܣ ܒܘܼܬ ܕܝܼܝܼ. ܠܵܐ ܐܲܚܟ̰ܝܼ ܐܵܢܵܐ ܒܸܛܥܵܢܵܐ ܝܢܵܐ ܡܸܢܬܵܐ ܡܸܢܲܝܗܝ، ܐܝܼܢܵܐ ܐܘܼܦ ܟܠܲܝܗܝ ܥܹܕܵܬܹ̈ܐ ܕܐܸܡܘܵܬܹ̈ܐ.
TRL: Anee dmoetiw-lhoon khayayhy gaw qewandenoos boet deeee. La akhchee ana biṭ'ana yna minta minayhy, eena oep klayhy 'edate dimwate.
ENG: who for my life laid down their own necks; unto whom not only I give thanks, but also all the churches of the Gentiles:

ASY: ܗܲܒ݂݇ܠܘܼܢ ܫܠܵܡܵܐ ܠܥܹܕܬܵܐ ܕܓܵܘ ܒܲܝܬܲܝܗܝ. ܗܲܒ݂݇ܠܘܼܢ ܫܠܵܡܵܐ ܠܐܵܦܸܢܛܘܿܣ ܡܘܼܚܸܒܝܼ ܕܝܼܠܹܗ ܛܥܘܼܢܬܵܐ ܩܵܕ݇ܡܵܝܬܵܐ ܒܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ ܓܵܘ ܐܵܟ݂ܵܐܝܼܵܐ.
TRL: Haloen shlama l'edta dgaw baytayhy. Haloen shlama lapinṭoos moekhibee deeleh ṭ'oenta qamayta bmsheekha gaw akhaeea.
ENG: and salute the church that is in their house. Salute Epaenetus my beloved, who is the firstfruits of Asia unto Christ.

ASY: ܗܲܒ݂݇ܠܘܼܢ ܫܠܵܡܵܐ ܠܡܲܪܝܲܡ، ܗ̇ܝ ܕܪܵܒܵܐ ܒܩܸܫܝܘܼܬܵܐ ܦܠܝܼܚ ܠܵܗ̇ ܩܵܬܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ.
TRL: Haloen shlama lmaryam, hay draba bqishyoeta pleekh-laha qatawkhoon.
ENG: Salute Mary, who bestowed much labour on you.

ASY: ܗܲܒ݂݇ܠܘܼܢ ܫܠܵܡܵܐ ܠܚܸܙܡܵܢܝܼ̈ ܐܵܢܕܪܘܿܢܝܼܩܘܿܣ ܘܝܘܿܢܝܼܵܐ، ܕܝܼܗ݇ܘܵܘ ܓܵܘ ܒܹܝܬ ܐܲܣܝܼܪܹ̈ܐ ܥܲܡܝܼ، ܘܡܫܲܡܗܹ̈ܐ ܓܵܘ ܫܠܝܼܚܹ̈ܐ، ܘܕܡ̣ܢ ܩܵܕ݇ܡ ܕܝܼܝܼ ܗܘܼܡܸܢܗܘܿܢ ܒܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ.
TRL: Haloen shlama lkhizmanee androoneeqoos o yooneea, deewaw gaw beyt aseere 'amee, o mshamhe gaw shleekhe, o dmin qam deeee hoeminhoon bmsheekha.
ENG: Salute Andronicus and Junias, my kinsmen, and my fellow-prisoners, who are of note among the apostles, who also have been in Christ before me.

ASY: ܗܲܒ݂݇ܠܘܼܢ ܫܠܵܡܵܐ ܠܐܵܡܦܠܹܐܘܿܣ ܡܘܼܚܸܒܝܼ ܒܡܵܪܲܢ.
TRL: Haloen shlama lampleoos moekhibee bmaran.
ENG: Salute Ampliatus my beloved in the Lord.

ASY: ܗܲܒ݂݇ܠܘܼܢ ܫܠܵܡܵܐ ܠܐܘܼܪܒܵܢܘܿܣ، ܦܲܠܵܚܵܐ ܥܲܡܲܢ ܒܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ، ܘܠܐܸܣܛܵܟ݂ܝܘܿܣ ܡܘܼܚܸܒܝܼ.
TRL: Haloen shlama loerbanoos, palakha 'aman bmsheekha, o lisṭakhyoos moekhibee.
ENG: Salute Urbanus our fellow-worker in Christ, and Stachys my beloved.

ASY: ܗܲܒ݂݇ܠܘܼܢ ܫܠܵܡܵܐ ܠܐܵܦܲܠܵܐ، ܡܝܘܼܩܪܵܐ ܒܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ. ܗܲܒ݂݇ܠܘܼܢ ܫܠܵܡܵܐ ܠܟܠܲܝܗܝ ܐܵܢܝܼ ܕܝܼܢܵܐ ܓܵܘ ܒܲܝܬܵܐ ܕܐܵܪܸܣܛܵܒ݂ܘܼܠܘܿܣ.
TRL: Haloen shlama lapala, myoeqra bmsheekha. Haloen shlama lklayhy anee deena gaw bayta darisṭawoeloos.
ENG: Salute Apelles the approved in Christ. Salute them which are of the household of Aristobulus.

ASY: ܗܲܒ݂݇ܠܘܼܢ ܫܠܵܡܵܐ ܠܗܹܪܘܿܕܝܼܘܿܢ ܚܸܙܡܝܼ. ܗܲܒ݂݇ܠܘܼܢ ܫܠܵܡܵܐ ܠܟܠܲܝܗܝ ܒܢܲܝ̈ ܒܲܝܬܵܐ ܕܢܵܪܩܸܣܘܿܢ، ܐܵܢܝܼ ܕܝܼܢܵܐ ܒܡܵܪܲܢ.
TRL: Haloen shlama lheroodeeoon khizmee. Haloen shlama lklayhy bnay bayta dnarqisoon, anee deena bmaran.
ENG: Salute Herodion my kinsman. Salute them of the household of Narcissus, which are in the Lord.

ASY: ܗܲܒ݂݇ܠܘܼܢ ܫܠܵܡܵܐ ܠܛܪܘܼܦܸܢܵܐ ܘܠܛܪܘܼܦܸܣܵܐ، ܒܲܟ݂ܬܵܬܹ̈ܐ ܕܒܸܦܠܵܚܵܐ ܝܢܵܐ ܪܵܒܵܐ ܒܡܵܪܲܢ. ܗܲܒ݂݇ܠܘܼܢ ܫܠܵܡܵܐ ܠܦܲܪܣܸܣ ܡܘܼܚܸܒܬܲܢ، ܕܪܵܒܵܐ ܦܠܝܼܚ ܠܵܗ̇ ܠܡܵܪܲܢ.
TRL: Haloen shlama lṭroepina o lṭroepisa, bakhtate dbiplakha yna raba bmaran. Haloen shlama lparsis moekhibtan, draba pleekh-laha lmaran.
ENG: Salute Tryphaena and Tryphosa, who labour in the Lord. Salute Persis the beloved, which laboured much in the Lord.

ASY: ܗܲܒ݂݇ܠܘܼܢ ܫܠܵܡܵܐ ܠܪܘܼܦܘܿܣ، ܓܘܼܒܝܵܐ ܒܡܵܪܲܢ، ܘܠܝܸܡܹܗ، ܗ̇ܝ ܕܗܘܹܐ ܠܵܗ̇ ܝܸܡܵܐ ܐܘܼܦ ܐܸܠܝܼ.
TRL: Haloen shlama lroepoos, goebya bmaran, o lyimeh, hay dhwe-laha yima oep ilee.
ENG: Salute Rufus the chosen in the Lord, and his mother and mine.

ASY: ܗܲܒ݂݇ܠܘܼܢ ܫܠܵܡܵܐ ܠܐܵܣܘܿܢܩܪܹܛܘܿܣ، ܘܠܐܵܦܸܠܓ݂ܘܿܢ، ܘܠܗܵܪܡܵܐ، ܘܠܦܲܛܪܵܒ݂ܵܣ، ܘܠܗܵܪܡܹܣ، ܘܠܐܲܚܘܿܢܘܵܬܹ̈ܐ ܕܝܼܢܵܐ ܥܲܡܲܝܗܝ.
TRL: Haloen shlama lasoonqreṭoos, o lapilghoon, o lharma, o lpaṭrawas, o lharmes, o lakhoonwate deena 'amayhy.
ENG: Salute Asyncritus, Phlegon, Hermes, Patrobas, Hermas, and the brethren that are with them.

ASY: ܗܲܒ݂݇ܠܘܼܢ ܫܠܵܡܵܐ ܠܦܝܼܠܵܓ݂ܘܿܣ، ܘܠܝܘܿܠܝܼܵܐ، ܘܠܢܹܐܪܘܿܣ ܘܠܚܵܬܹܗ، ܘܠܐܘܿܠܸܡܦܵܐ، ܘܠܟܠܲܝܗܝ ܩܲܕܝܼܫܹ̈ܐ ܕܝܼܢܵܐ ܥܲܡܲܝܗܝ.
TRL: Haloen shlama lpeelaghoos, o lyooleea, o lneroos o lkhateh, o loolimpa, o lklayhy qadeeshe deena 'amayhy.
ENG: Salute Philologus and Julia, Nereus and his sister, and Olympas, and all the saints that are with them.

ASY: ܗܲܒ݂݇ܠܘܼܢ ܫܠܵܡܵܐ ܚܲܕ ܠܗ̇ܘ ܐ݇ܚܹܪ݇ܢܵܐ ܒܢܫܘܼܩܬܵܐ ܩܲܕܝܼܫܬܵܐ. ܒܝܼܵܗ݇ܒ݂ܵܐ ܝܢܵܐ ܫܠܵܡܵܐ ܐܸܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܟܠܲܝܗܝ ܥܹܕܵܬܹ̈ܐ ܕܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ.
TRL: Haloen shlama khad lhaw khena bnshoeqta qadeeshta. Beeawa yna shlama ilawkhoon klayhy 'edate dmsheekha.
ENG: Salute one another with a holy kiss. All the churches of Christ salute you.

ASY: ܦܲܪܦܘܼܠܹܐ ܝܘܸܢ ܒܝܼܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܐܲܚܘܿܢܘܵܬܝܼ̈، ܕܗܵܘܹܝܬܘܿܢ ܗܸܫܝܵܪ ܡ̣ܢ ܐܵܢܝܼ ܕܥܵܒ݂ܕܝܼ ܦܘܼܠܵܓܹ̈ܐ ܘܬܘܼܪ̈ܩܵܠܹܐ ܕܲܠܩܘܼܒ݂ܠ ܕܝܘܼܠܦܵܢܵܐ ܕܐܲܚܬܘܿܢ ܝ݇ܠܝܼܦ ܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ، ܘܪܚܘܿܩܘܼܢ ܡܸܢܲܝܗܝ.
TRL: Parpoele ywin beeawkhoon akhoonwatee, dhaweytoon hishyar min anee d'awdee poelage o toerqale dalqoewl dyoelpana dakhtoon leep lawkhoon, o rkhooqoen minayhy.
ENG: Now I beseech you, brethren, mark them which are causing the divisions and occasions of stumbling, contrary to the doctrine which ye learned: and turn away from them.

ASY: ܐܵܢܝܼ ܕܝܼܢܵܐ ܗܲܕܟ݂ܵܐ ܠܹܐ ܥܵܒ݂ܕܝܼ ܚܸܠܡܲܬ ܠܡܵܪܲܢ ܝܼܫܘܿܥ ܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ، ܐܸܠܵܐ ܠܟܹܪ݇ܣܲܝܗܝ. ܒܗܹܡܸܙܡܵܢܹ̈ܐ ܒܲܣܝܼܡܹ̈ܐ ܘܫܲܦܝܼܪܹ̈ܐ ܟܹܐ ܡܲܚܠܸܛܝܼ ܠܸܒܵܘܵܬܹ̈ܐ ܕܐܵܢܝܼ ܕܝܼܢܵܐ ܦܫܝܼ̈ܛܹܐ.
TRL: Anee deena hadkha le 'awdee khilmat lmaran eeshoo' msheekha, ila lkesayhy. Bhemizmane baseeme o shapeere ke makhliṭee libawate danee deena psheeṭe.
ENG: For they that are such serve not our Lord Christ, but their own belly; and by their smooth and fair speech they beguile the hearts of the innocent.

ASY: ܟܠܲܝܗܝ ܫܡܝܼܥܹܐ ܝܢܵܐ ܒܘܼܬ ܡܲܨܝܲܬܬܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ. ܒܘܼܬ ܐܵܗܵܐ ܒܸܚܕܵܝܵܐ ܝܘܸܢ ܒܘܼܬ ܕܝܼܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ. ܐܝܼܢܵܐ ܒܵܥܹܝܢ ܕܗܵܘܹܝܬܘܿܢ ܚܲܟܝܼܡܹ̈ܐ ܡ̣ܢ ܛܵܒ݂ܬܵܐ ܓܹܒܵܐ، ܘܨܸܦܝܹ̈ܐ ܡ̣ܢ ܒܝܼܫܬܵܐ ܓܹܒܵܐ.
TRL: Klayhy shmee'e yna boet maṣyattawkhoon. Boet aha bikhdaya ywin boet deeawkhoon. Eena ba'eyn dhaweytoon khakeeme min ṭawta geba, o ṣipye min beeshta geba.
ENG: For your obedience is come abroad unto all men. I rejoice therefore over you: but I would have you wise unto that which is good, and simple unto that which is evil.

ASY: ܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ ܕܫܠܵܡܵܐ ܒܸܬ ܛܲܚܛܸܚ ܠܣܵܛܵܢܵܐ ܒܓ̰ܲܠܕܘܼܬܵܐ ܬܚܘܿܬ ܐܲܩܠܵܬܵܘ̈ܟ݂ܘܿܢ. ܫܵܦܵܩܲܬ ܕܡܵܪܲܢ ܝܼܫܘܿܥ ܥܲܡܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ.
TRL: Alaha dshlama bit ṭakhṭikh lsaṭana bjaldoeta tkhoot aqlatawkhoon. Shapaqat dmaran eeshoo' 'amawkhoon.
ENG: And the God of peace shall bruise Satan under your feet shortly. The grace of our Lord Jesus Christ be with you.

ASY: ܛܝܼܡܵܬܹܐܘܿܣ ܦܲܠܵܚܵܐ ܥܲܡܝܼ ܒܝܼܵܗ݇ܒ݂ܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܝܼܠܹܗ ܫܠܵܡܵܐ، ܗܲܕܟ݂ܵܐ ܐܘܼܦ ܚܸܙܡܵܢܝܼ̈ ܠܘܼܩܝܼܘܿܣ ܘܐܝܼܵܣܘܿܢ ܘܣܘܼܣܝܼܦܵܛܪܘܿܣ.
TRL: Ṭeemateoos palakha 'amee beeawawkhoon eeleh shlama, hadkha oep khizmanee loeqeeoos o eeasoon o soeseepaṭroos.
ENG: Timothy my fellow-worker saluteth you; and Lucius and Jason and Sosipater, my kinsmen.

ASY: ܐܵܢܵܐ ܬܸܪܬܝܼܘܿܣ، ܟܲܬܵܒ݂ܵܐ ܕܐܵܗܵܐ ܐܸܓܲܪܬܵܐ، ܒܝܼܵܗ݇ܒ݂ܵܐ ܝܘܸܢ ܫܠܵܡܵܐ ܐܸܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܒܡܵܪܲܢ.
TRL: Ana tirteeoos, katawa daha igarta, beeawa ywin shlama ilawkhoon bmaran.
ENG: I Tertius, who write the epistle, salute you in the Lord.

ASY: ܒܝܼܵܗ݇ܒ݂ܵܐ ܝܠܹܗ ܫܠܵܡܵܐ ܐܸܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܓܵܐܝܼܘܿܣ، ܕܫܸܪܝܵܐ ܝܘܲܚ ܠܟܸܣ ܠܹܗ ܐܵܢܵܐ ܘܟܠܵܗ̇ ܥܹܕܬܵܐ. ܒܸܕܪܵܝܵܐ ܝܢܵܐ ܫܠܵܡܵܐ ܐܸܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܐܵܪܸܣܛܘܿܣ، ܢܵܛܸܪܟܸܣܦܵܐ ܕܡܕܝܼܢ݇ܬܵܐ، ܘܩܘܼܐܵܪܛܘܿܣ ܐܲܚܘܿܢܲܢ.
TRL: Beeawa-yleh shlama ilawkhoon gaeeoos, dshirya ywakh lkis-leh ana o klaha 'edta. Bidraya yna shlama ilawkhoon arisṭoos, naṭirkispa dmdeeta, o qoearṭoos akhoonan.
ENG: Gaius my host, and of the whole church, saluteth you. Erastus the treasurer of the city saluteth you, and Quartus the brother.

ASY: ܫܵܦܵܩܲܬ ܕܡܵܪܲܢ ܝܼܫܘܿܥ ܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ ܥܲܡ ܟܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ. ܐܵܡܹܝܢ.
TRL: Shapaqat dmaran eeshoo' msheekha 'am klawkhoon. Ameyn.
ENG: May the grace of our Lord Jesus Christ be with all of you. Amen.

ASY: ܘܐܵܕܝܼܵܐ ܠܗ̇ܘ ܕܡܵܨܹܐ ܡܲܩܘܹܐ ܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܒܐܹܘܲܢܓܲܠܝܼܘܿܢ ܕܝܼܝܼ، ܘܒܡܲܟܪܲܙܬܵܐ ܒܘܼܬ ܝܼܫܘܿܥ ܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ ܘܓܸܠܝܵܢܵܐ ܕܐ݇ܪܵܙܵܐ ܕܛܸܫܝܵܐ ܝܗ݇ܘܵܐ ܗܵܐ ܡ̣ܢ ܙܲܒ݂ܢܹ̈ܐ ܥܲܬܝܼܩܹ̈ܐ،
TRL: O adeea lhaw dmaṣe maqwe lawkhoon bewangaleeoon deeee, o bmakrazta boet eeshoo' msheekha o gilyana draza dṭishya ywa ha min zawne 'ateeqe,
ENG: Now to him that is able to stablish you according to my gospel and the preaching of Jesus Christ, according to the revelation of the mystery which hath been kept in silence through times eternal,

ASY: ܐܝܼܢܵܐ ܐܵܕܝܼܵܐ ܦܝܼܫ ܠܹܗ ܓܸܠܝܵܐ ܘܦܝܼܫ ܠܹܗ ܝ݇ܕܝܼܥܵܐ ܒܝܲܕ ܟܬܵܒܹ̈ܐ ܕܢܒ݂ܝܼܹ̈ܐ ܘܒܦܘܼܩܕܵܢܹ̈ܐ ܕܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ ܥܵܠܡܝܼܢܵܝܵܐ، ܕܟܠܲܝܗܝ ܐܸܡܘܵܬܹ̈ܐ ܗܲܡܸܢܝܼ ܘܡܲܨܝܸܬܝܼ،
TRL: Eena adeea peesh-leh gilya o peesh-leh dee'a byad ktabe dnwee-e o bpoeqdane dalaha 'almeenaya, dklayhy imwate haminee o maṣyitee,
ENG: but now is manifested, and by the scriptures of the prophets, according to the commandment of the eternal God, is made known unto all the nations unto obedience of faith;

ASY: ܠܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ ܕܝܼܠܹܗ ܒܢܲܦ̮ܫܹܗ ܚܲܟܝܼܡܵܐ، ܗܵܘܹܐ ܚܸܩܪܵܐ ܒܝܲܕ ܝܼܫܘܿܥ ܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ ܠܥܵܠܲܡ ܥܵܠܡܝܼܢ. ܐܵܡܹܝܢ.
TRL: Lalaha deeleh bnawsheh khakeema, hawe khiqra byad eeshoo' msheekha l'alam 'almeen. Ameyn.
ENG: to the only wise God, through Jesus Christ, to whom be the glory for ever. Amen.

ASY: ܦܵܘܠܘܿܣ، ܩܸܪܝܵܐ ܕܗܵܘܹܐ ܫܠܝܼܚܵܐ ܕܝܼܫܘܿܥ ܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ ܒܨܸܒ݂ܝܵܢܵܐ ܕܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ، ܥܲܡ ܣܘܼܣܬܹܢܝܼܣ ܐܲܚܘܿܢܵܐ،
TRL: Pawloos, qirya dhawe shleekha deeshoo' msheekha bṣiwyana dalaha, 'am soestenees akhoona,
ENG: Paul, called to be an apostle of Jesus Christ through the will of God, and Sosthenes our brother,

ASY: ܠܥܹܕܬܵܐ ܕܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ ܓܵܘ ܩܘܿܪܲܢܬܘܿܣ، ܠܐܵܢܝܼ ܕܝܼܢܵܐ ܡܩܘܼܕܫܹܐ ܒܝܼܫܘܿܥ ܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ ܘܦܝܼܫܹܐ ܩܸܪܝܹܐ ܩܲܕܝܼܫܹ̈ܐ، ܘܥܲܡ ܟܠܲܝܗܝ ܐܵܢܝܼ ܕܒܟܠ ܕܘܼܟܵܐ ܩܵܪܝܼ ܒܫܸܡܵܐ ܕܡܵܪܲܢ ܝܼܫܘܿܥ ܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ، ܡܵܪܲܝܗܝ ܘܡܵܪܲܢ.
TRL: L'edta dalaha gaw qoorantoos, lanee deena mqoedshe beeshoo' msheekha o peeshe qirye qadeeshe, o 'am klayhy anee dbkl doeka qaree bshima dmaran eeshoo' msheekha, marayhy o Maran.
ENG: unto the church of God which is at Corinth, even them that are sanctified in Christ Jesus, called to be saints, with all that call upon the name of our Lord Jesus Christ in every place, their Lord and ours:

ASY: ܫܵܦܵܩܲܬ ܘܫܠܵܡܵܐ ܐܸܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܡ̣ܢ ܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ ܒܵܒܲܢ ܘܡ̣ܢ ܡܵܪܲܢ ܝܼܫܘܿܥ ܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ.
TRL: Shapaqat o shlama ilawkhoon min Alaha baban o min Maran eeshoo' msheekha.
ENG: Grace to you and peace from God our Father and the Lord Jesus Christ.

ASY: ܫܲܟܘܼܪܹܐ ܝܘܸܢ ܠܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ ܒܟܠ ܥܕܵܢܵܐ ܒܘܼܬ ܕܝܼܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܥܲܠ ܫܵܦܵܩܲܬ ܕܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ ܕܦܝܼܫܬܵܐ ܝܠܵܗ̇ ܝܘܼܗ݇ܒܸܠܬܵܐ ܐܸܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܒܝܼܫܘܿܥ ܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ،
TRL: Shakoere ywin lalaha bkl 'dana boet deeawkhoon 'al shapaqat dalaha dpeeshta-ylaha yoebilta ilawkhoon beeshoo' msheekha,
ENG: I thank my God always concerning you, for the grace of God which was given you in Christ Jesus;

ASY: ܣܵܒܵܒ ܒܝܼܹܗ ܦܝܼܫ ܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܥܒ݂ܝܼܕܹܐ ܥܲܬܝܼܪܹ̈ܐ ܒܟܠ ܡܸܢܕܝܼ، ܒܟܠ ܗܹܡܸܙܡܵܢ ܘܒܟܠ ܝ݇ܕܲܥܬܵܐ.
TRL: Sabab bee-eh peesh lawkhoon 'weede 'ateere bkl mindee, bkl hemizman o bkl da'ta.
ENG: that in everything ye were enriched in him, in all utterance and all knowledge;

ASY: ܘܣܵܒܵܒ ܣܵܗܕܘܼܬܵܐ ܒܘܼܬ ܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ ܦܝܼܫ ܠܵܗ̇ ܡܘܼܩܘܝܼܬܵܐ ܒܝܼܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ.
TRL: O sabab sahdoeta boet msheekha peesh-laha moeqweeta beeawkhoon.
ENG: even as the testimony of Christ was confirmed in you:

ASY: ܒܘܼܬ ܐܵܗܵܐ ܠܹܐ ܝܬܘܿܢ ܒܵܨܘܿܪܹ̈ܐ ܒܗܸܟ̃ ܡܵܘܗܲܒ݂ܬܵܐ ܪܘܼܚܵܢܵܝܬܵܐ ܟܲܕ ܒܸܣܦܵܪܵܐ ܝܬܘܿܢ ܠܓܸܠܝܵܢܵܐ ܕܡܵܪܲܢ ܝܼܫܘܿܥ ܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ،
TRL: Boet aha le ytoon baṣoore bhich mawhawta roekhanayta kad bispara ytoon lgilyana dmaran eeshoo' msheekha,
ENG: so that ye come behind in no gift; waiting for the revelation of our Lord Jesus Christ;

ASY: ܗ̇ܘ ܕܒܸܬ ܡܲܩܘܹܐ ܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܗܲܠ ܚܲܪܬܵܐ، ܕܗܵܘܹܝܬܘܿܢ ܕܠܵܐ ܠܵܘܡܵܐ ܒܝܵܘܡܵܐ ܕܡܵܪܲܢ ܝܼܫܘܿܥ ܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ.
TRL: Haw dbit maqwe lawkhoon hal kharta, dhaweytoon dla lawma byawma dmaran eeshoo' msheekha.
ENG: who shall also confirm you unto the end, that ye be unreproveable in the day of our Lord Jesus Christ.

ASY: ܡܗܘܼܡܢܵܐ ܝܠܹܗ ܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ، ܗ̇ܘ ܕܩܲܡ ܓܲܒܹܐ ܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܠܫܲܪܝܼܟܘܼܬܵܐ ܥܲܡ ܒܪܘܿܢܹܗ، ܝܼܫܘܿܥ ܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ ܡܵܪܲܢ.
TRL: Mhoemna-yleh Alaha, haw dqam gabe lawkhoon lshareekoeta 'am brooneh, eeshoo' msheekha Maran.
ENG: God is faithful, through whom ye were called into the fellowship of his Son Jesus Christ our Lord.

ASY: ܦܲܪܦܘܼܠܹܐ ܝܘܸܢ ܒܝܼܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ، ܐܲܚܘܿܢܘܵܬܝܼ̈، ܒܫܸܡܵܐ ܕܡܵܪܲܢ ܝܼܫܘܿܥ ܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ، ܕܟܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܣܲܙܓܸܪܝܼܬܘܿܢ ܥܲܠ ܚܲܕ ܡܸܢܕܝܼ، ܕܠܵܐ ܗܵܘܝܼ ܓܵܘܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܦܘܼܠܵܓܹ̈ܐ، ܐܸܠܵܐ ܕܚܵܕܹܝܬܘܿܢ ܚܲܕ ܥܲܡ ܗ̇ܘ ܐ݇ܚܹܪ݇ܢܵܐ، ܘܗܵܘܹܝܬܘܿܢ ܒܚܲܕ ܪܸܥܝܵܢܵܐ ܘܒܚܲܕ ܚܘܼܫܵܒ݂ܵܐ.
TRL: Parpoele ywin beeawkhoon, akhoonwatee, bshima dmaran eeshoo' msheekha, dklawkhoon sazgireetoon 'al khad mindee, dla hawee gawawkhoon poelage, ila dkhadeytoon khad 'am haw khena, o haweytoon bkhad ri'yana o bkhad khoeshawa.
ENG: Now I beseech you, brethren, through the name of our Lord Jesus Christ, that ye all speak the same thing, and that there be no divisions among you; but that ye be perfected together in the same mind and in the same judgment.

ASY: ܣܵܒܵܒ ܦܝܼܫ ܠܝܼ ܡܘܼܚܒܸܪܵܐ ܒܘܼܬ ܕܝܼܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ، ܐܲܚܘܿܢܘܵܬܝܼ̈، ܡ̣ܢ ܒܲܝܬܵܐ ܕܟܠܵܐܹܐ، ܕܐܝܼܬ ܓܵܘܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܡܲܩܲܪ̈ܵܨܘܼܝܵܬܹܐ،
TRL: Sabab peesh-lee moekhbira boet deeawkhoon, akhoonwatee, min bayta dklae, deet gawawkhoon maqaraṣoeyate,
ENG: For it hath been signified unto me concerning you, my brethren, by them which are of the household of Chloe, that there are contentions among you.

ASY: ܐܵܗܵܐ ܒܹܐܡܵܪܵܐ ܝܘܸܢ، ܕܚܲܕ ܡܸܢܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܒܹܐܡܵܪܵܐ ܝܠܹܗ، ”ܐܵܢܵܐ ܬܵܒܥܵܢܵܐ ܕܦܵܘܠܘܿܣ ܝܼܘܸܢ،“ ܘܗ̇ܘ ܐ݇ܚܹܪ݇ܢܵܐ، ”ܐܵܢܵܐ ܬܵܒܥܵܢܵܐ ܕܐܵܦܲܠܘܿ ܝܘܸܢ،“ ܘܗ̇ܘ ܐ݇ܚܹܪ݇ܢܵܐ ”ܐܵܢܵܐ ܬܵܒܥܵܢܵܐ ܕܫܸܡܥܘܿܢ ܟܹܐܦܵܐ ܝܘܸܢ،“ ܘܗ̇ܘ ܐ݇ܚܹܪ݇ܢܵܐ، ”ܐܵܢܵܐ ܬܵܒܥܵܢܵܐ ܕܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ ܝܘܸܢ.“
TRL: Aha bemara ywin, dkhad minawkhoon bemara-yleh, ”ana tab'ana dpawloos eewin,“ o haw khena, ”ana tab'ana dapaloo ywin,“ o haw khena ”ana tab'ana dshim'oon kepa ywin,“ o haw khena, ”ana tab'ana dmsheekha ywin.“
ENG: Now this I mean, that each one of you saith, I am of Paul; and I of Apollos; and I of Cephas; and I of Christ.

ASY: ܩܵܡܘܿ ܦܝܼܫ ܠܹܗ ܦܠܝܼܥܵܐ ܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ؟ ܝܲܢ ܦܵܘܠܘܿܣ ܦܝܼܫ ܠܹܗ ܙܩܝܼܦܵܐ ܡ̣ܢ ܓܹܒܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ؟ ܝܲܢ ܒܫܸܡܵܐ ܕܦܵܘܠܘܿܣ ܦܝܼܫ ܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܥܡܝܼܕܹܐ؟
TRL: Qamoo peesh-leh plee'a msheekha? Yan pawloos peesh-leh zqeepa min gebawkhoon? Yan bshima dpawloos peesh lawkhoon 'meede?
ENG: Is Christ divided? was Paul crucified for you? or were ye baptized into the name of Paul?

ASY: ܫܲܟܘܼܪܹܐ ܝܘܸܢ ܠܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ ܕܠܵܐ ܡܘܼܥܡܸܕ ܠܝܼ ܠܐ݇ܢܵܫܵܐ ܡܸܢܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ، ܫܒ݂ܘܿܩ ܡ̣ܢ ܩܪܝܼܣܦܘܿܣ ܘܠܓܵܐܝܼܘܿܣ،
TRL: Shakoere ywin lalaha dla moe'mid-lee lnasha minawkhoon, shwooq min qreespoos o lgaeeoos,
ENG: I thank God that I baptized none of you, save Crispus and Gaius;

ASY: ܗܲܕܟ݂ܵܐ ܕܐܘܼܦ ܚܲܕ ܡܸܢܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܠܵܐ ܐܵܡܹܪ ܕܦܝܼܫ ܠܹܗ ܥܡܝܼܕܵܐ ܒܫܸܡܝܼ.
TRL: Hadkha doep khad minawkhoon la amer dpeesh-leh 'meeda bshimee.
ENG: lest any man should say that ye were baptized into my name.

ASY: ܘܡܘܼܥܡܸܕ ܠܝܼ ܐܘܼܦ ܠܒܲܝܬܵܐ ܕܐܸܣܛܲܦܵܢܲܐ. ܫܒ݂ܘܿܩ ܡ̣ܢ ܐܲܢܹܐ ܠܹܐ ܝܘܸܢ ܒܸܕܟ݂ܵܪܵܐ ܐܸܢ ܡܘܼܥܡܸܕܵܐ ܝܘܸܢ ܠܐ݇ܢܵܫܵܐ ܐ݇ܚܹܪ݇ܢܵܐ.
TRL: O moe'mid-lee oep lbayta disṭapana. Shwooq min ane le ywin bidkhara in moe'mida ywin lnasha khena.
ENG: And I baptized also the household of Stephanas: besides, I know not whether I baptized any other.

ASY: ܣܵܒܵܒ ܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ ܠܵܐ ܫܘܼܕܪܸܢܹܗ ܕܡܲܥܡܸܕܸܢ ܐܸܠܵܐ ܕܡܲܟܪܸܙܸܢ ܐܹܘܲܢܓܲܠܝܼܘܿܢ، ܠܵܐ ܒܚܸܟ݂ܡܬܵܐ ܕܗܹܡܸܙܡܵܢ، ܕܠܵܐ ܦܵܐܹܫ ܒܘܼܛܠܵܐ ܚܲܝܠܵܐ ܕܙܩܝܼܦܵܐ ܕܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ.
TRL: Sabab msheekha la shoedrineh dma'midin ila dmakrizin ewangaleeoon, la bkhikhmta dhemizman, dla paesh boeṭla khayla dzqeepa dmsheekha.
ENG: For Christ sent me not to baptize, but to preach the gospel: not in wisdom of words, lest the cross of Christ should be made void.

ASY: ܡܲܟܪܲܙܬܵܐ ܒܘܼܬ ܙܩܝܼܦܵܐ ܣܲܟ݂ܠܘܼܬܵܐ ܝܠܵܗ̇ ܠܐܵܢܝܼ ܕܒܸܛܠܵܩܵܐ ܝܢܵܐ، ܐܝܼܢܵܐ ܐܸܠܲܢ ܕܝܼܘܲܚ ܦܝܵܫܵܐ ܦܘܼܪܩܹܐ، ܚܲܝܠܵܐ ܕܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ ܝܠܵܗ̇.
TRL: Makrazta boet zqeepa sakhloeta-ylaha lanee dbiṭlaqa yna, eena ilan deewakh pyasha poerqe, khayla dalaha-ylaha.
ENG: For the word of the cross is to them that are perishing foolishness; but unto us which are being saved it is the power of God.

ASY: ܣܵܒܵܒ ܦܝܼܫܬܵܐ ܝܠܵܗ̇ ܟܬܝܼܒ݂ܬܵܐ:
TRL: Sabab peeshta-ylaha kteewta:
ENG: For it is written, I will destroy the wisdom of the wise, And the prudence of the prudent will I reject.

ASY: ܐܲܝܟܵܐ ܝܠܹܗ ܚܲܟܝܼܡܵܐ؟ ܐܲܝܟܵܐ ܝܠܹܗ ܣܵܦܪܵܐ؟ ܐܲܝܟܵܐ ܝܠܹܗ ܕܵܪܘܿܫܵܐ ܕܐܵܗܵܐ ܙܲܒ݂ܢܵܐ؟ ܠܵܐ ܥܒ݂ܝܼܕܵܐ ܠܹܗ ܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ ܚܸܟ݂ܡܬܵܐ ܕܐܵܗܵܐ ܙܲܒ݂ܢܵܐ ܣܲܟ݂ܠܘܼܬܵܐ؟
TRL: Ayka-yleh khakeema? Ayka-yleh sapra? Ayka-yleh daroosha daha zawna? La 'weeda-leh Alaha khikhmta daha zawna sakhloeta?
ENG: Where is the wise? where is the scribe? where is the disputer of this world? hath not God made foolish the wisdom of the world?

ASY: ܣܵܒܵܒ ܒܚܸܟ݂ܡܬܵܐ ܕܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ، ܥܵܠܡܵܐ ܠܵܐ ܝ݇ܕܝܼܥ ܠܹܗ ܠܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ ܒܝܲܕ ܚܸܟ݂ܡܬܵܐ ܕܓܵܢܹܗ، ܒܘܼܬ ܐܵܗܵܐ ܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ ܒܣܝܼܡ ܠܵܗ̇ ܠܹܗ ܕܒܣܲܟ݂ܠܘܼܬܵܐ ܕܟܵܪܘܿܙܘܼܬܵܐ ܦܲܪܸܩ ܠܐܵܢܝܼ ܕܗܲܡܸܢܝܼ.
TRL: Sabab bkhikhmta dalaha, 'alma la dee' leh lalaha byad khikhmta dganeh, boet aha Alaha bseem-laha-leh dbsakhloeta dkaroozoeta pariq lanee dhaminee.
ENG: For seeing that in the wisdom of God the world through its wisdom knew not God, it was God’s good pleasure through the foolishness of the preaching to save them that believe.

ASY: ܣܵܒܵܒ ܝܗܘܼܕܵܝܹ̈ܐ ܒܸܛܠܵܒܵܐ ܝܢܵܐ ܢܝܼܫܲܢܩܵܐ، ܘܝܵܘܢܵܝܹ̈ܐ ܒܸܛܥܵܝܵܐ ܠܚܸܟ݂ܡܬܵܐ،
TRL: Sabab yhoedaye biṭlaba yna neeshanqa, o yawnaye biṭ'aya lkhikhmta,
ENG: Seeing that Jews ask for signs, and Greeks seek after wisdom:

ASY: ܐܝܼܢܵܐ ܐܲܚܢܲܢ ܡܲܟܪܘܼܙܹܐ ܝܘܲܚ ܒܘܼܬ ܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ ܡܸܚܝܵܐ ܠܙܩܝܼܦܵܐ، ܬܘܼܪܩܵܠܵܐ ܠܝܗܘܼܕܵܝܹ̈ܐ ܘܣܲܟ݂ܠܘܼܬܵܐ ܠܐܸܡܘܵܬܹ̈ܐ.
TRL: Eena akhnan makroeze ywakh boet msheekha mikhya lzqeepa, toerqala lyhoedaye o sakhloeta limwate.
ENG: but we preach Christ crucified, unto Jews a stumblingblock, and unto Gentiles foolishness;

ASY: ܐܝܼܢܵܐ ܠܐܵܢܝܼ ܕܦܝܼܫܹܐ ܝܢܵܐ ܩܸܪܝܹܐ ܒܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ، ܡ̣ܢ ܝܵܘܢܵܝܹ̈ܐ ܘܝܗܘܼܕܵܝܹ̈ܐ، ܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ ܚܲܝܠܵܐ ܝܠܹܗ ܘܚܸܟ݂ܡܬܵܐ ܕܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ،
TRL: Eena lanee dpeeshe yna qirye balaha, min yawnaye o yhoedaye, msheekha khayla-yleh o khikhmta dalaha,
ENG: but unto them that are called, both Jews and Greeks, Christ the power of God, and the wisdom of God.

ASY: ܣܵܒܵܒ ܣܲܟ݂ܠܘܼܬܵܐ ܕܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ ܒܘܼܫ ܚܲܟܝܼܡܬܵܐ ܝܠܵܗ̇ ܡ̣ܢ ܚܸܟ݂ܡܬܵܐ ܕܒܲܪܢܵܫܵܐ، ܘܙܲܒܘܼܢܘܼܬܵܐ ܕܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ ܒܘܼܫ ܚܲܝܠܵܢܬܵܐ ܝܠܵܗ̇ ܡ̣ܢ ܚܲܝܠܵܐ ܕܒܲܪܢܵܫܵܐ.
TRL: Sabab sakhloeta dalaha boesh khakeemta-ylaha min khikhmta dbarnasha, o zaboenoeta dalaha boesh khaylanta-ylaha min khayla dbarnasha.
ENG: Because the foolishness of God is wiser than men; and the weakness of God is stronger than men.

ASY: ܬܲܚܡܸܢܘܼܢ ܐܲܚܘܿܢܘܵܬܝܼ̈، ܐܝܼܡܲܢ ܕܦܝܼܫ ܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܩܸܪܝܹܐ. ܠܵܐ ܪܵܒܵܐ ܡܸܢܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܚܲܟܝܼܡܹ̈ܐ ܝܗ݇ܘܵܘ ܒܥܲܝܢܹ̈ܐ ܕܒܢܲܝ̈ܢܵܫܵܐ، ܘܠܵܐ ܪܵܒܵܐ ܚܲܝܠܵܢܹ̈ܐ، ܘܠܵܐ ܡ̣ܢ ܛܘܿܗܡܵܐ ܓܘܼܪܵܐ.
TRL: Takhminoen akhoonwatee, eeman dpeesh lawkhoon qirye. La raba minawkhoon khakeeme ywaw b'ayne dbnaynasha, o la raba khaylane, o la min ṭoohma goera.
ENG: For behold your calling, brethren, how that not many wise after the flesh, not many mighty, not many noble, are called:

ASY: ܐܝܼܢܵܐ ܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ ܓܘܼܒܹܐ ܠܹܗ ܠܣܲܟ݂ܠܹ̈ܐ ܕܥܵܠܡܵܐ ܕܡܲܢܟܸܦ ܠܚܲܟܝܼܡܹ̈ܐ، ܘܓܘܼܒܹܐ ܠܹܗ ܠܙܲܒܘܼܢܹ̈ܐ ܕܥܵܠܡܵܐ ܕܡܲܢܟܸܦ ܠܚܲܝܠܵܢܹ̈ܐ.
TRL: Eena Alaha goebe-leh lsakhle d'alma dmankip lkhakeeme, o goebe-leh lzaboene d'alma dmankip lkhaylane.
ENG: but God chose the foolish things of the world, that he might put to shame them that are wise; and God chose the weak things of the world, that he might put to shame the things that are strong;

ASY: ܘܓܘܼܒܹܐ ܠܹܗ ܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ ܡܸܢܕܝܼܵܢܹ̈ܐ ܟܘܼܦܹ̈ܐ ܘܡܘܼܣܠܝܼܹܐ ܕܐܵܗܵܐ ܥܵܠܡܵܐ، ܘܡܸܢܕܝܼܵܢܹ̈ܐ ܕܠܹܐ ܝܢܵܐ ܗܸܟ̃ ܡܸܢܕܝܼ، ܕܒܲܛܸܠ ܠܐܵܢܝܼ ܕܝܼܢܵܐ ܡܸܢܕܝܼ.
TRL: O goebe-leh Alaha mindeeane koepe o moeslee-e daha 'alma, o mindeeane dle yna hich mindee, dbaṭil lanee deena mindee.
ENG: and the base things of the world, and the things that are despised, did God choose, yea and the things that are not, that he might bring to nought the things that are:

ASY: ܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ ܥܒ݂ܝܼܕ ܠܹܗ ܐܵܗܵܐ ܕܐܘܼܦ ܚܲܕ ܠܵܐ ܡܵܨܹܐ ܥܵܒܹܕ ܫܘܼܒ݂ܗܵܪܵܐ ܩܵܕ݇ܡܘܼܗܝ.
TRL: Alaha 'weed-leh aha doep khad la maṣe 'abed shoewhara qamoehy.
ENG: that no flesh should glory before God.

ASY: ܘܒܝܲܕ ܦܘܼܠܚܵܢܘܼ̈ܗܝ ܐܲܚܬܘܿܢ ܝܼܬܘܿܢ ܒܝܼܫܘܿܥ ܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ، ܗ̇ܘ ܕܗܘܹܐ ܠܹܗ ܐܸܠܲܢ ܚܸܟ݂ܡܬܵܐ ܡ̣ܢ ܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ، ܘܙܲܕܝܼܩܘܼܬܵܐ، ܘܩܲܕܝܼܫܘܼܬܵܐ، ܘܦܘܼܪܩܵܢܵܐ.
TRL: O byad poelkhanoehy akhtoon eetoon beeshoo' msheekha, haw dhwe-leh ilan khikhmta min Alaha, o zadeeqoeta, o qadeeshoeta, o poerqana.
ENG: But of him are ye in Christ Jesus, who was made unto us wisdom from God, and righteousness and sanctification, and redemption:

ASY: ܐܲܝܟ݂ ܕܝܼܠܹܗ ܟܬܝܼܒ݂ܵܐ: ܗ̇ܘ ܕܥܵܒܹܕ ܫܘܼܒ݂ܗܵܪܵܐ، ܒܡܵܪܝܵܐ ܥܵܒܹܕ ܫܘܼܒ݂ܗܵܪܵܐ.
TRL: Aykh deeleh kteewa: haw d'abed shoewhara, bmarya 'abed shoewhara.
ENG: that, according as it is written, He that glorieth, let him glory in the Lord.

ASY: ܐܲܚܘܿܢܘܵܬܝܼ̈، ܐܝܼܡܲܢ ܕܐ݇ܬܹܐ ܠܝܼ ܠܟܸܣ ܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܡܲܟܪܘܼܙܹܐ ܐܸܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܐ݇ܪܵܙܵܐ ܕܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ، ܠܵܐ ܐ݇ܬܹܐ ܠܝܼ ܒܡܲܡܠܠܵܐ ܓܘܼܪܵܐ ܘܠܵܐ ܒܚܸܟ݂ܡܬܵܐ ܓܘܼܪܬܵܐ،
TRL: Akhoonwatee, eeman dte-lee lkis lawkhoon makroeze ilawkhoon raza dalaha, la te-lee bmamlla goera o la bkhikhmta goerta,
ENG: And I, brethren, when I came unto you, came not with excellency of speech or of wisdom, proclaiming to you the mystery of God.

ASY: ܣܵܒܵܒ ܩܛܝܼܥ ܠܝܼ ܒܚܝܼܵܠܝܼ، ܟܲܕ ܐܵܢܵܐ ܥܲܡܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܕܠܹܐ ܝܵܕܥܹܢ ܡܸܢܕܝܼ ܫܒ݂ܘܿܩ ܡ̣ܢ ܝܼܫܘܿܥ ܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ، ܘܐܸܠܹܗ ܡܸܚܝܵܐ ܠܙܩܝܼܦܵܐ.
TRL: Sabab qṭee' lee bkheealee, kad ana 'amawkhoon dle yad'en mindee shwooq min eeshoo' msheekha, o ileh mikhya lzqeepa.
ENG: For I determined not to know anything among you, save Jesus Christ, and him crucified.

ASY: ܗܘܹܐ ܠܝܼ ܠܟܸܣ ܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܒܙܲܒܘܼܢܘܼܬܵܐ، ܘܒܙܕܘܼܥܬܵܐ ܘܒܪܲܬܪܲܬܬܵܐ ܓܘܼܪܬܵܐ.
TRL: Hwe-lee lkis lawkhoon bzaboenoeta, o bzdoe'ta o bratratta goerta.
ENG: And I was with you in weakness, and in fear, and in much trembling.

ASY: ܘܗܹܡܸܙܡܵܢܝܼ̈ ܘܟܵܪܘܿܙܘܼܬܝܼ ܠܹܐ ܝܗ݇ܘܵܘ ܠܡܲܨܒ݂ܘܼܥܹܐ ܐܸܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܒܚܸܟ݂ܡܬܵܐ، ܐܝܼܢܵܐ ܒܡܲܚܙܵܝܬܵܐ ܕܪܘܼܚܵܐ ܘܕܚܲܝܠܵܐ،
TRL: O hemizmanee o karoozoetee le ywaw lmaṣwoe'e ilawkhoon bkhikhmta, eena bmakhzayta droekha o dkhayla,
ENG: And my speech and my preaching were not in persuasive words of wisdom, but in demonstration of the Spirit and of power:

ASY: ܩܵܐ ܕܗܲܝܡܵܢܘܼܬܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܠܵܐ ܗܵܘܝܵܐ ܒܢܝܼܬܵܐ ܥܲܠ ܚܸܟ݂ܡܬܵܐ ܕܒܢܲܝ̈ܢܵܫܵܐ، ܐܸܠܵܐ ܥܲܠ ܚܲܝܠܵܐ ܕܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ.
TRL: Qa dhaymanoetawkhoon la hawya bneeta 'al khikhmta dbnaynasha, ila 'al khayla dalaha.
ENG: that your faith should not stand in the wisdom of men, but in the power of God.

ASY: ܟܹܐ ܗܲܡܙܸܡܲܚ ܗܹܡܸܙܡܵܢܹ̈ܐ ܕܚܸܟ݂ܡܬܵܐ ܒܹܝܠ ܓܡܝܼܪܹ̈ܐ، ܐܝܼܢܵܐ ܠܵܐ ܚܸܟ݂ܡܬܵܐ ܕܐܵܗܵܐ ܙܲܒ݂ܢܵܐ ܘܠܵܐ ܕܓܘܼܪ̈ܵܢܹܐ ܕܐܵܗܵܐ ܙܲܒ݂ܢܵܐ، ܐܵܢܝܼ ܕܦܝܵܫܵܐ ܝܢܵܐ ܒܘܼܛܠܹܐ.
TRL: Ke hamzimakh hemizmane dkhikhmta beyl gmeere, eena la khikhmta daha zawna o la dgoerane daha zawna, anee dpyasha yna boeṭle.
ENG: Howbeit we speak wisdom among the perfect: yet a wisdom not of this world, nor of the rulers of this world, which are coming to nought:

ASY: ܐܝܼܢܵܐ ܟܹܐ ܗܲܡܙܸܡܲܚ ܚܸܟ݂ܡܬܵܐ ܕܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ ܒܐ݇ܪܵܙܵܐ، ܗ̇ܝ ܕܝܼܗ݇ܘܵܐ ܡܘܼܟܸܣܬܵܐ، ܗ̇ܝ ܕܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ ܦܪܝܼܫܵܐ ܠܹܗ ܡ̣ܢ ܩܵܕ݇ܡ ܫܘܼܪܵܝܵܐ ܕܙܲܒ݂ܢܵܐ ܠܚܸܩܪܵܐ ܕܝܼܲܢ،
TRL: Eena ke hamzimakh khikhmta dalaha braza, hay deewa moekista, hay dalaha preesha-leh min qam shoeraya dzawna lkhiqra dee-an,
ENG: but we speak God’s wisdom in a mystery, even the wisdom that hath been hidden, which God foreordained before the worlds unto our glory:

ASY: ܗ̇ܝ ܕܐܘܼܦ ܚܲܕ ܡ̣ܢ ܓܘܼܪ̈ܵܢܹܐ ܕܐܵܗܵܐ ܙܲܒ݂ܢܵܐ ܠܵܐ ܝ݇ܕܝܼܥܵܐ ܠܹܗ. ܐܸܢ ܗܵܘܝܼ ܗ݇ܘܵܘ ܝ݇ܕܝܼܥܘܼܗ̇، ܠܹܐ ܙܵܩܦܝܼ ܗ݇ܘܵܘ ܠܡܵܪܵܐ ܕܬܸܫܒܘܿܚܬܵܐ.
TRL: Hay doep khad min goerane daha zawna la dee'a-leh. In hawee waw dee'oeha, le zaqpee waw lmara dtishbookhta.
ENG: which none of the rulers of this world knoweth: for had they known it, they would not have crucified the Lord of glory:

ASY: ܐܲܝܟ݂ ܕܝܼܠܹܗ ܟܬܝܼܒ݂ܵܐ: ܥܲܝܢܵܐ ܠܹܐ ܝܠܵܗ̇ ܚܙܝܼܬܵܐ، ܘܢܵܬܵܐ ܠܹܐ ܝܠܵܗ̇ ܫܡܝܼܥܬܵܐ، ܘܓܵܘ ܗܵܘܢܵܐ ܕܒܲܪܢܵܫܵܐ ܠܹܐ ܝܢܵܐ ܥܒ݂ܝܼܪܹܐ، ܡܸܢܕܝܼܵܢܹ̈ܐ ܕܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ ܗܘܼܕܪܲܝ ܠܹܗ ܠܐܵܢܝܼ ܕܡܲܚܸܒܝܼ ܠܹܗ.
TRL: Aykh deeleh kteewa: 'ayna le-ylaha khzeeta, o nata le-ylaha shmee'ta, o gaw hawna dbarnasha le yna 'weere, mindeeane dalaha hoedray-leh lanee dmakhibee-leh.
ENG: but as it is written, Things which eye saw not, and ear heard not, And which entered not into the heart of man, Whatsoever things God prepared for them that love him.

ASY: ܐܝܼܢܵܐ ܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ ܓܸܠܝܲܝ ܠܹܗ ܐܸܠܲܢ ܒܝܲܕ ܪܘܼܚܹܗ، ܣܵܒܵܒ ܪܘܼܚܵܐ ܠܟܠ ܡܸܢܕܝܼ ܟܹܐ ܨܲܚܨܹܐ، ܐܘܼܦ ܠܡܸܢܕܝܼܵܢܹ̈ܐ ܥܲܡܘܼܩܹ̈ܐ ܕܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ.
TRL: Eena Alaha gilyay-leh ilan byad roekheh, sabab roekha lkl mindee ke ṣakhṣe, oep lmindeeane 'amoeqe dalaha.
ENG: But unto us God revealed them through the Spirit: for the Spirit searcheth all things, yea, the deep things of God.

ASY: ܣܵܒܵܒ ܡܵܢܝܼ ܡ̣ܢ ܒܢܲܝ̈ܢܵܫܵܐ ܟܹܐ ܝܵܕܹܥ ܪܸ̈ܥܝܵܢܹܐ ܕܐ݇ܢܵܫܵܐ ܫܒ݂ܘܿܩ ܡ̣ܢ ܪܘܼܚܵܐ ܕܐ݇ܢܵܫܵܐ ܕܝܼܠܵܗ̇ ܓܵܘܹܗ؟ ܗܲܕܟ݂ܵܐ ܐܘܼܦ ܚܲܕ ܠܹܐ ܝܵܕܹܥ ܪܸ̈ܥܝܵܢܹܐ ܕܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ ܫܒ݂ܘܿܩ ܡ̣ܢ ܪܘܼܚܵܐ ܕܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ.
TRL: Sabab manee min bnaynasha ke yade' ri'yane dnasha shwooq min roekha dnasha deelaha gaweh? Hadkha oep khad le yade' ri'yane dalaha shwooq min roekha dalaha.
ENG: For who among men knoweth the things of a man, save the spirit of the man, which is in him? even so the things of God none knoweth, save the Spirit of God.

ASY: ܐܝܼܢܵܐ ܐܲܚܢܲܢ ܠܵܐ ܩܘܼܒܸܠ ܠܲܢ ܪܘܼܚܵܐ ܕܐܵܗܵܐ ܕܘܼܢܝܹܐ ܐܸܠܵܐ ܪܘܼܚܵܐ ܕܡ̣ܢ ܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ، ܩܵܐ ܕܝܵܕܥܲܚ ܠܡܵܘܗܒ݂ܵܬܹ̈ܐ ܕܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ ܝܘܼܗ݇ܒܲܝ ܠܹܗ ܐܸܠܲܢ.
TRL: Eena akhnan la qoebil lan roekha daha doenye ila roekha dmin Alaha, qa dyad'akh lmawhwate dalaha yoebay-leh ilan.
ENG: But we received, not the spirit of the world, but the spirit which is of God; that we might know the things that are freely given to us by God.

ASY: ܘܐܘܼܦ ܐܲܚܢܲܢ ܟܹܐ ܗܲܡܙܸܡܲܚ ܒܘܼܬ ܐܵܢܝܼ ܡܸܢܕܝܼܵܢܹ̈ܐ، ܠܵܐ ܒܗܹܡܸܙܡܵܢܹ̈ܐ ܡܘܼܠܦܹܐ ܐܸܠܲܢ ܒܝܲܕ ܚܸܟ݂ܡܬܵܐ ܕܒܲܪܢܵܫܵܐ، ܐܸܠܵܐ ܒܗܹܡܸܙܡܵܢܹ̈ܐ ܡܘܼܠܦܹܐ ܒܝܲܕ ܪܘܼܚܵܐ، ܘܗܲܕܟ݂ܵܐ ܦܲܫܩܲܚ ܫܪܵܪܵܐ ܪܘܼܚܵܢܵܝܵܐ ܒܝܲܕ ܚܲܒܪܹ̈ܐ ܪ̈ܘܼܚܵܢܵܝܹܐ.
TRL: O oep akhnan ke hamzimakh boet anee mindeeane, la bhemizmane moelpe ilan byad khikhmta dbarnasha, ila bhemizmane moelpe byad roekha, o hadkha pashqakh shrara roekhanaya byad khabre roekhanaye.
ENG: Which things also we speak, not in words which man’s wisdom teacheth, but which the Spirit teacheth; comparing spiritual things with spiritual.

ASY: ܐ݇ܢܵܫܵܐ ܕܠܵܐ ܦܲܪܡܵܝܬܵܐ ܪܘܼܚܵܢܵܝܬܵܐ ܠܹܐ ܡܵܨܹܐ ܩܲܒܸܠ ܡܸܢܕܝܼܵܢܹ̈ܐ ܕܟܹܐ ܐܵܬܝܼ ܡ̣ܢ ܪܘܼܚܵܐ ܕܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ، ܣܵܒܵܒ ܣܲܟ݂ܠܘܼܬܵܐ ܝܢܵܐ ܠܟܸܣ ܠܹܗ، ܘܠܹܐ ܡܵܨܹܐ ܦܲܪܡܹܐ ܠܗܘܿܢ ܣܵܒܵܒ ܒܪܘܼܚܵܐ ܟܹܐ ܦܵܝܫܝܼ ܕܝܼܢܹܐ.
TRL: nasha dla parmayta roekhanayta le maṣe qabil mindeeane dke atee min roekha dalaha, sabab sakhloeta yna lkis-leh, o le maṣe parme-lhoon sabab broekha ke payshee deene.
ENG: Now the natural man receiveth not the things of the Spirit of God: for they are foolishness unto him; and he cannot know them, because they are spiritually judged.

ASY: ܐ݇ܢܵܫܵܐ ܪܘܼܚܵܢܵܝܵܐ ܟܹܐ ܕܵܐܹܢ ܟܠܲܝܗܝ ܡܸܢܕܝܼܵܢܹ̈ܐ، ܐܝܼܢܵܐ ܒܓܵܢܹܗ ܠܹܐ ܝܠܹܗ ܬܚܘܿܬ ܕܝܵܢܬܵܐ ܕܐܘܼܦ ܚܲܕ.
TRL: nasha roekhanaya ke daen klayhy mindeeane, eena bganeh le-yleh tkhoot dyanta doep khad.
ENG: But he that is spiritual judgeth all things, and he himself is judged of no man.

ASY: ܣܵܒܵܒ ܡܵܢܝܼ ܟܹܐ ܝܵܕܹܥ ܪܸܥܝܵܢܵܐ ܕܡܵܪܝܵܐ ܩܵܐ ܕܡܲܠܸܦ ܠܹܗ؟ ܐܝܼܢܵܐ ܐܲܚܢܲܢ ܐܝܼܬ ܠܲܢ ܪܸܥܝܵܢܵܐ ܕܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ.
TRL: Sabab manee ke yade' ri'yana dmarya qa dmalip-leh? Eena akhnan eet lan ri'yana dmsheekha.
ENG: For who hath known the mind of the Lord, that he should instruct him? But we have the mind of Christ.

ASY: ܐܲܚܘܿܢܘܵܬܝܼ̈، ܐܵܢܵܐ ܠܵܐ ܡܨܹܐ ܠܝܼ ܗܲܡܙܸܡܸܢ ܗ݇ܘܵܐ ܥܲܡܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܐܲܝܟ݂ ܕܗܲܡܙܸܡܸܢ ܥܲܡ ܐ݇ܢܵܫܹ̈ܐ ܪ̈ܘܼܚܵܢܵܝܹܐ، ܐܸܠܵܐ ܐܲܝܟ݂ ܐ݇ܢܵܫܹ̈ܐ ܦܲܓ݂ܪ̈ܵܢܵܝܹܐ، ܘܐܲܝܟ݂ ܝܲܠܘܼܕܹ̈ܐ ܒܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ.
TRL: Akhoonwatee, ana la mṣe-lee hamzimin wa 'amawkhoon aykh dhamzimin 'am nashe roekhanaye, ila aykh nashe paghranaye, o aykh yaloede bmsheekha.
ENG: And I, brethren, could not speak unto you as unto spiritual, but as unto carnal, as unto babes in Christ.

ASY: ܚܲܠܒ݂ܵܐ ܩܲܡ ܝܵܗ݇ܒܹܢܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܠܸܫܬܵܝܵܐ ܘܠܵܐ ܡܹܐܟ݂ܘܼܠܬܵܐ ܠܹܐܟ݂ܵܠܵܐ، ܣܵܒܵܒ ܗܹܫ ܠܹܐ ܡܵܨܹܝܬܘܿܢ ܗ݇ܘܵܘ ܐܵܟ݂ܠܝܼܬܘܿܢ ܠܵܗ̇. ܘܐܘܼܦ ܐܵܕܝܼܵܐ ܠܹܐ ܡܵܨܹܝܬܘܿܢ.
TRL: Khalwa qam yabenawkhoon lishtaya o la mekhoelta lekhala, sabab hesh le maṣeytoon waw akhleetoon-laha. O oep adeea le maṣeytoon.
ENG: I fed you with milk, not with meat; for ye were not yet able to bear it: nay, not even now are ye able;

ASY: ܣܵܒܵܒ ܗܹܫ ܦܲܓ݂ܪ̈ܵܢܵܝܹܐ ܝܬܘܿܢ. ܣܵܒܵܒ ܟܡܵܐ ܕܐܝܼܬ ܓܵܘܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܒܲܚܸܠܵܢܘܼܬܵܐ ܘܡܲܩܲܪܵܨܘܼܬܵܐ، ܗܵܐ ܠܹܐ ܝܬܘܿܢ ܦܲܓ݂ܪ̈ܵܢܵܝܹܐ، ܘܒܸܚܕܵܪܵܐ ܐܲܝܟ݂ ܒܲܪܢܵܫܵܐ؟
TRL: Sabab hesh paghranaye ytoon. Sabab kma deet gawawkhoon bakhilanoeta o maqaraṣoeta, ha le ytoon paghranaye, o bikhdara aykh barnasha?
ENG: for ye are yet carnal: for whereas there is among you jealousy and strife, are ye not carnal, and walk after the manner of men?

ASY: ܟܲܕ ܚܲܕ ܡܸܢܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܐܵܡܹܪ، ”ܐܵܢܵܐ ܟܹܐ ܬܵܒܥܹܢ ܠܦܵܘܠܘܿܣ،“ ܘܗ̇ܘ ܐ݇ܚܹܪ݇ܢܵܐ، ”ܐܵܢܵܐ ܟܹܐ ܬܵܒܥܹܢ ܠܐܵܦܲܠܘܿ،“ ܠܹܐ ܝܬܘܿܢ ܦܲܓ݂ܪ̈ܵܢܵܝܹܐ؟
TRL: Kad khad minawkhoon amer, ”ana ke tab'en lpawloos,“ o haw khena, ”ana ke tab'en lapaloo,“ le ytoon paghranaye?
ENG: For when one saith, I am of Paul; and another, I am of Apollos; are ye not men?

ASY: ܒܲܣ ܡܵܢܝܼ ܝܠܹܗ ܦܵܘܠܘܿܣ، ܡܵܢܝܼ ܝܠܹܗ ܐܵܦܲܠܘܿ؟ ܡܫܲܡܫܵܢܹ̈ܐ ܝܢܵܐ، ܕܒܝܼܲܝܗܝ ܐ݇ܬܹܐ ܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܠܗܲܝܡܵܢܘܼܬܵܐ، ܐܲܝܟ݂ ܕܝܘܼܗ݇ܒܸܠ ܠܹܗ ܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ ܦܘܼܠܚܵܢܵܐ ܠܟܠ ܚܲܕ ܡܸܢܲܝܗܝ.
TRL: Bas manee-yleh pawloos, manee-yleh apaloo? Mshamshane yna, dbee-ayhy te lawkhoon lhaymanoeta, aykh dyoebil-leh Alaha poelkhana lkl khad minayhy.
ENG: What then is Apollos? and what is Paul? Ministers through whom ye believed; and each as the Lord gave to him.

ASY: ܐܵܢܵܐ ܢܨܝܼܒ݂ ܠܝܼ، ܐܵܦܲܠܘܿ ܡܘܼܫܬܹܐ ܠܹܗ، ܐܝܼܢܵܐ ܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ ܓܘܼܪܘܸܣ ܠܹܗ.
TRL: Ana nṣeew-lee, apaloo moeshte-leh, eena Alaha goerwis-leh.
ENG: I planted, Apollos watered; but God gave the increase.

ASY: ܗܲܕܟ݂ܵܐ ܗ̇ܘ ܕܢܵܨܹܒ݂ ܠܹܐ ܝܠܹܗ ܡܸܢܕܝܼ، ܐܵܦܠܵܐ ܗ̇ܘ ܕܡܲܫܬܹܐ، ܐܸܠܵܐ ܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ، ܕܝܼܠܹܗ ܓܲܪܘܸܣܵܢܵܐ ܕܢܨܝܼܒ݂ܬܵܐ.
TRL: Hadkha haw dnaṣew le-yleh mindee, apla haw dmashte, ila Alaha, deeleh garwisana dnṣeewta.
ENG: So then neither is he that planteth anything, neither he that watereth; but God that giveth the increase.

ASY: ܗ̇ܘ ܕܢܵܨܹܒ݂ ܘܗ̇ܘ ܕܡܲܫܬܹܐ ܚܲܕ ܢܝܼܫܵܐ ܐܝܼܬ ܠܗܘܿܢ. ܘܟܠ ܚܲܕ ܒܸܬ ܩܲܒܸܠ ܦܘܼܪܥܵܢܹܗ ܐܲܝܟ݂ ܦܘܼܠܚܵܢܹܗ.
TRL: Haw dnaṣew o haw dmashte khad neesha eet-lhoon. O kl khad bit qabil poer'aneh aykh poelkhaneh.
ENG: Now he that planteth and he that watereth are one: but each shall receive his own reward according to his own labour.

ASY: ܫܲܪ̈ܝܼܟܹܐ ܝܘܲܚ ܥܲܡ ܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ ܒܦܘܼܠܚܵܢܵܐ، ܘܐܲܚܬܘܿܢ ܝܼܬܘܿܢ ܚܲܩܠܵܐ، ܒܸܢܝܵܢܵܐ ܕܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ.
TRL: Shareeke ywakh 'am Alaha bpoelkhana, o akhtoon eetoon khaqla, binyana dalaha.
ENG: For we are God’s fellow-workers: ye are God’s husbandry, God’s building.

ASY: ܒܫܵܦܵܩܲܬ ܕܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ ܕܦܝܼܫ ܠܵܗ̇ ܝܘܼܗ݇ܒܸܠܬܵܐ ܐܸܠܝܼ، ܐܵܢܵܐ ܡܘܼܬܸܒ݂ ܠܝܼ ܒܸܢܝܲܬ ܡܐܲܝܟ݂ ܚܲܕ ܒܲܢܵܝܵܐ ܚܲܟܝܼܡܵܐ، ܐܝܼܢܵܐ ܚܲܕ ܐ݇ܚܹܪ݇ܢܵܐ ܒܸܒܢܵܝܵܐ ܝܠܹܗ ܥܲܠܘܼܗ̇. ܐܝܼܢܵܐ ܟܠ ܚܲܕ ܗܵܘܹܐ ܗܸܫܝܵܪ ܕܵܐܟ݂ܝܼ ܒܵܢܹܐ ܥܲܠܘܼܗ̇.
TRL: Bshapaqat dalaha dpeesh-laha yoebilta ilee, ana moetiw-lee binyat maykh khad banaya khakeema, eena khad khena bibnaya-yleh 'aloeha. Eena kl khad hawe hishyar dakhee bane 'aloeha.
ENG: According to the grace of God which was given unto me, as a wise masterbuilder I laid a foundation; and another buildeth thereon. But let each man take heed how he buildeth thereon.

ASY: ܐܘܼܦ ܚܲܕ ܠܹܐ ܡܵܨܹܐ ܡܲܬܸܒ݂ ܚܕܵܐ ܒܸܢܝܲܬ ܐ݇ܚܹܪ݇ܬܵܐ ܫܒ݂ܘܿܩ ܡ̣ܢ ܗ̇ܝ ܕܡܘܼܬܸܒ݂ܬܵܐ ܝܠܵܗ̇، ܕܝܼܠܵܗ̇ ܝܼܫܘܿܥ ܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ.
TRL: Oep khad le maṣe matiw khda binyat kheta shwooq min hay dmoetiwta-ylaha, deelaha eeshoo' msheekha.
ENG: For other foundation can no man lay than that which is laid, which is Jesus Christ.

ASY: ܐܸܢ ܐ݇ܢܵܫܵܐ ܒܵܢܹܐ ܥܲܠ ܐܵܗܵܐ ܒܸܢܝܲܬ، ܕܲܗܒ݂ܵܐ، ܝܲܢ ܣܹܐܡܵܐ، ܝܲܢ ܟܹܐܦܹ̈ܐ ܛܝܼܡܵܢܹ̈ܐ، ܝܲܢ ܩܲܝܣܵܐ، ܝܲܢ ܬܸܒ݂ܢܵܐ، ܝܲܢ ܟܘܼܠܵܫ،
TRL: In nasha bane 'al aha binyat, dahwa, yan sema, yan kepe ṭeemane, yan qaysa, yan tiwna, yan koelash,
ENG: But if any man buildeth on the foundation gold, silver, costly stones, wood, hay, stubble;

ASY: ܒܸܬ ܦܵܐܹܫ ܚܸܙܝܵܐ ܦܘܼܠܚܵܢܵܐ ܕܟܠ ܚܲܕ، ܣܵܒܵܒ ܒܗ̇ܘ ܝܵܘܡܵܐ ܒܸܬ ܦܵܐܹܫ ܓܸܠܝܵܐ ܒܢܘܼܪܵܐ، ܣܵܒܵܒ ܢܘܼܪܵܐ ܒܸܬ ܨܲܚܨܹܐ ܦܘܼܠܚܵܢܵܐ ܕܟܠ ܚܲܕ ܐ݇ܢܵܫܵܐ ܕܵܐܟ݂ܝܼ ܕܝܼܠܹܗ.
TRL: Bit paesh khizya poelkhana dkl khad, sabab bhaw yawma bit paesh gilya bnoera, sabab noera bit ṣakhṣe poelkhana dkl khad nasha dakhee deeleh.
ENG: each man’s work shall be made manifest: for the day shall declare it, because it is revealed in fire; and the fire itself shall prove each man’s work of what sort it is.

ASY: ܐܸܢ ܟܵܠܹܐ ܦܘܼܠܚܵܢܵܐ ܕܒܢܹܐ ܠܹܗ ܐ݇ܢܵܫܵܐ، ܒܸܬ ܩܲܒܸܠ ܦܘܼܪܥܵܢܵܐ،
TRL: In kale poelkhana dbne-leh nasha, bit qabil poer'ana,
ENG: If any man’s work shall abide which he built thereon, he shall receive a reward.

ASY: ܐܝܼܢܵܐ ܐܸܢ ܝܵܩܹܕ ܦܘܼܠܚܵܢܵܐ ܕܐ݇ܢܵܫܵܐ، ܒܸܬ ܚܵܣܹܪ ܗ̇ܘ ܐ݇ܢܵܫܵܐ، ܐܝܼܢܵܐ ܒܓܵܢܹܗ ܒܸܬ ܦܵܪܹܩ، ܐܲܝܟ݂ ܚܲܕ ܕܦܵܪܹܩ ܡ̣ܢ ܠܵܗܵܐ ܕܢܘܼܪܵܐ.
TRL: Eena in yaqed poelkhana dnasha, bit khaser haw nasha, eena bganeh bit pareq, aykh khad dpareq min-laha dnoera.
ENG: If any man’s work shall be burned, he shall suffer loss: but he himself shall be saved; yet so as through fire.

ASY: ܠܹܐ ܝܬܘܿܢ ܒܝܼܕܵܥܵܐ ܕܐܲܚܬܘܿܢ ܗܲܝܟܠܵܐ ܕܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ ܝܬܘܿܢ ܘܪܘܼܚܵܐ ܕܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ ܒܸܥܡܵܪܵܐ ܝܠܹܗ ܓܵܘܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ؟
TRL: Le ytoon beeda'a dakhtoon haykla dalaha ytoon o roekha dalaha bi'mara-yleh gawawkhoon?
ENG: Know ye not that ye are a temple of God, and that the Spirit of God dwelleth in you?

ASY: ܐܸܢ ܐ݇ܢܵܫܵܐ ܡܲܚܪܸܒ݂ ܠܗܲܝܟܠܵܐ ܕܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ، ܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ ܒܸܬ ܡܲܚܪܸܒ݂ ܐܸܠܹܗ، ܣܵܒܵܒ ܗܲܝܟܠܵܐ ܕܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ ܩܲܕܝܼܫܵܐ ܝܠܹܗ، ܘܐܲܚܬܘܿܢ ܝܼܬܘܿܢ ܗ̇ܘ ܗܲܝܟܠܵܐ.
TRL: In nasha makhriw lhaykla dalaha, Alaha bit makhriw ileh, sabab haykla dalaha qadeesha-yleh, o akhtoon eetoon haw haykla.
ENG: If any man destroyeth the temple of God, him shall God destroy; for the temple of God is holy, which temple ye are.

ASY: ܐܘܼܦ ܚܲܕ ܡܸܢܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܠܵܐ ܥܲܠܕܹܐ ܓܵܢܹܗ ܘܚܵܫܹܒ݂ ܕܚܲܟܝܼܡܵܐ ܝܠܹܗ ܒܐܵܗܵܐ ܥܵܠܡܵܐ، ܐܸܠܵܐ ܫܒ݂ܘܿܩ ܗܵܘܹܐ ܣܲܟ݂ܠܵܐ، ܩܵܐ ܕܗܵܘܹܐ ܚܲܟܝܼܡܵܐ.
TRL: Oep khad minawkhoon la 'alde ganeh o khashew dkhakeema-yleh baha 'alma, ila shwooq hawe sakhla, qa dhawe khakeema.
ENG: Let no man deceive himself. If any man thinketh that he is wise among you in this world, let him become a fool, that he may become wise.

ASY: ܣܵܒܵܒ ܚܸܟ݂ܡܬܵܐ ܕܐܵܗܵܐ ܥܵܠܡܵܐ ܣܲܟ݂ܠܘܼܬܵܐ ܝܠܵܗ̇ ܒܥܲܝܢܵܐ ܕܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ. ܕܵܐܟ݂ܝܼ ܕܝܼܠܹܗ ܟܬܝܼܒ݂ܵܐ: ܟܹܐ ܕܵܒܹܩ ܠܚܲܟܝܼܡܹ̈ܐ ܒܦܲܢܕܲܝܗܝ.
TRL: Sabab khikhmta daha 'alma sakhloeta-ylaha b'ayna dalaha. Dakhee deeleh kteewa: ke dabeq lkhakeeme bpandayhy.
ENG: For the wisdom of this world is foolishness with God. For it is written, He that taketh the wise in their craftiness:

ASY: ܡܸܢܕܪܸܫ ܟܬܝܼܒ݂ܵܐ ܝܠܹܗ: ܡܵܪܝܵܐ ܟܹܐ ܝܵܕܹܥ ܚܘܼܫܵܒܹ̈ܐ ܕܚܲܟܝܼܡܹ̈ܐ ܕܒܲܛܝܼܠܹ̈ܐ ܝܢܵܐ.
