ASY: ܐܵܕܝܼܵܐ ܒܝܼܕܵܥܵܐ ܝܘܲܚ ܕܐܸܢ ܡܲܫܟܢܲܢ ܐܲܪܥܵܢܵܝܵܐ ܦܵܐܹܫ ܣܬܝܼܪܵܐ، ܐܝܼܬ ܠܲܢ ܒܸܢܝܵܢܵܐ ܥܵܠܡܝܼܢܵܝܵܐ ܡ̣ܢ ܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ ܓܵܘ ܫܡܲܝܵܐ ܕܠܹܐ ܝܠܹܗ ܦܝܼܫܵܐ ܒܸܢܝܵܐ ܒܐܝܼܕܵܬܹ̈ܐ.
TRL: Adeea beeda'a ywakh din mashknan ar'anaya paesh steera, eet lan binyana 'almeenaya min Alaha gaw shmaya dle-yleh peesha binya beedate.
ENG: For we know that if the earthly house of our tabernacle be dissolved, we have a building from God, a house not made with hands, eternal, in the heavens.

ASY: ܒܘܼܬ ܐܵܗܵܐ ܬܲܢܘܼܚܹܐ ܝܘܲܚ ܘܫܲܗܘܘܼܬܹܐ ܝܘܲܚ ܕܦܵܝܫܲܚ ܡܘܼܠܒܸܫܹܐ ܒܲܝܬܲܢ ܫܡܲܝܵܢܵܝܵܐ،
TRL: Boet aha tanoekhe ywakh o shahwoete ywakh dpayshakh moelbishe baytan shmayanaya,
ENG: For verily in this we groan, longing to be clothed upon with our habitation which is from heaven:

ASY: ܣܵܒܵܒ ܐܝܼܡܲܢ ܕܦܵܝܫܲܚ ܡܘܼܠܒܸܫܹܐ ܠܹܐ ܦܵܝܫܲܚ ܚܸܙܝܹܐ ܫܘܼܠܚܵܝܹ̈ܐ.
TRL: Sabab eeman dpayshakh moelbishe le payshakh khizye shoelkhaye.
ENG: if so be that being clothed we shall not be found naked.

ASY: ܟܡܵܐ ܕܝܼܘܲܚ ܒܐܵܗܵܐ ܡܲܫܟܢܵܐ ܦܲܓ݂ܪܵܢܵܝܵܐ، ܬܲܢܘܼܚܹܐ ܝܘܲܚ ܡ̣ܢ ܝܘܼܩܪܹܗ، ܣܵܒܵܒ ܠܹܐ ܒܵܥܲܚ ܕܦܵܝܫܲܚ ܫܘܼܠܚܹܐ ܐܝܼܢܵܐ ܕܦܵܝܫܲܚ ܡܘܼܠܒܸܫܹܐ، ܕܡܵܝܘܿܬܵܐ ܦܵܐܹܫ ܒܠܝܼܥܵܐ ܒܚܲܝܹ̈ܐ.
TRL: Kma deewakh baha mashkna paghranaya, tanoekhe ywakh min yoeqreh, sabab le ba'akh dpayshakh shoelkhe eena dpayshakh moelbishe, dmayoota paesh blee'a bkhaye.
ENG: For indeed we that are in this tabernacle do groan, being burdened; not for that we would be unclothed, but that we would be clothed upon, that what is mortal may be swallowed up of life.

ASY: ܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ ܝܠܹܗ ܗ̇ܘ ܕܩܲܡ ܗܲܕܸܪܲܢ ܠܐܵܗܵܐ ܢܝܼܫܵܐ، ܘܩܲܡ ܝܲܗ݇ܒܸܠ ܠܲܢ ܪܲܗܒ݂ܘܿܢܵܐ، ܕܝܼܠܹܗ ܪܘܼܚܵܐ.
TRL: Alaha-yleh haw dqam hadiran-laha neesha, o qam yabil lan rahwoona, deeleh roekha.
ENG: Now he that wrought us for this very thing is God, who gave unto us the earnest of the Spirit.

ASY: ܗܲܕܟ݂ܵܐ ܒܟܠ ܥܕܵܢܵܐ ܚܵܬܸܪܓ̰ܲܡܥ ܝܼܘܲܚ ܘܒܝܼܕܵܥܵܐ، ܟܡܵܐ ܕܒܸܥܡܵܪܵܐ ܝܘܲܚ ܒܐܵܗܵܐ ܦܲܓ݂ܪܵܐ، ܪܸܚܩܵܐ ܝܘܲܚ ܡ̣ܢ ܡܵܪܝܵܐ.
TRL: Hadkha bkl 'dana khatirjam' eewakh o beeda'a, kma dbi'mara ywakh baha paghra, rikhqa ywakh min Marya.
ENG: Being therefore always of good courage, and knowing that, whilst we are at home in the body, we are absent from the Lord

ASY: ܣܵܒܵܒ ܒܸܚܵܝܵܐ ܝܘܲܚ ܒܗܲܝܡܵܢܘܼܬܵܐ ܠܵܐ ܒܚܙܵܝܬܵܐ.
TRL: Sabab bikhaya ywakh bhaymanoeta la bkhzayta.
ENG: (for we walk by faith, not by sight);

ASY: ܚܵܬܸܪܓ̰ܲܡܥ ܝܼܘܲܚ ܘܒܸܚܫܵܒ݂ܵܐ، ܒܘܼܫ ܨܦܵܝܝܼ ܝܠܵܗ̇ ܕܗܵܘܲܚ ܪܸܚܩܵܐ ܡ̣ܢ ܐܵܗܵܐ ܦܲܓ݂ܪܵܐ، ܕܗܵܘܲܚ ܥܲܡ ܡܵܪܝܵܐ.
TRL: Khatirjam' eewakh o bikhshawa, boesh ṣpayee-ylaha dhawakh rikhqa min aha paghra, dhawakh 'am Marya.
ENG: we are of good courage, I say, and are willing rather to be absent from the body, and to be at home with the Lord.

ASY: ܒܘܼܬ ܐܵܗܵܐ ܚܲܦܘܼܛܹܐ ܝܘܲܚ ܕܫܵܦܪܲܚ ܩܵܕ݇ܡܘܼܗܝ، ܐܸܢ ܗܵܘܲܚ ܒܸܥܡܵܪܵܐ ܒܐܵܗܵܐ ܦܲܓ݂ܪܵܐ ܝܲܢ ܠܒܲܕܲܪ ܡܸܢܹܗ.
TRL: Boet aha khapoeṭe ywakh dshaprakh qamoehy, in hawakh bi'mara baha paghra yan lbadar mineh.
ENG: Wherefore also we make it our aim, whether at home or absent, to be well-pleasing unto him.

ASY: ܣܵܒܵܒ ܘܵܠܹܐ ܝܠܵܗ̇ ܕܟܠܲܢ ܟܵܠܲܚ ܩܵܕ݇ܡ ܟܘܼܪܣܝܵܐ ܕܕܝܼܘܵܢ ܕܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ، ܕܟܠ ܚܲܕ ܦܵܐܹܫ ܦܪܝܼܥܵܐ ܒܘܼܬ ܡܸܢܕܝܼ ܕܥܒ݂ܝܼܕܵܐ ܝܠܹܗ ܐܝܼܡܲܢ ܕܒܸܚܵܝܵܐ ܝܗ݇ܘܵܐ ܒܦܲܓ݂ܪܵܐ، ܐܸܢ ܛܵܒ݂ܵܐ ܝܲܢ ܒܝܼܫܵܐ.
TRL: Sabab wale-ylaha dklan kalakh qam koersya ddeewan dmsheekha, dkl khad paesh pree'a boet mindee d'weeda-yleh eeman dbikhaya ywa bpaghra, in ṭawa yan beesha.
ENG: For we must all be made manifest before the judgment-seat of Christ; that each one may receive the things done in the body, according to what he hath done, whether it be good or bad.

ASY: ܘܣܵܒܵܒ ܒܝܼܕܵܥܵܐ ܝܘܲܚ ܡܘܿܕܝܼ ܝܠܵܗ̇ ܙܕܘܼܥܬܵܐ ܕܡܵܪܝܵܐ، ܒܸܥܒ݂ܵܕܵܐ ܝܘܲܚ ܕܐ݇ܢܵܫܹ̈ܐ ܗܲܡܸܢܝܼ. ܠܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ ܦܝܼܫܹܐ ܝܘܲܚ ܓܸܠܝܹܐ، ܘܐܝܼܬ ܠܝܼ ܗܹܒ݂ܝܼ ܕܐܘܼܦ ܠܐܸܢܝܲܬܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܦܝܼܫܹܐ ܝܘܲܚ ܓܸܠܝܹܐ.
TRL: O sabab beeda'a ywakh moodee-ylaha zdoe'ta dmarya, bi'wada ywakh dnashe haminee. Lalaha peeshe ywakh gilye, o eet-lee hewee doep linyatawkhoon peeshe ywakh gilye.
ENG: Knowing therefore the fear of the Lord, we persuade men, but we are made manifest unto God; and I hope that we are made manifest also in your consciences.

ASY: ܠܹܐ ܝܘܲܚ ܡܸܢܕܪܸܫ ܒܸܚܩܵܪܵܐ ܓܵܢܲܢ ܠܟܸܣ ܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ، ܐܝܼܢܵܐ ܒܝܼܵܗ݇ܒ݂ܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܝܼܘܲܚ ܦܸܪܣܲܬ ܕܫܵܩܠܝܼܬܘܿܢ ܫܘܼܒ݂ܗܵܪܵܐ ܒܝܼܲܢ، ܘܕܓ̰ܲܘܸܒܝܼܬܘܿܢ ܠܐܵܢܝܼ ܕܫܵܩܠܝܼ ܫܘܼܒ݂ܗܵܪܵܐ ܡ̣ܢ ܦܵܬܵܐ ܘܠܵܐ ܡ̣ܢ ܠܸܒܵܐ.
TRL: Le ywakh mindrish bikhqara ganan lkis lawkhoon, eena beeawawkhoon eewakh pirsat dshaqleetoon shoewhara bee-an, o djawibeetoon lanee dshaqlee shoewhara min pata o la min liba.
ENG: We are not again commending ourselves unto you, but speak as giving you occasion of glorying on our behalf, that ye may have wherewith to answer them that glory in appearance, and not in heart.

ASY: ܐܸܢ ܫܹܐܕܵܢܹ̈ܐ ܝܘܲܚ، ܩܵܐ ܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ ܫܹܐܕܵܢܹ̈ܐ ܝܘܲܚ، ܘܐܸܢ ܗܵܘܢܵܢܹ̈ܐ ܝܘܲܚ، ܩܵܐ ܕܝܼܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܗܵܘܢܵܢܹ̈ܐ ܝܘܲܚ.
TRL: In shedane ywakh, qa Alaha shedane ywakh, o in hawnane ywakh, qa deeawkhoon hawnane ywakh.
ENG: For whether we are beside ourselves, it is unto God; or whether we are of sober mind, it is unto you.

ASY: ܣܵܒܵܒ ܚܘܼܒܵܐ ܕܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ ܡܲܠܝܘܼܨܲܢ ܝܼܠܹܗ، ܣܵܒܵܒ ܗܲܡܘܼܢܹܐ ܝܘܲܚ ܒܐܵܗܵܐ: ܕܚܲܕ ܡܝܼܬ ܠܹܗ ܡ̣ܢ ܓܹܒܵܐ ܕܟܠܲܝܗܝ، ܒܲܣ ܟܠܲܝܗܝ ܡܝܼܬ ܠܗܘܿܢ،
TRL: Sabab khoeba dmsheekha malyoeṣan eeleh, sabab hamoene ywakh baha: dkhad meet-leh min geba dklayhy, bas klayhy meet-lhoon,
ENG: For the love of Christ constraineth us; because we thus judge, that one died for all, therefore all died;

ASY: ܘܗ̇ܘ ܡܝܼܬ ܠܹܗ ܡ̣ܢ ܓܹܒܵܐ ܕܟܠܲܝܗܝ، ܕܐܵܢܝܼ ܕܝܼܢܵܐ ܚܵܝܹ̈ܐ، ܐ݇ܚܹܪ݇ܢܵܐ ܠܵܐ ܚܵܝܝܼ ܩܵܐ ܓܵܢܲܝܗܝ، ܐܝܼܢܵܐ ܩܵܐ ܗ̇ܘ ܕܡܝܼܬ ܠܹܗ ܒܘܼܬ ܕܝܼܲܝܗܝ ܘܩܝܼܡ ܠܹܗ.
TRL: O haw meet-leh min geba dklayhy, danee deena khaye, khena la khayee qa ganayhy, eena qa haw dmeet-leh boet dee-ayhy o qeem-leh.
ENG: and he died for all, that they which live should no longer live unto themselves, but unto him who for their sakes died and rose again.

ASY: ܒܲܣ ܡ̣ܢ ܐܵܕܝܼܵܐ ܠܹܐ ܝܵܕܥܲܚ ܠܐ݇ܢܵܫܵܐ ܡ̣ܢ ܚܙܵܝܬܵܐ ܕܟܝܵܢܹܗ ܐ݇ܢܵܫܵܝܵܐ. ܐܘܼܦ ܐܸܢ ܕܗܲܕܟ݂ܵܐ ܝ݇ܕܝܼܥ ܠܲܢ ܠܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ، ܐܝܼܢܵܐ ܡ̣ܢ ܐܵܕܝܼܵܐ ܠܹܐ ܝܵܕܥܲܚ ܠܹܗ ܗܲܕܟ݂ܵܐ.
TRL: Bas min adeea le yad'akh lnasha min khzayta dkyaneh nashaya. Oep in dhadkha dee' lan lmsheekha, eena min adeea le yad'akh-leh hadkha.
ENG: Wherefore we henceforth know no man after the flesh: even though we have known Christ after the flesh, yet now we know him so no more.

ASY: ܣܵܒܵܒ ܟܠ ܡ̇ܢ ܕܝܼܠܹܗ ܒܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ ܒܪܝܼܬܵܐ ܚܲܕܬܵܐ ܝܠܹܗ. ܡܸܢܕܝܼܵܢܹ̈ܐ ܥܲܬܝܼܩܹ̈ܐ ܥܒ݂ܝܼܪܗܘܿܢ، ܟܠ ܡܸܢܕܝܼ ܗܘܹܐ ܠܹܗ ܚܵܕ݇ܬܵܐ.
TRL: Sabab kl man deeleh bmsheekha breeta khadta-yleh. Mindeeane 'ateeqe 'weerhoon, kl mindee hwe-leh khata.
ENG: Wherefore if any man is in Christ, he is a new creature: the old things are passed away; behold, they are become new.

ASY: ܟܠܵܗ̇ ܐܵܗܵܐ ܡ̣ܢ ܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ ܝܠܵܗ̇، ܗ̇ܘ ܕܩܲܡ ܣܲܙܓܸܪܵܢ ܥܲܡܹܗ ܒܝܲܕ ܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ ܘܩܲܡ ܝܲܗ݇ܒܸܠ ܠܲܢ ܚܸܠܡܲܬ ܕܣܲܙܓܲܪܬܵܐ.
TRL: Klaha aha min Alaha-ylaha, haw dqam sazgiran 'ameh byad msheekha o qam yabil lan khilmat dsazgarta.
ENG: But all things are of God, who reconciled us to himself through Christ, and gave unto us the ministry of reconciliation;

ASY: ܘܐܵܗܵܐ ܝܠܵܗ̇، ܕܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ ܣܲܙܓܘܼܪܹܐ ܝܗ݇ܘܵܐ ܠܥܵܠܡܵܐ ܥܲܡ ܓܵܢܹܗ ܒܝܲܕ ܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ، ܘܠܵܐ ܚܘܼܫܒܸܢܹܗ ܐܸܠܲܝܗܝ ܚܛܝܼܵܬܲܝ̈ܗܝ، ܘܝܘܼܗ݇ܒܸܠ ܠܹܗ ܐܸܠܲܢ ܗܹܡܸܙܡܵܢ ܕܣܲܙܓܲܪܬܵܐ.
TRL: O aha-ylaha, dalaha sazgoere ywa l'alma 'am ganeh byad msheekha, o la khoeshbineh ilayhy khṭeeatayhy, o yoebil-leh ilan hemizman dsazgarta.
ENG: to wit, that God was in Christ reconciling the world unto himself, not reckoning unto them their trespasses, and having committed unto us the word of reconciliation.

ASY: ܗܲܕܟ݂ܵܐ ܐܲܚܢܲܢ ܡ̣ܢ ܓܹܒܵܐ ܕܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ ܐܝܼܙܓܲܕܹ̈ܐ ܝܘܲܚ، ܘܐܲܝܟ݂ ܕܐܸܢ ܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ ܦܲܪܦܘܼܠܹܐ ܝܠܹܗ ܒܝܲܕ ܕܝܼܲܢ، ܡ̣ܢ ܓܹܒܵܐ ܕܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ ܒܸܛܠܵܒܵܐ ܝܘܲܚ ܡܸܢܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ، ܣܲܙܓܸܪܘܼܢ ܥܲܡ ܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ.
TRL: Hadkha akhnan min geba dmsheekha eezgade ywakh, o aykh din Alaha parpoele-yleh byad dee-an, min geba dmsheekha biṭlaba ywakh minawkhoon, sazgiroen 'am Alaha.
ENG: We are ambassadors therefore on behalf of Christ, as though God were entreating by us: we beseech you on behalf of Christ, be ye reconciled to God.

ASY: ܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ ܥܒ݂ܝܼܕ ܠܹܗ ܠܗ̇ܘ ܕܠܹܐ ܝܵܕܹܥ ܗ݇ܘܵܐ ܚܛܝܼܬܵܐ ܕܗܵܘܹܐ ܚܛܝܼܬܵܐ ܡ̣ܢ ܓܹܒܲܢ، ܕܐܲܚܢܲܢ ܗܵܘܲܚ ܒܝܼܹܗ ܙܲܕܝܼܩܘܼܬܵܐ ܕܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ.
TRL: Alaha 'weed-leh lhaw dle yade' wa khṭeeta dhawe khṭeeta min geban, dakhnan hawakh bee-eh zadeeqoeta dalaha.
ENG: Him who knew no sin he made to be sin on our behalf; that we might become the righteousness of God in him.

ASY: ܣܵܒܵܒ ܦܲܠܵܚܹ̈ܐ ܝܘܲܚ ܥܲܡ ܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ، ܦܲܪܦܘܼܠܹܐ ܝܘܲܚ ܒܝܼܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܕܠܵܐ ܩܲܒܠܝܼܬܘܿܢ ܫܵܦܵܩܲܬ ܕܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ ܒܣܪܝܼܩܘܼܬܵܐ.
TRL: Sabab palakhe ywakh 'am Alaha, parpoele ywakh beeawkhoon dla qableetoon shapaqat dalaha bsreeqoeta.
ENG: And working together with him we entreat also that ye receive not the grace of God in vain

ASY: ܣܵܒܵܒ ܒܹܐܡܵܪܵܐ ܝܠܹܗ: ܒܥܕܵܢܵܐ ܡܲܩܒܘܼܠ ܩܲܡ ܫܵܡܥܹܢܘܼܟ݂، ܘܒܝܵܘܡܵܐ ܕܦܘܼܪܩܵܢܵܐ ܩܲܡ ܗܲܝܸܪܸܢܘܼܟ݂. ܗܹܐ ܐܵܕܝܼܵܐ ܝܠܵܗ̇ ܥܕܵܢܵܐ ܡܲܩܒܘܼܠ، ܐܵܕܝܼܵܐ ܝܠܹܗ ܝܵܘܡܵܐ ܕܦܘܼܪܩܵܢܵܐ.
TRL: Sabab bemara-yleh: b'dana maqboel qam sham'enoekh, o byawma dpoerqana qam hayirinoekh. He adeea-ylaha 'dana maqboel, adeea-yleh yawma dpoerqana.
ENG: (for he saith, At an acceptable time I hearkened unto thee, And in a day of salvation did I succour thee: behold, now is the acceptable time; behold, now is the day of salvation):

ASY: ܠܹܐ ܥܵܒ݂ܕܲܚ ܡܸܢܕܝܼ ܕܗܵܘܹܐ ܟܹܐܦܵܐ ܕܬܘܼܪܩܵܠܵܐ ܠܐܘܼܦ ܚܲܕ، ܕܠܵܐ ܡܲܝܬܲܚ ܠܵܘܡܵܐ ܠܚܸܠܡܲܬܲܢ،
TRL: Le 'awdakh mindee dhawe kepa dtoerqala loep khad, dla maytakh lawma lkhilmatan,
ENG: giving no occasion of stumbling in anything, that our ministration be not blamed;

ASY: ܐܸܠܵܐ ܒܟܠ ܡܸܢܕܝܼ ܡܲܚܫܸܚܲܚ ܓܵܢܲܢ ܥܵܒ݂ܕܵܢܹ̈ܐ ܕܚܸܠܡܲܬ ܕܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ، ܒܚܡܵܠܬܵܐ ܓܘܼܪܬܵܐ، ܒܐܘܼܠܨܵܢܹ̈ܐ، ܒܥܵܘܩܵܢܹ̈ܐ ܘܒܓ̰ܘܼܢܓ̰ܵܪܹ̈ܐ،
TRL: Ila bkl mindee makhshikhakh ganan 'awdane dkhilmat dalaha, bkhmalta goerta, boelṣane, b'awqane o bjoenjare,
ENG: but in everything commending ourselves, as ministers of God, in much patience, in afflictions, in necessities, in distresses,

ASY: ܒܡܚܵܝܵܬܹ̈ܐ، ܒܒܹܝܬ ܐܲܣܝܼܪܹ̈ܐ، ܒܫܓ݂ܘܼܫܝܹ̈ܐ، ܒܦܘܼܠܚܵܢܹ̈ܐ ܩܸܫܝܹ̈ܐ، ܒܫܵܗܲܪ̈ܝܵܬܹܐ، ܒܨܵܘܡܹ̈ܐ،
TRL: Bmkhayate, bbeyt aseere, bshghoeshye, bpoelkhane qishye, bshaharyate, bṣawme,
ENG: in stripes, in imprisonments, in tumults, in labours, in watchings, in fastings;

ASY: ܒܕܸܟ݂ܝܘܼܬܵܐ، ܒܝ݇ܕܲܥܬܵܐ، ܒܡܲܪܝܲܟ݂ܬܵܐ ܕܒܹܐܢܵܐ، ܒܡܲܟܝܼܟ݂ܘܼܬܵܐ، ܒܪܘܼܚܵܐ ܕܩܘܼܕܫܵܐ، ܒܚܘܼܒܵܐ ܕܠܵܐ ܦܸܠܡܵܐ،
TRL: Bdikhyoeta, bda'ta, bmaryakhta dbena, bmakeekhoeta, broekha dqoedsha, bkhoeba dla pilma,
ENG: in pureness, in knowledge, in longsuffering, in kindness, in the Holy Ghost, in love unfeigned,

ASY: ܒܗܹܡܸܙܡܵܢ ܫܲܪܝܼܪܬܵܐ، ܒܚܲܝܠܵܐ ܕܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ، ܒܙܲܝܢܵܐ ܕܙܲܕܝܼܩܘܼܬܵܐ ܒܐܝܼܕܵܐ ܕܝܲܡܝܼܢܵܐ ܘܒܐܝܼܕܵܐ ܕܣܸܡܵܠܵܐ،
TRL: Bhemizman shareerta, bkhayla dalaha, bzayna dzadeeqoeta beeda dyameena o beeda dsimala,
ENG: in the word of truth, in the power of God; by the armour of righteousness on the right hand and on the left,

ASY: ܒܚܸܩܪܵܐ ܘܒܡܲܣܠܵܝܬܵܐ، ܒܐܝܼܩܵܪܵܐ ܘܒܠܵܘܡܵܐ، ܐܲܝܟ݂ ܥܲܠܕܝܼܵܢܹ̈ܐ ܦܝܼܫܹܐ ܚܫܝܼܒܹܐ، ܐܝܼܢܵܐ ܫܲܪܝܼܪܹ̈ܐ ܝܘܲܚ،
TRL: Bkhiqra o bmaslayta, beeqara o blawma, aykh 'aldeeane peeshe khsheebe, eena shareere ywakh,
ENG: by glory and dishonour, by evil report and good report; as deceivers, and yet true;

ASY: ܐܲܝܟ݂ ܕܠܵܐ ܦܝܼܫܹܐ ܝ݇ܕܝܼܥܹܐ، ܐܝܼܢܵܐ ܨܦܵܝܝܼ ܦܝܼܫܹܐ ܝܘܲܚ ܝ݇ܕܝܼܥܹܐ، ܐܲܝܟ݂ ܕܐܸܢ ܒܸܡܝܵܬܵܐ ܐܝܼܢܵܐ ܒܸܚܵܝܵܐ ܝܘܲܚ، ܐܲܝܟ݂ ܦܝܼܫܹܐ ܬܘܼܥܠܸܡܹܐ ܐܝܼܢܵܐ ܠܵܐ ܩܛܝܼܠܹܐ،
TRL: Aykh dla peeshe dee'e, eena ṣpayee peeshe ywakh dee'e, aykh din bimyata eena bikhaya ywakh, aykh peeshe toe'lime eena la qṭeele,
ENG: as unknown, and yet well known; as dying, and behold, we live; as chastened, and not killed;

ASY: ܐܲܝܟ݂ ܦܫܝܼܡܹܐ ܐܝܼܢܵܐ ܒܟܠ ܙܲܒ݂ܢܵܐ ܦܨܝܼܚܹܐ، ܐܲܝܟ݂ ܡܸܣܟܹܢܹ̈ܐ ܐܝܼܢܵܐ ܠܪܵܒܵܐ ܒܸܥܒ݂ܵܕܵܐ ܝܘܲܚ ܥܲܬܝܼܪܹ̈ܐ، ܐܲܝܟ݂ ܕܠܲܝܬ ܠܲܢ ܡܸܢܕܝܼ ܐܝܼܢܵܐ ܐܲܚܢܲܢ ܟܠ ܡܸܢܕܝܼ ܐܝܼܬ ܠܲܢ.
TRL: Aykh psheeme eena bkl zawna pṣeekhe, aykh miskene eena lraba bi'wada ywakh 'ateere, aykh dlayt lan mindee eena akhnan kl mindee eet lan.
ENG: as sorrowful, yet alway rejoicing; as poor, yet making many rich; as having nothing, and yet possessing all things.

ASY: ܗܘܼܡܙܸܡ ܠܲܢ ܒܨܸܦܝܘܼܬܵܐ ܐܸܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ، ܝܵܐ ܩܘܿܪ̈ܲܢܬܵܝܹܐ، ܘܦܬܝܼܚ ܠܲܢ ܠܸܒܲܢ ܐܸܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܪܵܒܵܐ.
TRL: Hoemzim lan bṣipyoeta ilawkhoon, ya qoorantaye, o pteekh lan liban ilawkhoon raba.
ENG: Our mouth is open unto you, O Corinthians, our heart is enlarged.

ASY: ܠܹܐ ܝܘܲܚ ܒܸܚܣܵܟܹܗ ܚܘܼܒܲܢ ܡܸܢܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ، ܐܝܼܢܵܐ ܐܲܚܬܘܿܢ ܒܸܚܣܵܟܹܗ ܝܬܘܿܢ ܚܘܼܒܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܡܸܢܲܢ.
TRL: Le ywakh bikhsakeh khoeban minawkhoon, eena akhtoon bikhsakeh ytoon khoebawkhoon minan.
ENG: Ye are not straitened in us, but ye are straitened in your own affections.

ASY: ܐܲܝܟ݂ ܚܕܵܐ ܛܵܒ݂ܬܵܐ‐‐ܗܲܡܙܘܼܡܹܐ ܝܘܸܢ ܐܲܝܟ݂ ܕܠܒܢܘܿܢܝܼ̈‐‐ܐܘܼܦ ܐܲܚܬܘܿܢ ܦܬܘܿܚܘܼܢ ܠܸܒܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ.
TRL: Aykh khda ṭawta‐‐hamzoeme ywin aykh dlbnoonee‐‐oep akhtoon ptookhoen libawkhoon.
ENG: Now for a recompense in like kind (I speak as unto my children), be ye also enlarged.

ASY: ܠܵܐ ܗܵܘܹܝܬܘܿܢ ܐ݇ܣܝܼܪܹ̈ܐ ܒܢܝܼܪܵܐ ܥܲܡ ܐܵܢܝܼ ܕܠܹܐ ܝܢܵܐ ܡܗܘܼܡܢܹ̈ܐ، ܣܵܒܵܒ ܡܘܿܕܝܼ ܫܵܘܬܵܦܘܼܬܵܐ ܐܝܼܬ ܠܵܗ̇ ܙܲܕܝܼܩܘܼܬܵܐ ܥܲܡ ܥܵܘܠܵܐ؟ ܝܲܢ ܡܘܿܕܝܼ ܫܲܪܝܼܟܘܼܬܵܐ ܐܝܼܬ ܠܹܗ ܒܲܗܪܵܐ ܥܲܡ ܚܸܫܟܵܐ؟
TRL: La haweytoon seere bneera 'am anee dle yna mhoemne, sabab moodee shawtapoeta eet-laha zadeeqoeta 'am 'awla? Yan moodee shareekoeta eet-leh bahra 'am khishka?
ENG: Be not unequally yoked with unbelievers: for what fellowship have righteousness and iniquity? or what communion hath light with darkness?

ASY: ܝܲܢ ܡܘܿܕܝܼ ܣܲܙܓܲܪܬܵܐ ܐܝܼܬ ܠܹܗ ܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ ܥܲܡ ܣܵܛܵܢܵܐ؟ ܡܘܿܕܝܼ ܣܵܗܡܵܐ ܐܝܼܬ ܠܹܗ ܡܗܘܼܡܢܵܐ ܥܲܡ ܠܵܐ ܡܗܘܼܡܢܵܐ؟
TRL: Yan moodee sazgarta eet-leh msheekha 'am saṭana? Moodee sahma eet-leh mhoemna 'am la mhoemna?
ENG: And what concord hath Christ with Belial? or what portion hath a believer with an unbeliever?

ASY: ܡܘܿܕܝܼ ܚܘܼܝܵܕܵܐ ܐܝܼܬ ܒܹܝܠ ܗܲܝܟܠܵܐ ܕܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ ܘܨܵܢܲܡܹ̈ܐ؟ ܐܲܚܢܲܢ ܝܼܘܲܚ ܗܲܝܟܠܵܐ ܕܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ ܚܵܝܵܐ، ܐܲܝܟ݂ ܕܐ݇ܡܝܼܪܹܗ ܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ: ܒܸܬ ܥܵܡܪܹܢ ܓܵܘܲܝܗܝ ܘܒܸܬ ܚܵܕܪܹܢ ܓܵܘܲܝܗܝ، ܒܸܬ ܗܵܘܹܝܢ ܐܸܠܲܝܗܝ ܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ، ܘܐܵܢܝܼ ܒܸܬ ܗܵܘܝܼ ܐܸܠܝܼ ܥܲܡܵܐ.
TRL: Moodee khoeyada eet beyl haykla dalaha o ṣaname? Akhnan eewakh haykla dalaha khaya, aykh dmeereh Alaha: bit 'amren gawayhy o bit khadren gawayhy, bit haweyn ilayhy Alaha, o anee bit hawee ilee 'ama.
ENG: And what agreement hath a temple of God with idols? for we are a temple of the living God; even as God said, I will dwell in them, and walk in them; and I will be their God, and they shall be my people.

ASY: ܒܘܼܬ ܐܵܗܵܐ ܦܠܘܿܛܘܼܢ ܡ̣ܢ ܓܵܘܲܝܗܝ ܘܦܪܘܿܫܘܼܢ ܡܸܢܲܝܗܝ، ܒܹܐܡܵܪܵܐ ܝܠܹܗ ܡܵܪܝܵܐ، ܘܠܵܐ ܕܵܩܪܝܼܬܘܿܢ ܒܡܸܢܕܝܼ ܛܲܡܐܵܐ، ܘܐܵܢܵܐ ܒܸܬ ܩܲܒܠܸܢܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ،
TRL: Boet aha plooṭoen min gawayhy o prooshoen minayhy, bemara-yleh Marya, o la daqreetoon bmindee ṭama, o ana bit qablinawkhoon,
ENG: Wherefore Come ye out from among them, and be ye separate, saith the Lord, And touch no unclean thing; And I will receive you,

ASY: ܘܒܸܬ ܗܵܘܹܝܢ ܐܸܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܒܵܒܵܐ، ܘܐܲܚܬܘܿܢ ܒܸܬ ܗܵܘܹܝܬܘܿܢ ܐܸܠܝܼ ܒܢܘܿܢܹ̈ܐ ܘܒܢܵܬܹ̈ܐ، ܒܹܐܡܵܪܵܐ ܝܠܹܗ ܡܵܪܝܵܐ ܐܲܚܝܼܕ ܟܠ.
TRL: O bit haweyn ilawkhoon baba, o akhtoon bit haweytoon ilee bnoone o bnate, bemara-yleh Marya akheed kl.
ENG: And will be to you a Father, And ye shall be to me sons and daughters, saith the Lord Almighty.

ASY: ܡܘܼܚܸܒܝܼ̈، ܣܵܒܵܒ ܐܝܼܬ ܠܲܢ ܐܲܢܹܐ ܩܵܘܠܹ̈ܐ، ܕܲܟܲܚ ܓܵܢܲܢ ܡ̣ܢ ܟܠܵܗ̇ ܛܲܡܐܘܼܬܵܐ ܕܦܲܓ݂ܪܵܐ ܘܕܪܘܼܚܵܐ، ܘܬܲܡܸܡܲܚ ܩܲܕܝܼܫܘܼܬܵܐ ܒܙܕܘܼܥܬܵܐ ܕܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ.
TRL: Moekhibee, sabab eet lan ane qawle, dakakh ganan min klaha ṭamoeta dpaghra o droekha, o tamimakh qadeeshoeta bzdoe'ta dalaha.
ENG: Having therefore these promises, beloved, let us cleanse ourselves from all defilement of flesh and spirit, perfecting holiness in the fear of God.

ASY: ܩܲܒܠܘܼܢ ܠܲܢ. ܠܐ݇ܢܵܫܵܐ ܠܵܐ ܛܠܝܼܡ ܠܲܢ، ܘܠܐ݇ܢܵܫܵܐ ܠܵܐ ܡܘܼܚܪܸܒ݂ ܠܲܢ، ܘܠܐ݇ܢܵܫܵܐ ܠܵܐ ܥܒ݂ܝܼܕ ܠܲܢ ܠܹܐܒܹ̈ܐ.
TRL: Qabloen lan. Lnasha la ṭleem lan, o lnasha la moekhriw lan, o lnasha la 'weed lan lebe.
ENG: Open your hearts to us: we wronged no man, we corrupted no man, we took advantage of no man.

ASY: ܠܹܐ ܝܠܵܗ̇ ܠܸܕܝܵܢܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܒܹܐܡܵܪܵܐ ܝܘܸܢ ܐܵܗܵܐ، ܡ̣ܢ ܩܵܕ݇ܡܵܝܬܵܐ ܐ݇ܡܝܼܪܝܼ ܐܸܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܕܐܲܚܬܘܿܢ ܓܵܘ ܠܸܒܲܢ ܝܼܬܘܿܢ، ܠܸܡܝܵܬܵܐ ܘܠܸܚܵܝܵܐ ܡܥܘܼܕܵܠܹ̈ܐ.
TRL: Le-ylaha lidyanawkhoon bemara ywin aha, min qamayta meeree ilawkhoon dakhtoon gaw liban eetoon, limyata o likhaya m'oedale.
ENG: I say it not to condemn you: for I have said before, that ye are in our hearts to die together and live together.

ASY: ܐܝܼܬ ܠܝܼ ܒܸܣܬܵܝܘܼܬܵܐ ܓܘܼܪܬܵܐ ܒܝܼܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ، ܐܝܼܬ ܠܝܼ ܫܘܼܒ݂ܗܵܪܵܐ ܓܘܼܪܵܐ ܐܸܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ، ܘܦܝܼܫܵܐ ܝܘܸܢ ܡܸܠܝܵܐ ܝܲܗ݇ܒܲܠܬܵܐ ܕܠܸܒܵܐ، ܘܒܟܠܲܝܗܝ ܐܘܼܠܨܵܢܹ̈ܐ ܡܸܠܝܵܐ ܝܘܸܢ ܚܲܕܘܼܬܵܐ.
TRL: Eet-lee bistayoeta goerta beeawkhoon, eet-lee shoewhara goera ilawkhoon, o peesha ywin milya yabalta dliba, o bklayhy oelṣane milya ywin khadoeta.
ENG: Great is my boldness of speech toward you, great is my glorying on your behalf: I am filled with comfort, I overflow with joy in all our affliction.

ASY: ܣܵܒܵܒ ܐܝܼܡܲܢ ܕܐ݇ܬܹܐ ܠܲܢ ܠܡܵܩܹܕܘܿܢܝܼܵܐ، ܐܵܗܵܐ ܦܲܓ݂ܪܲܢ ܠܲܝܬ ܗ݇ܘܵܐ ܠܹܗ ܢܝܵܚܵܐ، ܐܸܠܵܐ ܒܟܠ ܡܸܢܕܝܼ ܦܝܼܫ ܠܲܢ ܡܘܼܠܝܸܨܹܐ، ܦܠܵܫܹ̈ܐ ܡ̣ܢ ܠܒܲܕܲܪ ܘܙܕܘܼܥܝܵܬܹ̈ܐ ܡ̣ܢ ܠܓܵܘܵܐ.
TRL: Sabab eeman dte lan lmaqedooneea, aha paghran layt wa-leh nyakha, ila bkl mindee peesh lan moelyiṣe, plashe min lbadar o zdoe'yate min lgawa.
ENG: For even when we were come into Macedonia, our flesh had no relief, but we were afflicted on every side; without were fightings, within were fears.

ASY: ܐܝܼܢܵܐ ܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ، ܕܟܹܐ ܝܲܗ݇ܒܸܠ ܠܸܒܵܐ ܠܡܲܟܝܼܟܹ̈ܐ، ܝܘܼܗ݇ܒܸܠ ܠܹܗ ܠܸܒܵܐ ܐܸܠܲܢ ܒܐ݇ܬܵܝܬܵܐ ܕܛܸܛܘܿܣ.
TRL: Eena Alaha, dke yabil liba lmakeeke, yoebil-leh liba ilan btayta dṭiṭoos.
ENG: Nevertheless he that comforteth the lowly, even God, comforted us by the coming of Titus;

ASY: ܘܠܵܐ ܐܲܚܟ̰ܝܼ ܒܐ݇ܬܵܝܬܹܗ ܐܝܼܢܵܐ ܐܘܼܦ ܒܝܲܗ݇ܒܲܠܬܵܐ ܕܠܸܒܵܐ ܕܝܘܼܗ݇ܒܸܠ ܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܐܸܠܹܗ. ܡܘܼܚܒܸܪܹܗ ܐܸܠܲܢ ܒܘܼܬ ܪܲܚܪܲܚܬܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܠܸܚܙܵܝܵܐ ܐܸܠܲܢ، ܘܦܵܫܲܡܬܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܓܘܼܪܬܵܐ، ܘܩܲܝܪܲܬܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܠܟܸܣ ܠܝܼ، ܕܗܲܕܟ݂ܵܐ ܚܲܕܘܼܬܝܼ ܒܘܼܫ ܓܘܼܪܬܵܐ ܗܘܹܐ ܠܵܗ̇ ܡ̣ܢ ܩܵܕ݇ܡܵܝܬܵܐ.
TRL: O la akhchee btayteh eena oep byabalta dliba dyoebil lawkhoon ileh. Moekhbireh ilan boet rakhrakhtawkhoon likhzaya ilan, o pashamtawkhoon goerta, o qayratawkhoon lkis-lee, dhadkha khadoetee boesh goerta hwe-laha min qamayta.
ENG: and not by his coming only, but also by the comfort wherewith he was comforted in you, while he told us your longing, your mourning, your zeal for me; so that I rejoiced yet more.

ASY: ܐܵܦܸܢ ܩܲܡ ܡܲܦܫܸܡܸܢܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܒܐܸܓܲܪܬܝܼ، ܐܝܼܢܵܐ ܠܹܐ ܝܘܸܢ ܦܫܝܼܡܵܐ، ܐܵܦܸܢ ܕܦܫܝܼܡ ܠܝܼ ܣܵܒܵܒ ܒܸܚܙܵܝܵܐ ܝܘܸܢ ܕܐܸܓܲܪܬܝܼ ܩܲܡ ܡܲܦܫܸܡܵܐ ܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ، ܐܝܼܢܵܐ ܐܲܚܟ̰ܝܼ ܩܵܐ ܚܕܵܐ ܥܕܵܢܵܐ ܟܪܝܼܬܵܐ.
TRL: Apin qam mapshiminawkhoon bigartee, eena le ywin psheema, apin dpsheem-lee sabab bikhzaya ywin digartee qam mapshima lawkhoon, eena akhchee qa khda 'dana kreeta.
ENG: For though I made you sorry with my epistle, I do not regret it, though I did regret; for I see that that epistle made you sorry, though but for a season.

ASY: ܐܵܕܝܼܵܐ ܒܸܚܕܵܝܵܐ ܝܘܸܢ، ܠܵܐ ܕܦܫܝܼܡ ܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ، ܐܸܠܵܐ ܕܦܫܝܼܡ ܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܠܬܝܵܒ݂ܘܼܬܵܐ، ܕܝܼܠܵܗ̇ ܚܕܵܐ ܦܵܫܲܡܬܵܐ ܡ̣ܢ ܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ، ܘܗܲܕܟ݂ܵܐ ܠܵܐ ܩܘܼܒܸܠ ܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܚܘܼܣܪܵܢܵܐ ܡܸܢܲܢ.
TRL: Adeea bikhdaya ywin, la dpsheem lawkhoon, ila dpsheem lawkhoon ltyawoeta, deelaha khda pashamta min Alaha, o hadkha la qoebil lawkhoon khoesrana minan.
ENG: Now I rejoice, not that ye were made sorry, but that ye were made sorry unto repentance: for ye were made sorry after a godly sort, that ye might suffer loss by us in nothing.

ASY: ܦܵܫܲܡܬܵܐ ܕܝܼܠܵܗ̇ ܡ̣ܢ ܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ ܟܹܐ ܡܲܝܬܝܵܐ ܬܝܵܒ݂ܘܼܬܵܐ ܠܦܘܼܪܩܵܢܵܐ ܕܠܲܝܬ ܦܵܫܲܡܬܵܐ ܒܝܼܘܼܗ̇، ܐܝܼܢܵܐ ܦܵܫܲܡܬܵܐ ܕܝܼܠܵܗ̇ ܡ̣ܢ ܕܘܼܢܝܹܐ ܟܹܐ ܡܲܝܬܝܵܐ ܡܵܘܬܵܐ.
TRL: Pashamta deelaha min Alaha ke maytya tyawoeta lpoerqana dlayt pashamta beeoeha, eena pashamta deelaha min doenye ke maytya mawta.
ENG: For godly sorrow worketh repentance unto salvation, a repentance which bringeth no regret: but the sorrow of the world worketh death.

ASY: ܚܙܹܝܡܘܼܢ ܡܘܿܕܝܼ ܥܒ݂ܝܼܕ ܠܵܗ̇ ܐܵܗܵܐ ܦܵܫܲܡܬܵܐ ܐܲܠܵܗܵܝܬܵܐ ܓܵܘܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ: ܗ̇ܝ ܡܘܼܒܪܹܐ ܠܵܗ̇ ܚܦܝܼܛܘܼܬܵܐ، ܘܝܲܗ݇ܒܲܠܬܵܐ ܕܓ̰ܘܼܘܵܒ، ܘܟܲܪܒܵܐ، ܘܙܕܘܼܥܬܵܐ، ܘܪܲܚܪܲܚܬܵܐ ܓܘܼܪܬܵܐ، ܘܛܢܵܢܵܐ، ܘܫܩܵܠܬܵܐ ܕܬܘܼܥܠܵܐ. ܒܟܠ ܡܸܢܕܝܼ ܡܘܼܚܙܹܐ ܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܓܵܢܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܕܕܸܟ݂ܝܹ̈ܐ ܝܬܘܿܢ ܒܐܵܗܵܐ ܫܘܼܠܵܐ.
TRL: Khzeymoen moodee 'weed-laha aha pashamta alahayta gawawkhoon: hay moebre-laha khpeeṭoeta, o yabalta djoewab, o karba, o zdoe'ta, o rakhrakhta goerta, o ṭnana, o shqalta dtoe'la. Bkl mindee moekhze lawkhoon ganawkhoon ddikhye ytoon baha shoela.
ENG: For behold, this selfsame thing, that ye were made sorry after a godly sort, what earnest care it wrought in you, yea, what clearing of yourselves, yea, what indignation, yea, what fear, yea, what longing, yea, what zeal, yea, what avenging! In everything ye approved yourselves to be pure in the matter.

ASY: ܐܘܼܦ ܐܸܢ ܕܟܬܝܼܒ݂ ܠܝܼ ܐܸܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ، ܠܹܐ ܝܗ݇ܘܵܐ ܒܘܼܬ ܗ̇ܘ ܕܥܒ݂ܝܼܕܵܐ ܝܠܹܗ ܓܢܵܗܵܐ، ܘܠܵܐ ܒܘܼܬ ܗ̇ܘ ܕܓܢܵܗܵܐ ܦܝܼܫܬܵܐ ܝܠܵܗ̇ ܥܒ݂ܝܼܕܬܵܐ ܐܸܠܹܗ، ܐܸܠܵܐ ܕܚܦܝܼܛܘܼܬܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܒܘܼܬ ܕܝܼܲܢ ܦܵܝܫܵܐ ܝ݇ܕܝܼܥܬܵܐ ܐܸܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܩܵܕ݇ܡ ܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ.
TRL: Oep in dkteew-lee ilawkhoon, le ywa boet haw d'weeda-yleh gnaha, o la boet haw dgnaha peeshta-ylaha 'weedta ileh, ila dkhpeeṭoetawkhoon boet dee-an paysha dee'ta ilawkhoon qam Alaha.
ENG: So although I wrote unto you, I wrote not for his cause that did the wrong, nor for his cause that suffered the wrong, but that your earnest care for us might be made manifest unto you in the sight of God.

ASY: ܒܟܠܵܗ̇ ܐܵܗܵܐ ܦܝܼܫܹܐ ܝܘܲܚ ܝܘܼܗ݇ܒܹܐ ܠܸܒܵܐ، ܘܥܲܡ ܐܵܗܵܐ ܝܲܗ݇ܒܲܠܬܵܐ ܕܠܸܒܵܐ ܒܘܼܫ ܙܵܘܕܵܐ ܚܕܹܐ ܠܲܢ ܒܚܲܕܘܼܬܵܐ ܕܛܸܛܘܿܣ، ܣܵܒܵܒ ܚܝܼܵܠܘܼ̈ܗܝ ܢܝܼܚ ܠܗܘܿܢ ܒܝܼܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ.
TRL: Bklaha aha peeshe ywakh yoebe liba, o 'am aha yabalta dliba boesh zawda khde lan bkhadoeta dṭiṭoos, sabab kheealoehy neekh-lhoon beeawkhoon.
ENG: Therefore we have been comforted: and in our comfort we joyed the more exceedingly for the joy of Titus, because his spirit hath been refreshed by you all.

ASY: ܚܩܝܼܪܝܼ ܐܸܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܠܟܸܣ ܠܹܗ، ܘܠܹܐ ܝܘܸܢ ܒܸܢܟ݂ܵܦܵܐ ܒܐܵܗܵܐ. ܐܝܼܢܵܐ ܕܵܐܟ݂ܝܼ ܕܐ݇ܡܝܼܪܝܼ ܟܠ ܡܸܢܕܝܼ ܐܸܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܒܫܪܵܪܵܐ، ܗܲܕܟ݂ܵܐ ܐܘܼܦ ܚܩܵܪܬܲܢ ܒܝܼܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܩܵܕ݇ܡ ܛܸܛܘܿܣ ܦܝܼܫ ܠܵܗ̇ ܝ݇ܕܝܼܥܬܵܐ ܫܪܵܪܵܐ.
TRL: Khqeeree ilawkhoon lkis-leh, o le ywin binkhapa baha. Eena dakhee dmeeree kl mindee ilawkhoon bshrara, hadkha oep khqartan beeawkhoon qam ṭiṭoos peesh-laha dee'ta shrara.
ENG: For if in anything I have gloried to him on your behalf, I was not put to shame; but as we spake all things to you in truth, so our glorying also, which I made before Titus, was found to be truth.

ASY: ܐܘܼܦ ܚܘܼܒܹܗ ܐܸܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܓܘܼܪܵܐ ܝܠܹܗ، ܒܘܼܫ ܙܵܘܕܵܐ ܐܝܼܡܲܢ ܕܒܸܕܟ݂ܵܪܵܐ ܝܠܹܗ ܡܲܨܝܲܬܬܵܐ ܕܟܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ، ܕܵܐܟ݂ܝܼ ܒܙܕܘܼܥܬܵܐ ܘܒܪܲܬܪܲܬܬܵܐ ܩܘܼܒܸܠ ܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܐܸܠܹܗ.
TRL: Oep khoebeh ilawkhoon goera-yleh, boesh zawda eeman dbidkhara-yleh maṣyatta dklawkhoon, dakhee bzdoe'ta o bratratta qoebil lawkhoon ileh.
ENG: And his inward affection is more abundantly toward you, whilst he remembereth the obedience of you all, how with fear and trembling ye received him.

ASY: ܒܸܚܕܵܝܵܐ ܝܘܸܢ ܕܐܝܼܬ ܠܝܼ ܗܹܒ݂ܝܼ ܒܝܼܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܒܟܠ ܡܸܢܕܝܼ.
TRL: Bikhdaya ywin deet-lee hewee beeawkhoon bkl mindee.
ENG: I rejoice that in everything I am of good courage concerning you.

ASY: ܒܵܥܲܚ ܕܝܵܕܥܝܼܬܘܿܢ، ܐܲܚܘܿܢܘܵܬܹ̈ܐ، ܒܘܼܬ ܫܵܦܵܩܲܬ ܕܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ ܕܦܝܼܫ ܠܵܗ̇ ܝܘܼܗ݇ܒܸܠܬܵܐ ܠܥܹܕܵܬܹ̈ܐ ܕܓܵܘ ܡܵܩܹܕܘܿܢܝܼܵܐ،
TRL: Ba'akh dyad'eetoon, akhoonwate, boet shapaqat dalaha dpeesh-laha yoebilta l'edate dgaw maqedooneea,
ENG: Moreover, brethren, we make known to you the grace of God which hath been given in the churches of Macedonia;

ASY: ܕܵܐܟ݂ܝܼ ܓܵܘ ܓ̰ܵܪܲܒܬܵܐ ܕܐܘܼܠܨܵܢܹ̈ܐ ܪܵܒܵܐ ܘܒܥܘܼܡܩܵܐ ܕܡܸܣܟܹܢܘܼܬܵܐ، ܒܚܲܕܘܼܬܵܐ ܓܘܼܪܬܵܐ ܫܘܼܦܸܟ݂ ܠܗܘܿܢ ܕܒ݂ܵܚܝܵܬܲܝ̈ܗܝ ܒܐܝܼܕܵܐ ܦܬܘܼܚܬܵܐ.
TRL: Dakhee gaw jarabta doelṣane raba o b'oemqa dmiskenoeta, bkhadoeta goerta shoepikh-lhoon dwakhyatayhy beeda ptoekhta.
ENG: how that in much proof of affliction the abundance of their joy and their deep poverty abounded unto the riches of their liberality.

ASY: ܒܸܣܗܵܕܵܐ ܝܘܸܢ ܕܝܘܼܗ݇ܒܸܠ ܠܗܘܿܢ ܐܲܝܟ݂ ܡܨܵܝܬܲܝܗܝ، ܗܹܐ، ܘܒܘܼܫ ܙܵܘܕܵܐ ܡ̣ܢ ܡܨܵܝܬܲܝܗܝ، ܒܨܸܒ݂ܝܵܢܵܐ ܕܓܵܢܲܝܗܝ.
TRL: Bishada ywin dyoebil-lhoon aykh mṣaytayhy, he, o boesh zawda min mṣaytayhy, bṣiwyana dganayhy.
ENG: For according to their power, I bear witness, yea and beyond their power, they gave of their own accord,

ASY: ܒܥܹܐ ܠܗܘܿܢ ܡܸܢܲܢ ܘܦܘܼܪܦܸܠ ܠܗܘܿܢ ܪܵܒܵܐ ܕܗܵܘܹܐ ܠܗܘܿܢ ܫܵܦܵܩܲܬ ܕܫܵܪܲܟܬܵܐ ܒܐܵܗܵܐ ܚܸܠܡܲܬ ܠܩܲܕܝܼܫܹ̈ܐ.
TRL: B'e-lhoon minan o poerpil-lhoon raba dhawe-lhoon shapaqat dsharakta baha khilmat lqadeeshe.
ENG: beseeching us with much entreaty in regard of this grace and the fellowship in the ministering to the saints:

ASY: ܥܒ݂ܝܼܕ ܠܗܘܿܢ ܡܸܢܕܝܼ ܕܠܹܐ ܝܘܲܚ ܗ݇ܘܵܘ ܒܸܣܦܵܪܵܐ، ܣܘܼܦܝܵܐ ܠܗܘܿܢ ܓܵܢܲܝܗܝ ܩܵܕ݇ܡܵܝܬܵܐ ܠܡܵܪܝܵܐ، ܘܗ̇ܝܓܵܗ ܐܸܠܲܢ ܐܲܝܟ݂ ܨܸܒ݂ܝܵܢܵܐ ܕܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ.
TRL: 'weed-lhoon mindee dle ywakh waw bispara, soepya-lhoon ganayhy qamayta lmarya, o haygah ilan aykh ṣiwyana dalaha.
ENG: and this, not as we had hoped, but first they gave their own selves to the Lord, and to us by the will of God.

ASY: ܒܘܼܬ ܐܵܗܵܐ ܦܘܼܪܦܸܠ ܠܲܢ ܒܛܸܛܘܿܣ، ܕܵܐܟ݂ܝܼ ܕܫܘܼܪܹܐ ܠܹܗ ܡ̣ܢ ܩܵܕ݇ܡܵܝܬܵܐ، ܗܲܕܟ݂ܵܐ ܐܘܼܦ ܬܲܡܸܡ ܐܵܗܵܐ ܫܘܼܠܵܐ ܕܫܵܦܵܩܲܬ ܒܐܝܼܕܵܐ ܕܝܼܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ.
TRL: Boet aha poerpil lan bṭiṭoos, dakhee dshoere-leh min qamayta, hadkha oep tamim aha shoela dshapaqat beeda deeawkhoon.
ENG: Insomuch that we exhorted Titus, that as he had made a beginning before, so he would also complete in you this grace also.

ASY: ܘܕܵܐܟ݂ܝܼ ܕܙܝܼܕ ܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܒܟܠ ܡܸܢܕܝܼ: ܒܗܲܝܡܵܢܘܼܬܵܐ، ܒܗܹܡܸܙܡܵܢ، ܒܝ݇ܕܲܥܬܵܐ، ܒܟܠ ܚܘܼܦܵܛܵܐ ܘܒܚܘܼܒܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܐܸܠܲܢ، ܚܙܹܝܡܘܼܢ ܕܙܵܝܕܝܼܬܘܿܢ ܐܘܼܦ ܒܐܵܗܵܐ ܫܵܦܵܩܲܬ ܕܕܒ݂ܵܚܬܵܐ.
TRL: O dakhee dzeed lawkhoon bkl mindee: bhaymanoeta, bhemizman, bda'ta, bkl khoepaṭa o bkhoebawkhoon ilan, khzeymoen dzaydeetoon oep baha shapaqat ddwakhta.
ENG: But as ye abound in everything, in faith, and utterance, and knowledge, and in all earnestness, and in your love to us, see that ye abound in this grace also.

ASY: ܠܹܐ ܝܘܸܢ ܦܩܵܕܵܐ ܒܸܦܩܵܕܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ، ܐܝܼܢܵܐ ܒܚܘܼܦܵܛܵܐ ܕܐ݇ܚܹܪ̈݇ܢܹܐ، ܓ̰ܲܪܘܼܒܹܐ ܝܘܸܢ ܠܫܲܪܝܼܪܘܼܬܵܐ ܕܚܘܼܒܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ.
TRL: Le ywin pqada bipqadawkhoon, eena bkhoepaṭa dkhene, jaroebe ywin lshareeroeta dkhoebawkhoon.
ENG: I speak not by way of commandment, but as proving through the earnestness of others the sincerity also of your love.

ASY: ܣܵܒܵܒ ܟܹܐ ܝܵܕܥܝܼܬܘܿܢ ܫܵܦܵܩܲܬ ܕܡܵܪܲܢ ܝܼܫܘܿܥ ܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ، ܕܟܲܕ ܥܲܬܝܼܪܵܐ ܝܗ݇ܘܵܐ، ܒܘܼܬ ܕܝܼܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܗܘܹܐ ܠܹܗ ܡܸܣܟܹܢܵܐ، ܕܐܲܚܬܘܿܢ ܗܵܘܹܝܬܘܿܢ ܥܲܬܝܼܪܹ̈ܐ ܒܝܲܕ ܡܸܣܟܹܢܘܼܬܹܗ.
TRL: Sabab ke yad'eetoon shapaqat dmaran eeshoo' msheekha, dkad 'ateera ywa, boet deeawkhoon hwe-leh miskena, dakhtoon haweytoon 'ateere byad miskenoeteh.
ENG: For ye know the grace of our Lord Jesus Christ, that, though he was rich, yet for your sakes he became poor, that ye through his poverty might become rich.

ASY: ܐܵܗܵܐ ܝܠܵܗ̇ ܣܲܦܵܝܬܝܼ ܒܘܼܬ ܡܘܿܕܝܼ ܝܠܹܗ ܨܦܵܝܝܼ ܐܸܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܒܐܵܗܵܐ ܡܸܢܕܝܼ: ܒܫܹܢ݇ܬܵܐ ܕܕܲܥܒܲܪ ܐܲܚܬܘܿܢ ܩܲܕ݇ܡܵܝܹ̈ܐ ܝܬܘܿܢ ܗ݇ܘܵܘ، ܠܵܐ ܐܲܚܟ̰ܝܼ ܒܕܒ݂ܵܚܬܵܐ ܐܝܼܢܵܐ ܐܘܼܦ ܒܚܘܼܒܵܐ ܠܸܥܒ݂ܵܕܵܐ ܗܲܕܟ݂ܵܐ.
TRL: Aha-ylaha sapaytee boet moodee-yleh ṣpayee ilawkhoon baha mindee: bsheta dda'bar akhtoon qamaye ytoon waw, la akhchee bdwakhta eena oep bkhoeba li'wada hadkha.
ENG: And herein I give my judgment: for this is expedient for you, who were the first to make a beginning a year ago, not only to do, but also to will.

ASY: ܐܵܕܝܼܵܐ ܬܲܡܸܡܘܼܢ ܫܘܼܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܐܲܝܟ݂ ܕܒܵܥܹܝܬܘܿܢ ܠܸܥܒ݂ܵܕܹܗ ܡ̣ܢ ܨܸܒ݂ܝܵܢܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ، ܐܲܝܟ݂ ܡܨܵܝܬܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܒܡܸܢܕܝܼ ܕܐܝܼܬ ܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ.
TRL: Adeea tamimoen shoelawkhoon aykh dba'eytoon li'wadeh min ṣiwyanawkhoon, aykh mṣaytawkhoon bmindee deet lawkhoon.
ENG: But now complete the doing also; that as there was the readiness to will, so there may be the completion also out of your ability.

ASY: ܣܵܒܵܒ ܐܸܢ ܐܝܼܬ ܨܸܒ݂ܝܵܢܵܐ ܠܸܕܒ݂ܵܚܵܐ، ܕܒ݂ܝܼܚܬܵܐ ܒܸܬ ܦܵܝܫܵܐ ܩܘܼܒܸܠܬܵܐ ܐܲܝܟ݂ ܕܐ݇ܢܵܫܵܐ ܐܝܼܬ ܠܹܗ، ܠܵܐ ܐܲܝܟ݂ ܕܠܲܝܬ ܠܹܗ.
TRL: Sabab in eet ṣiwyana lidwakha, dweekhta bit paysha qoebilta aykh dnasha eet-leh, la aykh dlayt-leh.
ENG: For if the readiness is there, it is acceptable according as a man hath, not according as he hath not.

ASY: ܠܹܐ ܒܵܥܲܚ ܕܗܵܘܝܵܐ ܢܝܵܚܬܵܐ ܠܐ݇ܚܹܪ̈݇ܢܹܐ ܘܐܘܼܠܨܵܢܹ̈ܐ ܐܸܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ، ܐܝܼܢܵܐ ܕܗܵܘܝܵܐ ܫܵܘܝܘܼܬܵܐ.
TRL: Le ba'akh dhawya nyakhta lkhene o oelṣane ilawkhoon, eena dhawya shawyoeta.
ENG: For I say not this, that others may be eased, and ye distressed:

ASY: ܩܵܐ ܐܵܕܝܼܵܐ ܙܵܘܕܘܼܢܝܘܼܬܵܐ ܕܝܼܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܒܸܬ ܡܵܠܝܵܐ ܠܒܵܨܘܿܪܘܼܬܵܐ ܕܐܵܢܝܼ، ܘܗܲܕܟ݂ܵܐ ܙܵܘܕܘܼܢܝܘܼܬܵܐ ܕܐܵܢܝܼ ܒܸܬ ܡܵܠܝܵܐ ܠܒܵܨܘܿܪܘܼܬܵܐ ܕܝܼܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ. ܒܐܵܗܵܐ ܒܸܬ ܗܵܘܝܵܐ ܫܵܘܝܘܼܬܵܐ.
TRL: Qa adeea zawdoenyoeta deeawkhoon bit malya lbaṣooroeta danee, o hadkha zawdoenyoeta danee bit malya lbaṣooroeta deeawkhoon. Baha bit hawya shawyoeta.
ENG: but by equality; your abundance being a supply at this present time for their want, that their abundance also may become a supply for your want; that there may be equality:

ASY: ܐܲܝܟ݂ ܕܝܼܠܹܗ ܟܬܝܼܒ݂ܵܐ: ܗ̇ܘ ܕܪܵܒܵܐ ܓ̰ܘܼܡܸܥ ܠܹܗ ܠܵܐ ܡܘܼܙܝܸܕ ܠܹܗ ܡܸܢܕܝܼ، ܘܗ̇ܘ ܕܒܵܨܘܿܪܵܐ ܓ̰ܘܼܡܸܥ ܠܹܗ ܠܵܐ ܡܘܼܒܨܸܪܹܗ ܡܸܢܕܝܼ.
TRL: Aykh deeleh kteewa: haw draba joemi' leh la moezyid-leh mindee, o haw dbaṣoora joemi' leh la moebṣireh mindee.
ENG: as it is written, He that gathered much had nothing over; and he that gathered little had no lack.

ASY: ܫܲܟܘܼܪܹܐ ܝܘܸܢ ܠܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ ܕܡܘܼܬܸܒ݂ ܠܹܗ ܒܠܸܒܵܐ ܕܛܸܛܘܿܣ ܗܲܪ ܗ̇ܝ ܚܦܝܼܛܘܼܬܵܐ ܕܐܵܢܵܐ ܐܝܼܬ ܠܝܼ ܒܘܼܬ ܕܝܼܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ.
TRL: Shakoere ywin lalaha dmoetiw-leh bliba dṭiṭoos har hay khpeeṭoeta dana eet-lee boet deeawkhoon.
ENG: But thanks be to God, which putteth the same earnest care for you into the heart of Titus.

ASY: ܣܵܒܵܒ ܩܘܼܒܠܵܐ ܠܹܗ ܒܵܥܘܼܬܲܢ ܛܸܛܘܿܣ، ܒܹܐܬܵܝܵܐ ܝܠܹܗ ܠܟܸܣ ܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܒܛܢܵܢܵܐ ܘܒܨܸܒ݂ܝܵܢܵܐ ܕܓܵܢܹܗ.
TRL: Sabab qoebla-leh ba'oetan ṭiṭoos, betaya-yleh lkis lawkhoon bṭnana o bṣiwyana dganeh.
ENG: For indeed he accepted our exhortation; but being himself very earnest, he went forth unto you of his own accord.

ASY: ܘܫܲܕܘܼܪܹܐ ܝܘܲܚ ܥܲܡܹܗ ܐܲܚܘܿܢܵܐ ܕܦܝܼܫܵܐ ܝܠܹܗ ܚܩܝܼܪܵܐ ܓܵܘ ܟܠܲܝܗܝ ܥܹܕܵܬܹ̈ܐ ܒܘܼܬ ܚܸܠܡܲܬܹܗ ܩܵܐ ܐܹܘܲܢܓܲܠܝܼܘܿܢ.
TRL: O shadoere ywakh 'ameh akhoona dpeesha-yleh khqeera gaw klayhy 'edate boet khilmateh qa ewangaleeoon.
ENG: And we have sent together with him the brother whose praise in the gospel is spread through all the churches;

ASY: ܘܙܵܘܕܵܐ ܡ̣ܢ ܐܵܗܵܐ، ܦܝܼܫܵܐ ܝܗ݇ܘܵܐ ܓܘܼܒܝܵܐ ܒܝܲܕ ܥܹܕܵܬܹ̈ܐ ܕܐܵܙܹܠ ܥܲܡܲܢ ܘܠܲܒܠܲܚ ܠܐܵܗܵܐ ܕܒ݂ܵܚܬܵܐ ܕܒܸܥܒ݂ܵܕܵܐ ܝܘܲܚ ܚܸܠܡܲܬ ܒܝܼܘܼܗ̇، ܘܡܝܲܩܘܼܪܹܐ ܠܡܵܪܲܢ ܒܓܵܢܹܗ، ܘܡܲܚܙܲܚ ܚܦܝܼܛܘܼܬܲܢ ܠܗܲܝܘܼܪܹܐ.
TRL: O zawda min aha, peesha ywa goebya byad 'edate dazel 'aman o lablakh-laha dwakhta dbi'wada ywakh khilmat beeoeha, o myaqoere lmaran bganeh, o makhzakh khpeeṭoetan lhayoere.
ENG: and not only so, but who was also appointed by the churches to travel with us in the matter of this grace, which is ministered by us to the glory of the Lord, and to shew our readiness:

ASY: ܠܹܐ ܒܵܥܲܚ ܕܐ݇ܢܵܫܵܐ ܡܲܬܸܒ݂ ܠܵܘܡܵܐ ܥܲܠܲܢ ܒܘܼܬ ܕܵܐܟ݂ܝܼ ܡܕܲܒܘܼܪܘܼܗ̇ ܝܘܲܚ ܐܵܗܵܐ ܕܒ݂ܵܚܬܵܐ ܓܘܼܪܬܵܐ ܕܒܸܥܒ݂ܵܕܘܼܗ̇ ܝܘܲܚ.
TRL: Le ba'akh dnasha matiw lawma 'alan boet dakhee mdaboeroeha ywakh aha dwakhta goerta dbi'wadoeha ywakh.
ENG: Avoiding this, that any man should blame us in the matter of this bounty which is ministered by us:

ASY: ܩܸܫܝܵܐܝܼܬ ܓ̰ܲܪܘܼܒܹܐ ܝܘܲܚ ܕܥܵܒ݂ܕܲܚ ܛܵܒ݂ܵܬܹ̈ܐ، ܠܵܐ ܐܲܚܟ̰ܝܼ ܒܥܲܝܢܹ̈ܐ ܕܡܵܪܝܵܐ، ܐܸܠܵܐ ܐܘܼܦ ܒܥܲܝܢܹ̈ܐ ܕܐ݇ܢܵܫܹ̈ܐ.
TRL: Qishyaeet jaroebe ywakh d'awdakh ṭawate, la akhchee b'ayne dmarya, ila oep b'ayne dnashe.
ENG: for we take thought for things honourable, not only in the sight of the Lord, but also in the sight of men.

ASY: ܫܲܕܘܼܪܹܐ ܝܘܲܚ ܥܲܡܲܝܗܝ ܐܲܚܘܿܢܲܢ، ܗ̇ܘ ܕܩܲܡ ܡܲܚܙܹܐ ܠܲܢ ܪܵܒܵܐ ܓܵܗܹ̈ܐ ܘܒܪܵܒܵܐ ܐܘܼܪ̈ܚܵܬܹܐ ܕܚܲܦܛܵܢܵܐ ܝܠܹܗ. ܘܐܵܕܝܼܵܐ ܒܘܼܫ ܚܲܦܛܵܢܵܐ ܝܠܹܗ ܣܵܒܵܒ ܐܝܼܬ ܠܹܗ ܗܹܒ݂ܝܼ ܓܘܼܪܬܵܐ ܒܝܼܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ.
TRL: Shadoere ywakh 'amayhy akhoonan, haw dqam makhze lan raba gahe o braba oerkhate dkhapṭana-yleh. O adeea boesh khapṭana-yleh sabab eet-leh hewee goerta beeawkhoon.
ENG: And we have sent with them our brother, whom we have many times proved earnest in many things, but now much more earnest, by reason of the great confidence which he hath in you.

ASY: ܒܘܼܬ ܛܸܛܘܿܣ، ܗ̇ܘ ܫܲܪܝܼܟܝܼ ܝܠܹܗ ܘܗܲܝܸܪܵܢܝܼ ܐܸܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ. ܘܒܘܼܬ ܐܲܚܘܿܢܘܵܬܲܢ̈، ܐܵܢܝܼ ܫܠܝܼܚܹ̈ܐ ܕܥܹܕܵܬܹ̈ܐ ܝܢܵܐ ܠܚܸܩܪܵܐ ܕܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ.
TRL: Boet ṭiṭoos, haw shareekee-yleh o hayiranee ilawkhoon. O boet akhoonwatan, anee shleekhe d'edate yna lkhiqra dmsheekha.
ENG: Whether any inquire about Titus, he is my partner and my fellow-worker to you-ward; or our brethren, they are the messengers of the churches, they are the glory of Christ.

ASY: ܒܘܼܬ ܐܵܗܵܐ، ܡܲܚܙܹܝܡܘܼܢ ܠܐܲܢܹܐ ܐ݇ܢܵܫܹ̈ܐ ܩܵܕ݇ܡ ܥܹܕܵܬܹ̈ܐ ܫܵܪܲܪܬܵܐ ܕܚܘܼܒܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܘܫܘܼܒ݂ܗܵܪܲܢ ܒܝܼܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ.
TRL: Boet aha, makhzeymoen lane nashe qam 'edate shararta dkhoebawkhoon o shoewharan beeawkhoon.
ENG: Shew ye therefore unto them in the face of the churches the proof of your love, and of our glorying on your behalf.

ASY: ܠܹܐ ܝܠܵܗ̇ ܐܵܢܲܢܩܵܝܬܵܐ ܐܸܠܝܼ ܕܟܵܬܒܹܢ ܐܸܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܒܘܼܬ ܚܸܠܡܲܬ ܠܩܲܕܝܼܫܹ̈ܐ،
TRL: Le-ylaha ananqayta ilee dkatben ilawkhoon boet khilmat lqadeeshe,
ENG: For as touching the ministering to the saints, it is superfluous for me to write to you:

ASY: ܣܵܒܵܒ ܒܝܼܕܵܥܵܐ ܝܘܸܢ ܛܢܵܢܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܠܗܲܝܘܼܪܹܐ، ܘܒܸܥܒ݂ܵܕܵܐ ܝܘܸܢ ܫܘܼܒ݂ܗܵܪܵܐ ܒܝܼܹܗ ܩܵܕ݇ܡ ܐ݇ܢܵܫܹ̈ܐ ܕܓܵܘ ܡܵܩܹܕܘܿܢܝܼܵܐ، ܗܲܕܟ݂ܵܐ ܕܐܵܟ݂ܵܐܝܼܵܐ ܗܘܼܕܸܪܬܵܐ ܝܠܵܗ̇ ܡ̣ܢ ܫܹܢ݇ܬܵܐ ܕܲܥܒܲܪ ܠܗܲܝܘܼܪܹܐ، ܘܛܢܵܢܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܡܘܼܓ̰ܘܸܓ̰ ܠܹܗ ܠܪܵܒܵܐ.
TRL: Sabab beeda'a ywin ṭnanawkhoon lhayoere, o bi'wada ywin shoewhara bee-eh qam nashe dgaw maqedooneea, hadkha dakhaeea hoedirta-ylaha min sheta da'bar lhayoere, o ṭnanawkhoon moejwij-leh lraba.
ENG: for I know your readiness, of which I glory on your behalf to them of Macedonia, that Achaia hath been prepared for a year past; and your zeal hath stirred up very many of them.

ASY: ܐܝܼܢܵܐ ܫܘܼܕܸܪܝܼ ܠܐܲܚܘܿܢܘܵܬܹ̈ܐ ܕܠܵܐ ܗܵܘܹܐ ܫܘܼܒ݂ܗܵܪܲܢ ܒܝܼܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܒܲܛܝܼܠܵܐ ܒܐܵܗܵܐ ܫܘܼܠܵܐ، ܕܗܵܘܹܝܬܘܿܢ ܗܕܝܼܪܹܐ، ܐܲܝܟ݂ ܕܐ݇ܡܝܼܪܝܼ.
TRL: Eena shoediree lakhoonwate dla hawe shoewharan beeawkhoon baṭeela baha shoela, dhaweytoon hdeere, aykh dmeeree.
ENG: But I have sent the brethren, that our glorying on your behalf may not be made void in this respect; that, even as I said, ye may be prepared:

ASY: ܠܵܐ ܗܵܘܝܵܐ ܕܐܵܬܝܼ ܥܲܡܝܼ ܐ݇ܢܵܫܹ̈ܐ ܡ̣ܢ ܡܵܩܹܕܘܿܢܝܼܵܐ ܘܚܵܙܝܼ ܕܠܹܐ ܝܬܘܿܢ ܗܕܝܼܪܹܐ، ܗ̇ܝܓܵܗ ܐܲܚܢܲܢ، ܘܐܘܼܦ ܐܲܚܬܘܿܢ، ܦܵܝܫܲܚ ܢܟ݂ܝܼܦܹܐ ܒܒܸܣܬܵܝܘܼܬܲܢ.
TRL: La hawya datee 'amee nashe min maqedooneea o khazee dle ytoon hdeere, haygah akhnan, o oep akhtoon, payshakh nkheepe bbistayoetan.
ENG: lest by any means, if there come with me any of Macedonia, and find you unprepared, we (that we say not, ye) should be put to shame in this confidence.

ASY: ܒܘܼܬ ܐܵܗܵܐ، ܚܙܹܐ ܠܝܼ ܐܵܢܲܢܩܵܝܬܵܐ ܝܗ݇ܘܵܐ ܕܛܵܠܒܹܢ ܗ݇ܘܵܐ ܡ̣ܢ ܐܲܢܹܐ ܐܲܚܘܿܢܘܵܬܹ̈ܐ ܕܐܵܬܝܼ ܗ݇ܘܵܘ ܠܟܸܣ ܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܡ̣ܢ ܩܵܕ݇ܡ ܕܝܼܝܼ، ܘܗܲܕܪܝܼ ܗ݇ܘܵܘ ܠܕܒ݂ܵܚܬܵܐ ܕܩܘܼܘܸܠܹܐ ܝܬܘܿܢ ܗ݇ܘܵܘ. ܗ̇ܝܓܵܗ ܒܸܬ ܗܵܘܝܵܐ ܚܕܵܐ ܕܒ݂ܵܚܬܵܐ ܘܠܵܐ ܛܲܡܲܥܟܵܪܘܼܬܵܐ.
TRL: Boet aha, khze-lee ananqayta ywa dṭalben wa min ane akhoonwate datee waw lkis lawkhoon min qam deeee, o hadree waw ldwakhta dqoewile ytoon waw. Haygah bit hawya khda dwakhta o la ṭama'karoeta.
ENG: I thought it necessary therefore to entreat the brethren, that they would go before unto you, and make up beforehand your aforepromised bounty, that the same might be ready, as a matter of bounty, and not of extortion.

ASY: ܐܵܗܵܐ ܒܹܐܡܵܪܵܐ ܝܘܸܢ ܐܸܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ: ܡ̇ܢ ܕܙܵܪܹܥ ܒܚܣܵܟ݂ܬܵܐ، ܒܚܣܵܟ݂ܬܵܐ ܒܸܬ ܚܵܨܹܕ، ܘܡ̇ܢ ܕܙܵܪܹܥ ܒܦܸܪܝܘܼܬܵܐ، ܒܦܸܪܝܘܼܬܵܐ ܒܸܬ ܚܵܨܹܕ.
TRL: Aha bemara ywin ilawkhoon: man dzare' bkhsakhta, bkhsakhta bit khaṣed, o man dzare' bpiryoeta, bpiryoeta bit khaṣed.
ENG: But this I say, He that soweth sparingly shall reap also sparingly; and he that soweth bountifully shall reap also bountifully.

ASY: ܟܠ ܚܲܕ ܘܵܠܹܐ ܝܠܵܗ̇ ܕܝܲܗ݇ܒܸܠ ܐܲܝܟ݂ ܕܡܘܼܬܒ݂ܵܐ ܝܠܹܗ ܒܠܸܒܹܗ، ܠܵܐ ܒܦܵܫܲܡܬܵܐ ܘܠܵܐ ܬܚܘܿܬ ܚܲܝܠܵܐ، ܣܵܒܵܒ ܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ ܟܹܐ ܡܲܚܸܒ ܠܝܵܗ݇ܒ݂ܵܢܵܐ ܚܸܕܝܵܐ.
TRL: Kl khad wale-ylaha dyabil aykh dmoetwa-yleh blibeh, la bpashamta o la tkhoot khayla, sabab Alaha ke makhib lyawana khidya.
ENG: Let each man do according as he hath purposed in his heart; not grudgingly, or of necessity: for God loveth a cheerful giver.

ASY: ܘܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ ܟܹܐ ܡܵܨܹܐ ܡܲܙܝܸܕ ܐܸܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܟܠܵܗ̇ ܫܵܦܵܩܲܬ، ܗܲܕܟ݂ܵܐ ܕܒܟܠ ܡܸܢܕܝܼ ܘܒܟܠ ܙܲܒ݂ܢܵܐ ܗܵܘܹܐ ܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܡܸܢܕܝܼ ܕܣܢܝܼܩܹܐ ܝܬܘܿܢ ܐܸܠܹܗ، ܘܙܵܝܕܝܼܬܘܿܢ ܒܟܠ ܦܘܼܠܚܵܢܵܐ ܛܵܒ݂ܵܐ.
TRL: O Alaha ke maṣe mazyid ilawkhoon klaha shapaqat, hadkha dbkl mindee o bkl zawna hawe lawkhoon mindee dsneeqe ytoon ileh, o zaydeetoon bkl poelkhana ṭawa.
ENG: And God is able to make all grace abound unto you; that ye, having always all sufficiency in everything, may abound unto every good work:

ASY: ܐܲܝܟ݂ ܕܟܬܝܼܒ݂ܵܐ ܝܠܹܗ: ܫܘܼܦܸܟ݂ ܠܹܗ ܡܵܘܗܒ݂ܵܬܹ̈ܗ ܠܡܸܣܟܹܢܹ̈ܐ، ܘܙܲܕܝܼܩܘܼܬܹܗ ܦܵܝܫܵܢܬܵܐ ܝܠܵܗ̇ ܠܥܵܠܲܡ.
TRL: Aykh dkteewa-yleh: shoepikh-leh mawhwateh lmiskene, o zadeeqoeteh payshanta-ylaha l'alam.
ENG: as it is written, He hath scattered abroad, he hath given to the poor; His righteousness abideth for ever.

ASY: ܘܗ̇ܘ ܕܟܹܐ ܝܲܗ݇ܒܸܠ ܒܲܪܙܲܪܥܵܐ ܠܙܵܪܥܵܢܵܐ ܘܠܲܚܡܵܐ ܠܡܹܐܟ݂ܘܼܠܬܵܐ، ܒܸܬ ܝܲܗ݇ܒܸܠ ܘܡܲܙܝܸܕ ܠܒܲܪܙܲܪܥܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ، ܘܡܲܦܪܹܐ ܠܛܥܘܼܢܝܵܬܹ̈ܐ ܕܙܲܕܝܼܩܘܼܬܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ،
TRL: O haw dke yabil barzar'a lzar'ana o lakhma lmekhoelta, bit yabil o mazyid lbarzar'awkhoon, o mapre lṭ'oenyate dzadeeqoetawkhoon,
ENG: And he that supplieth seed to the sower and bread for food, shall supply and multiply your seed for sowing, and increase the fruits of your righteousness:

ASY: ܕܦܵܝܫܝܼܬܘܿܢ ܥܒ݂ܝܼܕܹܐ ܥܲܬܝܼܪܹ̈ܐ ܒܟܠ ܡܸܢܕܝܼ، ܘܗܵܘܹܐ ܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܐܝܼܕܵܐ ܦܬܘܼܚܬܵܐ ܒܟܠ ܐܘܼܪܚܵܐ، ܘܦܬܝܼܚܘܼܬܵܐ ܕܐܝܼܕܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܒܝܼܲܢ ܒܸܬ ܗܵܘܝܵܐ ܫܵܟܲܪܬܵܐ ܠܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ.
TRL: Dpaysheetoon 'weede 'ateere bkl mindee, o hawe lawkhoon eeda ptoekhta bkl oerkha, o pteekhoeta deedawkhoon bee-an bit hawya shakarta lalaha.
ENG: ye being enriched in everything unto all liberality, which worketh through us thanksgiving to God.

ASY: ܐܵܗܵܐ ܚܸܠܡܲܬ ܕܒܸܥܒ݂ܵܕܘܼܗ̇ ܝܬܘܿܢ ܠܹܐ ܝܠܵܗ̇ ܐܲܚܟ̰ܝܼ ܒܸܡܠܵܝܵܐ ܣܢܝܼܩܘܼܬܵܐ ܕܩܲܕܝܼܫܹ̈ܐ، ܐܝܼܢܵܐ ܡܲܙܝܘܼܕܹܐ ܝܠܵܗ̇ ܫܵܟܲܪ̈ܝܵܬܹܐ ܠܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ.
TRL: Aha khilmat dbi'wadoeha ytoon le-ylaha akhchee bimlaya sneeqoeta dqadeeshe, eena mazyoede-ylaha shakaryate lalaha.
ENG: For the ministration of this service not only filleth up the measure of the wants of the saints, but aboundeth also through many thanksgivings unto God;

ASY: ܣܵܒܵܒ ܒܫܵܪܲܪܬܵܐ ܕܐܵܗܵܐ ܚܸܠܡܲܬ، ܐ݇ܢܵܫܹ̈ܐ ܫܲܒܘܼܚܹܐ ܝܢܵܐ ܠܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ ܒܘܼܬ ܫܠܵܡܬܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܠܐܹܘܲܢܓܲܠܝܼܘܿܢ ܕܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ ܘܕܒ݂ܵܚܬܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܒܐܝܼܕܵܐ ܦܬܘܼܚܬܵܐ ܐܸܠܲܝܗܝ ܘܠܟܠ ܐ݇ܢܵܫܵܐ.
TRL: Sabab bshararta daha khilmat, nashe shaboekhe yna lalaha boet shlamtawkhoon lewangaleeoon dmsheekha o dwakhtawkhoon beeda ptoekhta ilayhy o lkl nasha.
ENG: seeing that through the proving of you by this ministration they glorify God for the obedience of your confession unto the gospel of Christ, and for the liberality of your contribution unto them and unto all;

ASY: ܘܒܨܠܵܘܵܬܲܝ̈ܗܝ ܒܘܼܬ ܕܝܼܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܡܲܚܙܘܼܝܹܐ ܝܢܵܐ ܕܟܹܐ ܡܲܚܸܒܝܼ ܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ، ܣܵܒܵܒ ܫܵܦܵܩܲܬ ܕܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ ܙܝܼܕ ܠܵܗ̇ ܠܟܸܣ ܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ.
TRL: O bṣlawatayhy boet deeawkhoon makhzoeye yna dke makhibee lawkhoon, sabab shapaqat dalaha zeed-laha lkis lawkhoon.
ENG: while they themselves also, with supplication on your behalf, long after you by reason of the exceeding grace of God in you.

ASY: ܫܟܝܼܪܵܐ ܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ ܩܵܐ ܡܵܘܗܲܒ݂ܬܹܗ ܡܲܥܓ̰ܸܒܵܢܬܵܐ.
TRL: Shkeera Alaha qa mawhawteh ma'jibanta.
ENG: Thanks be to God for his unspeakable gift.

ASY: ܐܵܢܵܐ ܦܵܘܠܘܿܣ ܒܓܵܢܝܼ ܦܲܪܦܘܼܠܹܐ ܝܘܸܢ ܒܝܼܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܒܢܝܼܚܘܼܬܵܐ ܘܒܡܲܟܝܼܟ݂ܘܼܬܵܐ ܕܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ، ܐܵܢܵܐ ܕܟܹܐ ܗܵܘܹܝܢ ܡܲܟܝܼܟ݂ܵܐ ܐܝܼܡܲܢ ܕܝܼܘܲܚ ܦܵܬܵܐ ܓܵܘ ܦܵܬܵܐ، ܐܝܼܢܵܐ ܣܹܟܪܵܢܵܐ ܐܝܼܡܲܢ ܕܝܼܘܸܢ ܪܸܚܩܵܐ ܡܸܢܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ،
TRL: Ana pawloos bganee parpoele ywin beeawkhoon bneekhoeta o bmakeekhoeta dmsheekha, ana dke haweyn makeekha eeman deewakh pata gaw pata, eena sekrana eeman deewin rikhqa minawkhoon,
ENG: Now I Paul myself entreat you by the meekness and gentleness of Christ, I who in your presence am lowly among you, but being absent am of good courage toward you:

ASY: ܒܸܛܠܵܒܵܐ ܝܘܸܢ ܡܸܢܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܕܐܝܼܡܲܢ ܕܐܵܬܹܝܢ ܠܵܐ ܦܵܝܫܹܢ ܥܸܨܝܵܐ، ܒܒܸܣܬܵܝܘܼܬܵܐ ܕܐܝܼܬ ܠܝܼ ܠܟܸܣ ܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ، ܕܗܵܘܹܝܢ ܣܹܟܪܵܢܵܐ ܥܲܡ ܚܲܕ݇ܟܡܵܐ ܕܒܸܚܫܵܒ݂ܵܐ ܝܢܵܐ ܕܒܸܚܵܝܵܐ ܝܘܲܚ ܒܥܵܕܲܬܹ̈ܐ ܕܟܝܵܢܵܐ ܐ݇ܢܵܫܵܝܵܐ،
TRL: Biṭlaba ywin minawkhoon deeman dateyn la payshen 'iṣya, bbistayoeta deet-lee lkis lawkhoon, dhaweyn sekrana 'am khakma dbikhshawa yna dbikhaya ywakh b'adate dkyana nashaya,
ENG: yea, I beseech you, that I may not when present shew courage with the confidence wherewith I count to be bold against some, which count of us as if we walked according to the flesh.

ASY: ܐܘܼܦ ܐܸܢ ܕܒܸܚܵܝܵܐ ܝܘܲܚ ܒܟܝܵܢܵܐ ܐ݇ܢܵܫܵܝܵܐ، ܐܝܼܢܵܐ ܠܹܐ ܝܘܲܚ ܒܸܦܠܵܫܵܐ ܒܐܘܼܪܚܵܐ ܕܟܝܵܢܵܐ ܐ݇ܢܵܫܵܝܵܐ،
TRL: Oep in dbikhaya ywakh bkyana nashaya, eena le ywakh biplasha boerkha dkyana nashaya,
ENG: For though we walk in the flesh, we do not war according to the flesh

ASY: ܣܵܒܵܒ ܙܲܝܢܹ̈ܐ ܕܦܠܵܫܲܢ ܠܹܐ ܝܢܵܐ ܕܟܝܵܢܵܐ ܐ݇ܢܵܫܵܝܵܐ، ܐܝܼܢܵܐ ܕܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ ܝܢܵܐ ܠܸܫܩܵܠܵܐ ܩܲܠܥܵܬܹ̈ܐ ܥܲܣܩܹ̈ܐ،
TRL: Sabab zayne dplashan le yna dkyana nashaya, eena dalaha yna lishqala qal'ate 'asqe,
ENG: (for the weapons of our warfare are not of the flesh, but mighty before God to the casting down of strong holds);

ASY: ܘܠܡܲܚܪܘܼܒܹܐ ܟܠܲܝܗܝ ܚܘܼܫܵܒܹ̈ܐ ܥܸܠܵܝܹ̈ܐ ܕܩܵܝܡܝܼ ܕܲܠܩܘܼܒ݂ܠ ܝ݇ܕܲܥܬܵܐ ܕܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ، ܘܠܙܲܒܛܘܼܢܹܐ ܟܠ ܚܝܼܵܠ ܘܠܡܲܠܘܼܦܹܐ ܟܠ ܐ݇ܢܵܫܵܐ ܕܡܲܨܝܸܬ ܠܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ.
TRL: O lmakhroebe klayhy khoeshabe 'ilaye dqaymee dalqoewl da'ta dalaha, o lzabṭoene kl kheeal o lmaloepe kl nasha dmaṣyit lmsheekha.
ENG: casting down imaginations, and every high thing that is exalted against the knowledge of God, and bringing every thought into captivity to the obedience of Christ;

ASY: ܘܗܕܝܼܪܹܐ ܝܘܲܚ ܠܬܲܥܠܘܼܡܹܐ ܟܠܲܝܗܝ ܦܘܼܠܚܵܢܹ̈ܐ ܕܠܵܐ ܡܲܨܝܲܬܬܵܐ ܐܝܼܡܲܢ ܕܬܲܡܸܡܵܐ ܡܲܨܝܲܬܬܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ.
TRL: O hdeere ywakh lta'loeme klayhy poelkhane dla maṣyatta eeman dtamima maṣyattawkhoon.
ENG: and being in readiness to avenge all disobedience, when your obedience shall be fulfilled.

ASY: ܐܲܚܬܘܿܢ ܓܲܫܘܼܩܹܐ ܝܬܘܿܢ ܠܡܸܢܕܝܼܵܢܹ̈ܐ ܡ̣ܢ ܦܵܬܵܐ. ܐܸܢ ܚܲܕ ܐ݇ܢܵܫܵܐ ܚܵܬܸܪܓ̰ܲܡܥ ܝܼܠܹܗ ܒܓܵܢܹܗ ܕܝܼܠܹܗ ܕܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ، ܫܒ݂ܘܿܩ ܡܸܢܕܪܸܫ ܬܲܚܡܸܢ ܒܓܵܢܹܗ ܕܐܘܼܦ ܐܲܚܢܲܢ ܕܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ ܝܘܲܚ ܐܲܝܟ݂ ܕܝܼܠܹܗ ܗ̇ܘ.
TRL: Akhtoon gashoeqe ytoon lmindeeane min pata. In khad nasha khatirjam' eeleh bganeh deeleh dmsheekha, shwooq mindrish takhmin bganeh doep akhnan dmsheekha ywakh aykh deeleh haw.
ENG: Ye look at the things that are before your face. If any man trusteth in himself that he is Christ’s, let him consider this again with himself, that, even as he is Christ’s, so also are we.

ASY: ܣܵܒܵܒ ܐܘܼܦ ܐܸܢ ܕܥܵܒ݂ܕܹܢ ܚܲܕ݇ܟ̰ܵܐ ܙܵܘܕܵܐ ܫܘܼܒ݂ܗܵܪܵܐ ܒܫܘܼܠܛܵܢܵܐ ܕܡܵܪܝܵܐ ܝܘܼܗ݇ܒܸܠ ܠܹܗ ܐܸܠܲܢ ܠܒܢܵܝܬܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܘܠܵܐ ܠܬܠܵܚܬܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ، ܠܹܐ ܝܘܸܢ ܒܸܢܟ݂ܵܦܵܐ ܒܝܼܹܗ.
TRL: Sabab oep in d'awden khacha zawda shoewhara bshoelṭana dmarya yoebil-leh ilan lbnaytawkhoon o la ltlakhtawkhoon, le ywin binkhapa bee-eh.
ENG: For though I should glory somewhat abundantly concerning our authority (which the Lord gave for building you up, and not for casting you down), I shall not be put to shame:

ASY: ܠܹܐ ܒܵܥܹܝܢ ܕܚܵܫܒ݂ܝܼܬܘܿܢ ܕܡܲܙܕܘܼܥܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܝܼܘܸܢ ܒܐܸܓܲܪ̈ܝܵܬܝܼ.
TRL: Le ba'eyn dkhashweetoon dmazdoe'awkhoon eewin bigaryatee.
ENG: that I may not seem as if I would terrify you by my letters.

ASY: ܣܵܒܵܒ ܚܲܕ݇ܟܡܵܐ ܟܹܐ ܐܵܡܪܝܼ، ”ܐܸܓܲܪ̈ܝܵܬܹܗ ܝܲܩܘܼܪܹ̈ܐ ܝܢܵܐ ܘܚܲܝܠܵܢܹ̈ܐ، ܐܝܼܢܵܐ ܒܦܲܓ݂ܪܵܐ ܙܲܒܘܼܢ ܝܼܠܹܗ، ܘܗܹܡܸܙܡܵܢܹܗ ܡܘܼܣܠܝܼܬܵܐ ܝܠܵܗ̇.“
TRL: Sabab khakma ke amree, ”igaryateh yaqoere yna o khaylane, eena bpaghra zaboen eeleh, o hemizmaneh moesleeta-ylaha.“
ENG: For, His letters, they say, are weighty and strong; but his bodily presence is weak, and his speech of no account.

ASY: ܘܵܠܹܐ ܝܠܵܗ̇ ܕܗܲܕܟ݂ܵܐ ܐ݇ܢܵܫܹ̈ܐ ܝܵܕܥܝܼ ܕܡܘܿܕܝܼ ܝܘܲܚ ܒܗܹܡܸܙܡܵܢ ܕܐܸܓܲܪ̈ܝܵܬܲܢ ܟܲܕ ܐܲܚܢܲܢ ܪܸܚܩܵܐ، ܗܲܕܟ݂ܵܐ ܒܸܬ ܗܵܘܲܚ ܒܦܘܼܠܚܵܢܲܢ ܟܲܕ ܐܲܚܢܲܢ ܩܘܼܪܒܵܐ.
TRL: Wale-ylaha dhadkha nashe yad'ee dmoodee ywakh bhemizman digaryatan kad akhnan rikhqa, hadkha bit hawakh bpoelkhanan kad akhnan qoerba.
ENG: Let such a one reckon this, that, what we are in word by letters when we are absent, such are we also in deed when we are present.

ASY: ܣܵܒܵܒ ܐܲܚܢܲܢ ܠܹܐ ܩܲܫܕܸܪܲܚ ܠܚܲܫܒܘܼܢܘܼܗ̇ ܝܲܢ ܡܲܕܒ݂ܘܼܩܘܼܗ̇ ܓܵܢܲܢ ܥܲܡ ܐܵܢܝܼ ܕܚܵܩܪܝܼ ܒܓܵܢܲܝܗܝ. ܐܝܼܢܵܐ ܐܵܢܝܼ ܕܟܵܝܠܝܼ ܠܵܗ̇ ܓܵܢܲܝܗܝ ܒܓܵܢܲܝܗܝ ܘܡܲܕܒܸܩܝܼ ܠܵܗ̇ ܓܵܢܲܝܗܝ ܥܲܡ ܓܵܢܲܝܗܝ، ܠܹܐ ܝܢܵܐ ܚܲܟܝܼܡܹ̈ܐ.
TRL: Sabab akhnan le qashdirakh lkhashboenoeha yan madwoeqoeha ganan 'am anee dkhaqree bganayhy. Eena anee dkaylee-laha ganayhy bganayhy o madbiqee-laha ganayhy 'am ganayhy, le yna khakeeme.
ENG: For we are not bold to number or compare ourselves with certain of them that commend themselves: but they themselves, measuring themselves by themselves, and comparing themselves with themselves, are without understanding.

ASY: ܐܝܼܢܵܐ ܐܲܚܢܲܢ ܠܹܐ ܥܵܒ݂ܕܲܚ ܫܘܼܒ݂ܗܵܪܵܐ ܙܵܘܕܵܐ ܡ̣ܢ ܟܝܘܼܠܲܢ، ܐܸܠܵܐ ܒܟܝܘܼܠܵܐ ܕܦܘܼܠܸܥ ܠܹܗ ܐܸܠܲܢ ܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ، ܕܒܸܡܛܵܝܵܐ ܝܠܹܗ ܐܘܼܦ ܗܲܠ ܠܟܸܣ ܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ.
TRL: Eena akhnan le 'awdakh shoewhara zawda min kyoelan, ila bkyoela dpoeli' leh ilan Alaha, dbimṭaya-yleh oep hal lkis lawkhoon.
ENG: But we will not glory beyond our measure, but according to the measure of the province which God apportioned to us as a measure, to reach even unto you.

ASY: ܠܹܐ ܥܵܒ݂ܕܲܚ ܗ݇ܘܵܐ ܫܘܼܒ݂ܗܵܪܵܐ ܐܸܢ ܠܵܐ ܗܵܘܲܚ ܗ݇ܘܵܘ ܡܸܛܝܹܐ ܐܸܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ، ܐܝܼܢܵܐ ܡܛܹܐ ܠܲܢ ܐܸܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܒܐܹܘܲܢܓܲܠܝܼܘܿܢ ܕܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ.
TRL: Le 'awdakh wa shoewhara in la hawakh waw miṭye ilawkhoon, eena mṭe lan ilawkhoon bewangaleeoon dmsheekha.
ENG: For we stretch not ourselves overmuch, as though we reached not unto you: for we came even as far as unto you in the gospel of Christ:

ASY: ܘܠܹܐ ܥܵܒ݂ܕܲܚ ܫܘܼܒ݂ܗܵܪܵܐ ܙܵܘܕܵܐ ܡ̣ܢ ܟܝܘܼܠܲܢ ܒܦܘܼܠܚܵܢܵܐ ܕܐ݇ܚܹܪ̈݇ܢܹܐ. ܗܹܒ݂ܝܼܲܢ ܝܼܠܵܗ̇ ܟܡܵܐ ܕܙܵܝܕܵܐ ܗܲܝܡܵܢܘܼܬܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ، ܦܘܼܠܚܵܢܲܢ ܓܵܘܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܒܸܬ ܙܵܐܹܕ،
TRL: O le 'awdakh shoewhara zawda min kyoelan bpoelkhana dkhene. Hewee-an eelaha kma dzayda haymanoetawkhoon, poelkhanan gawawkhoon bit zaed,
ENG: not glorying beyond our measure, that is, in other men’s labours; but having hope that, as your faith groweth, we shall be magnified in you according to our province unto further abundance,

ASY: ܕܡܲܟܪܸܙܲܚ ܐܹܘܲܢܓܲܠܝܼܘܿܢ ܠܒܲܕܲܪ ܡ̣ܢ ܬܚܘܼܡܹ̈ܐ ܕܕܝܼܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ. ܣܵܒܵܒ ܠܹܐ ܒܵܥܲܚ ܕܥܵܒ݂ܕܲܚ ܫܘܼܒ݂ܗܵܪܵܐ ܒܦܘܼܠܚܵܢܵܐ ܕܦܝܼܫܵܐ ܝܠܹܗ ܥܒ݂ܝܼܕܵܐ ܓܵܘ ܚܲܩܠܵܐ ܕܚܲܕ ܐ݇ܚܹܪ݇ܢܵܐ.
TRL: Dmakrizakh ewangaleeoon lbadar min tkhoeme ddeeawkhoon. Sabab le ba'akh d'awdakh shoewhara bpoelkhana dpeesha-yleh 'weeda gaw khaqla dkhad khena.
ENG: so as to preach the gospel even unto the parts beyond you, and not to glory in another’s province in regard of things ready to our hand.

ASY: ܗ̇ܘ ܕܥܵܒܹܕ ܫܘܼܒ݂ܗܵܪܵܐ، ܫܒ݂ܘܿܩ ܥܵܒܹܕ ܫܘܼܒ݂ܗܵܪܵܐ ܒܡܵܪܝܵܐ.
TRL: Haw d'abed shoewhara, shwooq 'abed shoewhara bmarya.
ENG: But he that glorieth, let him glory in the Lord.

ASY: ܣܵܒܵܒ ܠܹܐ ܝܠܵܗ̇ ܗ̇ܘ ܕܚܵܩܹܪ ܓܵܢܹܗ ܚܫܝܼܚܵܐ ܝܠܹܗ، ܐܸܠܵܐ ܗ̇ܘ ܕܡܵܪܝܵܐ ܚܵܩܹܪܹܗ ܚܫܝܼܚܵܐ ܝܠܹܗ.
TRL: Sabab le-ylaha haw dkhaqer ganeh khsheekha-yleh, ila haw dmarya khaqereh khsheekha-yleh.
ENG: For not he that commendeth himself is approved, but whom the Lord commendeth.

ASY: ܒܗܹܒ݂ܝܼ ܝܘܸܢ ܒܸܬ ܩܲܒܠܝܼܬܘܿܢ ܡܸܢܝܼ ܚܲܕ݇ܟ̰ܵܐ ܣܲܟ݂ܠܘܼܬܵܐ، ܗܹܐ، ܩܘܼܒܠܘܼܗ̇ ܝܬܘܿܢ.
TRL: Bhewee ywin bit qableetoon minee khacha sakhloeta, he, qoebloeha ytoon.
ENG: Would that ye could bear with me in a little foolishness: nay indeed bear with me.

ASY: ܣܵܒܵܒ ܒܲܚܘܼܠܹܐ ܝܘܸܢ ܒܝܼܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܒܵܚܲܠܬܵܐ ܐܲܠܵܗܵܝܬܵܐ، ܣܵܒܵܒ ܩܲܡ ܛܵܠܒܹܢܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܠܚܲܕ ܓܲܒ݂ܪܵܐ، ܠܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ، ܕܡܲܩܪܸܒܸܢܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܒܬܘܼܠܬܵܐ ܕܟ݂ܝܼܬܵܐ ܐܸܠܹܗ.
TRL: Sabab bakhoele ywin beeawkhoon bakhalta alahayta, sabab qam ṭalbenawkhoon lkhad gawra, lmsheekha, dmaqribinawkhoon btoelta dkheeta ileh.
ENG: For I am jealous over you with a godly jealousy: for I espoused you to one husband, that I might present you as a pure virgin to Christ.

ASY: ܐܝܼܢܵܐ ܒܸܙܕܵܥܵܐ ܝܘܸܢ ܗܲܪ ܕܵܐܟ݂ܝܼ ܕܚܘܼܘܹܐ ܡܘܼܚܠܸܛ ܠܹܗ ܠܚܵܘܵܐ ܒܝܲܕ ܦܲܢܕܘܼ̈ܗܝ، ܗܲܕܟ݂ܵܐ ܦܵܝܫܝܼ ܡܘܼܩܠܸܒܹܐ ܚܝܼܵܠܵܘ̈ܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܡ̣ܢ ܦܫܝܼܛܘܼܬܵܐ ܘܕܸܟ݂ܝܘܼܬܵܐ ܕܠܟܸܣ ܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ.
TRL: Eena bizda'a ywin har dakhee dkhoewe moekhliṭ-leh lkhawa byad pandoehy, hadkha payshee moeqlibe kheealawkhoon min psheeṭoeta o dikhyoeta dlkis msheekha.
ENG: But I fear, lest by any means, as the serpent beguiled Eve in his craftiness, your minds should be corrupted from the simplicity and the purity that is toward Christ.

ASY: ܣܵܒܵܒ ܐܸܢ ܐܵܬܹܐ ܐ݇ܢܵܫܵܐ ܠܟܸܣ ܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܘܡܲܟܪܸܙ ܒܚܲܕ ܝܼܫܘܿܥ ܐ݇ܚܹܪ݇ܢܵܐ، ܗ̇ܘ ܕܐܲܚܢܲܢ ܠܵܐ ܡܘܼܟܪܸܙ ܠܲܢ، ܝܲܢ ܐܸܢ ܩܲܒܠܝܼܬܘܿܢ ܚܕܵܐ ܪܘܼܚܵܐ ܐ݇ܚܹܪ݇ܬܵܐ ܫܒ݂ܘܿܩ ܡ̣ܢ ܗ̇ܝ ܕܩܘܼܒܸܠ ܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ، ܝܲܢ ܚܲܕ ܐܹܘܲܢܓܲܠܝܼܘܿܢ ܐ݇ܚܹܪ݇ܢܵܐ ܫܒ݂ܘܿܩ ܡ̣ܢ ܗ̇ܘ ܕܩܘܼܒܸܠ ܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ، ܟܡܵܐ ܓ̰ܲܠܕܹܐ ܒܸܛܥܵܢܵܐ ܝܬܘܿܢ.
TRL: Sabab in ate nasha lkis lawkhoon o makriz bkhad eeshoo' khena, haw dakhnan la moekriz lan, yan in qableetoon khda roekha kheta shwooq min hay dqoebil lawkhoon, yan khad ewangaleeoon khena shwooq min haw dqoebil lawkhoon, kma jalde biṭ'ana ytoon.
ENG: For if he that cometh preacheth another Jesus, whom we did not preach, or if ye receive a different spirit, which ye did not receive, or a different gospel, which ye did not accept, ye do well to bear with him.

ASY: ܐܵܢܵܐ ܠܹܐ ܝܘܸܢ ܒܸܚܫܵܒ݂ܵܐ ܕܒܘܼܫ ܒܵܨܘܿܪܵܐ ܝܘܸܢ ܡ̣ܢ ܐܵܢܝܼ ܫܠܝܼܚܹ̈ܐ ܕܟܹܐ ܚܵܫܒ݂ܝܼ ܪܵܒܵܐ ܥܸܠܵܝܹ̈ܐ ܝܢܵܐ.
TRL: Ana le ywin bikhshawa dboesh baṣoora ywin min anee shleekhe dke khashwee raba 'ilaye yna.
ENG: For I reckon that I am not a whit behind the very chiefest apostles.

ASY: ܐܘܼܦ ܐܸܢ ܕܠܹܐ ܝܘܸܢ ܬܘܼܠܡܸܕܵܐ ܒܗܹܡܸܙܡܵܢ، ܐܝܼܢܵܐ ܐܝܼܬ ܠܝܼ ܝ݇ܕܲܥܬܵܐ. ܐܵܗܵܐ ܦܝܼܫܬܵܐ ܝܠܵܗ̇ ܓܠܝܼܬܵܐ ܐܸܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܒܟܠ ܐܘܼܪܚܵܐ.
TRL: Oep in dle ywin toelmida bhemizman, eena eet-lee da'ta. Aha peeshta-ylaha gleeta ilawkhoon bkl oerkha.
ENG: But though I be rude in speech, yet am I not in knowledge; nay, in everything we have made it manifest among all men to you-ward.

ASY: ܝܲܢ ܩܵܡܘܿ ܚܛܹܐ ܠܝܼ ܕܡܘܼܟܸܦ ܠܝܼ ܓܵܢܝܼ ܕܐܲܚܬܘܿܢ ܦܵܝܫܝܼܬܘܿܢ ܡܘܼܪܡܹܐ، ܟܲܕ ܡܘܼܟܪܸܙ ܠܝܼ ܚܘܼܪܵܝܝܼ ܐܸܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܐܹܘܲܢܓܲܠܝܼܘܿܢ ܕܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ؟
TRL: Yan qamoo khṭe-lee dmoekip-lee ganee dakhtoon paysheetoon moerme, kad moekriz-lee khoerayee ilawkhoon ewangaleeoon dalaha?
ENG: Or did I commit a sin in abasing myself that ye might be exalted, because I preached to you the gospel of God for nought?

ASY: ܣܠܝܼܒ ܠܝܼ ܥܹܕܵܬܹ̈ܐ ܐ݇ܚܹܪ̈݇ܢܹܐ، ܕܫܵܩܠܹܢ ܗ݇ܘܵܐ ܗܵܝܲܪܬܵܐ ܡܸܢܲܝܗܝ ܕܥܵܒ݂ܕܹܢ ܗ݇ܘܵܐ ܚܸܠܡܲܬ ܐܸܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ،
TRL: Sleeb-lee 'edate khene, dshaqlen wa hayarta minayhy d'awden wa khilmat ilawkhoon,
ENG: I robbed other churches, taking wages of them that I might minister unto you;

ASY: ܘܐܝܼܡܲܢ ܕܝܼܘܸܢ ܗ݇ܘܵܐ ܠܟܸܣ ܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܘܣܢܝܼܩ ܠܝܼ ܠܡܸܢܕܝܼ، ܠܵܐ ܗܘܹܐ ܠܝܼ ܝܘܼܩܪܵܐ ܠܐܘܼܦ ܚܲܕ، ܣܵܒܵܒ ܐܲܚܘܿܢܘܵܬܹ̈ܐ ܕܐ݇ܬܹܐ ܠܗܘܿܢ ܡ̣ܢ ܡܵܩܹܕܘܿܢܝܼܵܐ ܡܠܹܐ ܠܗܘܿܢ ܠܣܢܝܼܩܘܼܬܝܼ. ܠܹܐ ܝܘܸܢ ܗܘܝܼܵܐ ܝܘܼܩܪܵܐ ܠܐܘܼܦ ܚܲܕ، ܘܐܘܼܦ ܠܹܐ ܗܵܘܹܝܢ.
TRL: O eeman deewin wa lkis lawkhoon o sneeq-lee lmindee, la hwe-lee yoeqra loep khad, sabab akhoonwate dte-lhoon min maqedooneea mle-lhoon lsneeqoetee. Le ywin hweea yoeqra loep khad, o oep le haweyn.
ENG: and when I was present with you and was in want, I was not a burden on any man; for the brethren, when they came from Macedonia, supplied the measure of my want; and in everything I kept myself from being burdensome unto you, and so will I keep myself.

ASY: ܐܲܝܟ݂ ܕܫܪܵܪܵܐ ܕܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ ܒܝܼܝܼ ܝܠܹܗ، ܐܵܗܵܐ ܫܘܼܒ݂ܗܵܪܵܐ ܠܹܐ ܦܵܐܹܫ ܫܩܝܼܠܵܐ ܡܸܢܝܼ ܓܵܘ ܐܘܼܚܕܵܢܵܐ ܕܐܵܟ݂ܵܐܝܼܵܐ.
TRL: Aykh dshrara dmsheekha beeee-yleh, aha shoewhara le paesh shqeela minee gaw oekhdana dakhaeea.
ENG: As the truth of Christ is in me, no man shall stop me of this glorying in the regions of Achaia.

ASY: ܩܵܡܘܿܕܝܼ؟ ܣܵܒܵܒ ܠܹܐ ܡܲܚܸܒܸܢܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ؟ ܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ ܟܹܐ ܝܵܕܹܥ ܕܟܹܐ ܡܲܚܸܒܸܢܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ.
TRL: Qamoodee? Sabab le makhibinawkhoon? Alaha ke yade' dke makhibinawkhoon.
ENG: Wherefore? because I love you not? God knoweth.

ASY: ܘܒܸܬ ܥܵܒ݂ܕܹܢ ܡܸܢܕܝܼ ܕܒܸܥܒ݂ܵܕܵܐ ܝܘܸܢ ܕܩܵܛܥܹܢ ܟܠ ܦܸܪܣܲܬ ܥܲܠ ܐܵܢܝܼ ܕܒܸܛܥܵܝܵܐ ܝܢܵܐ ܠܦܸܪܣܲܬ ܕܚܵܫܒ݂ܝܼ ܠܵܗ̇ ܓܵܢܲܝܗܝ ܫܲܘܝܹ̈ܐ ܥܲܡܲܢ ܒܡܸܢܕܝܼܵܢܹ̈ܐ ܕܒܸܥܒ݂ܵܕܵܐ ܝܢܵܐ ܫܘܼܒ݂ܗܵܪܵܐ ܒܝܼܲܝܗܝ.
TRL: O bit 'awden mindee dbi'wada ywin dqaṭ'en kl pirsat 'al anee dbiṭ'aya yna lpirsat dkhashwee-laha ganayhy shawye 'aman bmindeeane dbi'wada yna shoewhara bee-ayhy.
ENG: But what I do, that I will do, that I may cut off occasion from them which desire an occasion; that wherein they glory, they may be found even as we.

ASY: ܐܲܢܹܐ ܐ݇ܢܵܫܹ̈ܐ ܫܠܝܼܚܹ̈ܐ ܕܲܓܵܠܹ̈ܐ ܝܢܵܐ، ܦܲܠܵܚܹ̈ܐ ܦܟ̰ܝܼܠܹ̈ܐ، ܕܡܲܕܡܘܼܝܘܼܗ̇ ܝܢܵܐ ܓܵܢܲܝܗܝ ܠܫܠܝܼܚܹ̈ܐ ܕܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ.
TRL: Ane nashe shleekhe dagale yna, palakhe pcheele, dmadmoeyoeha yna ganayhy lshleekhe dmsheekha.
ENG: For such men are false apostles, deceitful workers, fashioning themselves into apostles of Christ.

ASY: ܠܹܐ ܝܠܵܗ̇ ܡܲܥܓ̰ܸܒܵܢܬܵܐ، ܣܵܒܵܒ ܐܘܼܦ ܣܵܛܵܢܵܐ ܟܹܐ ܡܲܕܡܹܐ ܠܵܗ̇ ܓܵܢܹܗ ܠܡܲܠܲܐܟ݂ܵܐ ܕܒܲܗܪܵܐ.
TRL: Le-ylaha ma'jibanta, sabab oep saṭana ke madme-laha ganeh lmalakha dbahra.
ENG: And no marvel; for even Satan fashioneth himself into an angel of light.

ASY: ܒܲܣ ܠܹܐ ܝܠܹܗ ܚܲܕ ܡܸܢܕܝܼ ܓܘܼܪܵܐ ܕܐܸܢ ܐܘܼܦ ܥܵܒ݂ܕܵܢܹ̈ܐ ܕܚܸܠܡܲܬܹܗ ܡܲܕܡܝܼ ܠܵܗ̇ ܓܵܢܲܝܗܝ ܠܥܵܒ݂ܕܵܢܹ̈ܐ ܕܚܸܠܡܲܬ ܕܙܲܕܝܼܩܘܼܬܵܐ. ܐܝܼܢܵܐ ܚܲܪܬܲܝܗܝ ܒܸܬ ܗܵܘܝܵܐ ܐܲܝܟ݂ ܦܘܼܠܚܵܢܲܝ̈ܗܝ.
TRL: Bas le-yleh khad mindee goera din oep 'awdane dkhilmateh madmee-laha ganayhy l'awdane dkhilmat dzadeeqoeta. Eena khartayhy bit hawya aykh poelkhanayhy.
ENG: It is no great thing therefore if his ministers also fashion themselves as ministers of righteousness; whose end shall be according to their works.

ASY: ܡܸܢܕܪܸܫ ܒܹܐܡܵܪܵܐ ܝܘܸܢ، ܐ݇ܢܵܫܵܐ ܠܵܐ ܚܵܫܹܒ݂ ܠܝܼ ܐܲܝܟ݂ ܣܲܟ݂ܠܵܐ. ܐܝܼܢܵܐ ܐܸܢ ܚܵܫܹܒ݂ ܠܝܼ ܗܲܕܟ݂ܵܐ، ܩܲܒܠܘܼܢ ܠܝܼ ܐܲܝܟ݂ ܚܲܕ ܣܲܟ݂ܠܵܐ ܕܥܵܒ݂ܕܹܢ ܚܲܕ݇ܟ̰ܵܐ ܫܘܼܒ݂ܗܵܪܵܐ.
TRL: Mindrish bemara ywin, nasha la khashew-lee aykh sakhla. Eena in khashew-lee hadkha, qabloen-lee aykh khad sakhla d'awden khacha shoewhara.
ENG: I say again, Let no man think me foolish; but if ye do, yet as foolish receive me, that I also may glory a little.

ASY: ܡܸܢܕܝܼ ܕܗܲܡܙܘܼܡܹܐ ܝܘܸܢ ܠܹܐ ܝܘܸܢ ܗܲܡܙܘܼܡܹܗ ܐܲܝܟ݂ ܡܵܪܲܢ ܒܵܥܹܐ ܕܗܲܡܙܸܡܸܢܹܗ، ܐܸܠܵܐ ܐܲܝܟ݂ ܚܲܕ ܣܲܟ݂ܠܵܐ ܒܐܵܗܵܐ ܒܸܣܬܵܝܘܼܬܵܐ ܕܫܘܼܒ݂ܗܵܪܵܐ.
TRL: Mindee dhamzoeme ywin le ywin hamzoemeh aykh Maran ba'e dhamzimineh, ila aykh khad sakhla baha bistayoeta dshoewhara.
ENG: That which I speak, I speak not after the Lord, but as in foolishness, in this confidence of glorying.

ASY: ܣܵܒܵܒ ܪܵܒܵܐ ܟܹܐ ܥܵܒ݂ܕܝܼ ܫܘܼܒ݂ܗܵܪܵܐ ܡ̣ܢ ܟܝܵܢܲܝܗܝ ܐ݇ܢܵܫܵܝܵܐ، ܐܘܼܦ ܐܵܢܵܐ ܒܸܬ ܥܵܒ݂ܕܹܢ ܫܘܼܒ݂ܗܵܪܵܐ.
TRL: Sabab raba ke 'awdee shoewhara min kyanayhy nashaya, oep ana bit 'awden shoewhara.
ENG: Seeing that many glory after the flesh, I will glory also.

ASY: ܒܚܲܕܘܼܬܵܐ ܟܹܐ ܩܲܒܠܝܼܬܘܿܢ ܠܣܲܟ݂ܠܹ̈ܐ ܣܵܒܵܒ ܚܲܟܝܼܡܹ̈ܐ ܝܬܘܿܢ.
TRL: Bkhadoeta ke qableetoon lsakhle sabab khakeeme ytoon.
ENG: For ye bear with the foolish gladly, being wise yourselves.

ASY: ܟܹܐ ܩܲܒܠܝܼܬܘܿܢ ܠܗ̇ܘ ܕܥܵܒܹܕ ܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܪܹ̈ܓܵܘܵܬܹܐ، ܠܗ̇ܘ ܕܡܲܦܠܸܚ ܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܠܝܘܼܬܪܵܢܵܐ ܕܓܵܢܹܗ، ܠܗ̇ܘ ܕܫܵܩܹܠ ܡܸܢܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ، ܠܗ̇ܘ ܕܡܲܪܸܡ ܓܵܢܹܗ، ܠܗ̇ܘ ܕܡܵܚܹܐ ܥܲܠ ܦܵܬܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ.
TRL: Ke qableetoon lhaw d'abed lawkhoon regawate, lhaw dmaplikh lawkhoon lyoetrana dganeh, lhaw dshaqel minawkhoon, lhaw dmarim ganeh, lhaw dmakhe 'al patawkhoon.
ENG: For ye bear with a man, if he bringeth you into bondage, if he devoureth you, if he taketh you captive, if he exalteth himself, if he smiteth you on the face.

ASY: ܗܲܡܙܘܼܡܹܐ ܝܘܸܢ ܒܢܟ݂ܝܼܦܬܵܐ ܐܲܝܟ݂ ܕܐܸܢ ܗܵܘܲܚ ܗܘܝܼܹܐ ܡܚܝܼܠܹ̈ܐ. ܐܝܼܢܵܐ ܐܸܢ ܚܲܕ ܚܲܦܸܛ ܠܸܥܒ݂ܵܕܵܐ ܫܘܼܒ݂ܗܵܪܵܐ ܒܚܲܕ ܡܸܢܕܝܼ، ܐܘܼܦ ܐܵܢܵܐ ܒܸܬ ܚܲܦܛܸܢ ܕܥܵܒ݂ܕܹܢ ܫܘܼܒ݂ܗܵܪܵܐ. ܠܐܲܟ݂ܵܐ ܗܲܡܙܘܼܡܹܐ ܝܘܸܢ ܐܲܝܟ݂ ܣܲܟ݂ܠܵܐ.
TRL: Hamzoeme ywin bnkheepta aykh din hawakh hwee-e mkheele. Eena in khad khapiṭ li'wada shoewhara bkhad mindee, oep ana bit khapṭin d'awden shoewhara. Lakha hamzoeme ywin aykh sakhla.
ENG: I speak by way of disparagement, as though we had been weak. Yet whereinsoever any is bold (I speak in foolishness), I am bold also.

ASY: ܥܸܒ݂ܪ̈ܵܝܹܐ ܝܢܵܐ؟ ܐܘܼܦ ܐܵܢܵܐ ܥܸܒ݂ܪܵܝܵܐ ܝܘܸܢ. ܝܼܣܲܪ̈ܠܵܝܹܐ ܝܢܵܐ؟ ܐܘܼܦ ܐܵܢܵܐ ܝܼܣܲܪܠܵܝܵܐ ܝܘܸܢ. ܒܢܘܿܢܹ̈ܐ ܕܐܲܒ݂ܪܵܗܵܡ ܝܼܢܵܐ؟ ܐܘܼܦ ܐܵܢܵܐ.
TRL: 'Iwraye yna? Oep ana 'iwraya ywin. Eesarlaye yna? Oep ana eesarlaya ywin. Bnoone dawraham eena? Oep ana.
ENG: Are they Hebrews? so am I. Are they Israelites? so am I. Are they the seed of Abraham? so am I.

ASY: ܪܹ̈ܓܵܘܵܬܹܐ ܕܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ ܝܢܵܐ؟–ܗܲܡܙܘܼܡܹܐ ܝܘܸܢ ܐܲܝܟ݂ ܚܲܕ ܫܹܐܕܵܢܵܐ–ܐܵܢܵܐ ܒܘܼܫ ܙܵܘܕܵܐ. ܦܠܝܼܚ ܠܝܼ ܒܘܼܫ ܩܸܫܝܵܐ، ܗܘܹܐ ܠܝܼ ܓܵܘ ܒܹܝܬ ܐܲܣܝܼܪܹ̈ܐ ܒܘܼܫ ܙܵܘܕܵܐ، ܒܡܲܚܘܵܬܹ̈ܐ ܒܘܼܫ ܙܵܘܕܵܐ، ܪܵܒܵܐ ܓܵܗܹ̈ܐ ܩܘܼܪܒܵܐ ܠܡܵܘܬܵܐ.
TRL: Regawate dmsheekha yna?–hamzoeme ywin aykh khad shedana–ana boesh zawda. Pleekh-lee boesh qishya, hwe-lee gaw beyt aseere boesh zawda, bmakhwate boesh zawda, raba gahe qoerba lmawta.
ENG: Are they ministers of Christ? (I speak as one beside himself) I more; in labours more abundantly, in prisons more abundantly, in stripes above measure, in deaths oft.

ASY: ܚܲܡܸܫ ܓܵܗܹ̈ܐ ܦܝܼܫ ܠܝܼ ܡܸܚܝܵܐ ܒܝܲܕ ܝܗܘܼܕܵܝܹ̈ܐ، ܟܠ ܓܵܗܵܐ ܬܠܵܬܝܼ ܘܬܸܫܥܵܐ ܫܵܘܛܹ̈ܐ.
TRL: Khamish gahe peesh-lee mikhya byad yhoedaye, kl gaha tlatee o tish'a shawṭe.
ENG: Of the Jews five times received I forty stripes save one.

ASY: ܬܠܵܬ ܓܵܗܹ̈ܐ ܒܚܘܼܛܪܹ̈ܐ ܦܝܼܫ ܠܝܼ ܡܸܚܝܵܐ، ܚܕܵܐ ܓܵܗܵܐ ܦܝܼܫ ܠܝܼ ܪܓ̰ܝܼܡܵܐ، ܬܠܵܬ ܓܵܗܹ̈ܐ ܫܡܝܼܛ ܠܵܗ̇ ܒܝܼܝܼ ܓܵܡܝܼ، ܚܲܕ ܝܵܘܡܵܐ ܘܚܲܕ ܠܲܝܠܹܐ ܗܘܹܐ ܠܝܼ ܥܲܠ ܦܵܬܵܐ ܕܡ̈ܝܼܵܐ ܓܵܘ ܝܵܡܵܐ.
TRL: Tlat gahe bkhoeṭre peesh-lee mikhya, khda gaha peesh-lee rjeema, tlat gahe shmeeṭ-laha beeee gamee, khad yawma o khad layle hwe-lee 'al pata dmeea gaw yama.
ENG: Thrice was I beaten with rods, once was I stoned, thrice I suffered shipwreck, a night and a day have I been in the deep;

ASY: ܒܐܘܼܪ̈ܚܵܬܹܐ ܪܵܒܵܐ ܓܵܗܹ̈ܐ، ܒܩܹܘܲܢܕܹܢܘܿܣܹ̈ܐ ܕܢܲܗܪ̈ܵܘܵܬܹܐ، ܒܩܹܘܲܢܕܹܢܘܿܣܹ̈ܐ ܕܫܲܠܚܵܢܹ̈ܐ ܕܐܘܼܪ̈ܚܵܬܹܐ، ܒܩܹܘܲܢܕܹܢܘܿܣܹ̈ܐ ܡ̣ܢ ܐ݇ܢܵܫܹ̈ܐ ܕܓܵܢܝܼ، ܒܩܹܘܲܢܕܹܢܘܿܣܹ̈ܐ ܡ̣ܢ ܐܸܡܘܵܬܹ̈ܐ، ܒܩܹܘܲܢܕܹܢܘܿܣ ܓܵܘ ܡܕܝܼܢܵܬܹ̈ܐ، ܒܩܹܘܲܢܕܹܢܘܿܣ ܓܵܘ ܒܲܪܝܼܵܐ، ܒܩܹܘܲܢܕܹܢܘܿܣ ܕܝܵܡܵܐ، ܘܒܩܹܘܲܢܕܹܢܘܿܣ ܡ̣ܢ ܐܲܚܘܿܢܘܵܬܹ̈ܐ ܕܲܓܵܠܹ̈ܐ.
TRL: Boerkhate raba gahe, bqewandenoose dnahrawate, bqewandenoose dshalkhane doerkhate, bqewandenoose min nashe dganee, bqewandenoose min imwate, bqewandenoos gaw mdeenate, bqewandenoos gaw bareea, bqewandenoos dyama, o bqewandenoos min akhoonwate dagale.
ENG: in journeyings often, in perils of rivers, in perils of robbers, in perils from my countrymen, in perils from the Gentiles, in perils in the city, in perils in the wilderness, in perils in the sea, in perils among false brethren;

ASY: ܦܠܝܼܚ ܠܝܼ ܘܟܟ̰ܝܼܚ ܠܝܼ ܪܵܒܵܐ، ܘܒܠܲܝܠܵܘܵܬܹ̈ܐ ܠܵܐ ܛܠܝܼܥ ܠܝܼ. ܗܘܹܐ ܠܝܼ ܒܟܸܦܢܵܐ ܘܨܲܗܘܵܐ، ܘܒܨܵܘܡܵܐ ܪܵܒܵܐ ܓܵܗܹ̈ܐ، ܘܒܩܲܪܬܵܐ ܘܒܫܘܼܠܚܵܝܘܼܬܵܐ.
TRL: Pleekh-lee o kcheekh-lee raba, o blaylawate la ṭlee' lee. Hwe-lee bkipna o ṣahwa, o bṣawma raba gahe, o bqarta o bshoelkhayoeta.
ENG: in labour and travail, in watchings often, in hunger and thirst, in fastings often, in cold and nakedness.

ASY: ܫܒ݂ܘܿܩ ܡ̣ܢ ܡܸܢܕܝܼܵܢܹ̈ܐ ܕܠܒܲܕܲܪ، ܟܠ ܝܘܿܡ ܒܸܛܥܵܢܵܐ ܝܘܸܢ ܝܘܼܩܪܵܐ ܕܟܠܲܝܗܝ ܥܹܕܵܬܹ̈ܐ.
TRL: Shwooq min mindeeane dlbadar, kl yoom biṭ'ana ywin yoeqra dklayhy 'edate.
ENG: Beside those things that are without, there is that which presseth upon me daily, anxiety for all the churches.

ASY: ܡܵܢܝܼ ܝܠܹܗ ܡܚܝܼܠܵܐ ܘܐܵܢܵܐ ܠܹܐ ܝܘܸܢ ܡܚܝܼܠܵܐ؟ ܡܵܢܝܼ ܝܠܹܗ ܦܝܼܫܵܐ ܬܘܼܪܩܸܠܵܐ ܒܚܛܝܼܬܵܐ ܘܐܵܢܵܐ ܠܹܐ ܝܵܩܕܹܢ ܒܓܵܘܝܼ؟
TRL: Manee-yleh mkheela o ana le ywin mkheela? Manee-yleh peesha toerqila bkhṭeeta o ana le yaqden bgawee?
ENG: Who is weak, and I am not weak? who is made to stumble, and I burn not?

ASY: ܐܸܢ ܘܵܠܹܐ ܝܠܵܗ̇ ܕܫܲܒ݂ܗܸܪܸܢ ܒܸܬ ܫܲܒ݂ܗܸܪܸܢ ܒܙܲܒܘܼܢܘܼܝܵܬܝܼ̈.
TRL: In wale-ylaha dshawhirin bit shawhirin bzaboenoeyatee.
ENG: If I must needs glory, I will glory of the things that concern my weakness.

ASY: ܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ ܕܝܼܠܹܗ ܒܵܒܵܐ ܕܡܵܪܲܢ ܝܼܫܘܿܥ، ܕܡܒܘܼܪܟ݂ܵܐ ܝܠܹܗ ܠܥܵܠܲܡ، ܟܹܐ ܝܵܕܹܥ ܕܠܹܐ ܝܘܸܢ ܕܲܓܘܼܠܹܐ.
TRL: Alaha deeleh baba dmaran eeshoo', dmboerkha-yleh l'alam, ke yade' dle ywin dagoele.
ENG: The God and Father of the Lord Jesus, he who is blessed for evermore, knoweth that I lie not.

ASY: ܓܵܘ ܕܲܪܡܣܘܿܩ، ܪܲܒ ܚܲܝܠܵܐ ܬܚܘܿܬ ܫܘܼܠܛܵܢܵܐ ܕܐܵܪܹܛܘܿܣ ܡܲܠܟܵܐ ܒܸܢܛܵܪܵܐ ܝܗ݇ܘܵܐ ܡܕܝܼܢ݇ܬܵܐ ܕܕܲܪ̈ܡܣܘܿܩܵܝܹܐ ܠܸܕܒ݂ܵܩܝܼ.
TRL: Gaw darmsooq, rab khayla tkhoot shoelṭana dareṭoos malka binṭara ywa mdeeta ddarmsooqaye lidwaqee.
ENG: In Damascus the governor under Aretas the king guarded the city of the Damascenes, in order to take me:

ASY: ܐܝܼܢܵܐ ܦܝܼܫ ܠܝܼ ܡܘܼܫܪܸܛܵܐ ܓܵܘ ܩܸܪܛܵܠܵܐ ܡ̣ܢ ܟܵܘܹܐ ܡܥܲܠ ܫܘܼܪܵܐ، ܘܦܪܝܼܩ ܠܝܼ ܡ̣ܢ ܐܝܼܕܵܬܹ̈ܗ.
TRL: Eena peesh-lee moeshriṭa gaw qirṭala min kawe m'al shoera, o preeq-lee min eedateh.
ENG: and through a window was I let down in a basket by the wall, and escaped his hands.

ASY: ܘܵܠܹܐ ܝܠܵܗ̇ ܕܥܵܒ݂ܕܹܢ ܫܘܼܒ݂ܗܵܪܵܐ ܐܘܼܦ ܐܸܢ ܕܠܲܝܬ ܦܲܝܕܵܐ ܒܝܼܹܗ. ܐܵܕܝܼܵܐ ܒܸܬ ܫܲܪܹܝܢ ܒܚܸܙܘܹ̈ܐ ܘܒܓܸܠܝܵܢܹ̈ܐ ܡ̣ܢ ܡܵܪܲܢ.
TRL: Wale-ylaha d'awden shoewhara oep in dlayt payda bee-eh. Adeea bit shareyn bkhizwe o bgilyane min Maran.
ENG: I must needs glory, though it is not expedient; but I will come to visions and revelations of the Lord.

ASY: ܟܹܐ ܝܵܕܥܹܢ ܚܲܕ ܐ݇ܢܵܫܵܐ ܒܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ ܕܡ̣ܢ ܩܵܕ݇ܡ ܐܲܪܒܲܥܣܲܪ ܫܸܢܹ̈ܐ ܦܝܼܫ ܠܹܗ ܡܘܼܪܡܵܐ ܠܫܡܲܝܵܐ ܕܬܠܵܬ. ܐܸܢ ܒܦܲܓ݂ܪܵܐ ܝܗ݇ܘܵܐ ܝܲܢ ܠܒܲܕܲܪ ܡ̣ܢ ܦܲܓ݂ܪܵܐ ܠܹܐ ܝܵܕܥܹܢ، ܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ ܟܹܐ ܝܵܕܹܥ.
TRL: Ke yad'en khad nasha bmsheekha dmin qam arba'sar shine peesh-leh moerma lshmaya dtlat. In bpaghra ywa yan lbadar min paghra le yad'en, Alaha ke yade'.
ENG: I know a man in Christ, fourteen years ago (whether in the body, I know not; or whether out of the body, I know not; God knoweth), such a one caught up even to the third heaven.

ASY: ܐܵܢܵܐ ܟܹܐ ܝܵܕܥܹܢ ܗ݇ܘܵܐ ܚܲܕ ܗܲܕܟ݂ܵܐ ܐ݇ܢܵܫܵܐ، ܒܦܲܓ݂ܪܵܐ ܝܲܢ ܠܒܲܕܲܪ ܡ̣ܢ ܦܲܓ݂ܪܵܐ ܠܹܐ ܝܵܕܥܹܢ، ܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ ܟܹܐ ܝܵܕܹܥ،
TRL: Ana ke yad'en wa khad hadkha nasha, bpaghra yan lbadar min paghra le yad'en, Alaha ke yade',
ENG: And I know such a man (whether in the body, or apart from the body, I know not; God knoweth),

ASY: ܕܵܐܟ݂ܝܼ ܦܝܼܫ ܠܹܗ ܡܘܼܪܡܵܐ ܠܦܲܪܕܲܝܣܵܐ ܘܫܡܝܼܥ ܠܹܗ ܗܹܡܸܙܡܵܢܹ̈ܐ ܕܠܹܐ ܐܵܬܝܼ ܠܗܲܡܙܘܼܡܹܐ، ܗܹܡܸܙܡܵܢܹ̈ܐ ܕܠܹܐ ܝܠܵܗ̇ ܩܵܢܘܿܢܵܝܬܵܐ ܠܐ݇ܢܵܫܵܐ ܕܗܲܡܙܸܡ ܠܗܘܿܢ.
TRL: Dakhee peesh-leh moerma lpardaysa o shmee' leh hemizmane dle atee lhamzoeme, hemizmane dle-ylaha qanoonayta lnasha dhamzim-lhoon.
ENG: how that he was caught up into Paradise, and heard unspeakable words, which it is not lawful for a man to utter.

ASY: ܒܸܬ ܥܵܒ݂ܕܹܢ ܫܘܼܒ݂ܗܵܪܵܐ ܒܗܲܕܟ݂ܵܐ ܐ݇ܢܵܫܵܐ، ܐܝܼܢܵܐ ܒܓܵܢܝܼ ܠܹܐ ܥܵܒ݂ܕܹܢ ܫܘܼܒ݂ܗܵܪܵܐ ܫܒ݂ܘܿܩ ܡ̣ܢ ܒܙܲܒܘܼܢܘܼܬܝܼ.
TRL: Bit 'awden shoewhara bhadkha nasha, eena bganee le 'awden shoewhara shwooq min bzaboenoetee.
ENG: On behalf of such a one will I glory: but on mine own behalf I will not glory, save in my weaknesses.

ASY: ܐܘܼܦ ܐܸܢ ܕܒܵܥܹܝܢ ܥܵܒ݂ܕܹܢ ܫܘܼܒ݂ܗܵܪܵܐ ܠܹܐ ܗܵܘܹܝܢ ܣܲܟ݂ܠܵܐ، ܣܵܒܵܒ ܒܸܬ ܗܲܡܙܸܡܸܢ ܫܪܵܪܵܐ. ܐܝܼܢܵܐ ܒܸܬ ܕܵܒ݂ܩܹܢܵܗ̇ ܓܵܢܝܼ ܕܠܵܐ ܚܵܫܹܒ݂ ܐ݇ܢܵܫܵܐ ܒܘܼܬ ܕܝܼܝܼ ܙܵܘܕܵܐ ܡ̣ܢ ܗ̇ܘ ܡܸܢܕܝܼ ܕܚܵܙܹܐ ܒܝܼܝܼ ܝܲܢ ܕܫܵܡܹܥ ܡܸܢܝܼ.
TRL: Oep in dba'eyn 'awden shoewhara le haweyn sakhla, sabab bit hamzimin shrara. Eena bit dawqenaha ganee dla khashew nasha boet deeee zawda min haw mindee dkhaze beeee yan dshame' minee.
ENG: For if I should desire to glory, I shall not be foolish; for I shall speak the truth: but I forbear, lest any man should account of me above that which he seeth me to be, or heareth from me.

ASY: ܘܕܠܵܐ ܦܵܝܫܹܢ ܗ݇ܘܵܐ ܡܘܼܪܡܵܐ ܙܵܘܕܵܐ ܡ̣ܢ ܕܘܵܠܹܐ ܝܠܵܗ̇ ܒܝܲܬܝܼܪܘܼܬܵܐ ܕܓܸܠܝܵܢܹ̈ܐ، ܦܝܼܫ ܠܝܼ ܝܘܼܗ݇ܒ݂ܵܐ ܟܸܬܘܵܐ ܓܵܘ ܦܲܓ݂ܪܝܼ، ܐܝܼܙܓܲܕܵܐ ܡ̣ܢ ܣܵܛܵܢܵܐ ܠܥܲܓ̰ܘܼܙܝܼ، ܕܠܵܐ ܦܵܝܫܹܢ ܡܘܼܪܡܵܐ ܙܵܘܕܵܐ.
TRL: O dla payshen wa moerma zawda min dwale-ylaha byateeroeta dgilyane, peesh-lee yoewa kitwa gaw paghree, eezgada min saṭana l'ajoezee, dla payshen moerma zawda.
ENG: And by reason of the exceeding greatness of the revelations—wherefore, that I should not be exalted overmuch, there was given to me a thorn in the flesh, a messenger of Satan to buffet me, that I should not be exalted overmuch.

ASY: ܬܠܵܬ ܓܵܗܹ̈ܐ ܦܘܼܪܦܸܠ ܠܝܼ ܒܡܵܪܲܢ ܕܫܵܩܹܠ ܗ݇ܘܵܐ ܠܹܗ ܡܸܢܝܼ،
TRL: Tlat gahe poerpil-lee bmaran dshaqel wa-leh minee,
ENG: Concerning this thing I besought the Lord thrice, that it might depart from me.

ASY: ܐܝܼܢܵܐ ܐ݇ܡܝܼܪܹܗ ܐܸܠܝܼ، ”ܫܵܦܵܩܲܬܝܼ ܟܹܐ ܡܵܠܝܵܐ ܠܘܼܟ݂، ܣܵܒܵܒ ܚܲܝܠܝܼ ܒܙܲܒܘܼܢܘܼܬܵܐ ܟܹܐ ܦܵܐܹܫ ܬܘܼܡܸܡܵܐ.“ ܒܘܼܬ ܐܵܗܵܐ ܒܚܲܕܘܼܬܵܐ ܒܸܬ ܥܵܒ݂ܕܹܢ ܫܘܼܒ݂ܗܵܪܵܐ ܒܘܼܫ ܙܵܘܕܵܐ ܒܙܲܒܘܼܢܘܼܬܝܼ ܕܫܵܪܹܐ ܒܝܼܝܼ ܚܲܝܠܵܐ ܕܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ.
TRL: Eena meereh ilee, ”shapaqatee ke malya-loekh, sabab khaylee bzaboenoeta ke paesh toemima.“ boet aha bkhadoeta bit 'awden shoewhara boesh zawda bzaboenoetee dshare beeee khayla dmsheekha.
ENG: And he hath said unto me, My grace is sufficient for thee: for my power is made perfect in weakness. Most gladly therefore will I rather glory in my weaknesses, that the power of Christ may rest upon me.

ASY: ܡ̣ܢ ܗܵܕܵܐ، ܒܘܼܬ ܚܵܬܸܪ ܕܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ ܐܝܼܬ ܠܝܼ ܒܘܼܣܵܡܵܐ ܒܙܲܒܘܼܢܘܼܝܵܬܹ̈ܐ، ܒܡܲܣܠܵܝܵܬܹ̈ܐ، ܒܐܘܼܠܨܵܢܹ̈ܐ، ܒܪ̈ܕܘܼܦܝܹܐ، ܒܓ̰ܘܼܢܓ̰ܵܪܹ̈ܐ. ܣܵܒܵܒ ܐܝܼܡܲܢ ܕܙܲܒܘܼܢ ܝܼܘܸܢ، ܗ̇ܝܓܵܗ ܚܲܝܠܵܢܵܐ ܝܘܸܢ.
TRL: Min hada, boet khatir dmsheekha eet-lee boesama bzaboenoeyate, bmaslayate, boelṣane, brdoepye, bjoenjare. Sabab eeman dzaboen eewin, haygah khaylana ywin.
ENG: Wherefore I take pleasure in weaknesses, in injuries, in necessities, in persecutions, in distresses, for Christ’s sake: for when I am weak, then am I strong.

ASY: ܗܘܹܐ ܠܝܼ ܣܲܟ݂ܠܵܐ، ܐܝܼܢܵܐ ܐܲܚܬܘܿܢ ܩܲܡ ܡܲܠܝܸܨܝܼܬܘܿܢ ܠܝܼ. ܘܵܠܹܐ ܝܗ݇ܘܵܐ ܕܦܵܝܫܹܢ ܗ݇ܘܵܐ ܚܩܝܼܪܵܐ ܒܝܼܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܣܵܒܵܒ ܠܹܐ ܝܘܸܢ ܒܘܼܫ ܒܵܨܘܿܪܵܐ ܡ̣ܢ ܫܠܝܼܚܹ̈ܐ ܕܟܹܐ ܚܵܫܒ݂ܝܼ ܒܘܼܫ ܥܸܠܵܝܹ̈ܐ ܝܢܵܐ، ܐܵܦܸܢ ܕܠܹܐ ܝܘܸܢ ܡܸܢܕܝܼ.
TRL: Hwe-lee sakhla, eena akhtoon qam malyiṣeetoon-lee. Wale ywa dpayshen wa khqeera beeawkhoon sabab le ywin boesh baṣoora min shleekhe dke khashwee boesh 'ilaye yna, apin dle ywin mindee.
ENG: I am become foolish: ye compelled me; for I ought to have been commended of you: for in nothing was I behind the very chiefest apostles, though I am nothing.

ASY: ܪ̈ܘܼܫܡܹܐ ܕܚܲܕ ܫܠܝܼܚܵܐ ܐܲܢܹܐ ܝܢܵܐ: ܢܝܼܫܲܢܩܹ̈ܐ ܘܕܘܼܡܵܪܹ̈ܐ ܘܚܲܝܠܹ̈ܐ ܓܘܼܪܹ̈ܐ، ܘܐܲܢܹܐ ܦܝܼܫܹܐ ܝܗ݇ܘܵܘ ܥܒ݂ܝܼܕܹܐ ܓܵܘܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܒܟܠܵܗ̇ ܚܡܵܠܬܵܐ.
TRL: Roeshme dkhad shleekha ane yna: neeshanqe o doemare o khayle goere, o ane peeshe ywaw 'weede gawawkhoon bklaha khmalta.
ENG: Truly the signs of an apostle were wrought among you in all patience, by signs and wonders and mighty works.

ASY: ܒܡܘܿܕܝܼ ܝܬܘܿܢ ܗ݇ܘܵܘ ܒܘܼܫ ܒܵܨܘܿܪܹ̈ܐ ܡ̣ܢ ܥܹܕܵܬܹ̈ܐ ܐ݇ܚܹܪ̈݇ܢܹܐ ܫܒ݂ܘܿܩ ܡ̣ܢ ܕܠܹܐ ܝܘܸܢ ܗܘܝܼܵܐ ܝܘܼܩܪܵܐ ܐܸܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ؟ ܦܲܚܠܘܼܢ ܐܸܠܝܼ ܐܵܗܵܐ ܓܢܵܗܵܐ.
TRL: Bmoodee ytoon waw boesh baṣoore min 'edate khene shwooq min dle ywin hweea yoeqra ilawkhoon? Pakhloen ilee aha gnaha.
ENG: For what is there wherein ye were made inferior to the rest of the churches, except it be that I myself was not a burden to you? forgive me this wrong.

ASY: ܐܵܕܝܼܵܐ ܗܕܝܼܪܵܐ ܝܘܸܢ ܕܐܵܬܹܝܢ ܠܟܸܣ ܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܩܵܐ ܓܵܗܵܐ ܕܬܠܵܬ، ܘܠܹܐ ܗܵܘܹܝܢ ܝܘܼܩܪܵܐ ܐܸܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ، ܣܵܒܵܒ ܠܹܐ ܒܵܥܹܝܢ ܡܸܢܕܝܼܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܐܝܼܢܵܐ ܒܵܥܹܝܢ ܐܸܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ. ܣܵܒܵܒ ܠܹܐ ܝܠܵܗ̇ ܘܵܠܹܐ ܠܒܢܘܿܢܹ̈ܐ ܕܡܲܬܒ݂ܝܼ ܣܝܼܡܵܬܹ̈ܐ ܠܐܲܒ݂ܵܗܲܝ̈ܗܝ، ܐܸܠܵܐ ܐܲܒ݂ܵܗܹ̈ܐ ܠܒܢܘܿܢܹ̈ܐ.
TRL: Adeea hdeera ywin dateyn lkis lawkhoon qa gaha dtlat, o le haweyn yoeqra ilawkhoon, sabab le ba'eyn mindeeawkhoon eena ba'eyn ilawkhoon. Sabab le-ylaha wale lbnoone dmatwee seemate lawahayhy, ila awahe lbnoone.
ENG: Behold, this is the third time I am ready to come to you; and I will not be a burden to you: for I seek not yours, but you: for the children ought not to lay up for the parents, but the parents for the children.

ASY: ܗܲܕܟ݂ܵܐ ܒܚܲܕܘܼܬܵܐ ܐܵܢܵܐ ܒܸܬ ܨܲܪܦܸܢ ܟܠ ܡܸܢܕܝܼ ܥܲܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ، ܘܦܵܝܫܹܢ ܨܘܼܪܦܵܐ. ܐܸܢ ܡܲܚܸܒܸܢܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܙܵܘܕܵܐ، ܒܸܬ ܡܲܚܸܒܝܼܬܘܿܢ ܠܝܼ ܒܘܼܫ ܒܵܨܘܿܪܵܐ؟
TRL: Hadkha bkhadoeta ana bit ṣarpin kl mindee 'alawkhoon, o payshen ṣoerpa. In makhibinawkhoon zawda, bit makhibeetoon-lee boesh baṣoora?
ENG: And I will most gladly spend and be spent for your souls. If I love you more abundantly, am I loved the less?

ASY: ܟܠ ܕܵܐܟ݂ܝܼ ܕܗܵܘܝܵܐ، ܠܵܐ ܗܘܹܐ ܠܝܼ ܝܘܼܩܪܵܐ ܐܸܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ، ܐܸܠܵܐ ܐܲܝܟ݂ ܕܝܼܘܸܢ ܦܵܠܘܿܡܵܐ، ܩܲܡ ܕܵܒ݂ܩܹܢܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܒܦܸܠܡܹ̈ܐ.
TRL: Kl dakhee dhawya, la hwe-lee yoeqra ilawkhoon, ila aykh deewin palooma, qam dawqenawkhoon bpilme.
ENG: But be it so, I did not myself burden you; but, being crafty, I caught you with guile.

ASY: ܥܘܼܠܕܹܐ ܠܝܼ ܐܸܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܒܝܲܕ ܚܲܕ ܐ݇ܢܵܫܵܐ ܕܫܘܼܕܸܪܝܼ ܠܟܸܣ ܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ؟
TRL: 'oelde-lee ilawkhoon byad khad nasha dshoediree lkis lawkhoon?
ENG: Did I take advantage of you by any one of them whom I have sent unto you?

ASY: ܛܠܝܼܒ ܠܝܼ ܡ̣ܢ ܛܸܛܘܿܣ ܕܐܵܬܹܐ ܠܟܸܣ ܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ، ܘܫܘܼܕܸܪܝܼ ܐܲܚܘܿܢܲܢ ܥܲܡܹܗ. ܥܘܼܠܕܹܐ ܠܹܗ ܐܸܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܛܸܛܘܿܣ؟ ܟܠܲܢ ܠܵܐ ܚܕܝܼܪܲܢ ܒܚܲܕ ܪܘܼܚܵܐ؟ ܟܠܲܢ ܠܵܐ ܬܒܝܼܥ ܠܲܢ ܠܐܵܢܝܼ ܦܵܣܘܿܥܝܵܬܹ̈ܐ؟
TRL: Ṭleeb-lee min ṭiṭoos date lkis lawkhoon, o shoediree akhoonan 'ameh. 'oelde-leh ilawkhoon ṭiṭoos? Klan la khdeeran bkhad roekha? Klan la tbee' lan lanee pasoo'yate?
ENG: I exhorted Titus, and I sent the brother with him. Did Titus take any advantage of you? walked we not by the same Spirit? walked we not in the same steps?

ASY: ܟܠܵܗ̇ ܐܵܗܵܐ ܥܕܵܢܵܐ ܒܸܚܫܵܒ݂ܵܐ ܝܬܘܿܢ ܕܡܲܕܘܼܪܹܐ ܝܘܲܚ ܓ̰ܘܼܘܵܒ ܐܸܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ؟ ܗܲܡܙܘܼܡܹܐ ܝܘܲܚ ܩܵܕ݇ܡ ܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ ܒܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ، ܘܒܸܥܒ݂ܵܕܵܐ ܝܘܲܚ ܟܠܲܝܗܝ ܡܸܢܕܝܼܵܢܹ̈ܐ، ܡܘܼܚܸܒܝܼ̈، ܠܒܢܵܝܬܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ.
TRL: Klaha aha 'dana bikhshawa ytoon dmadoere ywakh joewab ilawkhoon? Hamzoeme ywakh qam Alaha bmsheekha, o bi'wada ywakh klayhy mindeeane, moekhibee, lbnaytawkhoon.
ENG: Ye think all this time that we are excusing ourselves unto you. In the sight of God speak we in Christ. But all things, beloved, are for your edifying.

ASY: ܣܵܒܵܒ ܒܸܙܕܵܥܵܐ ܝܘܸܢ ܩܵܘܡܵܐ ܐܝܼܡܲܢ ܕܐܵܬܹܝܢ ܠܵܐ ܚܵܙܹܝܢܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܕܵܐܟ݂ܝܼ ܕܒܵܣܡܵܐ ܠܝܼ، ܘܐܲܚܬܘܿܢ ܠܵܐ ܚܵܙܹܝܬܘܿܢ ܠܝܼ ܕܵܐܟ݂ܝܼ ܕܒܵܣܡܵܐ ܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ. ܒܸܙܕܵܥܵܐ ܝܘܸܢ ܕܗܵܘܝܵܐ ܡܲܩܲܪܵܨܘܼܬܵܐ، ܘܒܲܚܸܠܵܢܘܼܬܵܐ، ܘܟܲܪܒܵܐ، ܘܥܸܨܝܵܢܵܐ، ܘܡܹܐܟܲܠܩܲܪܨܵܐ، ܘܗܹܡܸܙܡܵܢ ܣܦܝܼܩܬܵܐ، ܘܚܬܝܼܪܘܼܬܵܐ، ܘܫܓ݂ܘܼܫܝܵܐ.
TRL: Sabab bizda'a ywin qawma eeman dateyn la khazeynawkhoon dakhee dbasma-lee, o akhtoon la khazeytoon-lee dakhee dbasma lawkhoon. Bizda'a ywin dhawya maqaraṣoeta, o bakhilanoeta, o karba, o 'iṣyana, o mekalqarṣa, o hemizman speeqta, o khteeroeta, o shghoeshya.
ENG: For I fear, lest by any means, when I come, I should find you not such as I would, and should myself be found of you such as ye would not; lest by any means there should be strife, jealousy, wraths, factions, backbitings, whisperings, swellings, tumults;

ASY: ܒܸܙܕܵܥܵܐ ܝܘܸܢ ܕܐܝܼܡܲܢ ܕܐܵܬܹܝܢ ܠܟܸܣ ܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܡܸܢܕܪܸܫ ܐܲܠܵܗܝܼ ܡܲܡܟܸܟ݂ ܠܝܼ ܩܵܕ݇ܡܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ، ܘܥܵܒ݂ܕܹܢ ܬܵܥܙܝܼ ܥܲܠ ܪܵܒܵܐ ܐܲܝܢܝܼ ܕܚܛܹܐ ܠܗܘܿܢ ܡ̣ܢ ܩܵܕ݇ܡܵܝܬܵܐ ܘܗܹܫ ܠܹܐ ܝܢܵܐ ܬܘܼܘܸܒܹܐ ܡ̣ܢ ܛܲܢܦܘܼܬܵܐ، ܘܙܵܢܝܘܼܬܵܐ، ܘܫܪܝܼܚܘܼܬܵܐ ܕܥܒ݂ܝܼܕ ܠܗܘܿܢ.
TRL: Bizda'a ywin deeman dateyn lkis lawkhoon mindrish alahee mamkikh-lee qamawkhoon, o 'awden ta'zee 'al raba aynee dkhṭe-lhoon min qamayta o hesh le yna toewibe min ṭanpoeta, o zanyoeta, o shreekhoeta d'weed-lhoon.
ENG: lest, when I come again, my God should humble me before you, and I should mourn for many of them that have sinned heretofore, and repented not of the uncleanness and fornication and lasciviousness which they committed.

ASY: ܐܵܗܵܐ ܓܵܗܵܐ ܕܬܠܵܬ ܝܼܠܵܗ̇ ܕܒܹܐܬܵܝܵܐ ܝܘܸܢ ܠܟܸܣ ܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ. ܟܠ ܚܲܕ ܡܸܢܕܝܼ ܒܸܬ ܦܵܐܹܫ ܡܘܼܣܒܸܬܵܐ ܒܝܲܕ ܗܹܡܸܙܡܵܢ ܕܬܪܹܝ ܝܲܢ ܬܠܵܬܵܐ ܣܵܗܕܹ̈ܐ.
TRL: Aha gaha dtlat eelaha dbetaya ywin lkis lawkhoon. Kl khad mindee bit paesh moesbita byad hemizman dtrey yan tlata sahde.
ENG: This is the third time I am coming to you. At the mouth of two witnesses or three shall every word be established.

ASY: ܡ̣ܢ ܩܵܕ݇ܡܵܝܬܵܐ ܐ݇ܡܝܼܪܝܼ ܐܸܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܐܝܼܡܲܢ ܕܝܼܘܸܢ ܗ݇ܘܵܐ ܠܟܸܣ ܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܓܵܗܵܐ ܕܬܲܪܬܹܝ، ܘܐܵܕܝܼܵܐ ܒܹܐܡܵܪܵܐ ܝܘܸܢ ܟܲܕ ܐܵܢܵܐ ܪܸܚܩܵܐ ܡܸܢܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ، ܕܐܸܢ ܐܵܬܹܝܢ ܡܸܢܕܪܸܫ ܠܹܐ ܚܵܣܟܹܢ ܠܐܵܢܝܼ ܕܚܛܹܐ ܠܗܘܿܢ ܡ̣ܢ ܩܵܕ݇ܡܵܝܬܵܐ ܘܐܘܼܦ ܠܟܠܲܝܗܝ ܐ݇ܚܹܪ̈݇ܢܹܐ ܡܸܢܲܝܗܝ،
TRL: Min qamayta meeree ilawkhoon eeman deewin wa lkis lawkhoon gaha dtartey, o adeea bemara ywin kad ana rikhqa minawkhoon, din ateyn mindrish le khasken lanee dkhṭe-lhoon min qamayta o oep lklayhy khene minayhy,
ENG: I have said beforehand, and I do say beforehand, as when I was present the second time, so now, being absent, to them that have sinned heretofore, and to all the rest, that, if I come again, I will not spare;

ASY: ܣܵܒܵܒ ܒܸܛܠܵܒܵܐ ܝܬܘܿܢ ܣܵܒܸܬܘܼܬܵܐ ܡܸܢܝܼ ܕܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ ܗܲܡܙܘܼܡܹܐ ܝܠܹܗ ܒܝܼܝܼ، ܗ̇ܘ ܕܠܹܐ ܝܠܹܗ ܙܲܒܘܼܢ ܒܝܼܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܐܸܠܵܐ ܚܲܝܠܵܢܵܐ ܝܠܹܗ ܓܵܘܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ.
TRL: Sabab biṭlaba ytoon sabitoeta minee dmsheekha hamzoeme-yleh beeee, haw dle-yleh zaboen beeawkhoon ila khaylana-yleh gawawkhoon.
ENG: seeing that ye seek a proof of Christ that speaketh in me; who to you-ward is not weak, but is powerful in you:

ASY: ܐܘܼܦ ܐܸܢ ܕܦܝܼܫ ܠܹܗ ܙܩܝܼܦܵܐ ܒܙܲܒܘܼܢܘܼܬܵܐ، ܐܝܼܢܵܐ ܒܸܚܵܝܵܐ ܝܠܹܗ ܒܚܲܝܠܵܐ ܕܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ. ܐܘܼܦ ܐܲܚܢܲܢ ܙܲܒܘܼܢ ܝܼܘܲܚ ܒܝܼܹܗ، ܐܝܼܢܵܐ ܒܸܬ ܚܵܝܲܚ ܥܲܡܹܗ ܒܚܲܝܠܵܐ ܕܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ، ܕܦܵܠܚܲܚ ܐܸܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ.
TRL: Oep in dpeesh-leh zqeepa bzaboenoeta, eena bikhaya-yleh bkhayla dalaha. Oep akhnan zaboen eewakh bee-eh, eena bit khayakh 'ameh bkhayla dalaha, dpalkhakh ilawkhoon.
ENG: for he was crucified through weakness, yet he liveth through the power of God. For we also are weak in him, but we shall live with him through the power of God toward you.

ASY: ܨܲܚܨܹܝܡܘܼܢ ܓܵܢܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܘܚܙܹܝܡܘܼܢ ܐܸܢ ܒܗܲܝܡܵܢܘܼܬܵܐ ܝܬܘܿܢ. ܬܲܦ̮ܬܸܫܘܼܢ ܓܵܢܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ. ܠܹܐ ܝܬܘܿܢ ܒܝܼܕܵܥܵܐ ܕܝܼܫܘܿܥ ܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ ܓܵܘܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܝܼܠܹܗ، ܐܸܠܵܐ ܐܸܢ ܢܵܦܠܝܼܬܘܿܢ ܒܨܲܚܨܵܝܬܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ؟
TRL: Ṣakhṣeymoen ganawkhoon o khzeymoen in bhaymanoeta ytoon. Tawtishoen ganawkhoon. Le ytoon beeda'a deeshoo' msheekha gawawkhoon eeleh, ila in napleetoon bṣakhṣaytawkhoon?
ENG: Try your own selves, whether ye be in the faith; prove your own selves. Or know ye not as to your own selves, that Jesus Christ is in you? unless indeed ye be reprobate.

ASY: ܐܝܼܢܵܐ ܐܝܼܬ ܠܝܼ ܗܹܒ݂ܝܼ ܕܒܸܬ ܝܵܕܥܝܼܬܘܿܢ ܕܠܵܐ ܢܦܝܼܠ ܠܲܢ ܒܨܲܚܨܵܝܬܵܐ.
TRL: Eena eet-lee hewee dbit yad'eetoon dla npeel lan bṣakhṣayta.
ENG: But I hope that ye shall know that we are not reprobate.

ASY: ܨܲܠܘܼܝܹܐ ܝܘܲܚ ܠܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ ܕܠܵܐ ܥܵܒ݂ܕܝܼܬܘܿܢ ܡܸܢܕܝܼ ܚܸܪܒܵܐ، ܠܵܐ ܕܡܲܒܝܸܢܲܚ ܡܘܼܢܬܝܼܹܐ ܒܨܲܚܨܵܝܬܲܢ، ܐܝܼܢܵܐ ܕܥܵܒ݂ܕܝܼܬܘܿܢ ܡܸܢܕܝܼ ܛܵܒ݂ܵܐ، ܐܘܼܦ ܐܸܢ ܕܐ݇ܢܵܫܹ̈ܐ ܚܵܫܒ݂ܝܼ ܕܢܦܝܼܠ ܠܲܢ،
TRL: Ṣaloeye ywakh lalaha dla 'awdeetoon mindee khirba, la dmabyinakh moentee-e bṣakhṣaytan, eena d'awdeetoon mindee ṭawa, oep in dnashe khashwee dnpeel lan,
ENG: Now we pray to God that ye do no evil; not that we may appear approved, but that ye may do that which is honourable, though we be as reprobate.

ASY: ܣܵܒܵܒ ܠܹܐ ܡܵܨܲܚ ܥܵܒ݂ܕܲܚ ܡܸܢܕܝܼ ܕܲܠܩܘܼܒ݂ܠ ܕܫܪܵܪܵܐ ܐܸܠܵܐ ܠܓܹܒܵܐ ܕܫܪܵܪܵܐ.
TRL: Sabab le maṣakh 'awdakh mindee dalqoewl dshrara ila lgeba dshrara.
ENG: For we can do nothing against the truth, but for the truth.

ASY: ܒܸܚܕܵܝܵܐ ܝܘܲܚ ܐܝܼܡܲܢ ܕܐܲܚܢܲܢ ܙܲܒܘܼܢ ܝܼܘܲܚ ܐܝܼܢܵܐ ܐܲܚܬܘܿܢ ܚܲܝܠܵܢܹ̈ܐ ܝܬܘܿܢ. ܘܐܘܼܦ ܨܲܠܘܼܝܹܐ ܝܘܲܚ ܕܗܵܘܹܝܬܘܿܢ ܓܡܝܼܪܹ̈ܐ.
TRL: Bikhdaya ywakh eeman dakhnan zaboen eewakh eena akhtoon khaylane ytoon. O oep ṣaloeye ywakh dhaweytoon gmeere.
ENG: For we rejoice, when we are weak, and ye are strong: this we also pray for, even your perfecting.

ASY: ܒܘܼܬ ܐܵܗܵܐ ܒܸܟܬܵܒ݂ܵܐ ܝܘܸܢ ܐܲܢܹܐ ܟܲܕ ܐܵܢܵܐ ܪܸܚܩܵܐ، ܕܐܝܼܡܲܢ ܕܐܵܬܹܝܢ ܠܵܐ ܗܵܘܹܝܢ ܩܸܫܝܵܐ ܒܫܘܼܠܛܵܢܝܼ ܥܲܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ، ܐܲܝܢܝܼ ܕܡܵܪܲܢ ܝܘܼܗ݇ܒܸܠ ܠܹܗ ܐܸܠܝܼ ܠܒܢܵܝܬܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܘܠܵܐ ܠܬܠܵܚܬܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ.
TRL: Boet aha biktawa ywin ane kad ana rikhqa, deeman dateyn la haweyn qishya bshoelṭanee 'alawkhoon, aynee dmaran yoebil-leh ilee lbnaytawkhoon o la ltlakhtawkhoon.
ENG: For this cause I write these things while absent, that I may not when present deal sharply, according to the authority which the Lord gave me for building up, and not for casting down.

ASY: ܒܚܲܪܬܵܐ ܐܲܚܘܿܢܘܵܬܝܼ̈، ܚܕܹܝܡܘܼܢ، ܗܘܹܝܡܘܼܢ ܓܡܝܼܪܹ̈ܐ، ܦܘܼܫܘܼܢ ܠܸܒܵܢܹ̈ܐ، ܗܘܹܝܡܘܼܢ ܒܚܲܕ ܪܸܥܝܵܢܵܐ، ܚܝܹܝܡܘܼܢ ܒܫܠܵܡܵܐ، ܘܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ ܕܚܘܼܒܵܐ ܘܕܫܠܵܡܵܐ ܗܵܘܹܐ ܥܲܡܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ.
TRL: Bkharta akhoonwatee, khdeymoen, hweymoen gmeere, poeshoen libane, hweymoen bkhad ri'yana, khyeymoen bshlama, o Alaha dkhoeba o dshlama hawe 'amawkhoon.
ENG: Finally, brethren, farewell. Be perfected; be comforted; be of the same mind; live in peace: and the God of love and peace shall be with you.

ASY: ܕܪܹܝܡܘܼܢ ܫܠܵܡܵܐ ܚܲܕ ܠܗ̇ܘ ܐ݇ܚܹܪ݇ܢܵܐ ܒܢܫܘܼܩܬܵܐ ܩܲܕܝܼܫܬܵܐ.
TRL: Dreymoen shlama khad lhaw khena bnshoeqta qadeeshta.
ENG: Salute one another with a holy kiss.

ASY: ܒܝܼܵܗ݇ܒ݂ܵܐ ܝܢܵܐ ܫܠܵܡܵܐ ܐܸܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܟܠܲܝܗܝ ܩܲܕܝܼܫܹ̈ܐ.
TRL: Beeawa yna shlama ilawkhoon klayhy qadeeshe.
ENG: All the saints salute you.

ASY: ܫܵܦܵܩܲܬ ܕܡܵܪܲܢ ܝܼܫܘܿܥ ܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ، ܘܚܘܼܒܵܐ ܕܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ، ܘܫܲܪܝܼܟܘܼܬܵܐ ܕܪܘܼܚܵܐ ܕܩܘܼܕܫܵܐ ܥܲܡ ܟܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ. ܐܵܡܹܝܢ.
TRL: Shapaqat dmaran eeshoo' msheekha, o khoeba dalaha, o shareekoeta droekha dqoedsha 'am klawkhoon. Ameyn.
ENG: The grace of the Lord Jesus Christ, and the love of God, and the communion of the Holy Ghost, be with you all.

ASY: ܦܵܘܠܘܿܣ، ܫܠܝܼܚܵܐ، ܠܵܐ ܡ̣ܢ ܒܢܲܝ̈ܢܵܫܵܐ ܘܠܵܐ ܒܝܲܕ ܒܲܪܢܵܫܵܐ، ܐܸܠܵܐ ܒܝܲܕ ܝܼܫܘܿܥ ܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ ܘܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ ܒܵܒܵܐ، ܗ̇ܘ ܕܡܘܼܩܸܡ ܠܹܗ ܡ̣ܢ ܓܵܘ ܡܝܼܬܹ̈ܐ،
TRL: Pawloos, shleekha, la min bnaynasha o la byad barnasha, ila byad eeshoo' msheekha o Alaha baba, haw dmoeqim-leh min gaw meete,
ENG: Paul, an apostle (not from men, neither through man, but through Jesus Christ, and God the Father, who raised him from the dead),

ASY: ܘܟܠܲܝܗܝ ܐܲܚܘܿܢܘܵܬܹ̈ܐ ܕܥܲܡܝܼ ܝܢܵܐ، ܠܥܹܕܵܬܹ̈ܐ ܕܓܵܘ ܓܵܠܵܛܝܼܵܐ:
TRL: O klayhy akhoonwate d'amee yna, l'edate dgaw galaṭeea:
ENG: and all the brethren which are with me, unto the churches of Galatia:

ASY: ܫܵܦܵܩܲܬ ܘܫܠܵܡܵܐ ܐܸܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܡ̣ܢ ܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ ܒܵܒܲܢ ܘܡ̣ܢ ܡܵܪܲܢ ܝܼܫܘܿܥ ܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ،
TRL: Shapaqat o shlama ilawkhoon min Alaha baban o min Maran eeshoo' msheekha,
ENG: Grace to you and peace from God the Father, and our Lord Jesus Christ,

ASY: ܗ̇ܘ ܕܝܘܼܗ݇ܒܸܠ ܠܹܗ ܓܵܢܹܗ ܡ̣ܢ ܓܹܒܵܐ ܕܚܛܝܼܵܬܲܢ̈ ܕܦܲܨܹܐ ܠܲܢ ܡ̣ܢ ܐܵܗܵܐ ܙܲܒ݂ܢܵܐ ܒܝܼܫܵܐ، ܐܲܝܟ݂ ܨܸܒ݂ܝܵܢܵܐ ܕܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ ܒܵܒܲܢ.
TRL: Haw dyoebil-leh ganeh min geba dkhṭeeatan dpaṣe lan min aha zawna beesha, aykh ṣiwyana dalaha baban.
ENG: who gave himself for our sins, that he might deliver us out of this present evil world, according to the will of our God and Father:

ASY: ܐܸܠܹܗ ܫܘܼܒ݂ܚܵܐ ܠܥܵܠܲܡ ܥܵܠܡܝܼܢ. ܐܵܡܹܝܢ.
TRL: Ileh shoewkha l'alam 'almeen. Ameyn.
ENG: to whom be the glory for ever and ever. Amen.

ASY: ܥܲܓ̰ܘܼܒܹܐ ܝܘܸܢ ܕܵܐܟ݂ܝܼ ܒܓ̰ܲܠܕܘܼܬܵܐ ܩܠܝܼܒ ܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܡ̣ܢ ܗ̇ܘ ܕܩܪܹܐ ܠܹܗ ܐܸܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܒܫܵܦܵܩܲܬ ܕܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ، ܘܬܒܝܼܥ ܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܠܚܲܕ ܐܹܘܲܢܓܲܠܝܼܘܿܢ ܦܪܝܼܫܵܐ،
TRL: 'Ajoebe ywin dakhee bjaldoeta qleeb lawkhoon min haw dqre-leh ilawkhoon bshapaqat dmsheekha, o tbee' lawkhoon lkhad ewangaleeoon preesha,
ENG: I marvel that ye are so quickly removing from him that called you in the grace of Christ unto a different gospel;

ASY: ܐܲܝܢܝܼ ܕܠܹܐ ܝܠܹܗ ܐܹܘܲܢܓܲܠܝܼܘܿܢ، ܐܝܼܢܵܐ ܐܝܼܬ ܐ݇ܢܵܫܹ̈ܐ ܕܒܸܚܒ݂ܵܛܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܝܼܢܵܐ ܘܒܵܥܝܼ ܕܫܲܚܠܸܦܝܼ ܐܹܘܲܢܓܲܠܝܼܘܿܢ ܕܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ.
TRL: Aynee dle-yleh ewangaleeoon, eena eet nashe dbikhwaṭawkhoon eena o ba'ee dshakhlipee ewangaleeoon dmsheekha.
ENG: which is not another gospel: only there are some that trouble you, and would pervert the gospel of Christ.

ASY: ܐܘܼܦ ܐܸܢ ܕܐܲܚܢܲܢ ܝܲܢ ܡܲܠܲܐܟ݂ܵܐ ܡ̣ܢ ܫܡܲܝܵܐ ܡܲܟܪܸܙ ܐܸܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܚܲܕ ܐܹܘܲܢܓܲܠܝܼܘܿܢ ܐ݇ܚܹܪ݇ܢܵܐ ܫܒ݂ܘܿܩ ܡ̣ܢ ܗ̇ܘ ܕܡܘܼܟܪܸܙ ܠܲܢ ܐܸܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ، ܗܵܘܹܐ ܡܘܼܚܪܸܡܵܐ.
TRL: Oep in dakhnan yan malakha min shmaya makriz ilawkhoon khad ewangaleeoon khena shwooq min haw dmoekriz lan ilawkhoon, hawe moekhrima.
ENG: But though we, or an angel from heaven, should preach unto you any gospel other than that which we preached unto you, let him be anathema.

ASY: ܐܝܼܢܵܐ ܐܲܝܟ݂ ܕܐ݇ܡܝܼܪܲܢ ܡ̣ܢ ܩܵܕ݇ܡܵܝܬܵܐ ܘܒܹܐܡܵܪܵܐ ܝܘܸܢ ܐܘܼܦ ܐܵܕܝܼܵܐ، ܐܸܢ ܚܲܕ ܡܲܟܪܸܙ ܐܸܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܚܲܕ ܐܹܘܲܢܓܲܠܝܼܘܿܢ ܐ݇ܚܹܪ݇ܢܵܐ ܫܒ݂ܘܿܩ ܡ̣ܢ ܗ̇ܘ ܕܩܘܼܒܸܠ ܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ، ܗܵܘܹܐ ܡܘܼܚܪܸܡܵܐ.
TRL: Eena aykh dmeeran min qamayta o bemara ywin oep adeea, in khad makriz ilawkhoon khad ewangaleeoon khena shwooq min haw dqoebil lawkhoon, hawe moekhrima.
ENG: As we have said before, so say I now again, If any man preacheth unto you any gospel other than that which ye received, let him be anathema.

ASY: ܡܘܿܕܝܼ ܒܸܚܫܵܒ݂ܵܐ ܝܬܘܿܢ، ܓ̰ܲܪܘܼܒܹܐ ܝܘܸܢ ܕܥܵܒ݂ܕܹܢ ܪܵܙܝܼ ܠܐ݇ܢܵܫܹ̈ܐ ܝܲܢ ܠܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ؟ ܝܲܢ ܓ̰ܲܪܘܼܒܹܐ ܝܘܸܢ ܕܫܵܦܪܹܢ ܠܐ݇ܢܵܫܹ̈ܐ؟ ܐܸܢ ܗܹܫ ܓ̰ܲܪܒܸܢ ܗ݇ܘܵܐ ܠܸܫܦܵܪܵܐ ܠܐ݇ܢܵܫܹ̈ܐ، ܒܲܣ ܠܹܐ ܗܵܘܹܝܢ ܗ݇ܘܵܐ ܪܹܓܵܐ ܕܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ.
TRL: Moodee bikhshawa ytoon, jaroebe ywin d'awden razee lnashe yan lalaha? Yan jaroebe ywin dshapren lnashe? In hesh jarbin wa lishpara lnashe, bas le haweyn wa rega dmsheekha.
ENG: For am I now persuading men, or God? or am I seeking to please men? if I were still pleasing men, I should not be a servant of Christ.

ASY: ܒܵܥܹܝܢ ܕܝܵܕܥܝܼܬܘܿܢ ܐܲܚܘܿܢܘܵܬܹ̈ܐ، ܕܐܹܘܲܢܓܲܠܝܼܘܿܢ ܕܡܘܼܟܪܸܙ ܠܝܼ ܠܹܐ ܝܠܹܗ ܡ̣ܢ ܒܢܲܝ̈ܢܵܫܵܐ،
TRL: Ba'eyn dyad'eetoon akhoonwate, dewangaleeoon dmoekriz-lee le-yleh min bnaynasha,
ENG: For I make known to you, brethren, as touching the gospel which was preached by me, that it is not after man.

ASY: ܣܵܒܵܒ ܠܵܐ ܩܘܼܒܸܠ ܠܝܼ ܡ̣ܢ ܐܘܼܦ ܚܲܕ ܐ݇ܢܵܫܵܐ ܘܠܵܐ ܦܝܼܫ ܠܹܗ ܡܘܼܠܦܵܐ ܐܸܠܝܼ ܒܝܲܕ ܐ݇ܢܵܫܵܐ، ܐܸܠܵܐ ܩܘܼܒܸܠ ܠܝܼ ܒܓܸܠܝܵܢܵܐ ܡ̣ܢ ܝܼܫܘܿܥ ܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ.
TRL: Sabab la qoebil-lee min oep khad nasha o la peesh-leh moelpa ilee byad nasha, ila qoebil-lee bgilyana min eeshoo' msheekha.
ENG: For neither did I receive it from man, nor was I taught it, but it came to me through revelation of Jesus Christ.

ASY: ܫܡܝܼܥܹܐ ܝܬܘܿܢ ܒܘܼܬ ܚܲܝܝܼ̈ ܡ̣ܢ ܩܵܕ݇ܡܵܝܬܵܐ ܒܝܗܘܼܕܵܝܘܼܬܵܐ، ܕܵܐܟ݂ܝܼ ܒܚܲܡܝܼܡܘܼܬܵܐ ܟܘܼܡܸܪܝܼ ܠܥܹܕܬܵܐ ܕܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ ܘܓ̰ܘܼܪܸܒ ܠܝܼ ܕܛܲܠܩܸܢ ܗ݇ܘܵܐ ܠܵܗ̇.
TRL: Shmee'e ytoon boet khayee min qamayta byhoedayoeta, dakhee bkhameemoeta koemiree l'edta dalaha o joerib-lee dṭalqin wa-laha.
ENG: For ye have heard of my manner of life in time past in the Jews’ religion, how that beyond measure I persecuted the church of God, and made havock of it:

ASY: ܘܪܵܒܵܐ ܡܘܼܢܬܹܐ ܠܝܼ ܒܬܵܘܕܝܼܬܵܐ ܕܝܗܘܼܕܵܝܘܼܬܵܐ، ܒܘܼܫ ܙܵܘܕܵܐ ܡ̣ܢ ܪܵܒܵܐ ܚܲܒ݂ܪ̈ܵܘܵܬܝܼ ܕܒܫܸܢܹ̈ܐ ܕܝܼܝܼ، ܡ̣ܢ ܒܢܲܝ̈ ܓܸܢܣܝܼ، ܘܪܵܒܵܐ ܛܲܢܵܢܵܐ ܝܘܸܢ ܗ݇ܘܵܐ ܒܣܲܦܝܵܢܘܼܬܵܐ ܕܐܲܒ݂ܵܗܵܬܝܼ̈.
TRL: O raba moente-lee btawdeeta dyhoedayoeta, boesh zawda min raba khawrawatee dbshine deeee, min bnay ginsee, o raba ṭanana ywin wa bsapyanoeta dawahatee.
ENG: and I advanced in the Jews’ religion beyond many of mine own age among my countrymen, being more exceedingly zealous for the traditions of my fathers.

ASY: ܐܝܼܢܵܐ ܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ، ܗ̇ܘ ܕܩܲܡ ܦܵܪܹܫ ܠܝܼ ܡ̣ܢ ܟܹܪ݇ܣܵܐ ܕܝܸܡܝܼ ܘܩܲܡ ܩܵܪܹܐ ܠܝܼ ܒܫܵܦܵܩܲܬܹܗ، ܒܣܝܼܡ ܠܵܗ̇ ܠܹܗ
TRL: Eena Alaha, haw dqam paresh-lee min kesa dyimee o qam qare-lee bshapaqateh, bseem-laha-leh
ENG: But when it was the good pleasure of God, who separated me, even from my mother’s womb, and called me through his grace,

ASY: ܕܓܵܠܹܐ ܒܪܘܿܢܹܗ ܒܝܼܝܼ، ܕܡܲܟܪܸܙܸܢ ܒܘܼܬ ܕܝܼܹܗ ܓܵܘ ܐܸܡܘܵܬܹ̈ܐ. ܠܵܐ ܥܒ݂ܝܼܕ ܠܝܼ ܡܸܠܟܵܐ ܗܲܪ ܒܗ̇ܝ ܥܕܵܢܵܐ ܥܲܡ ܐ݇ܢܵܫܵܐ،
TRL: Dgale brooneh beeee, dmakrizin boet dee-eh gaw imwate. La 'weed-lee milka har bhay 'dana 'am nasha,
ENG: to reveal his Son in me, that I might preach him among the Gentiles; immediately I conferred not with flesh and blood:

ASY: ܘܐܘܼܦ ܠܵܐ ܐ݇ܣܝܼܩ ܠܝܼ ܠܐܘܿܪܸܫܠܸܡ ܕܚܵܙܹܝܢ ܗ݇ܘܵܐ ܠܐܵܢܝܼ ܕܗܘܝܼܹܐ ܝܗ݇ܘܵܘ ܫܠܝܼܚܹ̈ܐ ܡ̣ܢ ܩܵܕ݇ܡ ܕܝܼܝܼ، ܐܸܠܵܐ ܐ݇ܙܝܼܠ ܠܝܼ ܠܐܵܪܵܒܝܼܵܐ ܘܕܝܼܪܝܼ ܡܸܢܕܪܸܫ ܠܕܲܪܡܣܘܿܩ.
TRL: O oep la seeq-lee loorishlim dkhazeyn wa lanee dhwee-e ywaw shleekhe min qam deeee, ila zeel-lee larabeea o deeree mindrish ldarmsooq.
ENG: neither went I up to Jerusalem to them which were apostles before me: but I went away into Arabia; and again I returned unto Damascus.

ASY: ܗ̇ܝܓܵܗ ܡ̣ܢ ܒܵܬ݇ܪ ܬܠܵܬ ܫܸܢܹ̈ܐ ܐ݇ܣܝܼܩ ܠܝܼ ܠܐܘܿܪܸܫܠܸܡ ܠܸܚܙܵܝܵܐ ܠܫܸܡܥܘܿܢ ܟܹܐܦܵܐ، ܘܦܝܼܫ ܠܝܼ ܠܟܸܣ ܠܹܗ ܚܲܡܫܲܥܣܲܪ ܝܵܘܡܵܢܹ̈ܐ.
TRL: Haygah min bar tlat shine seeq-lee loorishlim likhzaya lshim'oon kepa, o peesh-lee lkis-leh khamsha'sar yawmane.
ENG: Then after three years I went up to Jerusalem to visit Cephas, and tarried with him fifteen days.

ASY: ܠܵܐ ܚܙܹܐ ܠܝܼ ܠܫܠܝܼܚܹ̈ܐ ܐ݇ܚܹܪ̈݇ܢܹܐ ܫܒ݂ܘܿܩ ܡ̣ܢ ܝܲܥܩܘܿܒ݂ ܐܲܚܘܿܢܵܐ ܕܡܵܪܲܢ.
TRL: La khze-lee lshleekhe khene shwooq min ya'qoow akhoona dmaran.
ENG: But other of the apostles saw I none, save James the Lord’s brother.

ASY: ܒܸܟܬܵܒ݂ܵܐ ܝܘܸܢ ܐܲܢܹܐ ܐܸܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ، ܗܵܐ، ܩܵܕ݇ܡ ܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ، ܠܹܐ ܝܘܸܢ ܕܲܓܘܼܠܹܐ.
TRL: Biktawa ywin ane ilawkhoon, ha, qam Alaha, le ywin dagoele.
ENG: Now touching the things which I write unto you, behold, before God, I lie not.

ASY: ܡ̣ܢ ܒܵܬ݇ܪ ܐܵܗܵܐ ܐ݇ܙܝܼܠ ܠܝܼ ܠܬܚܘܼܡܹ̈ܐ ܕܣܘܼܪܝܼܵܐ ܘܕܩܝܼܠܝܼܩܝܼܵܐ.
TRL: Min bar aha zeel-lee ltkhoeme dsoereea o dqeeleeqeea.
ENG: Then I came into the regions of Syria and Cilicia.

ASY: ܦܲܪܨܘܿܦܵܐܝܼܬ ܠܹܐ ܝܘܸܢ ܗ݇ܘܵܐ ܦܝܼܫܵܐ ܝ݇ܕܝܼܥܵܐ ܒܥܹܕܵܬܹ̈ܐ ܕܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ ܕܓܵܘ ܝܼܗܘܼܕ.
TRL: Parṣoopaeet le ywin wa peesha dee'a b'edate dmsheekha dgaw eehoed.
ENG: And I was still unknown by face unto the churches of Judaea which were in Christ:

ASY: ܐܲܚܟ̰ܝܼ ܗܲܕܟ݂ܵܐ ܝܗ݇ܘܵܘ ܫܡܝܼܥܹܐ ܒܘܼܬ ܕܝܼܝܼ، ”ܗ̇ܘ ܕܩܵܕ݇ܡܵܝܬܵܐ ܪܵܕܹܦ ܗ݇ܘܵܐ ܠܲܢ، ܐܵܕܝܼܵܐ ܡܲܟܪܘܼܙܹܐ ܝܠܹܗ ܗܲܝܡܵܢܘܼܬܵܐ ܕܒܵܥܹܐ ܗ݇ܘܵܐ ܠܡܲܚܪܘܼܒ݂ܘܼܗ̇.“
TRL: Akhchee hadkha ywaw shmee'e boet deeee, ”haw dqamayta radep wa lan, adeea makroeze-yleh haymanoeta dba'e wa lmakhroewoeha.“
ENG: but they only heard say, He that once persecuted us now preacheth the faith of which he once made havock;
