ASY: ܘܫܲܒܚܝܼ ܗ݇ܘܵܘ ܠܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ ܒܝܼܝܼ.
TRL: O shabkhee waw lalaha beeee.
ENG: and they glorified God in me.

ASY: ܡ̣ܢ ܒܵܬ݇ܪ ܐܲܪܒܲܥܣܲܪ ܫܸܢܹ̈ܐ ܡܸܢܕܪܸܫ ܐ݇ܣܝܼܩ ܠܝܼ ܠܐܘܿܪܸܫܠܸܡ ܥܲܡ ܒܲܪܢܒ݂ܵܐ، ܘܠܘܼܒܸܠ ܠܝܼ ܥܲܡܝܼ ܐܘܼܦ ܠܛܸܛܘܿܣ.
TRL: Min bar arba'sar shine mindrish seeq-lee loorishlim 'am barnwa, o loebil-lee 'amee oep lṭiṭoos.
ENG: Then after the space of fourteen years I went up again to Jerusalem with Barnabas, taking Titus also with me.

ASY: ܐ݇ܣܝܼܩ ܠܝܼ ܣܵܒܵܒ ܦܝܼܫ ܠܝܼ ܡܘܼܚܒܸܪܵܐ ܒܓܸܠܝܵܢܵܐ، ܘܡܘܼܕܸܥ ܠܝܼ ܐܸܠܲܝܗܝ ܐܹܘܲܢܓܲܠܝܼܘܿܢ ܕܡܲܟܪܘܼܙܹܗ ܝܘܸܢ ܗ݇ܘܵܐ ܓܵܘ ܐܸܡܘܵܬܹ̈ܐ، ܐܝܼܢܵܐ ܠܐܵܢܝܼ ܕܦܝܼܫܹܐ ܝܗ݇ܘܵܘ ܚܫܝܼܒܹܐ ܓܘܼܪ̈ܵܢܹܐ ܡܘܼܟܪܸܙ ܠܝܼ ܒܛܸܫܘܵܐ، ܕܠܵܐ ܗܵܘܝܵܐ ܕܗܵܘܹܝܢ ܦܠܝܼܚܵܐ ܝܲܢ ܦܵܠܚܹܢ ܒܣܪܝܼܩܘܼܬܵܐ.
TRL: seeq-lee sabab peesh-lee moekhbira bgilyana, o moedi' lee ilayhy ewangaleeoon dmakroezeh ywin wa gaw imwate, eena lanee dpeeshe ywaw khsheebe goerane moekriz-lee bṭishwa, dla hawya dhaweyn pleekha yan palkhen bsreeqoeta.
ENG: And I went up by revelation; and I laid before them the gospel which I preach among the Gentiles, but privately before them who were of repute, lest by any means I should be running, or had run, in vain.

ASY: ܐܝܼܢܵܐ ܐܘܼܦ ܛܸܛܘܿܣ ܕܝܼܗ݇ܘܵܐ ܥܲܡܝܼ، ܐܵܦܸܢ ܕܝܵܘܢܵܝܵܐ ܝܗ݇ܘܵܐ، ܠܵܐ ܦܝܼܫ ܠܹܗ ܡܘܼܠܝܸܨܵܐ ܕܦܵܐܹܫ ܓܙܝܼܪܵܐ.
TRL: Eena oep ṭiṭoos deewa 'amee, apin dyawnaya ywa, la peesh-leh moelyiṣa dpaesh gzeera.
ENG: But not even Titus who was with me, being a Greek, was compelled to be circumcised:

ASY: ܐܵܗܵܐ ܡܸܢܕܝܼ ܗܘܹܐ ܠܹܗ ܣܵܒܵܒ ܚܲܕ݇ܟܡܵܐ ܐܲܚܘܿܢܘܵܬܹ̈ܐ ܕܲܓܵܠܹ̈ܐ ܒܛܸܫܘܵܐ ܥܒ݂ܝܼܪܗܘܿܢ ܓܵܘܲܢ ܠܓܲܫܘܼܫܹܐ ܠܚܹܐܪܘܼܬܵܐ ܕܐܝܼܬ ܠܲܢ ܒܝܼܫܘܿܥ ܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ ܕܥܵܒ݂ܕܝܼ ܠܲܢ ܥܲܒ݂ܕܹ̈ܐ.
TRL: Aha mindee hwe-leh sabab khakma akhoonwate dagale bṭishwa 'weerhoon gawan lgashoeshe lkheroeta deet lan beeshoo' msheekha d'awdee lan 'awde.
ENG: and that because of the false brethren privily brought in, who came in privily to spy out our liberty which we have in Christ Jesus, that they might bring us into bondage:

ASY: ܐܝܼܢܵܐ ܐܘܼܦ ܚܕܵܐ ܣܵܥܲܬ ܠܵܐ ܦܝܼܫ ܠܲܢ ܙܲܒܛ ܐܸܠܲܝܗܝ، ܕܦܵܐܹܫ ܠܟܸܣ ܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܫܪܵܪܵܐ ܕܐܹܘܲܢܓܲܠܝܼܘܿܢ.
TRL: Eena oep khda sa'at la peesh lan zabṭ ilayhy, dpaesh lkis lawkhoon shrara dewangaleeoon.
ENG: to whom we gave place in the way of subjection, no, not for an hour; that the truth of the gospel might continue with you.

ASY: ܐܝܼܢܵܐ ܒܘܼܬ ܐܵܢܝܼ ܕܦܝܼܫܹܐ ܝܗ݇ܘܵܘ ܚܫܝܼܒܹܐ ܓܘܼܪ̈ܵܢܹܐ–ܟܠ ܡ̇ܢ ܕܝܼܗ݇ܘܵܘ ܐܵܢܵܐ ܠܹܐ ܝܘܸܢ ܬܲܚܡܘܼܢܹܐ، ܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ ܠܹܐ ܝܠܹܗ ܡܲܫܦܸܪܵܢܵܐ–ܐܲܢܹܐ ܐ݇ܢܵܫܹ̈ܐ ܠܵܐ ܡܘܼܙܝܸܕ ܠܗܘܿܢ ܡܸܢܕܝܼ ܐܸܠܝܼ،
TRL: Eena boet anee dpeeshe ywaw khsheebe goerane–kl man deewaw ana le ywin takhmoene, Alaha le-yleh mashpirana–ane nashe la moezyid-lhoon mindee ilee,
ENG: But from those who were reputed to be somewhat (whatsoever they were, it maketh no matter to me: God accepteth not man’s person)—they, I say, who were of repute imparted nothing to me:

ASY: ܐܝܼܢܵܐ ܝ݇ܕܝܼܥ ܠܗܘܿܢ ܕܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ ܣܘܼܦܹܐ ܠܹܗ ܐܸܠܝܼ ܕܡܲܟܪܸܙܸܢ ܐܹܘܲܢܓܲܠܝܼܘܿܢ ܠܐܸܡܘܵܬܹ̈ܐ، ܐܲܝܟ݂ ܕܫܸܡܥܘܿܢ ܟܹܐܦܵܐ ܦܝܼܫ ܠܹܗ ܣܘܼܦܝܵܐ ܐܹܘܲܢܓܲܠܝܼܘܿܢ ܕܡܲܟܪܸܙ ܠܝܗܘܼܕܵܝܹ̈ܐ.
TRL: Eena dee' lhoon dalaha soepe-leh ilee dmakrizin ewangaleeoon limwate, aykh dshim'oon kepa peesh-leh soepya ewangaleeoon dmakriz lyhoedaye.
ENG: but contrariwise, when they saw that I had been intrusted with the gospel of the uncircumcision, even as Peter with the gospel of the circumcision

ASY: ܣܵܒܵܒ ܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ، ܕܒܸܦܠܵܚܵܐ ܝܗ݇ܘܵܐ ܒܝܲܕ ܫܸܡܥܘܿܢ ܟܹܐܦܵܐ، ܫܠܝܼܚܵܐ ܩܵܐ ܝܗܘܼܕܵܝܹ̈ܐ، ܒܸܦܠܵܚܵܐ ܝܗ݇ܘܵܐ ܐܘܼܦ ܒܝܼܝܼ، ܫܠܝܼܚܵܐ ܩܵܐ ܐܸܡܘܵܬܹ̈ܐ.
TRL: Sabab Alaha, dbiplakha ywa byad shim'oon kepa, shleekha qa yhoedaye, biplakha ywa oep beeee, shleekha qa imwate.
ENG: (for he that wrought for Peter unto the apostleship of the circumcision wrought for me also unto the Gentiles);

ASY: ܘܗܲܕܟ݂ܵܐ ܝܲܥܩܘܿܒ݂ ܘܫܸܡܥܘܿܢ ܟܹܐܦܵܐ ܘܝܘܿܚܲܢܵܢ، ܕܦܝܼܫܹܐ ܝܗ݇ܘܵܘ ܝ݇ܕܝܼܥܹܐ ܣܛܘܼܢܹ̈ܐ، ܐܝܼܡܲܢ ܕܝ݇ܕܝܼܥ ܠܗܘܿܢ ܫܵܦܵܩܲܬ ܦܝܼܫܬܵܐ ܝܗ݇ܘܵܐ ܝܘܼܗ݇ܒܸܠܬܵܐ ܐܸܠܝܼ، ܝܘܼܗ݇ܒܸܠ ܠܗܘܿܢ ܐܸܠܝܼ ܘܠܒܲܪܢܒ݂ܵܐ ܐܝܼܕܵܐ ܕܫܲܪܝܼܟܘܼܬܵܐ. ܗ̇ܝܓܵܗ ܡܘܼܚܫܸܚ ܠܗܘܿܢ ܕܐܲܚܢܲܢ ܐܵܙܲܠ݇ܚ ܠܓܵܘ ܐܸܡܘܵܬܹ̈ܐ ܘܐܵܢܝܼ ܠܓܵܘ ܝܗܘܼܕܵܝܹ̈ܐ.
TRL: O hadkha ya'qoow o shim'oon kepa o yookhanan, dpeeshe ywaw dee'e sṭoene, eeman ddee' lhoon shapaqat peeshta ywa yoebilta ilee, yoebil-lhoon ilee o lbarnwa eeda dshareekoeta. Haygah moekhshikh-lhoon dakhnan azakh lgaw imwate o anee lgaw yhoedaye.
ENG: and when they perceived the grace that was given unto me, James and Cephas and John, they who were reputed to be pillars, gave to me and Barnabas the right hands of fellowship, that we should go unto the Gentiles, and they unto the circumcision;

ASY: ܐܲܚܟ̰ܝܼ ܛܠܝܼܒ ܠܗܘܿܢ ܡܸܢܲܢ ܕܕܵܟ݂ܪܲܚ ܠܡܸܣܟܹܢܹ̈ܐ، ܗܲܪ ܗ̇ܘ ܡܸܢܕܝܼ ܕܐܵܢܵܐ ܒܵܥܹܝܢ ܗ݇ܘܵܐ ܠܸܥܒ݂ܵܕܵܐ.
TRL: Akhchee ṭleeb-lhoon minan ddakhrakh lmiskene, har haw mindee dana ba'eyn wa li'wada.
ENG: only they would that we should remember the poor; which very thing I was also zealous to do.

ASY: ܐܝܼܢܵܐ ܐܝܼܡܲܢ ܕܐ݇ܬܹܐ ܠܹܗ ܫܸܡܥܘܿܢ ܟܹܐܦܵܐ ܠܐܵܢܛܝܘܿܟ݂ܝ، ܡܘܼܢܟܸܣ ܠܝܼ ܐܸܠܹܗ ܓܵܘ ܦܵܬܹܗ ܣܵܒܵܒ ܡܵܪܹܐ ܓܢܵܗܵܐ ܝܗ݇ܘܵܐ.
TRL: Eena eeman dte-leh shim'oon kepa lanṭyookhy, moenkis-lee ileh gaw pateh sabab mare gnaha ywa.
ENG: But when Cephas came to Antioch, I resisted him to the face, because he stood condemned.

ASY: ܣܵܒܵܒ ܡ̣ܢ ܩܵܕ݇ܡ ܕܐܵܬܝܼ ܗ݇ܘܵܘ ܚܲܕ݇ܟܡܵܐ ܐ݇ܢܵܫܹ̈ܐ ܡ̣ܢ ܠܟܸܣ ܝܲܥܩܘܿܒ݂، ܟܹܐ ܐܵܟܹܠ ܗ݇ܘܵܐ ܥܲܡ ܐܸܡܘܵܬܹ̈ܐ، ܐܝܼܢܵܐ ܐܝܼܡܲܢ ܕܐ݇ܬܹܐ ܠܗܘܿܢ، ܓܪܝܼܫܵܐ ܠܹܗ ܓܵܢܹܗ ܘܦܪܝܼܫ ܠܹܗ ܡܸܢܲܝܗܝ ܣܵܒܵܒ ܒܸܙܕܵܥܵܐ ܝܗ݇ܘܵܐ ܡ̣ܢ ܝܗܘܼܕܵܝܹ̈ܐ.
TRL: Sabab min qam datee waw khakma nashe min lkis ya'qoow, ke akel wa 'am imwate, eena eeman dte-lhoon, greesha-leh ganeh o preesh-leh minayhy sabab bizda'a ywa min yhoedaye.
ENG: For before that certain came from James, he did eat with the Gentiles: but when they came, he drew back and separated himself, fearing them that were of the circumcision.

ASY: ܐܘܼܦ ܝܗܘܼܕܵܝܹ̈ܐ ܐ݇ܚܹܪ̈݇ܢܹܐ ܫܘܼܪܸܟ ܠܗܘܿܢ ܥܲܡܹܗ ܒܐܵܗܵܐ ܡܲܫܦܲܪܬܵܐ، ܕܵܐܟ݂ܝܼ ܕܐܘܼܦ ܒܲܪܢܒ݂ܵܐ ܦܝܵܫܵܐ ܝܗ݇ܘܵܐ ܡܘܼܚܠܸܛܵܐ ܒܡܲܫܦܲܪܬܲܝܗܝ.
TRL: Oep yhoedaye khene shoerik-lhoon 'ameh baha mashparta, dakhee doep barnwa pyasha ywa moekhliṭa bmashpartayhy.
ENG: And the rest of the Jews dissembled likewise with him; insomuch that even Barnabas was carried away with their dissimulation.

ASY: ܐܝܼܢܵܐ ܐܝܼܡܲܢ ܕܚܙܹܐ ܠܝܼ ܕܠܹܐ ܝܗ݇ܘܵܘ ܒܸܚܕܵܪܵܐ ܒܫܪܵܪܵܐ ܕܐܹܘܲܢܓܲܠܝܼܘܿܢ، ܐ݇ܡܝܼܪܝܼ ܠܫܸܡܥܘܿܢ ܟܹܐܦܵܐ ܩܵܕ݇ܡ ܟܠܲܝܗܝ، ”ܐܲܢ݇ܬ ܝܗܘܼܕܵܝܵܐ ܝܘܸܬ ܐܝܼܢܵܐ ܒܸܚܵܝܵܐ ܝܘܸܬ ܐܲܝܟ݂ ܚܲܕ ܡ̣ܢ ܒܢܲܝ̈ ܐܸܡܘܵܬܹ̈ܐ ܘܠܵܐ ܐܲܝܟ݂ ܚܲܕ ܝܗܘܼܕܵܝܵܐ. ܩܵܡܘܿܕܝܼ ܒܸܥܒ݂ܵܕܵܐ ܝܘܸܬ ܚܲܝܠܵܐ ܥܲܠ ܐܸܡܘܵܬܹ̈ܐ ܕܚܵܝܝܼ ܡܐܲܝܟ݂ ܝܗܘܼܕܵܝܹ̈ܐ؟“
TRL: Eena eeman dkhze-lee dle ywaw bikhdara bshrara dewangaleeoon, meeree lshim'oon kepa qam klayhy, ”at yhoedaya ywit eena bikhaya ywit aykh khad min bnay imwate o la aykh khad yhoedaya. Qamoodee bi'wada ywit khayla 'al imwate dkhayee maykh yhoedaye?“
ENG: But when I saw that they walked not uprightly according to the truth of the gospel, I said unto Cephas before them all, If thou, being a Jew, livest as do the Gentiles, and not as do the Jews, how compellest thou the Gentiles to live as do the Jews?

ASY: ܐܲܚܢܲܢ ܕܒܟܝܵܢܲܢ ܝܗܘܼܕܵܝܹ̈ܐ ܝܘܲܚ ܘܠܵܐ ܡ̣ܢ ܐܸܡܘܵܬܹ̈ܐ ܚܲܛܵܝܹ̈ܐ،
TRL: Akhnan dbkyanan yhoedaye ywakh o la min imwate khaṭaye,
ENG: We being Jews by nature, and not sinners of the Gentiles,

ASY: ܟܹܐ ܝܵܕܥܲܚ ܕܐ݇ܢܵܫܵܐ ܠܹܐ ܦܵܐܹܫ ܡܘܼܟܫܸܛܵܐ ܒܢܛܵܪܬܵܐ ܕܢܵܡܘܿܣܵܐ ܐܸܠܵܐ ܒܗܲܝܡܵܢܘܼܬܵܐ ܒܝܼܫܘܿܥ ܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ. ܗܲܕܟ݂ܵܐ ܐܘܼܦ ܐܲܚܢܲܢ ܗܘܼܡܸܢܲܢ ܒܝܼܫܘܿܥ ܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ ܘܠܵܐ ܒܢܛܵܪܬܵܐ ܕܢܵܡܘܿܣܵܐ، ܣܵܒܵܒ ܒܢܛܵܪܬܵܐ ܕܢܵܡܘܿܣܵܐ ܐܘܼܦ ܚܲܕ ܠܹܐ ܦܵܐܹܫ ܡܘܼܟܫܸܛܵܐ.
TRL: Ke yad'akh dnasha le paesh moekshiṭa bnṭarta dnamoosa ila bhaymanoeta beeshoo' msheekha. Hadkha oep akhnan hoeminan beeshoo' msheekha o la bnṭarta dnamoosa, sabab bnṭarta dnamoosa oep khad le paesh moekshiṭa.
ENG: yet knowing that a man is not justified by the works of the law, save through faith in Jesus Christ, even we believed on Christ Jesus, that we might be justified by faith in Christ, and not by the works of the law: because by the works of the law shall no flesh be justified.

ASY: ܐܝܼܢܵܐ ܐܸܢ ܒܸܒܥܵܝܵܐ ܝܘܲܚ ܕܦܵܝܫܲܚ ܡܘܼܟܫܸܛܹܐ ܒܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ، ܟܲܕ ܐܲܚܢܲܢ ܗܹܫ ܓܵܘ ܚܛܝܼܬܵܐ ܝܘܲܚ، ܒܲܣ ܐܘܼܦ ܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ ܒܸܗܘܵܝܵܐ ܝܠܹܗ ܥܵܒ݂ܕܵܢܵܐ ܕܚܸܠܡܲܬ ܕܚܛܝܼܬܵܐ؟ ܚܵܣ ܠܝܼ.
TRL: Eena in bib'aya ywakh dpayshakh moekshiṭe bmsheekha, kad akhnan hesh gaw khṭeeta ywakh, bas oep msheekha bihwaya-yleh 'awdana dkhilmat dkhṭeeta? Khas-lee.
ENG: But if, while we sought to be justified in Christ, we ourselves also were found sinners, is Christ a minister of sin? God forbid.

ASY: ܣܵܒܵܒ ܐܸܢ ܡܸܢܕܪܸܫ ܒܵܢܹܝܢ ܡܸܢܕܝܼ ܕܬܠܝܼܚ ܠܝܼ، ܡܫܲܪܘܼܪܹܐ ܝܘܸܢ ܠܓܵܢܝܼ ܕܝܼܘܸܢ ܫܵܡܛܵܢܵܐ ܕܢܵܡܘܿܣܵܐ.
TRL: Sabab in mindrish baneyn mindee dtleekh-lee, msharoere ywin lganee deewin shamṭana dnamoosa.
ENG: For if I build up again those things which I destroyed, I prove myself a transgressor.

ASY: ܣܵܒܵܒ ܒܝܲܕ ܢܵܡܘܿܣܵܐ ܡܝܼܬ ܠܝܼ ܠܢܵܡܘܿܣܵܐ ܕܚܵܝܹܝܢ ܠܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ.
TRL: Sabab byad namoosa meet-lee lnamoosa dkhayeyn lalaha.
ENG: For I through the law died unto the law, that I might live unto God.

ASY: ܦܝܼܫ ܠܝܼ ܙܩܝܼܦܵܐ ܥܲܡ ܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ. ܡ̣ܢ ܐܵܕܝܼܵܐ ܠܹܐ ܝܘܸܢ ܐܵܢܵܐ ܒܸܚܵܝܵܐ، ܐܸܠܵܐ ܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ ܝܠܹܗ ܒܸܚܵܝܵܐ ܒܝܼܝܼ، ܘܚܲܝܹ̈ܐ ܕܒܸܚܵܝܲܝ ܝܘܸܢ ܒܐܵܗܵܐ ܦܲܓ݂ܪܵܐ ܒܸܚܵܝܲܝ ܝܘܸܢ ܒܗܲܝܡܵܢܘܼܬܵܐ ܒܒܪܘܿܢܵܐ ܕܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ، ܗ̇ܘ ܕܡܘܼܚܸܒ ܠܹܗ ܐܸܠܝܼ ܘܝܘܼܗ݇ܒ݂ܵܐ ܠܹܗ ܓܵܢܹܗ ܡ̣ܢ ܓܹܒܝܼ.
TRL: Peesh-lee zqeepa 'am msheekha. Min adeea le ywin ana bikhaya, ila msheekha-yleh bikhaya beeee, o khaye dbikhayay ywin baha paghra bikhayay ywin bhaymanoeta bbroona dalaha, haw dmoekhib-leh ilee o yoewa-leh ganeh min gebee.
ENG: I have been crucified with Christ; yet I live; and yet no longer I, but Christ liveth in me: and that life which I now live in the flesh I live in faith, the faith which is in the Son of God, who loved me, and gave himself up for me.

ASY: ܠܹܐ ܝܘܸܢ ܡܲܣܠܘܼܝܹܐ ܠܫܵܦܵܩܲܬ ܕܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ، ܣܵܒܵܒ ܐܸܢ ܙܲܕܝܼܩܘܼܬܵܐ ܒܢܵܡܘܿܣܵܐ ܝܠܵܗ̇، ܒܲܣ ܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ ܣܪܝܼܩܵܐܝܼܬ ܡܝܼܬ ܠܹܗ.
TRL: Le ywin masloeye lshapaqat dalaha, sabab in zadeeqoeta bnamoosa-ylaha, bas msheekha sreeqaeet meet-leh.
ENG: I do not make void the grace of God: for if righteousness is through the law, then Christ died for nought.

ASY: ܝܵܐ ܓܵܠܵܛܵܝܹ̈ܐ ܣܲܟ݂ܠܹ̈ܐ، ܡܵܢܝܼ ܩܲܡ ܥܲܠܕܹܐ ܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ؟ ܩܵܕ݇ܡ ܥܲܝܢܵܘ̈ܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܝܼܫܘܿܥ ܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ ܓܲܠܝܵܐܝܼܬ ܦܝܼܫܵܐ ܝܗ݇ܘܵܐ ܙܩܝܼܦܵܐ.
TRL: Ya galaṭaye sakhle, manee qam 'alde lawkhoon? Qam 'aynawkhoon eeshoo' msheekha galyaeet peesha ywa zqeepa.
ENG: O foolish Galatians, who did bewitch you, before whose eyes Jesus Christ was openly set forth crucified?

ASY: ܒܵܥܹܝܢ ܕܝܵܕܥܹܢ ܐܵܗܵܐ ܡܸܢܕܝܼ ܡܸܢܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ: ܡ̣ܢ ܢܛܵܪܬܵܐ ܕܢܵܡܘܿܣܵܐ ܩܘܼܒܸܠ ܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܪܘܼܚܵܐ، ܝܲܢ ܡ̣ܢ ܗܲܝܡܵܢܘܼܬܵܐ ܒܡܸܢܕܝܼ ܕܫܡܝܼܥ ܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ؟
TRL: Ba'eyn dyad'en aha mindee minawkhoon: min nṭarta dnamoosa qoebil lawkhoon roekha, yan min haymanoeta bmindee dshmee' lawkhoon?
ENG: This only would I learn from you, Received ye the Spirit by the works of the law, or by the hearing of faith?

ASY: ܗܲܕܟ݂ܵܐ ܣܲܟ݂ܠܹ̈ܐ ܝܬܘܿܢ؟ ܫܘܼܪܹܐ ܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܒܪܘܼܚܵܐ، ܘܐܵܕܝܼܵܐ ܒܵܥܹܝܬܘܿܢ ܕܬܲܡܸܡܝܼܬܘܿܢ ܒܚܲܝܠܵܐ ܕܒܲܪܢܵܫܵܐ؟
TRL: Hadkha sakhle ytoon? Shoere lawkhoon broekha, o adeea ba'eytoon dtamimeetoon bkhayla dbarnasha?
ENG: Are ye so foolish? having begun in the Spirit, are ye now perfected in the flesh?

ASY: ܒܒܲܛܝܼܠܘܼܬܵܐ ܓ̰ܘܼܢܓ̰ܸܪܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܒܪܵܒܵܐ ܡܸܢܕܝܼܵܢܹ̈ܐ؟ ܐܸܢ ܫܲܪܝܼܪܵܐܝܼܬ ܒܒܲܛܝܼܠܘܼܬܵܐ ܝܗ݇ܘܵܘ.
TRL: Bbaṭeeloeta joenjirawkhoon braba mindeeane? In shareeraeet bbaṭeeloeta ywaw.
ENG: Did ye suffer so many things in vain? if it be indeed in vain.

ASY: ܩܵܡܘܿܕܝܼ ܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ ܟܹܐ ܝܲܗ݇ܒܸܠ ܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܪܘܼܚܹܗ ܘܥܵܒܹܕ ܚܲܝܠܹ̈ܐ ܓܘܼܪܹ̈ܐ ܓܵܘܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܣܵܒܵܒ ܢܛܝܼܪܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܢܵܡܘܿܣܵܐ، ܝܲܢ ܕܗܘܼܡܸܢܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܒܡܸܢܕܝܼ ܕܫܡܝܼܥ ܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ؟
TRL: Qamoodee Alaha ke yabil lawkhoon roekheh o 'abed khayle goere gawawkhoon sabab nṭeerawkhoon namoosa, yan dhoeminawkhoon bmindee dshmee' lawkhoon?
ENG: He therefore that supplieth to you the Spirit, and worketh miracles among you, doeth he it by the works of the law, or by the hearing of faith?

ASY: ܗܲܕܟ݂ܵܐ ܐܘܼܦ ܐܲܒ݂ܪܵܗܵܡ ܗܘܼܡܸܢܹܗ ܒܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ ܘܦܝܼܫ ܠܵܗ̇ ܚܘܼܫܒܸܢܬܵܐ ܐܸܠܹܗ ܠܙܲܕܝܼܩܘܼܬܵܐ.
TRL: Hadkha oep awraham hoemineh balaha o peesh-laha khoeshbinta ileh lzadeeqoeta.
ENG: Even as Abraham believed God, and it was reckoned unto him for righteousness.

ASY: ܒܘܼܬ ܐܵܗܵܐ ܝ݇ܕܸܥܡܘܼܢ، ܕܐܵܢܝܼ ܕܗܲܡܸܢܝܼ ܒܢܘܿܢܹ̈ܐ ܕܐܲܒ݂ܪܵܗܵܡ ܝܼܢܵܐ.
TRL: Boet aha di'moen, danee dhaminee bnoone dawraham eena.
ENG: Know therefore that they which be of faith, the same are sons of Abraham.

ASY: ܟܲܕ ܟܬܵܒ݂ܵܐ ܡ̣ܢ ܩܵܕ݇ܡܵܝܬܵܐ ܢܘܼܒܹܐ ܠܹܗ ܕܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ ܒܸܬ ܡܲܟܫܸܛ ܗ݇ܘܵܐ ܠܐܸܡܘܵܬܹ̈ܐ ܒܝܲܕ ܗܲܝܡܵܢܘܼܬܵܐ، ܩܵܕ݇ܡܵܝܬܵܐ ܡܘܼܫܚܸܕ ܠܹܗ ܐܹܘܲܢܓܲܠܝܼܘܿܢ ܠܐܲܒ݂ܪܵܗܵܡ، ܒܹܐܡܵܪܵܐ، ”ܒܝܼܘܼܟ݂ ܒܸܬ ܦܵܝܫܝܼ ܡܒܘܼܪܟܹܐ ܟܠܲܝܗܝ ܐܸܡܘܵܬܹ̈ܐ.“
TRL: Kad ktawa min qamayta noebe-leh dalaha bit makshiṭ wa limwate byad haymanoeta, qamayta moeshkhid-leh ewangaleeoon lawraham, bemara, ”beeoekh bit payshee mboerke klayhy imwate.“
ENG: And the scripture, foreseeing that God would justify the Gentiles by faith, preached the gospel beforehand unto Abraham, saying, In thee shall all the nations be blessed.

ASY: ܗܲܕܟ݂ܵܐ، ܐܵܢܝܼ ܕܐܝܼܬ ܠܗܘܿܢ ܗܲܝܡܵܢܘܼܬܵܐ ܦܝܼܫܹܐ ܝܢܵܐ ܡܒܘܼܪܟܹܐ ܥܲܡ ܐܲܒ݂ܪܵܗܵܡ، ܐ݇ܢܵܫܵܐ ܕܗܲܝܡܵܢܘܼܬܵܐ.
TRL: Hadkha, anee deet-lhoon haymanoeta peeshe yna mboerke 'am awraham, nasha dhaymanoeta.
ENG: So then they which be of faith are blessed with the faithful Abraham.

ASY: ܟܠܲܝܗܝ ܐܵܢܝܼ ܕܐܝܼܬ ܠܗܘܿܢ ܬܘܼܟ݂ܠܵܢܵܐ ܠܸܢܛܵܪܵܐ ܢܵܡܘܿܣܵܐ، ܬܚܘܿܬ ܠܵܘܛܬܵܐ ܝܢܵܐ، ܣܵܒܵܒ ܟܬܝܼܒ݂ܵܐ ܝܠܹܗ: ܠܝܼܛܵܐ ܝܠܹܗ ܟܠ ܡ̇ܢ ܕܠܵܐ ܗܵܘܹܐ ܒܸܢܛܵܪܵܐ ܟܠ ܡܸܢܕܝܼ ܕܦܝܼܫܵܐ ܝܠܹܗ ܟܬܝܼܒ݂ܵܐ ܓܵܘ ܟܬܵܒ݂ܵܐ ܕܢܵܡܘܿܣܵܐ.
TRL: Klayhy anee deet-lhoon toekhlana linṭara namoosa, tkhoot lawṭta yna, sabab kteewa-yleh: leeṭa-yleh kl man dla hawe binṭara kl mindee dpeesha-yleh kteewa gaw ktawa dnamoosa.
ENG: For as many as are of the works of the law are under a curse: for it is written, Cursed is every one which continueth not in all things that are written in the book of the law, to do them.

ASY: ܐܝܼܢܵܐ ܚܲܕ ܡܸܢܕܝܼ ܓܸܠܝܵܐ ܝܠܹܗ، ܐܘܼܦ ܚܲܕ ܠܹܐ ܦܵܐܹܫ ܡܘܼܟܫܸܛܵܐ ܩܵܕ݇ܡ ܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ ܒܢܵܡܘܿܣܵܐ، ܣܵܒܵܒ ܙܲܕܝܼܩܵܐ ܒܗܲܝܡܵܢܘܼܬܵܐ ܒܸܬ ܚܵܝܹܐ.
TRL: Eena khad mindee gilya-yleh, oep khad le paesh moekshiṭa qam Alaha bnamoosa, sabab zadeeqa bhaymanoeta bit khaye.
ENG: Now that no man is justified by the law in the sight of God, is evident: for, The righteous shall live by faith;

ASY: ܘܢܵܡܘܿܣܵܐ ܠܹܐ ܝܠܹܗ ܒܸܢܝܵܐ ܥܲܠ ܗܲܝܡܵܢܘܼܬܵܐ، ܐܝܼܢܵܐ: ܗ̇ܘ ܕܥܵܒܹܕ ܡܸܢܕܝܼܵܢܹ̈ܐ ܕܟܬܝܼܒܹܐ ܝܢܵܐ ܓܵܘܹܗ ܒܸܬ ܚܵܝܹܐ ܒܝܼܲܝܗܝ.
TRL: O namoosa le-yleh binya 'al haymanoeta, eena: haw d'abed mindeeane dkteebe yna gaweh bit khaye bee-ayhy.
ENG: and the law is not of faith; but, He that doeth them shall live in them.

ASY: ܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ ܙܒ݂ܝܼܢܹܗ ܐܸܠܲܢ ܡ̣ܢ ܠܵܘܛܬܵܐ ܕܢܵܡܘܿܣܵܐ، ܘܒܓܵܢܹܗ ܗܘܹܐ ܠܹܗ ܠܵܘܛܬܵܐ ܡ̣ܢ ܓܹܒܲܢ، ܣܵܒܵܒ ܟܬܝܼܒ݂ܵܐ ܝܠܹܗ: ܠܝܼܛܵܐ ܝܠܹܗ ܟܠ ܕܦܵܐܹܫ ܬܸܠܝܵܐ ܥܲܠ ܩܲܝܣܵܐ.
TRL: Msheekha zweeneh ilan min lawṭta dnamoosa, o bganeh hwe-leh lawṭta min geban, sabab kteewa-yleh: leeṭa-yleh kl dpaesh tilya 'al qaysa.
ENG: Christ redeemed us from the curse of the law, having become a curse for us: for it is written, Cursed is every one that hangeth on a tree:

ASY: ܥܒ݂ܝܼܕ ܠܹܗ ܐܵܗܵܐ ܩܵܐ ܕܒܘܼܪܟܬܵܐ ܕܦܝܼܫ ܠܵܗ̇ ܝܘܼܗ݇ܒܸܠܬܵܐ ܠܐܲܒ݂ܪܵܗܵܡ ܦܵܝܫܵܐ ܝܘܼܗ݇ܒܸܠܬܵܐ ܐܘܼܦ ܠܐܸܡܘܵܬܹ̈ܐ ܒܝܼܫܘܿܥ ܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ، ܗܲܕܟ݂ܵܐ ܕܒܝܲܕ ܗܲܝܡܵܢܘܼܬܵܐ ܩܲܒܠܲܚ ܩܵܘܠܵܐ، ܕܝܼܠܹܗ ܪܘܼܚܵܐ.
TRL: 'weed-leh aha qa dboerkta dpeesh-laha yoebilta lawraham paysha yoebilta oep limwate beeshoo' msheekha, hadkha dbyad haymanoeta qablakh qawla, deeleh roekha.
ENG: that upon the Gentiles might come the blessing of Abraham in Christ Jesus; that we might receive the promise of the Spirit through faith.

ASY: ܐܲܚܘܿܢܘܵܬܝܼ̈، ܝܵܗ݇ܒܹܢܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܛܘܼܦ̮ܣܵܐ ܡ̣ܢ ܚܲܝܹ̈ܐ ܝܲܕܥܵܝܹ̈ܐ. ܐܘܼܦ ܚܲܕ ܠܹܐ ܡܵܨܹܐ ܫܵܪܹܐ ܝܲܢ ܡܲܙܝܸܕ ܠܚܲܕ ܘܲܥܕܵܐ ܕܦܝܼܫܵܐ ܝܠܹܗ ܫܘܼܬܐܸܣܵܐ ܒܝܲܕ ܒܢܲܝ̈ܢܵܫܵܐ.
TRL: Akhoonwatee, yabenawkhoon ṭoewsa min khaye yad'aye. Oep khad le maṣe share yan mazyid lkhad wa'da dpeesha-yleh shoetisa byad bnaynasha.
ENG: Brethren, I speak after the manner of men: Though it be but a man’s covenant, yet when it hath been confirmed, no one maketh it void, or addeth thereto.

ASY: ܩܵܘܠܹ̈ܐ ܦܝܼܫܹܐ ܝܗ݇ܘܵܘ ܝܘܼܗ݇ܒܹܐ ܠܐܲܒ݂ܪܵܗܵܡ ܘܠܙܲܪܥܹܗ. ܟܬܵܒ݂ܵܐ ܠܹܐ ܝܠܹܗ ܒܹܐܡܵܪܵܐ، ”ܘܠܙܲܪ̈ܥܹܐ ܕܝܼܘܼܟ݂،“ ܕܝܼܢܵܐ ܪܵܒܵܐ، ܐܸܠܵܐ ܒܹܐܡܵܪܵܐ ܝܠܹܗ ”ܠܙܲܪܥܵܐ ܕܝܼܘܼܟ݂،“ ܝܲܥܢܹܐ ܚܲܕ ܦܲܪܨܘܿܦܵܐ، ܕܝܼܠܹܗ ܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ.
TRL: Qawle peeshe ywaw yoebe lawraham o lzar'eh. Ktawa le-yleh bemara, ”o lzar'e deeoekh,“ deena raba, ila bemara-yleh ”lzar'a deeoekh,“ ya'ne khad parṣoopa, deeleh msheekha.
ENG: Now to Abraham were the promises spoken, and to his seed. He saith not, And to seeds, as of many; but as of one, And to thy seed, which is Christ.

ASY: ܐܵܗܵܐ ܒܹܐܡܵܪܵܐ ܝܘܸܢ، ܢܵܡܘܿܣܵܐ ܕܐ݇ܬܹܐ ܠܹܗ ܡ̣ܢ ܒܵܬ݇ܪ ܐܲܪܒܲܥܡܵܐܐ ܘܬܠܵܬܝܼ ܫܸܢܹ̈ܐ، ܠܹܐ ܡܵܨܹܐ ܫܵܪܹܐ ܘܲܥܕܵܐ ܕܡ̣ܢ ܩܵܕ݇ܡܵܝܬܵܐ ܫܘܼܬܐܸܣܵܐ ܝܗ݇ܘܵܐ ܒܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ ܠܒܲܛܘܼܠܹܐ ܠܩܵܘܠܵܐ.
TRL: Aha bemara ywin, namoosa dte-leh min bar arba'ma o tlatee shine, le maṣe share wa'da dmin qamayta shoetisa ywa balaha lbaṭoele lqawla.
ENG: Now this I say; A covenant confirmed beforehand by God, the law, which came four hundred and thirty years after, doth not disannul, so as to make the promise of none effect.

ASY: ܣܵܒܵܒ ܐܸܢ ܝܵܪܬܘܼܬܵܐ ܡ̣ܢ ܢܵܡܘܿܣܵܐ ܝܠܵܗ̇، ܒܲܣ ܠܹܐ ܝܠܵܗ̇ ܡ̣ܢ ܩܵܘܠܵܐ. ܐܝܼܢܵܐ ܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ ܒܩܵܘܠܵܐ ܝܘܼܗ݇ܒ݂ܵܐ ܠܹܗ ܠܐܲܒ݂ܪܵܗܵܡ.
TRL: Sabab in yartoeta min namoosa-ylaha, bas le-ylaha min qawla. Eena Alaha bqawla yoewa-leh lawraham.
ENG: For if the inheritance is of the law, it is no more of promise: but God hath granted it to Abraham by promise.

ASY: ܒܲܣ ܡܘܿܕܝܼ ܝܠܹܗ ܢܝܼܫܵܐ ܕܢܵܡܘܿܣܵܐ؟ ܦܝܼܫܵܐ ܝܗ݇ܘܵܐ ܡܘܼܙܝܸܕܵܐ ܒܘܼܬ ܓܢܵܗܵܐ ܗܲܠ ܕܐܵܬܹܐ ܗ݇ܘܵܐ ܙܲܪܥܵܐ ܕܒܘܼܬ ܕܝܼܹܗ ܦܝܼܫܵܐ ܝܗ݇ܘܵܐ ܥܒ݂ܝܼܕܵܐ ܩܵܘܠܵܐ. ܢܵܡܘܿܣܵܐ ܦܝܼܫܵܐ ܝܗ݇ܘܵܐ ܝܘܼܗ݇ܒ݂ܵܐ ܒܝܲܕ ܡܲܠܲܐܟܹ̈ܐ ܒܐܝܼܕܵܐ ܕܡܸܨܥܵܝܵܐ.
TRL: Bas moodee-yleh neesha dnamoosa? Peesha ywa moezyida boet gnaha hal date wa zar'a dboet dee-eh peesha ywa 'weeda qawla. Namoosa peesha ywa yoewa byad malake beeda dmiṣ'aya.
ENG: What then is the law? It was added because of transgressions, till the seed should come to whom the promise hath been made; and it was ordained through angels by the hand of a mediator.

ASY: ܡܸܨܥܵܝܵܐ ܠܹܐ ܝܠܹܗ ܕܚܲܕ ܓܹܒܵܐ، ܐܝܼܢܵܐ ܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ ܚܲܕ ܝܼܠܹܗ.
TRL: Miṣ'aya le-yleh dkhad geba, eena Alaha khad eeleh.
ENG: Now a mediator is not a mediator of one; but God is one.

ASY: ܒܲܣ ܢܵܡܘܿܣܵܐ ܕܲܠܩܘܼܒ݂ܠ ܕܩܵܘܠܹ̈ܐ ܕܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ ܝܠܹܗ؟ ܚܵܣ ܠܝܼ. ܣܵܒܵܒ ܐܸܢ ܢܵܡܘܿܣܵܐ ܦܝܼܫܵܐ ܝܗ݇ܘܵܐ ܝܘܼܗ݇ܒ݂ܵܐ ܕܡܵܨܹܐ ܗ݇ܘܵܐ ܝܲܗ݇ܒܸܠ ܗ݇ܘܵܐ ܚܲܝܹ̈ܐ، ܗ̇ܝܓܵܗ ܫܲܪܝܼܪܵܐܝܼܬ ܙܲܕܝܼܩܘܼܬܵܐ ܒܸܬ ܐܵܬܝܵܐ ܗ݇ܘܵܐ ܒܢܵܡܘܿܣܵܐ.
TRL: Bas namoosa dalqoewl dqawle dalaha-yleh? Khas-lee. Sabab in namoosa peesha ywa yoewa dmaṣe wa yabil wa khaye, haygah shareeraeet zadeeqoeta bit atya wa bnamoosa.
ENG: Is the law then against the promises of God? God forbid: for if there had been a law given which could make alive, verily righteousness would have been of the law.

ASY: ܐܝܼܢܵܐ ܟܬܵܒ݂ܵܐ ܚܒ݂ܝܼܫܲܝ ܠܹܗ ܟܠܲܝܗܝ ܬܚܘܿܬ ܚܛܝܼܬܵܐ، ܗܲܕܟ݂ܵܐ ܕܩܵܘܠܵܐ ܒܝܲܕ ܗܲܝܡܵܢܘܼܬܵܐ ܒܝܼܫܘܿܥ ܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ ܦܵܐܹܫ ܝܘܼܗ݇ܒ݂ܵܐ ܠܟܠܲܝܗܝ ܐܵܢܝܼ ܕܗܲܡܸܢܝܼ.
TRL: Eena ktawa khweeshay-leh klayhy tkhoot khṭeeta, hadkha dqawla byad haymanoeta beeshoo' msheekha paesh yoewa lklayhy anee dhaminee.
ENG: Howbeit the scripture hath shut up all things under sin, that the promise by faith in Jesus Christ might be given to them that believe.

ASY: ܐܝܼܢܵܐ ܡ̣ܢ ܩܵܕ݇ܡ ܕܐܵܬܝܵܐ ܗ݇ܘܵܐ ܗܲܝܡܵܢܘܼܬܵܐ، ܦܝܼܫܹܐ ܝܘܲܚ ܗ݇ܘܵܘ ܕܒ݂ܝܼܩܹܐ ܐܲܝܟ݂ ܐܲܣܝܼܪܹ̈ܐ ܒܝܲܕ ܢܵܡܘܿܣܵܐ ܗܲܠ ܕܦܵܝܫܵܐ ܗ݇ܘܵܐ ܓܠܝܼܬܵܐ ܗܲܝܡܵܢܘܼܬܵܐ.
TRL: Eena min qam datya wa haymanoeta, peeshe ywakh waw dweeqe aykh aseere byad namoosa hal dpaysha wa gleeta haymanoeta.
ENG: But before faith came, we were kept in ward under the law, shut up unto the faith which should afterwards be revealed.

ASY: ܗܲܕܟ݂ܵܐ، ܢܵܡܘܿܣܵܐ ܢܵܛܘܿܪܵܐ ܝܗ݇ܘܵܐ ܐܸܠܲܢ ܕܡܲܝܬܹܐ ܗ݇ܘܵܐ ܠܲܢ ܠܟܸܣ ܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ ܕܦܵܝܫܲܚ ܗ݇ܘܵܘ ܡܘܼܟܫܸܛܹܐ ܒܗܲܝܡܵܢܘܼܬܵܐ.
TRL: Hadkha, namoosa naṭoora ywa ilan dmayte wa lan lkis msheekha dpayshakh waw moekshiṭe bhaymanoeta.
ENG: So that the law hath been our tutor to bring us unto Christ, that we might be justified by faith.

ASY: ܐܝܼܢܵܐ ܐܵܕܝܼܵܐ ܟܲܕ ܗܲܝܡܵܢܘܼܬܵܐ ܐ݇ܬܹܐ ܠܵܗ̇، ܐ݇ܚܹܪ݇ܢܵܐ ܠܹܐ ܝܘܲܚ ܣܢܝܼܩܹܐ ܠܢܵܛܘܿܪܵܐ.
TRL: Eena adeea kad haymanoeta te-laha, khena le ywakh sneeqe lnaṭoora.
ENG: But now that faith is come, we are no longer under a tutor.

ASY: ܣܵܒܵܒ ܟܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܒܢܘܿܢܹ̈ܐ ܕܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ ܝܬܘܿܢ ܒܝܲܕ ܗܲܝܡܵܢܘܼܬܵܐ ܒܝܼܫܘܿܥ ܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ.
TRL: Sabab klawkhoon bnoone dalaha ytoon byad haymanoeta beeshoo' msheekha.
ENG: For ye are all sons of God, through faith, in Christ Jesus.

ASY: ܣܵܒܵܒ ܟܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܕܦܝܼܫ ܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܥܡܝܼܕܹܐ ܒܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ، ܠܒ݂ܝܼܫ ܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܠܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ.
TRL: Sabab klawkhoon dpeesh lawkhoon 'meede bmsheekha, lweesh lawkhoon lmsheekha.
ENG: For as many of you as were baptized into Christ did put on Christ.

ASY: ܠܲܝܬ ܦܘܼܪܫܘܼܢܝܵܐ ܒܹܝܠ ܝܗܘܼܕܵܝܵܐ ܘܝܵܘܢܵܝܵܐ، ܒܹܝܠ ܥܲܒ݂ܕܵܐ ܘܚܹܐܪܵܐ، ܒܹܝܠ ܐܘܼܪܙܵܐ ܘܢܸܩܒ݂ܵܐ، ܣܵܒܵܒ ܟܠܲܝܗܝ ܚܲܕ ܝܼܢܵܐ ܒܝܼܫܘܿܥ ܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ.
TRL: Layt poershoenya beyl yhoedaya o yawnaya, beyl 'awda o khera, beyl oerza o niqwa, sabab klayhy khad eena beeshoo' msheekha.
ENG: There can be neither Jew nor Greek, there can be neither bond nor free, there can be no male and female: for ye all are one man in Christ Jesus.

ASY: ܘܐܸܢ ܐܲܚܬܘܿܢ ܕܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ ܝܬܘܿܢ، ܒܲܣ ܙܲܪܥܵܐ ܕܐܲܒ݂ܪܵܗܵܡ ܝܼܬܘܿܢ، ܘܝܵܪ̈ܘܿܬܹܐ ܕܩܵܘܠܵܐ.
TRL: O in akhtoon dmsheekha ytoon, bas zar'a dawraham eetoon, o yaroote dqawla.
ENG: And if ye are Christ’s, then are ye Abraham’s seed, heirs according to promise.

ASY: ܐܵܗܵܐ ܒܹܐܡܵܪܵܐ ܝܘܸܢ، ܟܡܵܐ ܕܝܵܪܘܿܬܵܐ ܝܲܠܘܼܕܵܐ ܝܠܹܗ، ܠܹܐ ܝܠܹܗ ܦܪܝܼܫܵܐ ܡ̣ܢ ܥܲܒ݂ܕܵܐ، ܐܘܼܦ ܐܸܢ ܕܡܵܪܵܐ ܕܟܠ ܡܸܢܕܝܼ ܝܠܹܗ.
TRL: Aha bemara ywin, kma dyaroota yaloeda-yleh, le-yleh preesha min 'awda, oep in dmara dkl mindee-yleh.
ENG: But I say that so long as the heir is a child, he differeth nothing from a bondservant, though he is lord of all;

ASY: ܐܸܠܵܐ ܬܚܘܿܬ ܬܲܓܒܲܪܬܵܐ ܕܡܕܲܒܪ̈ܵܢܹܐ ܘܪ̈ܲܒܲܝ ܒܲܝܬܵܐ ܝܠܹܗ ܗܲܠ ܙܲܒ݂ܢܵܐ ܕܦܝܼܫܵܐ ܝܠܹܗ ܡܘܼܬܒ݂ܵܐ ܒܝܲܕ ܒܵܒܘܼܗܝ.
TRL: Ila tkhoot tagbarta dmdabrane o rabay bayta-yleh hal zawna dpeesha-yleh moetwa byad baboehy.
ENG: but is under guardians and stewards until the term appointed of the father.

ASY: ܗܲܕܟ݂ܵܐ ܐܘܼܦ ܐܲܚܢܲܢ، ܐܝܼܡܲܢ ܕܝܵܠܹ̈ܕ݇ܐ ܝܘܲܚ ܗ݇ܘܵܘ ܓܵܘ ܥܲܒ݂ܕܘܼܬܵܐ ܝܘܲܚ ܗ݇ܘܵܘ، ܬܚܘܿܬ ܐܸܣܛܘܼܟ݂ܣܹ̈ܐ ܕܐܵܗܵܐ ܕܘܼܢܝܹܐ.
TRL: Hadkha oep akhnan, eeman dyale ywakh waw gaw 'awdoeta ywakh waw, tkhoot isṭoekhse daha doenye.
ENG: So we also, when we were children, were held in bondage under the rudiments of the world:

ASY: ܐܝܼܢܵܐ ܐܝܼܡܲܢ ܕܡܛܹܐ ܠܹܗ ܙܲܒ݂ܢܵܐ، ܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ ܫܘܼܕܸܪܹܗ ܒܪܘܿܢܹܗ، ܗܘܹܐ ܠܹܗ ܡ̣ܢ ܒܲܟ݂ܬܵܐ، ܗܘܹܐ ܠܹܗ ܬܚܘܿܬ ܢܵܡܘܿܣܵܐ،
TRL: Eena eeman dmṭe-leh zawna, Alaha shoedireh brooneh, hwe-leh min bakhta, hwe-leh tkhoot namoosa,
ENG: but when the fulness of the time came, God sent forth his Son, born of a woman, born under the law,

ASY: ܕܦܲܪܸܩ ܗ݇ܘܵܐ ܠܐܵܢܝܼ ܕܝܼܗ݇ܘܵܘ ܬܚܘܿܬ ܢܵܡܘܿܣܵܐ، ܕܩܲܒܠܲܚ ܗ݇ܘܵܘ ܟܠܲܝܗܝ ܙܸܕܩܹ̈ܐ ܕܒܪܘܿܢܘܼܬܵܐ.
TRL: Dpariq wa lanee deewaw tkhoot namoosa, dqablakh waw klayhy zidqe dbroonoeta.
ENG: that he might redeem them which were under the law, that we might receive the adoption of sons.

ASY: ܣܵܒܵܒ ܒܢܘܿܢܹ̈ܐ ܝܬܘܿܢ، ܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ ܫܘܼܕܸܪܹܗ ܪܘܼܚܵܐ ܕܒܪܘܿܢܹܗ ܓܵܘ ܠܸܒܲܢ ܕܝܼܠܹܗ ܒܸܩܪܵܝܵܐ، ”ܐܲܒܵܐ، ܒܵܒܵܐ.“
TRL: Sabab bnoone ytoon, Alaha shoedireh roekha dbrooneh gaw liban deeleh biqraya, ”aba, baba.“
ENG: And because ye are sons, God sent forth the Spirit of his Son into our hearts, crying, Abba, Father.

ASY: ܗܲܕܟ݂ܵܐ ܐܲܢ݇ܬ ܐ݇ܚܹܪ݇ܢܵܐ ܠܹܐ ܝܘܸܬ ܥܲܒ݂ܕܵܐ ܐܸܠܵܐ ܒܪܘܿܢܵܐ ܝܘܸܬ، ܘܣܵܒܵܒ ܒܪܘܿܢܵܐ ܝܘܸܬ، ܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ ܥܒ݂ܝܼܕ ܠܹܗ ܐܸܠܘܼܟ݂ ܝܵܪܘܿܬܵܐ.
TRL: Hadkha at khena le ywit 'awda ila broona ywit, o sabab broona ywit, Alaha 'weed-leh iloekh yaroota.
ENG: So that thou art no longer a bondservant, but a son; and if a son, then an heir through God.

ASY: ܐܝܼܢܵܐ ܩܵܕ݇ܡܵܝܬܵܐ ܐܝܼܡܲܢ ܕܠܹܐ ܝܵܕܥܝܼܬܘܿܢ ܗ݇ܘܵܘ ܠܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ، ܥܲܒ݂ܕܹ̈ܐ ܝܬܘܿܢ ܗ݇ܘܵܘ ܠܐܵܢܝܼ ܕܒܟܝܵܢܵܐ ܠܹܐ ܝܢܵܐ ܐܲܠܵܗܹ̈ܐ،
TRL: Eena qamayta eeman dle yad'eetoon waw lalaha, 'awde ytoon waw lanee dbkyana le yna alahe,
ENG: Howbeit at that time, not knowing God, ye were in bondage to them which by nature are no gods:

ASY: ܐܝܼܢܵܐ ܐܵܕܝܼܵܐ ܕܒܝܼܕܵܥܵܐ ܝܬܘܿܢ ܠܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ، ܝܲܢ ܒܘܼܫ ܙܵܘܕܵܐ ܕܦܝܼܫܹܐ ܝܬܘܿܢ ܝ݇ܕܝܼܥܹܐ ܒܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ، ܩܵܡܘܿܕܝܼ ܒܸܕܝܵܪܵܐ ܝܬܘܿܢ ܥܲܠ ܐܵܢܝܼ ܐܸܣܛܘܼܟ݂ܣܹ̈ܐ ܙܲܒܘܼܢܹ̈ܐ ܘܡܸܣܟܹܢܹ̈ܐ؟ ܒܵܥܹܝܬܘܿܢ ܡܸܢܕܪܸܫ ܦܵܝܫܝܼܬܘܿܢ ܥܲܒ݂ܕܹ̈ܐ ܐܸܠܲܝܗܝ؟
TRL: Eena adeea dbeeda'a ytoon lalaha, yan boesh zawda dpeeshe ytoon dee'e balaha, qamoodee bidyara ytoon 'al anee isṭoekhse zaboene o miskene? Ba'eytoon mindrish paysheetoon 'awde ilayhy?
ENG: but now that ye have come to know God, or rather to be known of God, how turn ye back again to the weak and beggarly rudiments, whereunto ye desire to be in bondage over again?

ASY: ܒܸܢܛܵܪܵܐ ܝܬܘܿܢ ܝܵܘܡܵܢܹ̈ܐ ܘܝܲܪ̈ܚܹܐ ܘܙܲܒ݂ܢܹ̈ܐ ܘܫܸܢܹ̈ܐ.
TRL: Binṭara ytoon yawmane o yarkhe o zawne o shine.
ENG: Ye observe days, and months, and seasons, and years.

ASY: ܒܸܙܕܵܥܵܐ ܝܘܸܢ ܥܲܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܩܵܘܡܵܐ ܕܦܘܼܠܚܵܢܝܼ ܗܵܒܵܣ ܗܘܹܐ ܠܹܗ ܠܟܸܣ ܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ.
TRL: Bizda'a ywin 'alawkhoon qawma dpoelkhanee habas hwe-leh lkis lawkhoon.
ENG: I am afraid of you, lest by any means I have bestowed labour upon you in vain.

ASY: ܦܲܪܦܘܼܠܹܐ ܝܘܸܢ ܒܝܼܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ، ܐܲܚܘܿܢܘܵܬܝܼ̈، ܕܗܵܘܹܝܬܘܿܢ ܐܲܝܟ݂ ܕܝܼܝܼ ܣܵܒܵܒ ܐܘܼܦ ܐܵܢܵܐ ܗܘܹܐ ܠܝܼ ܐܲܝܟ݂ ܕܝܼܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ. ܠܹܐ ܝܬܘܿܢ ܥܒ݂ܝܼܕܹܐ ܓܢܵܗܵܐ ܐܸܠܝܼ.
TRL: Parpoele ywin beeawkhoon, akhoonwatee, dhaweytoon aykh deeee sabab oep ana hwe-lee aykh deeawkhoon. Le ytoon 'weede gnaha ilee.
ENG: I beseech you, brethren, be as I am, for I am as ye are. Ye did me no wrong:

ASY: ܟܹܐ ܝܵܕܥܝܼܬܘܿܢ ܕܵܐܟ݂ܝܼ ܒܙܲܒܘܼܢܘܼܬܵܐ ܕܦܲܓ݂ܪܵܐ ܡܘܼܟܪܸܙ ܠܝܼ ܐܹܘܲܢܓܲܠܝܼܘܿܢ ܐܸܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܡ̣ܢ ܩܵܕ݇ܡܵܝܬܵܐ.
TRL: Ke yad'eetoon dakhee bzaboenoeta dpaghra moekriz-lee ewangaleeoon ilawkhoon min qamayta.
ENG: but ye know that because of an infirmity of the flesh I preached the gospel unto you the first time:

ASY: ܐܘܼܦ ܐܸܢ ܕܙܲܒܘܼܢܘܼܬܝܼ ܒܦܲܓ݂ܪܵܐ ܓ̰ܘܼܪܵܒܵܐ ܝܗ݇ܘܵܐ ܐܸܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ، ܐܝܼܢܵܐ ܐܲܚܬܘܿܢ ܠܵܐ ܡܘܼܣܠܹܐ ܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܐܸܠܝܼ ܘܠܵܐ ܡܘܼܣܚܸܪܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܒܝܼܝܼ. ܐܸܠܵܐ ܩܘܼܒܸܠ ܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܐܸܠܝܼ ܐܲܝܟ݂ ܡܲܠܲܐܟ݂ܵܐ ܕܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ، ܘܐܲܝܟ݂ ܝܼܫܘܿܥ ܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ ܒܓܵܢܹܗ.
TRL: Oep in dzaboenoetee bpaghra joeraba ywa ilawkhoon, eena akhtoon la moesle lawkhoon ilee o la moeskhirawkhoon beeee. Ila qoebil lawkhoon ilee aykh malakha dalaha, o aykh eeshoo' msheekha bganeh.
ENG: and that which was a temptation to you in my flesh ye despised not, nor rejected; but ye received me as an angel of God, even as Christ Jesus.

ASY: ܒܲܣ ܐܲܝܟܵܐ ܝܠܵܗ̇ ܚܲܕܘܼܬܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ؟ ܣܵܒܵܒ ܒܸܣܗܵܕܵܐ ܝܘܸܢ ܒܘܼܬ ܕܝܼܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܕܐܸܢ ܡܵܨܝܵܐ ܗ݇ܘܵܐ ܒܸܬ ܚܵܪܛܝܼܬܘܿܢ ܗ݇ܘܵܘ ܥܲܝܢܵܘ̈ܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܘܝܵܗ݇ܒ݂ܝܼܬܘܿܢ ܗ݇ܘܵܘ ܠܗܘܿܢ ܐܸܠܝܼ.
TRL: Bas ayka-ylaha khadoetawkhoon? Sabab bishada ywin boet deeawkhoon din maṣya wa bit kharṭeetoon waw 'aynawkhoon o yaweetoon waw-lhoon ilee.
ENG: Where then is that gratulation of yourselves? for I bear you witness, that, if possible, ye would have plucked out your eyes and given them to me.

ASY: ܐܵܕܝܼܵܐ ܗܘܹܐ ܠܝܼ ܕܸܫܡܸܢܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܣܵܒܵܒ ܗܲܡܙܘܼܡܹܐ ܝܘܸܢ ܫܪܵܪܵܐ ܐܸܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ؟
TRL: Adeea hwe-lee dishminawkhoon sabab hamzoeme ywin shrara ilawkhoon?
ENG: So then am I become your enemy, because I tell you the truth?

ASY: ܐܵܢܝܼ ܒܲܚܘܼܠܹܐ ܝܢܵܐ ܒܝܼܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܐܝܼܢܵܐ ܠܵܐ ܠܛܵܒ݂ܬܵܐ. ܒܵܥܝܼ ܕܡܲܪܚܸܩܝܼ ܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܡܸܢܲܢ ܕܗܵܘܹܝܬܘܿܢ ܐܲܚܬܘܿܢ ܒܲܚܘܼܠܹܐ ܒܝܼܲܝܗܝ.
TRL: Anee bakhoele yna beeawkhoon eena la lṭawta. Ba'ee dmarkhiqee lawkhoon minan dhaweytoon akhtoon bakhoele bee-ayhy.
ENG: They zealously seek you in no good way; nay, they desire to shut you out, that ye may seek them.

ASY: ܒܵܚܲܠܬܵܐ ܨܦܵܝܝܼ ܝܠܵܗ̇ ܐܸܢ ܢܝܼܫܵܐ ܨܦܵܝܝܼ ܝܠܹܗ، ܘܒܟܠ ܥܕܵܢܵܐ ܗܵܘܹܝܬܘܿܢ ܗܲܕܟ݂ܵܐ ܒܸܥܒ݂ܵܕܵܐ، ܘܠܵܐ ܐܲܚܟ̰ܝܼ ܐܝܼܡܲܢ ܕܥܲܡܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܝܼܘܸܢ.
TRL: Bakhalta ṣpayee-ylaha in neesha ṣpayee-yleh, o bkl 'dana haweytoon hadkha bi'wada, o la akhchee eeman d'amawkhoon eewin.
ENG: But it is good to be zealously sought in a good matter at all times, and not only when I am present with you.

ASY: ܝܵܐ ܒܢܘܿܢܝܼ̈، ܓ̰ܲܢܓ̰ܘܼܪܹܐ ܝܘܸܢ ܒܘܼܬ ܕܝܼܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܐܲܝܟ݂ ܒܲܟ݂ܬܵܐ ܕܓ̰ܲܢܓ̰ܸܪܵܐ ܒܗܵܨܲܠܬܵܐ، ܗܲܠ ܕܦܵܝܫܵܐ ܒܪܝܼܬܵܐ ܨܘܼܪܬܵܐ ܕܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ ܓܵܘܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ.
TRL: Ya bnoonee, janjoere ywin boet deeawkhoon aykh bakhta djanjira bhaṣalta, hal dpaysha breeta ṣoerta dmsheekha gawawkhoon.
ENG: My little children, of whom I am again in travail until Christ be formed in you,

ASY: ܟܡܵܐ ܒܸܒܥܵܝܵܐ ܝܘܸܢ ܕܐܵܕܝܼܵܐ ܗܵܘܹܝܢ ܗ݇ܘܵܐ ܠܟܸܣ ܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܘܫܲܚܠܸܦܸܢ ܗ݇ܘܵܐ ܗܹܡܸܙܡܵܢܝܼ̈، ܣܵܒܵܒ ܫܓ݂ܝܼܫܹܐ ܝܢܵܐ ܚܘܼܫܵܒ݂ܝܼ̈ ܒܘܼܬ ܕܝܼܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ.
TRL: Kma bib'aya ywin dadeea haweyn wa lkis lawkhoon o shakhlipin wa hemizmanee, sabab shgheeshe yna khoeshawee boet deeawkhoon.
ENG: yea, I could wish to be present with you now, and to change my voice; for I am perplexed about you.

ASY: ܐ݇ܡܘܿܪܘܼܢ ܠܝܼ، ܐܲܚܬܘܿܢ ܕܒܵܥܹܝܬܘܿܢ ܗܵܘܹܝܬܘܿܢ ܬܚܘܿܬ ܢܵܡܘܿܣܵܐ، ܠܹܐ ܝܬܘܿܢ ܒܝܼܕܵܥܵܐ ܡܘܿܕܝܼ ܝܠܹܗ ܒܹܐܡܵܪܵܐ ܢܵܡܘܿܣܵܐ؟
TRL: mooroen-lee, akhtoon dba'eytoon haweytoon tkhoot namoosa, le ytoon beeda'a moodee-yleh bemara namoosa?
ENG: Tell me, ye that desire to be under the law, do ye not hear the law?

ASY: ܣܵܒܵܒ ܟܬܝܼܒ݂ܵܐ ܝܠܹܗ ܕܐܲܒ݂ܪܵܗܵܡ ܐܝܼܬ ܗ݇ܘܵܐ ܠܹܗ ܬܪܹܝ ܒܢܘܿܢܹ̈ܐ، ܚܲܕ ܡ̣ܢ ܚܹܕܲܡܬܵܐ ܘܗ̇ܘ ܐ݇ܚܹܪ݇ܢܵܐ ܡ̣ܢ ܚܹܐܪܬܵܐ.
TRL: Sabab kteewa-yleh dawraham eet wa-leh trey bnoone, khad min khedamta o haw khena min kherta.
ENG: For it is written, that Abraham had two sons, one by the handmaid, and one by the freewoman.

ASY: ܗ̇ܘ ܕܡ̣ܢ ܚܹܕܲܡܬܵܐ ܦܝܼܫ ܠܹܗ ܝ݇ܠܝܼܕܵܐ ܒܐܘܼܪܚܵܐ ܕܦܲܓ݂ܪܵܐ، ܐܝܼܢܵܐ ܗ̇ܘ ܕܡ̣ܢ ܚܹܐܪܬܵܐ ܒܐܘܼܪܚܵܐ ܕܩܵܘܠܵܐ.
TRL: Haw dmin khedamta peesh-leh leeda boerkha dpaghra, eena haw dmin kherta boerkha dqawla.
ENG: Howbeit the son by the handmaid is born after the flesh; but the son by the freewoman is born through promise.

ASY: ܐܲܢܹܐ ܛܘܼܦ̮ܣܵܐ ܝܢܵܐ. ܐܲܢܹܐ ܒܲܟ݂ܬܵܬܹ̈ܐ ܛܘܼܦ̮ܣܵܐ ܕܬܪܹܝ ܘܲܥܕܹ̈ܐ ܝܢܵܐ. ܚܕܵܐ ܡܸܢܲܝܗܝ ܘܲܥܕܵܐ ܡ̣ܢ ܛܘܼܪܵܐ ܕܣܝܼܢܲܝ ܝܠܵܗ̇، ܘܒܢܘܿܢܘܼ̈ܗ̇ ܕܥܲܒ݂ܕܘܼܬܵܐ ܝܢܵܐ. ܐܵܗܵܐ ܗܵܓ݂ܵܪ ܝܼܠܵܗ̇.
TRL: Ane ṭoewsa yna. Ane bakhtate ṭoewsa dtrey wa'de yna. Khda minayhy wa'da min ṭoera dseenay-ylaha, o bnoonoeha d'awdoeta yna. Aha haghar eelaha.
ENG: Which things contain an allegory: for these women are two covenants; one from mount Sinai, bearing children unto bondage, which is Hagar.

ASY: ܗܵܓ݂ܵܪ ܛܘܼܪܵܐ ܕܣܝܼܢܲܝ ܝܠܵܗ̇، ܓܵܘ ܐܵܪܵܒܝܼܵܐ، ܘܛܘܼܦ̮ܣܵܐ ܕܐܘܿܪܸܫܠܸܡ ܕܐܵܕܝܼܵܐ ܝܠܵܗ̇، ܣܵܒܵܒ ܓܵܘ ܥܲܒ݂ܕܘܼܬܵܐ ܝܠܵܗ̇ ܥܲܡ ܒܢܘܿܢܘܼ̈ܗ̇.
TRL: Haghar ṭoera dseenay-ylaha, gaw arabeea, o ṭoewsa doorishlim dadeea-ylaha, sabab gaw 'awdoeta-ylaha 'am bnoonoeha.
ENG: Now this Hagar is mount Sinai in Arabia, and answereth to the Jerusalem that now is: for she is in bondage with her children.

ASY: ܐܝܼܢܵܐ ܐܘܿܪܸܫܠܸܡ ܕܥܸܠܸܠ ܚܹܐܪܬܵܐ ܝܠܵܗ̇، ܘܝܸܡܵܐ ܕܕܝܼܲܢ ܝܼܠܵܗ̇.
TRL: Eena oorishlim d'ilil kherta-ylaha, o yima ddee-an eelaha.
ENG: But the Jerusalem that is above is free, which is our mother.

ASY: ܣܵܒܵܒ ܟܬܝܼܒ݂ܵܐ ܝܠܹܗ: ܚܕܝܼ، ܝܵܐ ܥܩܲܪܬܵܐ، ܐܲܢ݇ܬ ܕܠܹܐ ܗܲܨܠܲܬܝ، ܡܲܪܸܡ ܩܵܠܵܟ݂ܝ ܘܡܲܩܘܸܚ، ܐܲܢ݇ܬ ܕܠܹܐ ܓ̰ܲܢܓ̰ܸܪܲܬܝ ܒܗܵܨܲܠܬܵܐ، ܣܵܒܵܒ ܒܘܼܫ ܪܵܒܵܐ ܝܢܵܐ ܒܢܘܿܢܹ̈ܐ ܕܒܲܟ݂ܬܵܐ ܡܘܼܫܲܡܸܪ ܡ̣ܢ ܗ̇ܝ ܕܐܝܼܬ ܠܵܗ̇ ܓܲܒ݂ܪܵܐ.
TRL: Sabab kteewa-yleh: khdee, ya 'qarta, at dle haṣlaty, marim qalakhy o maqwikh, at dle janjiraty bhaṣalta, sabab boesh raba yna bnoone dbakhta moeshamir min hay deet-laha gawra.
ENG: For it is written, Rejoice, thou barren that bearest not; Break forth and cry, thou that travailest not: For more are the children of the desolate than of her which hath the husband.

ASY: ܐܵܕܝܼܵܐ ܐܲܚܘܿܢܘܵܬܝܼ̈، ܐܲܚܬܘܿܢ ܐܲܝܟ݂ ܐܝܼܣܚܵܩ ܒܢܘܿܢܹ̈ܐ ܕܩܵܘܠܵܐ ܝܬܘܿܢ.
TRL: Adeea akhoonwatee, akhtoon aykh eeskhaq bnoone dqawla ytoon.
ENG: Now we, brethren, as Isaac was, are children of promise.

ASY: ܒܗ̇ܝ ܥܕܵܢܵܐ ܒܪܘܿܢܵܐ ܕܦܝܼܫܵܐ ܝܗ݇ܘܵܐ ܝ݇ܠܝܼܕܵܐ ܒܐܘܼܪܚܵܐ ܕܦܲܓ݂ܪܵܐ ܛܪܝܼܕ ܠܹܗ ܠܒܪܘܿܢܵܐ ܕܦܝܼܫܵܐ ܝܗ݇ܘܵܐ ܝ݇ܠܝܼܕܵܐ ܒܚܲܝܠܵܐ ܕܪܘܼܚܵܐ. ܐܘܼܦ ܐܵܕܝܼܵܐ ܗܲܕܟ݂ܵܐ ܝܠܵܗ̇.
TRL: Bhay 'dana broona dpeesha ywa leeda boerkha dpaghra ṭreed-leh lbroona dpeesha ywa leeda bkhayla droekha. Oep adeea hadkha-ylaha.
ENG: But as then he that was born after the flesh persecuted him that was born after the Spirit, even so it is now.

ASY: ܐܝܼܢܵܐ ܡܘܿܕܝܼ ܐ݇ܡܝܼܪܹܗ ܟܬܵܒ݂ܵܐ؟ ܛܪܘܿܕ ܠܚܹܕܲܡܬܵܐ ܘܠܒܪܘܿܢܘܼܗ̇، ܣܵܒܵܒ ܒܪܘܿܢܵܐ ܕܚܹܕܲܡܬܵܐ ܠܹܐ ܝܵܪܹܬ ܥܲܡ ܒܪܘܿܢܵܐ ܕܚܹܐܪܬܵܐ.
TRL: Eena moodee meereh ktawa? Ṭrood lkhedamta o lbroonoeha, sabab broona dkhedamta le yaret 'am broona dkherta.
ENG: Howbeit what saith the scripture? Cast out the handmaid and her son: for the son of the handmaid shall not inherit with the son of the freewoman.

ASY: ܗܲܕܟ݂ܵܐ ܐܲܚܘܿܢܘܵܬܝܼ̈، ܐܲܚܢܲܢ ܠܹܐ ܝܘܲܚ ܒܢܘܿܢܹ̈ܐ ܕܚܹܕܲܡܬܵܐ ܐܸܠܵܐ ܒܢܘܿܢܹ̈ܐ ܕܚܹܐܪܬܵܐ ܝܘܲܚ.
TRL: Hadkha akhoonwatee, akhnan le ywakh bnoone dkhedamta ila bnoone dkherta ywakh.
ENG: Wherefore, brethren, we are not children of a handmaid, but of the freewoman.

ASY: ܒܘܼܬ ܚܹܐܪܘܼܬܵܐ ܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ ܩܲܡ ܥܵܒܹܕ ܠܲܢ ܚܹܐܪܹ̈ܐ. ܗܲܕܟ݂ܵܐ ܟܠܹܝܡܘܼܢ ܩܸܘܝܹܐ ܘܠܵܐ ܦܵܝܫܝܼܬܘܿܢ ܡܸܢܕܪܸܫ ܐ݇ܣܝܼܪܹ̈ܐ ܒܢܝܼܪܵܐ ܕܥܲܒ݂ܕܘܼܬܵܐ.
TRL: Boet kheroeta msheekha qam 'abed lan khere. Hadkha kleymoen qiwye o la paysheetoon mindrish seere bneera d'awdoeta.
ENG: With freedom did Christ set us free: stand fast therefore, and be not entangled again in a yoke of bondage.

ASY: ܗܵܐ ܐܵܢܵܐ ܦܵܘܠܘܿܣ ܒܹܐܡܵܪܵܐ ܝܘܸܢ ܐܸܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ، ܕܐܸܢ ܦܵܝܫܝܼܬܘܿܢ ܓܙܝܼܪܹܐ، ܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ ܠܲܝܬ ܠܹܗ ܝܘܼܬܪܵܢܵܐ ܐܸܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ،
TRL: Ha ana pawloos bemara ywin ilawkhoon, din paysheetoon gzeere, msheekha layt-leh yoetrana ilawkhoon,
ENG: Behold, I Paul say unto you, that, if ye receive circumcision, Christ will profit you nothing.

ASY: ܡܸܢܕܪܸܫ ܒܸܣܗܵܕܵܐ ܝܘܸܢ ܠܟܠ ܚܲܕ ܕܝܼܠܹܗ ܓܙܝܼܪܵܐ، ܘܵܠܹܐ ܝܠܵܗ̇ ܕܢܵܛܹܪ ܟܠܹܗ ܢܵܡܘܿܣܵܐ.
TRL: Mindrish bishada ywin lkl khad deeleh gzeera, wale-ylaha dnaṭer kleh namoosa.
ENG: Yea, I testify again to every man that receiveth circumcision, that he is a debtor to do the whole law.

ASY: ܐܲܚܬܘܿܢ ܕܓ̰ܲܪܘܼܒܹܐ ܝܬܘܿܢ ܕܦܵܝܫܝܼܬܘܿܢ ܡܘܼܟܫܸܛܹܐ ܒܢܵܡܘܿܣܵܐ، ܪܚܝܼܩ ܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܡ̣ܢ ܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ؛ ܢܦܝܼܠ ܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܡ̣ܢ ܫܵܦܵܩܲܬ.
TRL: Akhtoon djaroebe ytoon dpaysheetoon moekshiṭe bnamoosa, rkheeq lawkhoon min msheekha; npeel lawkhoon min shapaqat.
ENG: Ye are severed from Christ, ye who would be justified by the law; ye are fallen away from grace.

ASY: ܣܵܒܵܒ ܐܲܚܢܲܢ ܒܝܲܕ ܪܘܼܚܵܐ ܒܸܣܦܵܪܵܐ ܝܘܲܚ ܠܗܹܒ݂ܝܼ ܕܙܲܕܝܼܩܘܼܬܵܐ ܒܗܲܝܡܵܢܘܼܬܵܐ.
TRL: Sabab akhnan byad roekha bispara ywakh lhewee dzadeeqoeta bhaymanoeta.
ENG: For we through the Spirit by faith wait for the hope of righteousness.

ASY: ܣܵܒܵܒ ܒܝܼܫܘܿܥ ܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ ܠܵܐ ܓܙܘܼܪܬܵܐ ܘܠܵܐ ܥܘܼܪܠܘܼܬܵܐ ܐܝܼܬ ܠܗܘܿܢ ܝܘܼܬܪܵܢܵܐ، ܐܸܠܵܐ ܗܲܝܡܵܢܘܼܬܵܐ ܒܸܦܠܵܚܵܐ ܒܚܘܼܒܵܐ.
TRL: Sabab beeshoo' msheekha la gzoerta o la 'oerloeta eet-lhoon yoetrana, ila haymanoeta biplakha bkhoeba.
ENG: For in Christ Jesus neither circumcision availeth anything, nor uncircumcision; but faith working through love.

ASY: ܨܦܵܝܝܼ ܒܸܪܚܵܛܵܐ ܝܬܘܿܢ ܗ݇ܘܵܘ. ܡܵܢܝܼ ܩܲܡ ܡܲܟܠܹܐ ܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܕܠܵܐ ܡܵܛܹܝܬܘܿܢ ܗ݇ܘܵܘ ܠܫܪܵܪܵܐ؟
TRL: Ṣpayee birkhaṭa ytoon waw. Manee qam makle lawkhoon dla maṭeytoon waw lshrara?
ENG: Ye were running well; who did hinder you that ye should not obey the truth?

ASY: ܗ̇ܘ ܕܡܘܼܟܠܹܐ ܠܹܗ ܐܸܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܠܹܐ ܝܠܹܗ ܗ̇ܘ ܕܩܲܡ ܩܵܪܹܐ ܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ.
TRL: Haw dmoekle-leh ilawkhoon le-yleh haw dqam qare lawkhoon.
ENG: This persuasion came not of him that calleth you.

ASY: ܚܕܵܐ ܟܡܵܝܘܼܬܵܐ ܙܥܘܿܪܬܵܐ ܕܚܡܝܼܪܵܐ ܟܠܹܗ ܠܲܝܫܵܐ ܟܹܐ ܡܲܚܡܸܥܵܐ ܠܹܗ.
TRL: Khda kmayoeta z'oorta dkhmeera kleh laysha ke makhmi'a-leh.
ENG: A little leaven leaveneth the whole lump.

ASY: ܐܝܼܬ ܠܝܼ ܗܹܒ݂ܝܼ ܒܝܼܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܒܡܵܪܲܢ ܕܠܹܐ ܚܵܫܒ݂ܝܼܬܘܿܢ ܡܸܢܕܝܼ ܐ݇ܚܹܪ݇ܢܵܐ. ܗ̇ܘ ܕܒܸܚܒ݂ܵܛܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܝܼܠܹܗ ܒܸܬ ܦܵܐܹܫ ܕܝܼܢܵܐ، ܟܠ ܡ̇ܢ ܕܝܼܠܹܗ.
TRL: Eet-lee hewee beeawkhoon bmaran dle khashweetoon mindee khena. Haw dbikhwaṭawkhoon eeleh bit paesh deena, kl man deeleh.
ENG: I have confidence to you-ward in the Lord, that ye will be none otherwise minded: but he that troubleth you shall bear his judgment, whosoever he be.

ASY: ܐܲܚܘܿܢܘܵܬܝܼ̈، ܐܸܢ ܐܵܢܵܐ ܗܹܫ ܡܲܟܪܘܼܙܹܐ ܝܘܸܢ ܓܙܘܼܪܬܵܐ، ܩܵܡܘܿܕܝܼ ܩܲܒܘܼܠܹܐ ܝܘܸܢ ܪܕܘܼܦܝܵܐ؟ ܒܲܣ ܒܛܝܼܠ ܠܹܗ ܬܘܼܪܩܵܠܵܐ ܕܒܙܩܝܼܦܵܐ.
TRL: Akhoonwatee, in ana hesh makroeze ywin gzoerta, qamoodee qaboele ywin rdoepya? Bas bṭeel-leh toerqala dbzqeepa.
ENG: But I, brethren, if I still preach circumcision, why am I still persecuted? then hath the stumblingblock of the cross been done away.

ASY: ܛܘܼܒ݂ܵܐ ܕܐܘܼܦ ܦܪܵܡܵܐ ܦܵܝܫܝܼ ܗ݇ܘܵܘ ܦܪܝܼܡܹܐ ܐܵܢܝܼ ܕܒܸܚܒ݂ܵܛܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܝܼܢܵܐ.
TRL: Ṭoewa doep prama payshee waw preeme anee dbikhwaṭawkhoon eena.
ENG: I would that they which unsettle you would even cut themselves off.

ASY: ܐܲܚܬܘܿܢ ܐܲܚܘܿܢܘܵܬܝܼ̈، ܦܝܼܫܹܐ ܝܬܘܿܢ ܓܘܼܒܝܹܐ ܠܚܹܐܪܘܼܬܵܐ. ܠܵܐ ܥܵܒ݂ܕܝܼܬܘܿܢ ܠܵܗ̇ ܚܹܐܪܘܼܬܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܦܸܪܣܲܬ ܠܟܝܵܢܵܐ ܚܲܛܵܝܵܐ، ܐܝܼܢܵܐ ܥܵܒ݂ܕܝܼܬܘܿܢ ܚܸܠܡܲܬ ܚܲܕ ܠܗ̇ܘ ܐ݇ܚܹܪ݇ܢܵܐ ܒܚܘܼܒܵܐ.
TRL: Akhtoon akhoonwatee, peeshe ytoon goebye lkheroeta. La 'awdeetoon-laha kheroetawkhoon pirsat lkyana khaṭaya, eena 'awdeetoon khilmat khad lhaw khena bkhoeba.
ENG: For ye, brethren, were called for freedom; only use not your freedom for an occasion to the flesh, but through love be servants one to another.

ASY: ܣܵܒܵܒ ܟܠܹܗ ܢܵܡܘܿܣܵܐ ܚܒ݂ܝܼܫܵܐ ܝܠܹܗ ܓܵܘ ܚܲܕ ܦܘܼܩܕܵܢܵܐ: ܡܲܚܸܒܸܬ ܠܫܒ݂ܵܒ݂ܘܼܟ݂ ܐܲܝܟ݂ ܓܵܢܘܼܟ݂.
TRL: Sabab kleh namoosa khweesha-yleh gaw khad poeqdana: makhibit lshwawoekh aykh ganoekh.
ENG: For the whole law is fulfilled in one word, even in this; Thou shalt love thy neighbour as thyself.

ASY: ܐܝܼܢܵܐ ܐܸܢ ܢܵܝܨܝܼܬܘܿܢ ܘܐܵܟ݂ܠܝܼܬܘܿܢ ܚܲܕ ܠܗ̇ܘ ܐ݇ܚܹܪ݇ܢܵܐ، ܗܘܹܝܡܘܼܢ ܗܸܫܝܵܪ ܣܵܒܵܒ ܒܸܬ ܛܲܠܩܝܼܬܘܿܢ ܚܲܕ ܠܗ̇ܘ ܐ݇ܚܹܪ݇ܢܵܐ.
TRL: Eena in nayṣeetoon o akhleetoon khad lhaw khena, hweymoen hishyar sabab bit ṭalqeetoon khad lhaw khena.
ENG: But if ye bite and devour one another, take heed that ye be not consumed one of another.

ASY: ܒܘܼܬ ܐܵܗܵܐ ܒܹܐܡܵܪܵܐ ܝܘܸܢ، ܚܝܹܝܡܘܼܢ ܒܪܘܼܚܵܐ ܘܠܵܐ ܡܲܣܒܸܥܝܼܬܘܿܢ ܫܲܗܘܲܬܬܵܐ ܕܟܝܵܢܵܐ ܚܲܛܵܝܵܐ.
TRL: Boet aha bemara ywin, khyeymoen broekha o la masbi'eetoon shahwatta dkyana khaṭaya.
ENG: But I say, Walk by the Spirit, and ye shall not fulfill the lust of the flesh.

ASY: ܣܵܒܵܒ ܦܲܓ݂ܪܵܐ ܟܹܐ ܫܲܗܘܸܬ ܕܲܠܩܘܼܒ݂ܠ ܕܪܘܼܚܵܐ، ܘܪܘܼܚܵܐ ܟܹܐ ܫܲܗܘܸܬܵܐ ܕܲܠܩܘܼܒ݂ܠ ܕܟܝܵܢܵܐ ܚܲܛܵܝܵܐ. ܬܸܪܘܲܝܗܝ ܕܲܠܩܘܼܒ݂ܠ ܕܚܲܕ ܠܗ̇ܘ ܐ݇ܚܹܪ݇ܢܵܐ ܝܢܵܐ، ܗܲܕܟ݂ܵܐ ܕܠܵܐ ܡܵܨܹܝܬܘܿܢ ܥܵܒ݂ܕܝܼܬܘܿܢ ܡܸܢܕܝܼ ܕܒܵܥܹܝܬܘܿܢ.
TRL: Sabab paghra ke shahwit dalqoewl droekha, o roekha ke shahwita dalqoewl dkyana khaṭaya. Tirwayhy dalqoewl dkhad lhaw khena yna, hadkha dla maṣeytoon 'awdeetoon mindee dba'eytoon.
ENG: For the flesh lusteth against the Spirit, and the Spirit against the flesh; for these are contrary the one to the other; that ye may not do the things that ye would.

ASY: ܐܝܼܢܵܐ ܐܸܢ ܒܪܘܼܚܵܐ ܦܝܵܫܵܐ ܝܬܘܿܢ ܡܗܘܼܕܝܹܐ، ܠܹܐ ܝܬܘܿܢ ܬܚܘܿܬ ܢܵܡܘܿܣܵܐ.
TRL: Eena in broekha pyasha ytoon mhoedye, le ytoon tkhoot namoosa.
ENG: But if ye are led by the Spirit, ye are not under the law.

ASY: ܫܘܼܠܵܢܹ̈ܐ ܕܟܝܵܢܵܐ ܚܲܛܵܝܵܐ ܓܸܠܝܹܐ ܝܢܵܐ، ܘܐܲܢܹܐ ܝܢܵܐ: ܙܵܢܝܘܼܬܵܐ، ܛܲܢܦܘܼܬܵܐ، ܦܲܚܙܘܼܬܵܐ،
TRL: Shoelane dkyana khaṭaya gilye yna, o ane yna: zanyoeta, ṭanpoeta, pakhzoeta,
ENG: Now the works of the flesh are manifest, which are these, fornication, uncleanness, lasciviousness,

ASY: ܣܓ݂ܵܕܬܵܐ ܕܨܵܢܲܡܹ̈ܐ، ܚܲܪܵܫܘܼܬܵܐ، ܕܸܫܡܸܢܵܝܘܼܬܵܐ، ܡܲܩܲܪܵܨܘܼܬܵܐ، ܒܲܚܸܠܵܢܘܼܬܵܐ، ܟܲܪܒܵܐ، ܦܠܵܫܹ̈ܐ، ܦܘܼܠܵܓܹ̈ܐ، ܦܘܼܪܫܘܼܢܝܵܐ،
TRL: Sghadta dṣaname, kharashoeta, dishminayoeta, maqaraṣoeta, bakhilanoeta, karba, plashe, poelage, poershoenya,
ENG: idolatry, sorcery, enmities, strife, jealousies, wraths, factions, divisions, heresies,

ASY: ܚܣܵܡܵܐ، ܪܵܘܵܝܘܼܬܵܐ، ܫܪܝܼܚܘܼܬܵܐ، ܘܡܸܢܕܝܼܵܢܹ̈ܐ ܡܐܲܝܟ݂ ܐܲܢܹܐ. ܡܲܪܥܘܼܫܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܝܼܘܸܢ ܐܲܝܟ݂ ܕܐ݇ܡܝܼܪܝܼ ܐܸܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܡ̣ܢ ܩܵܕ݇ܡܵܝܬܵܐ، ܐܵܢܝܼ ܕܗܲܕܟ݂ܵܐ ܟܹܐ ܚܵܝܝܼ ܠܹܐ ܝܵܪܬܝܼ ܡܲܠܟܘܼܬܵܐ ܕܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ.
TRL: Khsama, rawayoeta, shreekhoeta, o mindeeane maykh ane. Mar'oeshawkhoon eewin aykh dmeeree ilawkhoon min qamayta, anee dhadkha ke khayee le yartee malkoeta dalaha.
ENG: envyings, drunkenness, revellings, and such like: of the which I forewarn you, even as I did forewarn you, that they which practise such things shall not inherit the kingdom of God.

ASY: ܐܝܼܢܵܐ ܛܥܘܼܢܝܵܬܹ̈ܐ ܕܪܘܼܚܵܐ ܐܲܢܹܐ ܝܢܵܐ: ܚܘܼܒܵܐ، ܚܲܕܘܼܬܵܐ، ܫܠܵܡܵܐ، ܚܡܵܠܬܵܐ، ܒܲܣܝܼܡܘܼܬܵܐ، ܛܵܒ݂ܬܵܐ، ܡܗܘܼܡܢܘܼܬܵܐ،
TRL: Eena ṭ'oenyate droekha ane yna: khoeba, khadoeta, shlama, khmalta, baseemoeta, ṭawta, mhoemnoeta,
ENG: But the fruit of the Spirit is love, joy, peace, longsuffering, kindness, goodness, faithfulness,

ASY: ܡܲܟܝܼܟ݂ܘܼܬܵܐ، ܕܒ݂ܵܩܬܵܐ ܕܓܵܢܵܐ. ܥܲܠ ܗܲܕܟ݂ܵܐ ܡܸܢܕܝܼܵܢܹ̈ܐ ܠܲܝܬ ܢܵܡܘܿܣܵܐ.
TRL: Makeekhoeta, dwaqta dgana. 'Al hadkha mindeeane layt namoosa.
ENG: meekness, temperance: against such there is no law.

ASY: ܐܵܢܝܼ ܕܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ ܝܢܵܐ ܙܩܝܼܦ ܠܗܘܿܢ ܠܟܝܵܢܵܐ ܚܲܛܵܝܵܐ ܥܲܡ ܒܘܼܣܵܡܘܼ̈ܗܝ ܘܫܲܗܘܲܬܝܵܬܹ̈ܗ.
TRL: Anee dmsheekha yna zqeep-lhoon lkyana khaṭaya 'am boesamoehy o shahwatyateh.
ENG: And they that are of Christ Jesus have crucified the flesh with the passions and the lusts thereof.

ASY: ܐܸܢ ܚܵܝܲܚ ܒܪܘܼܚܵܐ، ܒܲܣ ܐܘܼܦ ܚܵܕܪܲܚ ܒܪܘܼܚܵܐ.
TRL: In khayakh broekha, bas oep khadrakh broekha.
ENG: If we live by the Spirit, by the Spirit let us also walk.

ASY: ܠܵܐ ܗܵܘܲܚ ܒܸܛܥܵܝܵܐ ܒܵܬ݇ܪ ܚܸܩܪܵܐ ܒܲܛܝܼܠܵܐ، ܡܲܟܪܘܼܒܹܐ ܚܲܕ ܠܗ̇ܘ ܐ݇ܚܹܪ݇ܢܵܐ، ܒܲܚܘܼܠܹܐ ܚܲܕ ܒܗ̇ܘ ܐ݇ܚܹܪ݇ܢܵܐ.
TRL: La hawakh biṭ'aya bar khiqra baṭeela, makroebe khad lhaw khena, bakhoele khad bhaw khena.
ENG: Let us not be vainglorious, provoking one another, envying one another.

ASY: ܝܵܐ ܐܲܚܘܿܢܘܵܬܝܼ̈، ܐܸܢ ܚܲܕ ܡܸܢܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܦܵܐܹܫ ܕܒ݂ܝܼܩܵܐ ܒܓܢܵܗܵܐ، ܐܲܚܬܘܿܢ ܕܝܼܬܘܿܢ ܪ̈ܘܼܚܵܢܵܝܹܐ ܡܲܕܸܪܘܼܢ ܠܹܗ ܒܪܘܼܚܵܐ ܡܲܟܝܼܟ݂ܬܵܐ. ܐܝܼܢܵܐ ܗܘܹܝܡܘܼܢ ܗܸܫܝܵܪ ܕܐܘܼܦ ܐܲܚܬܘܿܢ ܠܵܐ ܢܵܦܠܝܼܬܘܿܢ.
TRL: Ya akhoonwatee, in khad minawkhoon paesh dweeqa bgnaha, akhtoon deetoon roekhanaye madiroen-leh broekha makeekhta. Eena hweymoen hishyar doep akhtoon la napleetoon.
ENG: Brethren, even if a man be overtaken in any trespass, ye which are spiritual, restore such a one in a spirit of meekness; looking to thyself, lest thou also be tempted.

ASY: ܛܥܘܿܢܘܼܢ ܝܘܼܩܪܵܐ ܕܚܲܕ ܕܗ̇ܘ ܐ݇ܚܹܪ݇ܢܵܐ، ܘܗܲܕܟ݂ܵܐ ܬܲܡܸܡܘܼܢ ܢܵܡܘܿܣܵܐ ܕܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ.
TRL: Ṭ'oonoen yoeqra dkhad dhaw khena, o hadkha tamimoen namoosa dmsheekha.
ENG: Bear ye one another’s burdens, and so fulfill the law of Christ.

ASY: ܣܵܒܵܒ ܐܸܢ ܚܲܕ ܚܵܫܹܒ݂ ܕܝܼܠܹܗ ܡܸܢܕܝܼ ܘܟܲܕ ܗ̇ܘ ܠܹܐ ܝܠܹܗ ܗܸܟ̃ ܡܸܢܕܝܼ، ܥܲܠܕܘܼܝܹܐ ܝܠܹܗ ܓܵܢܹܗ.
TRL: Sabab in khad khashew deeleh mindee o kad haw le-yleh hich mindee, 'aldoeye-yleh ganeh.
ENG: For if a man thinketh himself to be something, when he is nothing, he deceiveth himself.

ASY: ܐܝܼܢܵܐ ܟܠ ܐ݇ܢܵܫܵܐ ܨܲܚܨܹܐ ܦܘܼܠܚܵܢܵܐ ܕܓܵܢܹܗ، ܗ̇ܝܓܵܗ ܫܵܩܹܠ ܫܘܼܒ݂ܗܵܪܵܐ ܒܓܵܢܹܗ ܘܠܵܐ ܒܓܵܫܲܩܬܵܐ ܠܐ݇ܚܹܪ̈݇ܢܹܐ.
TRL: Eena kl nasha ṣakhṣe poelkhana dganeh, haygah shaqel shoewhara bganeh o la bgashaqta lkhene.
ENG: But let each man prove his own work, and then shall he have his glorying in regard of himself alone, and not of his neighbour.

ASY: ܣܵܒܵܒ ܟܠ ܚܲܕ ܟܲܪܬܵܐ ܕܓܵܢܹܗ ܒܸܬ ܛܵܥܹܢ.
TRL: Sabab kl khad karta dganeh bit ṭa'en.
ENG: For each man shall bear his own burden.

ASY: ܗ̇ܘ ܕܦܝܵܫܵܐ ܝܠܹܗ ܡܘܼܠܦܵܐ ܗܹܡܸܙܡܵܢ، ܒܟܠܲܝܗܝ ܛܵܒ݂ܵܬܹ̈ܐ ܫܲܪܸܟ ܥܲܡ ܡܲܠܦܵܢܹܗ.
TRL: Haw dpyasha-yleh moelpa hemizman, bklayhy ṭawate sharik 'am malpaneh.
ENG: But let him that is taught in the word communicate unto him that teacheth in all good things.

ASY: ܣܵܒܵܒ ܠܵܐ ܚܵܠܛܝܼܬܘܿܢ، ܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ ܠܹܐ ܦܵܐܹܫ ܡܘܼܣܚܸܪܵܐ. ܐ݇ܢܵܫܵܐ ܒܸܬ ܚܵܨܹܕ ܡܸܢܕܝܼ ܕܙܵܪܹܥ.
TRL: Sabab la khalṭeetoon, Alaha le paesh moeskhira. nasha bit khaṣed mindee dzare'.
ENG: Be not deceived; God is not mocked: for whatsoever a man soweth, that shall he also reap.

ASY: ܗ̇ܘ ܕܙܵܪܹܥ ܩܵܐ ܒܘܼܣܵܡܵܐ ܕܟܝܵܢܵܐ ܚܲܛܵܝܵܐ، ܚܪܵܒ݂ܵܐ ܒܸܬ ܚܵܨܹܕ ܡܸܢܹܗ. ܐܝܼܢܵܐ ܗ̇ܘ ܕܙܵܪܹܥ ܩܵܐ ܒܘܼܣܵܡܵܐ ܕܪܘܼܚܵܐ، ܚܲܝܹ̈ܐ ܕܠܥܵܠܲܡ ܒܸܬ ܚܵܨܹܕ ܡ̣ܢ ܪܘܼܚܵܐ.
TRL: Haw dzare' qa boesama dkyana khaṭaya, khrawa bit khaṣed mineh. Eena haw dzare' qa boesama droekha, khaye dl'alam bit khaṣed min roekha.
ENG: For he that soweth unto his own flesh shall of the flesh reap corruption; but he that soweth unto the Spirit shall of the Spirit reap eternal life.

ASY: ܠܵܐ ܣܵܩܕܲܚ ܡ̣ܢ ܠܸܥܒ݂ܵܕܵܐ ܛܵܒ݂ܬܵܐ، ܣܵܒܵܒ ܒܥܕܵܢܵܐ ܠܵܚܘܿܡܬܵܐ ܒܸܬ ܚܵܨܕܲܚ ܐܸܢ ܠܵܐ ܢܵܦܠܲܚ.
TRL: La saqdakh min li'wada ṭawta, sabab b'dana lakhoomta bit khaṣdakh in la naplakh.
ENG: And let us not be weary in well-doing: for in due season we shall reap, if we faint not.

ASY: ܒܲܣ ܟܡܵܐ ܕܐܝܼܬ ܠܲܢ ܦܸܪܣܲܬ ܥܵܒ݂ܕܲܚ ܛܵܒ݂ܬܵܐ ܠܟܠܲܝܗܝ، ܒܘܼܫ ܙܵܘܕܵܐ ܠܒܢܘܿܢܹ̈ܐ ܕܗܲܝܡܵܢܘܼܬܵܐ.
TRL: Bas kma deet lan pirsat 'awdakh ṭawta lklayhy, boesh zawda lbnoone dhaymanoeta.
ENG: So then, as we have opportunity, let us work that which is good toward all men, and especially toward them that are of the household of the faith.

ASY: ܚܙܹܝܡܘܼܢ ܟܡܵܐ ܓܘܼܪܹ̈ܐ ܝܢܵܐ ܐܵܬܘܵܬܹ̈ܐ ܕܟܬܝܼܒ݂ ܠܝܼ ܒܐܝܼܕܵܬܝܼ̈ ܐܸܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܓܵܘ ܐܵܗܵܐ ܟܬܵܒ݂ܵܐ.
TRL: Khzeymoen kma goere yna atwate dkteew-lee beedatee ilawkhoon gaw aha ktawa.
ENG: See with how large letters I have written unto you with mine own hand.

ASY: ܐܵܢܝܼ ܕܒܵܥܝܼ ܕܡܲܚܙܝܼ ܓܵܢܲܝܗܝ ܒܲܪܵܐܝܼܬ، ܡܲܠܝܘܼܨܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܝܼܢܵܐ ܕܦܵܝܫܝܼܬܘܿܢ ܓܙܝܼܪܹܐ ܐܲܚܟ̰ܝܼ ܕܠܵܐ ܦܵܝܫܝܼ ܛܪܝܼܕܹܐ ܒܘܼܬ ܙܩܝܼܦܵܐ ܕܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ.
TRL: Anee dba'ee dmakhzee ganayhy baraeet, malyoeṣawkhoon eena dpaysheetoon gzeere akhchee dla payshee ṭreede boet zqeepa dmsheekha.
ENG: As many as desire to make a fair show in the flesh, they compel you to be circumcised; only that they may not be persecuted for the cross of Christ.

ASY: ܐܘܼܦ ܐܵܢܝܼ ܕܓܙܝܼܪܹܐ ܝܢܵܐ ܒܓܵܢܲܝܗܝ ܠܹܐ ܢܵܛܪܝܼ ܢܵܡܘܿܣܵܐ، ܐܝܼܢܵܐ ܒܵܥܝܼ ܕܦܵܝܫܝܼܬܘܿܢ ܓܙܝܼܪܹܐ ܕܥܵܒ݂ܕܝܼ ܫܘܼܒ݂ܗܵܪܵܐ ܒܡܸܢܕܝܼ ܕܥܒ݂ܝܼܕ ܠܗܘܿܢ ܠܦܲܓ݂ܪܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ.
TRL: Oep anee dgzeere yna bganayhy le naṭree namoosa, eena ba'ee dpaysheetoon gzeere d'awdee shoewhara bmindee d'weed-lhoon lpaghrawkhoon.
ENG: For not even they who receive circumcision do themselves keep the law; but they desire to have you circumcised, that they may glory in your flesh.

ASY: ܐܝܼܢܵܐ ܐܵܢܵܐ ܚܵܣ ܠܝܼ ܕܥܵܒ݂ܕܹܢ ܫܘܼܒ݂ܗܵܪܵܐ ܫܒ݂ܘܿܩ ܡ̣ܢ ܒܙܩܝܼܦܵܐ ܕܡܵܪܲܢ ܝܼܫܘܿܥ ܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ، ܗ̇ܘ ܕܒܝܼܹܗ ܕܘܼܢܝܹܐ ܦܝܼܫ ܠܵܗ̇ ܙܩܝܼܦܬܵܐ ܐܸܠܝܼ ܘܐܵܢܵܐ ܠܕܘܼܢܝܹܐ.
TRL: Eena ana khas-lee d'awden shoewhara shwooq min bzqeepa dmaran eeshoo' msheekha, haw dbee-eh doenye peesh-laha zqeepta ilee o ana ldoenye.
ENG: But far be it from me to glory, save in the cross of our Lord Jesus Christ, through which the world hath been crucified unto me, and I unto the world.

ASY: ܣܵܒܵܒ ܠܵܐ ܓܙܘܼܪܬܵܐ ܡܸܢܕܝܼ ܝܠܵܗ̇ ܘܠܵܐ ܥܘܼܪܠܘܼܬܵܐ، ܐܸܠܵܐ ܒܪܝܼܬܵܐ ܚܲܕܬܵܐ.
TRL: Sabab la gzoerta mindee-ylaha o la 'oerloeta, ila breeta khadta.
ENG: For neither is circumcision anything, nor uncircumcision, but a new creature.

ASY: ܐܵܢܝܼ ܕܚܵܕܪܝܼ ܒܐܵܗܵܐ ܩܵܢܘܿܢܵܐ، ܫܠܵܡܵܐ ܘܪ̈ܲܚܡܹܐ ܗܵܘܝܼ ܥܲܠܲܝܗܝ، ܘܐܘܼܦ ܥܲܠ ܝܼܣܪܵܝܹܠ ܕܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ.
TRL: Anee dkhadree baha qanoona, shlama o rakhme hawee 'alayhy, o oep 'al eesrayel dalaha.
ENG: And as many as shall walk by this rule, peace be upon them, and mercy, and upon the Israel of God.

ASY: ܡ̣ܢ ܐܵܕܝܼܵܐ ܐ݇ܢܵܫܵܐ ܠܵܐ ܓ̰ܲܢܓ̰ܸܪ ܐܸܠܝܼ، ܣܵܒܵܒ ܛܥܝܼܢܵܐ ܝܘܸܢ ܓܵܘ ܦܲܓ݂ܪܝܼ ܫܵܘܦܵܐ ܕܕܲܪ̈ܒܵܬܹܐ ܕܝܼܫܘܿܥ.
TRL: Min adeea nasha la janjir ilee, sabab ṭ'eena ywin gaw paghree shawpa ddarbate deeshoo'.
ENG: From henceforth let no man trouble me: for I bear branded on my body the marks of Jesus.

ASY: ܫܵܦܵܩܲܬ ܕܡܵܪܲܢ ܝܼܫܘܿܥ ܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ ܥܲܡ ܪܘܼܚܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ، ܐܲܚܘܿܢܘܵܬܝܼ̈. ܐܵܡܹܝܢ.
TRL: Shapaqat dmaran eeshoo' msheekha 'am roekhawkhoon, akhoonwatee. Ameyn.
ENG: The grace of our Lord Jesus Christ be with your spirit, brethren. Amen.

ASY: ܦܵܘܠܘܿܣ، ܫܠܝܼܚܵܐ ܕܝܼܫܘܿܥ ܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ ܒܨܸܒ݂ܝܵܢܵܐ ܕܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ، ܠܩܲܕܝܼܫܹ̈ܐ ܕܝܼܢܵܐ ܓܵܘ ܐܵܦܸܣܘܿܣ، ܡܗܘܼܡܢܹ̈ܐ ܒܝܼܫܘܿܥ ܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ.
TRL: Pawloos, shleekha deeshoo' msheekha bṣiwyana dalaha, lqadeeshe deena gaw apisoos, mhoemne beeshoo' msheekha.
ENG: Paul, an apostle of Christ Jesus through the will of God, to the saints which are at Ephesus, and the faithful in Christ Jesus:

ASY: ܫܵܦܵܩܲܬ ܘܫܠܵܡܵܐ ܐܸܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܡ̣ܢ ܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ ܒܵܒܲܢ ܘܡ̣ܢ ܡܵܪܲܢ ܝܼܫܘܿܥ ܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ.
TRL: Shapaqat o shlama ilawkhoon min Alaha baban o min Maran eeshoo' msheekha.
ENG: Grace to you and peace from God our Father and the Lord Jesus Christ.

ASY: ܒܘܼܪܟ݂ܵܐ ܝܠܹܗ ܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ ܒܵܒܵܐ ܕܡܵܪܲܢ ܝܼܫܘܿܥ ܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ، ܗ̇ܘ ܕܩܲܡ ܒܲܪܸܟ݂ ܠܲܢ ܒܟܠ ܒܘܼܪܟܬܵܐ ܪܘܼܚܵܢܵܝܬܵܐ ܒܕܘܼܟܵܢܹ̈ܐ ܫܡܲܝܵܢܵܝܹ̈ܐ ܒܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ،
TRL: Boerkha-yleh Alaha baba dmaran eeshoo' msheekha, haw dqam barikh lan bkl boerkta roekhanayta bdoekane shmayanaye bmsheekha,
ENG: Blessed be the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ, who hath blessed us with every spiritual blessing in the heavenly places in Christ:

ASY: ܣܵܒܵܒ ܒܝܼܹܗ ܓܘܼܒܹܐ ܠܹܗ ܐܸܠܲܢ ܡ̣ܢ ܩܵܕ݇ܡ ܫܘܼܪܵܝܵܐ ܕܒܪܝܼܬܵܐ، ܕܗܵܘܲܚ ܩܲܕܝܼܫܹ̈ܐ ܘܕܠܵܐ ܡܘܼܡܵܐ ܩܵܕ݇ܡܘܼܗܝ.
TRL: Sabab bee-eh goebe-leh ilan min qam shoeraya dbreeta, dhawakh qadeeshe o dla moema qamoehy.
ENG: even as he chose us in him before the foundation of the world, that we should be holy and without blemish before him in love:

ASY: ܒܚܘܼܒܵܐ ܪܫܝܼܡ ܠܹܗ ܐܸܠܲܢ ܡ̣ܢ ܩܵܕ݇ܡܵܝܬܵܐ ܕܦܵܝܫܲܚ ܥܒ݂ܝܼܕܹܐ ܒܢܘܿܢܹ̈ܐ ܐܸܠܹܗ ܒܝܲܕ ܝܼܫܘܿܥ ܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ، ܐܲܝܟ݂ ܕܫܵܦܹܪ ܠܨܸܒ݂ܝܵܢܹܗ،
TRL: Bkhoeba rsheem-leh ilan min qamayta dpayshakh 'weede bnoone ileh byad eeshoo' msheekha, aykh dshaper lṣiwyaneh,
ENG: having foreordained us unto adoption as sons through Jesus Christ unto himself, according to the good pleasure of his will,

ASY: ܕܦܵܐܹܫ ܚܩܝܼܪܵܐ ܫܘܼܒ݂ܚܵܐ ܕܫܵܦܵܩܲܬܹܗ ܕܫܘܼܦܸܟ݂ ܠܹܗ ܥܲܠܲܢ ܒܝܲܕ ܡܘܼܚܸܒܵܐ،
TRL: Dpaesh khqeera shoewkha dshapaqateh dshoepikh-leh 'alan byad moekhiba,
ENG: to the praise of the glory of his grace, which he freely bestowed on us in the Beloved:

ASY: ܕܒܝܼܹܗ ܐܝܼܬ ܠܲܢ ܦܘܼܪܩܵܢܵܐ ܒܕܸܡܹܗ، ܦܘܼܚܵܠܵܐ ܕܓܢܵܗܹ̈ܐ ܐܲܝܟ݂ ܥܘܼܬܪܵܐ ܕܫܵܦܵܩܲܬܹܗ،
TRL: Dbee-eh eet lan poerqana bdimeh, poekhala dgnahe aykh 'oetra dshapaqateh,
ENG: in whom we have our redemption through his blood, the forgiveness of our trespasses, according to the riches of his grace,

ASY: ܗ̇ܝ ܕܡܘܼܙܝܸܕܵܐ ܠܹܗ ܐܸܠܲܢ ܒܟܠ ܚܸܟ݂ܡܬܵܐ ܘܒܟܠ ܦܲܪܡܵܝܬܵܐ.
TRL: Hay dmoezyida-leh ilan bkl khikhmta o bkl parmayta.
ENG: which he made to abound toward us in all wisdom and prudence,

ASY: ܘܡܘܼܕܸܥ ܠܹܗ ܐܸܠܲܢ ܐ݇ܪܵܙܵܐ ܕܨܸܒ݂ܝܵܢܹܗ ܐܲܝܟ݂ ܕܒܣܝܼܡ ܠܵܗ̇ ܠܹܗ، ܘܐܲܝܟ݂ ܕܡܘܼܬܸܒ݂ ܠܹܗ ܒܪܸܥܝܵܢܵܐ ܕܓܵܢܹܗ ܡ̣ܢ ܩܵܕ݇ܡܵܝܬܵܐ،
TRL: O moedi' leh ilan raza dṣiwyaneh aykh dbseem-laha-leh, o aykh dmoetiw-leh bri'yana dganeh min qamayta,
ENG: having made known unto us the mystery of his will, according to his good pleasure which he purposed in him

ASY: ܕܐܝܼܡܲܢ ܕܡܵܛܝܼ ܙܲܒ݂ܢܹ̈ܐ ܕܡܸܠܝܘܼܬܵܐ، ܕܡܲܬܸܒ݂ ܟܠܲܝܗܝ ܡܸܢܕܝܼܵܢܹ̈ܐ ܕܒܫܡܲܝܵܐ ܘܕܒܐܲܪܥܵܐ ܬܚܘܿܬ ܡܕܲܒܪܵܢܘܼܬܵܐ ܕܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ ܐܲܚܟ̰ܝܼ،
TRL: Deeman dmaṭee zawne dmilyoeta, dmatiw klayhy mindeeane dbshmaya o dbar'a tkhoot mdabranoeta dmsheekha akhchee,
ENG: unto a dispensation of the fulness of the times, to sum up all things in Christ, the things in the heavens, and the things upon the earth; in him, I say,

ASY: ܗ̇ܘ ܕܐܘܼܦ ܐܲܚܢܲܢ ܒܝܼܹܗ ܗܘܹܐ ܠܲܢ ܝܵܪ̈ܘܿܬܹܐ، ܟܲܕ ܦܝܼܫ ܠܲܢ ܪܫܝܼܡܹܐ ܡ̣ܢ ܩܵܕ݇ܡܵܝܬܵܐ ܠܢܝܼܫܵܐ ܕܗ̇ܘ ܕܒܸܦܠܵܚܵܐ ܝܠܹܗ ܟܠ ܡܸܢܕܝܼ ܐܲܝܟ݂ ܨܸܒ݂ܝܵܢܹܗ،
TRL: Haw doep akhnan bee-eh hwe lan yaroote, kad peesh lan rsheeme min qamayta lneesha dhaw dbiplakha-yleh kl mindee aykh ṣiwyaneh,
ENG: in whom also we were made a heritage, having been foreordained according to the purpose of him who worketh all things after the counsel of his will;

ASY: ܕܐܲܚܢܲܢ ܕܩܵܕ݇ܡܵܝܬܵܐ ܩܲܡ ܗܵܘܹܐ ܠܲܢ ܗܹܒ݂ܝܼ ܒܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ، ܗܵܘܲܚ ܩܵܐ ܚܸܩܪܵܐ ܕܫܘܼܒ݂ܚܹܗ.
TRL: Dakhnan dqamayta qam hawe lan hewee bmsheekha, hawakh qa khiqra dshoewkheh.
ENG: to the end that we should be unto the praise of his glory, we who had before hoped in Christ:

ASY: ܘܐܘܼܦ ܐܲܚܬܘܿܢ، ܐܝܼܡܲܢ ܕܫܡܝܼܥ ܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܗܹܡܸܙܡܵܢ ܕܫܪܵܪܵܐ، ܕܝܼܠܵܗ̇ ܐܹܘܲܢܓܲܠܝܼܘܿܢ ܕܦܘܼܪܩܵܢܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ، ܗܘܼܡܸܢܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܒܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ، ܘܒܝܼܹܗ ܦܝܼܫ ܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܡܸܚܝܹܐ ܚܵܬܡܵܐ ܒܪܘܼܚܵܐ ܕܩܘܼܕܫܵܐ، ܕܦܝܼܫܵܐ ܝܗ݇ܘܵܐ ܩܘܼܘܸܠܵܐ ܐܸܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ،
TRL: O oep akhtoon, eeman dshmee' lawkhoon hemizman dshrara, deelaha ewangaleeoon dpoerqanawkhoon, hoeminawkhoon bmsheekha, o bee-eh peesh lawkhoon mikhye khatma broekha dqoedsha, dpeesha ywa qoewila ilawkhoon,
ENG: in whom ye also, having heard the word of the truth, the gospel of your salvation,—in whom, having also believed, ye were sealed with the Holy Spirit of promise,

ASY: ܗ̇ܘ ܕܝܼܠܹܗ ܪܲܗܒ݂ܘܿܢܵܐ ܕܝܵܪܬܘܼܬܲܢ، ܒܐܵܗܵܐ ܩܵܘܠܵܐ ܕܙܒ݂ܝܼܢܲܢ ܝܼܠܹܗ ܕܗܵܘܲܚ ܕܝܼܹܗ ܠܡܲܐܣܘܼܩܹܐ ܫܘܼܒ݂ܚܵܐ ܠܐܝܼܩܵܪܹܗ.
TRL: Haw deeleh rahwoona dyartoetan, baha qawla dzweenan eeleh dhawakh dee-eh lmasoeqe shoewkha leeqareh.
ENG: which is an earnest of our inheritance, unto the redemption of God’s own possession, unto the praise of his glory.

ASY: ܒܘܼܬ ܐܵܗܵܐ ܐܘܼܦ ܐܵܢܵܐ، ܐܝܼܡܲܢ ܕܫܡܝܼܥ ܠܝܼ ܒܘܼܬ ܗܲܝܡܵܢܘܼܬܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܒܡܵܪܲܢ ܝܼܫܘܿܥ، ܘܚܘܼܒܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܠܟܸܣ ܟܠܲܝܗܝ ܩܲܕܝܼܫܹ̈ܐ،
TRL: Boet aha oep ana, eeman dshmee' lee boet haymanoetawkhoon bmaran eeshoo', o khoebawkhoon lkis klayhy qadeeshe,
ENG: For this cause I also, having heard of the faith in the Lord Jesus which is among you, and which ye shew toward all the saints,

ASY: ܠܹܐ ܝܘܸܢ ܫܸܠܝܵܐ ܡ̣ܢ ܠܫܲܟܘܼܪܹܐ ܒܘܼܬ ܕܝܼܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܘܠܸܕܟ݂ܵܪܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܒܨܠܵܘܵܬܝܼ̈،
TRL: Le ywin shilya min lshakoere boet deeawkhoon o lidkharawkhoon bṣlawatee,
ENG: cease not to give thanks for you, making mention of you in my prayers;

ASY: ܕܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ ܕܡܵܪܲܢ ܝܼܫܘܿܥ ܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ، ܒܵܒܵܐ ܕܫܘܼܒ݂ܚܵܐ، ܝܲܗ݇ܒܸܠ ܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܪܘܼܚܵܐ ܕܚܸܟ݂ܡܬܵܐ ܘܕܓܸܠܝܵܢܵܐ، ܕܝܵܕܥܝܼܬܘܿܢ ܠܹܗ ܒܘܼܫ ܨܦܵܝܝܼ،
TRL: Dalaha dmaran eeshoo' msheekha, baba dshoewkha, yabil lawkhoon roekha dkhikhmta o dgilyana, dyad'eetoon-leh boesh ṣpayee,
ENG: that the God of our Lord Jesus Christ, the Father of glory, may give unto you a spirit of wisdom and revelation in the knowledge of him;

ASY: ܕܦܵܝܫܝܼ ܒܘܼܗܪܸܢܹܗ ܥܲܝܢܵܬܹ̈ܐ ܕܠܸܒܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ، ܘܕܝܵܕܥܝܼܬܘܿܢ ܡܘܿܕܝܼ ܝܠܵܗ̇ ܗܹܒ݂ܝܼ ܕܐܸܠܘܼܗ̇ ܩܸܪܝܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܝܼܠܹܗ، ܘܡܘܿܕܝܼ ܝܠܹܗ ܥܘܼܬܪܵܐ ܕܚܸܩܪܵܐ ܕܝܵܪܬܘܼܬܵܐ ܒܩܲܕܝܼܫܹ̈ܐ،
TRL: Dpayshee boehrineh 'aynate dlibawkhoon, o dyad'eetoon moodee-ylaha hewee diloeha qiryawkhoon eeleh, o moodee-yleh 'oetra dkhiqra dyartoeta bqadeeshe,
ENG: having the eyes of your heart enlightened, that ye may know what is the hope of his calling, what the riches of the glory of his inheritance in the saints,

ASY: ܘܡܘܿܕܝܼ ܝܠܵܗ̇ ܦܸܪܝܘܼܬܵܐ ܕܓܘܼܪܘܼܬܵܐ ܕܚܲܝܠܹܗ ܒܝܼܲܢ، ܐܲܚܢܲܢ ܕܗܲܡܘܼܢܹܐ ܝܘܲܚ، ܐܲܝܟ݂ ܕܦܵܠܹܚ ܒܚܲܝܠܹܗ ܓܲܢ݇ܒܵܪܵܐ،
TRL: O moodee-ylaha piryoeta dgoeroeta dkhayleh bee-an, akhnan dhamoene ywakh, aykh dpalekh bkhayleh gabara,
ENG: and what the exceeding greatness of his power to us-ward who believe, according to that working of the strength of his might

ASY: ܗ̇ܘ ܕܡܘܼܦܠܸܚ ܠܹܗ ܒܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ ܐܝܼܡܲܢ ܕܡܘܼܩܸܡ ܠܹܗ ܡ̣ܢ ܡܝܼܬܹ̈ܐ، ܘܡܘܼܬܸܒ݂ ܠܹܗ ܡ̣ܢ ܝܲܡܝܼܢܹܗ ܒܫܡܲܝܵܐ،
TRL: Haw dmoeplikh-leh bmsheekha eeman dmoeqim-leh min meete, o moetiw-leh min yameeneh bshmaya,
ENG: which he wrought in Christ, when he raised him from the dead, and made him to sit at his right hand in the heavenly places,

ASY: ܥܸܠܸܠ ܡ̣ܢ ܟܠܲܝܗܝ ܪܹ̈ܫܵܢܹܐ، ܘܫܘܼܠܛܵܢܹ̈ܐ، ܘܚܲܝܠܹ̈ܐ ܘܡܵܪ̈ܵܘܵܬܹܐ، ܘܥܸܠܸܠ ܡ̣ܢ ܟܠ ܫܸܡܵܐ ܕܦܵܐܹܫ ܩܸܪܝܵܐ، ܠܵܐ ܐܲܚܟ̰ܝܼ ܒܐܵܗܵܐ ܙܲܒ݂ܢܵܐ، ܐܝܼܢܵܐ ܐܘܼܦ ܒܙܲܒ݂ܢܵܐ ܕܐܵܬܹܐ.
TRL: 'Ilil min klayhy reshane, o shoelṭane, o khayle o marawate, o 'ilil min kl shima dpaesh qirya, la akhchee baha zawna, eena oep bzawna date.
ENG: far above all rule, and authority, and power, and dominion, and every name that is named, not only in this world, but also in that which is to come:

ASY: ܘܡܘܼܬܸܒ݂ ܠܹܗ ܟܠܲܝܗܝ ܡܸܢܕܝܼܵܢܹ̈ܐ ܬܚܘܿܬ ܐܲܩܠܵܬܹ̈ܗ، ܘܥܒ݂ܝܼܕ ܠܹܗ ܪܹܫܵܐ ܥܲܠ ܟܠ ܡܸܢܕܝܼ ܩܵܐ ܥܹܕܬܵܐ،
TRL: O moetiw-leh klayhy mindeeane tkhoot aqlateh, o 'weed-leh resha 'al kl mindee qa 'edta,
ENG: and he put all things in subjection under his feet, and gave him to be head over all things to the church,

ASY: ܕܝܼܠܵܗ̇ ܦܲܓ݂ܪܹܗ، ܘܕܝܼܠܵܗ̇ ܡܸܠܝܘܼܬܵܐ ܕܗ̇ܘ ܕܟܹܐ ܡܵܠܹܐ ܟܠ ܡܸܢܕܝܼ ܒܟܠ ܐܘܼܪܚܵܐ.
TRL: Deelaha paghreh, o deelaha milyoeta dhaw dke male kl mindee bkl oerkha.
ENG: which is his body, the fulness of him that filleth all in all.

ASY: ܘܐܲܚܬܘܿܢ ܡܝܼܬܹ̈ܐ ܝܬܘܿܢ ܗ݇ܘܵܘ ܒܓܢܵܗܹ̈ܐ ܘܒܚܛܝܼܵܬܹ̈ܐ،
TRL: O akhtoon meete ytoon waw bgnahe o bkhṭeeate,
ENG: And you did he quicken, when ye were dead through your trespasses and sins,

ASY: ܕܓܵܘܲܝܗܝ ܩܵܕ݇ܡܵܝܬܵܐ ܟܹܐ ܚܵܕܪܝܼܬܘܿܢ ܗ݇ܘܵܘ ܒܐܘܼܪ̈ܚܵܬܹܐ ܕܐܵܗܵܐ ܙܲܒ݂ܢܵܐ، ܘܒܐܘܼܪ̈ܚܵܬܹܐ ܕܪܹܫܵܐ ܕܫܘܼܠܛܵܢܵܐ ܕܗܵܘܵܐ، ܪܘܼܚܵܐ ܕܐܵܕܝܼܵܐ ܒܸܦܠܵܚܵܐ ܝܠܵܗ̇ ܓܵܘ ܒܢܘܿܢܹ̈ܐ ܕܥܵܨܝܼܘܼܬܵܐ.
TRL: Dgawayhy qamayta ke khadreetoon waw boerkhate daha zawna, o boerkhate dresha dshoelṭana dhawa, roekha dadeea biplakha-ylaha gaw bnoone d'aṣeeoeta.
ENG: wherein aforetime ye walked according to the course of this world, according to the prince of the power of the air, of the spirit that now worketh in the sons of disobedience;

ASY: ܐܘܼܦ ܐܲܚܢܲܢ ܟܠܲܢ ܚܕܝܼܪܲܢ ܩܵܕ݇ܡܵܝܬܵܐ ܒܐܲܢܹܐ ܐܘܼܪ̈ܚܵܬܹܐ، ܒܫܲܗܘܲܬܝܵܬܹ̈ܐ ܕܟܝܵܢܲܢ ܚܲܛܵܝܵܐ، ܒܸܥܒ݂ܵܕܵܐ ܨܸܒ݂ܝܵܢܵܐ ܕܦܲܓ݂ܪܵܐ ܘܪܸܥܝܵܢܹܗ. ܒܟܝܵܢܲܢ ܒܢܘܿܢܹ̈ܐ ܕܟܲܪܒܵܐ ܝܘܲܚ ܗ݇ܘܵܘ، ܐܲܝܟ݂ ܐ݇ܚܹܪ̈݇ܢܹܐ.
TRL: Oep akhnan klan khdeeran qamayta bane oerkhate, bshahwatyate dkyanan khaṭaya, bi'wada ṣiwyana dpaghra o ri'yaneh. Bkyanan bnoone dkarba ywakh waw, aykh khene.
ENG: among whom we also all once lived in the lusts of our flesh, doing the desires of the flesh and of the mind, and were by nature children of wrath, even as the rest:—

ASY: ܐܝܼܢܵܐ ܣܵܒܵܒ ܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ ܥܲܬܝܼܪܵܐ ܝܠܹܗ ܒܪ̈ܲܚܡܘܼܗܝ، ܘܚܘܼܒܹܗ ܓܘܼܪܵܐ ܝܠܹܗ ܠܟܸܣ ܠܲܢ،
TRL: Eena sabab Alaha 'ateera-yleh brakhmoehy, o khoebeh goera-yleh lkis lan,
ENG: but God, being rich in mercy, for his great love wherewith he loved us,

ASY: ܩܲܡ ܡܲܚܹܐ ܠܲܢ ܥܲܡ ܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ ܟܲܕ ܡܝܼܬܹ̈ܐ ܝܘܲܚ ܗ݇ܘܵܘ ܓܵܘ ܓܢܵܗܹ̈ܐ. ܒܫܵܦܵܩܲܬܹܗ ܩܲܡ ܦܲܪܸܩ ܠܲܢ.
TRL: Qam makhe lan 'am msheekha kad meete ywakh waw gaw gnahe. Bshapaqateh qam pariq lan.
ENG: even when we were dead through our trespasses, quickened us together with Christ (by grace have ye been saved),

ASY: ܘܩܲܡ ܡܲܩܸܡ ܠܲܢ ܥܲܡܹܗ ܘܩܲܡ ܡܲܬܸܒ݂ ܠܲܢ ܥܲܡܹܗ ܒܕܘܼܟܵܢܹ̈ܐ ܫܡܲܝܵܢܵܝܹ̈ܐ ܒܝܼܫܘܿܥ ܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ،
TRL: O qam maqim lan 'ameh o qam matiw lan 'ameh bdoekane shmayanaye beeshoo' msheekha,
ENG: and raised us up with him, and made us to sit with him in the heavenly places, in Christ Jesus:

ASY: ܕܡܲܕܸܥ ܒܙܲܒ݂ܢܹ̈ܐ ܕܐܵܬܝܼ ܥܘܼܬܪܵܐ ܓܘܼܪܵܐ ܕܫܵܦܵܩܲܬܹܗ ܒܒܲܣܝܼܡܘܼܬܵܐ ܠܟܸܣ ܠܲܢ ܒܝܼܫܘܿܥ ܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ.
TRL: Dmadi' bzawne datee 'oetra goera dshapaqateh bbaseemoeta lkis lan beeshoo' msheekha.
ENG: that in the ages to come he might shew the exceeding riches of his grace in kindness toward us in Christ Jesus:

ASY: ܣܵܒܵܒ ܒܫܵܦܵܩܲܬ ܦܝܼܫ ܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܦܪܝܼܩܹܐ ܒܝܲܕ ܗܲܝܡܵܢܘܼܬܵܐ؛ ܘܐܵܗܵܐ ܠܹܐ ܝܠܵܗ̇ ܡܸܢܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ، ܐܸܠܵܐ ܡܵܘܗܲܒ݂ܬܵܐ ܕܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ ܝܠܵܗ̇،
TRL: Sabab bshapaqat peesh lawkhoon preeqe byad haymanoeta; o aha le-ylaha minawkhoon, ila mawhawta dalaha-ylaha,
ENG: for by grace have ye been saved through faith; and that not of yourselves: it is the gift of God:

ASY: ܠܵܐ ܡ̣ܢ ܦܘܼܠܚܵܢܹ̈ܐ، ܕܠܵܐ ܥܵܒܹܕ ܫܘܼܒ݂ܗܵܪܵܐ ܐܘܼܦ ܚܲܕ.
TRL: La min poelkhane, dla 'abed shoewhara oep khad.
ENG: not of works, that no man should glory.

ASY: ܣܵܒܵܒ ܦܘܼܠܚܵܢܵܐ ܕܐܝܼܕܵܬܹ̈ܗ ܝܘܲܚ، ܦܝܼܫܹܐ ܒܸܪܝܹܐ ܒܝܼܫܘܿܥ ܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ ܠܥܒ݂ܵܕܹ̈ܐ ܛܵܒܹ̈ܐ، ܐܵܢܝܼ ܕܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ ܡ̣ܢ ܩܵܕ݇ܡܵܝܬܵܐ ܗܘܼܕܪܲܝ ܝܠܹܗ ܕܥܵܒ݂ܕܲܚ ܠܗܘܿܢ.
TRL: Sabab poelkhana deedateh ywakh, peeshe birye beeshoo' msheekha l'wade ṭabe, anee dalaha min qamayta hoedray-yleh d'awdakh-lhoon.
ENG: For we are his workmanship, created in Christ Jesus for good works, which God afore prepared that we should walk in them.

ASY: ܒܘܼܬ ܐܵܗܵܐ ܕܟ݂ܘܿܪܘܼܢ ܕܩܵܕ݇ܡܵܝܬܵܐ، ܐܲܚܬܘܿܢ ܐܸܡܘܵܬܹ̈ܐ ܒܦܲܓ݂ܪܵܐ، ܕܦܝܵܫܵܐ ܝܬܘܿܢ ܩܸܪܝܹܐ ܥܘܼܪ̈ܠܹܐ ܒܝܲܕ ܐܵܢܝܼ ܕܦܝܵܫܵܐ ܝܢܵܐ ܩܸܪܝܹܐ ܓܙܝܼܪܹ̈ܐ، ܕܝܼܠܵܗ̇ ܒܦܲܓ݂ܪܵܐ، ܒܐܝܼܕܵܬܹ̈ܐ ܕܒܢܲܝ̈ܢܵܫܵܐ،
TRL: Boet aha dkhooroen dqamayta, akhtoon imwate bpaghra, dpyasha ytoon qirye 'oerle byad anee dpyasha yna qirye gzeere, deelaha bpaghra, beedate dbnaynasha,
ENG: Wherefore remember, that aforetime ye, the Gentiles in the flesh, who are called Uncircumcision by that which is called Circumcision, in the flesh, made by hands;

ASY: ܕܟ݂ܘܿܪܘܼܢ ܕܒܗ̇ܝ ܥܕܵܢܵܐ ܕܠܵܐ ܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ ܝܬܘܿܢ ܗ݇ܘܵܘ، ܘܢܘܼܟ݂ܪ̈ܵܝܹܐ ܡ̣ܢ ܒܢܲܝ̈ ܡܕܝܼܢ݇ܬܵܐ ܕܝܼܣܪܵܝܹܠ، ܘܩܵܪ̈ܝܼܒܵܝܹܐ ܠܘܲܥܕܹ̈ܐ ܕܩܵܘܠܵܐ، ܘܕܠܵܐ ܗܹܒ݂ܝܼ ܘܕܠܵܐ ܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ ܓܵܘ ܕܘܼܢܝܹܐ.
TRL: Dkhooroen dbhay 'dana dla msheekha ytoon waw, o noekhraye min bnay mdeeta deesrayel, o qareebaye lwa'de dqawla, o dla hewee o dla Alaha gaw doenye.
ENG: that ye were at that time separate from Christ, alienated from the commonwealth of Israel, and strangers from the covenants of the promise, having no hope and without God in the world.

ASY: ܐܝܼܢܵܐ ܐܵܕܝܼܵܐ ܒܝܼܫܘܿܥ ܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ، ܐܲܚܬܘܿܢ ܕܩܵܕ݇ܡܵܝܬܵܐ ܪܸܚܩܵܐ ܝܬܘܿܢ ܗ݇ܘܵܘ ܦܝܼܫ ܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܩܘܼܪܒܸܢܹܐ ܒܕܸܡܵܐ ܕܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ.
TRL: Eena adeea beeshoo' msheekha, akhtoon dqamayta rikhqa ytoon waw peesh lawkhoon qoerbine bdima dmsheekha.
ENG: But now in Christ Jesus ye that once were far off are made nigh in the blood of Christ.

ASY: ܣܵܒܵܒ ܗ̇ܘ ܝܼܠܹܗ ܫܠܵܡܲܢ، ܗ̇ܘ ܥܒ݂ܝܼܕܲܚ ܠܹܗ ܬܸܪܘܲܢ ܚܲܕ، ܘܬܠܝܼܚ ܠܹܗ ܓܘܼܕܵܐ ܕܦܪܝܼܫܲܢ ܝܼܗ݇ܘܵܐ ܡܥܘܼܕܵܠܹ̈ܐ. ܘܒܝܲܕ ܦܲܓ݂ܪܹܗ ܒܘܼܛܸܠ ܠܹܗ ܕܸܫܡܸܢܵܝܘܼܬܵܐ،
TRL: Sabab haw eeleh shlaman, haw 'weedakh-leh tirwan khad, o tleekh-leh goeda dpreeshan eewa m'oedale. O byad paghreh boeṭil-leh dishminayoeta,
ENG: For he is our peace, who made both one, and brake down the middle wall of partition,

ASY: ܕܝܼܠܵܗ̇ ܢܵܡܘܿܣܵܐ ܕܦܘܼܩܵܕܹ̈ܐ ܒܸܚܒ݂ܵܫܵܐ ܦܘܼܩܕܵܢܹ̈ܐ، ܕܒܵܪܹܐ ܗ݇ܘܵܐ ܡ̣ܢ ܬܪܹܝ ܚܲܕ ܒܲܪܢܵܫܵܐ ܚܵܕ݇ܬܵܐ ܓܵܘ ܓܵܢܹܗ، ܘܗܲܕܟ݂ܵܐ ܒܸܥܒ݂ܵܕܵܐ ܫܠܵܡܵܐ،
TRL: Deelaha namoosa dpoeqade bikhwasha poeqdane, dbare wa min trey khad barnasha khata gaw ganeh, o hadkha bi'wada shlama,
ENG: having abolished in his flesh the enmity, even the law of commandments contained in ordinances; that he might create in himself of the twain one new man, so making peace;

ASY: ܘܕܣܲܙܓܸܪ ܗ݇ܘܵܐ ܬܸܪܘܲܢ ܓܵܘ ܚܲܕ ܦܲܓ݂ܪܵܐ ܠܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ ܒܝܲܕ ܙܩܝܼܦܹܗ، ܕܒܝܼܹܗ ܩܛܝܼܠ ܠܹܗ ܠܕܸܫܡܸܢܵܝܘܼܬܵܐ.
TRL: O dsazgir wa tirwan gaw khad paghra lalaha byad zqeepeh, dbee-eh qṭeel-leh ldishminayoeta.
ENG: and might reconcile them both in one body unto God through the cross, having slain the enmity thereby:

ASY: ܐ݇ܬܹܐ ܠܹܗ ܘܡܘܼܟܪܸܙ ܠܹܗ ܫܠܵܡܵܐ ܐܸܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ، ܐܲܚܬܘܿܢ ܕܝܼܬܘܿܢ ܗ݇ܘܵܘ ܪܸܚܩܵܐ، ܘܐܘܼܦ ܠܐܵܢܝܼ ܕܝܼܗ݇ܘܵܘ ܩܘܼܪܒܵܐ،
TRL: te-leh o moekriz-leh shlama ilawkhoon, akhtoon deetoon waw rikhqa, o oep lanee deewaw qoerba,
ENG: and he came and preached peace to you that were far off, and peace to them that were nigh:

ASY: ܣܵܒܵܒ ܬܸܪܘܲܢ ܒܝܼܹܗ ܡܵܨܲܚ ܩܲܪܒܸܢܲܚ ܠܟܸܣ ܒܵܒܵܐ ܒܚܲܕ ܪܘܼܚܵܐ.
TRL: Sabab tirwan bee-eh maṣakh qarbinakh lkis baba bkhad roekha.
ENG: for through him we both have our access in one Spirit unto the Father.

ASY: ܒܲܣ ܐ݇ܚܹܪ݇ܢܵܐ ܐܲܚܬܘܿܢ ܠܹܐ ܝܬܘܿܢ ܢܘܼܟ݂ܪ̈ܵܝܹܐ ܘܩܵܪ̈ܝܼܒܵܝܹܐ، ܐܸܠܵܐ ܒܢܲܝ̈ ܡܕܝܼܢ݇ܬܵܐ ܕܩܲܕܝܼܫܹ̈ܐ ܝܬܘܿܢ، ܘܗܲܕܵܡܹ̈ܐ ܕܒܲܝܬܵܐ ܕܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ.
TRL: Bas khena akhtoon le ytoon noekhraye o qareebaye, ila bnay mdeeta dqadeeshe ytoon, o hadame dbayta dalaha.
ENG: So then ye are no more strangers and sojourners, but ye are fellow-citizens with the saints, and of the household of God,

ASY: ܦܝܼܫ ܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܒܸܢܝܹܐ ܥܲܠ ܒܸܢܝܲܬ ܕܫܠܝܼܚܹ̈ܐ ܘܕܢܒ݂ܝܼܹ̈ܐ، ܘܝܼܫܘܿܥ ܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ ܒܓܵܢܹܗ ܝܼܠܹܗ ܟܹܐܦܵܐ ܕܩܘܼܪܢܝܼܬܵܐ،
TRL: Peesh lawkhoon binye 'al binyat dshleekhe o dnwee-e, o eeshoo' msheekha bganeh eeleh kepa dqoerneeta,
ENG: being built upon the foundation of the apostles and prophets, Christ Jesus himself being the chief corner stone;

ASY: ܒܝܼܹܗ ܟܠܹܗ ܒܸܢܝܵܢܵܐ ܦܝܼܫܵܐ ܝܠܹܗ ܐ݇ܣܝܼܪܵܐ ܒܥܘܼܕܵܠܹ̈ܐ، ܘܟܹܐ ܓܲܪܘܸܣ ܕܗܵܘܹܐ ܚܲܕ ܗܲܝܟܠܵܐ ܡܩܘܼܕܫܵܐ ܒܡܵܪܝܵܐ.
TRL: Bee-eh kleh binyana peesha-yleh seera b'oedale, o ke garwis dhawe khad haykla mqoedsha bmarya.
ENG: in whom each several building, fitly framed together, groweth into a holy temple in the Lord;

ASY: ܒܝܼܹܗ ܐܘܼܦ ܐܲܚܬܘܿܢ ܦܝܼܫܹܐ ܝܬܘܿܢ ܒܸܢܝܹܐ ܡܥܘܼܕܵܠܹ̈ܐ، ܕܗܵܘܹܝܬܘܿܢ ܚܲܕ ܒܲܝܬܵܐ ܐܲܝܟܵܐ ܕܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ ܥܵܡܹܪ ܒܪܘܼܚܵܐ.
TRL: Bee-eh oep akhtoon peeshe ytoon binye m'oedale, dhaweytoon khad bayta ayka dalaha 'amer broekha.
ENG: in whom ye also are builded together for a habitation of God in the Spirit.

ASY: ܒܘܼܬ ܐܵܗܵܐ، ܐܵܢܵܐ ܦܵܘܠܘܿܣ، ܐܲܣܝܼܪܵܐ ܝܘܸܢ ܕܝܼܫܘܿܥ ܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ ܒܘܼܬ ܕܝܼܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܐܸܡܘܵܬܹ̈ܐ،
TRL: Boet aha, ana pawloos, aseera ywin deeshoo' msheekha boet deeawkhoon imwate,
ENG: For this cause I Paul, the prisoner of Christ Jesus in behalf of you Gentiles,—

ASY: ܗܵܐ ܫܡܝܼܥ ܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܒܘܼܬ ܡܕܲܒܪܵܢܘܼܬܵܐ ܕܫܵܦܵܩܲܬ ܕܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ ܕܦܝܼܫ ܠܵܗ̇ ܝܘܼܗ݇ܒܸܠܬܵܐ ܐܸܠܝܼ ܒܘܼܬ ܕܝܼܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ،
TRL: Ha shmee' lawkhoon boet mdabranoeta dshapaqat dalaha dpeesh-laha yoebilta ilee boet deeawkhoon,
ENG: if so be that ye have heard of the dispensation of that grace of God which was given me to you-ward;

ASY: ܕܵܐܟ݂ܝܼ ܒܓܸܠܝܵܢܵܐ ܦܝܼܫ ܠܹܗ ܡܘܼܕܸܥܵܐ ܐܸܠܝܼ ܐ݇ܪܵܙܵܐ، ܐܲܝܟ݂ ܕܟܬܝܼܒ݂ ܠܝܼ ܐܸܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܒܟܸܪܝܘܼܬܵܐ ܡ̣ܢ ܩܵܕ݇ܡܵܝܬܵܐ،
TRL: Dakhee bgilyana peesh-leh moedi'a ilee raza, aykh dkteew-lee ilawkhoon bkiryoeta min qamayta,
ENG: how that by revelation was made known unto me the mystery, as I wrote afore in few words,

ASY: ܕܐܝܼܡܲܢ ܕܩܵܪܹܝܬܘܿܢ ܐܵܗܵܐ، ܟܹܐ ܡܵܨܹܝܬܘܿܢ ܦܲܪܡܹܝܬܘܿܢ ܝ݇ܕܲܥܬܝܼ ܠܐ݇ܪܵܙܵܐ ܕܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ،
TRL: Deeman dqareytoon aha, ke maṣeytoon parmeytoon da'tee lraza dmsheekha,
ENG: whereby, when ye read, ye can perceive my understanding in the mystery of Christ;

ASY: ܐܲܝܢܝܼ ܕܒܕܵܘܪܹ̈ܐ ܐ݇ܚܹܪ̈݇ܢܹܐ ܠܹܐ ܝܗ݇ܘܵܐ ܦܝܼܫܵܐ ܓܸܠܝܵܐ ܠܒܢܲܝ̈ܢܵܫܵܐ ܐܲܝܟ݂ ܕܝܼܠܹܗ ܐܵܕܝܼܵܐ ܦܝܼܫܵܐ ܓܸܠܝܵܐ ܒܝܲܕ ܪܘܼܚܵܐ ܠܫܠܝܼܚܘܼ̈ܗܝ ܩܲܕܝܼܫܹ̈ܐ ܘܠܢܒ݂ܝܼܘܼ̈ܗܝ،
TRL: Aynee dbdawre khene le ywa peesha gilya lbnaynasha aykh deeleh adeea peesha gilya byad roekha lshleekhoehy qadeeshe o lnweeoehy,
ENG: which in other generations was not made known unto the sons of men, as it hath now been revealed unto his holy apostles and prophets in the Spirit;

ASY: ܕܐܸܡܘܵܬܹ̈ܐ ܗܵܘܝܼ ܒܢܲܝ̈ ܝܵܪܬܘܼܬܵܐ، ܘܗܲܕܵܡܹ̈ܐ ܕܚܲܕ ܦܲܓ݂ܪܵܐ، ܘܫܲܪ̈ܝܼܟܹܐ ܕܩܵܘܠܵܐ ܒܝܼܫܘܿܥ ܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ ܒܝܲܕ ܐܹܘܲܢܓܲܠܝܼܘܿܢ.
TRL: Dimwate hawee bnay yartoeta, o hadame dkhad paghra, o shareeke dqawla beeshoo' msheekha byad ewangaleeoon.
ENG: to wit, that the Gentiles are fellow-heirs, and fellow-members of the body, and fellow-partakers of the promise in Christ Jesus through the gospel,

ASY: ܐܵܢܵܐ ܗܘܹܐ ܠܝܼ ܥܵܒ݂ܕܵܢܵܐ ܕܚܸܠܡܲܬ ܕܐܵܗܵܐ ܐܹܘܲܢܓܲܠܝܼܘܿܢ ܐܲܝܟ݂ ܡܵܘܗܲܒ݂ܬܵܐ ܕܫܵܦܵܩܲܬ ܕܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ ܕܦܝܼܫ ܠܵܗ̇ ܝܘܼܗ݇ܒܸܠܬܵܐ ܐܸܠܝܼ ܒܦܘܼܠܚܵܢܵܐ ܕܚܲܝܠܹܗ.
TRL: Ana hwe-lee 'awdana dkhilmat daha ewangaleeoon aykh mawhawta dshapaqat dalaha dpeesh-laha yoebilta ilee bpoelkhana dkhayleh.
ENG: whereof I was made a minister, according to the gift of that grace of God which was given me according to the working of his power.

ASY: ܐܵܦܸܢ ܕܐܵܢܵܐ ܒܘܼܫ ܒܵܨܘܿܪܵܐ ܝܘܸܢ ܡ̣ܢ ܟܠܲܝܗܝ ܩܲܕܝܼܫܹ̈ܐ، ܦܝܼܫ ܠܵܗ̇ ܝܘܼܗ݇ܒܸܠܬܵܐ ܐܵܗܵܐ ܫܵܦܵܩܲܬ ܐܸܠܝܼ ܕܡܲܟܪܸܙܸܢ ܓܵܘ ܐܸܡܘܵܬܹ̈ܐ ܥܘܼܬܪܵܐ ܕܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ، ܗ̇ܘ ܕܠܹܐ ܐܵܬܹܐ ܠܨܲܚܨܘܼܝܹܐ،
TRL: Apin dana boesh baṣoora ywin min klayhy qadeeshe, peesh-laha yoebilta aha shapaqat ilee dmakrizin gaw imwate 'oetra dmsheekha, haw dle ate lṣakhṣoeye,
ENG: Unto me, who am less than the least of all saints, was this grace given, to preach unto the Gentiles the unsearchable riches of Christ;

ASY: ܘܕܡܲܚܙܹܝܢ ܓܲܠܝܵܐܝܼܬ ܠܟܠ ܚܲܕ ܐ݇ܢܵܫܵܐ ܡܕܲܒܪܵܢܘܼܬܵܐ ܕܐ݇ܪܵܙܵܐ، ܗ̇ܘ ܐ݇ܪܵܙܵܐ ܐܲܝܢܝܼ ܕܒܕܵܘܪܹ̈ܐ ܩܲܕ݇ܡܵܝܹ̈ܐ ܦܝܼܫܵܐ ܝܗ݇ܘܵܐ ܛܸܫܝܵܐ ܒܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ، ܗ̇ܘ ܕܒܪܹܐ ܠܹܗ ܟܠ ܡܸܢܕܝܼ،
TRL: O dmakhzeyn galyaeet lkl khad nasha mdabranoeta draza, haw raza aynee dbdawre qamaye peesha ywa ṭishya balaha, haw dbre-leh kl mindee,
ENG: and to make all men see what is the dispensation of the mystery which from all ages hath been hid in God who created all things;

ASY: ܕܐܵܕܝܼܵܐ ܒܝܲܕ ܥܹܕܬܵܐ ܦܵܝܫܵܐ ܓܠܝܼܬܵܐ ܦܸܪܝܘܼܬܵܐ ܕܚܸܟ݂ܡܬܵܐ ܕܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ، ܠܪܹ̈ܫܵܢܹܐ ܘܠܫܲܠܝܼܛܹ̈ܐ ܒܕܘܼܟܵܢܹ̈ܐ ܫܡܲܝܵܢܵܝܹ̈ܐ
TRL: Dadeea byad 'edta paysha gleeta piryoeta dkhikhmta dalaha, lreshane o lshaleeṭe bdoekane shmayanaye
ENG: to the intent that now unto the principalities and the powers in the heavenly places might be made known through the church the manifold wisdom of God,

ASY: ܐܲܝܟ݂ ܕܩܛܝܼܥ ܠܹܗ ܡ̣ܢ ܩܵܕ݇ܡ ܫܘܼܪܵܝܵܐ ܕܙܲܒ݂ܢܹ̈ܐ ܡܸܢܕܝܼ ܕܬܘܼܡܸܡ ܠܹܗ ܒܝܲܕ ܝܼܫܘܿܥ ܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ ܡܵܪܲܢ،
TRL: Aykh dqṭee' leh min qam shoeraya dzawne mindee dtoemim-leh byad eeshoo' msheekha Maran,
ENG: according to the eternal purpose which he purposed in Christ Jesus our Lord:

ASY: ܕܒܝܼܹܗ ܐܝܼܬ ܠܲܢ ܓ̰ܘܼܪܐܲܬ ܘܩܲܪܒܲܢܬܵܐ ܒܚܵܬܸܪܓ̰ܲܡܥܘܼܬܵܐ ܕܗܲܝܡܵܢܘܼܬܵܐ ܒܝܼܹܗ.
TRL: Dbee-eh eet lan joerat o qarbanta bkhatirjam'oeta dhaymanoeta bee-eh.
ENG: in whom we have boldness and access in confidence through our faith in him.

ASY: ܒܘܼܬ ܐܵܗܵܐ ܒܸܛܠܵܒܵܐ ܝܘܸܢ ܡܸܢܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܕܠܵܐ ܣܵܩܕܝܼܬܘܿܢ ܡ̣ܢ ܐܘܼܠܨܵܢܝܼ̈ ܒܘܼܬ ܕܝܼܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ، ܕܝܼܢܵܐ ܚܸܩܪܵܐ ܐܸܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ.
TRL: Boet aha biṭlaba ywin minawkhoon dla saqdeetoon min oelṣanee boet deeawkhoon, deena khiqra ilawkhoon.
ENG: Wherefore I ask that ye faint not at my tribulations for you, which are your glory.

ASY: ܒܘܼܬ ܐܵܗܵܐ ܒܸܒܪܵܟܵܐ ܝܘܸܢ ܩܵܕ݇ܡ ܒܵܒܵܐ ܕܡܵܪܲܢ ܝܼܫܘܿܥ ܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ،
TRL: Boet aha bibraka ywin qam baba dmaran eeshoo' msheekha,
ENG: For this cause I bow my knees unto the Father,

ASY: ܗ̇ܘ ܕܡܸܢܹܗ ܟܠܵܗ̇ ܐܲܒ݂ܵܗܘܼܬܵܐ ܓܵܘ ܫܡܲܝܵܐ ܘܐܲܪܥܵܐ ܦܝܼܫܬܵܐ ܝܠܵܗ̇ ܪܫܝܼܡܬܵܐ،
TRL: Haw dmineh klaha awahoeta gaw shmaya o ar'a peeshta-ylaha rsheemta,
ENG: from whom every family in heaven and on earth is named,

ASY: ܕܝܲܗ݇ܒܸܠ ܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܐܲܝܟ݂ ܥܘܼܬܪܵܐ ܕܚܸܩܪܹܗ ܠܸܦܝܵܫܵܐ ܡܘܼܩܘܝܼܹܐ ܒܚܲܝܠܵܐ ܕܪܘܼܚܹܗ ܒܒܲܪܢܵܫܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܓܵܘܵܝܵܐ،
TRL: Dyabil lawkhoon aykh 'oetra dkhiqreh lipyasha moeqwee-e bkhayla droekheh bbarnashawkhoon gawaya,
ENG: that he would grant you, according to the riches of his glory, that ye may be strengthened with power through his Spirit in the inward man;

ASY: ܕܥܵܡܹܪ ܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ ܓܵܘ ܠܸܒܵܘܵܬܵܘ̈ܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܒܝܲܕ ܗܲܝܡܵܢܘܼܬܵܐ ܟܲܕ ܥܸܩܪܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܡܘܼܩܘܝܼܵܐ ܘܫܘܼܬܐܸܣܵܐ ܒܚܘܼܒܵܐ،
TRL: D'amer msheekha gaw libawatawkhoon byad haymanoeta kad 'iqrawkhoon moeqweea o shoetisa bkhoeba,
ENG: that Christ may dwell in your hearts through faith; to the end that ye, being rooted and grounded in love,

ASY: ܕܡܵܨܹܝܬܘܿܢ ܝܵܕܥܝܼܬܘܿܢ، ܥܲܡ ܟܠܲܝܗܝ ܩܲܕܝܼܫܹ̈ܐ، ܡܘܿܕܝܼ ܝܠܵܗ̇ ܦܸܬܝܘܼܬܵܐ ܘܝܘܼܪܟ݂ܘܼܬܵܐ ܘܪܵܡܘܼܬܵܐ ܘܥܘܼܡܩܵܐ،
TRL: Dmaṣeytoon yad'eetoon, 'am klayhy qadeeshe, moodee-ylaha pityoeta o yoerkhoeta o ramoeta o 'oemqa,
ENG: may be strong to apprehend with all the saints what is the breadth and length and height and depth,

ASY: ܘܕܝܵܕܥܝܼܬܘܿܢ ܚܘܼܒܵܐ ܕܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ ܕܝܼܠܹܗ ܥܸܠܸܠ ܡ̣ܢ ܟܠ ܝ݇ܕܲܥܬܵܐ، ܕܦܵܝܫܝܼܬܘܿܢ ܡܸܠܝܹܐ ܒܟܠܵܗ̇ ܡܠܵܝܬܵܐ ܕܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ.
TRL: O dyad'eetoon khoeba dmsheekha deeleh 'ilil min kl da'ta, dpaysheetoon milye bklaha mlayta dalaha.
ENG: and to know the love of Christ which passeth knowledge, that ye may be filled unto all the fulness of God.

ASY: ܘܐܵܕܝܼܵܐ، ܠܗ̇ܘ ܕܟܹܐ ܡܵܨܹܐ ܥܵܒܹܕ ܒܘܼܫ ܙܵܘܕܵܐ ܡ̣ܢ ܕܛܵܠܒܲܚ ܝܲܢ ܕܚܵܫܒܲܚ ܐܲܝܟ݂ ܚܲܝܠܵܐ ܕܟܹܐ ܦܵܠܹܚ ܓܵܘܲܢ،
TRL: O adeea, lhaw dke maṣe 'abed boesh zawda min dṭalbakh yan dkhashbakh aykh khayla dke palekh gawan,
ENG: Now unto him that is able to do exceeding abundantly above all that we ask or think, according to the power that worketh in us,

ASY: ܐܸܠܹܗ ܬܸܫܒܘܿܚܬܵܐ ܓܵܘ ܥܹܕܬܵܐ ܘܒܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ ܝܼܫܘܿܥ ܒܟܠܲܝܗܝ ܕܵܘܪܹ̈ܐ، ܠܥܵܠܲܡ ܥܵܠܡܝܼܢ، ܐܵܡܹܝܢ.
TRL: Ileh tishbookhta gaw 'edta o bmsheekha eeshoo' bklayhy dawre, l'alam 'almeen, ameyn.
ENG: unto him be the glory in the church and in Christ Jesus unto all generations for ever and ever. Amen.

ASY: ܒܘܼܬ ܐܵܗܵܐ ܦܲܪܦܘܼܠܹܐ ܝܘܸܢ ܒܝܼܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ، ܐܵܢܵܐ ܐܲܣܝܼܪܵܐ ܒܘܼܬ ܚܵܬܸܪ ܕܡܵܪܝܵܐ، ܕܚܵܝܹܝܬܘܿܢ ܚܲܝܹ̈ܐ ܚܫܝܼܚܹ̈ܐ ܠܩܪܵܝܬܵܐ ܕܒܝܼܘܼܗ̇ ܦܝܼܫ ܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܩܸܪܝܹܐ.
TRL: Boet aha parpoele ywin beeawkhoon, ana aseera boet khatir dmarya, dkhayeytoon khaye khsheekhe lqrayta dbeeoeha peesh lawkhoon qirye.
ENG: I therefore, the prisoner in the Lord, beseech you to walk worthily of the calling wherewith ye were called,

ASY: ܗܘܹܝܡܘܼܢ ܬܲܡܵܡ ܡܲܟܝܼܟܹ̈ܐ ܘܒܲܣܝܼܡܹ̈ܐ؛ ܒܡܲܪܝܲܟ݂ܬܵܐ ܕܒܹܐܢܵܐ ܚܡܘܿܠܘܼܢ ܚܲܕ ܠܗ̇ܘ ܐ݇ܚܹܪ݇ܢܵܐ ܒܚܘܼܒܵܐ،
TRL: Hweymoen tamam makeeke o baseeme; bmaryakhta dbena khmooloen khad lhaw khena bkhoeba,
ENG: with all lowliness and meekness, with longsuffering, forbearing one another in love;

ASY: ܚܲܦܛܘܼܢ ܕܢܵܛܪܝܼܬܘܿܢ ܚܕܵܢܵܝܘܼܬܵܐ ܕܪܘܼܚܵܐ ܒܐܸܣܘܼܪܵܐ ܕܫܠܵܡܵܐ.
TRL: Khapṭoen dnaṭreetoon khdanayoeta droekha bisoera dshlama.
ENG: giving diligence to keep the unity of the Spirit in the bond of peace.

ASY: ܐܝܼܬ ܚܲܕ ܦܲܓ݂ܪܵܐ ܘܚܲܕ ܪܘܼܚܵܐ، ܕܵܐܟ݂ܝܼ ܕܦܝܼܫ ܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܩܸܪܝܹܐ ܠܚܕܵܐ ܗܹܒ݂ܝܼ ܐܝܼܡܲܢ ܕܦܝܼܫ ܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܩܸܪܝܹܐ،
TRL: Eet khad paghra o khad roekha, dakhee dpeesh lawkhoon qirye lkhda hewee eeman dpeesh lawkhoon qirye,
ENG: There is one body, and one Spirit, even as also ye were called in one hope of your calling;

ASY: ܚܲܕ ܡܵܪܝܵܐ، ܚܕܵܐ ܗܲܝܡܵܢܘܼܬܵܐ، ܚܕܵܐ ܡܲܥܡܘܿܕܝܼܬܵܐ،
TRL: Khad Marya, khda haymanoeta, khda ma'moodeeta,
ENG: one Lord, one faith, one baptism,

ASY: ܚܲܕ ܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ ܘܒܵܒܵܐ ܕܟܠ، ܥܲܠ ܟܠ، ܒܝܲܕ ܟܠ، ܘܓܵܘ ܟܠ.
TRL: Khad Alaha o baba dkl, 'al kl, byad kl, o gaw kl.
ENG: one God and Father of all, who is over all, and through all, and in all.

ASY: ܐܝܼܢܵܐ ܠܟܠ ܚܲܕ ܡܸܢܲܢ ܦܝܼܫ ܠܵܗ̇ ܝܘܼܗ݇ܒܸܠܬܵܐ ܫܵܦܵܩܲܬ ܐܲܝܟ݂ ܟܝܘܼܠܵܐ ܕܡܵܘܗܲܒ݂ܬܵܐ ܕܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ.
TRL: Eena lkl khad minan peesh-laha yoebilta shapaqat aykh kyoela dmawhawta dmsheekha.
ENG: But unto each one of us was the grace given according to the measure of the gift of Christ.

ASY: ܒܘܼܬ ܐܵܗܵܐ ܐ݇ܡܝܼܪܹܗ: ܐ݇ܣܝܼܩ ܠܹܗ ܠܡܪܵܘܡܵܐ ܘܣܠܝܼܒ ܠܹܗ ܣܠܵܒܬܵܐ، ܘܝܘܼܗ݇ܒܸܠ ܠܹܗ ܡܵܘܗܒ݂ܵܬܹ̈ܐ ܠܒܢܲܝ̈ܢܵܫܵܐ.
TRL: Boet aha meereh: seeq-leh lmrawma o sleeb-leh slabta, o yoebil-leh mawhwate lbnaynasha.
ENG: Wherefore he saith, When he ascended on high, he led captivity captive, And gave gifts unto men.

ASY: ܗ̇ܘ ܕܐ݇ܣܝܼܩ ܠܹܗ ܝܼܠܹܗ ܗܲܪ ܗ̇ܘ ܕܐܘܼܦ ܨܠܹܐ ܠܹܗ ܠܣܵܗܡܹ̈ܐ ܬܲܚܬܵܝܹ̈ܐ ܕܐܲܪܥܵܐ؛
TRL: Haw dseeq-leh eeleh har haw doep ṣle-leh lsahme takhtaye dar'a;
ENG: (Now this, He ascended, what is it but that he also descended into the lower parts of the earth?

ASY: ܘܗ̇ܘ ܕܨܠܹܐ ܠܹܗ ܝܼܠܹܗ ܗܲܪ ܗ̇ܘ ܕܐ݇ܣܝܼܩ ܠܹܗ ܥܸܠܸܠ ܡ̣ܢ ܟܠܲܝܗܝ ܫܡܲܝܹ̈ܐ، ܕܡܵܠܹܐ ܗ݇ܘܵܐ ܠܟܠܲܝܗܝ ܡܸܢܕܝܼܵܢܹ̈ܐ.
TRL: O haw dṣle-leh eeleh har haw dseeq-leh 'ilil min klayhy shmaye, dmale wa lklayhy mindeeane.
ENG: He that descended is the same also that ascended far above all the heavens, that he might fill all things.)

ASY: ܘܗ̇ܘ ܝܘܼܗ݇ܒܸܠ ܠܹܗ ܠܚܲܕ݇ܟܡܵܐ ܕܗܵܘܝܼ ܫܠܝܼܚܹ̈ܐ، ܘܠܚܲܕ݇ܟܡܵܐ ܢܒ݂ܝܼܹ̈ܐ، ܘܠܚܲܕ݇ܟܡܵܐ ܡܲܫܚܸܕܵܢܹ̈ܐ، ܘܠܚܲܕ݇ܟܡܵܐ ܪ̈ܵܥܝܹܐ ܘܡܲܠܦܵܢܹ̈ܐ،
TRL: O haw yoebil-leh lkhakma dhawee shleekhe, o lkhakma nwee-e, o lkhakma mashkhidane, o lkhakma ra'ye o malpane,
ENG: And he gave some to be apostles; and some, prophets; and some, evangelists; and some, pastors and teachers;

ASY: ܠܗܲܕܘܼܪܹܐ ܩܲܕܝܼܫܹ̈ܐ ܩܵܐ ܦܘܼܠܚܵܢܵܐ ܕܚܸܠܡܲܬ ܠܸܒܢܵܝܵܐ ܦܲܓ݂ܪܵܐ ܕܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ،
TRL: Lhadoere qadeeshe qa poelkhana dkhilmat libnaya paghra dmsheekha,
ENG: for the perfecting of the saints, unto the work of ministering, unto the building up of the body of Christ:

ASY: ܗܲܠ ܕܟܠܲܢ ܡܵܛܲܚ ܠܚܕܵܢܵܝܘܼܬܵܐ ܕܗܲܝܡܵܢܘܼܬܵܐ ܘܝ݇ܕܲܥܬܵܐ ܕܒܪܘܿܢܵܐ ܕܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ، ܠܒܲܪܢܵܫܵܐ ܓܡܝܼܪܵܐ، ܠܟܝܘܼܠܵܐ ܓܡܝܼܪܵܐ ܕܬܲܡܵܡܵܬܘܼܬܵܐ ܕܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ،
TRL: Hal dklan maṭakh lkhdanayoeta dhaymanoeta o da'ta dbroona dalaha, lbarnasha gmeera, lkyoela gmeera dtamamatoeta dmsheekha,
ENG: till we all attain unto the unity of the faith, and of the knowledge of the Son of God, unto a fullgrown man, unto the measure of the stature of the fulness of Christ:

ASY: ܕܠܵܐ ܗܵܘܲܚ ܐ݇ܚܹܪ݇ܢܵܐ ܝܲܠܘܼܕܹ̈ܐ، ܡܘܼܫܥܸܫܹܐ ܠܐܵܗܵܐ ܓܹܒܵܐ ܘܠܗ̇ܘ ܓܹܒܵܐ ܒܟܠ ܦܵܘܚܵܐ ܕܝܘܼܠܦܵܢܵܐ، ܘܒܦܸܠܡܵܐ ܕܒܢܲܝ̈ܢܵܫܵܐ، ܒܦܲܢܕܹ̈ܐ ܠܒܘܼܨܵܐ ܕܡܲܚܠܲܛܬܵܐ،
TRL: Dla hawakh khena yaloede, moesh'ishe-laha geba o lhaw geba bkl pawkha dyoelpana, o bpilma dbnaynasha, bpande lboeṣa dmakhlaṭta,
ENG: that we may be no longer children, tossed to and fro and carried about with every wind of doctrine, by the sleight of men, in craftiness, after the wiles of error;

ASY: ܐܸܠܵܐ ܗܲܡܙܸܡܲܚ ܫܪܵܪܵܐ ܒܚܘܼܒܵܐ، ܕܓܲܪܘܸܣܲܚ ܒܟܠ ܐܘܼܪܚܵܐ ܒܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ، ܕܝܼܠܹܗ ܪܹܫܲܢ،
TRL: Ila hamzimakh shrara bkhoeba, dgarwisakh bkl oerkha bmsheekha, deeleh reshan,
ENG: but speaking truth in love, may grow up in all things into him, which is the head, even Christ;

ASY: ܕܡܸܢܹܗ ܟܠܹܗ ܦܲܓ݂ܪܵܐ ܦܝܼܫܵܐ ܝܠܹܗ ܡܪܘܼܟܒ݂ܵܐ ܘܐ݇ܣܝܼܪܵܐ ܒܥܘܼܕܵܠܹ̈ܐ ܒܟܠܲܝܗܝ ܓܲܝܹ̈ܐ، ܠܸܥܒ݂ܵܕܵܐ ܟܠ ܗܲܕܵܡܵܐ ܕܦܵܠܹܚ ܩܵܐ ܓܲܪܘܲܣܬܵܐ ܕܦܲܓ݂ܪܵܐ ܒܚܘܼܒܵܐ.
TRL: Dmineh kleh paghra peesha-yleh mroekwa o seera b'oedale bklayhy gaye, li'wada kl hadama dpalekh qa garwasta dpaghra bkhoeba.
ENG: from whom all the body fitly framed and knit together through that which every joint supplieth, according to the working in due measure of each several part, maketh the increase of the body unto the building up of itself in love.

ASY: ܗܲܕܟ݂ܵܐ ܐܵܗܵܐ ܒܹܐܡܵܪܵܐ ܝܘܸܢ ܘܒܸܣܗܵܕܵܐ ܝܘܸܢ ܒܡܵܪܝܵܐ، ܕܠܵܐ ܗܵܘܹܝܬܘܿܢ ܐ݇ܚܹܪ݇ܢܵܐ ܒܸܚܵܝܵܐ ܐܲܝܟ݂ ܐܸܡܘܵܬܹ̈ܐ ܐ݇ܚܹܪ̈݇ܢܹܐ ܕܒܸܚܵܝܵܐ ܝܢܵܐ ܒܣܪܝܼܩܘܼܬܵܐ ܕܪܸܥܝܵܢܲܝܗܝ.
TRL: Hadkha aha bemara ywin o bishada ywin bmarya, dla haweytoon khena bikhaya aykh imwate khene dbikhaya yna bsreeqoeta dri'yanayhy.
ENG: This I say therefore, and testify in the Lord, that ye no longer walk as the Gentiles also walk, in the vanity of their mind,

ASY: ܐܵܢܝܼ ܚܘܼܫܟܸܢܹܐ ܝܢܵܐ ܒܦܲܪܡܵܝܬܲܝܗܝ، ܘܪܘܼܚܩܸܢܹܐ ܝܢܵܐ ܡ̣ܢ ܚܲܝܹ̈ܐ ܕܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ، ܣܵܒܵܒ ܠܲܝܬ ܝ݇ܕܲܥܬܵܐ ܒܝܼܲܝܗܝ ܒܘܼܬ ܩܸܫܝܘܼܬܵܐ ܕܠܸܒܲܝܗܝ؛
TRL: Anee khoeshkine yna bparmaytayhy, o roekhqine yna min khaye dalaha, sabab layt da'ta bee-ayhy boet qishyoeta dlibayhy;
ENG: being darkened in their understanding, alienated from the life of God because of the ignorance that is in them, because of the hardening of their heart;

ASY: ܟܲܕ ܠܲܝܬ ܪܥܵܫܬܵܐ ܒܝܼܲܝܗܝ، ܣܘܼܦܝܵܐ ܠܗܘܿܢ ܓܵܢܲܝܗܝ ܠܫܪܝܼܚܘܼܬܵܐ ܕܦܵܠܚܝܼ ܟܠܵܗ̇ ܛܲܢܦܘܼܬܵܐ ܒܛܲܡܲܥܟܵܪܘܼܬܵܐ.
TRL: Kad layt r'ashta bee-ayhy, soepya-lhoon ganayhy lshreekhoeta dpalkhee klaha ṭanpoeta bṭama'karoeta.
ENG: who being past feeling gave themselves up to lasciviousness, to work all uncleanness with greediness.

ASY: ܐܝܼܢܵܐ ܐܲܚܬܘܿܢ ܗܲܕܟ݂ܵܐ ܠܵܐ ܝ݇ܠܝܼܦ ܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܠܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ.
TRL: Eena akhtoon hadkha la leep lawkhoon lmsheekha.
ENG: But ye did not so learn Christ;

ASY: ܐܲܚܬܘܿܢ ܫܡܝܼܥ ܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܒܘܼܬ ܕܝܼܹܗ، ܘܦܝܼܫ ܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܡܘܼܠܦܹܐ ܒܝܼܹܗ، ܐܲܝܟ݂ ܕܝܼܠܹܗ ܫܪܵܪܵܐ ܒܝܼܫܘܿܥ،
TRL: Akhtoon shmee' lawkhoon boet dee-eh, o peesh lawkhoon moelpe bee-eh, aykh deeleh shrara beeshoo',
ENG: if so be that ye heard him, and were taught in him, even as truth is in Jesus:

ASY: ܕܫܵܒ݂ܩܝܼܬܘܿܢ ܐܘܼܪ̈ܚܵܬܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܩܲܕ݇ܡܵܝܹ̈ܐ ܕܚܲܝܹ̈ܐ، ܘܪܲܦܹܝܬܘܿܢ ܡܸܢܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܒܲܪܢܵܫܵܐ ܥܲܬܝܼܩܵܐ ܕܦܝܼܫܵܐ ܝܠܹܗ ܡܘܼܚܪܸܒ݂ܵܐ ܒܫܲܗܘܲܬܝܵܬܹ̈ܐ ܕܚܸܠܛܸܢܝܘܼܬܵܐ،
TRL: Dshawqeetoon oerkhatawkhoon qamaye dkhaye, o rapeytoon minawkhoon barnasha 'ateeqa dpeesha-yleh moekhriwa bshahwatyate dkhilṭinyoeta,
ENG: that ye put away, as concerning your former manner of life, the old man, which waxeth corrupt after the lusts of deceit;

ASY: ܘܕܦܵܝܫܝܼܬܘܿܢ ܚܘܼܕܸܬܹܐ ܒܪܘܼܚܵܐ ܕܪܸܥܝܵܢܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ،
TRL: O dpaysheetoon khoedite broekha dri'yanawkhoon,
ENG: and that ye be renewed in the spirit of your mind,

ASY: ܘܕܠܵܒ݂ܫܝܼܬܘܿܢ ܒܲܪܢܵܫܵܐ ܚܵܕ݇ܬܵܐ، ܐܲܝܟ݂ ܕܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ ܒܪܹܐ ܠܹܗ ܒܙܲܕܝܼܩܘܼܬܵܐ ܘܒܩܲܕܝܼܫܘܼܬܵܐ ܫܲܪܝܼܪܬܵܐ.
TRL: O dlawsheetoon barnasha khata, aykh dalaha bre-leh bzadeeqoeta o bqadeeshoeta shareerta.
ENG: and put on the new man, which after God hath been created in righteousness and holiness of truth.

ASY: ܒܘܼܬ ܐܵܗܵܐ ܪܲܦܹܝܡܘܼܢ ܡܸܢܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܕܲܓܵܠܘܼܬܵܐ، ܗܲܡܙܸܡܘܼܢ ܫܪܵܪܵܐ ܟܠ ܚܲܕ ܥܲܡ ܫܒ݂ܵܒܹܗ، ܣܵܒܵܒ ܗܲܕܵܡܹ̈ܐ ܕܚܲܕ ܕܗ̇ܘ ܐ݇ܚܹܪ݇ܢܵܐ ܝܘܲܚ.
TRL: Boet aha rapeymoen minawkhoon dagaloeta, hamzimoen shrara kl khad 'am shwabeh, sabab hadame dkhad dhaw khena ywakh.
ENG: Wherefore, putting away falsehood, speak ye truth each one with his neighbour: for we are members one of another.

ASY: ܟܪܘܿܒܘܼܢ ܐܝܼܢܵܐ ܠܵܐ ܚܵܛܹܝܬܘܿܢ؛ ܠܵܐ ܫܵܒ݂ܩܝܼܬܘܿܢ ܫܸܡܫܵܐ ܓܵܢܹܐ ܥܲܠ ܟܲܪܒܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ،
TRL: Krooboen eena la khaṭeytoon; la shawqeetoon shimsha gane 'al karbawkhoon,
ENG: Be ye angry, and sin not: let not the sun go down upon your wrath:

ASY: ܘܠܵܐ ܝܵܗ݇ܒ݂ܝܼܬܘܿܢ ܕܘܼܟܵܐ ܠܐܵܟܹܠܩܲܪܨܵܐ.
TRL: O la yaweetoon doeka lakelqarṣa.
ENG: neither give place to the devil.

ASY: ܗ̇ܘ ܕܓܢܝܼܒ݂ܵܐ ܝܠܹܗ، ܐ݇ܚܹܪ݇ܢܵܐ ܠܵܐ ܓܵܢܹܒ݂، ܐܝܼܢܵܐ ܫܒ݂ܘܿܩ ܦܵܠܹܚ ܩܸܫܝܵܐ، ܘܥܵܒܹܕ ܛܵܒ݂ܬܵܐ ܒܐܝܼܕܵܬܹ̈ܗ، ܕܗܵܘܹܐ ܠܹܗ ܡܸܢܕܝܼ ܠܝܼܵܗ݇ܒ݂ܵܐ ܠܗ̇ܘ ܕܝܼܠܹܗ ܣܢܝܼܩܵܐ.
TRL: Haw dgneewa-yleh, khena la ganew, eena shwooq palekh qishya, o 'abed ṭawta beedateh, dhawe-leh mindee leeawa lhaw deeleh sneeqa.
ENG: Let him that stole steal no more: but rather let him labour, working with his hands the thing that is good, that he may have whereof to give to him that hath need.

ASY: ܠܵܐ ܦܵܠܛܵܐ ܗܹܡܸܙܡܵܢ ܫܸܚܬܵܢܬܵܐ ܡ̣ܢ ܦܘܼܡܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ، ܐܸܠܵܐ ܗܹܡܸܙܡܵܢ ܕܝܼܠܵܗ̇ ܨܦܵܝܝܼ ܠܸܒܢܵܝܵܐ ܠܐܵܢܝܼ ܕܣܢܝܼܩܹ̈ܐ ܝܢܵܐ ܐܸܠܘܼܗ̇، ܕܝܵܗ݇ܒ݂ܵܐ ܫܵܦܵܩܲܬ ܠܐܵܢܝܼ ܕܫܵܡܥܝܼ.
TRL: La palṭa hemizman shikhtanta min poemawkhoon, ila hemizman deelaha ṣpayee libnaya lanee dsneeqe yna iloeha, dyawa shapaqat lanee dsham'ee.
ENG: Let no corrupt speech proceed out of your mouth, but such as is good for edifying as the need may be, that it may give grace to them that hear.

ASY: ܘܠܵܐ ܡܲܦܫܸܡܝܼܬܘܿܢ ܠܪܘܼܚܵܐ ܩܲܕܝܼܫܵܐ ܕܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ، ܕܒܝܼܹܗ ܦܝܼܫ ܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܚܬܝܼܡܹܐ ܠܝܵܘܡܵܐ ܕܦܘܼܪܩܵܢܵܐ.
TRL: O la mapshimeetoon lroekha qadeesha dalaha, dbee-eh peesh lawkhoon khteeme lyawma dpoerqana.
ENG: And grieve not the Holy Spirit of God, in whom ye were sealed unto the day of redemption.

ASY: ܪܲܦܹܝܡܘܼܢ ܡܸܢܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܟܠܵܗ̇ ܡܲܪܝܼܪܘܼܬܵܐ، ܘܚܸܡܬܵܐ، ܘܟܲܪܒܵܐ، ܘܪܵܘܒܵܐ، ܘܓܘܼܕܵܦܵܐ، ܥܲܡ ܟܠܵܗ̇ ܒܝܼܫܘܼܬܵܐ.
TRL: Rapeymoen minawkhoon klaha mareeroeta, o khimta, o karba, o rawba, o goedapa, 'am klaha beeshoeta.
ENG: Let all bitterness, and wrath, and anger, and clamour, and railing, be put away from you, with all malice:

ASY: ܘܗܘܹܝܡܘܼܢ ܡܲܟܝܼܟܹ̈ܐ ܘܡܪ̈ܲܚܡܵܢܹܐ ܚܲܕ ܥܲܡ ܗ̇ܘ ܐ݇ܚܹܪ݇ܢܵܐ، ܦܲܚܠܘܼܢ ܚܲܕ ܠܗ̇ܘ ܐ݇ܚܹܪ݇ܢܵܐ، ܐܲܝܟ݂ ܕܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ ܦܘܼܚܸܠ ܠܹܗ ܐܸܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܒܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ.
TRL: O hweymoen makeeke o mrakhmane khad 'am haw khena, pakhloen khad lhaw khena, aykh dalaha poekhil-leh ilawkhoon bmsheekha.
ENG: and be ye kind one to another, tenderhearted, forgiving each other, even as God also in Christ forgave you.

ASY: ܗܘܹܝܡܘܼܢ ܗܲܕܟ݂ܵܐ ܬܵܒܥܵܢܹ̈ܐ ܠܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ ܐܲܝܟ݂ ܒܢܘܿܢܘܼ̈ܗܝ ܡܘܼܚܸܒܹ̈ܐ،
TRL: Hweymoen hadkha tab'ane lalaha aykh bnoonoehy moekhibe,
ENG: Be ye therefore imitators of God, as beloved children;

ASY: ܘܚܹܝܡܘܼܢ ܚܲܝܹ̈ܐ ܕܚܘܼܒܵܐ، ܕܵܐܟ݂ܝܼ ܕܐܘܼܦ ܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ ܡܘܼܚܸܒ ܠܹܗ ܐܸܠܲܢ ܘܣܘܼܦܝܵܐ ܠܹܗ ܓܵܢܹܗ ܡ̣ܢ ܓܹܒܲܢ، ܩܘܼܪܒܵܢܵܐ ܘܕܸܒ݂ܚܵܐ ܠܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ، ܪܹܝܚܵܐ ܒܲܣܝܼܡܵܐ.
TRL: O kheymoen khaye dkhoeba, dakhee doep msheekha moekhib-leh ilan o soepya-leh ganeh min geban, qoerbana o diwkha lalaha, reykha baseema.
ENG: and walk in love, even as Christ also loved you, and gave himself up for us, an offering and a sacrifice to God for an odour of a sweet smell.

ASY: ܐܝܼܢܵܐ ܙܵܢܝܘܼܬܵܐ، ܘܟܠܵܗ̇ ܛܲܢܦܘܼܬܵܐ، ܘܛܲܡܲܥܟܵܪܘܼܬܵܐ، ܐܘܼܦ ܠܵܐ ܗܵܘܹܐ ܠܗܘܿܢ ܕܘܼܟܵܐ ܓܵܘܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ، ܣܵܒܵܒ ܐܲܢܹܐ ܠܹܐ ܝܢܵܐ ܚܫܝܼܚܹܐ ܠܩܲܕܝܼܫܹ̈ܐ،
TRL: Eena zanyoeta, o klaha ṭanpoeta, o ṭama'karoeta, oep la hawe-lhoon doeka gawawkhoon, sabab ane le yna khsheekhe lqadeeshe,
ENG: But fornication, and all uncleanness, or covetousness, let it not even be named among you, as becometh saints;

ASY: ܘܠܵܐ ܫܪܝܼܚܘܼܬܵܐ، ܘܠܵܐ ܗܹܡܸܙܡܵܢܹ̈ܐ ܕܣܲܟ݂ܠܘܼܬܵܐ، ܝܲܢ ܡܲܣܚܵܪܘܼܬܵܐ، ܕܠܹܐ ܝܢܵܐ ܒܕܘܼܟܲܝܗܝ، ܐܸܠܵܐ ܡܒܵܕܵܠ ܕܐܲܢܹܐ، ܫܵܟܲܪܬܵܐ.
TRL: O la shreekhoeta, o la hemizmane dsakhloeta, yan maskharoeta, dle yna bdoekayhy, ila mbadal dane, shakarta.
ENG: nor filthiness, nor foolish talking, or jesting, which are not befitting: but rather giving of thanks.

ASY: ܣܵܒܵܒ ܟܹܐ ܝܵܕܥܝܼܬܘܿܢ ܨܦܵܝܝܼ، ܕܟܠ ܙܲܢܵܝܵܐ، ܝܲܢ ܛܲܢܦܵܐ، ܝܲܢ ܛܲܡܲܥܟܵܪ، ܕܝܼܠܹܗ ܣܵܓ݂ܕܵܢܵܐ ܕܨܵܢܲܡܹ̈ܐ، ܠܲܝܬ ܠܹܗ ܝܵܪܬܘܼܬܵܐ ܒܡܲܠܟܘܼܬܵܐ ܕܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ ܘܕܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ.
TRL: Sabab ke yad'eetoon ṣpayee, dkl zanaya, yan ṭanpa, yan ṭama'kar, deeleh saghdana dṣaname, layt-leh yartoeta bmalkoeta dmsheekha o dalaha.
ENG: For this ye know of a surety, that no fornicator, nor unclean person, nor covetous man, which is an idolater, hath any inheritance in the kingdom of Christ and God.

ASY: ܠܵܐ ܐ݇ܢܵܫܵܐ ܡܲܚܠܸܛ ܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܒܗܹܡܸܙܡܵܢܹ̈ܐ ܒܲܛܝܼܠܹ̈ܐ، ܣܵܒܵܒ ܒܘܼܬ ܐܲܢܹܐ ܒܹܐܬܵܝܵܐ ܝܠܵܗ̇ ܟܲܪܒܵܐ ܕܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ ܥܲܠ ܒܢܘܿܢܹ̈ܐ ܕܥܵܨܝܼܘܼܬܵܐ.
TRL: La nasha makhliṭ lawkhoon bhemizmane baṭeele, sabab boet ane betaya-ylaha karba dalaha 'al bnoone d'aṣeeoeta.
ENG: Let no man deceive you with empty words: for because of these things cometh the wrath of God upon the sons of disobedience.

ASY: ܒܲܣ ܠܵܐ ܗܵܘܹܝܬܘܿܢ ܫܲܪ̈ܝܼܟܹܐ ܥܲܡܲܝܗܝ.
TRL: Bas la haweytoon shareeke 'amayhy.
ENG: Be not ye therefore partakers with them;

ASY: ܣܵܒܵܒ ܩܵܕ݇ܡܵܝܬܵܐ ܚܸܫܟܵܐ ܝܬܘܿܢ ܗ݇ܘܵܘ، ܐܝܼܢܵܐ ܐܵܕܝܼܵܐ ܒܲܗܪܵܐ ܝܬܘܿܢ ܒܡܵܪܲܢ، ܒܲܣ ܚܝܹܝܡܘܼܢ ܐܲܝܟ݂ ܒܢܘܿܢܹ̈ܐ ܕܒܲܗܪܵܐ،
TRL: Sabab qamayta khishka ytoon waw, eena adeea bahra ytoon bmaran, bas khyeymoen aykh bnoone dbahra,
ENG: For ye were once darkness, but are now light in the Lord: walk as children of light

ASY: ܣܵܒܵܒ ܛܥܘܼܢܬܵܐ ܕܒܲܗܪܵܐ ܒܟܠܵܗ̇ ܛܵܒ݂ܬܵܐ ܝܠܵܗ̇، ܘܙܲܕܝܼܩܘܼܬܵܐ ܘܫܪܵܪܵܐ.
TRL: Sabab ṭ'oenta dbahra bklaha ṭawta-ylaha, o zadeeqoeta o shrara.
ENG: (for the fruit of the light is in all goodness and righteousness and truth),

ASY: ܗܘܹܝܡܘܼܢ ܒܸܦܪܵܫܵܐ ܡܘܿܕܝܼ ܝܠܹܗ ܫܲܦܝܼܪܵܐ ܩܵܕ݇ܡ ܡܵܪܲܢ،
TRL: Hweymoen biprasha moodee-yleh shapeera qam Maran,
ENG: proving what is well-pleasing unto the Lord;
