ASY: ܘܠܵܐ ܗܵܘܹܝܬܘܿܢ ܫܲܪ̈ܝܼܟܹܐ ܥܲܡ ܦܘܼܠܚܵܢܹ̈ܐ ܕܚܸܫܟܵܐ، ܕܠܲܝܬ ܠܗܘܿܢ ܛܥܘܼܢܝܵܬܹ̈ܐ، ܐܸܠܵܐ ܒܘܼܫ ܙܵܘܕܵܐ ܡܲܢܟܸܣܘܼܢ ܠܗܘܿܢ،
TRL: O la haweytoon shareeke 'am poelkhane dkhishka, dlayt-lhoon ṭ'oenyate, ila boesh zawda mankisoen-lhoon,
ENG: and have no fellowship with the unfruitful works of darkness, but rather even reprove them;

ASY: ܣܵܒܵܒ ܦܘܼܠܚܵܢܹ̈ܐ ܕܦܝܼܫܹܐ ܝܢܵܐ ܥܒ݂ܝܼܕܹܐ ܒܝܲܕ ܒܢܘܿܢܹ̈ܐ ܕܥܵܨܝܼܘܼܬܵܐ ܒܛܸܫܘܵܐ، ܥܲܝܒܵܐ ܝܠܹܗ ܐܘܼܦ ܕܗܲܡܙܸܡܲܚ ܒܘܼܬ ܕܝܼܲܝܗܝ.
TRL: Sabab poelkhane dpeeshe yna 'weede byad bnoone d'aṣeeoeta bṭishwa, 'ayba-yleh oep dhamzimakh boet dee-ayhy.
ENG: for the things which are done by them in secret it is a shame even to speak of.

ASY: ܐܝܼܢܵܐ ܟܠܲܝܗܝ ܡܸܢܕܝܼܵܢܹ̈ܐ ܕܟܹܐ ܦܵܝܫܝܼ ܦܪܝܼܣܹܐ ܩܵܕ݇ܡ ܒܲܗܪܵܐ ܟܹܐ ܦܵܝܫܝܼ ܓܸܠܝܹܐ،
TRL: Eena klayhy mindeeane dke payshee preese qam bahra ke payshee gilye,
ENG: But all things when they are reproved are made manifest by the light: for everything that is made manifest is light.

ASY: ܣܵܒܵܒ ܒܲܗܪܵܐ ܟܹܐ ܓܵܠܹܐ ܟܠ ܡܸܢܕܝܼ. ܒܘܼܬ ܐܵܗܵܐ ܦܝܼܫܵܐ ܝܠܹܗ ܐ݇ܡܝܼܪܵܐ: ܪܥܘܿܫ، ܝܵܐ ܕܡܝܼܟ݂ܵܐ ܘܩܘܼܡ ܡ̣ܢ ܡܝܼܬܹ̈ܐ، ܘܒܸܬ ܒܲܗܪܸܢ ܐܸܠܘܼܟ݂ ܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ.
TRL: Sabab bahra ke gale kl mindee. Boet aha peesha-yleh meera: r'oosh, ya dmeekha o qoem min meete, o bit bahrin iloekh msheekha.
ENG: Wherefore he saith, Awake, thou that sleepest, and arise from the dead, and Christ shall shine upon thee.

ASY: ܒܘܼܬ ܐܵܗܵܐ ܗܘܹܝܡܘܼܢ ܗܸܫܝܵܪ ܕܵܐܟ݂ܝܼ ܚܵܝܹܝܬܘܿܢ، ܠܵܐ ܐܲܝܟ݂ ܣܲܟ݂ܠܹ̈ܐ، ܐܸܠܵܐ ܐܲܝܟ݂ ܚܲܟܝܼܡܹ̈ܐ،
TRL: Boet aha hweymoen hishyar dakhee khayeytoon, la aykh sakhle, ila aykh khakeeme,
ENG: Look therefore carefully how ye walk, not as unwise, but as wise;

ASY: ܒܸܓ̰ܢܵܒ݂ܵܐ ܟܠ ܦܸܪܣܲܬ، ܣܵܒܵܒ ܝܵܘܡܵܢܹ̈ܐ ܒܝܼܫܹ̈ܐ ܝܢܵܐ.
TRL: Bijnawa kl pirsat, sabab yawmane beeshe yna.
ENG: redeeming the time, because the days are evil.

ASY: ܒܘܼܬ ܐܵܗܵܐ ܠܵܐ ܗܵܘܹܝܬܘܿܢ ܣܲܟ݂ܠܹ̈ܐ، ܐܝܼܢܵܐ ܦܲܪܡܹܝܡܘܼܢ ܡܘܿܕܝܼ ܝܠܹܗ ܨܸܒ݂ܝܵܢܵܐ ܕܡܵܪܝܵܐ.
TRL: Boet aha la haweytoon sakhle, eena parmeymoen moodee-yleh ṣiwyana dmarya.
ENG: Wherefore be ye not foolish, but understand what the will of the Lord is.

ASY: ܘܠܵܐ ܪܵܘܹܝܬܘܿܢ ܒܚܲܡܪܵܐ، ܕܒܝܼܹܗ ܐܝܼܬ ܐܵܣܘܿܛܘܼܬܵܐ، ܐܸܠܵܐ ܦܘܼܫܘܼܢ ܡܸܠܝܹܐ ܡ̣ܢ ܪܘܼܚܵܐ.
TRL: O la raweytoon bkhamra, dbee-eh eet asooṭoeta, ila poeshoen milye min roekha.
ENG: And be not drunken with wine, wherein is riot, but be filled with the Spirit;

ASY: ܗܲܡܙܸܡܘܼܢ ܚܲܕ ܥܲܡ ܗ̇ܘ ܐ݇ܚܹܪ݇ܢܵܐ ܒܡܲܙܡܘܿܪܹ̈ܐ، ܘܒܬܸܫܒܘܿܚܝܵܬܹ̈ܐ، ܘܒܙܡܵܪ̈ܝܵܬܹܐ ܪ̈ܘܼܚܵܢܵܝܹܐ، ܫܲܒܘܼܚܹܐ ܘܒܸܙܡܵܪܵܐ ܓܵܘ ܠܸܒܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܠܡܵܪܝܵܐ.
TRL: Hamzimoen khad 'am haw khena bmazmoore, o btishbookhyate, o bzmaryate roekhanaye, shaboekhe o bizmara gaw libawkhoon lmarya.
ENG: speaking one to another in psalms and hymns and spiritual songs, singing and making melody with your heart to the Lord;

ASY: ܗܘܹܝܡܘܼܢ ܫܲܟܘܼܪܹܐ ܠܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ ܒܵܒܵܐ ܒܟܠ ܙܲܒ݂ܢܵܐ ܒܘܼܬ ܟܠܲܝܗܝ ܡܸܢܕܝܼܵܢܹ̈ܐ ܒܫܸܡܵܐ ܕܡܵܪܲܢ ܝܼܫܘܿܥ ܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ.
TRL: Hweymoen shakoere lalaha baba bkl zawna boet klayhy mindeeane bshima dmaran eeshoo' msheekha.
ENG: giving thanks always for all things in the name of our Lord Jesus Christ to God, even the Father;

ASY: ܫܠܘܿܡܘܼܢ ܚܲܕ ܠܗ̇ܘ ܐ݇ܚܹܪ݇ܢܵܐ ܒܙܕܘܼܥܬܵܐ ܕܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ.
TRL: Shloomoen khad lhaw khena bzdoe'ta dmsheekha.
ENG: subjecting yourselves one to another in the fear of Christ.

ASY: ܒܲܟ݂ܬܵܬܹ̈ܐ، ܫܠܘܿܡܘܼܢ ܠܓܲܒ݂ܪ̈ܵܢܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ، ܐܲܝܟ݂ ܕܠܡܵܪܲܢ.
TRL: Bakhtate, shloomoen lgawranawkhoon, aykh dlmaran.
ENG: Wives, be in subjection unto your own husbands, as unto the Lord.

ASY: ܣܵܒܵܒ ܓܲܒ݂ܪܵܐ ܪܹܫܵܐ ܕܒܲܟ݂ܬܵܐ ܝܠܹܗ، ܕܵܐܟ݂ܝܼ ܕܐܘܼܦ ܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ ܪܹܫܵܐ ܕܥܹܕܬܵܐ ܝܠܹܗ، ܘܗ̇ܘ ܝܼܠܹܗ ܦܵܪܘܿܩܵܐ ܕܦܲܓ݂ܪܵܐ.
TRL: Sabab gawra resha dbakhta-yleh, dakhee doep msheekha resha d'edta-yleh, o haw eeleh parooqa dpaghra.
ENG: For the husband is the head of the wife, as Christ also is the head of the church, being himself the saviour of the body.

ASY: ܒܘܼܬ ܐܵܗܵܐ، ܕܵܐܟ݂ܝܼ ܕܥܹܕܬܵܐ ܟܹܐ ܫܵܠܡܵܐ ܠܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ، ܗܲܕܟ݂ܵܐ ܐܘܼܦ ܒܲܟ݂ܬܵܬܹ̈ܐ ܫܵܠܡܝܼ ܠܓܲܒ݂ܪ̈ܵܢܲܝܗܝ ܒܟܠ ܡܸܢܕܝܼ.
TRL: Boet aha, dakhee d'edta ke shalma lmsheekha, hadkha oep bakhtate shalmee lgawranayhy bkl mindee.
ENG: But as the church is subject to Christ, so let the wives also be to their husbands in everything.

ASY: ܓܲܒ݂ܪ̈ܵܢܹܐ، ܡܲܚܸܒܘܼܢ ܠܒܲܟ݂ܬܵܬܵܘ̈ܟ݂ܘܿܢ، ܐܲܝܟ݂ ܕܐܘܼܦ ܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ ܡܘܼܚܸܒ ܠܹܗ ܠܥܹܕܬܵܐ، ܘܣܘܼܦܝܵܐ ܠܹܗ ܓܵܢܹܗ ܒܘܼܬ ܕܝܼܘܼܗ̇،
TRL: Gawrane, makhiboen lbakhtatawkhoon, aykh doep msheekha moekhib-leh l'edta, o soepya-leh ganeh boet deeoeha,
ENG: Husbands, love your wives, even as Christ also loved the church, and gave himself up for it;

ASY: ܕܡܩܲܕܸܫ ܗ݇ܘܵܐ ܠܵܗ̇ ܘܕܲܟܹܐ ܗ݇ܘܵܐ ܠܵܗ̇ ܒܣܚܵܝܬܵܐ ܕܒܡ̈ܝܼܵܐ ܒܝܲܕ ܗܹܡܸܙܡܵܢ،
TRL: Dmqadish wa-laha o dake wa-laha bskhayta dbmeea byad hemizman,
ENG: that he might sanctify it, having cleansed it by the washing of water with the word,

ASY: ܕܡܲܩܪܸܒ݂ ܗ݇ܘܵܐ ܠܵܗ̇ ܠܓܵܢܹܗ ܚܕܵܐ ܥܹܕܬܵܐ ܚܩܝܼܪܬܵܐ، ܕܠܵܐ ܠܲܟܵܐ ܘܕܠܵܐ ܩܲܪܡܲܟ̰ܬܵܐ، ܘܠܵܐ ܡܸܢܕܝܼ ܐܲܝܟ݂ ܕܐܲܢܹܐ، ܐܸܠܵܐ ܕܗܵܘܝܵܐ ܩܲܕܝܼܫܬܵܐ ܘܕܠܵܐ ܡܘܼܡܵܐ.
TRL: Dmaqriw wa-laha lganeh khda 'edta khqeerta, dla laka o dla qarmachta, o la mindee aykh dane, ila dhawya qadeeshta o dla moema.
ENG: that he might present the church to himself a glorious church, not having spot or wrinkle or any such thing; but that it should be holy and without blemish.

ASY: ܗܲܕܟ݂ܵܐ ܘܵܠܹܐ ܝܠܵܗ̇ ܠܓܲܒ݂ܪ̈ܵܢܹܐ ܕܡܲܚܸܒܝܼ ܠܒܲܟ݂ܬܵܬܲܝ̈ܗܝ ܐܲܝܟ݂ ܕܠܦܲܓ݂ܪܵܐ ܕܓܵܢܲܝܗܝ. ܗ̇ܘ ܕܡܲܚܸܒ ܠܒܲܟ݂ܬܹܗ، ܠܓܵܢܹܗ ܡܲܚܘܼܒܹܐ ܝܠܹܗ.
TRL: Hadkha wale-ylaha lgawrane dmakhibee lbakhtatayhy aykh dlpaghra dganayhy. Haw dmakhib lbakhteh, lganeh makhoebe-yleh.
ENG: Even so ought husbands also to love their own wives as their own bodies. He that loveth his own wife loveth himself:

ASY: ܣܵܒܵܒ ܗܸܟ̃ ܐ݇ܢܵܫܵܐ ܠܹܐ ܣܵܢܹܐ ܠܦܲܓ݂ܪܹܗ، ܐܸܠܵܐ ܟܹܐ ܬܲܪܣܹܐ ܠܹܗ ܘܬܲܓܒܸܪܹܗ ܕܵܐܟ݂ܝܼ ܕܐܘܼܦ ܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ ܟܹܐ ܥܵܒܹܕ ܠܥܹܕܬܵܐ،
TRL: Sabab hich nasha le sane lpaghreh, ila ke tarse-leh o tagbireh dakhee doep msheekha ke 'abed l'edta,
ENG: for no man ever hated his own flesh; but nourisheth and cherisheth it, even as Christ also the church;

ASY: ܣܵܒܵܒ ܗܲܕܵܡܹ̈ܐ ܕܦܲܓ݂ܪܹܗ ܝܘܲܚ.
TRL: Sabab hadame dpaghreh ywakh.
ENG: because we are members of his body.

ASY: ܒܘܼܬ ܐܵܗܵܐ ܒܸܬ ܫܵܒܹܩ ܐ݇ܢܵܫܵܐ ܠܒܵܒܘܼܗܝ ܘܠܝܸܡܹܗ ܘܒܸܬ ܬܵܒܹܥ ܠܒܲܟ݂ܬܹܗ، ܘܒܸܬ ܗܵܘܝܼ ܬܸܪܘܲܝܗܝ ܚܲܕ ܦܲܓ݂ܪܵܐ.
TRL: Boet aha bit shabeq nasha lbaboehy o lyimeh o bit tabe' lbakhteh, o bit hawee tirwayhy khad paghra.
ENG: For this cause shall a man leave his father and mother, and shall cleave to his wife; and the twain shall become one flesh.

ASY: ܐܵܗܵܐ ܐ݇ܪܵܙܵܐ ܓܘܼܪܵܐ ܝܠܹܗ؛ ܐܝܼܢܵܐ ܐܵܢܵܐ ܗܲܡܙܘܼܡܹܐ ܝܘܸܢ ܒܘܼܬ ܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ ܘܒܘܼܬ ܥܹܕܬܵܐ.
TRL: Aha raza goera-yleh; eena ana hamzoeme ywin boet msheekha o boet 'edta.
ENG: This mystery is great: but I speak in regard of Christ and of the church.

ASY: ܗܲܕܟ݂ܵܐ ܐܘܼܦ ܐܲܚܬܘܿܢ، ܟܠ ܚܲܕ ܡܸܢܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܘܵܠܹܐ ܝܠܵܗ̇ ܕܡܲܚܸܒ ܠܒܲܟ݂ܬܹܗ ܐܲܝܟ݂ ܕܡܲܚܸܒ ܠܓܵܢܹܗ، ܘܒܲܟ݂ܬܵܐ، ܘܵܠܹܐ ܝܠܵܗ̇ ܕܡܝܲܩܪܵܐ ܠܓܲܒ݂ܪܘܼܗ̇.
TRL: Hadkha oep akhtoon, kl khad minawkhoon wale-ylaha dmakhib lbakhteh aykh dmakhib lganeh, o bakhta, wale-ylaha dmyaqra lgawroeha.
ENG: Nevertheless do ye also severally love each one his own wife even as himself; and let the wife see that she fear her husband.

ASY: ܝܵܠܹ̈ܕ݇ܐ، ܡܲܨܝܸܬܘܼܢ ܠܐܲܒ݂ܵܗܵܘ̈ܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܒܡܵܪܲܢ، ܣܵܒܵܒ ܐܵܗܵܐ ܬܪܘܼܨܵܐ ܝܠܵܗ̇.
TRL: Yale, maṣyitoen lawahawkhoon bmaran, sabab aha troeṣa-ylaha.
ENG: Children, obey your parents in the Lord: for this is right.

ASY: ܡܝܲܩܸܪ ܠܒܵܒܘܼܟ݂ ܘܠܝܸܡܘܼܟ݂، ܕܝܼܠܹܗ ܦܘܼܩܕܵܢܵܐ ܩܵܕ݇ܡܵܝܵܐ ܥܲܡ ܩܵܘܠܵܐ،
TRL: Myaqir lbaboekh o lyimoekh, deeleh poeqdana qamaya 'am qawla,
ENG: Honour thy father and mother (which is the first commandment with promise),

ASY: ܕܗܵܘܝܵܐ ܨܦܵܝܝܼ ܐܸܠܘܼܟ݂، ܘܝܵܪܟ݂ܝܼ ܚܲܝܘܼ̈ܟ݂ ܥܲܠ ܐܲܪܥܵܐ.
TRL: Dhawya ṣpayee iloekh, o yarkhee khayoekh 'al ar'a.
ENG: that it may be well with thee, and thou mayest live long on the earth.

ASY: ܒܵܒܵܘܵܬܹ̈ܐ، ܠܵܐ ܡܲܟܪܸܒܝܼܬܘܿܢ ܠܝܵܠܵܕ݇ܘ̈ܟ݂ܘܿܢ، ܐܝܼܢܵܐ ܓܲܪܘܸܣܘܼܢ ܠܗܘܿܢ ܒܡܲܪܕܘܼܬܵܐ ܘܒܝܘܼܠܦܵܢܵܐ ܕܡܵܪܲܢ.
TRL: Babawate, la makribeetoon lyalawkhoon, eena garwisoen-lhoon bmardoeta o byoelpana dmaran.
ENG: And, ye fathers, provoke not your children to wrath: but nurture them in the chastening and admonition of the Lord.

ASY: ܥܲܒ݂ܕܹ̈ܐ، ܡܲܨܝܸܬܘܼܢ ܠܡܵܪ̈ܵܘܵܬܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܐܲܪ̈ܥܵܢܵܝܹܐ، ܒܙܕܘܼܥܬܵܐ ܘܒܪܲܬܪܲܬܬܵܐ ܘܒܦܫܝܼܛܘܼܬܵܐ ܕܠܸܒܵܐ، ܐܲܝܟ݂ ܕܠܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ،
TRL: 'Awde, maṣyitoen lmarawatawkhoon ar'anaye, bzdoe'ta o bratratta o bpsheeṭoeta dliba, aykh dlmsheekha,
ENG: Servants, be obedient unto them that according to the flesh are your masters, with fear and trembling, in singleness of your heart, as unto Christ;

ASY: ܠܵܐ ܒܦܠܵܚܬܵܐ ܩܵܕ݇ܡ ܥܲܝܢܵܐ ܐܲܝܟ݂ ܡܲܫܦܸܪ̈ܵܢܹܐ ܠܒܢܲܝ̈ܢܵܫܵܐ، ܐܸܠܵܐ ܐܲܝܟ݂ ܥܲܒ݂ܕܹ̈ܐ ܕܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ، ܒܸܥܒ݂ܵܕܵܐ ܨܸܒ݂ܝܵܢܵܐ ܕܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ ܡ̣ܢ ܠܸܒܵܐ.
TRL: La bplakhta qam 'ayna aykh mashpirane lbnaynasha, ila aykh 'awde dmsheekha, bi'wada ṣiwyana dalaha min liba.
ENG: not in the way of eyeservice, as men-pleasers; but as servants of Christ, doing the will of God from the heart;

ASY: ܦܠܘܿܚܘܼܢ ܒܨܸܒ݂ܝܵܢܵܐ ܛܵܒ݂ܵܐ ܐܲܝܟ݂ ܕܠܡܵܪܲܢ ܘܠܵܐ ܐܲܝܟ݂ ܕܠܒܢܲܝ̈ܢܵܫܵܐ،
TRL: Plookhoen bṣiwyana ṭawa aykh dlmaran o la aykh dlbnaynasha,
ENG: with good will doing service, as unto the Lord, and not unto men:

ASY: ܣܵܒܵܒ ܟܹܐ ܝܵܕܥܝܼܬܘܿܢ ܕܡܵܪܲܢ ܒܸܬ ܦܵܪܹܥ ܠܟܠ ܚܲܕ ܩܵܐ ܦܘܼܠܚܵܢܵܐ ܛܵܒ݂ܵܐ ܕܥܵܒܹܕ، ܐܸܢ ܥܲܒ݂ܕܵܐ ܝܠܹܗ ܝܲܢ ܚܹܐܪܵܐ.
TRL: Sabab ke yad'eetoon dmaran bit pare' lkl khad qa poelkhana ṭawa d'abed, in 'awda-yleh yan khera.
ENG: knowing that whatsoever good thing each one doeth, the same shall he receive again from the Lord, whether he be bond or free.

ASY: ܐܘܼܦ ܐܲܚܬܘܿܢ، ܡܵܪ̈ܵܘܵܬܹܐ، ܗܲܕܟ݂ܵܐ ܥܒ݂ܘܿܕܘܼܢ ܠܥܲܒ݂ܕܹ̈ܐ، ܫܠܹܝܡܘܼܢ ܡ̣ܢ ܠܸܥܒ݂ܵܕܵܐ ܓܸܙܡܹ̈ܐ ܥܲܠܲܝܗܝ، ܟܲܕ ܒܝܼܕܵܥܵܐ ܝܬܘܿܢ ܕܡܵܪܵܐ ܕܝܼܲܝܗܝ ܘܕܝܼܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܓܵܘ ܫܡܲܝܵܐ ܝܠܹܗ، ܘܠܹܐ ܚܵܙܹܐ ܦܵܬܵܐ.
TRL: Oep akhtoon, marawate, hadkha 'woodoen l'awde, shleymoen min li'wada gizme 'alayhy, kad beeda'a ytoon dmara dee-ayhy o deeawkhoon gaw shmaya-yleh, o le khaze pata.
ENG: And, ye masters, do the same things unto them, and forbear threatening: knowing that both their Master and yours is in heaven, and there is no respect of persons with him.

ASY: ܒܚܲܪܬܵܐ، ܐܲܚܘܿܢܘܵܬܝܼ̈، ܚܲܠܸܢܘܼܢ ܒܡܵܪܲܢ ܘܒܙܲܪܒ ܕܚܲܝܠܹܗ.
TRL: Bkharta, akhoonwatee, khalinoen bmaran o bzarb dkhayleh.
ENG: Finally, be strong in the Lord, and in the strength of his might.

ASY: ܠܒ݂ܘܿܫܘܼܢ ܟܠܹܗ ܙܲܝܢܵܐ ܕܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ، ܕܡܵܨܹܝܬܘܿܢ ܠܸܟܠܵܝܵܐ ܩܵܕ݇ܡ ܦܲܢܕܹ̈ܐ ܕܐܵܟܹܠܩܲܪܨܵܐ.
TRL: Lwooshoen kleh zayna dalaha, dmaṣeytoon liklaya qam pande dakelqarṣa.
ENG: Put on the whole armour of God, that ye may be able to stand against the wiles of the devil.

ASY: ܣܵܒܵܒ ܦܠܵܫܲܢ ܠܹܐ ܝܠܹܗ ܥܲܡ ܕܸܡܵܐ ܘܒܸܣܪܵܐ، ܐܸܠܵܐ ܥܲܡ ܪܹ̈ܫܵܢܹܐ ܘܫܘܼܠܛܵܢܹ̈ܐ ܘܥܲܡ ܪܵܘܪ̈ܒ݂ܵܢܹܐ ܕܐܵܗܵܐ ܙܲܒ݂ܢܵܐ ܕܚܸܫܟܵܐ، ܘܥܲܡ ܚܲܝܠܵܘܵܬܹ̈ܐ ܪ̈ܘܼܚܵܢܵܝܹܐ ܕܒܝܼܫܵܐ ܒܕܘܼܟܵܢܹ̈ܐ ܫܡܲܝܵܢܵܝܹ̈ܐ.
TRL: Sabab plashan le-yleh 'am dima o bisra, ila 'am reshane o shoelṭane o 'am rawrwane daha zawna dkhishka, o 'am khaylawate roekhanaye dbeesha bdoekane shmayanaye.
ENG: For our wrestling is not against flesh and blood, but against the principalities, against the powers, against the world-rulers of this darkness, against the spiritual hosts of wickedness in the heavenly places.

ASY: ܒܘܼܬ ܐܵܗܵܐ، ܠܒ݂ܘܿܫܘܼܢ ܟܠܹܗ ܙܲܝܢܵܐ ܕܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ ܕܡܵܨܹܝܬܘܿܢ ܟܵܠܹܝܬܘܿܢ ܕܲܠܩܘܼܒ݂ܠܲܝܗܝ ܐܝܼܡܲܢ ܕܐܵܬܹܐ ܝܵܘܡܵܐ ܕܒܝܼܫܵܐ، ܘܡ̣ܢ ܒܵܬ݇ܪ ܕܗܵܘܹܝܬܘܿܢ ܥܒ݂ܝܼܕܹܐ ܟܠ ܡܸܢܕܝܼ، ܟܵܠܹܝܬܘܿܢ.
TRL: Boet aha, lwooshoen kleh zayna dalaha dmaṣeytoon kaleytoon dalqoewlayhy eeman date yawma dbeesha, o min bar dhaweytoon 'weede kl mindee, kaleytoon.
ENG: Wherefore take up the whole armour of God, that ye may be able to withstand in the evil day, and, having done all, to stand.

ASY: ܒܲܣ ܟܠܹܝܡܘܼܢ ܗܲܕܟ݂ܵܐ. ܚܠܘܿܨܘܼܢ ܚܲܨܵܘ̈ܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܒܫܪܵܪܵܐ، ܘܠܒ݂ܘܿܫܘܼܢ ܫܸܪܝܵܢܵܐ ܕܙܲܕܝܼܩܘܼܬܵܐ،
TRL: Bas kleymoen hadkha. Khlooṣoen khaṣawkhoon bshrara, o lwooshoen shiryana dzadeeqoeta,
ENG: Stand therefore, having girded your loins with truth, and having put on the breastplate of righteousness,

ASY: ܘܐܲܩܠܵܬܵܘ̈ܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܚܠܝܼܨܹܐ ܗܵܕܵܐ ܕܡܵܨܹܝܬܘܿܢ ܡܲܟܪܸܙܝܼܬܘܿܢ ܐܹܘܲܢܓܲܠܝܼܘܿܢ ܕܫܠܵܡܵܐ،
TRL: O aqlatawkhoon khleeṣe hada dmaṣeytoon makrizeetoon ewangaleeoon dshlama,
ENG: and having shod your feet with the preparation of the gospel of peace;

ASY: ܘܥܲܠ ܟܠܲܝܗܝ ܐܲܢܹܐ، ܫܩܘܿܠܘܼܢ ܡܵܛܵܠܵܐ ܕܗܲܝܡܵܢܘܼܬܵܐ ܕܒܝܼܹܗ ܡܵܨܹܝܬܘܿܢ ܡܲܟ̰ܡܸܥܝܼܬܘܿܢ ܟܠܲܝܗܝ ܓܹܐܪܹ̈ܐ ܠܵܗܝܵܢܹ̈ܐ ܕܒܝܼܫܵܐ.
TRL: O 'al klayhy ane, shqooloen maṭala dhaymanoeta dbee-eh maṣeytoon machmi'eetoon klayhy gere lahyane dbeesha.
ENG: withal taking up the shield of faith, wherewith ye shall be able to quench all the fiery darts of the evil one.

ASY: ܘܫܩܘܿܠܘܼܢ ܣܲܢܘܲܪܬܵܐ ܕܦܘܼܪܩܵܢܵܐ، ܘܣܲܝܦܵܐ ܕܪܘܼܚܵܐ، ܕܝܼܠܹܗ ܗܹܡܸܙܡܵܢ ܕܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ.
TRL: O shqooloen sanwarta dpoerqana, o saypa droekha, deeleh hemizman dalaha.
ENG: And take the helmet of salvation, and the sword of the Spirit, which is the word of God:

ASY: ܨܲܠܹܝܡܘܼܢ ܒܪܘܼܚܵܐ ܒܟܠ ܙܲܒ݂ܢܵܐ، ܒܟܠܲܝܗܝ ܨܠܵܘܵܬܹ̈ܐ ܘܒܦܲܪ̈ܦܲܠܝܵܬܹܐ. ܗܲܕܟ݂ܵܐ ܗܵܘܹܝܬܘܿܢ ܒܸܥܒ݂ܵܕܵܐ، ܘܒܟܠ ܚܡܵܠܬܵܐ، ܪܥܝܼܫܹܐ ܘܦܲܪܦܘܼܠܹܐ ܒܘܼܬ ܟܠܲܝܗܝ ܩܲܕܝܼܫܹ̈ܐ.
TRL: Ṣaleymoen broekha bkl zawna, bklayhy ṣlawate o bparpalyate. Hadkha haweytoon bi'wada, o bkl khmalta, r'eeshe o parpoele boet klayhy qadeeshe.
ENG: with all prayer and supplication praying at all seasons in the Spirit, and watching thereunto in all perseverance and supplication for all the saints,

ASY: ܨܲܠܹܝܡܘܼܢ ܐܘܼܦ ܒܘܼܬ ܕܝܼܝܼ، ܕܐܝܼܡܲܢ ܕܗܲܡܙܸܡܸܢ، ܦܵܝܫܝܼ ܝܘܼܗ݇ܒܹܐ ܐܸܠܝܼ ܗܹܡܸܙܡܵܢܹ̈ܐ ܕܡܲܕܥܸܢ ܐ݇ܪܵܙܵܐ ܕܐܹܘܲܢܓܲܠܝܼܘܿܢ ܕܠܵܐ ܙܕܘܼܥܬܵܐ،
TRL: Ṣaleymoen oep boet deeee, deeman dhamzimin, payshee yoebe ilee hemizmane dmad'in raza dewangaleeoon dla zdoe'ta,
ENG: And on my behalf, that utterance may be given unto me in opening my mouth, to make known with boldness the mystery of the gospel,

ASY: ܗ̇ܘ ܕܐܵܢܵܐ ܐܝܼܙܓܲܕܹܗ ܝܘܸܢ ܒܫܹܫܠܵܬܹ̈ܐ. ܨܲܠܹܝܡܘܼܢ ܕܦܵܪܣܹܢܹܗ ܒܓ̰ܘܼܪܐܲܬ ܐܲܝܟ݂ ܕܘܵܠܹܐ ܝܠܵܗ̇ ܐܸܠܝܼ ܕܦܵܪܣܹܢܹܗ.
TRL: Haw dana eezgadeh ywin bsheshlate. Ṣaleymoen dparseneh bjoerat aykh dwale-ylaha ilee dparseneh.
ENG: for which I am an ambassador in chains; that in it I may speak boldly, as I ought to speak.

ASY: ܘܐܵܕܝܼܵܐ ܩܵܐ ܕܝܵܕܥܝܼܬܘܿܢ ܒܘܼܬ ܕܝܼܝܼ ܘܡܘܿܕܝܼ ܝܘܸܢ ܒܸܥܒ݂ܵܕܵܐ، ܒܸܬ ܡܲܚܒܸܪܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܟܠ ܡܸܢܕܝܼ ܛܘܼܟ݂ܝܼܩܘܿܣ، ܐܲܚܘܿܢܵܐ ܡܘܼܚܸܒܵܐ ܘܡܫܲܡܫܵܢܵܐ ܡܗܘܼܡܢܵܐ ܒܡܵܪܲܢ،
TRL: O adeea qa dyad'eetoon boet deeee o moodee ywin bi'wada, bit makhbirawkhoon kl mindee ṭoekheeqoos, akhoona moekhiba o mshamshana mhoemna bmaran,
ENG: But that ye also may know my affairs, how I do, Tychicus, the beloved brother and faithful minister in the Lord, shall make known to you all things:

ASY: ܗ̇ܘ ܕܐܵܢܵܐ ܫܘܼܕܸܪܝܼ ܠܟܸܣ ܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܗܲܪ ܒܘܼܬ ܐܵܗܵܐ ܡܸܢܕܝܼ، ܕܝܵܕܥܝܼܬܘܿܢ ܒܘܼܬ ܕܝܼܲܢ ܘܝܲܗ݇ܒܸܠ ܠܸܒܵܐ ܐܸܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ.
TRL: Haw dana shoediree lkis lawkhoon har boet aha mindee, dyad'eetoon boet dee-an o yabil liba ilawkhoon.
ENG: whom I have sent unto you for this very purpose, that ye may know our state, and that he may comfort your hearts.

ASY: ܫܠܵܡܵܐ ܠܐܲܚܘܿܢܘܵܬܲܢ̈، ܘܚܘܼܒܵܐ ܥܲܡ ܗܲܝܡܵܢܘܼܬܵܐ ܡ̣ܢ ܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ ܒܵܒܵܐ ܘܡ̣ܢ ܡܵܪܲܢ ܝܼܫܘܿܥ ܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ.
TRL: Shlama lakhoonwatan, o khoeba 'am haymanoeta min Alaha baba o min Maran eeshoo' msheekha.
ENG: Peace be to the brethren, and love with faith, from God the Father and the Lord Jesus Christ.

ASY: ܫܵܦܵܩܲܬ ܥܲܡ ܟܠܲܝܗܝ ܐܵܢܝܼ ܕܡܲܚܸܒܝܼ ܠܡܵܪܲܢ ܝܼܫܘܿܥ ܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ ܕܠܵܐ ܚܪܵܒ݂ܵܐ. ܐܵܡܹܝܢ.
TRL: Shapaqat 'am klayhy anee dmakhibee lmaran eeshoo' msheekha dla khrawa. Ameyn.
ENG: Grace be with all them that love our Lord Jesus Christ in uncorruptness.

ASY: ܦܵܘܠܘܿܣ ܘܛܝܼܡܵܬܹܐܘܿܣ، ܥܲܒ݂ܕܹ̈ܐ ܕܝܼܫܘܿܥ ܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ، ܠܟܠܲܝܗܝ ܩܲܕܝܼܫܹ̈ܐ ܒܝܼܫܘܿܥ ܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ ܕܝܼܢܵܐ ܓܵܘ ܦܝܼܠܝܼܦܘܿܣ، ܥܲܡ ܐܲܦܸܣܩܘܿܦܹ̈ܐ ܘܡܫܲܡܫܵܢܹ̈ܐ،
TRL: Pawloos o ṭeemateoos, 'awde deeshoo' msheekha, lklayhy qadeeshe beeshoo' msheekha deena gaw peeleepoos, 'am apisqoope o mshamshane,
ENG: Paul and Timothy, servants of Christ Jesus, to all the saints in Christ Jesus which are at Philippi, with the bishops and deacons:

ASY: ܫܵܦܵܩܲܬ ܘܫܠܵܡܵܐ ܐܸܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܡ̣ܢ ܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ ܒܵܒܲܢ ܘܡ̣ܢ ܡܵܪܲܢ ܝܼܫܘܿܥ ܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ.
TRL: Shapaqat o shlama ilawkhoon min Alaha baban o min Maran eeshoo' msheekha.
ENG: Grace to you and peace from God our Father and the Lord Jesus Christ.

ASY: ܫܲܟܘܼܪܹܐ ܝܘܸܢ ܠܐܲܠܵܗܝܼ ܟܠ ܥܕܵܢܵܐ ܕܕܵܟ݂ܪܹܢܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ.
TRL: Shakoere ywin lalahee kl 'dana ddakhrenawkhoon.
ENG: I thank my God upon all my remembrance of you,

ASY: ܒܟܠܹܗ ܙܲܒ݂ܢܵܐ ܟܹܐ ܦܲܪܦܸܠܸܢ ܒܚܲܕܘܼܬܵܐ ܒܘܼܬ ܕܝܼܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܓܵܘ ܟܠܲܝܗܝ ܦܲܪ̈ܦܲܠܝܵܬܝܼ،
TRL: Bkleh zawna ke parpilin bkhadoeta boet deeawkhoon gaw klayhy parpalyatee,
ENG: always in every supplication of mine on behalf of you all making my supplication with joy,

ASY: ܥܲܠ ܫܲܪܝܼܟܘܼܬܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܒܐܹܘܲܢܓܲܠܝܼܘܿܢ ܡ̣ܢ ܝܵܘܡܵܐ ܩܵܕ݇ܡܵܝܵܐ ܘܗܲܠ ܐܵܕܝܼܵܐ،
TRL: 'Al shareekoetawkhoon bewangaleeoon min yawma qamaya o hal adeea,
ENG: for your fellowship in furtherance of the gospel from the first day until now;

ASY: ܣܵܒܵܒ ܚܵܬܸܪܓ̰ܲܡܥ ܝܼܘܸܢ ܒܐܵܗܵܐ: ܗ̇ܘ ܕܫܘܼܪܹܐ ܠܹܗ ܒܝܼܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܦܘܼܠܚܵܢܵܐ ܛܵܒ݂ܵܐ، ܗ̇ܘ ܒܸܬ ܡܲܟܡܸܠ ܠܹܗ ܗܲܠ ܝܵܘܡܵܐ ܕܝܼܫܘܿܥ ܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ.
TRL: Sabab khatirjam' eewin baha: haw dshoere-leh beeawkhoon poelkhana ṭawa, haw bit makmil-leh hal yawma deeshoo' msheekha.
ENG: being confident of this very thing, that he which began a good work in you will perfect it until the day of Jesus Christ:

ASY: ܐܝܼܬ ܠܝܼ ܗܵܩܘܼܬܵܐ ܕܚܵܫܒܹܢ ܗܲܕܟ݂ܵܐ ܒܘܼܬ ܟܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ، ܣܵܒܵܒ ܓܵܘ ܠܸܒܝܼ ܝܬܘܿܢ. ܐܸܢ ܒܐܸܣܘܼܪܹ̈ܐ، ܘܐܸܢ ܒܝܲܗ݇ܒܲܠܬܵܐ ܕܓ̰ܘܼܘܵܒ ܘܒܡܲܩܘܵܝܬܵܐ ܕܐܹܘܲܢܓܲܠܝܼܘܿܢ، ܟܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܫܲܪ̈ܝܼܟܹܐ ܝܬܘܿܢ ܥܲܡܝܼ ܒܫܵܦܵܩܲܬ.
TRL: Eet-lee haqoeta dkhashben hadkha boet klawkhoon, sabab gaw libee ytoon. In bisoere, o in byabalta djoewab o bmaqwayta dewangaleeoon, klawkhoon shareeke ytoon 'amee bshapaqat.
ENG: even as it is right for me to be thus minded on behalf of you all, because I have you in my heart, inasmuch as, both in my bonds and in the defence and confirmation of the gospel, ye all are partakers with me of grace.

ASY: ܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ ܒܸܣܗܵܕܵܐ ܝܠܹܗ ܥܲܠܝܼ، ܟܡܵܐ ܟܹܐ ܪܲܚܪܸܚܸܢ ܥܲܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܒܪܲܚܪ̈ܲܚܝܵܬܹܐ ܕܝܼܫܘܿܥ ܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ.
TRL: Alaha bishada-yleh 'alee, kma ke rakhrikhin 'alawkhoon brakhrakhyate deeshoo' msheekha.
ENG: For God is my witness, how I long after you all in the tender mercies of Christ Jesus.

ASY: ܘܐܵܗܵܐ ܝܠܵܗ̇ ܨܠܘܿܬܝܼ، ܕܚܘܼܒܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܙܵܐܹܕ ܒܘܼܫ ܪܵܒܵܐ ܒܝ݇ܕܲܥܬܵܐ ܘܒܟܠܵܗ̇ ܦܲܪܡܵܝܬܵܐ،
TRL: O aha-ylaha ṣlootee, dkhoebawkhoon zaed boesh raba bda'ta o bklaha parmayta,
ENG: And this I pray, that your love may abound yet more and more in knowledge and all discernment;

ASY: ܕܗܵܘܹܝܬܘܿܢ ܒܸܦܪܵܫܵܐ ܠܡܸܢܕܝܼܵܢܹ̈ܐ ܕܝܼܢܵܐ ܒܘܼܫ ܨܦܵܝܝܼ، ܕܗܵܘܹܝܬܘܿܢ ܕܸܟ݂ܝܹܐ ܘܕܠܵܐ ܠܵܘܡܵܐ ܗܲܠ ܝܵܘܡܵܐ ܕܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ،
TRL: Dhaweytoon biprasha lmindeeane deena boesh ṣpayee, dhaweytoon dikhye o dla lawma hal yawma dmsheekha,
ENG: so that ye may approve the things that are excellent; that ye may be sincere and void of offence unto the day of Christ;

ASY: ܘܡܸܠܝܹܐ ܛܥܘܼܢܝܵܬܹ̈ܐ ܕܙܲܕܝܼܩܘܼܬܵܐ ܕܒܝܼܫܘܿܥ ܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ، ܠܫܘܼܒ݂ܚܵܐ ܘܠܚܸܩܪܵܐ ܕܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ.
TRL: O milye ṭ'oenyate dzadeeqoeta dbeeshoo' msheekha, lshoewkha o lkhiqra dalaha.
ENG: being filled with the fruits of righteousness, which are through Jesus Christ, unto the glory and praise of God.

ASY: ܐܝܼܢܵܐ ܒܵܥܹܝܢ ܕܝܵܕܥܝܼܬܘܿܢ ܐܲܚܘܿܢܘܵܬܝܼ̈، ܕܡܸܢܕܝܼܵܢܹ̈ܐ ܕܩܘܼܘܸܡ ܠܗܘܿܢ ܐܸܠܝܼ ܒܘܼܫ ܙܵܘܕܵܐ ܩܵܐ ܦܪܵܣܬܵܐ ܕܐܹܘܲܢܓܲܠܝܼܘܿܢ ܝܼܗ݇ܘܵܘ.
TRL: Eena ba'eyn dyad'eetoon akhoonwatee, dmindeeane dqoewim-lhoon ilee boesh zawda qa prasta dewangaleeoon eewaw.
ENG: Now I would have you know, brethren, that the things which happened unto me have fallen out rather unto the progress of the gospel;

ASY: ܗܲܕܟ݂ܵܐ ܕܦܝܼܫܬܵܐ ܝܠܵܗ̇ ܝ݇ܕܝܼܥܬܵܐ ܠܟܠܲܝܗܝ ܐܵܢܝܼ ܕܝܼܢܵܐ ܒܩܲܨܪܵܐ ܘܒܟܠܲܝܗܝ ܕܘܼܟܵܢܹ̈ܐ ܐ݇ܚܹܪ̈݇ܢܹܐ ܕܦܝܼܫܵܐ ܝܘܸܢ ܐ݇ܣܝܼܪܵܐ ܒܫܹܫܠܵܬܹ̈ܐ ܒܘܼܬ ܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ.
TRL: Hadkha dpeeshta-ylaha dee'ta lklayhy anee deena bqaṣra o bklayhy doekane khene dpeesha ywin seera bsheshlate boet msheekha.
ENG: so that my bonds became manifest in Christ throughout the whole praetorian guard, and to all the rest;

ASY: ܘܣܵܗܡܵܐ ܙܵܘܕܵܐ ܕܐܲܚܘܿܢܘܵܬܹ̈ܐ ܒܡܵܪܲܢ ܫܩܝܼܠ ܠܗܘܿܢ ܓ̰ܘܼܪܐܲܬ ܒܫܹܫܠܵܬܝܼ̈ ܘܩܘܼܫܕܸܪܗܘܿܢ ܠܗܲܡܙܘܼܡܹܐ ܗܹܡܸܙܡܵܢ ܕܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ ܕܠܵܐ ܙܕܘܼܥܬܵܐ.
TRL: O sahma zawda dakhoonwate bmaran shqeel-lhoon joerat bsheshlatee o qoeshdirhoon lhamzoeme hemizman dalaha dla zdoe'ta.
ENG: and that most of the brethren in the Lord, being confident through my bonds, are more abundantly bold to speak the word of God without fear.

ASY: ܫܲܪܝܼܪܘܼܬܵܐ ܝܠܵܗ̇ ܕܚܲܕ݇ܟܡܵܐ ܟܹܐ ܡܲܟܪܸܙܝܼ ܒܘܼܬ ܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ ܡ̣ܢ ܒܲܚܸܠܵܢܘܼܬܵܐ ܘܡܲܩܲܪܵܨܘܼܬܵܐ، ܘܚܲܕ݇ܟܡܵܐ ܒܨܸܒ݂ܝܵܢܵܐ ܛܵܒ݂ܵܐ ܡܲܟܪܘܼܙܹܐ ܝܢܵܐ ܒܘܼܬ ܕܝܼܹܗ.
TRL: Shareeroeta-ylaha dkhakma ke makrizee boet msheekha min bakhilanoeta o maqaraṣoeta, o khakma bṣiwyana ṭawa makroeze yna boet dee-eh.
ENG: Some indeed preach Christ even of envy and strife; and some also of good will:

ASY: ܐܲܢܹܐ ܡܲܟܪܘܼܙܹܐ ܝܢܵܐ ܡ̣ܢ ܚܘܼܒܵܐ، ܟܲܕ ܒܝܼܕܵܥܵܐ ܝܢܵܐ ܕܦܝܼܫܵܐ ܝܘܸܢ ܡܘܼܬܒ݂ܵܐ ܠܐܲܟ݂ܵܐ ܠܝܲܗ݇ܒܲܠܬܵܐ ܕܓ̰ܘܼܘܵܒ ܒܘܼܬ ܐܹܘܲܢܓܲܠܝܼܘܿܢ،
TRL: Ane makroeze yna min khoeba, kad beeda'a yna dpeesha ywin moetwa lakha lyabalta djoewab boet ewangaleeoon,
ENG: the one do it of love, knowing that I am set for the defence of the gospel:

ASY: ܐܵܢܝܼ ܐ݇ܚܹܪ̈݇ܢܹܐ ܒܡܲܩܲܪܵܨܘܼܬܵܐ ܡܲܟܪܘܼܙܹܐ ܝܢܵܐ ܒܘܼܬ ܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ، ܠܵܐ ܒܕܸܟ݂ܝܘܼܬܵܐ، ܟܲܕ ܒܸܚܫܵܒ݂ܵܐ ܒܸܬ ܡܲܙܝܸܕܝܼ ܐܘܼܠܨܵܢܹ̈ܐ ܠܐܸܣܘܼܪ̈ܝܼ.
TRL: Anee khene bmaqaraṣoeta makroeze yna boet msheekha, la bdikhyoeta, kad bikhshawa bit mazyidee oelṣane lisoeree.
ENG: but the other proclaim Christ of faction, not sincerely, thinking to raise up affliction for me in my bonds.

ASY: ܒܲܣ ܡܘܿܕܝܼ؟ ܟܠ ܕܵܐܟ݂ܝܼ ܕܗܵܘܝܵܐ، ܒܟܠ ܐܘܼܪܚܵܐ ܕܗܵܘܝܵܐ، ܐܸܢ ܒܡܲܚܙܵܝܬܵܐ ܕܓܵܢܵܐ، ܘܐܸܢ ܒܬܪܘܼܨܘܼܬܵܐ، ܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ ܦܝܵܫܵܐ ܝܠܹܗ ܡܘܼܟܪܸܙܵܐ. ܒܘܼܬ ܐܵܗܵܐ ܒܸܚܕܵܝܵܐ ܝܘܸܢ، ܘܒܘܼܫ ܙܵܘܕܵܐ ܒܸܬ ܚܵܕܹܝܢ،
TRL: Bas moodee? Kl dakhee dhawya, bkl oerkha dhawya, in bmakhzayta dgana, o in btroeṣoeta, msheekha pyasha-yleh moekriza. Boet aha bikhdaya ywin, o boesh zawda bit khadeyn,
ENG: What then? only that in every way, whether in pretence or in truth, Christ is proclaimed; and therein I rejoice, yea, and will rejoice.

ASY: ܣܵܒܵܒ ܒܝܼܕܵܥܵܐ ܝܘܸܢ ܕܡܸܢܕܝܼ ܕܩܘܼܘܸܡ ܠܹܗ ܐܸܠܝܼ ܒܸܬ ܗܵܘܹܐ ܠܦܘܼܪܩܵܢܝܼ ܒܦܲܪ̈ܦܲܠܝܵܬܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܘܒܗܵܝܲܪܬܵܐ ܕܦܝܼܫܬܵܐ ܝܠܵܗ̇ ܝܘܼܗ݇ܒܸܠܬܵܐ ܒܪܘܼܚܵܐ ܕܝܼܫܘܿܥ ܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ.
TRL: Sabab beeda'a ywin dmindee dqoewim-leh ilee bit hawe lpoerqanee bparpalyatawkhoon o bhayarta dpeeshta-ylaha yoebilta broekha deeshoo' msheekha.
ENG: For I know that this shall turn to my salvation, through your supplication and the supply of the Spirit of Jesus Christ,

ASY: ܐܵܢܵܐ ܒܸܣܦܵܪܵܐ ܝܘܸܢ ܩܸܘܝܵܐ ܘܐܝܼܬ ܠܝܼ ܗܹܒ݂ܝܼ ܕܠܹܐ ܢܵܟ݂ܦܹܢ ܒܗܸܟ̃ ܡܸܢܕܝܼ، ܐܸܠܵܐ ܒܟܠܵܗ̇ ܓ̰ܘܼܪܐܲܬ، ܐܲܝܟ݂ ܒܟܠ ܙܲܒ݂ܢܵܐ ܘܐܘܼܦ ܐܵܕܝܼܵܐ، ܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ ܒܸܬ ܦܵܐܹܫ ܚܩܝܼܪܵܐ ܓܵܘ ܦܲܓ݂ܪܝܼ، ܐܸܢ ܒܚܲܝܹ̈ܐ، ܐܸܢ ܒܡܵܘܬܵܐ.
TRL: Ana bispara ywin qiwya o eet-lee hewee dle nakhpen bhich mindee, ila bklaha joerat, aykh bkl zawna o oep adeea, msheekha bit paesh khqeera gaw paghree, in bkhaye, in bmawta.
ENG: according to my earnest expectation and hope, that in nothing shall I be put to shame, but that with all boldness, as always, so now also Christ shall be magnified in my body, whether by life, or by death.

ASY: ܣܵܒܵܒ ܐܸܠܝܼ ܠܸܚܵܝܵܐ ܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ ܝܠܹܗ، ܘܠܸܡܝܵܬܵܐ ܝܘܼܬܪܵܢܵܐ ܝܠܹܗ.
TRL: Sabab ilee likhaya msheekha-yleh, o limyata yoetrana-yleh.
ENG: For to me to live is Christ, and to die is gain.

ASY: ܐܸܢ ܚܵܝܹܝܢ ܒܦܲܓ݂ܪܵܐ، ܒܸܬ ܗܵܘܹܐ ܠܝܼ ܛܥܘܼܢܬܵܐ ܒܦܘܼܠܚܵܢܝܼ. ܐܝܼܢܵܐ ܡܘܿܕܝܼ ܓܲܒܹܝܢ، ܠܹܐ ܝܘܸܢ ܒܝܼܕܵܥܵܐ.
TRL: In khayeyn bpaghra, bit hawe-lee ṭ'oenta bpoelkhanee. Eena moodee gabeyn, le ywin beeda'a.
ENG: But if to live in the flesh,—if this is the fruit of my work, then what I shall choose I wot not.

ASY: ܦܝܼܫܵܐ ܝܘܸܢ ܡܘܼܠܝܸܨܵܐ ܡ̣ܢ ܬܸܪܘܲܝܗܝ ܓܹܒܵܢܹ̈ܐ. ܫܲܗܘܘܼܬܹܐ ܝܘܸܢ ܠܫܲܢܘܼܝܹܐ ܘܠܸܗܘܵܝܵܐ ܥܲܡ ܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ. ܐܵܗܵܐ ܒܘܼܫ ܪܵܒܵܐ ܨܦܵܝܝܼ ܝܠܵܗ̇.
TRL: Peesha ywin moelyiṣa min tirwayhy gebane. Shahwoete ywin lshanoeye o lihwaya 'am msheekha. Aha boesh raba ṣpayee-ylaha.
ENG: But I am in a strait betwixt the two, having the desire to depart and be with Christ; for it is very far better:

ASY: ܐܝܼܢܵܐ ܒܘܼܫ ܐܵܢܲܢܩܵܝܬܵܐ ܝܠܵܗ̇ ܐܸܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܕܦܵܝܫܹܢ ܒܦܲܓ݂ܪܵܐ.
TRL: Eena boesh ananqayta-ylaha ilawkhoon dpayshen bpaghra.
ENG: yet to abide in the flesh is more needful for your sake.

ASY: ܒܐܵܗܵܐ ܚܵܬܸܪܓ̰ܲܡܥ ܝܼܘܸܢ، ܘܗܲܕܟ݂ܵܐ ܒܝܼܕܵܥܵܐ ܝܘܸܢ ܕܒܸܬ ܦܵܝܫܹܢ، ܘܒܸܬ ܗܵܘܹܝܢ ܥܲܡ ܟܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܩܵܐ ܡܲܩܘܵܝܬܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܘܩܵܐ ܚܲܕܘܼܬܵܐ ܒܗܲܝܡܵܢܘܼܬܵܐ،
TRL: Baha khatirjam' eewin, o hadkha beeda'a ywin dbit payshen, o bit haweyn 'am klawkhoon qa maqwaytawkhoon o qa khadoeta bhaymanoeta,
ENG: And having this confidence, I know that I shall abide, yea, and abide with you all, for your progress and joy in the faith;

ASY: ܩܵܐ ܕܙܵܝܕܵܐ ܚܲܕܘܼܬܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܒܝܼܝܼ ܒܝܼܫܘܿܥ ܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ ܐܝܼܡܲܢ ܕܗܵܘܹܝܢ ܥܲܡܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܚܕܵܐ ܓܵܗܵܐ ܐ݇ܚܹܪ݇ܬܵܐ.
TRL: Qa dzayda khadoetawkhoon beeee beeshoo' msheekha eeman dhaweyn 'amawkhoon khda gaha kheta.
ENG: that your glorying may abound in Christ Jesus in me through my presence with you again.

ASY: ܐܲܚܟ̰ܝܼ ܚܝܹܝܡܘܼܢ ܐܲܝܟ݂ ܕܚܵܫܚܵܐ ܠܐܹܘܲܢܓܲܠܝܼܘܿܢ ܕܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ، ܕܐܸܢ ܐܵܬܹܝܢ ܘܚܵܙܹܝܢܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ، ܝܲܢ ܫܵܡܥܹܢ ܒܘܼܬ ܕܝܼܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܡ̣ܢ ܪܸܚܩܵܐ، ܗܵܘܹܝܬܘܿܢ ܟܸܠܝܹܐ ܩܸܘܝܵܐ ܒܚܕܵܐ ܪܘܼܚܵܐ، ܒܚܕܵܐ ܓܵܢܵܐ ܒܸܥܒ݂ܵܕܵܐ ܐܵܓ݂ܘܿܢܵܐ ܡܥܘܼܕܵܠܹ̈ܐ ܒܗܲܝܡܵܢܘܼܬܵܐ ܕܐܹܘܲܢܓܲܠܝܼܘܿܢ،
TRL: Akhchee khyeymoen aykh dkhashkha lewangaleeoon dmsheekha, din ateyn o khazeynawkhoon, yan sham'en boet deeawkhoon min rikhqa, haweytoon kilye qiwya bkhda roekha, bkhda gana bi'wada aghoona m'oedale bhaymanoeta dewangaleeoon,
ENG: Only let your manner of life be worthy of the gospel of Christ: that, whether I come and see you or be absent, I may hear of your state, that ye stand fast in one spirit, with one soul striving for the faith of the gospel;

ASY: ܘܠܵܐ ܒܸܙܕܵܥܵܐ ܒܘܼܬ ܗܸܟ̃ ܡܸܢܕܝܼ ܡ̣ܢ ܐܵܢܝܼ ܕܩܵܝܡܝܼ ܕܲܠܩܘܼܒ݂ܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ. ܐܵܗܵܐ ܢܝܼܫܲܢܩܵܐ ܝܠܹܗ ܐܸܠܲܝܗܝ ܕܒܸܬ ܛܵܠܩܝܼ، ܐܝܼܢܵܐ ܕܐܲܚܬܘܿܢ ܒܸܬ ܦܵܪܩܝܼܬܘܿܢ، ܘܐܵܗܵܐ ܡ̣ܢ ܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ ܝܠܵܗ̇.
TRL: O la bizda'a boet hich mindee min anee dqaymee dalqoewlawkhoon. Aha neeshanqa-yleh ilayhy dbit ṭalqee, eena dakhtoon bit parqeetoon, o aha min Alaha-ylaha.
ENG: and in nothing affrighted by the adversaries: which is for them an evident token of perdition, but of your salvation, and that from God;

ASY: ܣܵܒܵܒ ܦܝܼܫܬܵܐ ܝܠܵܗ̇ ܝܘܼܗ݇ܒܸܠܬܵܐ ܐܸܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܒܘܼܬ ܚܵܬܸܪ ܕܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ ܠܵܐ ܐܲܚܟ̰ܝܼ ܕܗܲܡܸܢܝܼܬܘܿܢ ܒܝܼܹܗ، ܐܸܠܵܐ ܐܘܼܦ ܕܓ̰ܲܢܓ̰ܸܪܝܼܬܘܿܢ ܒܘܼܬ ܕܝܼܹܗ.
TRL: Sabab peeshta-ylaha yoebilta ilawkhoon boet khatir dmsheekha la akhchee dhamineetoon bee-eh, ila oep djanjireetoon boet dee-eh.
ENG: because to you it hath been granted in the behalf of Christ, not only to believe on him, but also to suffer in his behalf:

ASY: ܟܲܕ ܐܝܼܬ ܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܗܲܪ ܗ̇ܘ ܐܵܓ݂ܘܿܢܵܐ ܕܚܙܹܐ ܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܒܝܼܝܼ، ܘܐܵܕܝܼܵܐ ܒܸܫܡܵܥܵܐ ܝܬܘܿܢ ܕܗܹܫ ܒܝܼܝܼ ܝܠܹܗ.
TRL: Kad eet lawkhoon har haw aghoona dkhze lawkhoon beeee, o adeea bishma'a ytoon dhesh beeee-yleh.
ENG: having the same conflict which ye saw in me, and now hear to be in me.

ASY: ܒܲܣ ܐܸܢ ܐܝܼܬ ܒܘܼܝܵܐܵܐ ܒܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ، ܘܐܸܢ ܝܲܗ݇ܒܲܠܬܵܐ ܕܠܸܒܵܐ ܒܚܘܼܒܵܐ، ܘܐܸܢ ܫܲܪܝܼܟܘܼܬܵܐ ܕܪܘܼܚܵܐ، ܘܐܸܢ ܪܲܚܪܲܚܬܵܐ ܘܪ̈ܲܚܡܹܐ،
TRL: Bas in eet boeyaa bmsheekha, o in yabalta dliba bkhoeba, o in shareekoeta droekha, o in rakhrakhta o rakhme,
ENG: If there is therefore any comfort in Christ, if any consolation of love, if any fellowship of the Spirit, if any tender mercies and compassions,

ASY: ܬܲܡܸܡܘܼܢ ܚܲܕܘܼܬܝܼ ܕܗܵܘܹܝܬܘܿܢ ܒܚܲܕ ܪܸܥܝܵܢܵܐ، ܘܒܚܲܕ ܚܘܼܒܵܐ، ܘܒܚܕܵܐ ܓܵܢܵܐ ܘܒܚܲܕ ܚܘܼܫܵܒ݂ܵܐ.
TRL: Tamimoen khadoetee dhaweytoon bkhad ri'yana, o bkhad khoeba, o bkhda gana o bkhad khoeshawa.
ENG: fulfill ye my joy, that ye be of the same mind, having the same love, being of one accord, of one mind;

ASY: ܠܵܐ ܥܵܒ݂ܕܝܼܬܘܿܢ ܗܸܟ̃ ܡܸܢܕܝܼ ܒܡܲܩܲܪܵܨܘܼܬܵܐ ܝܲܢ ܒܚܸܩܪܵܐ ܒܲܛܝܼܠܵܐ، ܐܸܠܵܐ ܒܡܲܟܝܼܟ݂ܘܼܬܵܐ ܗܵܘܹܝܬܘܿܢ ܒܸܚܫܵܒ݂ܵܐ ܐ݇ܚܹܪ̈݇ܢܹܐ ܙܵܘܕܵܐ ܡ̣ܢ ܓܵܢܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ.
TRL: La 'awdeetoon hich mindee bmaqaraṣoeta yan bkhiqra baṭeela, ila bmakeekhoeta haweytoon bikhshawa khene zawda min ganawkhoon.
ENG: doing nothing through faction or through vainglory, but in lowliness of mind each counting other better than himself;

ASY: ܠܵܐ ܟܠ ܐ݇ܢܵܫܵܐ ܡܸܢܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܓܲܫܸܩ ܠܝܘܼܬܪܵܢܵܐ ܕܓܵܢܹܗ ܐܲܚܟ̰ܝܼ، ܐܸܠܵܐ ܐܘܼܦ ܠܝܘܼܬܪܵܢܵܐ ܕܐ݇ܚܹܪ̈݇ܢܹܐ.
TRL: La kl nasha minawkhoon gashiq lyoetrana dganeh akhchee, ila oep lyoetrana dkhene.
ENG: not looking each of you to his own things, but each of you also to the things of others.

ASY: ܚܵܫܒ݂ܝܼܬܘܿܢ ܗܲܪ ܗ̇ܘ ܡܸܢܕܝܼ ܕܚܫܝܼܒ݂ ܠܹܗ ܐܘܼܦ ܝܼܫܘܿܥ ܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ،
TRL: Khashweetoon har haw mindee dkhsheew-leh oep eeshoo' msheekha,
ENG: Have this mind in you, which was also in Christ Jesus:

ASY: ܗ̇ܘ ܕܟܲܕ ܝܼܗ݇ܘܵܐ ܒܟܝܵܢܹܗ ܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ، ܠܵܐ ܚܫܝܼܒ݂ ܠܹܗ ܕܫܵܘܝܘܼܬܵܐ ܥܲܡ ܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ ܚܵܛܹܦ ܗ݇ܘܵܐ ܠܵܗ̇.
TRL: Haw dkad eewa bkyaneh Alaha, la khsheew-leh dshawyoeta 'am Alaha khaṭep wa-laha.
ENG: who, being in the form of God, counted it not a prize to be on an equality with God,

ASY: ܐܸܠܵܐ ܣܘܼܦܩܵܐ ܠܹܗ ܓܵܢܹܗ ܘܫܩܝܼܠ ܠܹܗ ܕܡܘܼܬܵܐ ܕܪܹܓܵܐ، ܘܗܘܹܐ ܠܹܗ ܒܨܘܼܪܬܵܐ ܕܒܢܲܝ̈ܢܵܫܵܐ.
TRL: Ila soepqa-leh ganeh o shqeel-leh dmoeta drega, o hwe-leh bṣoerta dbnaynasha.
ENG: but emptied himself, taking the form of a servant, being made in the likeness of men;

ASY: ܘܟܲܕ ܫܩܝܼܠ ܠܹܗ ܐܸܣܟܝܼܡܵܐ ܕܒܲܪܢܵܫܵܐ، ܘܡܘܼܟܸܦܵܐ ܠܹܗ ܓܵܢܹܗ ܘܫܠܝܼܡ ܠܹܗ ܗܲܠ ܡܵܘܬܵܐ، ܡܵܘܬܵܐ ܕܙܩܝܼܦܵܐ.
TRL: O kad shqeel-leh iskeema dbarnasha, o moekipa-leh ganeh o shleem-leh hal mawta, mawta dzqeepa.
ENG: and being found in fashion as a man, he humbled himself, becoming obedient even unto death, yea, the death of the cross.

ASY: ܒܘܼܬ ܐܵܗܵܐ ܐܘܼܦ ܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ ܒܘܼܫ ܙܵܘܕܵܐ ܡܘܼܪܸܡ ܠܹܗ ܐܸܠܹܗ، ܘܝܘܼܗ݇ܒܸܠ ܠܹܗ ܐܸܠܹܗ ܫܸܡܵܐ ܥܸܠܸܠ ܡ̣ܢ ܟܠ ܫܸܡܵܐ،
TRL: Boet aha oep Alaha boesh zawda moerim-leh ileh, o yoebil-leh ileh shima 'ilil min kl shima,
ENG: Wherefore also God highly exalted him, and gave unto him the name which is above every name;

ASY: ܕܒܫܸܡܵܐ ܕܝܼܫܘܿܥ ܟܠ ܒܘܼܪܟܵܐ ܟܵܝܦܵܐ، ܒܫܡܲܝܵܐ ܘܒܐܲܪܥܵܐ ܘܕܠܠܬܸܚܬ ܡ̣ܢ ܐܲܪܥܵܐ،
TRL: Dbshima deeshoo' kl boerka kaypa, bshmaya o bar'a o dlltikht min ar'a,
ENG: that in the name of Jesus every knee should bow, of things in heaven and things on earth and things under the earth,

ASY: ܘܟܠ ܠܸܫܵܢܵܐ ܡܵܘܕܹܐ ܕܝܼܫܘܿܥ ܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ ܡܵܪܝܵܐ ܝܠܹܗ، ܠܫܘܼܒ݂ܚܵܐ ܕܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ ܒܵܒܵܐ.
TRL: O kl lishana mawde deeshoo' msheekha Marya-yleh, lshoewkha dalaha baba.
ENG: and that every tongue should confess that Jesus Christ is Lord, to the glory of God the Father.

ASY: ܒܲܣ ܗܲܕܟ݂ܵܐ ܡܘܼܚܸܒܝܼ̈، ܕܵܐܟ݂ܝܼ ܕܒܟܠ ܙܲܒ݂ܢܵܐ ܡܘܼܨܝܸܬ ܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ، ܠܵܐ ܐܲܚܟ̰ܝܼ ܐܝܼܡܲܢ ܕܝܼܘܸܢ ܗ݇ܘܵܐ ܠܟܸܣ ܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ، ܐܸܠܵܐ ܒܘܼܫ ܙܵܘܕܵܐ ܐܵܕܝܼܵܐ ܕܪܸܚܩܵܐ ܝܘܸܢ ܡܸܢܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ، ܡܲܟܡܸܠܘܼܢ ܦܘܼܪܩܵܢܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܒܙܕܘܼܥܬܵܐ ܘܒܪܲܬܪܲܬܬܵܐ،
TRL: Bas hadkha moekhibee, dakhee dbkl zawna moeṣyit lawkhoon, la akhchee eeman deewin wa lkis lawkhoon, ila boesh zawda adeea drikhqa ywin minawkhoon, makmiloen poerqanawkhoon bzdoe'ta o bratratta,
ENG: So then, my beloved, even as ye have always obeyed, not as in my presence only, but now much more in my absence, work out your own salvation with fear and trembling;

ASY: ܣܵܒܵܒ ܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ ܝܠܹܗ ܕܟܹܐ ܦܵܠܹܚ ܒܝܼܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܕܡܲܥܒܸܕ ܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܕܒܵܥܹܝܬܘܿܢ ܘܥܵܒ݂ܕܝܼܬܘܿܢ ܨܸܒ݂ܝܵܢܹܗ ܛܵܒ݂ܵܐ.
TRL: Sabab Alaha-yleh dke palekh beeawkhoon dma'bid lawkhoon dba'eytoon o 'awdeetoon ṣiwyaneh ṭawa.
ENG: for it is God which worketh in you both to will and to work, for his good pleasure.

ASY: ܥܒ݂ܘܿܕܘܼܢ ܟܠ ܡܸܢܕܝܼ ܕܠܵܐ ܛܲܪܛܲܡܬܵܐ ܘܕܠܵܐ ܕܘܼܒܵܪܘܼܬܵܐ،
TRL: 'woodoen kl mindee dla ṭarṭamta o dla doebaroeta,
ENG: Do all things without murmurings and disputings;

ASY: ܕܗܵܘܹܝܬܘܿܢ ܕܠܵܐ ܡܘܼܡܵܐ ܘܕܸܟ݂ܝܹ̈ܐ، ܒܢܘܿܢܹ̈ܐ ܕܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ ܕܠܵܐ ܠܵܘܡܵܐ ܓܵܘ ܚܲܕ ܕܵܘܪܵܐ ܦܟ̰ܝܼܠܵܐ ܘܚܪܝܼܒ݂ܵܐ، ܘܕܦܵܝܫܝܼܬܘܿܢ ܚܸܙܝܹܐ ܓܵܘܹܗ ܐܲܝܟ݂ ܟܵܘܟ݂ܒܹ̈ܐ ܒܲܗܪܘܼܢܹܐ ܓܵܘ ܥܵܠܡܵܐ،
TRL: Dhaweytoon dla moema o dikhye, bnoone dalaha dla lawma gaw khad dawra pcheela o khreewa, o dpaysheetoon khizye gaweh aykh kawkhbe bahroene gaw 'alma,
ENG: that ye may be blameless and harmless, children of God without blemish in the midst of a crooked and perverse generation, among whom ye are seen as lights in the world,

ASY: ܕܒ݂ܝܼܩܹܐ ܒܗܹܡܸܙܡܵܢ ܕܚܲܝܹ̈ܐ، ܕܥܵܒ݂ܕܹܢ ܫܘܼܒ݂ܗܵܪܵܐ ܒܝܵܘܡܵܐ ܕܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ ܕܠܵܐ ܣܪܝܼܩܵܐܝܼܬ ܪܚܝܼܛ ܠܝܼ ܘܠܵܐ ܣܪܝܼܩܵܐܝܼܬ ܥܒ݂ܝܼܕ ܠܝܼ ܥܲܡܠܵܐ.
TRL: Dweeqe bhemizman dkhaye, d'awden shoewhara byawma dmsheekha dla sreeqaeet rkheeṭ-lee o la sreeqaeet 'weed-lee 'amla.
ENG: holding forth the word of life; that I may have whereof to glory in the day of Christ, that I did not run in vain neither labour in vain.

ASY: ܐܝܼܢܵܐ ܐܘܼܦ ܐܸܢ ܕܦܵܝܫܹܢ ܨܘܼܢܨܸܠܵܐ ܥܲܠ ܕܸܒ݂ܚܵܐ ܘܚܸܠܡܲܬ ܕܗܲܝܡܵܢܘܼܬܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ، ܒܸܚܕܵܝܵܐ ܝܘܸܢ ܘܒܸܦܨܵܚܵܐ ܥܲܡ ܟܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ.
TRL: Eena oep in dpayshen ṣoenṣila 'al diwkha o khilmat dhaymanoetawkhoon, bikhdaya ywin o bipṣakha 'am klawkhoon.
ENG: Yea, and if I am offered upon the sacrifice and service of your faith, I joy, and rejoice with you all:

ASY: ܘܗܲܪ ܗܲܕܟ݂ܵܐ ܐܘܼܦ ܐܲܚܬܘܿܢ ܚܕܹܝܡܘܼܢ ܘܦܨܘܿܚܘܼܢ ܥܲܡܝܼ.
TRL: O har hadkha oep akhtoon khdeymoen o pṣookhoen 'amee.
ENG: and in the same manner do ye also joy, and rejoice with me.

ASY: ܒܗܹܒ݂ܝܼ ܝܘܸܢ ܒܡܵܪܲܢ ܝܼܫܘܿܥ ܕܒܸܬ ܫܲܕܪܸܢ ܠܟܸܣ ܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܛܝܼܡܵܬܹܐܘܿܣ ܒܓ̰ܲܠܕܘܼܬܵܐ، ܕܐܘܼܦ ܐܵܢܵܐ ܫܵܩܠܹܢ ܠܸܒܵܐ ܐܝܼܡܲܢ ܕܫܵܡܥܹܢ ܒܘܼܬ ܕܝܼܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ.
TRL: Bhewee ywin bmaran eeshoo' dbit shadrin lkis lawkhoon ṭeemateoos bjaldoeta, doep ana shaqlen liba eeman dsham'en boet deeawkhoon.
ENG: But I hope in the Lord Jesus to send Timothy shortly unto you, that I also may be of good comfort, when I know your state.

ASY: ܣܵܒܵܒ ܠܲܝܬ ܠܝܼ ܚܲܕ ܐ݇ܚܹܪ݇ܢܵܐ ܡܐܲܝܟ݂ ܕܝܼܹܗ، ܕܫܲܪܝܼܪܵܐܝܼܬ ܐܝܼܬ ܠܹܗ ܒܘܼܣܵܡܵܐ ܒܫܘܼܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ،
TRL: Sabab layt-lee khad khena maykh dee-eh, dshareeraeet eet-leh boesama bshoelawkhoon,
ENG: For I have no man likeminded, who will care truly for your state.

ASY: ܣܵܒܵܒ ܟܠܲܝܗܝ ܒܸܛܥܵܝܵܐ ܝܢܵܐ ܒܵܬ݇ܪ ܝܘܼܬܪܵܢܵܐ ܕܓܵܢܲܝܗܝ ܘܠܵܐ ܕܝܼܫܘܿܥ ܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ.
TRL: Sabab klayhy biṭ'aya yna bar yoetrana dganayhy o la deeshoo' msheekha.
ENG: For they all seek their own, not the things of Jesus Christ.

ASY: ܐܝܼܢܵܐ ܟܹܐ ܝܵܕܥܝܼܬܘܿܢ ܕܛܝܼܡܵܬܹܐܘܿܣ ܡܘܼܚܙܝܼܘܼܗ̇ ܝܠܹܗ ܓܵܢܹܗ ܚܫܝܼܚܵܐ، ܣܵܒܵܒ ܐܲܝܟ݂ ܚܲܕ ܒܪܘܿܢܵܐ ܕܒܵܒܘܼܗܝ ܥܒ݂ܝܼܕܵܐ ܝܠܹܗ ܚܸܠܡܲܬ ܥܲܡܝܼ ܒܐܹܘܲܢܓܲܠܝܼܘܿܢ.
TRL: Eena ke yad'eetoon dṭeemateoos moekhzeeoeha-yleh ganeh khsheekha, sabab aykh khad broona dbaboehy 'weeda-yleh khilmat 'amee bewangaleeoon.
ENG: But ye know the proof of him, that, as a child serveth a father, so he served with me in furtherance of the gospel.

ASY: ܒܘܼܬ ܐܵܗܵܐ ܒܗܹܒ݂ܝܼ ܝܘܸܢ ܕܫܲܕܪܸܢܹܗ ܠܟܸܣ ܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܒܓ̰ܲܠܕܘܼܬܵܐ، ܐܝܼܡܲܢ ܕܚܵܙܹܝܢ ܕܵܐܟ݂ܝܼ ܒܸܬ ܗܵܘܝܼ ܫܘܼܠܵܢܝܼ̈.
TRL: Boet aha bhewee ywin dshadrineh lkis lawkhoon bjaldoeta, eeman dkhazeyn dakhee bit hawee shoelanee.
ENG: Him therefore I hope to send forthwith, so soon as I shall see how it will go with me:

ASY: ܘܒܗܹܒ݂ܝܼ ܝܘܸܢ ܒܡܵܪܝܵܐ ܕܐܘܼܦ ܐܵܢܵܐ ܒܓܵܢܝܼ ܒܸܬ ܐܵܬܹܝܢ ܒܓ̰ܲܠܕܘܼܬܵܐ.
TRL: O bhewee ywin bmarya doep ana bganee bit ateyn bjaldoeta.
ENG: but I trust in the Lord that I myself also shall come shortly.

ASY: ܐܝܼܢܵܐ ܚܫܝܼܒ݂ ܠܝܼ ܕܐܵܢܲܢܩܵܝܬܵܐ ܝܗ݇ܘܵܐ ܕܫܲܕܪܸܢ ܠܟܸܣ ܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܐܵܦܵܦܪܘܿܕܝܼܛܘܿܣ، ܐܲܚܘܿܢܝܼ ܘܫܲܪܝܼܟܵܐ ܒܦܘܼܠܚܵܢܝܼ ܘܕܲܚܫܵܐ ܥܲܡܝܼ، ܘܫܠܝܼܚܵܐ ܘܦܲܠܵܚܵܐ ܕܝܼܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ، ܕܫܘܼܕܸܪܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܐܸܠܝܼ ܕܬܲܓܒܸܪ ܠܣܢܝܼܩܘܼܬܝܼ.
TRL: Eena khsheew-lee dananqayta ywa dshadrin lkis lawkhoon apaproodeeṭoos, akhoonee o shareeka bpoelkhanee o dakhsha 'amee, o shleekha o palakha deeawkhoon, dshoedirawkhoon ilee dtagbir lsneeqoetee.
ENG: But I counted it necessary to send to you Epaphroditus, my brother and fellow-worker and fellow-soldier, and your messenger and minister to my need;

ASY: ܫܲܕܘܼܪܹܐ ܝܘܸܢ ܐܸܠܹܗ ܣܵܒܵܒ ܫܲܗܘܘܼܬܹܐ ܝܠܹܗ ܠܸܚܙܵܝܵܐ ܠܟܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ، ܘܪܵܒܵܐ ܦܫܝܼܡܵܐ ܝܗ݇ܘܵܐ ܐܝܼܡܲܢ ܕܝ݇ܕܝܼܥ ܠܹܗ ܕܫܡܝܼܥ ܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܕܡܪܝܼܥܵܐ ܝܗ݇ܘܵܐ.
TRL: Shadoere ywin ileh sabab shahwoete-yleh likhzaya lklawkhoon, o raba psheema ywa eeman ddee' leh dshmee' lawkhoon dmree'a ywa.
ENG: since he longed after you all, and was sore troubled, because ye had heard that he was sick:

ASY: ܡܸܓ̰ܸܕ ܡܪܝܼܥܵܐ ܝܗ݇ܘܵܐ ܗܲܠ ܡܵܘܬܵܐ، ܐܝܼܢܵܐ ܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ ܪܘܼܚܸܡ ܠܹܗ ܥܲܠܘܼܗܝ، ܘܠܵܐ ܐܲܚܟ̰ܝܼ ܥܲܠܘܼܗܝ ܐܝܼܢܵܐ ܐܘܼܦ ܥܲܠܝܼ، ܕܠܵܐ ܗܵܘܹܐ ܠܝܼ ܚܲܫܵܐ ܥܲܠ ܚܲܫܵܐ.
TRL: Mijid mree'a ywa hal mawta, eena Alaha roekhim-leh 'aloehy, o la akhchee 'aloehy eena oep 'alee, dla hawe-lee khasha 'al khasha.
ENG: for indeed he was sick nigh unto death: but God had mercy on him; and not on him only, but on me also, that I might not have sorrow upon sorrow.

ASY: ܒܘܼܬ ܐܵܗܵܐ ܒܚܘܼܦܵܛܵܐ ܫܘܼܕܸܪܝܼ ܐܸܠܹܗ ܠܟܸܣ ܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܕܚܵܙܹܝܬܘܿܢ ܠܹܗ ܡܸܢܕܪܸܫ ܘܚܵܕܹܝܬܘܿܢ، ܘܕܚܲܫܝܼ ܗܵܘܹܐ ܒܵܨܘܿܪܵܐ.
TRL: Boet aha bkhoepaṭa shoediree ileh lkis lawkhoon dkhazeytoon-leh mindrish o khadeytoon, o dkhashee hawe baṣoora.
ENG: I have sent him therefore the more diligently, that, when ye see him again, ye may rejoice, and that I may be the less sorrowful.

ASY: ܒܲܣ ܩܲܒܠܘܼܢ ܠܹܗ ܒܡܵܪܲܢ ܒܟܠ ܚܲܕܘܼܬܵܐ، ܘܡܝܲܩܪܘܼܢ ܠܐ݇ܢܵܫܹ̈ܐ ܡܐܲܝܟ݂ ܕܝܼܹܗ،
TRL: Bas qabloen-leh bmaran bkl khadoeta, o myaqroen lnashe maykh dee-eh,
ENG: Receive him therefore in the Lord with all joy; and hold such in honour:

ASY: ܣܵܒܵܒ ܩܘܼܪܒܸܢܵܐ ܝܗ݇ܘܵܐ ܠܡܵܘܬܵܐ ܒܘܼܬ ܚܵܬܸܪ ܕܦܘܼܠܚܵܢܵܐ ܕܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ، ܡܲܬܘܼܒܹܐ ܓܵܢܹܗ ܓܵܘ ܩܹܘܲܢܕܹܢܘܿܣ ܕܬܲܡܸܡ ܗ݇ܘܵܐ ܒܵܨܘܿܪܘܼܬܵܐ ܕܚܸܠܡܲܬܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܠܟܸܣ ܠܝܼ.
TRL: Sabab qoerbina ywa lmawta boet khatir dpoelkhana dmsheekha, matoebe ganeh gaw qewandenoos dtamim wa baṣooroeta dkhilmatawkhoon lkis-lee.
ENG: because for the work of Christ he came nigh unto death, hazarding his life to supply that which was lacking in your service toward me.

ASY: ܒܚܲܪܬܵܐ ܐܲܚܘܿܢܘܵܬܝܼ̈، ܚܕܹܝܡܘܼܢ ܒܡܵܪܲܢ. ܠܹܐ ܣܵܩܕܹܢ ܕܟܵܬܒܹܢ ܗܲܪ ܐܲܢܹܐ ܐܸܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ، ܣܵܒܵܒ ܡܵܪܹܐ ܝܘܼܬܪܵܢܵܐ ܝܢܵܐ ܐܸܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ.
TRL: Bkharta akhoonwatee, khdeymoen bmaran. Le saqden dkatben har ane ilawkhoon, sabab mare yoetrana yna ilawkhoon.
ENG: Finally, my brethren, rejoice in the Lord. To write the same things to you, to me indeed is not irksome, but for you it is safe.

ASY: ܗܘܹܝܡܘܼܢ ܗܸܫܝܵܪ ܡ̣ܢ ܟܲܠܒܹ̈ܐ، ܗܘܹܝܡܘܼܢ ܗܸܫܝܵܪ ܡ̣ܢ ܦܲܠܵܚܹ̈ܐ ܒܝܼܫܹ̈ܐ، ܗܘܹܝܡܘܼܢ ܗܸܫܝܵܪ ܡ̣ܢ ܩܛܵܥܬܵܐ ܕܒܸܣܪܵܐ.
TRL: Hweymoen hishyar min kalbe, hweymoen hishyar min palakhe beeshe, hweymoen hishyar min qṭa'ta dbisra.
ENG: Beware of the dogs, beware of the evil workers, beware of the concision:

ASY: ܣܵܒܵܒ ܐܲܚܢܲܢ ܝܼܘܲܚ ܕܓܙܘܼܪܬܵܐ، ܐܲܚܢܲܢ ܕܒܸܣܓ݂ܵܕܵܐ ܝܘܲܚ ܠܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ ܒܪܘܼܚܵܐ، ܘܒܸܥܒ݂ܵܕܵܐ ܫܘܼܒ݂ܗܵܪܵܐ ܒܝܼܫܘܿܥ ܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ ܘܠܹܐ ܝܘܲܚ ܒܗܹܒ݂ܝܼ ܥܲܠ ܦܲܓ݂ܪܵܐ،
TRL: Sabab akhnan eewakh dgzoerta, akhnan dbisghada ywakh lalaha broekha, o bi'wada shoewhara beeshoo' msheekha o le ywakh bhewee 'al paghra,
ENG: for we are the circumcision, who worship by the Spirit of God, and glory in Christ Jesus, and have no confidence in the flesh:

ASY: ܐܘܼܦ ܐܸܢ ܕܐܵܢܵܐ ܒܓܵܢܝܼ ܐܝܼܬ ܠܝܼ ܥܸܠܬܵܐ ܕܗܵܘܹܐ ܠܝܼ ܗܹܒ݂ܝܼ ܒܦܲܓ݂ܪܵܐ. ܐܸܢ ܚܲܕ ܐ݇ܚܹܪ݇ܢܵܐ ܚܵܫܹܒ݂ ܐܝܼܬ ܠܹܗ ܗܹܒ݂ܝܼ ܒܦܲܓ݂ܪܵܐ، ܐܵܢܵܐ ܒܘܼܫ ܪܵܒܵܐ ܡܸܢܹܗ ܐܝܼܬ ܠܝܼ.
TRL: Oep in dana bganee eet-lee 'ilta dhawe-lee hewee bpaghra. In khad khena khashew eet-leh hewee bpaghra, ana boesh raba mineh eet-lee.
ENG: though I myself might have confidence even in the flesh: if any other man thinketh to have confidence in the flesh, I yet more:

ASY: ܦܝܼܫܵܐ ܝܘܸܢ ܗ݇ܘܵܐ ܓܙܝܼܪܵܐ ܒܝܵܘܡܵܐ ܕܬܡܵܢܝܵܐ، ܡ̣ܢ ܫܲܪܒܬܵܐ ܕܝܼܣܪܵܝܹܠ، ܡ̣ܢ ܫܲܒ݂ܛܵܐ ܕܒܸܢܝܵܡܹܝܢ، ܥܸܒ݂ܪܵܝܵܐ ܡ̣ܢ ܥܸܒ݂ܪ̈ܵܝܹܐ، ܡ̣ܢ ܓܹܒܵܐ ܕܢܵܡܘܿܣܵܐ، ܦܪܝܼܫܵܝܵܐ،
TRL: Peesha ywin wa gzeera byawma dtmanya, min sharbta deesrayel, min shawṭa dbinyameyn, 'iwraya min 'iwraye, min geba dnamoosa, preeshaya,
ENG: circumcised the eighth day, of the stock of Israel, of the tribe of Benjamin, a Hebrew of Hebrews; as touching the law, a Pharisee;

ASY: ܡ̣ܢ ܓܹܒܵܐ ܕܛܢܵܢܵܐ، ܟܲܡܪܵܢܵܐ ܕܥܹܕܬܵܐ، ܘܡ̣ܢ ܓܹܒܵܐ ܕܙܲܕܝܼܩܘܼܬܵܐ ܕܢܵܡܘܿܣܵܐ، ܕܠܵܐ ܡܘܼܡܵܐ.
TRL: Min geba dṭnana, kamrana d'edta, o min geba dzadeeqoeta dnamoosa, dla moema.
ENG: as touching zeal, persecuting the church; as touching the righteousness which is in the law, found blameless.

ASY: ܐܝܼܢܵܐ ܐܲܢܹܐ ܕܒܸܚܫܵܒ݂ܵܐ ܝܘܸܢ ܗ݇ܘܵܐ ܩܢܵܝܬܵܐ ܝܢܵܐ ܐܸܠܝܼ، ܚܘܼܫܒܸܢܲܝ ܠܝܼ ܚܘܼܣܪܵܢܵܐ ܒܘܼܬ ܚܵܬܸܪ ܕܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ.
TRL: Eena ane dbikhshawa ywin wa qnayta yna ilee, khoeshbinay-lee khoesrana boet khatir dmsheekha.
ENG: Howbeit what things were gain to me, these have I counted loss for Christ.

ASY: ܘܗܹܫ ܒܘܼܫ ܙܵܘܕܵܐ، ܚܲܫܒܘܼܢܲܝ ܝܘܸܢ ܟܠܲܝܗܝ ܚܘܼܣܪܵܢܵܐ ܒܘܼܬ ܚܵܬܸܪ ܕܓܘܼܪܘܼܬܵܐ ܕܝ݇ܕܲܥܬܵܐ ܕܝܼܫܘܿܥ ܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ ܡܵܪܝܼ، ܕܒܘܼܬ ܕܝܼܹܗ ܚܣܝܼܪܝܼ ܟܠܲܝܗܝ ܡܸܢܕܝܼܵܢܹ̈ܐ، ܘܚܲܫܒܘܼܢܲܝ ܝܘܸܢ ܙܸܒܠܵܐ ܕܩܵܢܹܝܢ ܠܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ،
TRL: O hesh boesh zawda, khashboenay ywin klayhy khoesrana boet khatir dgoeroeta dda'ta deeshoo' msheekha maree, dboet dee-eh khseeree klayhy mindeeane, o khashboenay ywin zibla dqaneyn lmsheekha,
ENG: Yea verily, and I count all things to be loss for the excellency of the knowledge of Christ Jesus my Lord: for whom I suffered the loss of all things, and do count them but dung, that I may gain Christ,

ASY: ܘܕܗܵܘܹܝܢ ܒܝܼܹܗ، ܠܵܐ ܒܙܲܕܝܼܩܘܼܬܵܐ ܕܝܼܝܼ ܕܝܼܠܵܗ̇ ܡ̣ܢ ܢܵܡܘܿܣܵܐ، ܐܸܠܵܐ ܗ̇ܝ ܕܝܼܠܵܗ̇ ܒܝܲܕ ܗܲܝܡܵܢܘܼܬܵܐ ܒܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ، ܙܲܕܝܼܩܘܼܬܵܐ ܡ̣ܢ ܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ ܒܢܝܼܬܵܐ ܥܲܠ ܗܲܝܡܵܢܘܼܬܵܐ،
TRL: O dhaweyn bee-eh, la bzadeeqoeta deeee deelaha min namoosa, ila hay deelaha byad haymanoeta bmsheekha, zadeeqoeta min Alaha bneeta 'al haymanoeta,
ENG: and be found in him, not having a righteousness of mine own, even that which is of the law, but that which is through faith in Christ, the righteousness which is of God by faith:

ASY: ܕܝܵܕܥܹܢܹܗ، ܘܚܲܝܠܵܐ ܕܩܝܵܡܬܹܗ، ܘܫܲܪܝܼܟܘܼܬܵܐ ܕܚܲܫܘܼ̈ܗܝ، ܘܦܵܝܫܹܢ ܕܘܼܡܝܵܐ ܥܲܠܘܼܗܝ ܒܡܵܘܬܹܗ،
TRL: Dyad'eneh, o khayla dqyamteh, o shareekoeta dkhashoehy, o payshen doemya 'aloehy bmawteh,
ENG: that I may know him, and the power of his resurrection, and the fellowship of his sufferings, becoming conformed unto his death;

ASY: ܕܩܵܘܡܵܐ ܡܵܨܹܝܢ ܡܵܛܹܝܢ ܠܩܝܵܡܬܵܐ ܡ̣ܢ ܓܵܘ ܡܝܼܬܹ̈ܐ.
TRL: Dqawma maṣeyn maṭeyn lqyamta min gaw meete.
ENG: if by any means I may attain unto the resurrection from the dead.

ASY: ܠܵܐ ܕܡܸܛܝܵܐ ܝܘܸܢ ܝܲܢ ܦܝܼܫܵܐ ܝܘܸܢ ܡܘܼܟܡܸܠܵܐ، ܐܸܠܵܐ ܒܸܪܚܵܛܵܐ ܝܘܸܢ ܕܩܵܘܡܵܐ ܩܲܒܠܸܢ ܠܗ̇ܘ ܡܸܢܕܝܼ ܕܒܘܼܬ ܕܝܼܹܗ ܩܘܼܒܠܸܢܹܗ ܝܼܫܘܿܥ ܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ.
TRL: La dmiṭya ywin yan peesha ywin moekmila, ila birkhaṭa ywin dqawma qablin lhaw mindee dboet dee-eh qoeblineh eeshoo' msheekha.
ENG: Not that I have already obtained, or am already made perfect: but I press on, if so be that I may apprehend that for which also I was apprehended by Christ Jesus.

ASY: ܐܲܚܘܿܢܘܵܬܝܼ̈، ܐܵܢܵܐ ܒܓܵܢܝܼ ܠܹܐ ܝܘܸܢ ܒܸܚܫܵܒ݂ܵܐ ܗܹܫ ܕܡܸܛܝܵܐ ܝܘܸܢ، ܐܝܼܢܵܐ ܚܲܕ ܡܸܢܕܝܼ ܒܸܥܒ݂ܵܕܵܐ ܝܘܸܢ، ܡܲܢܫܘܼܝܹܐ ܝܘܸܢ ܡܸܢܕܝܼܵܢܹ̈ܐ ܕܕܲܥܒܲܪ، ܘܓ̰ܲܪܘܼܒܹܐ ܝܘܸܢ ܕܡܵܛܹܝܢ ܠܡܸܢܕܝܼܵܢܹ̈ܐ ܕܕܲܥܬܝܼܕ،
TRL: Akhoonwatee, ana bganee le ywin bikhshawa hesh dmiṭya ywin, eena khad mindee bi'wada ywin, manshoeye ywin mindeeane dda'bar, o jaroebe ywin dmaṭeyn lmindeeane dda'teed,
ENG: Brethren, I count not myself yet to have apprehended: but one thing I do, forgetting the things which are behind, and stretching forward to the things which are before,

ASY: ܘܒܸܪܚܵܛܵܐ ܝܘܸܢ ܕܡܵܛܹܝܢ ܠܢܝܼܫܵܐ ܕܫܵܩܠܹܢ ܦܘܼܪܥܵܢܵܐ ܕܐܸܠܹܗ ܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ ܩܸܪܝܝܼ ܝܠܹܗ ܠܫܡܲܝܵܐ ܒܝܼܫܘܿܥ ܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ.
TRL: O birkhaṭa ywin dmaṭeyn lneesha dshaqlen poer'ana dileh Alaha qiryee-yleh lshmaya beeshoo' msheekha.
ENG: I press on toward the goal unto the prize of the high calling of God in Christ Jesus.

ASY: ܒܲܣ ܟܡܵܐ ܡܸܢܲܢ ܕܝܼܘܲܚ ܟܵܡܝܼܠ، ܚܵܫܒܲܚ ܗܲܕܟ݂ܵܐ، ܘܐܸܢ ܚܵܫܒ݂ܝܼܬܘܿܢ ܡܸܢܕܝܼ ܐ݇ܚܹܪ݇ܢܵܐ ܦܪܝܼܫܵܐ، ܐܘܼܦ ܐܵܗܵܐ ܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ ܒܸܬ ܓܵܠܹܐ ܠܹܗ ܐܸܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ.
TRL: Bas kma minan deewakh kameel, khashbakh hadkha, o in khashweetoon mindee khena preesha, oep aha Alaha bit gale-leh ilawkhoon.
ENG: Let us therefore, as many as be perfect, be thus minded: and if in anything ye are otherwise minded, even this shall God reveal unto you:

ASY: ܐܝܼܢܵܐ ܠܗ̇ܘ ܡܸܢܕܝܼ ܕܡܸܛܝܹܐ ܝܘܲܚ، ܗܲܪ ܒܗ̇ܘ ܟܵܠܲܚ.
TRL: Eena lhaw mindee dmiṭye ywakh, har bhaw kalakh.
ENG: only, whereunto we have already attained, by that same rule let us walk.

ASY: ܐܲܚܘܿܢܘܵܬܝܼ̈، ܟܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܡܥܘܼܕܵܠܹ̈ܐ ܗܘܹܝܡܘܼܢ ܕܵܡܝܵܢܹ̈ܐ ܥܲܠܝܼ، ܘܝ݇ܠܘܿܦܘܼܢ ܡ̣ܢ ܐܵܢܝܼ ܕܒܸܚܵܝܵܐ ܝܢܵܐ ܐܲܝܟ݂ ܛܘܼܦ̮ܣܵܐ ܕܝܘܼܗ݇ܒܸܠ ܠܲܢ ܐܸܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ.
TRL: Akhoonwatee, klawkhoon m'oedale hweymoen damyane 'alee, o loopoen min anee dbikhaya yna aykh ṭoewsa dyoebil lan ilawkhoon.
ENG: Brethren, be ye imitators together of me, and mark them which so walk even as ye have us for an ensample.

ASY: ܣܵܒܵܒ ܐܲܝܟ݂ ܕܐ݇ܡܝܼܪܝܼ ܐܸܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܡ̣ܢ ܩܵܕ݇ܡܵܝܬܵܐ ܘܐܵܕܝܼܵܐ ܒܹܐܡܵܪܵܐ ܝܘܸܢ، ܟܲܕ ܐܵܢܵܐ ܒܸܒܟ݂ܵܝܵܐ، ܪܵܒܵܐ ܒܸܚܵܝܵܐ ܝܢܵܐ ܐܲܝܟ݂ ܕܸܫܡܸܢܹ̈ܐ ܕܙܩܝܼܦܵܐ ܕܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ،
TRL: Sabab aykh dmeeree ilawkhoon min qamayta o adeea bemara ywin, kad ana bibkhaya, raba bikhaya yna aykh dishmine dzqeepa dmsheekha,
ENG: For many walk, of whom I told you often, and now tell you even weeping, that they are the enemies of the cross of Christ:

ASY: ܐܵܢܝܼ ܕܚܲܪܬܲܝܗܝ ܛܠܵܩܵܐ ܝܠܵܗ̇، ܘܐܲܠܵܗܲܝܗܝ ܟܹܪ݇ܣܲܝܗܝ ܝܠܵܗ̇، ܘܚܸܩܪܲܝܗܝ ܢܟ݂ܝܼܦܬܵܐ ܝܠܹܗ ܐܸܠܲܝܗܝ، ܘܬܲܚܡܲܢܬܲܝܗܝ ܒܡܸܢܕܝܼܵܢܹ̈ܐ ܐܲܪ̈ܥܵܢܵܝܹܐ ܝܠܵܗ̇.
TRL: Anee dkhartayhy ṭlaqa-ylaha, o alahayhy kesayhy-ylaha, o khiqrayhy nkheepta-yleh ilayhy, o takhmantayhy bmindeeane ar'anaye-ylaha.
ENG: whose end is perdition, whose god is the belly, and whose glory is in their shame, who mind earthly things.

ASY: ܐܝܼܢܵܐ ܐܲܚܢܲܢ ܒܢܲܝ̈ ܡܕܝܼܢ݇ܬܵܐ ܕܫܡܲܝܵܐ ܝܘܲܚ، ܡܐܲܝܟܵܐ ܕܒܸܣܦܵܪܵܐ ܝܘܲܚ ܠܦܵܪܘܿܩܲܢ، ܡܵܪܲܢ ܝܼܫܘܿܥ ܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ،
TRL: Eena akhnan bnay mdeeta dshmaya ywakh, mayka dbispara ywakh lparooqan, Maran eeshoo' msheekha,
ENG: For our citizenship is in heaven; from whence also we wait for a Saviour, the Lord Jesus Christ:

ASY: ܗ̇ܘ ܕܒܸܬ ܫܲܚܠܸܦ ܠܦܲܓ݂ܪܲܢ ܟܘܼܦܵܐ ܘܥܵܒܹܕ ܠܹܗ ܒܕܡܘܼܬܵܐ ܕܦܲܓ݂ܪܹܗ ܚܩܝܼܪܵܐ ܒܝܲܕ ܚܲܝܠܵܐ ܕܐܝܼܬ ܠܹܗ ܕܥܵܒܹܕ ܟܠ ܡܸܢܕܝܼ ܙܲܒܛ ܠܓܵܢܹܗ.
TRL: Haw dbit shakhlip lpaghran koepa o 'abed-leh bdmoeta dpaghreh khqeera byad khayla deet-leh d'abed kl mindee zabṭ lganeh.
ENG: who shall fashion anew the body of our humiliation, that it may be conformed to the body of his glory, according to the working whereby he is able even to subject all things unto himself.

ASY: ܘܐܵܕܝܼܵܐ ܐܲܚܘܿܢܘܵܬܝܼ̈، ܚܲܒܝܼܒܹ̈ܐ ܘܡܘܼܚܸܒܹ̈ܐ، ܚܲܕܘܼܬܝܼ ܘܟܠܝܼܠܝܼ، ܗܲܕܟ݂ܵܐ ܟܠܹܝܡܘܼܢ ܒܡܵܪܲܢ، ܡܘܼܚܸܒܝܼ̈.
TRL: O adeea akhoonwatee, khabeebe o moekhibe, khadoetee o kleelee, hadkha kleymoen bmaran, moekhibee.
ENG: Wherefore, my brethren beloved and longed for, my joy and crown, so stand fast in the Lord, my beloved.

ASY: ܦܲܪܦܘܼܠܹܐ ܝܘܸܢ ܒܐܹܘܗܵܕܝܼܵܐ، ܘܦܲܪܦܘܼܠܹܐ ܝܘܸܢ ܒܣܘܼܢܛܹܟܹܐ، ܕܗܵܘܝܼ ܒܚܲܕ ܪܸܥܝܵܢܵܐ ܒܡܵܪܲܢ.
TRL: Parpoele ywin bewhadeea, o parpoele ywin bsoenṭeke, dhawee bkhad ri'yana bmaran.
ENG: I exhort Euodia, and I exhort Syntyche, to be of the same mind in the Lord.

ASY: ܦܲܪܦܘܼܠܹܐ ܝܘܸܢ ܐܘܼܦ ܒܝܼܘܼܟ݂، ܫܲܪܝܼܟܝܼ ܫܲܪܝܼܪܵܐ، ܕܗܵܘܹܝܬ ܗܲܝܘܼܪܹܐ ܠܐܵܢܝܼ ܒܲܟ݂ܬܵܬܹ̈ܐ ܕܟܟ̰ܝܼܚ ܠܗܘܿܢ ܥܲܡܝܼ ܒܐܹܘܲܢܓܲܠܝܼܘܿܢ، ܐܘܼܦ ܥܲܡ ܩܠܹܡܝܼܣ ܘܥܲܡ ܫܲܪ̈ܝܼܟܹܐ ܐ݇ܚܹܪ̈݇ܢܹܐ ܥܲܡܝܼ ܒܦܘܼܠܚܵܢܵܐ، ܐܵܢܝܼ ܕܫܸܡܵܢܲܝ̈ܗܝ ܓܵܘ ܟܬܵܒ݂ܵܐ ܕܚܲܝܹ̈ܐ ܝܢܵܐ.
TRL: Parpoele ywin oep beeoekh, shareekee shareera, dhaweyt hayoere lanee bakhtate dkcheekh-lhoon 'amee bewangaleeoon, oep 'am qlemees o 'am shareeke khene 'amee bpoelkhana, anee dshimanayhy gaw ktawa dkhaye yna.
ENG: Yea, I beseech thee also, true yokefellow, help these women, for they laboured with me in the gospel, with Clement also, and the rest of my fellow-workers, whose names are in the book of life.

ASY: ܚܕܹܝܡܘܼܢ ܒܡܵܪܝܵܐ ܒܟܠ ܥܕܵܢܵܐ، ܘܡܸܢܕܪܸܫ ܒܹܐܡܵܪܵܐ ܝܘܸܢ، ܚܕܹܝܡܘܼܢ.
TRL: Khdeymoen bmarya bkl 'dana, o mindrish bemara ywin, khdeymoen.
ENG: Rejoice in the Lord alway: again I will say, Rejoice.

ASY: ܦܵܝܫܵܐ ܝ݇ܕܝܼܥܬܵܐ ܡܲܟܝܼܟ݂ܘܼܬܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܠܟܸܣ ܟܠ ܐ݇ܢܵܫܵܐ، ܡܵܪܲܢ ܩܘܼܪܒܵܐ ܝܠܹܗ.
TRL: Paysha dee'ta makeekhoetawkhoon lkis kl nasha, Maran qoerba-yleh.
ENG: Let your forbearance be known unto all men. The Lord is at hand.

ASY: ܠܵܐ ܐܵܟ݂ܠܝܼܬܘܿܢ ܚܲܡ ܕܡܸܢܕܝܼ، ܐܸܠܵܐ ܒܟܠ ܡܸܢܕܝܼ، ܒܨܠܘܿܬܵܐ ܘܒܦܲܪܦܲܠܬܵܐ ܘܥܲܡ ܫܵܟܲܪܬܵܐ، ܡܲܩܪܸܒ݂ܘܼܢ ܒܵܥܘܼܝܵܬܵܘ̈ܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܠܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ.
TRL: La akhleetoon kham dmindee, ila bkl mindee, bṣloota o bparpalta o 'am shakarta, maqriwoen ba'oeyatawkhoon lalaha.
ENG: In nothing be anxious; but in everything by prayer and supplication with thanksgiving let your requests be made known unto God.

ASY: ܘܫܠܵܡܵܐ ܕܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ، ܗ̇ܘ ܫܠܵܡܵܐ ܕܝܼܠܹܗ ܥܸܠܸܠ ܡ̣ܢ ܟܠ ܦܲܪܡܵܝܬܵܐ، ܒܸܬ ܢܵܛܹܪ ܠܠܸܒܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܘܪܸ̈ܥܝܵܢܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܒܝܼܫܘܿܥ ܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ.
TRL: O shlama dalaha, haw shlama deeleh 'ilil min kl parmayta, bit naṭer llibawkhoon o ri'yanawkhoon beeshoo' msheekha.
ENG: And the peace of God, which passeth all understanding, shall guard your hearts and your thoughts in Christ Jesus.

ASY: ܒܚܲܪܬܵܐ ܐܲܚܘܿܢܘܵܬܝܼ̈، ܐܵܢܝܼ ܡܸܢܕܝܼܵܢܹ̈ܐ ܕܝܼܢܵܐ ܫܲܪܝܼܪܹ̈ܐ، ܐܵܢܝܼ ܕܝܼܢܵܐ ܡܝܘܼܩܪܹ̈ܐ، ܐܵܢܝܼ ܕܝܼܢܵܐ ܟܹܐܢܹ̈ܐ، ܐܵܢܝܼ ܕܝܼܢܵܐ ܕܸܟ݂ܝܹ̈ܐ، ܐܵܢܝܼ ܕܝܼܢܵܐ ܡܘܼܚܸܒܹ̈ܐ، ܐܵܢܝܼ ܕܝܼܢܵܐ ܚܩܝܼܪܹ̈ܐ؛ ܐܸܢ ܐܝܼܬ ܡܸܢܕܝܼ ܛܵܒ݂ܵܐ، ܘܐܸܢ ܐܝܼܬ ܡܸܢܕܝܼ ܕܐܝܼܩܵܪܵܐ، ܬܲܚܡܸܢܘܼܢ ܒܐܲܢܹܐ.
TRL: Bkharta akhoonwatee, anee mindeeane deena shareere, anee deena myoeqre, anee deena kene, anee deena dikhye, anee deena moekhibe, anee deena khqeere; in eet mindee ṭawa, o in eet mindee deeqara, takhminoen bane.
ENG: Finally, brethren, whatsoever things are true, whatsoever things are honourable, whatsoever things are just, whatsoever things are pure, whatsoever things are lovely, whatsoever things are of good report; if there be any virtue, and if there be any praise, think on these things.

ASY: ܐܲܢܹܐ ܕܝ݇ܠܝܼܦ ܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܘܩܘܼܒܸܠ ܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܘܫܡܝܼܥ ܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ، ܘܚܙܹܐ ܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܒܝܼܝܼ، ܐܲܢܹܐ ܥܒ݂ܘܿܕܘܼܢ، ܘܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ ܕܫܠܵܡܵܐ ܒܸܬ ܗܵܘܹܐ ܥܲܡܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ.
TRL: Ane dleep lawkhoon o qoebil lawkhoon o shmee' lawkhoon, o khze lawkhoon beeee, ane 'woodoen, o Alaha dshlama bit hawe 'amawkhoon.
ENG: The things which ye both learned and received and heard and saw in me, these things do: and the God of peace shall be with you.

ASY: ܪܵܒܵܐ ܚܕܹܐ ܠܝܼ ܒܡܵܪܲܢ ܕܐܵܕܝܼܵܐ ܒܚܲܪܬܵܐ ܚܘܼܕܸܬ ܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܗܵܝܲܪܬܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܐܸܠܝܼ. ܐܘܼܦ ܡ̣ܢ ܩܵܕ݇ܡܵܝܬܵܐ ܒܵܥܹܝܬܘܿܢ ܗ݇ܘܵܘ ܕܗܲܝܸܪܝܼܬܘܿܢ ܗ݇ܘܵܘ، ܐܝܼܢܵܐ ܠܲܝܬ ܗ݇ܘܵܘ ܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܦܸܪܣܲܬ.
TRL: Raba khde-lee bmaran dadeea bkharta khoedit lawkhoon hayartawkhoon ilee. Oep min qamayta ba'eytoon waw dhayireetoon waw, eena layt waw lawkhoon pirsat.
ENG: But I rejoice in the Lord greatly, that now at length ye have revived your thought for me; wherein ye did indeed take thought, but ye lacked opportunity.

ASY: ܠܹܐ ܝܘܸܢ ܒܹܐܡܵܪܵܐ ܗܲܕܟ݂ܵܐ ܣܵܒܵܒ ܣܢܝܼܩܵܐ ܝܘܸܢ. ܐܵܢܵܐ ܝ݇ܠܝܼܦܵܐ ܝܘܸܢ ܕܗܵܘܹܝܢ ܪܵܙܝܼ ܒܡܸܢܕܝܼ ܕܐܝܼܬ ܠܝܼ.
TRL: Le ywin bemara hadkha sabab sneeqa ywin. Ana leepa ywin dhaweyn razee bmindee deet-lee.
ENG: Not that I speak in respect of want: for I have learned, in whatsoever state I am, therein to be content.

ASY: ܐܵܢܵܐ ܟܹܐ ܝܵܕܥܹܢ ܕܵܐܟ݂ܝܼ ܝܠܵܗ̇ ܕܗܵܘܹܝܢ ܓܵܘ ܒܵܨܘܿܪܘܼܬܵܐ، ܘܟܹܐ ܝܵܕܥܹܢ ܕܵܐܟ݂ܝܼ ܝܠܵܗ̇ ܕܗܵܘܹܝܢ ܓܵܘ ܡܸܠܝܘܼܬܵܐ. ܒܟܠ ܐܘܼܪܚܵܐ ܘܒܟܠ ܡܸܢܕܝܼ ܝ݇ܠܝܼܦܵܐ ܝܘܸܢ ܐܘܼܪܚܵܐ ܕܵܐܟ݂ܝܼ ܗܵܘܹܝܢ ܣܒ݂ܝܼܥܵܐ ܘܕܵܐܟ݂ܝܼ ܗܵܘܹܝܢ ܟܦܝܼܢܵܐ، ܕܵܐܟ݂ܝܼ ܗܵܘܹܝܢ ܓܵܘ ܦܸܪܝܘܼܬܵܐ ܘܕܵܐܟ݂ܝܼ ܗܵܘܹܝܢ ܓܵܘ ܣܢܝܼܩܘܼܬܵܐ.
TRL: Ana ke yad'en dakhee-ylaha dhaweyn gaw baṣooroeta, o ke yad'en dakhee-ylaha dhaweyn gaw milyoeta. Bkl oerkha o bkl mindee leepa ywin oerkha dakhee haweyn swee'a o dakhee haweyn kpeena, dakhee haweyn gaw piryoeta o dakhee haweyn gaw sneeqoeta.
ENG: I know how to be abased, and I know also how to abound: in everything and in all things have I learned the secret both to be filled and to be hungry, both to abound and to be in want.

ASY: ܡܵܨܹܝܢ ܥܵܒ݂ܕܹܢ ܟܠܲܝܗܝ ܡܸܢܕܝܼܵܢܹ̈ܐ ܒܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ ܕܟܹܐ ܚܲܠܸܢܝܼ.
TRL: Maṣeyn 'awden klayhy mindeeane bmsheekha dke khalinee.
ENG: I can do all things in him that strengtheneth me.

ASY: ܐܝܼܢܵܐ ܫܘܼܠܵܐ ܨܦܵܝܝܼ ܥܒ݂ܝܼܕ ܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܕܫܘܼܪܸܟ ܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܒܐܘܼܠܨܵܢܝܼ̈.
TRL: Eena shoela ṣpayee 'weed lawkhoon dshoerik lawkhoon boelṣanee.
ENG: Howbeit ye did well, that ye had fellowship with my affliction.

ASY: ܘܐܘܼܦ ܐܲܚܬܘܿܢ ܦܝܼܠܝܼܦܸܣܵܝܹ̈ܐ ܟܹܐ ܝܵܕܥܝܼܬܘܿܢ ܕܒܫܘܼܪܵܝܵܐ ܕܡܲܟܪܲܙܬܝܼ ܒܐܹܘܲܢܓܲܠܝܼܘܿܢ، ܐܝܼܡܲܢ ܕܦܠܝܼܛ ܠܝܼ ܡ̣ܢ ܡܵܩܹܕܘܿܢܝܼܵܐ، ܐܘܼܦ ܚܕܵܐ ܡ̣ܢ ܥܹܕܵܬܹ̈ܐ ܠܵܐ ܫܘܼܪܸܟ ܠܵܗ̇ ܥܲܡܝܼ ܒܫܘܼܠܵܐ ܕܝܲܗ݇ܒܲܠܬܵܐ ܘܫܩܵܠܬܵܐ ܫܒ݂ܘܿܩ ܡܸܢܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ،
TRL: O oep akhtoon peeleepisaye ke yad'eetoon dbshoeraya dmakraztee bewangaleeoon, eeman dpleeṭ-lee min maqedooneea, oep khda min 'edate la shoerik-laha 'amee bshoela dyabalta o shqalta shwooq minawkhoon,
ENG: And ye yourselves also know, ye Philippians, that in the beginning of the gospel, when I departed from Macedonia, no church had fellowship with me in the matter of giving and receiving, but ye only;

ASY: ܣܵܒܵܒ ܐܝܼܡܲܢ ܕܝܼܘܸܢ ܗ݇ܘܵܐ ܓܵܘ ܬܹܣܵܠܘܿܢܝܼܩܹܐ، ܐܘܼܦ ܠܬܵܡܵܐ ܫܘܼܕܸܪܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܠܣܢܝܼܩܘܼܬܝܼ ܙܵܘܕܵܐ ܡ̣ܢ ܚܕܵܐ ܓܵܗܵܐ.
TRL: Sabab eeman deewin wa gaw tesalooneeqe, oep ltama shoedirawkhoon lsneeqoetee zawda min khda gaha.
ENG: for even in Thessalonica ye sent once and again unto my need.

ASY: ܠܹܐ ܝܠܵܗ̇ ܕܒܸܒܥܵܝܵܐ ܝܘܸܢ ܡܵܘܗܲܒ݂ܬܵܐ، ܐܝܼܢܵܐ ܒܸܒܥܵܝܵܐ ܝܘܸܢ ܕܛܥܘܼܢܝܵܬܹ̈ܐ ܙܵܝܕܝܼ ܠܚܸܫܒܘܼܢܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ.
TRL: Le-ylaha dbib'aya ywin mawhawta, eena bib'aya ywin dṭ'oenyate zaydee lkhishboenawkhoon.
ENG: Not that I seek for the gift; but I seek for the fruit that increaseth to your account.

ASY: ܐܝܼܬ ܠܝܼ ܟܠ ܡܸܢܕܝܼ ܘܙܵܘܕܵܐ ܝܠܹܗ ܐܸܠܝܼ، ܘܣܒ݂ܝܼܥܵܐ ܝܘܸܢ، ܟܲܕ ܩܘܼܒܸܠ ܠܝܼ ܐܵܢܝܼ ܡܸܢܕܝܼܵܢܹ̈ܐ ܕܫܘܼܕܪܲܝ ܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܥܲܡ ܐܵܦܵܦܪܘܿܕܝܼܛܘܿܣ، ܪܹܝܚܵܐ ܒܲܣܝܼܡܵܐ ܘܕܸܒ݂ܚܵܐ ܩܘܼܒܠܵܐ ܘܫܵܦܪܵܢܵܐ ܠܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ.
TRL: Eet-lee kl mindee o zawda-yleh ilee, o swee'a ywin, kad qoebil-lee anee mindeeane dshoedray lawkhoon 'am apaproodeeṭoos, reykha baseema o diwkha qoebla o shaprana lalaha.
ENG: But I have all things, and abound: I am filled, having received from Epaphroditus the things that came from you, an odour of a sweet smell, a sacrifice acceptable, well-pleasing to God.

ASY: ܘܐܲܠܵܗܝܼ ܒܸܬ ܡܵܠܹܐ ܟܠܵܗ̇ ܣܢܝܼܩܘܼܬܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܡ̣ܢ ܥܘܼܬܪܵܐ ܕܚܸܩܪܹܗ ܒܝܼܫܘܿܥ ܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ.
TRL: O alahee bit male klaha sneeqoetawkhoon min 'oetra dkhiqreh beeshoo' msheekha.
ENG: And my God shall fulfill every need of yours according to his riches in glory in Christ Jesus.

ASY: ܘܐܵܕܝܼܵܐ ܫܘܼܒ݂ܚܵܐ ܠܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ ܒܵܒܲܢ ܠܥܵܠܲܡ ܥܵܠܡܝܼܢ، ܐܵܡܹܝܢ.
TRL: O adeea shoewkha lalaha baban l'alam 'almeen, ameyn.
ENG: Now unto our God and Father be the glory for ever and ever. Amen.

ASY: ܗܲܒ݂݇ܠܘܼܢ ܫܠܵܡܵܐ ܠܟܠܲܝܗܝ ܩܲܕܝܼܫܹ̈ܐ ܕܒܝܼܫܘܿܥ ܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ. ܒܝܼܵܗ݇ܒ݂ܵܐ ܝܢܵܐ ܫܠܵܡܵܐ ܐܸܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܐܲܚܘܿܢܘܵܬܹ̈ܐ ܕܝܼܢܵܐ ܥܲܡܝܼ.
TRL: Haloen shlama lklayhy qadeeshe dbeeshoo' msheekha. Beeawa yna shlama ilawkhoon akhoonwate deena 'amee.
ENG: Salute every saint in Christ Jesus. The brethren which are with me salute you.

ASY: ܒܝܼܵܗ݇ܒ݂ܵܐ ܝܢܵܐ ܫܠܵܡܵܐ ܐܸܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܟܠܲܝܗܝ ܩܲܕܝܼܫܹ̈ܐ، ܒܘܼܫ ܙܵܘܕܵܐ ܐܵܢܝܼ ܕܝܼܢܵܐ ܡ̣ܢ ܒܲܝܬܵܐ ܕܩܹܣܲܪ.
TRL: Beeawa yna shlama ilawkhoon klayhy qadeeshe, boesh zawda anee deena min bayta dqesar.
ENG: All the saints salute you, especially they that are of Caesar’s household.

ASY: ܫܵܦܵܩܲܬ ܕܡܵܪܲܢ ܝܼܫܘܿܥ ܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ ܥܲܡ ܪܘܼܚܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ. ܐܵܡܹܝܢ.
TRL: Shapaqat dmaran eeshoo' msheekha 'am roekhawkhoon. Ameyn.
ENG: The grace of the Lord Jesus Christ be with your spirit.

ASY: ܦܵܘܠܘܿܣ، ܫܠܝܼܚܵܐ ܕܝܼܫܘܿܥ ܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ ܒܨܸܒ݂ܝܵܢܵܐ ܕܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ، ܘܛܝܼܡܵܬܹܐܘܿܣ ܐܲܚܘܿܢܵܐ،
TRL: Pawloos, shleekha deeshoo' msheekha bṣiwyana dalaha, o ṭeemateoos akhoona,
ENG: Paul, an apostle of Christ Jesus through the will of God, and Timothy our brother,

ASY: ܠܐܲܚܘܿܢܘܵܬܹ̈ܐ ܩܲܕܝܼܫܹ̈ܐ ܘܡܗܘܼܡܢܹ̈ܐ ܒܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ ܕܝܼܢܵܐ ܓܵܘ ܩܘܼܠܸܣܘܿܣ. ܫܵܦܵܩܲܬ ܘܫܠܵܡܵܐ ܐܸܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܡ̣ܢ ܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ ܒܵܒܲܢ.
TRL: Lakhoonwate qadeeshe o mhoemne bmsheekha deena gaw qoelisoos. Shapaqat o shlama ilawkhoon min Alaha baban.
ENG: To the saints and faithful brethren in Christ which are at Colossae: Grace to you and peace from God our Father.

ASY: ܒܟܠ ܙܲܒ݂ܢܵܐ ܫܲܟܘܼܪܹܐ ܝܘܲܚ ܠܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ، ܒܵܒܵܐ ܕܡܵܪܲܢ ܝܼܫܘܿܥ ܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ، ܘܨܲܠܘܼܝܹܐ ܒܘܼܬ ܕܝܼܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ،
TRL: Bkl zawna shakoere ywakh lalaha, baba dmaran eeshoo' msheekha, o ṣaloeye boet deeawkhoon,
ENG: We give thanks to God the Father of our Lord Jesus Christ, praying always for you,

ASY: ܟܲܕ ܫܡܝܼܥ ܠܲܢ ܒܘܼܬ ܗܲܝܡܵܢܘܼܬܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܒܝܼܫܘܿܥ ܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ، ܘܚܘܼܒܵܐ ܕܐܝܼܬ ܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܠܟܸܣ ܟܠܲܝܗܝ ܩܲܕܝܼܫܹ̈ܐ،
TRL: Kad shmee' lan boet haymanoetawkhoon beeshoo' msheekha, o khoeba deet lawkhoon lkis klayhy qadeeshe,
ENG: having heard of your faith in Christ Jesus, and of the love which ye have toward all the saints,

ASY: ܡ̣ܢ ܥܸܠܬܵܐ ܕܗܹܒ݂ܝܼ ܕܦܝܼܫܬܵܐ ܝܠܵܗ̇ ܢܛܝܼܪܬܵܐ ܐܸܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܓܵܘ ܫܡܲܝܵܐ، ܗ̇ܝ ܕܩܵܕ݇ܡܵܝܬܵܐ ܫܡܝܼܥܵܐ ܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܒܗܹܡܸܙܡܵܢ ܕܫܪܵܪܵܐ ܕܐܹܘܲܢܓܲܠܝܼܘܿܢ
TRL: Min 'ilta dhewee dpeeshta-ylaha nṭeerta ilawkhoon gaw shmaya, hay dqamayta shmee'a lawkhoon bhemizman dshrara dewangaleeoon
ENG: because of the hope which is laid up for you in the heavens, whereof ye heard before in the word of the truth of the gospel,

ASY: ܕܡܛܹܐ ܠܹܗ ܐܸܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ، ܐܲܝܟ݂ ܕܒܝܼܵܗ݇ܒ݂ܵܐ ܝܠܹܗ ܛܥܘܼܢܝܵܬܹ̈ܐ ܘܓܲܪܘܘܼܣܹܐ ܒܟܠܹܗ ܥܵܠܡܵܐ، ܗܲܕܟ݂ܵܐ ܒܸܥܒ݂ܵܕܵܐ ܝܠܹܗ ܐܘܼܦ ܓܵܘܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܡ̣ܢ ܝܵܘܡܵܐ ܕܫܡܝܼܥ ܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܘܦܘܼܪܡܹܐ ܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܫܵܦܵܩܲܬ ܕܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ ܒܫܪܵܪܵܐ؛
TRL: Dmṭe-leh ilawkhoon, aykh dbeeawa-yleh ṭ'oenyate o garwoese bkleh 'alma, hadkha bi'wada-yleh oep gawawkhoon min yawma dshmee' lawkhoon o poerme lawkhoon shapaqat dalaha bshrara;
ENG: which is come unto you; even as it is also in all the world bearing fruit and increasing, as it doth in you also, since the day ye heard and knew the grace of God in truth;

ASY: ܕܵܐܟ݂ܝܼ ܕܝ݇ܠܝܼܦ ܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܡ̣ܢ ܐܲܦܵܦܪܵܐ، ܚܲܒ݂ܪܵܐ ܡܘܼܚܸܒܵܐ ܒܪܹܓܘܼܬܵܐ ܥܲܡܲܢ، ܗ̇ܘ ܕܒܘܼܬ ܕܝܼܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܝܼܠܹܗ ܡܫܲܡܫܵܢܵܐ ܡܗܘܼܡܢܵܐ ܕܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ،
TRL: Dakhee dleep lawkhoon min apapra, khawra moekhiba bregoeta 'aman, haw dboet deeawkhoon eeleh mshamshana mhoemna dmsheekha,
ENG: even as ye learned of Epaphras our beloved fellow-servant, who is a faithful minister of Christ on our behalf,

ASY: ܗ̇ܘ ܕܐܘܼܦ ܩܲܡ ܡܲܕܸܥ ܠܲܢ ܒܘܼܬ ܚܘܼܒܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܒܪܘܼܚܵܐ.
TRL: Haw doep qam madi' lan boet khoebawkhoon broekha.
ENG: who also declared unto us your love in the Spirit.

ASY: ܒܘܼܬ ܐܵܗܵܐ ܐܘܼܦ ܐܲܚܢܲܢ، ܗܵܐ ܡ̣ܢ ܝܵܘܡܵܐ ܕܫܡܝܼܥ ܠܲܢ ܐܵܗܵܐ، ܠܹܐ ܝܘܲܚ ܫܸܠܝܹܐ ܡ̣ܢ ܠܨܲܠܘܼܝܹܐ ܒܘܼܬ ܕܝܼܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ، ܘܒܸܛܠܵܒܵܐ ܕܗܵܘܹܝܬܘܿܢ ܡܸܠܝܹܐ ܡ̣ܢ ܝ݇ܕܲܥܬܵܐ ܕܨܸܒ݂ܝܵܢܹܗ ܒܟܠ ܚܸܟ݂ܡܬܵܐ ܘܦܲܪܡܵܝܬܵܐ ܪܘܼܚܵܢܵܝܬܵܐ،
TRL: Boet aha oep akhnan, ha min yawma dshmee' lan aha, le ywakh shilye min lṣaloeye boet deeawkhoon, o biṭlaba dhaweytoon milye min da'ta dṣiwyaneh bkl khikhmta o parmayta roekhanayta,
ENG: For this cause we also, since the day we heard it, do not cease to pray and make request for you, that ye may be filled with the knowledge of his will in all spiritual wisdom and understanding,

ASY: ܕܚܵܝܹܝܬܘܿܢ ܐܲܝܟ݂ ܕܚܵܫܚܵܐ ܠܡܵܪܝܵܐ ܘܫܵܦܪܵܐ ܐܸܠܹܗ ܒܟܠ ܐܘܼܪܚܵܐ، ܘܝܵܗ݇ܒ݂ܝܼܬܘܿܢ ܛܥܘܼܢܝܵܬܹ̈ܐ ܒܟܠ ܦܘܼܠܚܵܢܵܐ ܛܵܒ݂ܵܐ، ܘܙܵܝܕܵܐ ܒܝܼܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܝ݇ܕܲܥܬܵܐ ܕܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ،
TRL: Dkhayeytoon aykh dkhashkha lmarya o shapra ileh bkl oerkha, o yaweetoon ṭ'oenyate bkl poelkhana ṭawa, o zayda beeawkhoon da'ta dalaha,
ENG: to walk worthily of the Lord unto all pleasing, bearing fruit in every good work, and increasing in the knowledge of God;

ASY: ܘܕܒܟܠ ܚܲܝܠܵܐ ܦܵܝܫܝܼܬܘܿܢ ܚܘܼܠܸܢܹܐ ܐܲܝܟ݂ ܪܲܒܘܼܬܵܐ ܕܫܘܼܒ݂ܚܹܗ، ܕܗܵܘܹܐ ܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܚܡܵܠܬܵܐ ܘܡܲܪܝܲܟ݂ܬܵܐ ܕܒܹܐܢܵܐ ܥܲܡ ܚܲܕܘܼܬܵܐ،
TRL: O dbkl khayla paysheetoon khoeline aykh raboeta dshoewkheh, dhawe lawkhoon khmalta o maryakhta dbena 'am khadoeta,
ENG: strengthened with all power, according to the might of his glory, unto all patience and longsuffering with joy;

ASY: ܟܲܕ ܫܲܟܘܼܪܹܐ ܠܒܵܒܵܐ، ܗ̇ܘ ܕܩܲܡ ܡܲܚܫܸܚ ܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܠܣܵܗܡܵܐ ܕܝܵܪܬܘܼܬܵܐ ܕܩܲܕܝܼܫܹ̈ܐ ܒܒܲܗܪܵܐ.
TRL: Kad shakoere lbaba, haw dqam makhshikh lawkhoon lsahma dyartoeta dqadeeshe bbahra.
ENG: giving thanks unto the Father, who made us meet to be partakers of the inheritance of the saints in light;

ASY: ܣܵܒܵܒ ܩܲܡ ܦܲܨܹܐ ܠܲܢ ܡ̣ܢ ܫܘܼܠܛܵܢܵܐ ܕܚܸܫܟܵܐ ܘܩܲܡ ܫܲܢܹܐ ܠܲܢ ܠܡܲܠܟܘܼܬܵܐ ܕܒܪܘܿܢܹܗ ܡܘܼܚܸܒܵܐ،
TRL: Sabab qam paṣe lan min shoelṭana dkhishka o qam shane lan lmalkoeta dbrooneh moekhiba,
ENG: who delivered us out of the power of darkness, and translated us into the kingdom of the Son of his love;

ASY: ܕܒܝܼܹܗ ܐܝܼܬ ܠܲܢ ܦܘܼܪܩܵܢܵܐ، ܕܝܼܠܹܗ ܦܘܼܚܵܠܵܐ ܕܚܛܝܼܵܬܹ̈ܐ.
TRL: Dbee-eh eet lan poerqana, deeleh poekhala dkhṭeeate.
ENG: in whom we have our redemption, the forgiveness of our sins:

ASY: ܗ̇ܘ ܝܼܠܹܗ ܕܡܘܼܬܵܐ ܕܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ ܠܵܐ ܡܸܬܚܲܙܝܵܢܵܐ، ܘܒܘܼܟ݂ܪܵܐ ܕܟܠܲܝܗܝ ܒܸܪ̈ܝܵܬܹܐ.
TRL: Haw eeleh dmoeta dalaha la mitkhazyana, o boekhra dklayhy biryate.
ENG: who is the image of the invisible God, the firstborn of all creation;

ASY: ܣܵܒܵܒ ܒܝܼܹܗ ܦܝܼܫ ܠܗܘܿܢ ܒܸܪܝܹܐ ܟܠܲܝܗܝ ܡܸܢܕܝܼܵܢܹ̈ܐ ܒܫܡܲܝܵܐ ܘܒܐܲܪܥܵܐ، ܡܸܬܚܲܙܝܵܢܹ̈ܐ ܘܠܵܐ ܡܸܬܚܲܙܝܵܢܹ̈ܐ، ܐܸܢ ܬܪ̈ܘܿܢܘܿܣܹܐ ܘܐܸܢ ܡܵܪ̈ܵܘܵܬܹܐ، ܐܸܢ ܪܹ̈ܫܵܢܹܐ ܘܐܸܢ ܫܘܼܠܛܵܢܹ̈ܐ، ܟܠܲܝܗܝ ܡܸܢܕܝܼܵܢܹ̈ܐ ܒܝܼܹܗ ܘܐܸܠܹܗ ܦܝܼܫ ܠܗܘܿܢ ܒܸܪܝܹܐ،
TRL: Sabab bee-eh peesh-lhoon birye klayhy mindeeane bshmaya o bar'a, mitkhazyane o la mitkhazyane, in troonoose o in marawate, in reshane o in shoelṭane, klayhy mindeeane bee-eh o ileh peesh-lhoon birye,
ENG: for in him were all things created, in the heavens and upon the earth, things visible and things invisible, whether thrones or dominions or principalities or powers; all things have been created through him, and unto him;

ASY: ܗ̇ܘ ܝܼܠܹܗ ܡ̣ܢ ܩܵܕ݇ܡ ܟܠܲܝܗܝ ܡܸܢܕܝܼܵܢܹ̈ܐ، ܘܟܠ ܡܸܢܕܝܼ ܒܝܼܹܗ ܟܹܐ ܟܵܠܹܐ.
TRL: Haw eeleh min qam klayhy mindeeane, o kl mindee bee-eh ke kale.
ENG: and he is before all things, and in him all things consist.

ASY: ܘܗ̇ܘ ܝܼܠܹܗ ܪܹܫܵܐ ܕܦܲܓ݂ܪܵܐ، ܕܝܼܠܹܗ ܥܹܕܬܵܐ. ܗ̇ܘ ܝܼܠܹܗ ܫܘܼܪܵܝܵܐ، ܘܒܘܼܟ݂ܪܵܐ ܡ̣ܢ ܡܝܼܬܹ̈ܐ، ܕܗܵܘܹܐ ܗ̇ܘ ܩܵܕ݇ܡܵܝܵܐ ܒܟܠ.
TRL: O haw eeleh resha dpaghra, deeleh 'edta. Haw eeleh shoeraya, o boekhra min meete, dhawe haw qamaya bkl.
ENG: And he is the head of the body, the church: who is the beginning, the firstborn from the dead; that in all things he might have the preeminence.

ASY: ܣܵܒܵܒ ܒܣܝܼܡ ܠܵܗ̇ ܠܹܗ ܒܵܒܵܐ ܕܒܝܼܹܗ ܥܵܡܪܵܐ ܟܠܵܗ̇ ܟܵܡܝܼܠܘܼܬܵܐ،
TRL: Sabab bseem-laha-leh baba dbee-eh 'amra klaha kameeloeta,
ENG: For it was the good pleasure of the Father that in him should all the fulness dwell;

ASY: ܘܒܝܼܹܗ ܣܲܙܓܸܪ ܟܠܲܝܗܝ ܡܸܢܕܝܼܵܢܹ̈ܐ ܠܓܵܢܹܗ، ܐܸܢ ܒܫܡܲܝܵܐ ܘܐܸܢ ܒܐܲܪܥܵܐ، ܒܝܲܕ ܥܒ݂ܵܕܬܵܐ ܕܫܠܵܡܵܐ ܒܕܸܡܹܗ ܕܫܘܼܦܸܟ݂ ܠܹܗ ܥܲܠ ܙܩܝܼܦܵܐ.
TRL: O bee-eh sazgir klayhy mindeeane lganeh, in bshmaya o in bar'a, byad 'wadta dshlama bdimeh dshoepikh-leh 'al zqeepa.
ENG: and through him to reconcile all things unto himself, having made peace through the blood of his cross; through him, I say, whether things upon the earth, or things in the heavens.

ASY: ܐܲܚܬܘܿܢ ܝܼܬܘܿܢ ܗ݇ܘܵܘ ܒܚܕܵܐ ܥܕܵܢܵܐ ܢܘܼܟ݂ܪ̈ܵܝܹܐ ܘܕܸܫܡܸܢܹ̈ܐ ܒܚܝܼܵܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܒܘܼܬ ܦܘܼܠܚܵܢܹ̈ܐ ܒܝܼܫܹ̈ܐ،
TRL: Akhtoon eetoon waw bkhda 'dana noekhraye o dishmine bkheealawkhoon boet poelkhane beeshe,
ENG: And you, being in time past alienated and enemies in your mind in your evil works, yet now hath he reconciled

ASY: ܐܝܼܢܵܐ ܐܵܕܝܼܵܐ ܩܲܡ ܣܲܙܓܸܪܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܒܦܲܓ݂ܪܹܗ ܟܝܵܢܵܝܵܐ ܒܝܲܕ ܡܵܘܬܹܗ، ܕܡܲܩܪܸܒ݂ ܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܠܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ ܩܲܕܝܼܫܹ̈ܐ ܘܕܠܵܐ ܡܘܼܡܵܐ ܘܕܠܵܐ ܠܵܘܡܵܐ،
TRL: Eena adeea qam sazgirawkhoon bpaghreh kyanaya byad mawteh, dmaqriw lawkhoon lalaha qadeeshe o dla moema o dla lawma,
ENG: in the body of his flesh through death, to present you holy and without blemish and unreproveable before him:

ASY: ܐܸܢ ܒܫܪܵܪܵܐ ܦܵܝܫܝܼܬܘܿܢ ܒܗܲܝܡܵܢܘܼܬܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ، ܘܗܵܘܹܝܬܘܿܢ ܟܸܠܝܹܐ ܩܸܘܝܹܐ ܠܒܸܢܝܲܬܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ، ܘܠܵܐ ܪܵܚܩܝܼܬܘܿܢ ܡ̣ܢ ܗܹܒ݂ܝܼ ܕܐܹܘܲܢܓܲܠܝܼܘܿܢ. ܐܵܗܵܐ ܝܠܹܗ ܐܹܘܲܢܓܲܠܝܼܘܿܢ ܕܫܡܝܼܥ ܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܘܕܦܝܼܫܵܐ ܝܠܹܗ ܡܘܼܟܪܸܙܵܐ ܒܟܠܵܗ̇ ܒܪܝܼܬܵܐ ܬܚܘܿܬ ܫܡܲܝܵܐ، ܘܕܐܵܢܵܐ ܦܵܘܠܘܿܣ ܗܘܹܐ ܠܝܼ ܥܵܒ݂ܕܵܢܵܐ ܕܚܸܠܡܲܬ ܐܸܠܹܗ.
TRL: In bshrara paysheetoon bhaymanoetawkhoon, o haweytoon kilye qiwye lbinyatawkhoon, o la rakhqeetoon min hewee dewangaleeoon. Aha-yleh ewangaleeoon dshmee' lawkhoon o dpeesha-yleh moekriza bklaha breeta tkhoot shmaya, o dana pawloos hwe-lee 'awdana dkhilmat ileh.
ENG: if so be that ye continue in the faith, grounded and stedfast, and not moved away from the hope of the gospel which ye heard, which was preached in all creation under heaven; whereof I Paul was made a minister.

ASY: ܐܵܕܝܼܵܐ ܒܸܚܕܵܝܵܐ ܝܘܸܢ ܒܐܘܼܠܨܵܢܝܼ̈ ܒܘܼܬ ܕܝܼܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ، ܘܡܲܟܡܘܼܠܹܐ ܝܘܸܢ ܒܦܲܓ݂ܪܝܼ ܒܵܨܘܿܪܘܼܬܵܐ ܕܐܘܼܠܨܵܢܹ̈ܐ ܕܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ، ܒܘܼܬ ܚܵܬܸܪ ܕܦܲܓ݂ܪܹܗ، ܕܝܼܠܹܗ ܥܹܕܬܵܐ.
TRL: Adeea bikhdaya ywin boelṣanee boet deeawkhoon, o makmoele ywin bpaghree baṣooroeta doelṣane dmsheekha, boet khatir dpaghreh, deeleh 'edta.
ENG: Now I rejoice in my sufferings for your sake, and fill up on my part that which is lacking of the afflictions of Christ in my flesh for his body’s sake, which is the church;

ASY: ܗܘܹܐ ܠܝܼ ܥܵܒ݂ܕܵܢܵܐ ܕܚܸܠܡܲܬ ܐܸܠܘܼܗ̇ ܐܲܝܟ݂ ܡܕܲܒܪܵܢܘܼܬܵܐ ܕܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ ܕܝܘܼܗ݇ܒܸܠ ܠܹܗ ܐܸܠܝܼ ܕܡܲܩܪܸܒܸܢ ܐܸܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܗܹܡܸܙܡܵܢ ܕܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ ܒܟܠܵܗ̇ ܡܸܠܝܘܼܬܵܐ،
TRL: Hwe-lee 'awdana dkhilmat iloeha aykh mdabranoeta dalaha dyoebil-leh ilee dmaqribin ilawkhoon hemizman dalaha bklaha milyoeta,
ENG: whereof I was made a minister, according to the dispensation of God which was given me to you-ward, to fulfill the word of God,

ASY: ܐ݇ܪܵܙܵܐ ܕܝܼܗ݇ܘܵܐ ܛܸܫܝܵܐ ܡ̣ܢ ܥܵܠܡܹ̈ܐ ܘܡ̣ܢ ܕܵܘܪܹ̈ܐ، ܐܝܼܢܵܐ ܐܵܕܝܼܵܐ ܦܝܼܫ ܠܹܗ ܓܸܠܝܵܐ ܠܩܲܕܝܼܫܘܼ̈ܗܝ.
TRL: raza deewa ṭishya min 'alme o min dawre, eena adeea peesh-leh gilya lqadeeshoehy.
ENG: even the mystery which hath been hid from all ages and generations: but now hath it been manifested to his saints,

ASY: ܐܸܠܲܝܗܝ ܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ ܒܣܝܼܡ ܠܵܗ̇ ܠܹܗ ܕܡܲܕܸܥ ܓܵܘ ܐܸܡܘܵܬܹ̈ܐ ܡܘܿܕܝܼ ܝܠܹܗ ܥܘܼܬܪܵܐ ܕܚܸܩܪܵܐ ܕܐܵܗܵܐ ܐ݇ܪܵܙܵܐ، ܗ̇ܘ ܕܝܼܠܹܗ ܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ ܓܵܘܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ، ܗܹܒ݂ܝܼ ܕܚܸܩܪܵܐ.
TRL: Ilayhy Alaha bseem-laha-leh dmadi' gaw imwate moodee-yleh 'oetra dkhiqra daha raza, haw deeleh msheekha gawawkhoon, hewee dkhiqra.
ENG: to whom God was pleased to make known what is the riches of the glory of this mystery among the Gentiles, which is Christ in you, the hope of glory:

ASY: ܗ̇ܘ ܟܹܐ ܡܲܟܪܸܙܲܚ ܠܹܗ، ܡܗܲܕܘܼܝܹܐ ܟܠ ܐ݇ܢܵܫܵܐ ܘܡܲܠܘܼܦܹܐ ܟܠ ܐ݇ܢܵܫܵܐ ܒܟܠ ܚܸܟ݂ܡܬܵܐ، ܕܡܲܩܪܸܒܲܚ ܟܠ ܚܲܕ ܐ݇ܢܵܫܵܐ ܟܵܡܝܼܠ ܒܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ.
TRL: Haw ke makrizakh-leh, mhadoeye kl nasha o maloepe kl nasha bkl khikhmta, dmaqribakh kl khad nasha kameel bmsheekha.
ENG: whom we proclaim, admonishing every man and teaching every man in all wisdom, that we may present every man perfect in Christ;

ASY: ܠܐܵܗܵܐ ܒܸܥܒ݂ܵܕܵܐ ܝܘܸܢ ܥܲܡܠܵܐ ܒܦܘܼܠܚܵܢܹܗ ܕܒܸܦܠܵܚܵܐ ܝܠܹܗ ܒܝܼܝܼ ܒܚܲܝܠܵܐ.
TRL: Laha bi'wada ywin 'amla bpoelkhaneh dbiplakha-yleh beeee bkhayla.
ENG: whereunto I labour also, striving according to his working, which worketh in me mightily.

ASY: ܒܵܥܹܝܢ ܕܝܵܕܥܝܼܬܘܿܢ ܕܝܼܘܸܢ ܓܵܘ ܐܵܓ݂ܘܿܢܵܐ ܓܘܼܪܵܐ ܒܘܼܬ ܕܝܼܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܘܒܘܼܬ ܐܵܢܝܼ ܕܝܼܢܵܐ ܓܵܘ ܠܵܕܝܼܩܝܼܵܐ، ܘܒܘܼܬ ܟܠܲܝܗܝ ܐܵܢܝܼ ܕܠܹܐ ܝܢܵܐ ܚܸܙܝܝܼ ܦܲܪܨܘܿܦܵܐܝܼܬ،
TRL: Ba'eyn dyad'eetoon deewin gaw aghoona goera boet deeawkhoon o boet anee deena gaw ladeeqeea, o boet klayhy anee dle yna khizyee parṣoopaeet,
ENG: For I would have you know how greatly I strive for you, and for them at Laodicea, and for as many as have not seen my face in the flesh;

ASY: ܕܦܵܝܫܝܼ ܝܘܼܗ݇ܒܹܐ ܠܸܒܵܐ ܘܚܘܼܝܸܕܹܐ ܒܚܘܼܒܵܐ، ܕܗܵܘܹܐ ܠܗܘܿܢ ܟܠ ܥܘܼܬܪܵܐ ܕܦܲܪܡܵܝܬܵܐ ܓܡܝܼܪܬܵܐ، ܕܝܵܕܥܝܼ ܐ݇ܪܵܙܵܐ ܕܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ ܒܵܒܵܐ، ܗ̇ܘ ܐ݇ܪܵܙܵܐ ܕܝܼܠܹܗ ܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ،
TRL: Dpayshee yoebe liba o khoeyide bkhoeba, dhawe-lhoon kl 'oetra dparmayta gmeerta, dyad'ee raza dalaha baba, haw raza deeleh msheekha,
ENG: that their hearts may be comforted, they being knit together in love, and unto all riches of the full assurance of understanding, that they may know the mystery of God, even Christ,

ASY: ܗ̇ܘ ܕܒܝܼܹܗ ܟܘܼܣܝܹܐ ܝܢܵܐ ܟܠܲܝܗܝ ܣܝܼܡܵܬܹ̈ܐ ܕܚܸܟ݂ܡܬܵܐ ܘܕܝ݇ܕܲܥܬܵܐ.
TRL: Haw dbee-eh koesye yna klayhy seemate dkhikhmta o dda'ta.
ENG: in whom are all the treasures of wisdom and knowledge hidden.

ASY: ܒܹܐܡܵܪܵܐ ܝܘܸܢ ܐܵܗܵܐ ܕܗܸܟ̃ ܚܲܕ ܠܵܐ ܡܲܚܠܸܛ ܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܒܗܹܡܸܙܡܵܢܹ̈ܐ ܡܲܪ̈ܕܝܼܵܢܹܐ.
TRL: Bemara ywin aha dhich khad la makhliṭ lawkhoon bhemizmane mardeeane.
ENG: This I say, that no one may delude you with persuasiveness of speech.

ASY: ܣܵܒܵܒ ܐܘܼܦ ܐܸܢ ܕܪܸܚܩܵܐ ܝܘܸܢ ܡܸܢܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܒܦܲܓ݂ܪܵܐ، ܥܲܡܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܝܼܘܸܢ ܒܪܘܼܚܵܐ، ܘܒܸܚܕܵܝܵܐ ܝܘܸܢ ܕܒܸܚܙܵܝܵܐ ܝܘܸܢ ܟܡܵܐ ܪܹ̈ܐܙܵܢܵܝܹܐ ܝܬܘܿܢ، ܘܟܡܵܐ ܩܘܝܼܬܵܐ ܝܠܵܗ̇ ܗܲܝܡܵܢܘܼܬܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܒܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ.
TRL: Sabab oep in drikhqa ywin minawkhoon bpaghra, 'amawkhoon eewin broekha, o bikhdaya ywin dbikhzaya ywin kma rezanaye ytoon, o kma qweeta-ylaha haymanoetawkhoon bmsheekha.
ENG: For though I am absent in the flesh, yet am I with you in the spirit, joying and beholding your order, and the stedfastness of your faith in Christ.

ASY: ܒܲܣ ܗܲܕܟ݂ܵܐ، ܕܵܐܟ݂ܝܼ ܕܩܘܼܒܸܠ ܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܠܝܼܫܘܿܥ ܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ ܡܵܪܲܢ، ܗܲܕܟ݂ܵܐ ܚܝܹܝܡܘܼܢ ܒܝܼܹܗ،
TRL: Bas hadkha, dakhee dqoebil lawkhoon leeshoo' msheekha Maran, hadkha khyeymoen bee-eh,
ENG: As therefore ye received Christ Jesus the Lord, so walk in him,

ASY: ܕܥܸܩܪ̈ܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܡܘܼܩܘܝܼܹܐ، ܘܦܝܼܫܹܐ ܒܸܢܝܹܐ ܒܝܼܹܗ، ܘܚܘܼܠܸܢܹܐ ܒܗܲܝܡܵܢܘܼܬܵܐ ܐܲܝܟ݂ ܕܦܝܼܫܹܐ ܝܬܘܿܢ ܡܘܼܠܦܹܐ، ܕܒܝܼܘܼܗ̇ ܙܵܝܕܝܼܬܘܿܢ ܒܫܵܟܲܪܬܵܐ.
TRL: D'iqrawkhoon moeqwee-e, o peeshe binye bee-eh, o khoeline bhaymanoeta aykh dpeeshe ytoon moelpe, dbeeoeha zaydeetoon bshakarta.
ENG: rooted and builded up in him, and stablished in your faith, even as ye were taught, abounding in thanksgiving.

ASY: ܗܘܹܝܡܘܼܢ ܗܸܫܝܵܪ ܕܐ݇ܢܵܫܵܐ ܠܵܐ ܣܵܠܹܒ ܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܒܦܝܼܠܵܣܘܿܦܘܼܬܵܐ ܘܒܚܸܠܛܸܢܝܘܼܬܵܐ ܒܲܛܝܼܠܬܵܐ، ܐܲܝܟ݂ ܣܲܦܝܵܢܘܼܬܵܐ ܕܒܢܲܝ̈ܢܵܫܵܐ ܘܐܲܝܟ݂ ܐܸܣܛܘܼܟ݂ܣܹ̈ܐ ܕܕܘܼܢܝܹܐ، ܕܠܹܐ ܝܢܵܐ ܒܐܘܼܪܚܵܐ ܕܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ.
TRL: Hweymoen hishyar dnasha la saleb lawkhoon bpeelasoopoeta o bkhilṭinyoeta baṭeelta, aykh sapyanoeta dbnaynasha o aykh isṭoekhse ddoenye, dle yna boerkha dmsheekha.
ENG: Take heed lest there shall be any one that maketh spoil of you through his philosophy and vain deceit, after the tradition of men, after the rudiments of the world, and not after Christ:

ASY: ܣܵܒܵܒ ܒܝܼܹܗ ܟܹܐ ܥܵܡܪܵܐ ܟܠܵܗ̇ ܡܸܠܝܘܼܬܵܐ ܕܐܲܠܵܗܘܼܬܵܐ ܓܘܼܫܡܵܢܵܐܝܼܬ.
TRL: Sabab bee-eh ke 'amra klaha milyoeta dalahoeta goeshmanaeet.
ENG: for in him dwelleth all the fulness of the Godhead bodily,

ASY: ܘܐܲܚܬܘܿܢ ܒܝܼܹܗ ܦܝܼܫܹܐ ܝܬܘܿܢ ܡܸܠܝܹܐ، ܗ̇ܘ ܕܝܼܠܹܗ ܪܹܫܵܐ ܕܟܠ ܚܲܝܠܵܐ ܘܫܘܼܠܛܵܢܵܐ.
TRL: O akhtoon bee-eh peeshe ytoon milye, haw deeleh resha dkl khayla o shoelṭana.
ENG: and in him ye are made full, who is the head of all principality and power:

ASY: ܘܐܘܼܦ ܒܝܼܹܗ ܐܲܚܬܘܿܢ ܦܝܼܫ ܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܓܙܝܼܪܹܐ ܒܓܙܘܼܪܬܵܐ ܕܠܵܐ ܒܐܝܼܕܵܬܹ̈ܐ، ܐܸܠܵܐ ܒܫܵܠܲܚܬܵܐ ܕܟܝܵܢܵܐ ܚܲܛܵܝܵܐ، ܒܓܙܘܼܪܬܵܐ ܒܝܲܕ ܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ،
TRL: O oep bee-eh akhtoon peesh lawkhoon gzeere bgzoerta dla beedate, ila bshalakhta dkyana khaṭaya, bgzoerta byad msheekha,
ENG: in whom ye were also circumcised with a circumcision not made with hands, in the putting off of the body of the flesh, in the circumcision of Christ;

ASY: ܘܦܝܼܫ ܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܩܒ݂ܝܼܪܹܐ ܥܲܡܹܗ ܒܡܲܥܡܘܿܕܝܼܬܵܐ، ܘܦܝܼܫ ܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܡܘܼܩܸܡܹܐ ܥܲܡܹܗ ܒܗܲܝܡܵܢܘܼܬܵܐ ܒܚܲܝܠܵܐ ܕܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ، ܗ̇ܘ ܕܡܘܼܩܸܡ ܠܹܗ ܡ̣ܢ ܓܵܘ ܡܝܼܬܹ̈ܐ.
TRL: O peesh lawkhoon qweere 'ameh bma'moodeeta, o peesh lawkhoon moeqime 'ameh bhaymanoeta bkhayla dalaha, haw dmoeqim-leh min gaw meete.
ENG: having been buried with him in baptism, wherein ye were also raised with him through faith in the working of God, who raised him from the dead.

ASY: ܐܝܼܡܲܢ ܕܝܼܬܘܿܢ ܗ݇ܘܵܘ ܡܝܼܬܹ̈ܐ ܓܵܘ ܚܛܝܼܵܬܵܘ̈ܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܘܓܵܘ ܥܘܼܪܠܘܼܬܵܐ ܕܟܝܵܢܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܚܲܛܵܝܵܐ، ܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ ܩܲܡ ܡܲܚܹܐ ܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܥܲܡܹܗ، ܟܲܕ ܦܘܼܚܠܲܝ ܠܹܗ ܟܠܲܝܗܝ ܚܛܝܼܵܬܲܢ̈،
TRL: Eeman deetoon waw meete gaw khṭeeatawkhoon o gaw 'oerloeta dkyanawkhoon khaṭaya, Alaha qam makhe lawkhoon 'ameh, kad poekhlay-leh klayhy khṭeeatan,
ENG: And you, being dead through your trespasses and the uncircumcision of your flesh, you, I say, did he quicken together with him, having forgiven us all our trespasses;

ASY: ܘܫܝܼܦ ܠܹܗ ܦܘܼܩܕܵܢܹ̈ܐ ܟܬܝܼܒܹܐ ܒܐܝܼܕܵܐ ܕܝܼܗ݇ܘܵܘ ܠܕܲܠܩܘܼܒ݂ܠܲܢ ܘܕܝܼܗ݇ܘܵܘ ܟܸܠܝܹܐ ܓܵܘ ܐܘܼܪܚܲܢ، ܘܫܩܝܼܠܲܝ ܠܹܗ ܟܲܕ ܡܸܚܝܲܝ ܠܹܗ ܠܙܩܝܼܦܵܐ،
TRL: O sheep-leh poeqdane kteebe beeda deewaw ldalqoewlan o deewaw kilye gaw oerkhan, o shqeelay-leh kad mikhyay-leh lzqeepa,
ENG: having blotted out the bond written in ordinances that was against us, which was contrary to us: and he hath taken it out of the way, nailing it to the cross;

ASY: ܘܡ̣ܢ ܒܵܬ݇ܪ ܕܫܘܼܠܸܚ ܠܹܗ ܠܟܠܲܝܗܝ ܚܲܝܠܹ̈ܐ ܘܫܘܼܠܛܵܢܹ̈ܐ، ܓܸܠܝܲܝ ܠܹܗ ܐܲܫܟܵܪܵܐ ܩܵܕ݇ܡ ܟܠ ܚܲܕ، ܘܓ݂ܠܝܼܒܲܝ ܠܹܗ ܒܝܲܕ ܙܩܝܼܦܹܗ.
TRL: O min bar dshoelikh-leh lklayhy khayle o shoelṭane, gilyay-leh ashkara qam kl khad, o ghleebay-leh byad zqeepeh.
ENG: having put off from himself the principalities and the powers, he made a show of them openly, triumphing over them in it.

ASY: ܒܲܣ ܐ݇ܢܵܫܵܐ ܠܵܐ ܕܵܐܹܢܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܒܡܸܢܕܝܼ ܕܐܵܟ݂ܠܝܼܬܘܿܢ ܝܲܢ ܒܡܸܢܕܝܼ ܕܫܵܬܹܝܬܘܿܢ، ܝܲܢ ܒܘܼܬ ܥܹܐܕܵܐ ܘܪܹܫܵܐ ܕܝܲܪ̈ܚܹܐ ܘܫܲܒܵܬܹ̈ܐ.
TRL: Bas nasha la daenawkhoon bmindee dakhleetoon yan bmindee dshateytoon, yan boet 'eda o resha dyarkhe o shabate.
ENG: Let no man therefore judge you in meat, or in drink, or in respect of a feast day or a new moon or a sabbath day:

ASY: ܐܲܢܹܐ ܝܼܢܵܐ ܛܸܠܵܢܝܵܬܹ̈ܐ ܕܡܸܢܕܝܼܵܢܹ̈ܐ ܕܗܕܝܼܪܹܐ ܝܢܵܐ ܕܐܵܬܝܼ، ܐܝܼܢܵܐ ܐܘܼܣܝܼܵܐ ܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ ܝܠܹܗ.
TRL: Ane eena ṭilanyate dmindeeane dhdeere yna datee, eena oeseea msheekha-yleh.
ENG: which are a shadow of the things to come; but the body is Christ’s.

ASY: ܠܵܐ ܫܵܒ݂ܩܝܼܬܘܿܢ ܕܵܐܹܢ ܐܸܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܐ݇ܢܵܫܵܐ ܕܟܹܐ ܚܵܕܹܐ ܒܡܲܟܝܼܟ݂ܘܼܬܵܐ ܒܲܛܝܼܠܬܵܐ ܘܒܣܓ݂ܵܕܬܵܐ ܕܡܲܠܲܐܟܹ̈ܐ ܕܣܵܠܹܒ ܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܡ̣ܢ ܦܘܼܪܥܵܢܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ. ܗܲܕܟ݂ܵܐ ܐ݇ܢܵܫܵܐ ܟܹܐ ܛܲܠܸܩ ܠܵܗ̇ ܥܕܵܢܹܗ ܒܡܸܢܕܝܼܵܢܹ̈ܐ ܕܚܸܙܝܲܝ ܠܹܗ، ܘܪܸܥܝܵܢܵܐ ܠܵܐ ܪܘܼܚܵܢܵܝܵܐ ܟܹܐ ܥܵܒܹܕ ܠܹܗ ܕܚܵܬܹܪ ܒܟܝܵܢܹܗ ܚܲܛܵܝܵܐ،
TRL: La shawqeetoon daen ilawkhoon nasha dke khade bmakeekhoeta baṭeelta o bsghadta dmalake dsaleb lawkhoon min poer'anawkhoon. Hadkha nasha ke ṭaliq-laha 'daneh bmindeeane dkhizyay-leh, o ri'yana la roekhanaya ke 'abed-leh dkhater bkyaneh khaṭaya,
ENG: Let no man rob you of your prize by a voluntary humility and worshipping of the angels, dwelling in the things which he hath seen, vainly puffed up by his fleshly mind,

ASY: ܗܲܕܟ݂ܵܐ ܐ݇ܢܵܫܵܐ ܠܹܐ ܝܠܹܗ ܕܒ݂ܝܼܩܵܐ ܒܪܹܫܵܐ، ܕܒܝܼܹܗ ܟܠܹܗ ܦܲܓ݂ܪܵܐ ܒܸܢܝܵܐ ܝܠܹܗ، ܘܕܒ݂ܝܼܩܵܐ ܒܥܘܼܕܵܠܹ̈ܐ ܒܓܲܝܹ̈ܐ ܘܒܫܸܪ̈ܝܵܢܹܐ، ܘܓܲܪܘܘܼܣܹܐ ܝܠܹܗ ܐܲܝܟ݂ ܕܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ ܥܵܒܹܕ ܠܹܗ ܕܓܲܪܘܸܣ.
TRL: Hadkha nasha le-yleh dweeqa bresha, dbee-eh kleh paghra binya-yleh, o dweeqa b'oedale bgaye o bshiryane, o garwoese-yleh aykh dalaha 'abed-leh dgarwis.
ENG: and not holding fast the Head, from whom all the body, being supplied and knit together through the joints and bands, increaseth with the increase of God.

ASY: ܒܲܣ ܐܸܢ ܡܝܼܬ ܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܥܲܡ ܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ ܡ̣ܢ ܐܸܣܛܘܼܟ݂ܣܹ̈ܐ ܕܥܵܠܡܵܐ، ܩܵܡܘܿܕܝܼ ܐܲܝܟ݂ ܕܐܸܢ ܒܸܚܵܝܵܐ ܓܵܘ ܥܵܠܡܵܐ ܒܸܫܠܵܡܵܐ ܝܬܘܿܢ ܠܦܘܼܩܕܵܢܹ̈ܐ، ܐܲܝܟ݂:
TRL: Bas in meet lawkhoon 'am msheekha min isṭoekhse d'alma, qamoodee aykh din bikhaya gaw 'alma bishlama ytoon lpoeqdane, aykh:
ENG: If ye died with Christ from the rudiments of the world, why, as though living in the world, do ye subject yourselves to ordinances,

ASY: ”ܠܵܐ ܩܲܪܒܸܢܸܬ، ܘܠܵܐ ܛܵܥܡܹܬ، ܘܠܵܐ ܕܵܩܪܹܬ؟“
TRL: ”La qarbinit, o la ṭa'met, o la daqret?“
ENG: Handle not, nor taste, nor touch

ASY: ܐܲܢܹܐ ܟܠܲܝܗܝ ܟܹܐ ܚܵܪܒ݂ܝܼ ܒܡܲܦܠܲܚܬܵܐ ܣܵܒܵܒ ܝܼܢܵܐ ܦܘܼܩܕܵܢܹ̈ܐ ܘܝܘܼܠܦܵܢܹ̈ܐ ܕܒܢܲܝ̈ܢܵܫܵܐ.
TRL: Ane klayhy ke kharwee bmaplakhta sabab eena poeqdane o yoelpane dbnaynasha.
ENG: (all which things are to perish with the using), after the precepts and doctrines of men?

ASY: ܐܲܢܹܐ ܟܹܐ ܦܵܝܫܝܼ ܚܸܙܝܹܐ ܐܲܝܟ݂ ܕܐܸܢ ܐܝܼܬ ܒܝܼܲܝܗܝ ܚܸܟ݂ܡܬܵܐ ܕܝܼܠܵܗ̇ ܣܓ݂ܵܕܬܵܐ ܡ̣ܢ ܨܸܒ݂ܝܵܢܵܐ، ܘܡܲܟܝܼܟ݂ܘܼܬܵܐ ܕܲܓܵܠܬܵܐ، ܘܓ̰ܲܢܓ̰ܲܪܬܵܐ ܕܦܲܓ݂ܪܵܐ، ܐܝܼܢܵܐ ܠܹܐ ܝܢܵܐ ܡܸܢܕܝܼ ܡܵܪܹܐ ܛܝܼܡܵܐ ܠܡܲܟܠܘܼܝܹܐ ܫܪ̈ܝܼܚܘܼܝܵܬܹܐ ܕܦܲܓ݂ܪܵܐ.
TRL: Ane ke payshee khizye aykh din eet bee-ayhy khikhmta deelaha sghadta min ṣiwyana, o makeekhoeta dagalta, o janjarta dpaghra, eena le yna mindee mare ṭeema lmakloeye shreekhoeyate dpaghra.
ENG: Which things have indeed a show of wisdom in will-worship, and humility, and severity to the body; but are not of any value against the indulgence of the flesh.

ASY: ܒܲܣ ܐܸܢ ܩܝܼܡ ܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܥܲܡ ܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ، ܛܠܘܿܒܘܼܢ ܡܸܢܕܝܼܵܢܹ̈ܐ ܕܝܼܢܵܐ ܠܥܸܠܸܠ، ܐܲܝܟܵܐ ܕܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ ܝ݇ܬܝܼܒ݂ܵܐ ܝܠܹܗ ܥܲܠ ܝܲܡܝܼܢܵܐ ܕܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ.
TRL: Bas in qeem lawkhoon 'am msheekha, ṭlooboen mindeeane deena l'ilil, ayka dmsheekha teewa-yleh 'al yameena dalaha.
ENG: If then ye were raised together with Christ, seek the things that are above, where Christ is, seated on the right hand of God.

ASY: ܡܲܬܒ݂ܘܼܢ ܚܝܼܵܠܵܘ̈ܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܒܡܸܢܕܝܼܵܢܹ̈ܐ ܕܠܥܸܠܸܠ، ܘܠܵܐ ܒܡܸܢܕܝܼܵܢܹ̈ܐ ܕܒܐܲܪܥܵܐ.
TRL: Matwoen kheealawkhoon bmindeeane dl'ilil, o la bmindeeane dbar'a.
ENG: Set your mind on the things that are above, not on the things that are upon the earth.

ASY: ܣܵܒܵܒ ܡܝܼܬ ܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ، ܘܚܲܝܵܘ̈ܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܛܸܫܝܹܐ ܝܢܵܐ ܥܲܡ ܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ ܒܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ.
TRL: Sabab meet lawkhoon, o khayawkhoon ṭishye yna 'am msheekha balaha.
ENG: For ye died, and your life is hid with Christ in God.

ASY: ܐܝܼܡܲܢ ܕܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ، ܗ̇ܘ ܕܝܼܠܹܗ ܚܲܝܵܘ̈ܟ݂ܘܿܢ، ܦܵܐܹܫ ܓܸܠܝܵܐ، ܗ̇ܝܓܵܗ ܐܘܼܦ ܐܲܚܬܘܿܢ ܒܸܬ ܦܵܝܫܝܼܬܘܿܢ ܓܸܠܝܹܐ ܥܲܡܹܗ ܒܚܸܩܪܵܐ.
TRL: Eeman dmsheekha, haw deeleh khayawkhoon, paesh gilya, haygah oep akhtoon bit paysheetoon gilye 'ameh bkhiqra.
ENG: When Christ, who is our life, shall be manifested, then shall ye also with him be manifested in glory.

ASY: ܒܲܣ ܡܲܡܝܸܬܘܼܢ ܗܲܕܵܡܵܘ̈ܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܕܦܲܓ݂ܪܵܐ ܐܲܪܥܵܢܵܝܵܐ: ܙܵܢܝܘܼܬܵܐ، ܛܲܢܦܘܼܬܵܐ، ܪܸܓܬܵܐ، ܫܲܗܘܲܬܬܵܐ ܒܝܼܫܬܵܐ، ܘܛܲܡܲܥܟܵܪܘܼܬܵܐ، ܗ̇ܝ ܕܝܼܠܵܗ̇ ܣܓ݂ܵܕܬܵܐ ܕܨܵܢܲܡܹ̈ܐ.
TRL: Bas mamyitoen hadamawkhoon dpaghra ar'anaya: zanyoeta, ṭanpoeta, rigta, shahwatta beeshta, o ṭama'karoeta, hay deelaha sghadta dṣaname.
ENG: Mortify therefore your members which are upon the earth; fornication, uncleanness, passion, evil desire, and covetousness, the which is idolatry;

ASY: ܒܥܸܠܬܵܐ ܕܐܲܢܹܐ، ܒܹܐܬܵܝܵܐ ܝܠܵܗ̇ ܟܲܪܒܵܐ ܕܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ ܥܲܠ ܒܢܘܿܢܹ̈ܐ ܕܠܵܐ ܡܲܨܝܲܬܬܵܐ.
TRL: B'ilta dane, betaya-ylaha karba dalaha 'al bnoone dla maṣyatta.
ENG: for which things’ sake cometh the wrath of God upon the sons of disobedience;

ASY: ܐܘܼܦ ܐܲܚܬܘܿܢ ܟܹܐ ܚܵܕܪܝܼܬܘܿܢ ܗ݇ܘܵܘ ܒܐܲܢܹܐ ܐܘܼܪ̈ܚܵܬܹܐ ܐܝܼܡܲܢ ܕܒܸܚܵܝܵܐ ܝܬܘܿܢ ܗ݇ܘܵܘ ܓܵܘܲܝܗܝ.
TRL: Oep akhtoon ke khadreetoon waw bane oerkhate eeman dbikhaya ytoon waw gawayhy.
ENG: in the which ye also walked aforetime, when ye lived in these things.

ASY: ܐܝܼܢܵܐ ܐܵܕܝܼܵܐ ܪܲܦܹܝܡܘܼܢ ܐܝܼܕܵܐ ܡ̣ܢ ܐܲܢܹܐ: ܚܸܡܬܵܐ، ܟܲܪܒܵܐ، ܒܝܼܫܘܼܬܵܐ، ܓܘܼܕܵܦܵܐ، ܘܗܹܡܸܙܡܵܢܹ̈ܐ ܫܸܚܬܵܢܹ̈ܐ ܡ̣ܢ ܦܘܼܡܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ.
TRL: Eena adeea rapeymoen eeda min ane: khimta, karba, beeshoeta, goedapa, o hemizmane shikhtane min poemawkhoon.
ENG: But now put ye also away all these; anger, wrath, malice, railing, shameful speaking out of your mouth:

ASY: ܠܵܐ ܕܲܓܠܝܼܬܘܿܢ ܚܲܕ ܠܗ̇ܘ ܐ݇ܚܹܪ݇ܢܵܐ، ܣܵܒܵܒ ܫܘܼܠܸܚ ܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܠܒܲܪܢܵܫܵܐ ܥܲܬܝܼܩܵܐ ܥܲܡ ܦܘܼܠܚܵܢܘܼ̈ܗܝ،
TRL: La dagleetoon khad lhaw khena, sabab shoelikh lawkhoon lbarnasha 'ateeqa 'am poelkhanoehy,
ENG: lie not one to another; seeing that ye have put off the old man with his doings,

ASY: ܘܠܒ݂ܝܼܫ ܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܒܲܪܢܵܫܵܐ ܚܵܕ݇ܬܵܐ، ܕܦܝܵܫܵܐ ܝܠܹܗ ܚܘܼܕܸܬܵܐ ܒܝ݇ܕܲܥܬܵܐ، ܕܗܵܘܹܐ ܒܕܡܘܼܬܵܐ ܕܒܵܪܝܵܢܹܗ،
TRL: O lweesh lawkhoon barnasha khata, dpyasha-yleh khoedita bda'ta, dhawe bdmoeta dbaryaneh,
ENG: and have put on the new man, which is being renewed unto knowledge after the image of him that created him:

ASY: ܐܲܝܟܵܐ ܕܠܲܝܬ ܝܵܘܢܵܝܵܐ ܘܝܗܘܼܕܵܝܵܐ، ܠܵܐ ܓܙܘܼܪܬܵܐ ܘܠܵܐ ܥܘܼܪܠܘܼܬܵܐ، ܠܵܐ ܒܲܪܒܪܵܝܵܐ ܘܠܵܐ ܐܸܣܩܸܛܹܐ، ܘܠܵܐ ܥܲܒ݂ܕܵܐ ܘܠܵܐ ܚܹܐܪܵܐ؛ ܐܸܠܵܐ ܟܠ ܘܒܟܠ ܝܼܠܹܗ ܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ.
TRL: Ayka dlayt yawnaya o yhoedaya, la gzoerta o la 'oerloeta, la barbraya o la isqiṭe, o la 'awda o la khera; ila kl o bkl eeleh msheekha.
ENG: where there cannot be Greek and Jew, circumcision and uncircumcision, barbarian, Scythian, bondman, freeman: but Christ is all, and in all.

ASY: ܒܲܣ ܐܲܝܟ݂ ܓܘܼܒܝܹ̈ܐ ܕܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ، ܩܲܕܝܼܫܹ̈ܐ ܘܡܘܼܚܸܒܹ̈ܐ، ܠܒ݂ܘܿܫܘܼܢ ܪ̈ܲܚܡܹܐ، ܪܲܚܪܲܚܬܵܐ، ܡܲܟܝܼܟ݂ܘܼܬܵܐ، ܢܝܼܚܘܼܬܵܐ، ܘܡܲܪܝܲܟ݂ܬܵܐ ܕܒܹܐܢܵܐ.
TRL: Bas aykh goebye dalaha, qadeeshe o moekhibe, lwooshoen rakhme, rakhrakhta, makeekhoeta, neekhoeta, o maryakhta dbena.
ENG: Put on therefore, as God’s elect, holy and beloved, a heart of compassion, kindness, humility, meekness, longsuffering;

ASY: ܚܡܘܿܠܘܼܢ ܚܲܕ ܠܗ̇ܘ ܐ݇ܚܹܪ݇ܢܵܐ، ܘܦܲܚܠܘܼܢ ܚܲܕ ܠܗ̇ܘ ܐ݇ܚܹܪ݇ܢܵܐ. ܐܸܢ ܚܲܕ ܐܝܼܬ ܠܹܗ ܩܒ݂ܵܠܬܵܐ ܠܗ̇ܘ ܐ݇ܚܹܪ݇ܢܵܐ، ܦܲܚܠܘܼܢ ܕܵܐܟ݂ܝܼ ܕܐܘܼܦ ܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ ܦܘܼܚܸܠ ܠܹܗ ܐܸܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ.
TRL: Khmooloen khad lhaw khena, o pakhloen khad lhaw khena. In khad eet-leh qwalta lhaw khena, pakhloen dakhee doep msheekha poekhil-leh ilawkhoon.
ENG: forbearing one another, and forgiving each other, if any man have a complaint against any; even as the Lord forgave you, so also do ye:

ASY: ܘܥܲܠ ܟܠܲܝܗܝ ܐܲܢܹܐ، ܠܒ݂ܘܿܫܘܼܢ ܚܘܼܒܵܐ، ܕܝܼܠܹܗ ܐܸܣܘܼܪܵܐ ܕܟܵܡܝܼܠܘܼܬܵܐ.
TRL: O 'al klayhy ane, lwooshoen khoeba, deeleh isoera dkameeloeta.
ENG: and above all these things put on love, which is the bond of perfectness.

ASY: ܘܫܒ݂ܘܿܩܘܼܢ ܫܠܵܡܵܐ ܕܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ ܙܲܒܛܸܢ ܠܠܸܒܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ، ܕܐܸܠܹܗ ܦܝܼܫ ܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܩܸܪܝܹܐ ܒܚܲܕ ܦܲܓ݂ܪܵܐ؛ ܘܗܵܘܹܝܬܘܿܢ ܫܲܟܘܼܪܹܐ.
TRL: O shwooqoen shlama dmsheekha zabṭin llibawkhoon, dileh peesh lawkhoon qirye bkhad paghra; o haweytoon shakoere.
ENG: And let the peace of Christ rule in your hearts, to the which also ye were called in one body; and be ye thankful.

ASY: ܫܒ݂ܘܿܩܘܼܢ ܗܹܡܸܙܡܵܢ ܕܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ ܥܵܡܪܵܐ ܒܝܼܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܥܲܬܝܼܪܵܐܝܼܬ، ܒܟܠ ܚܸܟ݂ܡܬܵܐ ܗܵܘܹܝܬܘܿܢ ܡܲܠܘܼܦܹܐ ܘܡܗܲܕܘܼܝܹܐ ܚܲܕ ܠܗ̇ܘ ܐ݇ܚܹܪ݇ܢܵܐ ܒܡܲܙܡܘܿܪܹ̈ܐ ܘܒܬܸܫܒܘܿܚܝܵܬܹ̈ܐ ܘܒܙܡܵܪ̈ܝܵܬܹܐ ܪ̈ܘܼܚܵܢܵܝܹܐ، ܒܸܙܡܵܪܵܐ ܒܫܵܦܵܩܲܬ ܓܵܘ ܠܸܒܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܠܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ.
TRL: Shwooqoen hemizman dmsheekha 'amra beeawkhoon 'ateeraeet, bkl khikhmta haweytoon maloepe o mhadoeye khad lhaw khena bmazmoore o btishbookhyate o bzmaryate roekhanaye, bizmara bshapaqat gaw libawkhoon lalaha.
ENG: Let the word of Christ dwell in you richly in all wisdom; teaching and admonishing one another with psalms and hymns and spiritual songs, singing with grace in your hearts unto God.

ASY: ܘܟܠ ܡܸܢܕܝܼ ܕܥܵܒ݂ܕܝܼܬܘܿܢ، ܐܸܢ ܒܗܹܡܸܙܡܵܢ ܘܐܸܢ ܒܦܘܼܠܚܵܢܵܐ، ܥܒ݂ܘܿܕܘܼܢ ܟܠ ܡܸܢܕܝܼ ܒܫܸܡܵܐ ܕܡܵܪܲܢ ܝܼܫܘܿܥ، ܫܲܟܘܼܪܹܐ ܒܝܼܹܗ ܠܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ ܒܵܒܵܐ.
TRL: O kl mindee d'awdeetoon, in bhemizman o in bpoelkhana, 'woodoen kl mindee bshima dmaran eeshoo', shakoere bee-eh lalaha baba.
ENG: And whatsoever ye do, in word or in deed, do all in the name of the Lord Jesus, giving thanks to God the Father through him.

ASY: ܒܲܟ݂ܬܵܬܹ̈ܐ، ܫܠܘܿܡܘܼܢ ܠܓܲܒ݂ܪ̈ܵܢܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܐܲܝܟ݂ ܕܚܵܫܚܵܐ ܠܡܵܪܝܵܐ.
TRL: Bakhtate, shloomoen lgawranawkhoon aykh dkhashkha lmarya.
ENG: Wives, be in subjection to your husbands, as is fitting in the Lord.

ASY: ܓܲܒ݂ܪ̈ܵܢܹܐ، ܡܲܚܸܒܘܼܢ ܠܒܲܟ݂ܬܵܬܵܘ̈ܟ݂ܘܿܢ، ܘܠܵܐ ܗܵܘܹܝܬܘܿܢ ܡܲܪܝܼܪܹ̈ܐ ܥܲܠܲܝܗܝ.
TRL: Gawrane, makhiboen lbakhtatawkhoon, o la haweytoon mareere 'alayhy.
ENG: Husbands, love your wives, and be not bitter against them.

ASY: ܝܵܠܹ̈ܕ݇ܐ، ܡܲܨܝܸܬܘܼܢ ܠܐܲܒ݂ܵܗܵܘ̈ܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܒܟܠ ܡܸܢܕܝܼ، ܣܵܒܵܒ ܐܵܗܵܐ ܒܲܣܝܼܡܬܵܐ ܝܠܵܗ̇ ܠܡܵܪܝܵܐ.
TRL: Yale, maṣyitoen lawahawkhoon bkl mindee, sabab aha baseemta-ylaha lmarya.
ENG: Children, obey your parents in all things, for this is well-pleasing in the Lord.

ASY: ܐܲܒ݂ܵܗܹ̈ܐ، ܠܵܐ ܡܲܟܪܸܒܝܼܬܘܿܢ ܠܝܵܠܵܕ݇ܘ̈ܟ݂ܘܿܢ، ܕܠܵܐ ܦܵܝܫܝܼ ܡܘܼܥܝܸܩܹܐ.
TRL: Awahe, la makribeetoon lyalawkhoon, dla payshee moe'yiqe.
ENG: Fathers, provoke not your children, that they be not discouraged.

ASY: ܥܲܒ݂ܕܹ̈ܐ، ܡܲܨܝܸܬܘܼܢ ܒܟܠ ܡܸܢܕܝܼ ܠܡܵܪ̈ܵܘܵܬܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܐܲܪ̈ܥܵܢܵܝܹܐ، ܠܵܐ ܒܦܠܵܚܬܵܐ ܩܵܕ݇ܡ ܥܲܝܢܵܐ ܐܲܝܟ݂ ܡܲܫܦܸܪ̈ܵܢܹܐ ܠܒܢܲܝ̈ܢܵܫܵܐ، ܐܸܠܵܐ ܒܦܫܝܼܛܘܼܬܵܐ ܕܠܸܒܵܐ ܘܒܙܕܘܼܥܬܵܐ ܕܡܵܪܝܵܐ.
TRL: 'Awde, maṣyitoen bkl mindee lmarawatawkhoon ar'anaye, la bplakhta qam 'ayna aykh mashpirane lbnaynasha, ila bpsheeṭoeta dliba o bzdoe'ta dmarya.
ENG: Servants, obey in all things them that are your masters according to the flesh; not with eyeservice, as men-pleasers, but in singleness of heart, fearing the Lord:

ASY: ܘܟܠ ܡܸܢܕܝܼ ܕܥܵܒ݂ܕܝܼܬܘܿܢ، ܥܒ݂ܘܿܕܘܼܢ ܠܹܗ ܡ̣ܢ ܟܠܹܗ ܠܸܒܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ، ܐܲܝܟ݂ ܕܐܸܢ ܠܡܵܪܲܢ ܒܸܥܒ݂ܵܕܵܐ ܝܬܘܿܢ ܘܠܵܐ ܠܒܢܲܝ̈ܢܵܫܵܐ،
TRL: O kl mindee d'awdeetoon, 'woodoen-leh min kleh libawkhoon, aykh din lmaran bi'wada ytoon o la lbnaynasha,
ENG: whatsoever ye do, work heartily, as unto the Lord, and not unto men;

ASY: ܒܲܣ ܝ݇ܕܸܥܡܘܼܢ ܕܡ̣ܢ ܡܵܪܲܢ ܒܸܬ ܩܲܒܠܝܼܬܘܿܢ ܦܘܼܪܥܵܢܵܐ ܕܝܵܪܬܘܼܬܵܐ، ܣܵܒܵܒ ܒܸܥܒ݂ܵܕܵܐ ܝܬܘܿܢ ܚܸܠܡܲܬ ܠܡܵܪܝܵܐ ܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ.
TRL: Bas di'moen dmin Maran bit qableetoon poer'ana dyartoeta, sabab bi'wada ytoon khilmat lmarya msheekha.
ENG: knowing that from the Lord ye shall receive the recompense of the inheritance: ye serve the Lord Christ.

ASY: ܐܝܼܢܵܐ ܗ̇ܘ ܕܥܵܒܹܕ ܓܢܵܗܵܐ، ܐܲܝܟ݂ ܓܢܵܗܹܗ ܒܸܬ ܦܵܐܹܫ ܦܪܝܼܥܵܐ، ܘܠܲܝܬ ܚܙܵܝܬܵܐ ܕܦܵܬܵܐ.
TRL: Eena haw d'abed gnaha, aykh gnaheh bit paesh pree'a, o layt khzayta dpata.
ENG: For he that doeth wrong shall receive again for the wrong that he hath done: and there is no respect of persons.

ASY: ܡܵܪ̈ܵܘܵܬܹܐ، ܥܒ݂ܘܿܕܘܼܢ ܫܵܘܝܘܼܬܵܐ ܘܟܹܐܢܘܼܬܵܐ ܠܥܲܒ݂ܕܵܘ̈ܟ݂ܘܿܢ، ܟܲܕ ܝܵܕܥܝܼܬܘܿܢ ܕܐܘܼܦ ܐܲܚܬܘܿܢ ܐܝܼܬ ܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܡܵܪܵܐ ܒܫܡܲܝܵܐ.
TRL: Marawate, 'woodoen shawyoeta o kenoeta l'awdawkhoon, kad yad'eetoon doep akhtoon eet lawkhoon mara bshmaya.
ENG: Masters, render unto your servants that which is just and equal; knowing that ye also have a Master in heaven.

ASY: ܗܘܹܝܡܘܼܢ ܒܨܠܘܿܬܵܐ ܒܟܠ ܙܲܒ݂ܢܵܐ، ܘܗܵܘܹܝܬܘܿܢ ܪܥܝܼܫܹܐ ܒܝܼܘܼܗ̇ ܘܫܲܟܘܼܪܹܐ.
TRL: Hweymoen bṣloota bkl zawna, o haweytoon r'eeshe beeoeha o shakoere.
ENG: Continue stedfastly in prayer, watching therein with thanksgiving;

ASY: ܨܲܠܹܝܡܘܼܢ ܐܘܼܦ ܒܘܼܬ ܕܝܼܲܢ، ܕܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ ܦܵܬܹܚ ܐܸܠܲܢ ܬܲܪܥܵܐ ܠܗܹܡܸܙܡܵܢ، ܕܗܲܡܙܸܡܲܚ ܐ݇ܪܵܙܵܐ ܕܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ، ܕܒܘܼܬ ܕܝܼܹܗ ܐܲܣܝܼܪܵܐ ܝܼܘܸܢ.
