TRL: Ṣaleymoen oep boet dee-an, dalaha patekh ilan tar'a lhemizman, dhamzimakh raza dmsheekha, dboet dee-eh aseera eewin.
ENG: withal praying for us also, that God may open unto us a door for the word, to speak the mystery of Christ, for which I am also in bonds;

ASY: ܥܒ݂ܘܿܕܘܼܢ ܐܵܗܵܐ ܕܓܵܠܹܝܢܹܗ ܐܲܫܟܵܪܵܐ ܘܗܲܡܙܸܡܸܢ ܒܘܼܬ ܕܝܼܹܗ ܐܲܝܟ݂ ܕܘܵܠܹܐ ܝܠܵܗ̇ ܐܸܠܝܼ.
TRL: 'woodoen aha dgaleyneh ashkara o hamzimin boet dee-eh aykh dwale-ylaha ilee.
ENG: that I may make it manifest, as I ought to speak.

ASY: ܗܘܹܝܡܘܼܢ ܚܲܟܝܼܡܹ̈ܐ ܠܟܸܣ ܐܵܢܝܼ ܕܝܼܢܵܐ ܡ̣ܢ ܠܒܲܕܲܪ، ܘܕܒ݂ܘܿܩܘܼܢ ܠܟܠ ܦܸܪܣܲܬ.
TRL: Hweymoen khakeeme lkis anee deena min lbadar, o dwooqoen lkl pirsat.
ENG: Walk in wisdom toward them that are without, redeeming the time.

ASY: ܒܟܠ ܙܲܒ݂ܢܵܐ ܗܵܘܝܵܐ ܗܹܡܸܙܡܵܢܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܡܠܝܼܬܵܐ ܡ̣ܢ ܫܵܦܵܩܲܬ، ܡܘܼܡܠܸܚܬܵܐ ܒܡܸܠܚܵܐ، ܕܝܵܕܥܝܼܬܘܿܢ ܕܵܐܟ݂ܝܼ ܓ̰ܲܘܸܒܝܼܬܘܿܢ ܠܟܠ ܚܲܕ ܐ݇ܢܵܫܵܐ.
TRL: Bkl zawna hawya hemizmanawkhoon mleeta min shapaqat, moemlikhta bmilkha, dyad'eetoon dakhee jawibeetoon lkl khad nasha.
ENG: Let your speech be always with grace, seasoned with salt, that ye may know how ye ought to answer each one.

ASY: ܟܠ ܡܸܢܕܝܼ ܒܘܼܬ ܕܝܼܝܼ ܒܸܬ ܡܲܕܸܥ ܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܛܘܼܟ݂ܝܼܩܘܿܣ، ܗ̇ܘ ܕܝܼܠܹܗ ܐܲܚܘܿܢܵܐ ܡܘܼܚܸܒܵܐ، ܘܡܫܲܡܫܵܢܵܐ ܡܗܘܼܡܢܵܐ، ܘܪܹܓܵܐ ܥܲܡܲܢ ܒܡܵܪܝܵܐ.
TRL: Kl mindee boet deeee bit madi' lawkhoon ṭoekheeqoos, haw deeleh akhoona moekhiba, o mshamshana mhoemna, o rega 'aman bmarya.
ENG: All my affairs shall Tychicus make known unto you, the beloved brother and faithful minister and fellow-servant in the Lord:

ASY: ܫܲܕܘܼܪܹܐ ܝܘܸܢ ܐܸܠܹܗ ܠܟܸܣ ܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܒܘܼܬ ܐܵܗܵܐ ܢܝܼܫܵܐ، ܕܝܵܕܥܝܼܬܘܿܢ ܐܲܗܘܵܠܵܬܲܢ̈ ܘܡܲܩܘܹܐ ܠܸܒܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ.
TRL: Shadoere ywin ileh lkis lawkhoon boet aha neesha, dyad'eetoon ahwalatan o maqwe libawkhoon.
ENG: whom I have sent unto you for this very purpose, that ye may know our estate, and that he may comfort your hearts;

ASY: ܒܹܐܬܵܝܵܐ ܝܠܹܗ ܥܲܡ ܐܵܢܹܣܝܼܡܘܿܣ، ܐܲܚܘܿܢܵܐ ܡܗܘܼܡܢܵܐ ܘܡܘܼܚܸܒܵܐ، ܗ̇ܘ ܕܝܼܠܹܗ ܚܲܕ ܡܸܢܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ. ܐܵܢܝܼ ܒܸܬ ܡܲܕܥܝܼ ܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܟܠ ܡܸܢܕܝܼ ܕܠܐܲܟ݂ܵܐ.
TRL: Betaya-yleh 'am aneseemoos, akhoona mhoemna o moekhiba, haw deeleh khad minawkhoon. Anee bit mad'ee lawkhoon kl mindee dlakha.
ENG: together with Onesimus, the faithful and beloved brother, who is one of you. They shall make known unto you all things that are done here.

ASY: ܒܝܼܵܗ݇ܒ݂ܵܐ ܝܠܹܗ ܫܠܵܡܵܐ ܐܸܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܐܵܪܸܣܛܲܪܟ݂ܘܿܣ، ܐܲܣܝܼܪܵܐ ܥܲܡܝܼ. ܒܝܼܵܗ݇ܒ݂ܵܐ ܝܠܹܗ ܫܠܵܡܵܐ ܐܸܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ، ܘܐܘܼܦ ܡܵܪܩܘܿܣ، ܒܪܘܿܢܵܐ ܕܚܵܬܵܐ ܕܒܲܪܢܒ݂ܵܐ. ܦܝܼܫ ܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܦܩܝܼܕܹܐ ܒܘܼܬ ܡܵܪܩܘܿܣ، ܕܐܸܢ ܐ݇ܬܹܐ ܠܹܗ ܠܟܸܣ ܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ، ܩܲܒܠܝܼܬܘܿܢ ܠܹܗ.
TRL: Beeawa-yleh shlama ilawkhoon arisṭarkhoos, aseera 'amee. Beeawa-yleh shlama ilawkhoon, o oep marqoos, broona dkhata dbarnwa. Peesh lawkhoon pqeede boet marqoos, din te-leh lkis lawkhoon, qableetoon-leh.
ENG: Aristarchus my fellow-prisoner saluteth you, and Mark, the cousin of Barnabas (touching whom ye received commandments; if he come unto you, receive him),

ASY: ܒܝܼܵܗ݇ܒ݂ܵܐ ܝܠܹܗ ܫܠܵܡܵܐ ܐܸܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܝܼܫܘܿܥ، ܗ̇ܘ ܕܟܹܐ ܦܵܐܹܫ ܩܸܪܝܵܐ ܝܘܼܣܛܘܿܣ. ܐܲܚܟ̰ܝܼ ܐܲܢܹܐ ܝܗܘܼܕܵܝܹ̈ܐ ܝܢܵܐ ܕܝܼܢܵܐ ܦܲܠܵܚܹ̈ܐ ܥܲܡܝܼ ܩܵܐ ܡܲܠܟܘܼܬܵܐ ܕܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ، ܘܝܲܗ݇ܒܲܠܬܵܐ ܕܠܸܒܵܐ ܐܸܠܝܼ.
TRL: Beeawa-yleh shlama ilawkhoon eeshoo', haw dke paesh qirya yoesṭoos. Akhchee ane yhoedaye yna deena palakhe 'amee qa malkoeta dalaha, o yabalta dliba ilee.
ENG: and Jesus, which is called Justus, who are of the circumcision: these only are my fellow-workers unto the kingdom of God, men that have been a comfort unto me.

ASY: ܒܝܼܵܗ݇ܒ݂ܵܐ ܝܠܹܗ ܫܠܵܡܵܐ ܐܸܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܐܲܦܵܦܪܵܐ، ܗ̇ܘ ܕܝܼܠܹܗ ܚܲܕ ܡܸܢܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ، ܘܪܹܓܵܐ ܕܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ. ܒܟܠ ܙܲܒ݂ܢܵܐ ܓܵܘ ܐܵܓ݂ܘܿܢܵܐ ܝܠܹܗ ܒܨܠܘܿܬܵܐ ܒܘܼܬ ܕܝܼܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ، ܕܗܵܘܹܝܬܘܿܢ ܟܸܠܝܹܐ ܓܡܝܼܪܹ̈ܐ ܘܟܡܝܼܠܹ̈ܐ ܒܨܸܒ݂ܝܵܢܵܐ ܕܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ.
TRL: Beeawa-yleh shlama ilawkhoon apapra, haw deeleh khad minawkhoon, o rega dmsheekha. Bkl zawna gaw aghoona-yleh bṣloota boet deeawkhoon, dhaweytoon kilye gmeere o kmeele bṣiwyana dalaha.
ENG: Epaphras, who is one of you, a servant of Christ Jesus, saluteth you, always striving for you in his prayers, that ye may stand perfect and fully assured in all the will of God.

ASY: ܐܵܢܵܐ ܒܸܣܗܵܕܵܐ ܝܘܸܢ ܒܘܼܬ ܕܝܼܹܗ ܕܪܵܒܵܐ ܒܸܟܟ̰ܵܚܵܐ ܝܠܹܗ ܒܘܼܬ ܕܝܼܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܘܒܘܼܬ ܐܵܢܝܼ ܕܓܵܘ ܠܵܕܝܼܩܝܼܵܐ ܘܕܓܵܘ ܐܝܼܪܵܦܘܿܠܝܼܣ.
TRL: Ana bishada ywin boet dee-eh draba bikchakha-yleh boet deeawkhoon o boet anee dgaw ladeeqeea o dgaw eerapoolees.
ENG: For I bear him witness, that he hath much labour for you, and for them in Laodicea, and for them in Hierapolis.

ASY: ܒܝܼܵܗ݇ܒ݂ܵܐ ܝܠܹܗ ܫܠܵܡܵܐ ܐܸܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܠܘܼܩܵܐ، ܐܵܣܝܵܐ ܡܘܼܚܸܒܵܐ، ܘܐܘܼܦ ܕܹܐܡܵܐ.
TRL: Beeawa-yleh shlama ilawkhoon loeqa, asya moekhiba, o oep dema.
ENG: Luke, the beloved physician, and Demas salute you.

ASY: ܗܲܒ݂݇ܠܘܼܢ ܫܠܵܡܵܐ ܠܐܲܚܘܿܢܘܵܬܹ̈ܐ ܕܝܼܢܵܐ ܓܵܘ ܠܵܕܝܼܩܝܼܵܐ، ܘܠܢܘܼܡܦܹܐ، ܘܠܥܹܕܬܵܐ ܕܓܵܘ ܒܲܝܬܘܼܗ̇.
TRL: Haloen shlama lakhoonwate deena gaw ladeeqeea, o lnoempe, o l'edta dgaw baytoeha.
ENG: Salute the brethren that are in Laodicea, and Nymphas, and the church that is in their house.

ASY: ܐܝܼܡܲܢ ܕܦܵܝܫܵܐ ܩܪܝܼܬܵܐ ܐܵܗܵܐ ܐܸܓܲܪܬܵܐ ܩܵܬܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ، ܚܙܹܝܡܘܼܢ ܕܦܵܝܫܵܐ ܩܪܝܼܬܵܐ ܐܘܼܦ ܓܵܘ ܥܹܕܬܵܐ ܕܠܵܕܝܼܩܵܝܹ̈ܐ؛ ܘܗ̇ܝ ܐܸܓܲܪܬܵܐ ܕܡ̣ܢ ܠܵܕܝܼܩܝܼܵܐ ܩܵܪܹܝܬܘܿܢ ܠܵܗ̇ ܐܲܚܬܘܿܢ.
TRL: Eeman dpaysha qreeta aha igarta qatawkhoon, khzeymoen dpaysha qreeta oep gaw 'edta dladeeqaye; o hay igarta dmin ladeeqeea qareytoon-laha akhtoon.
ENG: And when this epistle hath been read among you, cause that it be read also in the church of the Laodiceans; and that ye also read the epistle from Laodicea.

ASY: ܘܐ݇ܡܘܿܪܘܼܢ ܠܐܲܪܟܝܼܦܘܿܣ، ”ܗܘܝܼ ܗܸܫܝܵܪ ܕܬܲܡܸܡܸܬ ܠܚܸܠܡܲܬ ܕܩܘܼܒܸܠ ܠܘܼܟ݂ ܒܡܵܪܲܢ.“
TRL: O mooroen larkeepoos, ”hwee hishyar dtamimit lkhilmat dqoebil-loekh bmaran.“
ENG: And say to Archippus, Take heed to the ministry which thou hast received in the Lord, that thou fulfill it.

ASY: ܐܵܢܵܐ ܦܵܘܠܘܿܣ ܒܐܝܼܕܵܐ ܕܓܵܢܝܼ ܒܸܟܬܵܒ݂ܵܐ ܝܘܸܢ ܐܵܗܵܐ ܫܠܵܡܵܐ. ܕܟ݂ܘܿܪܘܼܢ ܠܐܸܣܘܼܪ̈ܝܼ. ܫܵܦܵܩܲܬ ܥܲܡܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ. ܐܵܡܹܝܢ.
TRL: Ana pawloos beeda dganee biktawa ywin aha shlama. Dkhooroen lisoeree. Shapaqat 'amawkhoon. Ameyn.
ENG: The salutation of me Paul with mine own hand. Remember my bonds. Grace be with you.

ASY: ܦܵܘܠܘܿܣ ܘܣܸܠܘܵܢܘܿܣ ܘܛܝܼܡܵܬܹܐܘܿܣ، ܠܥܹܕܬܵܐ ܕܬܹܣܵܠܘܿܢܝܼܩܵܝܹ̈ܐ ܕܝܼܢܵܐ ܒܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ ܒܵܒܵܐ ܘܒܡܵܪܲܢ ܝܼܫܘܿܥ ܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ: ܫܵܦܵܩܲܬ ܘܫܠܵܡܵܐ ܐܸܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ.
TRL: Pawloos o silwanoos o ṭeemateoos, l'edta dtesalooneeqaye deena balaha baba o bmaran eeshoo' msheekha: shapaqat o shlama ilawkhoon.
ENG: Paul, and Silvanus, and Timothy, unto the church of the Thessalonians in God the Father and the Lord Jesus Christ: Grace to you and peace.

ASY: ܫܲܟܘܼܪܹܐ ܝܘܲܚ ܠܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ ܒܟܠ ܙܲܒ݂ܢܵܐ ܒܘܼܬ ܟܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ، ܘܒܸܕܟ݂ܵܪܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܝܼܘܲܚ ܒܨܠܵܘܵܬܲܢ̈.
TRL: Shakoere ywakh lalaha bkl zawna boet klawkhoon, o bidkharawkhoon eewakh bṣlawatan.
ENG: We give thanks to God always for you all, making mention of you in our prayers;

ASY: ܕܠܵܐ ܫܠܵܝܬܵܐ ܒܸܕܟ݂ܵܪܵܐ ܝܘܲܚ ܩܵܕ݇ܡ ܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ ܒܵܒܲܢ ܦܘܼܠܚܵܢܵܐ ܕܗܲܝܡܵܢܘܼܬܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ، ܘܥܲܡܠܵܐ ܕܚܘܼܒܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ، ܘܚܡܵܠܬܵܐ ܕܗܹܒ݂ܝܼܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܒܡܵܪܲܢ ܝܼܫܘܿܥ ܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ.
TRL: Dla shlayta bidkhara ywakh qam Alaha baban poelkhana dhaymanoetawkhoon, o 'amla dkhoebawkhoon, o khmalta dheweeawkhoon bmaran eeshoo' msheekha.
ENG: remembering without ceasing your work of faith and labour of love and patience of hope in our Lord Jesus Christ, before our God and Father;

ASY: ܐܲܚܘܿܢܘܵܬܹ̈ܐ ܡܘܼܚܸܒܹ̈ܐ ܒܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ، ܒܝܼܕܵܥܵܐ ܝܘܲܚ ܕܗ̇ܘ ܩܲܡ ܓܲܒܹܐ ܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ،
TRL: Akhoonwate moekhibe balaha, beeda'a ywakh dhaw qam gabe lawkhoon,
ENG: knowing, brethren beloved of God, your election,

ASY: ܣܵܒܵܒ ܡܲܟܪܲܙܬܲܢ ܠܵܐ ܗܘܹܐ ܠܵܗ̇ ܐܸܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܒܗܹܡܸܙܡܵܢ ܐܲܚܟ̰ܝܼ، ܐܸܠܵܐ ܐܘܼܦ ܒܚܲܝܠܵܐ، ܘܒܪܘܼܚܵܐ ܕܩܘܼܕܫܵܐ، ܘܒܚܵܬܸܪܓ̰ܲܡܥܘܼܬܵܐ ܓܘܼܪܬܵܐ؛ ܐܲܝܟ݂ ܕܒܝܼܕܵܥܵܐ ܝܬܘܿܢ ܕܵܐܟ݂ܝܼ ܚܝܹܐ ܠܲܢ ܓܵܘܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܒܘܼܬ ܕܝܼܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ.
TRL: Sabab makraztan la hwe-laha ilawkhoon bhemizman akhchee, ila oep bkhayla, o broekha dqoedsha, o bkhatirjam'oeta goerta; aykh dbeeda'a ytoon dakhee khye lan gawawkhoon boet deeawkhoon.
ENG: how that our gospel came not unto you in word only, but also in power, and in the Holy Ghost, and in much assurance; even as ye know what manner of men we shewed ourselves toward you for your sake.

ASY: ܘܐܲܚܬܘܿܢ ܗܘܹܐ ܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܕܵܡܝܵܢܹ̈ܐ ܥܲܠܲܢ ܘܠܡܵܪܲܢ، ܟܲܕ ܩܘܼܒܸܠ ܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܗܹܡܸܙܡܵܢ ܒܐܘܼܠܨܵܢܵܐ ܓܘܼܪܵܐ، ܒܚܲܕܘܼܬܵܐ ܕܪܘܼܚܵܐ ܕܩܘܼܕܫܵܐ.
TRL: O akhtoon hwe lawkhoon damyane 'alan o lmaran, kad qoebil lawkhoon hemizman boelṣana goera, bkhadoeta droekha dqoedsha.
ENG: And ye became imitators of us, and of the Lord, having received the word in much affliction, with joy of the Holy Ghost;

ASY: ܗܲܕܟ݂ܵܐ ܕܗܘܹܐ ܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܛܘܼܦ̮ܣܵܐ ܠܟܠܲܝܗܝ ܡܗܘܼܡܢܹ̈ܐ ܕܓܵܘ ܡܵܩܹܕܘܿܢܝܼܵܐ ܘܕܐܵܟ݂ܵܐܝܼܵܐ.
TRL: Hadkha dhwe lawkhoon ṭoewsa lklayhy mhoemne dgaw maqedooneea o dakhaeea.
ENG: so that ye became an ensample to all that believe in Macedonia and in Achaia.

ASY: ܣܵܒܵܒ ܡܸܢܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܦܝܼܫ ܠܵܗ̇ ܫܡܝܼܥܬܵܐ ܗܹܡܸܙܡܵܢ ܕܡܵܪܲܢ، ܠܵܐ ܐܲܚܟ̰ܝܼ ܓܵܘ ܡܵܩܹܕܘܿܢܝܼܵܐ ܘܐܵܟ݂ܵܐܝܼܵܐ، ܐܸܠܵܐ ܒܟܠ ܕܘܼܟܵܐ ܦܪܝܼܣ ܠܵܗ̇ ܗܲܝܡܵܢܘܼܬܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܒܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ، ܗܲܕܟ݂ܵܐ ܕܠܹܐ ܝܠܵܗ̇ ܣܢܝܼܩܬܵܐ ܕܗܲܡܙܸܡܲܚ ܙܵܘܕܵܐ ܒܘܼܬ ܕܝܼܘܼܗ̇.
TRL: Sabab minawkhoon peesh-laha shmee'ta hemizman dmaran, la akhchee gaw maqedooneea o akhaeea, ila bkl doeka prees-laha haymanoetawkhoon balaha, hadkha dle-ylaha sneeqta dhamzimakh zawda boet deeoeha.
ENG: For from you hath sounded forth the word of the Lord, not only in Macedonia and Achaia, but in every place your faith to God-ward is gone forth; so that we need not to speak anything.

ASY: ܣܵܒܵܒ ܐܵܢܝܼ ܒܓܵܢܲܝܗܝ ܡܘܼܚܒܸܪܗܘܿܢ ܕܵܐܟ݂ܝܼ ܩܲܡ ܩܲܒܠܝܼܬܘܿܢ ܠܲܢ، ܘܕܵܐܟ݂ܝܼ ܕܝܼܪܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܠܟܸܣ ܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ ܡ̣ܢ ܨܵܢܲܡܹ̈ܐ، ܕܥܵܒ݂ܕܝܼܬܘܿܢ ܚܸܠܡܲܬ ܠܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ ܚܵܝܵܐ ܘܫܲܪܝܼܪܵܐ،
TRL: Sabab anee bganayhy moekhbirhoon dakhee qam qableetoon lan, o dakhee deerawkhoon lkis Alaha min ṣaname, d'awdeetoon khilmat lalaha khaya o shareera,
ENG: For they themselves report concerning us what manner of entering in we had unto you; and how ye turned unto God from idols, to serve a living and true God,

ASY: ܘܕܣܵܦܪܝܼܬܘܿܢ ܠܒܪܘܿܢܹܗ ܡ̣ܢ ܫܡܲܝܵܐ، ܠܝܼܫܘܿܥ، ܗ̇ܘ ܕܡܘܼܩܸܡ ܠܹܗ ܡ̣ܢ ܡܝܼܬܹ̈ܐ، ܗ̇ܘ ܕܟܹܐ ܦܲܨܹܐ ܠܲܢ ܡ̣ܢ ܟܲܪܒܵܐ ܕܒܹܐܬܵܝܵܐ ܝܠܵܗ̇.
TRL: O dsapreetoon lbrooneh min shmaya, leeshoo', haw dmoeqim-leh min meete, haw dke paṣe lan min karba dbetaya-ylaha.
ENG: and to wait for his Son from heaven, whom he raised from the dead, even Jesus, which delivereth us from the wrath to come.

ASY: ܐܲܚܘܿܢܘܵܬܹ̈ܐ، ܐܲܚܬܘܿܢ ܟܹܐ ܝܵܕܥܝܼܬܘܿܢ ܕܐ݇ܬܵܝܬܲܢ ܠܟܸܣ ܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܠܹܐ ܝܠܵܗ̇ ܗܘܝܼܬܵܐ ܕܠܵܐ ܝܘܼܬܪܵܢܵܐ.
TRL: Akhoonwate, akhtoon ke yad'eetoon dtaytan lkis lawkhoon le-ylaha hweeta dla yoetrana.
ENG: For yourselves, brethren, know our entering in unto you, that it hath not been found vain:

ASY: ܐܘܼܦ ܐܸܢ ܕܓ̰ܘܼܢܓ̰ܸܪܲܢ ܘܦܝܼܫ ܠܲܢ ܡܘܼܣܠܝܼܹܐ ܓܵܘ ܦܝܼܠܝܼܦܘܿܣ، ܐܲܝܟ݂ ܕܟܹܐ ܝܵܕܥܝܼܬܘܿܢ، ܐܝܼܢܵܐ ܕܠܵܐ ܙܕܘܼܥܬܵܐ ܘܒܐܵܓ݂ܘܿܢܵܐ ܓܘܼܪܵܐ ܩܘܼܫܕܸܪܲܢ ܕܗܲܡܙܸܡܲܚ ܐܸܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܐܹܘܲܢܓܲܠܝܼܘܿܢ ܕܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ.
TRL: Oep in djoenjiran o peesh lan moeslee-e gaw peeleepoos, aykh dke yad'eetoon, eena dla zdoe'ta o baghoona goera qoeshdiran dhamzimakh ilawkhoon ewangaleeoon dalaha.
ENG: but having suffered before, and been shamefully entreated, as ye know, at Philippi, we waxed bold in our God to speak unto you the gospel of God in much conflict.

ASY: ܣܵܒܵܒ ܢܵܨܝܼܗܲܬܲܢ ܠܹܐ ܝܠܵܗ̇ ܡ̣ܢ ܚܸܠܛܸܢܝܘܼܬܵܐ ܘܠܵܐ ܡ̣ܢ ܛܲܢܦܘܼܬܵܐ، ܘܐܵܦܠܵܐ ܒܦܸܠܡܵܐ،
TRL: Sabab naṣeehatan le-ylaha min khilṭinyoeta o la min ṭanpoeta, o apla bpilma,
ENG: For our exhortation is not of error, nor of uncleanness, nor in guile:

ASY: ܐܝܼܢܵܐ ܐܲܝܟ݂ ܕܦܝܼܫܹܐ ܝܘܲܚ ܡܘܼܚܫܸܚܹܐ ܒܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ ܕܦܵܐܹܫ ܣܘܼܦܝܵܐ ܒܝܼܲܢ ܐܹܘܲܢܓܲܠܝܼܘܿܢ، ܗܲܕܟ݂ܵܐ ܗܲܡܙܘܼܡܹܐ ܝܘܲܚ؛ ܠܵܐ ܕܫܵܦܪܲܚ ܠܒܢܲܝ̈ܢܵܫܵܐ، ܐܸܠܵܐ ܠܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ، ܒܲܚܪܵܢܵܐ ܕܠܸܒܲܢ.
TRL: Eena aykh dpeeshe ywakh moekhshikhe balaha dpaesh soepya bee-an ewangaleeoon, hadkha hamzoeme ywakh; la dshaprakh lbnaynasha, ila lalaha, bakhrana dliban.
ENG: but even as we have been approved of God to be intrusted with the gospel, so we speak; not as pleasing men, but God which proveth our hearts.

ASY: ܣܵܒܵܒ ܟܹܐ ܝܵܕܥܝܼܬܘܿܢ ܒܗܸܟ̃ ܥܕܵܢܵܐ ܠܹܐ ܝܘܲܚ ܐ݇ܬܝܼܹܐ ܒܗܹܡܸܙܡܵܢܹ̈ܐ ܕܫܵܕܲܠܬܵܐ، ܘܠܵܐ ܒܡܵܗܵܢܵܐ ܠܛܲܡܲܥܟܵܪܘܼܬܵܐ؛ ܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ ܣܵܗܕܵܐ ܝܠܹܗ.
TRL: Sabab ke yad'eetoon bhich 'dana le ywakh tee-e bhemizmane dshadalta, o la bmahana lṭama'karoeta; Alaha sahda-yleh.
ENG: For neither at any time were we found using words of flattery, as ye know, nor a cloke of covetousness, God is witness;

ASY: ܘܠܵܐ ܛܥܹܐ ܠܲܢ ܚܸܩܪܵܐ ܡ̣ܢ ܒܢܲܝ̈ܢܵܫܵܐ، ܠܵܐ ܡܸܢܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܘܠܵܐ ܡ̣ܢ ܐ݇ܚܹܪ̈݇ܢܹܐ، ܐܘܼܦ ܐܸܢ ܐܲܝܟ݂ ܫܠܝܼܚܹ̈ܐ ܕܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ ܟܹܐ ܡܵܨܲܚ ܗ݇ܘܵܘ ܗܵܘܲܚ ܗ݇ܘܵܘ ܝܘܼܩܪܵܐ ܥܲܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ،
TRL: O la ṭ'e lan khiqra min bnaynasha, la minawkhoon o la min khene, oep in aykh shleekhe dmsheekha ke maṣakh waw hawakh waw yoeqra 'alawkhoon,
ENG: nor seeking glory of men, neither from you, nor from others, when we might have been burdensome, as apostles of Christ.

ASY: ܐܝܼܢܵܐ ܗܘܹܐ ܠܲܢ ܡܲܟܝܼܟܹ̈ܐ ܓܵܘܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܐܲܝܟ݂ ܡܪܲܒܝܵܢܬܵܐ ܕܬܲܓܒܸܪܵܐ ܝܵܠܕ݇ܘܼ̈ܗ̇ ܙܥܘܿܪܹ̈ܐ.
TRL: Eena hwe lan makeeke gawawkhoon aykh mrabyanta dtagbira yaloeha z'oore.
ENG: But we were gentle in the midst of you, as when a nurse cherisheth her own children:

ASY: ܗܲܕܟ݂ܵܐ ܡܘܼܚܸܒ ܠܲܢ ܐܸܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܕܒܣܝܼܡ ܠܵܗ̇ ܠܲܢ ܕܝܵܗ݇ܒܲܚ ܗ݇ܘܵܘ ܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܠܵܐ ܐܲܚܟ̰ܝܼ ܐܹܘܲܢܓܲܠܝܼܘܿܢ ܕܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ ܐܝܼܢܵܐ ܐܘܼܦ ܓܵܢܵܬܲܢ̈، ܣܵܒܵܒ ܦܝܼܫ ܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܡܘܼܚܸܒܹܐ ܒܝܼܲܢ.
TRL: Hadkha moekhib lan ilawkhoon dbseem-laha lan dyabakh waw lawkhoon la akhchee ewangaleeoon dalaha eena oep ganatan, sabab peesh lawkhoon moekhibe bee-an.
ENG: even so, being affectionately desirous of you, we were well pleased to impart unto you, not the gospel of God only, but also our own souls, because ye were become very dear to us.

ASY: ܣܵܒܵܒ ܒܸܕܟ݂ܵܪܵܐ ܝܬܘܿܢ ܐܲܚܘܿܢܘܵܬܝܼ̈، ܠܓ̰ܗܵܝܬܲܢ ܘܠܥܲܡܠܲܢ، ܟܲܕ ܒܸܦܠܵܚܵܐ ܒܠܲܝܠܹܐ ܘܒܐܝܼܡܵܡܵܐ، ܕܠܵܐ ܥܵܒ݂ܕܲܚ ܗ݇ܘܵܘ ܝܘܼܩܪܵܐ ܥܲܠ ܚܲܕ ܡܸܢܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ، ܐܝܼܡܲܢ ܕܡܘܼܟܪܸܙ ܠܲܢ ܐܸܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܐܹܘܲܢܓܲܠܝܼܘܿܢ ܕܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ.
TRL: Sabab bidkhara ytoon akhoonwatee, ljhaytan o l'amlan, kad biplakha blayle o beemama, dla 'awdakh waw yoeqra 'al khad minawkhoon, eeman dmoekriz lan ilawkhoon ewangaleeoon dalaha.
ENG: For ye remember, brethren, our labour and travail: working night and day, that we might not burden any of you, we preached unto you the gospel of God.

ASY: ܐܲܚܬܘܿܢ ܣܵܗܕܹ̈ܐ ܝܬܘܿܢ، ܘܐܘܼܦ ܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ، ܕܵܐܟ݂ܝܼ ܒܩܲܕܝܼܫܘܼܬܵܐ ܘܒܙܲܕܝܼܩܘܼܬܵܐ ܘܕܠܵܐ ܡܘܼܡܵܐ ܗܘܹܐ ܠܲܢ ܠܟܸܣ ܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ، ܐܲܚܬܘܿܢ ܗܲܡܸܢܵܢܹ̈ܐ.
TRL: Akhtoon sahde ytoon, o oep Alaha, dakhee bqadeeshoeta o bzadeeqoeta o dla moema hwe lan lkis lawkhoon, akhtoon haminane.
ENG: Ye are witnesses, and God also, how holily and righteously and unblameably we behaved ourselves toward you that believe:

ASY: ܐܲܝܟ݂ ܕܟܹܐ ܝܵܕܥܝܼܬܘܿܢ ܕܵܐܟ݂ܝܼ ܦܘܼܪܦܸܠ ܠܲܢ ܘܝܘܼܗ݇ܒܸܠ ܠܲܢ ܒܘܼܝܵܐܵܐ ܠܟܠ ܚܲܕ ܡܸܢܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܐܲܝܟ݂ ܒܵܒܵܐ ܠܝܵܠܕ݇ܘܼ̈ܗܝ،
TRL: Aykh dke yad'eetoon dakhee poerpil lan o yoebil lan boeyaa lkl khad minawkhoon aykh baba lyaloehy,
ENG: as ye know how we dealt with each one of you, as a father with his own children, exhorting you, and encouraging you, and testifying,

ASY: ܘܚܘܼܦܸܛ ܠܲܢ ܐܸܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܕܚܵܕܪܝܼܬܘܿܢ ܐܲܝܟ݂ ܕܚܵܫܚܵܐ ܠܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ، ܗ̇ܘ ܕܩܲܡ ܩܵܪܹܐ ܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܠܡܲܠܟܘܼܬܹܗ ܘܠܚܸܩܪܹܗ.
TRL: O khoepiṭ lan ilawkhoon dkhadreetoon aykh dkhashkha lalaha, haw dqam qare lawkhoon lmalkoeteh o lkhiqreh.
ENG: to the end that ye should walk worthily of God, who calleth you into his own kingdom and glory.

ASY: ܒܘܼܬ ܐܵܗܵܐ ܐܘܼܦ ܐܲܚܢܲܢ ܐܲܡܝܼܢܵܐܝܼܬ ܫܲܟܘܼܪܹܐ ܝܘܲܚ ܠܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ، ܣܵܒܵܒ ܐܝܼܡܲܢ ܕܩܘܼܒܠܵܐ ܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܗܹܡܸܙܡܵܢ ܕܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ ܕܫܡܝܼܥ ܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܡܸܢܲܢ، ܩܘܼܒܠܵܐ ܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܠܵܐ ܐܲܝܟ݂ ܗܹܡܸܙܡܵܢ ܕܒܢܲܝ̈ܢܵܫܵܐ، ܐܝܼܢܵܐ ܐܲܝܟ݂ ܕܝܼܠܵܗ̇ ܗܹܡܸܙܡܵܢ ܫܲܪܝܼܪܬܵܐ ܕܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ ܘܕܒܸܦܠܵܚܵܐ ܝܠܵܗ̇ ܓܵܘܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ، ܐܲܚܬܘܿܢ ܕܗܘܼܡܸܢܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ.
TRL: Boet aha oep akhnan ameenaeet shakoere ywakh lalaha, sabab eeman dqoebla lawkhoon hemizman dalaha dshmee' lawkhoon minan, qoebla lawkhoon la aykh hemizman dbnaynasha, eena aykh deelaha hemizman shareerta dalaha o dbiplakha-ylaha gawawkhoon, akhtoon dhoeminawkhoon.
ENG: And for this cause we also thank God without ceasing, that, when ye received from us the word of the message, even the word of God, ye accepted it not as the word of men, but, as it is in truth, the word of God, which also worketh in you that believe.

ASY: ܣܵܒܵܒ ܐܲܚܬܘܿܢ، ܐܲܚܘܿܢܘܵܬܝܼ̈، ܗܘܹܐ ܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܕܵܡܝܵܢܹ̈ܐ ܠܥܹܕܵܬܹ̈ܐ ܕܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ ܒܝܼܫܘܿܥ ܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ ܕܝܼܢܵܐ ܒܝܼܗܘܼܕ، ܣܵܒܵܒ ܐܘܼܦ ܐܲܚܬܘܿܢ ܓ̰ܘܼܢܓ̰ܸܪܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܡ̣ܢ ܒܢܲܝ̈ ܓܸܢܣܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܐܲܝܟ݂ ܕܐܘܼܦ ܐܵܢܝܼ ܓ̰ܘܼܢܓ̰ܸܪܗܘܿܢ ܡ̣ܢ ܝܗܘܼܕܵܝܹ̈ܐ،
TRL: Sabab akhtoon, akhoonwatee, hwe lawkhoon damyane l'edate dalaha beeshoo' msheekha deena beehoed, sabab oep akhtoon joenjirawkhoon min bnay ginsawkhoon aykh doep anee joenjirhoon min yhoedaye,
ENG: For ye, brethren, became imitators of the churches of God which are in Judaea in Christ Jesus: for ye also suffered the same things of your own countrymen, even as they did of the Jews;

ASY: ܐܵܢܝܼ ܕܩܛܝܼܠ ܠܗܘܿܢ ܠܡܵܪܲܢ ܝܼܫܘܿܥ ܘܠܢܒ݂ܝܼܹ̈ܐ، ܘܛܪܝܼܕ ܠܗܘܿܢ ܐܘܼܦ ܐܸܠܲܢ. ܠܹܐ ܫܵܦܪܝܼ ܠܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ، ܘܕܲܠܩܘܼܒ݂ܠ ܝܼܢܵܐ ܕܟܠܲܝܗܝ ܒܢܲܝ̈ܢܵܫܵܐ.
TRL: Anee dqṭeel-lhoon lmaran eeshoo' o lnwee-e, o ṭreed-lhoon oep ilan. Le shapree lalaha, o dalqoewl eena dklayhy bnaynasha.
ENG: who both killed the Lord Jesus and the prophets, and drave out us, and please not God, and are contrary to all men;

ASY: ܡܲܟܠܘܼܝܲܢ ܝܼܢܵܐ ܕܠܵܐ ܗܲܡܙܸܡܲܚ ܠܐܸܡܘܵܬܹ̈ܐ ܕܦܵܪܩܝܼ. ܒܐܵܗܵܐ ܐܘܼܪܚܵܐ ܡܲܙܝܘܼܕܹܐ ܝܢܵܐ ܚܛܝܼܵܬܲܝ̈ܗܝ ܒܟܠ ܙܲܒ݂ܢܵܐ. ܐܝܼܢܵܐ ܟܲܪܒܵܐ ܕܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ ܐ݇ܬܹܐ ܠܵܗ̇ ܥܲܠܲܝܗܝ ܒܚܲܪܬܵܐ.
TRL: Makloeyan eena dla hamzimakh limwate dparqee. Baha oerkha mazyoede yna khṭeeatayhy bkl zawna. Eena karba dalaha te-laha 'alayhy bkharta.
ENG: forbidding us to speak to the Gentiles that they may be saved; to fill up their sins alway: but the wrath is come upon them to the uttermost.

ASY: ܐܝܼܢܵܐ ܐܲܚܢܲܢ، ܐܲܚܘܿܢܘܵܬܝܼ̈، ܐܝܼܡܲܢ ܕܦܪܝܼܫ ܠܲܢ ܡܸܢܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܩܵܐ ܚܲܕ ܙܲܒ݂ܢܵܐ ܟܸܪܝܵܐ، ܒܦܲܓ݂ܪܵܐ ܘܠܵܐ ܒܠܸܒܵܐ، ܒܘܼܫ ܙܵܘܕܵܐ ܚܘܼܦܸܛ ܠܲܢ ܕܚܵܙܲܚ ܗ݇ܘܵܘ ܦܲܪܨܘܿܦܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܒܫܲܗܘܲܬܬܵܐ ܓܘܼܪܬܵܐ.
TRL: Eena akhnan, akhoonwatee, eeman dpreesh lan minawkhoon qa khad zawna kirya, bpaghra o la bliba, boesh zawda khoepiṭ lan dkhazakh waw parṣoopawkhoon bshahwatta goerta.
ENG: But we, brethren, being bereaved of you for a short season, in presence, not in heart, endeavoured the more exceedingly to see your face with great desire:

ASY: ܣܵܒܵܒ ܒܥܹܐ ܠܲܢ ܠܹܐܬܵܝܵܐ ܠܟܸܣ ܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ، ܫܲܪܝܼܪܵܐܝܼܬ ܐܵܢܵܐ ܦܵܘܠܘܿܣ ܒܥܹܐ ܠܝܼ، ܒܘܼܫ ܙܵܘܕܵܐ ܡ̣ܢ ܚܕܵܐ ܓܵܗܵܐ، ܐܝܼܢܵܐ ܡܘܼܟܠܝܼܲܚ ܠܹܗ ܣܵܛܵܢܵܐ.
TRL: Sabab b'e lan letaya lkis lawkhoon, shareeraeet ana pawloos b'e-lee, boesh zawda min khda gaha, eena moeklee-akh-leh saṭana.
ENG: because we would fain have come unto you, I Paul once and again; and Satan hindered us.

ASY: ܣܵܒܵܒ ܡܘܿܕܝܼ ܝܠܵܗ̇ ܗܹܒ݂ܝܼܲܢ ܘܚܲܕܘܼܬܲܢ، ܘܡܘܿܕܝܼ ܝܠܹܗ ܟܠܝܼܠܵܐ ܕܫܘܼܒ݂ܗܵܪܲܢ ܩܵܕ݇ܡ ܡܵܪܲܢ ܝܼܫܘܿܥ ܐܝܼܡܲܢ ܕܐܵܬܹܐ؟ ܠܹܐ ܝܬܘܿܢ ܐܲܚܬܘܿܢ؟
TRL: Sabab moodee-ylaha hewee-an o khadoetan, o moodee-yleh kleela dshoewharan qam Maran eeshoo' eeman date? Le ytoon akhtoon?
ENG: For what is our hope, or joy, or crown of glorying? Are not even ye, before our Lord Jesus at his coming?

ASY: ܗܹܐ، ܐܲܚܬܘܿܢ ܝܼܬܘܿܢ ܚܸܩܪܲܢ ܘܚܲܕܘܼܬܲܢ.
TRL: He, akhtoon eetoon khiqran o khadoetan.
ENG: For ye are our glory and our joy.

ASY: ܗܲܕܟ݂ܵܐ ܐܝܼܡܲܢ ܕܠܵܐ ܡܨܹܐ ܠܲܢ ܠܸܚܡܵܠܵܐ ܒܘܼܫ ܙܵܘܕܵܐ، ܒܣܝܼܡ ܠܵܗ̇ ܠܲܢ ܕܦܵܝܫܲܚ ܗ݇ܘܵܘ ܫܒ݂ܝܼܩܹܐ ܒܢܲܦ̮ܫܲܢ ܓܵܘ ܐܵܬܹܢܘܿܣ.
TRL: Hadkha eeman dla mṣe lan likhmala boesh zawda, bseem-laha lan dpayshakh waw shweeqe bnawshan gaw atenoos.
ENG: Wherefore when we could no longer forbear, we thought it good to be left behind at Athens alone;

ASY: ܒܘܼܬ ܐܵܗܵܐ ܫܘܼܕܸܪܲܢ ܠܛܝܼܡܵܬܹܐܘܿܣ ܐܲܚܘܿܢܲܢ ܘܦܲܠܵܚܵܐ ܕܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ ܥܲܡܲܢ ܒܐܹܘܲܢܓܲܠܝܼܘܿܢ ܕܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ، ܕܡܲܩܘܹܐ ܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܘܝܲܗ݇ܒܸܠ ܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܠܸܒܵܐ ܒܗܲܝܡܵܢܘܼܬܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ،
TRL: Boet aha shoediran lṭeemateoos akhoonan o palakha dalaha 'aman bewangaleeoon dmsheekha, dmaqwe lawkhoon o yabil lawkhoon liba bhaymanoetawkhoon,
ENG: and sent Timothy, our brother and God’s minister in the gospel of Christ, to establish you, and to comfort you concerning your faith;

ASY: ܗܵܕܵܐ ܕܐܘܼܦ ܚܲܕ ܡܸܢܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܠܵܐ ܦܵܐܹܫ ܫܥܝܼܫܵܐ ܒܐܲܢܹܐ ܐܘܼܠܨܵܢܹ̈ܐ. ܣܵܒܵܒ ܒܓܵܢܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܟܹܐ ܝܵܕܥܝܼܬܘܿܢ ܠܐܲܢܹܐ ܐܘܼܠܨܵܢܹ̈ܐ ܦܝܼܫܹܐ ܝܘܲܚ ܪܫܝܼܡܹܐ.
TRL: Hada doep khad minawkhoon la paesh sh'eesha bane oelṣane. Sabab bganawkhoon ke yad'eetoon lane oelṣane peeshe ywakh rsheeme.
ENG: that no man be moved by these afflictions; for yourselves know that hereunto we are appointed.

ASY: ܣܵܒܵܒ ܐܘܼܦ ܐܝܼܡܲܢ ܕܝܼܘܲܚ ܗ݇ܘܵܘ ܥܲܡܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ، ܐ݇ܡܝܼܪܲܢ ܐܸܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܩܵܕ݇ܡܵܝܬܵܐ ܕܒܸܬ ܦܵܝܫܲܚ ܡܘܼܠܝܸܨܹܐ؛ ܘܗܘܹܐ ܠܵܗ̇ ܗܲܕܟ݂ܵܐ، ܐܲܝܟ݂ ܕܒܝܼܕܵܥܵܐ ܝܬܘܿܢ.
TRL: Sabab oep eeman deewakh waw 'amawkhoon, meeran ilawkhoon qamayta dbit payshakh moelyiṣe; o hwe-laha hadkha, aykh dbeeda'a ytoon.
ENG: For verily, when we were with you, we told you beforehand that we are to suffer affliction; even as it came to pass, and ye know.

ASY: ܒܘܼܬ ܐܵܗܵܐ ܐܝܼܡܲܢ ܕܠܵܐ ܡܨܹܐ ܠܝܼ ܠܸܚܡܵܠܵܐ ܐ݇ܚܹܪ݇ܢܵܐ ܒܘܼܫ ܙܵܘܕܵܐ، ܫܘܼܕܸܪܝܼ ܕܝܵܕܥܹܢ ܠܗܲܝܡܵܢܘܼܬܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ، ܕܠܵܐ ܗܵܘܝܵܐ ܕܓ̰ܲܪܸܒ ܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܓ̰ܲܪܒܵܢܵܐ ܒܚܕܵܐ ܐܘܼܪܚܵܐ، ܘܗܵܘܹܐ ܦܘܼܠܚܵܢܲܢ ܓܵܘܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܕܠܵܐ ܝܘܼܬܪܵܢܵܐ.
TRL: Boet aha eeman dla mṣe-lee likhmala khena boesh zawda, shoediree dyad'en lhaymanoetawkhoon, dla hawya djarib lawkhoon jarbana bkhda oerkha, o hawe poelkhanan gawawkhoon dla yoetrana.
ENG: For this cause I also, when I could no longer forbear, sent that I might know your faith, lest by any means the tempter had tempted you, and our labour should be in vain.

ASY: ܐܝܼܢܵܐ ܐܵܕܝܼܵܐ ܐ݇ܬܹܐ ܠܹܗ ܛܝܼܡܵܬܹܐܘܿܣ ܡ̣ܢ ܟܸܣܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܠܟܸܣ ܠܲܢ ܘܡܘܼܐܬܹܐ ܠܹܗ ܐܸܠܲܢ ܚܲܒܪܹ̈ܐ ܡܲܚܕܝܼܵܢܹ̈ܐ ܒܘܼܬ ܗܲܝܡܵܢܘܼܬܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܘܚܘܼܒܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ، ܘܕܐܝܼܬ ܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܕܟ݂ܵܪܲܢ ܛܵܒ݂ܵܐ ܒܟܠ ܥܕܵܢܵܐ، ܘܫܲܗܘܘܼܬܹܐ ܝܬܘܿܢ ܠܸܚܙܵܝܲܢ ܐܲܝܟ݂ ܕܐܲܚܢܲܢ ܫܲܗܘܘܼܬܹܐ ܝܘܲܚ ܠܸܚܙܵܝܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ.
TRL: Eena adeea te-leh ṭeemateoos min kislawkhoon lkis lan o moete-leh ilan khabre makhdeeane boet haymanoetawkhoon o khoebawkhoon, o deet lawkhoon dkharan ṭawa bkl 'dana, o shahwoete ytoon likhzayan aykh dakhnan shahwoete ywakh likhzayawkhoon.
ENG: But when Timothy came even now unto us from you, and brought us glad tidings of your faith and love, and that ye have good remembrance of us always, longing to see us, even as we also to see you;

ASY: ܒܘܼܬ ܐܵܗܵܐ، ܐܲܚܘܿܢܘܵܬܹ̈ܐ، ܦܝܼܫ ܠܲܢ ܝܘܼܗ݇ܒܹܐ ܠܸܒܵܐ ܒܝܼܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܥܲܠ ܟܠܲܝܗܝ ܥܵܘܩܵܢܲܢ̈ ܘܐܘܼܠܨܵܢܲܢ̈ ܒܝܲܕ ܗܲܝܡܵܢܘܼܬܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ.
TRL: Boet aha, akhoonwate, peesh lan yoebe liba beeawkhoon 'al klayhy 'awqanan o oelṣanan byad haymanoetawkhoon.
ENG: for this cause, brethren, we were comforted over you in all our distress and affliction through your faith:

ASY: ܣܵܒܵܒ ܐܵܕܝܼܵܐ ܒܸܚܵܝܵܐ ܝܘܲܚ، ܐܸܢ ܐܲܚܬܘܿܢ ܟܵܠܹܝܬܘܿܢ ܩܸܘܝܹܐ ܒܡܵܪܲܢ.
TRL: Sabab adeea bikhaya ywakh, in akhtoon kaleytoon qiwye bmaran.
ENG: for now we live, if ye stand fast in the Lord.

ASY: ܣܵܒܵܒ ܡܘܿܕܝܼ ܫܵܟܲܪܬܵܐ ܡܵܨܲܚ ܠܸܦܪܵܥܵܐ ܠܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ ܒܘܼܬ ܕܝܼܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܥܲܠ ܟܠܵܗ̇ ܚܲܕܘܼܬܵܐ ܕܒܸܚܕܵܝܵܐ ܝܘܲܚ ܒܝܼܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܩܵܕ݇ܡ ܐܲܠܵܗܲܢ،
TRL: Sabab moodee shakarta maṣakh lipra'a lalaha boet deeawkhoon 'al klaha khadoeta dbikhdaya ywakh beeawkhoon qam alahan,
ENG: For what thanksgiving can we render again unto God for you, for all the joy wherewith we joy for your sakes before our God;

ASY: ܟܲܕ ܦܲܪܦܘܼܠܹܐ ܝܘܲܚ ܪܵܒܵܐ، ܒܠܲܝܠܹܐ ܘܒܐܝܼܡܵܡܵܐ، ܕܚܵܙܲܚ ܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܦܲܪܨܘܿܦܵܐܝܼܬ ܘܬܲܡܸܡܲܚ ܡܸܢܕܝܼ ܕܒܵܨܘܿܪܵܐ ܝܠܹܗ ܒܗܲܝܡܵܢܘܼܬܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ؟
TRL: Kad parpoele ywakh raba, blayle o beemama, dkhazakh lawkhoon parṣoopaeet o tamimakh mindee dbaṣoora-yleh bhaymanoetawkhoon?
ENG: night and day praying exceedingly that we may see your face, and may perfect that which is lacking in your faith?

ASY: ܘܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ ܒܵܒܲܢ ܒܓܵܢܹܗ، ܘܡܵܪܲܢ ܝܼܫܘܿܥ ܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ، ܥܵܒܹܕ ܠܵܗ̇ ܐܘܼܪܚܲܢ ܦܫܝܼܛܬܵܐ ܠܟܸܣ ܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ.
TRL: O Alaha baban bganeh, o Maran eeshoo' msheekha, 'abed-laha oerkhan psheeṭta lkis lawkhoon.
ENG: Now may our God and Father himself, and our Lord Jesus, direct our way unto you:

ASY: ܘܡܵܪܝܵܐ ܡܲܙܝܸܕ ܘܡܲܦܪܹܐ ܠܚܘܼܒܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܚܲܕ ܠܟܸܣ ܗ̇ܘ ܐ݇ܚܹܪ݇ܢܵܐ ܘܠܟܸܣ ܟܠܲܝܗܝ ܐ݇ܢܵܫܹ̈ܐ، ܕܵܐܟ݂ܝܼ ܕܐܲܚܢܲܢ ܟܹܐ ܡܲܚܸܒܲܚ ܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ،
TRL: O Marya mazyid o mapre lkhoebawkhoon khad lkis haw khena o lkis klayhy nashe, dakhee dakhnan ke makhibakh lawkhoon,
ENG: and the Lord make you to increase and abound in love one toward another, and toward all men, even as we also do toward you;

ASY: ܘܡܲܩܘܹܐ ܠܸܒܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܕܠܵܐ ܡܘܼܡܵܐ ܒܩܲܕܝܼܫܘܼܬܵܐ ܩܵܕ݇ܡ ܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ ܒܵܒܲܢ، ܐܝܼܡܲܢ ܕܡܵܪܲܢ ܝܼܫܘܿܥ ܐܵܬܹܐ ܥܲܡ ܟܠܲܝܗܝ ܩܲܕܝܼܫܘܼ̈ܗܝ.
TRL: O maqwe libawkhoon dla moema bqadeeshoeta qam Alaha baban, eeman dmaran eeshoo' ate 'am klayhy qadeeshoehy.
ENG: to the end he may stablish your hearts unblameable in holiness before our God and Father, at the coming of our Lord Jesus with all his saints.

ASY: ܒܚܲܪܬܵܐ ܐܲܚܘܿܢܘܵܬܹ̈ܐ، ܒܸܛܠܵܒܵܐ ܝܘܲܚ ܡܸܢܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܘܦܲܪܦܘܼܠܹܐ ܒܝܼܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܒܡܵܪܲܢ ܝܼܫܘܿܥ، ܐܲܝܟ݂ ܕܩܘܼܒܸܠ ܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܡܸܢܲܢ ܕܵܐܟ݂ܝܼ ܘܵܠܹܐ ܝܠܵܗ̇ ܕܚܵܝܹܝܬܘܿܢ ܘܫܵܦܪܝܼܬܘܿܢ ܠܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ، ܕܵܐܟ݂ܝܼ ܕܐܘܼܦ ܒܫܲܪܝܼܪܘܼܬܵܐ ܒܸܚܵܝܵܐ ܝܬܘܿܢ، ܐܵܕܝܼܵܐ ܒܸܛܠܵܒܵܐ ܝܘܲܚ ܡܸܢܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܕܒܘܼܫ ܙܵܘܕܵܐ ܥܵܒ݂ܕܝܼܬܘܿܢ ܗܲܕܟ݂ܵܐ.
TRL: Bkharta akhoonwate, biṭlaba ywakh minawkhoon o parpoele beeawkhoon bmaran eeshoo', aykh dqoebil lawkhoon minan dakhee wale-ylaha dkhayeytoon o shapreetoon lalaha, dakhee doep bshareeroeta bikhaya ytoon, adeea biṭlaba ywakh minawkhoon dboesh zawda 'awdeetoon hadkha.
ENG: Finally then, brethren, we beseech and exhort you in the Lord Jesus, that, as ye received of us how ye ought to walk and to please God, even as ye do walk,—that ye abound more and more.

ASY: ܣܵܒܵܒ ܒܝܼܕܵܥܵܐ ܝܬܘܿܢ ܡܘܿܕܝܼ ܦܘܼܩܕܵܢܹ̈ܐ ܝܘܼܗ݇ܒܸܠ ܠܲܢ ܐܸܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܒܝܲܕ ܡܵܪܲܢ ܝܼܫܘܿܥ،
TRL: Sabab beeda'a ytoon moodee poeqdane yoebil lan ilawkhoon byad Maran eeshoo',
ENG: For ye know what charge we gave you through the Lord Jesus.

ASY: ܕܨܸܒ݂ܝܵܢܵܐ ܕܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ ܝܠܹܗ ܕܗܵܘܹܝܬܘܿܢ ܩܲܕܝܼܫܹ̈ܐ ܘܪܵܚܩܝܼܬܘܿܢ ܡ̣ܢ ܙܵܢܝܘܼܬܵܐ،
TRL: Dṣiwyana dalaha-yleh dhaweytoon qadeeshe o rakhqeetoon min zanyoeta,
ENG: For this is the will of God, even your sanctification, that ye abstain from fornication;

ASY: ܘܕܟܠ ܚܲܕ ܡܸܢܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܝܵܕܹܥ ܕܵܐܟ݂ܝܼ ܢܵܛܹܪ ܠܦܲܓ݂ܪܹܗ ܒܩܲܕܝܼܫܘܼܬܵܐ ܘܒܐܝܼܩܵܪܵܐ،
TRL: O dkl khad minawkhoon yade' dakhee naṭer lpaghreh bqadeeshoeta o beeqara,
ENG: that each one of you know how to possess himself of his own vessel in sanctification and honour,

ASY: ܠܵܐ ܒܙܵܘܥܹ̈ܐ ܕܫܲܗܘܲܬܬܵܐ ܐܲܝܟ݂ ܐܸܡܘܵܬܹ̈ܐ، ܐܵܢܝܼ ܕܠܹܐ ܝܵܕܥܝܼ ܠܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ؛
TRL: La bzaw'e dshahwatta aykh imwate, anee dle yad'ee lalaha;
ENG: not in the passion of lust, even as the Gentiles which know not God;

ASY: ܘܒܐܵܗܵܐ ܫܘܼܠܵܐ ܗܸܟ̃ ܚܲܕ ܠܵܐ ܥܲܠܕܹܐ ܠܐܲܚܘܿܢܘܼܗܝ ܘܡܲܙܝܸܕ ܥܵܘܠܵܐ ܐܸܠܹܗ، ܣܵܒܵܒ ܡܵܪܲܢ ܒܸܬ ܫܵܩܹܠ ܬܘܼܥܠܵܐ ܒܐܲܢܹܐ ܟܠܲܝܗܝ، ܕܵܐܟ݂ܝܼ ܕܐ݇ܡܝܼܪܲܢ ܘܣܗܝܼܕ ܠܲܢ ܐܸܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܡ̣ܢ ܩܵܕ݇ܡܵܝܬܵܐ.
TRL: O baha shoela hich khad la 'alde lakhoonoehy o mazyid 'awla ileh, sabab Maran bit shaqel toe'la bane klayhy, dakhee dmeeran o sheed lan ilawkhoon min qamayta.
ENG: that no man transgress, and wrong his brother in the matter: because the Lord is an avenger in all these things, as also we forewarned you and testified.

ASY: ܣܵܒܵܒ ܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ ܠܵܐ ܩܸܪܝܲܚ ܠܹܗ ܠܛܲܢܦܘܼܬܵܐ ܐܸܠܵܐ ܠܩܲܕܝܼܫܘܼܬܵܐ.
TRL: Sabab Alaha la qiryakh-leh lṭanpoeta ila lqadeeshoeta.
ENG: For God called us not for uncleanness, but in sanctification.

ASY: ܒܘܼܬ ܐܵܗܵܐ، ܗ̇ܘ ܕܡܲܣܠܹܐ ܠܐܵܗܵܐ ܝܘܼܠܦܵܢܵܐ ܠܹܐ ܝܠܹܗ ܡܲܣܠܘܼܝܹܐ ܠܒܲܪܢܵܫܵܐ ܐܸܠܵܐ ܠܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ، ܗ̇ܘ ܕܝܘܼܗ݇ܒܸܠ ܠܹܗ ܐܸܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܪܘܼܚܹܗ ܩܲܕܝܼܫܵܐ.
TRL: Boet aha, haw dmasle-laha yoelpana le-yleh masloeye lbarnasha ila lalaha, haw dyoebil-leh ilawkhoon roekheh qadeesha.
ENG: Therefore he that rejecteth, rejecteth not man, but God, who giveth his Holy Spirit unto you.

ASY: ܐܝܼܢܵܐ ܒܘܼܬ ܚܘܼܒܵܐ ܕܐܲܚܘܿܢܘܵܬܹ̈ܐ، ܠܹܐ ܝܬܘܿܢ ܣܢܝܼܩܹܐ ܕܟܵܬܒܲܚ ܐܸܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ، ܣܵܒܵܒ ܐܲܚܬܘܿܢ ܒܓܵܢܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܦܝܼܫܹܐ ܝܬܘܿܢ ܡܘܼܠܦܹܐ ܒܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ ܕܡܲܚܸܒܝܼܬܘܿܢ ܚܲܕ ܠܗ̇ܘ ܐ݇ܚܹܪ݇ܢܵܐ.
TRL: Eena boet khoeba dakhoonwate, le ytoon sneeqe dkatbakh ilawkhoon, sabab akhtoon bganawkhoon peeshe ytoon moelpe balaha dmakhibeetoon khad lhaw khena.
ENG: But concerning love of the brethren ye have no need that one write unto you: for ye yourselves are taught of God to love one another;

ASY: ܘܫܲܪܝܼܪܵܐܝܼܬ ܟܹܐ ܡܲܚܸܒܝܼܬܘܿܢ ܠܟܠܲܝܗܝ ܐܲܚܘܿܢܘܵܬܹ̈ܐ ܕܒܟܠܵܗ̇ ܡܵܩܹܕܘܿܢܝܼܵܐ. ܐܝܼܢܵܐ ܒܸܛܠܵܒܵܐ ܝܘܲܚ ܡܸܢܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ، ܐܲܚܘܿܢܘܵܬܹ̈ܐ، ܕܡܲܚܸܒܝܼܬܘܿܢ ܒܘܼܫ ܙܵܘܕܵܐ،
TRL: O shareeraeet ke makhibeetoon lklayhy akhoonwate dbklaha maqedooneea. Eena biṭlaba ywakh minawkhoon, akhoonwate, dmakhibeetoon boesh zawda,
ENG: for indeed ye do it toward all the brethren which are in all Macedonia. But we exhort you, brethren, that ye abound more and more;

ASY: ܘܕܚܲܦܛܝܼܬܘܿܢ ܕܗܵܘܹܝܬܘܿܢ ܫܸܠܝܹ̈ܐ، ܘܕܥܵܒ݂ܕܝܼܬܘܿܢ ܫܘܼܠܵܢܹ̈ܐ ܕܓܵܢܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ، ܘܕܦܵܠܚܝܼܬܘܿܢ ܒܐܝܼܕܵܬܵܘ̈ܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܐܲܝܟ݂ ܕܦܩܝܼܕ ܠܲܢ ܐܸܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ،
TRL: O dkhapṭeetoon dhaweytoon shilye, o d'awdeetoon shoelane dganawkhoon, o dpalkheetoon beedatawkhoon aykh dpqeed lan ilawkhoon,
ENG: and that ye study to be quiet, and to do your own business, and to work with your hands, even as we charged you;

ASY: ܕܚܵܝܹܝܬܘܿܢ ܒܢܲܟ݂ܦܘܼܬܵܐ ܠܟܸܣ ܒܲܪ̈ܵܝܹܐ ܘܠܐ݇ܢܵܫܵܐ ܠܵܐ ܦܵܝܫܝܼܬܘܿܢ ܣܢܝܼܩܹܐ.
TRL: Dkhayeytoon bnakhpoeta lkis baraye o lnasha la paysheetoon sneeqe.
ENG: that ye may walk honestly toward them that are without, and may have need of nothing.

ASY: ܒܵܥܹܝܢ ܕܝܵܕܥܝܼܬܘܿܢ، ܐܲܚܘܿܢܘܵܬܹ̈ܐ، ܒܘܼܬ ܐܵܢܝܼ ܕܝܼܢܵܐ ܕܡܝܼܟܹܐ، ܕܠܵܐ ܦܵܫܡܝܼܬܘܿܢ ܐܲܝܟ݂ ܐ݇ܢܵܫܹ̈ܐ ܐ݇ܚܹܪ̈݇ܢܹܐ ܕܗܹܒ݂ܝܼ ܠܲܝܬ ܠܗܘܿܢ.
TRL: Ba'eyn dyad'eetoon, akhoonwate, boet anee deena dmeeke, dla pashmeetoon aykh nashe khene dhewee layt-lhoon.
ENG: But we would not have you ignorant, brethren, concerning them that fall asleep; that ye sorrow not, even as the rest, which have no hope.

ASY: ܣܵܒܵܒ ܐܸܢ ܗܲܡܘܼܢܹܐ ܝܘܲܚ ܕܝܼܫܘܿܥ ܡܝܼܬ ܠܹܗ ܘܩܝܼܡ ܠܹܗ، ܐܘܼܦ ܗܲܕܟ݂ܵܐ ܗܲܡܘܼܢܹܐ ܝܘܲܚ ܕܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ ܒܸܬ ܡܲܝܬܹܐ ܥܲܡ ܝܼܫܘܿܥ ܠܐܵܢܝܼ ܕܕܡܝܼܟ݂ ܠܗܘܿܢ ܒܝܼܹܗ.
TRL: Sabab in hamoene ywakh deeshoo' meet-leh o qeem-leh, oep hadkha hamoene ywakh dalaha bit mayte 'am eeshoo' lanee ddmeekh-lhoon bee-eh.
ENG: For if we believe that Jesus died and rose again, even so them also that are fallen asleep in Jesus will God bring with him.

ASY: ܒܹܐܡܵܪܵܐ ܝܘܲܚ ܐܵܗܵܐ ܐܸܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܒܗܹܡܸܙܡܵܢ ܕܡܵܪܲܢ، ܐܲܚܢܲܢ ܕܗܵܘܲܚ ܚܵܝܹ̈ܐ، ܕܦܵܝܫܲܚ ܗܲܠ ܐ݇ܬܵܝܬܵܐ ܕܡܵܪܲܢ، ܠܹܐ ܩܵܕܡܲܚ ܠܐܵܢܝܼ ܕܝܼܢܵܐ ܕܡܝܼܟܹܐ.
TRL: Bemara ywakh aha ilawkhoon bhemizman dmaran, akhnan dhawakh khaye, dpayshakh hal tayta dmaran, le qadmakh lanee deena dmeeke.
ENG: For this we say unto you by the word of the Lord, that we that are alive, that are left unto the coming of the Lord, shall in no wise precede them that are fallen asleep.

ASY: ܣܵܒܵܒ ܡܵܪܲܢ ܒܓܵܢܹܗ ܒܸܬ ܨܵܠܹܐ ܡ̣ܢ ܫܡܲܝܵܐ ܒܩܵܘܲܚܬܵܐ ܕܦܘܼܩܕܵܢܵܐ، ܒܩܵܠܵܐ ܕܪܹܫ ܡܲܠܲܐܟܹ̈ܐ، ܘܒܫܝܼܦܘܿܪܵܐ ܕܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ، ܘܡܝܼܬܹ̈ܐ ܕܒܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ ܒܸܬ ܩܵܝܡܝܼ ܩܵܕ݇ܡܵܝܬܵܐ.
TRL: Sabab Maran bganeh bit ṣale min shmaya bqawakhta dpoeqdana, bqala dresh malake, o bsheepoora dalaha, o meete dbmsheekha bit qaymee qamayta.
ENG: For the Lord himself shall descend from heaven, with a shout, with the voice of the archangel, and with the trump of God: and the dead in Christ shall rise first:

ASY: ܗ̇ܝܓܵܗ ܐܲܚܢܲܢ ܚܵܝܹ̈ܐ ܦܵܝܫܵܢܹ̈ܐ ܒܸܬ ܦܵܝܫܲܚ ܚܛܝܼܦܹܐ ܥܲܡܲܝܗܝ ܓܵܘ ܥܢܵܢܹ̈ܐ ܕܬܵܦܩܲܚ ܒܡܵܪܲܢ ܓܵܘ ܗܵܘܵܐ؛ ܘܗܲܕܟ݂ܵܐ ܒܸܬ ܗܵܘܲܚ ܥܲܡ ܡܵܪܲܢ ܒܟܠ ܙܲܒ݂ܢܵܐ.
TRL: Haygah akhnan khaye payshane bit payshakh khṭeepe 'amayhy gaw 'nane dtapqakh bmaran gaw hawa; o hadkha bit hawakh 'am Maran bkl zawna.
ENG: then we that are alive, that are left, shall together with them be caught up in the clouds, to meet the Lord in the air: and so shall we ever be with the Lord.

ASY: ܒܲܣ ܗܲܒ݂݇ܠܘܼܢ ܠܸܒܵܐ ܚܲܕ ܠܗ̇ܘ ܐ݇ܚܹܪ݇ܢܵܐ ܒܐܲܢܹܐ ܗܹܡܸܙܡܵܢܹ̈ܐ.
TRL: Bas haloen liba khad lhaw khena bane hemizmane.
ENG: Wherefore comfort one another with these words.

ASY: ܐܝܼܢܵܐ ܒܘܼܬ ܙܲܒ݂ܢܹ̈ܐ ܘܥܕܵܢܹ̈ܐ، ܐܲܚܘܿܢܘܵܬܝܼ̈، ܠܹܐ ܝܬܘܿܢ ܣܢܝܼܩܹܐ ܕܟܵܬܒܹܢ ܐܸܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ،
TRL: Eena boet zawne o 'dane, akhoonwatee, le ytoon sneeqe dkatben ilawkhoon,
ENG: But concerning the times and the seasons, brethren, ye have no need that aught be written unto you.

ASY: ܣܵܒܵܒ ܒܓܵܢܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܪܵܒܵܐ ܨܦܵܝܝܼ ܟܹܐ ܝܵܕܥܝܼܬܘܿܢ ܕܝܵܘܡܵܐ ܕܡܵܪܝܵܐ ܒܸܬ ܐܵܬܹܐ ܐܲܝܟ݂ ܓܹܢܵܒ݂ܵܐ ܒܠܲܝܠܹܐ.
TRL: Sabab bganawkhoon raba ṣpayee ke yad'eetoon dyawma dmarya bit ate aykh genawa blayle.
ENG: For yourselves know perfectly that the day of the Lord so cometh as a thief in the night.

ASY: ܐܝܼܡܲܢ ܕܐ݇ܢܵܫܹ̈ܐ ܗܵܘܝܼ ܒܹܐܡܵܪܵܐ، ”ܫܠܵܡܵܐ ܘܫܲܝܢܵܐ،“ ܗ̇ܝܓܵܗ ܡܸܢܫܸܠܬܵܢܹܐ ܚܪܵܒ݂ܵܐ ܒܸܬ ܐܵܬܹܐ ܥܲܠܲܝܗܝ، ܐܲܝܟ݂ ܚܸܒ݂ܠܹ̈ܐ ܥܲܠ ܒܲܟ݂ܬܵܐ ܒܛܝܼܢܬܵܐ، ܘܠܹܐ ܦܵܪܩܝܼ.
TRL: Eeman dnashe hawee bemara, ”shlama o shayna,“ haygah minshiltane khrawa bit ate 'alayhy, aykh khiwle 'al bakhta bṭeenta, o le parqee.
ENG: When they are saying, Peace and safety, then sudden destruction cometh upon them, as travail upon a woman with child; and they shall in no wise escape.

ASY: ܐܝܼܢܵܐ ܐܲܚܬܘܿܢ، ܐܲܚܘܿܢܘܵܬܝܼ̈، ܠܹܐ ܝܬܘܿܢ ܓܵܘ ܚܸܫܟܵܐ، ܕܗ̇ܘ ܝܵܘܡܵܐ ܐܲܝܟ݂ ܓܹܢܵܒ݂ܵܐ ܡܵܛܹܐ ܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ.
TRL: Eena akhtoon, akhoonwatee, le ytoon gaw khishka, dhaw yawma aykh genawa maṭe lawkhoon.
ENG: But ye, brethren, are not in darkness, that that day should overtake you as a thief:

ASY: ܣܵܒܵܒ ܐܲܚܬܘܿܢ ܟܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܒܢܘܿܢܹ̈ܐ ܕܒܲܗܪܵܐ ܝܬܘܿܢ ܘܒܢܘܿܢܹ̈ܐ ܕܝܵܘܡܵܐ. ܠܹܐ ܝܘܲܚ ܒܢܘܿܢܹ̈ܐ ܕܠܲܝܠܹܐ ܘܠܵܐ ܒܢܘܿܢܹ̈ܐ ܕܚܸܫܟܵܐ.
TRL: Sabab akhtoon klawkhoon bnoone dbahra ytoon o bnoone dyawma. Le ywakh bnoone dlayle o la bnoone dkhishka.
ENG: for ye are all sons of light, and sons of the day: we are not of the night, nor of darkness;

ASY: ܒܘܼܬ ܐܵܗܵܐ ܠܵܐ ܕܵܡܟܲܚ ܐܲܝܟ݂ ܐ݇ܚܹܪ̈݇ܢܹܐ، ܐܸܠܵܐ ܗܵܘܲܚ ܒܫܵܗܲܪܬܵܐ ܘܪܥܝܼܫܹܐ.
TRL: Boet aha la damkakh aykh khene, ila hawakh bshaharta o r'eeshe.
ENG: so then let us not sleep, as do the rest, but let us watch and be sober.

ASY: ܣܵܒܵܒ ܐܵܢܝܼ ܕܟܹܐ ܕܵܡܟ݂ܝܼ، ܒܠܲܝܠܹܐ ܟܹܐ ܕܵܡܟ݂ܝܼ، ܘܐܵܢܝܼ ܕܟܹܐ ܪܵܘܝܼ، ܒܠܲܝܠܹܐ ܟܹܐ ܪܵܘܝܼ.
TRL: Sabab anee dke damkhee, blayle ke damkhee, o anee dke rawee, blayle ke rawee.
ENG: For they that sleep sleep in the night; and they that be drunken are drunken in the night.

ASY: ܐܝܼܢܵܐ ܐܲܚܢܲܢ ܕܝܼܘܲܚ ܐ݇ܢܵܫܹ̈ܐ ܕܐܝܼܡܵܡܵܐ، ܗܵܘܲܚ ܪܥܝܼܫܹܐ، ܠܒ݂ܝܼܫܹܐ ܫܸܪܝܵܢܵܐ ܕܗܲܝܡܵܢܘܼܬܵܐ ܘܕܚܘܼܒܵܐ، ܘܣܲܢܘܲܪܬܵܐ ܕܗܹܒ݂ܝܼ ܕܦܘܼܪܩܵܢܵܐ.
TRL: Eena akhnan deewakh nashe deemama, hawakh r'eeshe, lweeshe shiryana dhaymanoeta o dkhoeba, o sanwarta dhewee dpoerqana.
ENG: But let us, since we are of the day, be sober, putting on the breastplate of faith and love; and for a helmet, the hope of salvation.

ASY: ܣܵܒܵܒ ܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ ܠܹܐ ܝܠܹܗ ܪܫܝܼܡܲܢ ܠܟܲܪܒܵܐ ܐܸܠܵܐ ܕܩܲܒܠܲܚ ܦܘܼܪܩܵܢܵܐ ܒܝܲܕ ܡܵܪܲܢ ܝܼܫܘܿܥ ܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ،
TRL: Sabab Alaha le-yleh rsheeman lkarba ila dqablakh poerqana byad Maran eeshoo' msheekha,
ENG: For God appointed us not unto wrath, but unto the obtaining of salvation through our Lord Jesus Christ,

ASY: ܗ̇ܘ ܕܡܝܼܬ ܠܹܗ ܡ̣ܢ ܓܹܒܲܢ، ܕܐܸܢ ܪܥܝܼܫܹܐ ܝܘܲܚ ܘܐܸܢ ܕܡܝܼܟܹܐ ܝܘܲܚ، ܡܥܘܼܕܵܠܹ̈ܐ ܚܵܝܲܚ ܥܲܡܹܗ.
TRL: Haw dmeet-leh min geban, din r'eeshe ywakh o in dmeeke ywakh, m'oedale khayakh 'ameh.
ENG: who died for us, that, whether we wake or sleep, we should live together with him.

ASY: ܒܘܼܬ ܐܵܗܵܐ ܗܲܒ݂݇ܠܘܼܢ ܠܸܒܵܐ ܚܲܕ ܠܗ̇ܘ ܐ݇ܚܹܪ݇ܢܵܐ، ܘܒܢܹܝܡܘܼܢ ܚܲܕ ܠܗ̇ܘ ܐ݇ܚܹܪ݇ܢܵܐ، ܗܲܪ ܐܲܝܟ݂ ܕܝܼܬܘܿܢ ܒܸܥܒ݂ܵܕܵܐ.
TRL: Boet aha haloen liba khad lhaw khena, o bneymoen khad lhaw khena, har aykh deetoon bi'wada.
ENG: Wherefore exhort one another, and build each other up, even as also ye do.

ASY: ܐܵܕܝܼܵܐ ܒܸܛܠܵܒܵܐ ܝܘܲܚ ܡܸܢܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܐܲܚܘܿܢܘܵܬܹ̈ܐ، ܕܡܝܲܩܪܝܼܬܘܿܢ ܠܐܵܢܝܼ ܕܒܸܦܠܵܚܵܐ ܝܢܵܐ ܩܸܫܝܵܐ ܓܵܘܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ، ܘܕܝܼܢܵܐ ܡܗܲܕܘܼܝܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܒܡܵܪܝܵܐ ܘܡܲܠܘܼܦܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ.
TRL: Adeea biṭlaba ywakh minawkhoon akhoonwate, dmyaqreetoon lanee dbiplakha yna qishya gawawkhoon, o deena mhadoeyawkhoon bmarya o maloepawkhoon.
ENG: But we beseech you, brethren, to know them that labour among you, and are over you in the Lord, and admonish you;

ASY: ܡܝܲܩܪܘܼܢ ܠܗܘܿܢ ܪܵܒܵܐ ܒܚܘܼܒܵܐ ܒܘܼܬ ܦܘܼܠܚܵܢܲܝ̈ܗܝ. ܚܝܹܝܡܘܼܢ ܒܫܠܵܡܵܐ ܚܲܕ ܥܲܡ ܗ̇ܘ ܐ݇ܚܹܪ݇ܢܵܐ.
TRL: Myaqroen-lhoon raba bkhoeba boet poelkhanayhy. Khyeymoen bshlama khad 'am haw khena.
ENG: and to esteem them exceeding highly in love for their work’s sake. Be at peace among yourselves.

ASY: ܘܦܲܪܦܘܼܠܹܐ ܝܘܲܚ ܒܝܼܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ، ܐܲܚܘܿܢܘܵܬܹ̈ܐ، ܡܲܢܟܸܣܘܼܢ ܠܡܲܟܣܸܠܵܢܹ̈ܐ، ܣܢܘܿܕܘܼܢ ܠܙܵܕܘܿܥܹ̈ܐ، ܗܲܝܸܪܘܼܢ ܠܙܲܒܘܼܢܹ̈ܐ، ܡܲܪܝܸܟ݂ܘܼܢ ܒܹܐܢܵܐ ܥܲܠ ܟܠܲܝܗܝ ܐ݇ܢܵܫܹ̈ܐ.
TRL: O parpoele ywakh beeawkhoon, akhoonwate, mankisoen lmaksilane, snoodoen lzadoo'e, hayiroen lzaboene, maryikhoen bena 'al klayhy nashe.
ENG: And we exhort you, brethren, admonish the disorderly, encourage the fainthearted, support the weak, be longsuffering toward all.

ASY: ܗܘܹܝܡܘܼܢ ܗܸܫܝܵܪ ܕܐ݇ܢܵܫܵܐ ܡܸܢܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܠܵܐ ܦܵܪܹܥ ܒܝܼܫܬܵܐ ܡ̣ܢ ܓܹܒܵܐ ܕܒܝܼܫܬܵܐ، ܐܝܼܢܵܐ ܒܟܠ ܙܲܒ݂ܢܵܐ ܥܒ݂ܘܿܕܘܼܢ ܛܵܒ݂ܬܵܐ ܚܲܕ ܠܗ̇ܘ ܐ݇ܚܹܪ݇ܢܵܐ ܘܠܟܠܲܝܗܝ ܐ݇ܢܵܫܹ̈ܐ.
TRL: Hweymoen hishyar dnasha minawkhoon la pare' beeshta min geba dbeeshta, eena bkl zawna 'woodoen ṭawta khad lhaw khena o lklayhy nashe.
ENG: See that none render unto any one evil for evil; but alway follow after that which is good, one toward another, and toward all.

ASY: ܚܕܹܝܡܘܼܢ ܒܟܠ ܙܲܒ݂ܢܵܐ.
TRL: Khdeymoen bkl zawna.
ENG: Rejoice alway;

ASY: ܨܲܠܹܝܡܘܼܢ ܕܠܵܐ ܫܠܵܝܬܵܐ.
TRL: Ṣaleymoen dla shlayta.
ENG: pray without ceasing;

ASY: ܗܘܹܝܡܘܼܢ ܫܲܟܘܼܪܹܐ ܥܲܠ ܟܠ ܡܸܢܕܝܼ، ܣܵܒܵܒ ܐܵܗܵܐ ܝܠܹܗ ܨܸܒ݂ܝܵܢܵܐ ܕܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ ܐܸܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܒܝܼܫܘܿܥ ܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ.
TRL: Hweymoen shakoere 'al kl mindee, sabab aha-yleh ṣiwyana dalaha ilawkhoon beeshoo' msheekha.
ENG: in everything give thanks: for this is the will of God in Christ Jesus to you-ward.

ASY: ܠܵܐ ܡܲܟ̰ܡܸܥܝܼܬܘܿܢ ܠܪܘܼܚܵܐ.
TRL: La machmi'eetoon lroekha.
ENG: Quench not the Spirit;

ASY: ܠܵܐ ܡܲܣܠܹܝܬܘܿܢ ܠܢܒ݂ܝܼܵܘܵܬܹ̈ܐ.
TRL: La masleytoon lnweeawate.
ENG: despise not prophesyings;

ASY: ܨܲܚܨܹܝܡܘܼܢ ܠܟܠܲܝܗܝ ܡܸܢܕܝܼܵܢܹ̈ܐ. ܕܒ݂ܘܿܩܘܼܢ ܒܡܸܢܕܝܼ ܕܝܼܠܹܗ ܫܲܦܝܼܪܵܐ.
TRL: Ṣakhṣeymoen lklayhy mindeeane. Dwooqoen bmindee deeleh shapeera.
ENG: prove all things; hold fast that which is good;

ASY: ܪܚܘܿܩܘܼܢ ܡ̣ܢ ܟܠ ܐܵܕܫܵܐ ܕܒܝܼܫܬܵܐ.
TRL: Rkhooqoen min kl adsha dbeeshta.
ENG: abstain from every form of evil.

ASY: ܘܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ ܕܫܠܵܡܵܐ ܒܓܵܢܹܗ ܩܲܕܸܫ ܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܒܡܸܠܝܘܼܬܵܐ، ܘܟܠܵܗ̇ ܪܘܼܚܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܘܓܵܢܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܘܦܲܓ݂ܪܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܢܵܛܹܪ ܕܠܵܐ ܡܘܼܡܵܐ ܒܐ݇ܬܵܝܬܵܐ ܕܡܵܪܲܢ ܝܼܫܘܿܥ ܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ.
TRL: O Alaha dshlama bganeh qadish lawkhoon bmilyoeta, o klaha roekhawkhoon o ganawkhoon o paghrawkhoon naṭer dla moema btayta dmaran eeshoo' msheekha.
ENG: And the God of peace himself sanctify you wholly; and may your spirit and soul and body be preserved entire, without blame at the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ.

ASY: ܡܗܘܼܡܢܵܐ ܝܠܹܗ ܗ̇ܘ ܕܩܲܡ ܩܵܪܹܐ ܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ، ܘܗ̇ܘ ܒܸܬ ܬܲܡܸܡ ܐܵܗܵܐ.
TRL: Mhoemna-yleh haw dqam qare lawkhoon, o haw bit tamim aha.
ENG: Faithful is he that calleth you, who will also do it.

ASY: ܐܲܚܘܿܢܘܵܬܹ̈ܐ، ܨܲܠܹܝܡܘܼܢ ܡ̣ܢ ܓܹܒܲܢ.
TRL: Akhoonwate, ṣaleymoen min geban.
ENG: Brethren, pray for us.

ASY: ܗܲܒ݂݇ܠܘܼܢ ܫܠܵܡܵܐ ܠܟܠܲܝܗܝ ܐܲܚܘܿܢܘܵܬܹ̈ܐ ܒܢܫܘܼܩܬܵܐ ܩܲܕܝܼܫܬܵܐ.
TRL: Haloen shlama lklayhy akhoonwate bnshoeqta qadeeshta.
ENG: Salute all the brethren with a holy kiss.

ASY: ܡܲܡܘܼܝܹܐ ܝܘܸܢ ܐܸܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܒܡܵܪܲܢ ܕܦܵܝܫܵܐ ܩܪܝܼܬܵܐ ܐܵܗܵܐ ܐܸܓܲܪܬܵܐ ܠܟܠܲܝܗܝ ܐܲܚܘܿܢܘܵܬܹ̈ܐ.
TRL: Mamoeye ywin ilawkhoon bmaran dpaysha qreeta aha igarta lklayhy akhoonwate.
ENG: I adjure you by the Lord that this epistle be read unto all the brethren.

ASY: ܫܵܦܵܩܲܬ ܕܡܵܪܲܢ ܝܼܫܘܿܥ ܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ ܥܲܡܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ. ܐܵܡܹܝܢ.
TRL: Shapaqat dmaran eeshoo' msheekha 'amawkhoon. Ameyn.
ENG: The grace of our Lord Jesus Christ be with you.

ASY: ܦܵܘܠܘܿܣ ܘܣܸܠܘܵܢܘܿܣ ܘܛܝܼܡܵܬܹܐܘܿܣ، ܠܥܹܕܬܵܐ ܕܬܹܣܵܠܘܿܢܝܼܩܵܝܹ̈ܐ ܕܝܼܢܵܐ ܒܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ ܒܵܒܲܢ ܘܡܵܪܲܢ ܝܼܫܘܿܥ ܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ،
TRL: Pawloos o silwanoos o ṭeemateoos, l'edta dtesalooneeqaye deena balaha baban o Maran eeshoo' msheekha,
ENG: Paul, and Silvanus, and Timothy, unto the church of the Thessalonians in God our Father and the Lord Jesus Christ;

ASY: ܫܵܦܵܩܲܬ ܘܫܠܵܡܵܐ ܐܸܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܡ̣ܢ ܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ ܒܵܒܵܐ ܘܡ̣ܢ ܡܵܪܲܢ ܝܼܫܘܿܥ ܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ.
TRL: Shapaqat o shlama ilawkhoon min Alaha baba o min Maran eeshoo' msheekha.
ENG: Grace to you and peace from God the Father and the Lord Jesus Christ.

ASY: ܘܵܠܹܐ ܝܠܵܗ̇ ܠܫܲܟܘܼܪܹܐ ܠܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ ܒܟܠ ܙܲܒ݂ܢܵܐ ܒܘܼܬ ܕܝܼܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ، ܐܲܚܘܿܢܘܵܬܹ̈ܐ، ܐܲܝܟ݂ ܕܝܼܠܵܗ̇ ܚܫܝܼܚܬܵܐ، ܣܵܒܵܒ ܗܲܝܡܵܢܘܼܬܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܒܸܙܝܵܕܵܐ ܝܠܵܗ̇ ܪܵܒܵܐ، ܘܚܘܼܒܵܐ ܕܟܠ ܚܲܕ ܡܸܢܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܓܲܪܘܘܼܣܹܐ ܝܠܹܗ، ܚܲܕ ܠܟܸܣ ܗ̇ܘ ܐ݇ܚܹܪ݇ܢܵܐ.
TRL: Wale-ylaha lshakoere lalaha bkl zawna boet deeawkhoon, akhoonwate, aykh deelaha khsheekhta, sabab haymanoetawkhoon bizyada-ylaha raba, o khoeba dkl khad minawkhoon garwoese-yleh, khad lkis haw khena.
ENG: We are bound to give thanks to God alway for you, brethren, even as it is meet, for that your faith groweth exceedingly, and the love of each one of you all toward one another aboundeth;

ASY: ܗܲܕܟ݂ܵܐ ܕܐܲܚܢܲܢ ܒܓܵܢܲܢ ܐܝܼܬ ܠܲܢ ܫܘܼܒ݂ܗܵܪܵܐ ܒܝܼܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܓܵܘ ܥܹܕܵܬܹ̈ܐ ܕܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ ܒܘܼܬ ܚܡܵܠܬܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܘܗܲܝܡܵܢܘܼܬܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܓܵܘ ܟܠܲܝܗܝ ܟܵܡܲܪ̈ܝܵܬܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܘܪ̈ܕܘܼܦܝܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܘܐܘܼܠܨܵܢܵܘ̈ܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܕܒܸܚܡܵܠܵܐ ܝܬܘܿܢ.
TRL: Hadkha dakhnan bganan eet lan shoewhara beeawkhoon gaw 'edate dalaha boet khmaltawkhoon o haymanoetawkhoon gaw klayhy kamaryatawkhoon o rdoepyawkhoon o oelṣanawkhoon dbikhmala ytoon.
ENG: so that we ourselves glory in you in the churches of God for your patience and faith in all your persecutions and in the afflictions which ye endure;

ASY: ܐܵܗܵܐ ܡܲܣܒܘܼܬܹܐ ܝܠܵܗ̇ ܕܕܝܵܢܬܵܐ ܕܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ ܫܲܪܝܼܪܬܵܐ ܝܠܵܗ̇، ܕܚܵܫܚܝܼܬܘܿܢ ܠܡܲܠܟܘܼܬܵܐ ܕܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ، ܗ̇ܝ ܕܒܘܼܬ ܕܝܼܘܼܗ̇ ܓ̰ܲܢܓ̰ܘܼܪܹܐ ܝܬܘܿܢ،
TRL: Aha masboete-ylaha ddyanta dalaha shareerta-ylaha, dkhashkheetoon lmalkoeta dalaha, hay dboet deeoeha janjoere ytoon,
ENG: which is a manifest token of the righteous judgment of God; to the end that ye may be counted worthy of the kingdom of God, for which ye also suffer:

ASY: ܣܵܒܵܒ ܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ ܫܲܪܝܼܪܵܐ ܝܠܹܗ ܕܦܵܪܹܥ ܐܘܼܠܨܵܢܹ̈ܐ ܠܐܵܢܝܼ ܕܡܲܠܝܘܼܨܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܝܼܢܵܐ،
TRL: Sabab Alaha shareera-yleh dpare' oelṣane lanee dmalyoeṣawkhoon eena,
ENG: if so be that it is a righteous thing with God to recompense affliction to them that afflict you,

ASY: ܘܕܐܸܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܕܝܼܬܘܿܢ ܡܘܼܠܝܸܨܹܐ ܒܸܬ ܝܲܗ݇ܒܸܠ ܢܝܵܚܵܐ ܥܲܡܲܢ، ܐܝܼܡܲܢ ܕܦܵܐܹܫ ܓܸܠܝܵܐ ܡܵܪܲܢ ܝܼܫܘܿܥ ܡ̣ܢ ܫܡܲܝܵܐ ܥܲܡ ܡܲܠܲܐܟ݂ܘܼ̈ܗܝ ܚܲܝܠܵܢܹ̈ܐ،
TRL: O dilawkhoon deetoon moelyiṣe bit yabil nyakha 'aman, eeman dpaesh gilya Maran eeshoo' min shmaya 'am malakhoehy khaylane,
ENG: and to you that are afflicted rest with us, at the revelation of the Lord Jesus from heaven with the angels of his power

ASY: ܒܠܵܗܵܐ ܕܢܘܼܪܵܐ ܒܸܫܩܵܠܵܐ ܬܘܼܥܠܵܐ ܡ̣ܢ ܐܵܢܝܼ ܕܠܹܐ ܝܵܕܥܝܼ ܠܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ، ܘܐܵܢܝܼ ܕܠܹܐ ܡܲܨܝܸܬܝܼ ܠܐܹܘܲܢܓܲܠܝܼܘܿܢ ܕܡܵܪܲܢ ܝܼܫܘܿܥ.
TRL: Blaha dnoera bishqala toe'la min anee dle yad'ee lalaha, o anee dle maṣyitee lewangaleeoon dmaran eeshoo'.
ENG: in flaming fire, rendering vengeance to them that know not God, and to them that obey not the gospel of our Lord Jesus:

ASY: ܐܲܢܹܐ ܒܸܬ ܦܵܝܫܝܼ ܕܝܼܢܹܐ ܒܛܠܵܩܵܐ ܐܵܒܵܕܝܼܢܵܝܵܐ ܡ̣ܢ ܩܵܕ݇ܡ ܦܵܬܵܐ ܕܡܵܪܲܢ، ܘܡ̣ܢ ܚܸܩܪܵܐ ܕܚܲܝܠܹܗ،
TRL: Ane bit payshee deene bṭlaqa abadeenaya min qam pata dmaran, o min khiqra dkhayleh,
ENG: who shall suffer punishment, even eternal destruction from the face of the Lord and from the glory of his might,

ASY: ܒܗ̇ܘ ܝܵܘܡܵܐ ܐܝܼܡܲܢ ܕܐܵܬܹܐ ܕܦܵܐܹܫ ܚܩܝܼܪܵܐ ܓܵܘ ܩܲܕܝܼܫܘܼ̈ܗܝ، ܘܩܲܒܸܠ ܥܘܼܓ̰ܵܒܵܐ ܡ̣ܢ ܟܠܲܝܗܝ ܐܵܢܝܼ ܕܗܘܼܡܸܢܗܘܿܢ، ܣܵܒܵܒ ܗܘܼܡܸܢܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܠܣܵܗܕܘܼܬܲܢ.
TRL: Bhaw yawma eeman date dpaesh khqeera gaw qadeeshoehy, o qabil 'oejaba min klayhy anee dhoeminhoon, sabab hoeminawkhoon lsahdoetan.
ENG: when he shall come to be glorified in his saints, and to be marveled at in all them that believed (because our testimony unto you was believed) in that day.

ASY: ܒܘܼܬ ܐܵܗܵܐ ܐܲܡܝܼܢܵܐܝܼܬ ܟܹܐ ܗܵܘܲܚ ܨܲܠܘܼܝܹܐ ܒܘܼܬ ܕܝܼܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ، ܕܗܵܘܹܝܬܘܿܢ ܚܫܝܼܚܹܐ ܠܓܲܒܵܝܬܵܐ ܕܐܲܠܵܗܲܢ، ܘܡܲܟܡܸܠ ܒܝܼܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܒܚܲܝܠܹܗ ܟܠ ܢܝܼܫܵܐ ܨܦܵܝܝܼ ܠܛܵܒ݂ܬܵܐ ܘܠܦܘܼܠܚܵܢܵܐ ܕܗܲܝܡܵܢܘܼܬܵܐ،
TRL: Boet aha ameenaeet ke hawakh ṣaloeye boet deeawkhoon, dhaweytoon khsheekhe lgabayta dalahan, o makmil beeawkhoon bkhayleh kl neesha ṣpayee lṭawta o lpoelkhana dhaymanoeta,
ENG: To which end we also pray always for you, that our God may count you worthy of your calling, and fulfill every desire of goodness and every work of faith, with power;

ASY: ܗܲܕܟ݂ܵܐ ܕܫܸܡܵܐ ܕܡܵܪܲܢ ܝܼܫܘܿܥ ܦܵܐܹܫ ܚܩܝܼܪܵܐ ܒܝܼܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ، ܘܐܲܚܬܘܿܢ ܒܝܼܹܗ، ܐܲܝܟ݂ ܫܵܦܵܩܲܬ ܕܐܲܠܵܗܲܢ ܘܡܵܪܲܢ ܝܼܫܘܿܥ ܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ.
TRL: Hadkha dshima dmaran eeshoo' paesh khqeera beeawkhoon, o akhtoon bee-eh, aykh shapaqat dalahan o Maran eeshoo' msheekha.
ENG: that the name of our Lord Jesus may be glorified in you, and ye in him, according to the grace of our God and the Lord Jesus Christ.

ASY: ܒܘܼܬ ܐ݇ܬܵܝܬܵܐ ܕܡܵܪܲܢ ܝܼܫܘܿܥ ܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ ܘܓ̰ܡܵܥܬܲܢ ܡܥܘܼܕܵܠܹ̈ܐ ܠܟܸܣ ܠܹܗ، ܒܸܛܠܵܒܵܐ ܝܘܲܚ ܡܸܢܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܐܲܚܘܿܢܘܵܬܹ̈ܐ،
TRL: Boet tayta dmaran eeshoo' msheekha o jma'tan m'oedale lkis-leh, biṭlaba ywakh minawkhoon akhoonwate,
ENG: Now we beseech you, brethren, touching the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ, and our gathering together unto him;

ASY: ܠܵܐ ܓ̰ܲܠܕܹܐ ܦܵܝܫܝܼܬܘܿܢ ܫܥܝܼܫܹܐ ܒܪܸܥܝܵܢܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ، ܘܠܵܐ ܡܘܼܫܓܸܫܹܐ ܒܝܲܕ ܪܘܼܚܵܐ ܝܲܢ ܒܗܹܡܸܙܡܵܢ ܝܲܢ ܒܐܸܓܲܪܬܵܐ، ܐܲܝܟ݂ ܕܐܸܢ ܦܝܼܫܬܵܐ ܝܠܵܗ̇ ܟܬܝܼܒ݂ܬܵܐ ܒܝܼܲܢ، ܒܹܐܡܵܪܵܐ، ”ܝܵܘܡܵܐ ܕܡܵܪܲܢ ܡܸܛܝܵܐ ܝܠܹܗ.“
TRL: La jalde paysheetoon sh'eeshe bri'yanawkhoon, o la moeshgishe byad roekha yan bhemizman yan bigarta, aykh din peeshta-ylaha kteewta bee-an, bemara, ”yawma dmaran miṭya-yleh.“
ENG: to the end that ye be not quickly shaken from your mind, nor yet be troubled, either by spirit, or by word, or by epistle as from us, as that the day of the Lord is now present;

ASY: ܐܘܼܦ ܚܲܕ ܠܵܐ ܡܲܚܠܸܛ ܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܒܗܸܟ̃ ܐܘܼܪܚܵܐ، ܣܵܒܵܒ ܗ̇ܘ ܝܵܘܡܵܐ ܠܹܐ ܐܵܬܹܐ ܐܸܢ ܩܵܕ݇ܡܵܝܬܵܐ ܠܵܐ ܐܵܬܝܵܐ ܡܵܪܘܿܕܘܼܬܵܐ ܘܦܵܐܹܫ ܓܸܠܝܵܐ ܒܲܪܢܵܫܵܐ ܕܚܛܝܼܬܵܐ، ܒܪܘܿܢܵܐ ܕܐܲܒ݂ܕܵܢܵܐ،
TRL: Oep khad la makhliṭ lawkhoon bhich oerkha, sabab haw yawma le ate in qamayta la atya maroodoeta o paesh gilya barnasha dkhṭeeta, broona dawdana,
ENG: let no man beguile you in any wise: for it will not be, except the falling away come first, and the man of sin be revealed, the son of perdition,

ASY: ܗ̇ܘ ܕܝܼܠܹܗ ܕܲܠܩܘܼܒ݂ܠܵܝܵܐ ܘܡܲܪܘܼܡܘܼܗ̇ ܝܠܹܗ ܓܵܢܹܗ ܥܲܠ ܟܠ ܡܸܢܕܝܼ ܕܝܼܠܹܗ ܦܝܼܫܵܐ ܩܸܪܝܵܐ ܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ ܘܕܝܼܠܹܗ ܣܓ݂ܝܼܕܵܐ، ܗܲܕܟ݂ܵܐ ܕܡܲܬܘܼܒ݂ܘܼܗ̇ ܝܠܹܗ ܓܵܢܹܗ ܓܵܘ ܗܲܝܟܠܵܐ ܕܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ، ܘܡܲܚܙܘܼܝܘܼܗ̇ ܓܵܢܹܗ ܐܲܝܟ݂ ܕܐܸܢ ܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ ܝܠܹܗ.
TRL: Haw deeleh dalqoewlaya o maroemoeha-yleh ganeh 'al kl mindee deeleh peesha qirya Alaha o deeleh sgheeda, hadkha dmatoewoeha-yleh ganeh gaw haykla dalaha, o makhzoeyoeha ganeh aykh din Alaha-yleh.
ENG: he that opposeth and exalteth himself against all that is called God or that is worshipped; so that he sitteth in the temple of God, setting himself forth as God.

ASY: ܠܹܐ ܝܬܘܿܢ ܒܸܕܟ݂ܵܪܵܐ ܕܐ݇ܡܝܼܪܝܼ ܐܲܢܹܐ ܐܸܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܐܝܼܡܲܢ ܕܝܼܘܸܢ ܗ݇ܘܵܐ ܥܲܡܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ؟
TRL: Le ytoon bidkhara dmeeree ane ilawkhoon eeman deewin wa 'amawkhoon?
ENG: Remember ye not, that, when I was yet with you, I told you these things?

ASY: ܘܐܵܕܝܼܵܐ ܒܝܼܕܵܥܵܐ ܝܬܘܿܢ ܕܡܘܿܕܝܼ ܝܠܹܗ ܡܲܟܠܘܼܝܹܐ ܗܲܠ ܕܦܵܐܹܫ ܓܸܠܝܵܐ ܒܙܲܒ݂ܢܹܗ.
TRL: O adeea beeda'a ytoon dmoodee-yleh makloeye hal dpaesh gilya bzawneh.
ENG: And now ye know that which restraineth, to the end that he may be revealed in his own season.

ASY: ܣܵܒܵܒ ܐ݇ܪܵܙܵܐ ܕܥܵܘܠܵܐ ܡ̣ܢ ܓ̰ܲܠܕܹܐ ܒܸܦܠܵܚܵܐ ܝܠܹܗ، ܐܝܼܢܵܐ ܗ̇ܘ ܕܡܲܟܠܘܼܝܹܗ ܝܠܹܗ ܗܲܠ ܐܵܕܝܼܵܐ ܒܸܬ ܥܵܒܹܕ ܗܲܕܟ݂ܵܐ ܗܲܠ ܕܦܵܐܹܫ ܫܩܝܼܠܵܐ ܡ̣ܢ ܐܘܼܪܚܵܐ.
TRL: Sabab raza d'awla min jalde biplakha-yleh, eena haw dmakloeyeh-yleh hal adeea bit 'abed hadkha hal dpaesh shqeela min oerkha.
ENG: For the mystery of lawlessness doth already work: only there is one that restraineth now, until he be taken out of the way.

ASY: ܗ̇ܝܓܵܗ ܒܸܬ ܦܵܐܹܫ ܓܸܠܝܵܐ ܗ̇ܘ ܕܝܼܠܹܗ ܥܵܘܵܠܵܐ، ܗ̇ܘ ܕܡܵܪܲܢ ܝܼܫܘܿܥ ܒܸܬ ܛܲܠܸܩ ܠܹܗ ܒܢܦܵܚܬܵܐ ܕܦܘܼܡܹܗ، ܘܒܸܬ ܒܲܛܸܠ ܠܹܗ ܒܫܲܦ̮ܩܵܐ ܕܐ݇ܬܵܝܬܹܗ.
TRL: Haygah bit paesh gilya haw deeleh 'awala, haw dmaran eeshoo' bit ṭaliq-leh bnpakhta dpoemeh, o bit baṭil-leh bshawqa dtayteh.
ENG: And then shall be revealed the lawless one, whom the Lord Jesus shall slay with the breath of his mouth, and bring to nought by the manifestation of his coming;

ASY: ܗ̇ܘ ܥܵܘܵܠܵܐ ܐ݇ܬܵܝܬܹܗ ܐܲܝܟ݂ ܦܘܼܠܚܵܢܵܐ ܕܣܵܛܵܢܵܐ ܝܠܵܗ̇، ܒܟܠܹܗ ܚܲܝܠܵܐ ܘܢܝܼܫܲܢܩܹ̈ܐ ܘܕܘܼܡܵܪܹ̈ܐ ܕܕܘܼܓܠܵܐ،
TRL: Haw 'awala tayteh aykh poelkhana dsaṭana-ylaha, bkleh khayla o neeshanqe o doemare ddoegla,
ENG: even he, whose coming is according to the working of Satan with all power and signs and lying wonders,

ASY: ܘܒܟܠܵܗ̇ ܥܲܠܕܵܝܬܵܐ ܕܥܵܘܠܵܐ ܠܐܵܢܝܼ ܕܒܸܛܠܵܩܵܐ ܝܢܵܐ، ܣܵܒܵܒ ܠܵܐ ܩܘܼܒܸܠ ܠܗܘܿܢ ܚܘܼܒܵܐ ܕܫܪܵܪܵܐ ܕܦܵܪܩܝܼ ܗ݇ܘܵܘ.
TRL: O bklaha 'aldayta d'awla lanee dbiṭlaqa yna, sabab la qoebil-lhoon khoeba dshrara dparqee waw.
ENG: and with all deceit of unrighteousness for them that are perishing; because they received not the love of the truth, that they might be saved.

ASY: ܒܘܼܬ ܐܵܗܵܐ ܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ ܒܸܬ ܫܲܕܸܪ ܐܸܠܲܝܗܝ ܚܸܠܛܸܢܝܘܼܬܵܐ ܓܘܼܪܬܵܐ ܕܗܲܡܸܢܝܼ ܠܕܘܼܓܠܵܐ،
TRL: Boet aha Alaha bit shadir ilayhy khilṭinyoeta goerta dhaminee ldoegla,
ENG: And for this cause God sendeth them a working of error, that they should believe a lie:

ASY: ܕܦܵܝܫܝܼ ܕܝܼܢܹܐ ܟܠܲܝܗܝ ܐܵܢܝܼ ܕܠܵܐ ܗܘܼܡܸܢܗܘܿܢ ܠܫܪܵܪܵܐ، ܐܸܠܵܐ ܒܣܝܼܡ ܠܵܗ̇ ܠܗܘܿܢ ܒܥܵܘܠܵܐ.
TRL: Dpayshee deene klayhy anee dla hoeminhoon lshrara, ila bseem-laha-lhoon b'awla.
ENG: that they all might be judged who believed not the truth, but had pleasure in unrighteousness.

ASY: ܐܝܼܢܵܐ ܐܲܚܢܲܢ، ܐܲܚܘܿܢܘܵܬܹ̈ܐ، ܘܵܠܹܐ ܝܠܵܗ̇ ܕܫܲܟܪܲܚ ܠܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ ܒܟܠ ܙܲܒ݂ܢܵܐ ܒܘܼܬ ܕܝܼܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ، ܡܘܼܚܸܒܹ̈ܐ ܒܡܵܪܲܢ، ܣܵܒܵܒ ܡ̣ܢ ܩܵܕ݇ܡܵܝܬܵܐ ܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ ܩܲܡ ܓܲܒܹܐ ܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܠܦܘܼܪܩܵܢܵܐ ܒܩܵܕܲܫܬܵܐ ܕܪܘܼܚܵܐ ܘܗܲܝܡܵܢܘܼܬܵܐ ܒܫܪܵܪܵܐ.
TRL: Eena akhnan, akhoonwate, wale-ylaha dshakrakh lalaha bkl zawna boet deeawkhoon, moekhibe bmaran, sabab min qamayta Alaha qam gabe lawkhoon lpoerqana bqadashta droekha o haymanoeta bshrara.
ENG: But we are bound to give thanks to God alway for you, brethren beloved of the Lord, for that God chose you from the beginning unto salvation in sanctification of the Spirit and belief of the truth:

ASY: ܠܕܐܵܗܵܐ ܩܪܹܐ ܠܹܗ ܐܸܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܒܐܹܘܲܢܓܲܠܝܼܘܿܢ ܕܝܼܲܢ، ܕܗܵܘܹܝܬܘܿܢ ܫܲܪ̈ܝܼܟܹܐ ܒܚܸܩܪܵܐ ܕܡܵܪܲܢ ܝܼܫܘܿܥ ܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ.
TRL: Ldaha qre-leh ilawkhoon bewangaleeoon dee-an, dhaweytoon shareeke bkhiqra dmaran eeshoo' msheekha.
ENG: whereunto he called you through our gospel, to the obtaining of the glory of our Lord Jesus Christ.

ASY: ܗܲܕܟ݂ܵܐ ܐܲܚܘܿܢܘܵܬܹ̈ܐ، ܟܠܹܝܡܘܼܢ ܩܸܘܝܹܐ، ܘܕܒ݂ܘܿܩܘܼܢ ܒܣܲܦܝܵܢܘܼܝܵܬܹ̈ܐ ܕܝ݇ܠܝܼܦ ܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܡܸܢܲܢ، ܝܲܢ ܒܗܹܡܸܙܡܵܢ ܕܦܘܼܡܵܐ ܝܲܢ ܒܐܸܓܲܪܬܵܐ.
TRL: Hadkha akhoonwate, kleymoen qiwye, o dwooqoen bsapyanoeyate dleep lawkhoon minan, yan bhemizman dpoema yan bigarta.
ENG: So then, brethren, stand fast, and hold the traditions which ye were taught, whether by word, or by epistle of ours.

ASY: ܡܵܪܲܢ ܝܼܫܘܿܥ ܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ ܒܓܵܢܹܗ ܘܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ ܒܵܒܲܢ، ܗ̇ܘ ܕܡܘܼܚܸܒ ܠܹܗ ܐܸܠܲܢ ܘܒܫܵܦܵܩܲܬ ܝܘܼܗ݇ܒܸܠ ܠܹܗ ܐܸܠܲܢ ܒܘܼܝܵܐܵܐ ܥܵܠܡܝܼܢܵܝܵܐ ܘܣܲܒ݂ܪܵܐ ܛܵܒ݂ܵܐ،
TRL: Maran eeshoo' msheekha bganeh o Alaha baban, haw dmoekhib-leh ilan o bshapaqat yoebil-leh ilan boeyaa 'almeenaya o sawra ṭawa,
ENG: Now our Lord Jesus Christ himself, and God our Father which loved us and gave us eternal comfort and good hope through grace,

ASY: ܚܲܠܸܢ ܠܸܒܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܘܣܵܢܹܕ ܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܒܟܠ ܗܹܡܸܙܡܵܢ ܘܒܟܠ ܦܘܼܠܚܵܢܵܐ ܛܵܒ݂ܵܐ.
TRL: Khalin libawkhoon o saned lawkhoon bkl hemizman o bkl poelkhana ṭawa.
ENG: comfort your hearts and stablish them in every good work and word.

ASY: ܒܚܲܪܬܵܐ، ܐܲܚܘܿܢܘܵܬܹ̈ܐ، ܨܲܠܹܝܡܘܼܢ ܡ̣ܢ ܓܹܒܲܢ ܕܦܵܪܣܵܐ ܗܹܡܸܙܡܵܢ ܕܡܵܪܲܢ ܘܦܵܝܫܵܐ ܚܩܝܼܪܬܵܐ، ܐܲܝܟ݂ ܕܝܼܠܵܗ̇ ܠܟܸܣ ܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ،
TRL: Bkharta, akhoonwate, ṣaleymoen min geban dparsa hemizman dmaran o paysha khqeerta, aykh deelaha lkis lawkhoon,
ENG: Finally, brethren, pray for us, that the word of the Lord may run and be glorified, even as also it is with you;

ASY: ܘܕܦܵܝܫܲܚ ܦܘܼܨܝܹܐ ܡ̣ܢ ܐ݇ܢܵܫܹ̈ܐ ܦܟ̰ܝܼܠܹ̈ܐ ܘܒܝܼܫܹ̈ܐ، ܣܵܒܵܒ ܗܲܝܡܵܢܘܼܬܵܐ ܠܹܐ ܝܠܵܗ̇ ܕܟܠܲܝܗܝ ܐ݇ܢܵܫܹ̈ܐ.
TRL: O dpayshakh poeṣye min nashe pcheele o beeshe, sabab haymanoeta le-ylaha dklayhy nashe.
ENG: and that we may be delivered from unreasonable and evil men; for all have not faith.

ASY: ܐܝܼܢܵܐ ܡܗܘܼܡܢܵܐ ܝܠܹܗ ܡܵܪܝܵܐ، ܘܗ̇ܘ ܒܸܬ ܣܵܢܹܕ ܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܘܢܵܛܹܪܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܡ̣ܢ ܒܝܼܫܵܐ.
TRL: Eena mhoemna-yleh Marya, o haw bit saned lawkhoon o naṭerawkhoon min beesha.
ENG: But the Lord is faithful, who shall stablish you, and guard you from the evil one.

ASY: ܘܐܲܚܢܲܢ ܚܵܬܸܪܓ̰ܲܡܥ ܝܼܘܲܚ ܒܡܵܪܲܢ ܕܒܸܥܒ݂ܵܕܵܐ ܝܬܘܿܢ ܘܒܸܬ ܥܵܒ݂ܕܝܼܬܘܿܢ ܡܸܢܕܝܼܵܢܹ̈ܐ ܕܦܩܝܼܕ ܠܲܢ ܐܸܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ.
TRL: O akhnan khatirjam' eewakh bmaran dbi'wada ytoon o bit 'awdeetoon mindeeane dpqeed lan ilawkhoon.
ENG: And we have confidence in the Lord touching you, that ye both do and will do the things which we command.

ASY: ܘܡܵܪܲܢ ܡܗܲܕܹܐ ܠܸܒܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܒܚܘܼܒܵܐ ܕܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ ܘܒܚܡܵܠܬܵܐ ܕܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ.
TRL: O Maran mhade libawkhoon bkhoeba dalaha o bkhmalta dmsheekha.
ENG: And the Lord direct your hearts into the love of God, and into the patience of Christ.

ASY: ܦܲܩܘܼܕܹܐ ܝܘܲܚ ܐܸܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ، ܐܲܚܘܿܢܘܵܬܹ̈ܐ، ܒܫܸܡܵܐ ܕܡܵܪܲܢ ܝܼܫܘܿܥ ܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ، ܕܪܵܚܩܝܼܬܘܿܢ ܡ̣ܢ ܟܠ ܐܲܚܘܿܢܵܐ ܒܲܛܝܼܠܵܐ ܕܠܹܐ ܝܠܹܗ ܒܸܚܵܝܵܐ ܐܲܝܟ݂ ܣܲܦܝܵܢܘܼܬܵܐ ܕܩܘܼܒܸܠ ܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܡܸܢܲܢ.
TRL: Paqoede ywakh ilawkhoon, akhoonwate, bshima dmaran eeshoo' msheekha, drakhqeetoon min kl akhoona baṭeela dle-yleh bikhaya aykh sapyanoeta dqoebil lawkhoon minan.
ENG: Now we command you, brethren, in the name of our Lord Jesus Christ, that ye withdraw yourselves from every brother that walketh disorderly, and not after the tradition which they received of us.

ASY: ܣܵܒܵܒ ܒܓܵܢܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܟܹܐ ܝܵܕܥܝܼܬܘܿܢ ܕܵܐܟ݂ܝܼ ܘܵܠܹܐ ܝܠܵܗ̇ ܕܫܵܩܠܝܼܬܘܿܢ ܛܘܼܦ̮ܣܵܐ ܡܸܢܲܢ، ܣܵܒܵܒ ܠܵܐ ܗܘܹܐ ܠܲܢ ܒܲܛܝܼܠܹ̈ܐ ܐܝܼܡܲܢ ܕܝܼܘܲܚ ܗ݇ܘܵܘ ܠܟܸܣ ܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ،
TRL: Sabab bganawkhoon ke yad'eetoon dakhee wale-ylaha dshaqleetoon ṭoewsa minan, sabab la hwe lan baṭeele eeman deewakh waw lkis lawkhoon,
ENG: For yourselves know how ye ought to imitate us: for we behaved not ourselves disorderly among you;

ASY: ܐܘܼܦ ܠܲܚܡܵܐ ܚܘܼܪܵܝܝܼ ܠܵܐ ܐ݇ܟ݂ܝܼܠ ܠܲܢ ܡ̣ܢ ܠܟܸܣ ܗܸܟ̃ ܚܲܕ، ܐܸܠܵܐ ܦܠܝܼܚ ܠܲܢ ܒܠܲܝܠܹܐ ܘܒܐܝܼܡܵܡܵܐ، ܒܥܲܡܠܵܐ ܘܒܓ̰ܗܵܝܬܵܐ، ܕܠܵܐ ܡܲܬܒܲܚ ܗ݇ܘܵܘ ܝܘܼܩܪܵܐ ܥܲܠ ܗܸܟ̃ ܚܲܕ ܡܸܢܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ،
TRL: Oep lakhma khoerayee la kheel lan min lkis hich khad, ila pleekh lan blayle o beemama, b'amla o bjhayta, dla matbakh waw yoeqra 'al hich khad minawkhoon,
ENG: neither did we eat bread for nought at any man’s hand, but in labour and travail, working night and day, that we might not burden any of you:

ASY: ܠܵܐ ܣܵܒܵܒ ܠܲܝܬ ܠܲܢ ܗܵܩܘܼܬܵܐ ܕܥܵܒ݂ܕܲܚ ܗܲܕܟ݂ܵܐ، ܐܸܠܵܐ ܕܗܵܘܲܚ ܛܘܼܦ̮ܣܵܐ ܐܸܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ، ܕܥܵܒ݂ܕܝܼܬܘܿܢ ܡܐܲܝܟ݂ ܕܝܼܲܢ.
TRL: La sabab layt lan haqoeta d'awdakh hadkha, ila dhawakh ṭoewsa ilawkhoon, d'awdeetoon maykh dee-an.
ENG: not because we have not the right, but to make ourselves an ensample unto you, that ye should imitate us.

ASY: ܣܵܒܵܒ ܐܝܼܡܲܢ ܕܠܟܸܣ ܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܝܼܘܲܚ ܗ݇ܘܵܘ ܦܩܝܼܕ ܠܲܢ ܐܸܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ، ܕܐܸܢ ܐ݇ܢܵܫܵܐ ܠܵܐ ܦܵܠܹܚ، ܐܘܼܦ ܠܵܐ ܐܵܟܹܠ.
TRL: Sabab eeman dlkis lawkhoon eewakh waw pqeed lan ilawkhoon, din nasha la palekh, oep la akel.
ENG: For even when we were with you, this we commanded you, If any will not work, neither let him eat.

ASY: ܣܵܒܵܒ ܒܸܫܡܵܥܵܐ ܝܘܲܚ ܕܐܝܼܬ ܐ݇ܢܵܫܹ̈ܐ ܓܵܘܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܕܒܸܚܵܝܵܐ ܝܢܵܐ ܒܲܛܝܼܠܹ̈ܐ، ܘܠܹܐ ܝܢܵܐ ܒܸܥܒ݂ܵܕܵܐ ܗܸܟ̃ ܡܸܢܕܝܼ، ܐܸܠܵܐ ܒܸܚܒ݂ܵܛܵܐ ܝܢܵܐ ܒܫܘܼܠܵܢܹ̈ܐ ܣܪ̈ܝܼܩܹܐ.
TRL: Sabab bishma'a ywakh deet nashe gawawkhoon dbikhaya yna baṭeele, o le yna bi'wada hich mindee, ila bikhwaṭa yna bshoelane sreeqe.
ENG: For we hear of some that walk among you disorderly, that work not at all, but are busybodies.

ASY: ܐܝܼܢܵܐ ܗܲܪ ܠܐܲܢܹܐ ܦܲܩܘܼܕܹܐ ܝܘܲܚ ܘܒܸܛܠܵܒܵܐ ܡܸܢܲܝܗܝ ܒܡܵܪܲܢ ܝܼܫܘܿܥ ܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ، ܕܒܫܸܠܝܘܼܬܵܐ ܗܵܘܝܼ ܒܸܦܠܵܚܵܐ ܘܒܹܐܟ݂ܵܠܵܐ ܠܲܚܡܵܐ ܕܓܵܢܲܝܗܝ.
TRL: Eena har lane paqoede ywakh o biṭlaba minayhy bmaran eeshoo' msheekha, dbshilyoeta hawee biplakha o bekhala lakhma dganayhy.
ENG: Now them that are such we command and exhort in the Lord Jesus Christ, that with quietness they work, and eat their own bread.

ASY: ܘܐܲܚܬܘܿܢ ܐܲܚܘܿܢܘܵܬܹ̈ܐ، ܠܵܐ ܣܵܩܕܝܼܬܘܿܢ ܡ̣ܢ ܠܸܥܒ݂ܵܕܵܐ ܡܸܢܕܝܼ ܛܵܒ݂ܵܐ.
TRL: O akhtoon akhoonwate, la saqdeetoon min li'wada mindee ṭawa.
ENG: But ye, brethren, be not weary in well-doing.

ASY: ܘܐܸܢ ܐ݇ܢܵܫܵܐ ܠܵܐ ܡܲܨܝܸܬ ܠܗܹܡܸܙܡܵܢܲܢ̈ ܕܓܵܘ ܐܵܗܵܐ ܐܸܓܲܪܬܵܐ، ܪܫܘܿܡܘܼܢ ܠܹܗ، ܘܠܵܐ ܚܵܒ݂ܛܝܼܬܘܿܢ ܥܲܡܹܗ، ܕܦܵܐܹܫ ܢܟ݂ܝܼܦܵܐ.
TRL: O in nasha la maṣyit lhemizmanan dgaw aha igarta, rshoomoen-leh, o la khawṭeetoon 'ameh, dpaesh nkheepa.
ENG: And if any man obeyeth not our word by this epistle, note that man, that ye have no company with him, to the end that he may be ashamed.

ASY: ܐܝܼܢܵܐ ܠܵܐ ܚܵܫܒ݂ܝܼܬܘܿܢ ܠܹܗ ܐܲܝܟ݂ ܕܸܫܡܸܢ، ܐܸܠܵܐ ܗܲܒ݂݇ܠܘܼܢ ܠܹܗ ܢܵܨܝܼܗܲܬ ܐܲܝܟ݂ ܕܠܐܲܚܘܿܢܵܐ.
TRL: Eena la khashweetoon-leh aykh dishmin, ila haloen-leh naṣeehat aykh dlakhoona.
ENG: And yet count him not as an enemy, but admonish him as a brother.

ASY: ܘܡܵܪܵܐ ܕܫܠܵܡܵܐ ܒܓܵܢܹܗ ܝܲܗ݇ܒܸܠ ܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܫܠܵܡܵܐ ܒܟܠ ܙܲܒ݂ܢܵܐ ܘܒܟܠ ܐܘܼܪܚܵܐ. ܡܵܪܲܢ ܥܲܡ ܟܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ.
TRL: O mara dshlama bganeh yabil lawkhoon shlama bkl zawna o bkl oerkha. Maran 'am klawkhoon.
ENG: Now the Lord of peace himself give you peace at all times in all ways. The Lord be with you all.

ASY: ܐܵܢܵܐ ܦܵܘܠܘܿܣ ܒܸܟܬܵܒ݂ܵܐ ܝܘܸܢ ܐܵܗܵܐ ܫܠܵܡܵܐ ܒܐܝܼܕܵܐ ܕܓܵܢܝܼ، ܕܝܼܠܹܗ ܢܝܼܫܲܢܩܵܐ ܓܵܘ ܟܠ ܐܸܓܲܪܬܵܐ.
TRL: Ana pawloos biktawa ywin aha shlama beeda dganee, deeleh neeshanqa gaw kl igarta.
ENG: The salutation of me Paul with mine own hand, which is the token in every epistle: so I write.

ASY: ܫܵܦܵܩܲܬ ܕܡܵܪܲܢ ܝܼܫܘܿܥ ܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ ܥܲܡ ܟܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ. ܐܵܡܹܝܢ.
TRL: Shapaqat dmaran eeshoo' msheekha 'am klawkhoon. Ameyn.
ENG: The grace of our Lord Jesus Christ be with you all.

ASY: ܦܵܘܠܘܿܣ، ܫܠܝܼܚܵܐ ܕܝܼܫܘܿܥ ܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ، ܒܦܘܼܩܕܵܢܵܐ ܕܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ ܦܵܪܘܿܩܲܢ، ܘܕܝܼܫܘܿܥ ܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ ܗܹܒ݂ܝܼܲܢ،
TRL: Pawloos, shleekha deeshoo' msheekha, bpoeqdana dalaha parooqan, o deeshoo' msheekha hewee-an,
ENG: Paul, an apostle of Christ Jesus according to the commandment of God our Saviour, and Christ Jesus our hope;

ASY: ܠܛܝܼܡܵܬܹܐܘܿܣ، ܒܪܘܿܢܵܐ ܫܲܪܝܼܪܵܐ ܒܗܲܝܡܵܢܘܼܬܵܐ. ܫܵܦܵܩܲܬ ܘܪ̈ܲܚܡܹܐ ܘܫܠܵܡܵܐ، ܡ̣ܢ ܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ ܒܵܒܵܐ ܘܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ ܝܼܫܘܿܥ ܡܵܪܲܢ.
TRL: Lṭeemateoos, broona shareera bhaymanoeta. Shapaqat o rakhme o shlama, min Alaha baba o msheekha eeshoo' Maran.
ENG: unto Timothy, my true child in faith: Grace, mercy, peace, from God the Father and Christ Jesus our Lord.

ASY: ܕܵܐܟ݂ܝܼ ܕܛܠܝܼܒ ܠܝܼ ܡܸܢܘܼܟ݂ ܐܝܼܡܲܢ ܕܒܹܐܙܵܠܵܐ ܝܘܸܢ ܗ݇ܘܵܐ ܠܡܵܩܹܕܘܿܢܝܼܵܐ، ܕܦܵܝܫܹܬ ܓܵܘ ܐܵܦܸܣܘܿܣ، ܕܦܵܩܕܹܬ ܠܚܲܕ݇ܟܡܵܐ ܦܲܪ̈ܨܘܿܦܹܐ ܕܠܵܐ ܡܲܠܦܝܼ ܝܘܼܠܦܵܢܹ̈ܐ ܦܪ̈ܝܼܫܹܐ،
TRL: Dakhee dṭleeb-lee minoekh eeman dbezala ywin wa lmaqedooneea, dpayshet gaw apisoos, dpaqdet lkhakma parṣoope dla malpee yoelpane preeshe,
ENG: As I exhorted thee to tarry at Ephesus, when I was going into Macedonia, that thou mightest charge certain men not to teach a different doctrine,

ASY: ܘܠܵܐ ܡܲܨܝܸܬܝܼ ܠܗܲܩܝܵܬܹ̈ܐ ܘܠܬܲܫܥܝܼܵܬܹ̈ܐ ܕܫܲܪ̈ܒܵܬܹܐ ܐܲܝܢܝܼ ܕܠܲܝܬ ܠܗܘܿܢ ܬܝܵܡܵܐ. ܐܲܢܹܐ ܟܹܐ ܡܲܒܪܝܼ ܕܘܼܪ̈ܵܫܹܐ ܒܘܼܫ ܙܵܘܕܵܐ ܡ̣ܢ ܦܘܼܠܚܵܢܹ̈ܐ ܕܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ ܕܝܼܢܵܐ ܒܗܲܝܡܵܢܘܼܬܵܐ.
TRL: O la maṣyitee lhaqyate o ltash'eeate dsharbate aynee dlayt-lhoon tyama. Ane ke mabree doerashe boesh zawda min poelkhane dalaha deena bhaymanoeta.
ENG: neither to give heed to fables and endless genealogies, the which minister questionings, rather than a dispensation of God which is in faith; so do I now.

ASY: ܐܝܼܢܵܐ ܢܝܼܫܵܐ ܕܦܘܼܩܕܵܢܵܐ ܚܘܼܒܵܐ ܝܠܹܗ ܡ̣ܢ ܠܸܒܵܐ ܕܸܟ݂ܝܵܐ ܘܡ̣ܢ ܐܸܢܝܲܬ ܛܵܒ݂ܬܵܐ ܘܡ̣ܢ ܗܲܝܡܵܢܘܼܬܵܐ ܫܲܪܝܼܪܬܵܐ.
TRL: Eena neesha dpoeqdana khoeba-yleh min liba dikhya o min inyat ṭawta o min haymanoeta shareerta.
ENG: But the end of the charge is love out of a pure heart and a good conscience and faith unfeigned:

ASY: ܚܲܕ݇ܟܡܵܐ ܚܠܝܼܛ ܠܗܘܿܢ ܡ̣ܢ ܐܲܢܹܐ، ܘܩܠܝܼܒ ܠܗܘܿܢ ܠܗܹܡܸܙܡܵܢܹ̈ܐ ܒܲܛܝܼܠܹ̈ܐ.
TRL: Khakma khleeṭ-lhoon min ane, o qleeb-lhoon lhemizmane baṭeele.
ENG: from which things some having swerved have turned aside unto vain talking;

ASY: ܒܥܹܐ ܠܗܘܿܢ ܕܗܵܘܝܼ ܡܲܠܦܵܢܹ̈ܐ ܕܢܵܡܘܿܣܵܐ، ܐܝܼܢܵܐ ܠܹܐ ܝܢܵܐ ܦܲܪܡܘܼܝܹܐ ܡܘܿܕܝܼ ܝܢܵܐ ܗܲܡܙܘܼܡܹܐ، ܘܐܘܼܦ ܠܵܐ ܡܸܢܕܝܼ ܕܒܘܼܬ ܕܝܼܹܗ ܡܲܩܪܘܼܨܹܐ ܝܢܵܐ.
TRL: B'e-lhoon dhawee malpane dnamoosa, eena le yna parmoeye moodee yna hamzoeme, o oep la mindee dboet dee-eh maqroeṣe yna.
ENG: desiring to be teachers of the law, though they understand neither what they say, nor whereof they confidently affirm.

ASY: ܐܝܼܢܵܐ ܐܲܚܢܲܢ ܟܹܐ ܝܵܕܥܲܚ ܕܢܵܡܘܿܣܵܐ ܛܵܒ݂ܵܐ ܝܠܹܗ ܐܸܢ ܐ݇ܢܵܫܵܐ ܡܲܦܠܸܚ ܠܹܗ ܩܵܢܘܿܢܵܐܝܼܬ.
TRL: Eena akhnan ke yad'akh dnamoosa ṭawa-yleh in nasha maplikh-leh qanoonaeet.
ENG: But we know that the law is good, if a man use it lawfully,

ASY: ܐܘܼܦ ܟܹܐ ܝܵܕܥܲܚ ܕܢܵܡܘܿܣܵܐ ܠܹܐ ܝܠܹܗ ܦܝܼܫܵܐ ܝܘܼܗ݇ܒ݂ܵܐ ܠܙܲܕܝܼܩܹ̈ܐ، ܐܝܼܢܵܐ ܠܥܵܘܵܠܹ̈ܐ، ܠܡܵܪ̈ܘܿܕܹܐ، ܠܪ̈ܲܫܝܼܥܹܐ، ܠܚܲܛܵܝܹ̈ܐ، ܠܥܵܨܝܼܹ̈ܐ، ܘܠܵܐ ܕܸܟ݂ܝܹ̈ܐ، ܠܡܵܚܝܵܢܹ̈ܐ ܕܒܵܒܵܘܵܬܲܝ̈ܗܝ ܘܡܵܚܝܵܢܹ̈ܐ ܕܝܸܡܵܬܲܝ̈ܗܝ، ܠܩܵܛܠܵܢܹ̈ܐ ܕܐ݇ܢܵܫܹ̈ܐ،
TRL: Oep ke yad'akh dnamoosa le-yleh peesha yoewa lzadeeqe, eena l'awale, lmaroode, lrashee'e, lkhaṭaye, l'aṣee-e, o la dikhye, lmakhyane dbabawatayhy o makhyane dyimatayhy, lqaṭlane dnashe,
ENG: as knowing this, that law is not made for a righteous man, but for the lawless and unruly, for the ungodly and sinners, for the unholy and profane, for murderers of fathers and murderers of mothers, for manslayers,

ASY: ܠܙܲܢܵܝܹ̈ܐ، ܠܕܵܡܟ݂ܵܢܹ̈ܐ ܥܲܡ ܐܘܼܪ̈ܙܹܐ، ܠܓܵܢܒ݂ܵܢܹ̈ܐ ܕܐ݇ܢܵܫܹ̈ܐ، ܠܕܲܓܵܠܹ̈ܐ، ܠܫܵܡܛܵܢܹ̈ܐ ܕܡܵܘܡܵܬܹ̈ܐ؛ ܘܟܠ ܡܸܢܕܝܼ ܐ݇ܚܹܪ݇ܢܵܐ، ܐܸܢ ܐܝܼܬ، ܕܝܼܠܹܗ ܕܲܠܩܘܼܒ݂ܠ ܕܝܘܼܠܦܵܢܵܐ ܫܲܠܡܵܐ،
TRL: Lzanaye, ldamkhane 'am oerze, lganwane dnashe, ldagale, lshamṭane dmawmate; o kl mindee khena, in eet, deeleh dalqoewl dyoelpana shalma,
ENG: for fornicators, for abusers of themselves with men, for menstealers, for liars, for false swearers, and if there be any other thing contrary to the sound doctrine;

ASY: ܐܲܝܟ݂ ܐܹܘܲܢܓܲܠܝܼܘܿܢ ܕܚܸܩܪܵܐ ܕܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ ܒܘܼܪܟ݂ܵܐ، ܗ̇ܘ ܕܝܼܠܹܗ ܣܘܼܦܝܵܐ ܒܝܼܝܼ.
TRL: Aykh ewangaleeoon dkhiqra dalaha boerkha, haw deeleh soepya beeee.
ENG: according to the gospel of the glory of the blessed God, which was committed to my trust.

ASY: ܫܲܟܘܼܪܹܐ ܝܘܸܢ ܠܡܵܪܲܢ ܝܼܫܘܿܥ ܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ، ܗ̇ܘ ܕܩܲܡ ܚܲܠܸܢܝܼ ܣܵܒܵܒ ܚܫܝܼܒܸܢܹܗ ܡܗܘܼܡܢܵܐ ܘܪܫܝܼܡܸܢܹܗ ܠܚܸܠܡܲܬ،
TRL: Shakoere ywin lmaran eeshoo' msheekha, haw dqam khalinee sabab khsheebineh mhoemna o rsheemineh lkhilmat,
ENG: I thank him that enabled me, even Christ Jesus our Lord, for that he counted me faithful, appointing me to his service;

ASY: ܐܵܦܸܢ ܡ̣ܢ ܩܵܕ݇ܡܵܝܬܵܐ ܓܵܕܦܵܢܵܐ ܝܘܸܢ ܗ݇ܘܵܐ، ܘܟܲܡܪܵܢܵܐ، ܘܨܲܥܪܵܢܵܐ. ܐܝܼܢܵܐ ܦܝܼܫ ܠܝܼ ܝܘܼܗ݇ܒ݂ܵܐ ܪ̈ܲܚܡܹܐ، ܣܵܒܵܒ ܟܲܕ ܠܹܐ ܝܵܕܥܹܢ ܗ݇ܘܵܐ ܦܠܝܼܚ ܠܝܼ ܒܠܵܐ ܗܲܝܡܵܢܘܼܬܵܐ.
TRL: Apin min qamayta gadpana ywin wa, o kamrana, o ṣa'rana. Eena peesh-lee yoewa rakhme, sabab kad le yad'en wa pleekh-lee bla haymanoeta.
ENG: though I was before a blasphemer, and a persecutor, and injurious: howbeit I obtained mercy, because I did it ignorantly in unbelief;

ASY: ܘܙܝܼܕ ܠܵܗ̇ ܪܵܒܵܐ ܥܲܠܝܼ ܫܵܦܵܩܲܬ ܕܡܵܪܲܢ، ܥܲܡ ܗܲܝܡܵܢܘܼܬܵܐ ܘܚܘܼܒܵܐ ܕܒܝܼܫܘܿܥ ܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ.
TRL: O zeed-laha raba 'alee shapaqat dmaran, 'am haymanoeta o khoeba dbeeshoo' msheekha.
ENG: and the grace of our Lord abounded exceedingly with faith and love which is in Christ Jesus.

ASY: ܡܗܘܼܡܸܢܬܵܐ ܝܠܵܗ̇ ܗܹܡܸܙܡܵܢ ܘܚܫܝܼܚܬܵܐ ܠܟܠ ܩܵܒܲܠܬܵܐ، ܕܝܼܫܘܿܥ ܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ ܐ݇ܬܹܐ ܠܹܗ ܠܕܘܼܢܝܹܐ ܕܦܲܪܸܩ ܠܚܲܛܵܝܹ̈ܐ، ܗ̇ܘ ܕܒܘܼܫ ܚܸܪܒܵܐ ܐܵܢܵܐ ܝܘܸܢ.
TRL: Mhoeminta-ylaha hemizman o khsheekhta lkl qabalta, deeshoo' msheekha te-leh ldoenye dpariq lkhaṭaye, haw dboesh khirba ana ywin.
ENG: Faithful is the saying, and worthy of all acceptation, that Christ Jesus came into the world to save sinners; of whom I am chief:

ASY: ܐܝܼܢܵܐ ܒܘܼܬ ܐܵܗܵܐ ܥܸܠܬܵܐ ܦܝܼܫ ܠܝܼ ܝܘܼܗ݇ܒ݂ܵܐ ܪ̈ܲܚܡܹܐ، ܕܒܝܼܝܼ، ܗ̇ܘ ܒܘܼܫ ܚܸܪܒܵܐ، ܝܼܫܘܿܥ ܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ ܡܲܚܙܹܐ ܟܠܵܗ̇ ܡܲܪܝܲܟ݂ܬܵܐ ܕܒܹܐܢܵܐ، ܐܲܝܟ݂ ܛܘܼܦ̮ܣܵܐ ܠܐܵܢܝܼ ܕܒܸܬ ܗܲܡܸܢܝܼ ܒܝܼܹܗ ܠܚܲܝܹ̈ܐ ܕܠܥܵܠܲܡ.
TRL: Eena boet aha 'ilta peesh-lee yoewa rakhme, dbeeee, haw boesh khirba, eeshoo' msheekha makhze klaha maryakhta dbena, aykh ṭoewsa lanee dbit haminee bee-eh lkhaye dl'alam.
ENG: howbeit for this cause I obtained mercy, that in me as chief might Jesus Christ shew forth all his longsuffering, for an ensample of them which should hereafter believe on him unto eternal life.

ASY: ܐܵܕܝܼܵܐ ܠܡܲܠܟܵܐ ܥܵܠܡܝܼܢܵܝܵܐ، ܠܵܐ ܡܵܝܘܿܬܵܐ، ܠܵܐ ܡܸܬܚܲܙܝܵܢܵܐ، ܠܗ̇ܘ ܕܝܼܠܹܗ ܒܢܲܦ̮ܫܹܗ ܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ، ܗܵܘܹܐ ܐܝܼܩܵܪܵܐ ܘܬܸܫܒܘܿܚܬܵܐ ܠܥܵܠܲܡ ܥܵܠܡܝܼܢ. ܐܵܡܹܝܢ.
TRL: Adeea lmalka 'almeenaya, la mayoota, la mitkhazyana, lhaw deeleh bnawsheh Alaha, hawe eeqara o tishbookhta l'alam 'almeen. Ameyn.
ENG: Now unto the King eternal, incorruptible, invisible, the only God, be honour and glory for ever and ever. Amen.

ASY: ܐܵܗܵܐ ܦܘܼܩܕܵܢܵܐ ܣܲܦܘܼܝܹܐ ܝܘܸܢ ܒܝܼܘܼܟ݂، ܒܪܘܿܢܝܼ ܛܝܼܡܵܬܹܐܘܿܣ، ܐܲܝܟ݂ ܢܲܒܵܝܵܬܹ̈ܐ ܕܡ̣ܢ ܩܵܕ݇ܡ ܥܕܵܢܵܐ ܗܘܹܐ ܠܗܘܿܢ ܥܲܠܘܼܟ݂، ܕܒܝܼܲܝܗܝ ܦܵܠܫܹܬ ܦܠܵܫܵܐ ܫܲܦܝܼܪܵܐ،
TRL: Aha poeqdana sapoeye ywin beeoekh, broonee ṭeemateoos, aykh nabayate dmin qam 'dana hwe-lhoon 'aloekh, dbee-ayhy palshet plasha shapeera,
ENG: This charge I commit unto thee, my child Timothy, according to the prophecies which went before on thee, that by them thou mayest war the good warfare;

ASY: ܟܲܕ ܕܒ݂ܝܼܩܵܐ ܒܗܲܝܡܵܢܘܼܬܵܐ ܘܐܸܢܝܲܬ ܛܵܒ݂ܬܵܐ، ܗ̇ܝ ܕܚܲܕ݇ܟܡܵܐ ܪܘܼܦܝܵܐ ܠܗܘܿܢ، ܘܡ̣ܢ ܗܲܝܡܵܢܘܼܬܵܐ ܓܹܒܵܐ ܗܘܹܐ ܠܗܘܿܢ ܐܲܝܟ݂ ܐܸܠܦܵܐ ܚܪܝܼܩܬܵܐ.
TRL: Kad dweeqa bhaymanoeta o inyat ṭawta, hay dkhakma roepya-lhoon, o min haymanoeta geba hwe-lhoon aykh ilpa khreeqta.
ENG: holding faith and a good conscience; which some having thrust from them made shipwreck concerning the faith:

ASY: ܡܸܢܲܝܗܝ ܝܼܢܵܐ ܗܹܘܡܹܢܹܐܘܿܣ ܘܐܵܠܸܟܣܲܢܕܪܘܿܣ، ܐܲܝܢܝܼ ܕܣܘܼܦܝܲܝ ܠܝܼ ܠܣܵܛܵܢܵܐ ܕܦܵܝܫܝܼ ܡܘܼܠܦܹܐ ܕܠܵܐ ܓܵܕܦܝܼ.
TRL: Minayhy eena hewmeneoos o aliksandroos, aynee dsoepyay-lee lsaṭana dpayshee moelpe dla gadpee.
ENG: of whom is Hymenaeus and Alexander; whom I delivered unto Satan, that they might be taught not to blaspheme.

ASY: ܡ̣ܢ ܩܵܕ݇ܡ ܟܠ ܡܸܢܕܝܼ، ܒܸܛܠܵܒܵܐ ܝܘܸܢ ܕܒܵܥܘܼܝܵܬܹ̈ܐ ܘܨܠܵܘܵܬܹ̈ܐ ܘܦܲܪ̈ܦܲܠܝܵܬܹܐ ܘܫܵܟܲܪ̈ܝܵܬܹܐ ܦܵܝܫܝܼ ܡܘܼܩܪܸܒܹܐ ܡ̣ܢ ܓܹܒܵܐ ܕܟܠܲܝܗܝ ܒܢܲܝ̈ܢܵܫܵܐ،
TRL: Min qam kl mindee, biṭlaba ywin dba'oeyate o ṣlawate o parpalyate o shakaryate payshee moeqribe min geba dklayhy bnaynasha,
ENG: I exhort therefore, first of all, that supplications, prayers, intercessions, thanksgivings, be made for all men;

ASY: ܡ̣ܢ ܓܹܒܵܐ ܕܡܲܠܟܹ̈ܐ، ܘܡ̣ܢ ܓܹܒܵܐ ܕܟܠܲܝܗܝ ܐܵܢܝܼ ܕܝܼܢܵܐ ܓܵܘ ܫܘܼܠܛܵܢܵܐ، ܕܚܵܝܲܚ ܚܲܝܹ̈ܐ ܫܸܠܝܹܐ ܘܢܝܼܚܹ̈ܐ ܒܟܠܵܗ̇ ܙܕܘܼܥܬܵܐ ܕܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ ܘܒܐܝܼܩܵܪܵܐ.
TRL: Min geba dmalke, o min geba dklayhy anee deena gaw shoelṭana, dkhayakh khaye shilye o neekhe bklaha zdoe'ta dalaha o beeqara.
ENG: for kings and all that are in high place; that we may lead a tranquil and quiet life in all godliness and gravity.

ASY: ܐܵܗܵܐ ܛܵܒ݂ܵܐ ܝܠܹܗ ܘܡܩܲܒܠܵܐ ܩܵܕ݇ܡ ܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ ܦܵܪܘܿܩܲܢ،
TRL: Aha ṭawa-yleh o mqabla qam Alaha parooqan,
ENG: This is good and acceptable in the sight of God our Saviour;

ASY: ܗ̇ܘ ܕܟܹܐ ܒܵܥܹܐ ܕܟܠܲܝܗܝ ܐ݇ܢܵܫܹ̈ܐ ܦܵܪܩܝܼ ܘܐܵܬܝܼ ܠܝ݇ܕܲܥܬܵܐ ܕܫܪܵܪܵܐ.
TRL: Haw dke ba'e dklayhy nashe parqee o atee lda'ta dshrara.
ENG: who willeth that all men should be saved, and come to the knowledge of the truth.

ASY: ܣܵܒܵܒ ܐܝܼܬ ܚܲܕ ܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ، ܘܚܲܕ ܡܸܨܥܵܝܵܐ ܒܹܝܠ ܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ ܘܒܢܲܝ̈ܢܵܫܵܐ، ܕܝܼܠܹܗ ܒܲܪܢܵܫܵܐ ܝܼܫܘܿܥ ܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ،
TRL: Sabab eet khad Alaha, o khad miṣ'aya beyl Alaha o bnaynasha, deeleh barnasha eeshoo' msheekha,
ENG: For there is one God, one mediator also between God and men, himself man, Christ Jesus,

ASY: ܗ̇ܘ ܕܝܘܼܗ݇ܒܸܠ ܠܹܗ ܓܵܢܹܗ ܦܘܼܪܩܵܢܵܐ ܡ̣ܢ ܓܹܒܵܐ ܕܟܠܲܝܗܝ ܐ݇ܢܵܫܹ̈ܐ، ܣܵܗܕܘܼܬܵܐ ܕܦܝܼܫ ܠܵܗ̇ ܝܘܼܗ݇ܒܸܠܬܵܐ ܒܙܲܒ݂ܢܵܐ ܕܓܵܢܘܼܗ̇.
TRL: Haw dyoebil-leh ganeh poerqana min geba dklayhy nashe, sahdoeta dpeesh-laha yoebilta bzawna dganoeha.
ENG: who gave himself a ransom for all; the testimony to be borne in its own times;

ASY: ܠܐܵܗܵܐ ܢܝܼܫܵܐ ܐܵܢܵܐ ܦܝܼܫ ܠܝܼ ܪܫܝܼܡܵܐ ܟܵܪܘܿܙܵܐ ܘܫܠܝܼܚܵܐ ܘܡܲܠܦܵܢܵܐ ܕܗܲܝܡܵܢܘܼܬܵܐ ܘܕܫܪܵܪܵܐ ܠܐܸܡܘܵܬܹ̈ܐ. ܫܪܵܪܵܐ ܗܲܡܙܘܼܡܹܐ ܝܘܸܢ ܘܠܹܐ ܝܘܸܢ ܕܲܓܘܼܠܹܐ.
TRL: Laha neesha ana peesh-lee rsheema karooza o shleekha o malpana dhaymanoeta o dshrara limwate. Shrara hamzoeme ywin o le ywin dagoele.
ENG: whereunto I was appointed a preacher and an apostle (I speak the truth, I lie not), a teacher of the Gentiles in faith and truth.

ASY: ܒܲܣ ܒܸܒܥܵܝܵܐ ܝܘܸܢ ܕܐ݇ܢܵܫܹ̈ܐ ܗܵܘܝܼ ܨܲܠܘܼܝܹܐ ܨܠܘܿܬܵܐ ܒܟܠ ܕܘܼܟܵܐ، ܟܲܕ ܡܲܪܘܼܡܹܐ ܐܝܼܕܵܬܹ̈ܐ ܕܸܟ݂ܝܹ̈ܐ ܕܠܵܐ ܟܲܪܒܵܐ ܘܕܠܵܐ ܕܘܼܒܵܪܘܼܬܵܐ.
TRL: Bas bib'aya ywin dnashe hawee ṣaloeye ṣloota bkl doeka, kad maroeme eedate dikhye dla karba o dla doebaroeta.
ENG: I desire therefore that the men pray in every place, lifting up holy hands, without wrath and disputing.

ASY: ܗܲܕܟ݂ܵܐ ܐܘܼܦ ܒܲܟ݂ܬܵܬܹ̈ܐ، ܠܵܒ݂ܫܝܼ ܪܹܐܙܵܢܵܐܝܼܬ ܒܠܒ݂ܝܼܫܬܵܐ ܕܡܲܪܕܘܼܬܵܐ ܘܕܢܲܟ݂ܦܘܼܬܵܐ، ܠܵܐ ܣܲܩܠܝܼ ܓܵܢܲܝܗܝ ܒܓܸܕܠܹ̈ܐ ܘܒܕܲܗܒ݂ܵܐ، ܘܠܵܐ ܒܡܲܪ̈ܓܵܢܝܵܬܹܐ ܘܠܵܐ ܒܠܒ݂ܝܼܫܝܵܬܹ̈ܐ ܛܝܼܡܵܢܹ̈ܐ،
TRL: Hadkha oep bakhtate, lawshee rezanaeet blweeshta dmardoeta o dnakhpoeta, la saqlee ganayhy bgidle o bdahwa, o la bmarganyate o la blweeshyate ṭeemane,
ENG: In like manner, that women adorn themselves in modest apparel, with shamefastness and sobriety; not with braided hair, and gold or pearls or costly raiment;

ASY: ܐܸܠܵܐ ܒܦܘܼܠܚܵܢܹ̈ܐ ܛܵܒܹ̈ܐ، ܐܲܝܟ݂ ܕܚܫܝܼܚܬܵܐ ܝܠܵܗ̇ ܠܒܲܟ݂ܬܵܬܹ̈ܐ، ܐܵܢܝܼ ܕܡܵܘܕܝܼ ܙܕܘܼܥܬܵܐ ܕܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ.
TRL: Ila bpoelkhane ṭabe, aykh dkhsheekhta-ylaha lbakhtate, anee dmawdee zdoe'ta dalaha.
ENG: but (which becometh women professing godliness) through good works.

ASY: ܒܲܟ݂ܬܵܐ ܝܵܠܦܵܐ ܒܫܸܠܝܘܼܬܵܐ ܘܒܟܠܵܗ̇ ܙܲܒܛܘܼܬܵܐ.
TRL: Bakhta yalpa bshilyoeta o bklaha zabṭoeta.
ENG: Let a woman learn in quietness with all subjection.

ASY: ܐܝܼܢܵܐ ܠܹܐ ܝܘܸܢ ܒܝܼܵܗ݇ܒ݂ܵܐ ܦܣܵܣܵܐ ܠܒܲܟ݂ܬܵܐ ܕܡܲܠܦܵܐ ܘܠܵܐ ܕܥܵܒ݂ܕܵܐ ܫܘܼܠܛܵܢܵܐ ܥܲܠ ܓܲܒ݂ܪܵܐ، ܐܝܼܢܵܐ ܗܵܘܝܵܐ ܫܠܝܼܬܵܐ.
TRL: Eena le ywin beeawa psasa lbakhta dmalpa o la d'awda shoelṭana 'al gawra, eena hawya shleeta.
ENG: But I permit not a woman to teach, nor to have dominion over a man, but to be in quietness.

ASY: ܣܵܒܵܒ ܩܵܕ݇ܡܵܝܬܵܐ ܐܵܕܵܡ ܦܝܼܫ ܠܹܗ ܓܒ݂ܝܼܠܵܐ ܘܗ̇ܝܓܵܗ ܚܵܘܵܐ.
TRL: Sabab qamayta adam peesh-leh gweela o haygah khawa.
ENG: For Adam was first formed, then Eve;

ASY: ܘܠܹܐ ܝܗ݇ܘܵܐ ܐܵܕܵܡ ܕܦܝܼܫ ܠܹܗ ܥܘܼܠܕܝܼܵܐ، ܐܸܠܵܐ ܒܲܟ݂ܬܵܐ ܦܝܼܫ ܠܵܗ̇ ܥܘܼܠܕܝܼܬܵܐ، ܘܫܡܝܼܛ ܠܵܗ̇ ܦܘܼܩܕܵܢܵܐ.
TRL: O le ywa adam dpeesh-leh 'oeldeea, ila bakhta peesh-laha 'oeldeeta, o shmeeṭ-laha poeqdana.
ENG: and Adam was not beguiled, but the woman being beguiled hath fallen into transgression:

ASY: ܐܝܼܢܵܐ ܒܲܟ݂ܬܵܐ ܒܸܬ ܦܵܝܫܵܐ ܦܪܝܼܩܬܵܐ ܒܝ݇ܠܵܕܬܵܐ ܕܝܵܠܹ̈ܕ݇ܐ، ܐܸܢ ܟܵܠܝܵܐ ܒܗܲܝܡܵܢܘܼܬܵܐ، ܘܒܚܘܼܒܵܐ، ܘܒܩܲܕܝܼܫܘܼܬܵܐ، ܥܲܡ ܢܲܟ݂ܦܘܼܬܵܐ.
TRL: Eena bakhta bit paysha preeqta bladta dyale, in kalya bhaymanoeta, o bkhoeba, o bqadeeshoeta, 'am nakhpoeta.
ENG: but she shall be saved through the childbearing, if they continue in faith and love and sanctification with sobriety.

ASY: ܫܲܪܝܼܪܬܵܐ ܝܠܵܗ̇ ܐܵܗܵܐ ܗܹܡܸܙܡܵܢ، ܐܸܢ ܐ݇ܢܵܫܵܐ ܫܲܗܘܸܬ ܠܐܲܦܸܣܩܘܿܦܘܼܬܵܐ، ܦܘܼܠܚܵܢܵܐ ܛܵܒ݂ܵܐ ܒܸܛܥܵܝܵܐ ܝܠܹܗ.
TRL: Shareerta-ylaha aha hemizman, in nasha shahwit lapisqoopoeta, poelkhana ṭawa biṭ'aya-yleh.
ENG: Faithful is the saying, If a man seeketh the office of a bishop, he desireth a good work.

ASY: ܒܲܣ ܘܵܠܹܐ ܝܠܵܗ̇ ܠܐܲܦܸܣܩܘܿܦܵܐ ܕܗܵܘܹܐ ܕܠܵܐ ܠܵܘܡܵܐ، ܓܲܒ݂ܪܵܐ ܕܚܕܵܐ ܒܲܟ݂ܬܵܐ ܐܲܚܟ̰ܝܼ، ܙܲܒܛܸܢܵܢܵܐ ܕܓܵܢܹܗ، ܨܲܠܝܼܠܵܐ، ܪܹܐܙܵܢܵܝܵܐ، ܡܲܫܪܝܼܵܢܵܐ ܕܢܘܼܟ݂ܪ̈ܵܝܹܐ ܘܚܫܝܼܚܵܐ ܠܡܲܠܘܼܦܹܐ،
TRL: Bas wale-ylaha lapisqoopa dhawe dla lawma, gawra dkhda bakhta akhchee, zabṭinana dganeh, ṣaleela, rezanaya, mashreeana dnoekhraye o khsheekha lmaloepe,
ENG: The bishop therefore must be without reproach, the husband of one wife, temperate, soberminded, orderly, given to hospitality, apt to teach;

ASY: ܠܵܐ ܫܵܬܝܵܢܵܐ ܕܚܲܡܪܵܐ ܪܵܒܵܐ، ܠܵܐ ܡܵܚܝܵܢܵܐ ܐܸܠܵܐ ܡܲܟܝܼܟ݂ܵܐ، ܠܵܐ ܡܲܩܪܸܨܵܢܵܐ، ܠܵܐ ܡܲܚܸܒܵܢܵܐ ܕܙܘܼܙܵܐ،
TRL: La shatyana dkhamra raba, la makhyana ila makeekha, la maqriṣana, la makhibana dzoeza,
ENG: no brawler, no striker; but gentle, not contentious, no lover of money;

ASY: ܘܕܬܲܓܒܸܪ ܒܲܝܬܹܗ ܨܦܵܝܝܼ، ܘܝܵܠܕ݇ܘܼ̈ܗܝ ܗܵܘܝܼ ܡܲܨܝܸܬܵܢܹ̈ܐ ܒܟܠܹܗ ܐܝܼܩܵܪܵܐ.
TRL: O dtagbir bayteh ṣpayee, o yaloehy hawee maṣyitane bkleh eeqara.
ENG: one that ruleth well his own house, having his children in subjection with all gravity;

ASY: ܣܵܒܵܒ ܐܸܢ ܚܲܕ ܠܵܐ ܝܵܕܹܥ ܕܵܐܟ݂ܝܼ ܬܲܓܒܸܪ ܒܲܝܬܵܐ ܕܓܵܢܹܗ، ܕܵܐܟ݂ܝܼ ܒܸܬ ܬܲܓܒܸܪ ܥܹܕܬܵܐ ܕܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ؟
TRL: Sabab in khad la yade' dakhee tagbir bayta dganeh, dakhee bit tagbir 'edta dalaha?
ENG: (but if a man knoweth not how to rule his own house, how shall he take care of the church of God?)

ASY: ܠܵܐ ܗܵܘܹܐ ܚܵܕ݇ܬܵܐ ܒܗܲܝܡܵܢܘܼܬܵܐ، ܕܠܵܐ ܦܵܐܹܫ ܡܘܼܪܡܵܐ ܒܫܘܼܒ݂ܗܵܪܵܐ ܘܢܵܦܹܠ ܬܚܘܿܬ ܕܝܵܢܬܵܐ ܐܲܝܟ݂ ܕܢܦܝܼܠ ܠܹܗ ܐܵܟܹܠܩܲܪܨܵܐ.
TRL: La hawe khata bhaymanoeta, dla paesh moerma bshoewhara o napel tkhoot dyanta aykh dnpeel-leh akelqarṣa.
ENG: not a novice, lest being puffed up he fall into the condemnation of the devil.

ASY: ܐܘܼܦ ܘܵܠܹܐ ܝܠܵܗ̇ ܕܗܵܘܹܐ ܠܹܗ ܣܵܗܕܘܼܬܵܐ ܨܦܵܝܝܼ ܡ̣ܢ ܒܲܪ̈ܵܝܹܐ، ܕܠܵܐ ܢܵܦܹܠ ܬܚܘܿܬ ܠܵܘܡܵܐ ܘܓܵܘ ܢܸܫܒܹ̈ܐ ܕܐܵܟܹܠܩܲܪܨܵܐ.
TRL: Oep wale-ylaha dhawe-leh sahdoeta ṣpayee min baraye, dla napel tkhoot lawma o gaw nishbe dakelqarṣa.
ENG: Moreover he must have good testimony from them that are without; lest he fall into reproach and the snare of the devil.

ASY: ܗܲܕܟ݂ܵܐ ܐܘܼܦ ܫܲܡܵܫܹ̈ܐ ܘܵܠܹܐ ܝܠܵܗ̇ ܕܗܵܘܝܼ ܐ݇ܢܵܫܹ̈ܐ ܕܐܝܼܩܵܪܵܐ، ܗܲܡܙܸܡܵܢܹ̈ܐ ܕܫܪܵܪܵܐ، ܠܵܐ ܫܵܬܝܵܢܹ̈ܐ ܕܚܲܡܪܵܐ ܪܵܒܵܐ، ܠܵܐ ܡܲܚܸܒܵܢܹ̈ܐ ܕܩܢܵܝܬܵܐ ܫܸܚܬܵܢܬܵܐ،
TRL: Hadkha oep shamashe wale-ylaha dhawee nashe deeqara, hamzimane dshrara, la shatyane dkhamra raba, la makhibane dqnayta shikhtanta,
ENG: Deacons in like manner must be grave, not doubletongued, not given to much wine, not greedy of filthy lucre;

ASY: ܐܸܠܵܐ ܗܵܘܝܼ ܡܩܵܘܝܵܢܹ̈ܐ ܒܐ݇ܪܵܙܵܐ ܕܗܲܝܡܵܢܘܼܬܵܐ ܒܐܸܢܝܲܬ ܕܟ݂ܝܼܬܵܐ.
TRL: Ila hawee mqawyane braza dhaymanoeta binyat dkheeta.
ENG: holding the mystery of the faith in a pure conscience.

ASY: ܐܝܼܢܵܐ ܩܵܕ݇ܡܵܝܬܵܐ ܘܵܠܹܐ ܝܠܵܗ̇ ܕܦܵܝܫܝܼ ܨܘܼܚܨܝܼܹܐ، ܘܗ̇ܝܓܵܗ ܥܵܒ݂ܕܝܼ ܫܲܡܵܫܘܼܬܵܐ، ܐܸܢ ܠܲܝܬ ܠܵܘܡܵܐ ܥܲܠܲܝܗܝ.
TRL: Eena qamayta wale-ylaha dpayshee ṣoekhṣee-e, o haygah 'awdee shamashoeta, in layt lawma 'alayhy.
ENG: And let these also first be proved; then let them serve as deacons, if they be blameless.

ASY: ܗܲܕܟ݂ܵܐ ܐܘܼܦ ܒܲܟ݂ܬܵܬܲܝ̈ܗܝ ܗܵܘܝܼ ܚܫܝܼܚܹ̈ܐ ܠܐܝܼܩܵܪܵܐ، ܠܵܐ ܥܵܒ݂ܕܵܢܹ̈ܐ ܕܩܲܝܒܲܬ، ܙܲܒܛܸܢܵܢܹ̈ܐ ܕܓܵܢܲܝܗܝ، ܡܗܘܼܡܢܹ̈ܐ ܒܟܠ ܡܸܢܕܝܼ.
TRL: Hadkha oep bakhtatayhy hawee khsheekhe leeqara, la 'awdane dqaybat, zabṭinane dganayhy, mhoemne bkl mindee.
ENG: Women in like manner must be grave, not slanderers, temperate, faithful in all things.

ASY: ܫܲܡܵܫܹ̈ܐ ܗܵܘܝܼ ܟܠ ܚܲܕ ܓܲܒ݂ܪܵܐ ܕܚܕܵܐ ܒܲܟ݂ܬܵܐ، ܘܬܲܓܒܸܪܝܼ ܝܵܠܵܕ݇ܝ̈ܗܝ ܘܒܲܝܬܲܝܗܝ ܨܦܵܝܝܼ.
TRL: Shamashe hawee kl khad gawra dkhda bakhta, o tagbiree yalayhy o baytayhy ṣpayee.
ENG: Let deacons be husbands of one wife, ruling their children and their own houses well.

ASY: ܣܵܒܵܒ ܐܵܢܝܼ ܕܥܵܒ݂ܕܝܼ ܫܲܡܵܫܘܼܬܵܐ ܨܦܵܝܝܼ، ܕܲܪܓ݂ܵܐ ܛܵܒ݂ܵܐ ܒܸܬ ܩܵܢܝܼ ܠܓܵܢܲܝܗܝ، ܘܓ̰ܘܼܪܐܲܬ ܓܘܼܪܬܵܐ ܒܗܲܝܡܵܢܘܼܬܵܐ ܒܝܼܫܘܿܥ ܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ.
TRL: Sabab anee d'awdee shamashoeta ṣpayee, dargha ṭawa bit qanee lganayhy, o joerat goerta bhaymanoeta beeshoo' msheekha.
ENG: For they that have served well as deacons gain to themselves a good standing, and great boldness in the faith which is in Christ Jesus.

ASY: ܐܲܢܹܐ ܒܸܟܬܵܒ݂ܵܐ ܝܘܸܢ ܐܸܠܘܼܟ݂، ܟܲܕ ܒܗܹܒ݂ܝܼ ܝܘܸܢ ܕܐܵܬܹܝܢ ܠܟܸܣ ܠܘܼܟ݂ ܒܓ̰ܲܠܕܘܼܬܵܐ،
TRL: Ane biktawa ywin iloekh, kad bhewee ywin dateyn lkis-loekh bjaldoeta,
ENG: These things write I unto thee, hoping to come unto thee shortly;

ASY: ܐܝܼܢܵܐ ܐܸܢ ܥܲܪܩܸܠܸܢ، ܕܝܵܕܥܹܬ ܕܵܐܟ݂ܝܼ ܘܵܠܹܐ ܝܠܵܗ̇ ܕܐ݇ܢܵܫܹ̈ܐ ܡܕܲܒܪܝܼ ܓܵܢܲܝܗܝ ܓܵܘ ܒܲܝܬܵܐ ܕܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ، ܕܝܼܠܹܗ ܥܹܕܬܵܐ ܕܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ ܚܵܝܵܐ، ܘܣܛܘܼܢܵܐ ܘܫܲܬܐܸܣܬܵܐ ܕܫܪܵܪܵܐ.
TRL: Eena in 'arqilin, dyad'et dakhee wale-ylaha dnashe mdabree ganayhy gaw bayta dalaha, deeleh 'edta dalaha khaya, o sṭoena o shatista dshrara.
ENG: but if I tarry long, that thou mayest know how men ought to behave themselves in the house of God, which is the church of the living God, the pillar and ground of the truth.

ASY: ܫܲܪܝܼܪܵܐܝܼܬ ܓܘܼܪܵܐ ܝܠܹܗ ܐ݇ܪܵܙܵܐ ܕܙܲܕܝܼܩܘܼܬܵܐ، ܗ̇ܘ ܕܦܝܼܫ ܠܹܗ ܓܸܠܝܵܐ ܒܦܲܓ݂ܪܵܐ، ܦܝܼܫ ܠܹܗ ܡܘܼܟܫܸܛܵܐ ܒܪܘܼܚܵܐ، ܦܝܼܫ ܠܹܗ ܚܸܙܝܵܐ ܒܡܲܠܲܐܟܹ̈ܐ، ܦܝܼܫ ܠܹܗ ܡܘܼܟܪܸܙܵܐ ܓܵܘ ܐܸܡܘܵܬܹ̈ܐ، ܦܝܼܫ ܠܹܗ ܗܘܼܡܸܢܵܐ ܒܥܵܠܡܵܐ، ܘܦܝܼܫ ܠܹܗ ܡܘܼܐܣܩܵܐ ܒܚܸܩܪܵܐ.
TRL: Shareeraeet goera-yleh raza dzadeeqoeta, haw dpeesh-leh gilya bpaghra, peesh-leh moekshiṭa broekha, peesh-leh khizya bmalake, peesh-leh moekriza gaw imwate, peesh-leh hoemina b'alma, o peesh-leh moesqa bkhiqra.
ENG: And without controversy great is the mystery of godliness; He who was manifested in the flesh, justified in the spirit, seen of angels, preached among the nations, believed on in the world, received up in glory.

ASY: ܪܘܼܚܵܐ ܦܫܝܼܛܵܐܝܼܬ ܒܹܐܡܵܪܵܐ ܝܠܹܗ ܕܒܙܲܒ݂ܢܹ̈ܐ ܐ݇ܚܵܪ̈ܵܝܹܐ ܚܲܕ݇ܟܡܵܐ ܒܸܬ ܩܵܠܒܝܼ ܡ̣ܢ ܗܲܝܡܵܢܘܼܬܵܐ ܘܒܸܬ ܬܵܒܥܝܼ ܠܪ̈ܘܼܚܹܐ ܡܲܚܠܸܛܵܢܹ̈ܐ ܘܠܝܘܼܠܦܵܢܹ̈ܐ ܕܫܹܐܕܹ̈ܐ.
TRL: Roekha psheeṭaeet bemara-yleh dbzawne kharaye khakma bit qalbee min haymanoeta o bit tab'ee lroekhe makhliṭane o lyoelpane dshede.
ENG: But the Spirit saith expressly, that in later times some shall fall away from the faith, giving heed to seducing spirits and doctrines of devils,

ASY: ܐܲܢܹܐ ܝܘܼܠܦܵܢܹ̈ܐ ܒܸܬ ܐܵܬܝܼ ܡ̣ܢ ܡܲܫܦܸܪ̈ܵܢܹܐ ܗܲܡܙܘܼܡܹܐ ܕܘܼܓܠܹ̈ܐ. ܐܵܢܝܼ ܕܐܸܢܝܲܬܲܝܗܝ ܟܘܝܼܬܵܐ ܝܠܵܗ̇ ܐܲܝܟ݂ ܒܦܪܸܙܠܵܐ ܚܲܡܝܼܡܵܐ.
TRL: Ane yoelpane bit atee min mashpirane hamzoeme doegle. Anee dinyatayhy kweeta-ylaha aykh bprizla khameema.
ENG: through the hypocrisy of men that speak lies, branded in their own conscience as with a hot iron;

ASY: ܡܲܟܠܘܼܝܹܐ ܝܢܵܐ ܐ݇ܢܵܫܹ̈ܐ ܡ̣ܢ ܠܸܓܒ݂ܵܪܵܐ، ܘܡܲܪܚܘܼܩܲܝ ܝܢܵܐ ܡ̣ܢ ܡܹܐܟ݂ܘܼܠܝܵܬܹ̈ܐ، ܐܵܢܝܼ ܕܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ ܒܸܪܝܲܝ ܠܹܗ ܕܦܵܝܫܝܼ ܩܘܼܒܠܹܐ ܒܫܵܟܲܪܬܵܐ ܒܝܲܕ ܡܗܘܼܡܢܹ̈ܐ ܘܒܝܲܕ ܐܵܢܝܼ ܕܝܵܕܥܝܼ ܠܹܗ ܫܪܵܪܵܐ.
TRL: Makloeye yna nashe min ligwara, o markhoeqay yna min mekhoelyate, anee dalaha biryay-leh dpayshee qoeble bshakarta byad mhoemne o byad anee dyad'ee-leh shrara.
ENG: forbidding to marry, and commanding to abstain from meats, which God created to be received with thanksgiving by them that believe and know the truth.

ASY: ܣܵܒܵܒ ܛܵܒ݂ܵܐ ܝܠܹܗ ܟܠ ܡܸܢܕܝܼ ܕܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ ܒܪܹܐ ܠܹܗ، ܘܠܲܝܬ ܡܸܢܕܝܼ ܡܘܼܣܠܝܼܵܐ ܐܸܢ ܦܵܐܹܫ ܩܘܼܒܠܵܐ ܒܫܵܟܲܪܬܵܐ،
TRL: Sabab ṭawa-yleh kl mindee dalaha bre-leh, o layt mindee moesleea in paesh qoebla bshakarta,
ENG: For every creature of God is good, and nothing is to be rejected, if it be received with thanksgiving:

ASY: ܣܵܒܵܒ ܡܩܘܼܕܫܵܐ ܝܠܹܗ ܒܗܹܡܸܙܡܵܢ ܕܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ ܘܒܨܠܘܿܬܵܐ.
TRL: Sabab mqoedsha-yleh bhemizman dalaha o bṣloota.
ENG: for it is sanctified through the word of God and prayer.

ASY: ܐܸܢ ܡܲܚܙܹܝܬ ܐܲܢܹܐ ܠܐܲܚܘܿܢܘܵܬܹ̈ܐ، ܒܸܬ ܗܵܘܹܝܬ ܦܲܠܵܚܵܐ ܛܵܒ݂ܵܐ ܕܝܼܫܘܿܥ ܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ ܒܚܸܠܡܲܬ، ܦܝܼܫܵܐ ܬܘܼܪܣܝܼܵܐ ܒܗܹܡܸܙܡܵܢܹ̈ܐ ܕܗܲܝܡܵܢܘܼܬܵܐ ܘܒܝܘܼܠܦܵܢܵܐ ܛܵܒ݂ܵܐ ܕܬܒܝܼܥܵܐ ܝܘܸܬ ܥܲܠܘܼܗܝ.
TRL: In makhzeyt ane lakhoonwate, bit haweyt palakha ṭawa deeshoo' msheekha bkhilmat, peesha toerseea bhemizmane dhaymanoeta o byoelpana ṭawa dtbee'a ywit 'aloehy.
ENG: If thou put the brethren in mind of these things, thou shalt be a good minister of Christ Jesus, nourished in the words of the faith, and of the good doctrine which thou hast followed until now:

ASY: ܪܚܘܿܩ ܡ̣ܢ ܗܲܩܝܵܬܹ̈ܐ ܣܦܝܼܩܹ̈ܐ ܕܣܵܒ݂ܝܵܬܹ̈ܐ؛ ܬܲܠܡܸܕ ܓܵܢܘܼܟ݂ ܒܙܕܘܼܥܬܵܐ ܕܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ.
TRL: Rkhooq min haqyate speeqe dsawyate; talmid ganoekh bzdoe'ta dalaha.
ENG: but refuse profane and old wives’ fables. And exercise thyself unto godliness:

ASY: ܣܵܒܵܒ ܬܘܼܠܡܵܕܵܐ ܕܦܲܓ݂ܪܵܐ ܐܝܼܬ ܠܹܗ ܝܘܼܬܪܵܢܵܐ ܩܵܐ ܚܲܕ ܙܲܒ݂ܢܵܐ، ܐܝܼܢܵܐ ܙܕܘܼܥܬܵܐ ܕܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ ܐܝܼܬ ܠܵܗ̇ ܝܘܼܬܪܵܢܵܐ ܩܵܐ ܟܠ ܡܸܢܕܝܼ، ܣܵܒܵܒ ܐܝܼܬ ܠܵܗ̇ ܩܵܘܠܵܐ ܩܵܐ ܐܲܢܹܐ ܚܲܝܹ̈ܐ ܘܐܘܼܦ ܩܵܐ ܚܲܝܹ̈ܐ ܕܐܵܬܝܼ.
TRL: Sabab toelmada dpaghra eet-leh yoetrana qa khad zawna, eena zdoe'ta dalaha eet-laha yoetrana qa kl mindee, sabab eet-laha qawla qa ane khaye o oep qa khaye datee.
ENG: for bodily exercise is profitable for a little; but godliness is profitable for all things, having promise of the life which now is, and of that which is to come.

ASY: ܫܲܪܝܼܪܬܵܐ ܝܠܵܗ̇ ܐܵܗܵܐ ܗܹܡܸܙܡܵܢ ܘܚܫܝܼܚܬܵܐ ܠܟܠܵܗ̇ ܩܵܒܲܠܬܵܐ.
TRL: Shareerta-ylaha aha hemizman o khsheekhta lklaha qabalta.
ENG: Faithful is the saying, and worthy of all acceptation.

ASY: ܒܘܼܬ ܐܵܗܵܐ ܒܸܦܠܵܚܵܐ ܝܘܲܚ ܘܒܸܥܒ݂ܵܕܵܐ ܝܘܲܚ ܐܵܓ݂ܘܿܢܵܐ، ܣܵܒܵܒ ܗܹܒ݂ܝܼܲܢ ܒܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ ܚܵܝܵܐ ܝܠܵܗ̇، ܗ̇ܘ ܕܝܼܠܹܗ ܦܵܪܘܿܩܵܐ ܕܟܠܲܝܗܝ ܒܢܲܝ̈ܢܵܫܵܐ، ܘܒܘܼܫ ܙܵܘܕܵܐ ܕܡܗܘܼܡܢܹ̈ܐ.
TRL: Boet aha biplakha ywakh o bi'wada ywakh aghoona, sabab hewee-an balaha khaya-ylaha, haw deeleh parooqa dklayhy bnaynasha, o boesh zawda dmhoemne.
ENG: For to this end we labour and strive, because we have our hope set on the living God, who is the Saviour of all men, specially of them that believe.

ASY: ܐܲܢܹܐ ܦܲܩܸܕ ܘܡܲܠܸܦ.
TRL: Ane paqid o malip.
ENG: These things command and teach.

ASY: ܠܵܐ ܐ݇ܢܵܫܵܐ ܡܲܣܠܹܐ ܠܘܼܟ݂ ܣܵܒܵܒ ܙܥܘܿܪܵܐ ܝܘܸܬ ܒܫܸܢܹ̈ܐ، ܣܵܒܵܒ ܙܥܘܿܪܵܐ ܝܘܸܬ ܒܫܸܢܹ̈ܐ، ܐܸܠܵܐ ܗܘܝܼ ܛܘܼܦ̮ܣܵܐ ܠܡܗܘܼܡܢܹ̈ܐ ܒܗܹܡܸܙܡܵܢ ܘܒܕܘܼܒܵܪܹ̈ܐ ܘܒܚܘܼܒܵܐ، ܘܒܗܲܝܡܵܢܘܼܬܵܐ ܘܒܕܸܟ݂ܝܘܼܬܵܐ.
TRL: La nasha masle-loekh sabab z'oora ywit bshine, sabab z'oora ywit bshine, ila hwee ṭoewsa lmhoemne bhemizman o bdoebare o bkhoeba, o bhaymanoeta o bdikhyoeta.
ENG: Let no man despise thy youth; but be thou an ensample to them that believe, in word, in manner of life, in love, in faith, in purity.

ASY: ܗܲܠ ܕܐܵܬܹܝܢ ܚܲܦܸܛ ܒܩܪܵܝܬܵܐ ܩܵܐ ܥܹܕܬܵܐ، ܘܒܡܲܪܥܲܫܬܵܐ ܘܒܡܲܠܲܦܬܵܐ.
TRL: Hal dateyn khapiṭ bqrayta qa 'edta, o bmar'ashta o bmalapta.
ENG: Till I come, give heed to reading, to exhortation, to teaching.

ASY: ܠܵܐ ܡܲܚܦܸܠܸܬ ܠܡܵܘܗܲܒ݂ܬܵܐ ܕܐܝܼܬ ܒܝܼܘܼܟ݂، ܕܦܝܼܫܬܵܐ ܝܗ݇ܘܵܐ ܝܘܼܗ݇ܒܸܠܬܵܐ ܐܸܠܘܼܟ݂ ܒܝܲܕ ܢܒ݂ܝܼܘܼܬܵܐ، ܒܣܝܵܡ ܐܝܼܕܵܐ ܕܚܘܵܪ̈ܕܸܩܢܹܐ.
TRL: La makhpilit lmawhawta deet beeoekh, dpeeshta ywa yoebilta iloekh byad nweeoeta, bsyam eeda dkhwardiqne.
ENG: Neglect not the gift that is in thee, which was given thee by prophecy, with the laying on of the hands of the presbytery.

ASY: ܚܲܦܸܛ ܒܐܲܢܹܐ، ܘܟܠܝܼ ܩܸܘܝܵܐ ܒܝܼܲܝܗܝ، ܗܲܕܟ݂ܵܐ ܕܟܠܲܝܗܝ ܐ݇ܢܵܫܹ̈ܐ ܚܵܙܝܼ ܠܡܲܢܬܵܝܬܘܼܟ݂.
TRL: Khapiṭ bane, o klee qiwya bee-ayhy, hadkha dklayhy nashe khazee lmantaytoekh.
ENG: Be diligent in these things; give thyself wholly to them; that thy progress may be manifest unto all.

ASY: ܗܘܝܼ ܗܸܫܝܵܪ ܠܓܵܢܘܼܟ݂ ܘܠܝܘܼܠܦܵܢܘܼܟ݂. ܥܲܪܩܸܠ ܒܝܼܲܝܗܝ، ܣܵܒܵܒ ܐܸܢ ܥܵܒ݂ܕܹܬ ܗܲܕܟ݂ܵܐ، ܒܸܬ ܦܲܪܩܸܬ ܠܓܵܢܘܼܟ݂ ܘܠܐܵܢܝܼ ܕܫܵܡܥܝܼ ܠܘܼܟ݂.
TRL: Hwee hishyar lganoekh o lyoelpanoekh. 'Arqil bee-ayhy, sabab in 'awdet hadkha, bit parqit lganoekh o lanee dsham'ee-loekh.
ENG: Take heed to thyself, and to thy teaching. Continue in these things; for in doing this thou shalt save both thyself and them that hear thee.

ASY: ܠܵܐ ܡܲܢܟܸܣܸܬ ܠܐ݇ܢܵܫܵܐ ܣܵܒ݂ܵܐ، ܐܸܠܵܐ ܦܲܪܦܸܠ ܒܝܼܹܗ ܐܲܝܟ݂ ܕܠܒܵܒܵܐ، ܘܠܥܠܲܝܡܵܐ ܐܲܝܟ݂ ܕܠܐܲܚܘܿܢܵܐ،
TRL: La mankisit lnasha sawa, ila parpil bee-eh aykh dlbaba, o l'layma aykh dlakhoona,
ENG: Rebuke not an elder, but exhort him as a father; the younger men as brethren:

ASY: ܘܠܣܵܒ݂ܝܵܬܹ̈ܐ ܐܲܝܟ݂ ܕܠܝܸܡܵܬܹ̈ܐ، ܘܠܚܵܡܵܬܹ̈ܐ ܐܲܝܟ݂ ܕܠܚܵܬܘܵܬܹ̈ܐ ܒܟܠܵܗ̇ ܕܸܟ݂ܝܘܼܬܵܐ.
TRL: O lsawyate aykh dlyimate, o lkhamate aykh dlkhatwate bklaha dikhyoeta.
ENG: the elder women as mothers; the younger as sisters, in all purity.

ASY: ܡܝܲܩܸܪ ܠܐܲܪ̈ܡܸܠܝܵܬܹܐ ܕܝܼܢܵܐ ܐܲܪ̈ܡܸܠܝܵܬܹܐ ܒܫܲܪܝܼܪܘܼܬܵܐ.
TRL: Myaqir larmilyate deena armilyate bshareeroeta.
ENG: Honour widows that are widows indeed.

ASY: ܐܝܼܢܵܐ ܐܸܢ ܐܝܼܬ ܐܲܪܡܸܠܬܵܐ ܕܐܝܼܬ ܠܵܗ̇ ܝܵܠܹ̈ܕ݇ܐ ܝܲܢ ܢܵܘܸܓܹ̈ܐ، ܫܒ݂ܘܿܩ ܐܲܢܹܐ ܩܵܕ݇ܡܵܝܬܵܐ ܝܵܠܦܝܼ ܙܕܘܼܥܬܵܐ ܡ̣ܢ ܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ ܓܵܘ ܒܲܝܬܵܐ ܕܓܵܢܲܝܗܝ ܘܡܲܕܸܪܝܼ ܦܘܼܪܥܵܢܵܐ ܠܐܲܒ݂ܵܗܲܝ̈ܗܝ، ܣܵܒܵܒ ܐܵܗܵܐ ܡܩܲܒܠܵܐ ܝܠܹܗ ܠܟܸܣ ܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ.
TRL: Eena in eet armilta deet-laha yale yan nawige, shwooq ane qamayta yalpee zdoe'ta min Alaha gaw bayta dganayhy o madiree poer'ana lawahayhy, sabab aha mqabla-yleh lkis Alaha.
ENG: But if any widow hath children or grandchildren, let them learn first to shew piety towards their own family, and to requite their parents: for this is acceptable in the sight of God.

ASY: ܐܝܼܢܵܐ ܗ̇ܝ ܕܝܼܠܵܗ̇ ܒܫܲܪܝܼܪܘܼܬܵܐ ܐܲܪܡܸܠܬܵܐ ܘܦܝܼܫܬܵܐ ܫܒ݂ܝܼܩܬܵܐ ܒܢܲܦ̮ܫܘܼܗ̇، ܕܪܝܼܬܘܼܗ̇ ܝܠܵܗ̇ ܗܹܒ݂ܝܼܘܼܗ̇ ܠܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ، ܘܒܟܠ ܙܲܒ݂ܢܵܐ ܒܨܠܵܘܵܬܹ̈ܐ ܘܦܲܪ̈ܦܲܠܝܵܬܹܐ ܝܠܵܗ̇ ܒܠܲܝܠܹܐ ܘܒܐܝܼܡܵܡܵܐ.
TRL: Eena hay deelaha bshareeroeta armilta o peeshta shweeqta bnawshoeha, dreetoeha-ylaha heweeoeha lalaha, o bkl zawna bṣlawate o parpalyate-ylaha blayle o beemama.
ENG: Now she that is a widow indeed, and desolate, hath her hope set on God, and continueth in supplications and prayers night and day.

ASY: ܐܝܼܢܵܐ ܗ̇ܝ ܕܝܼܠܵܗ̇ ܒܸܚܵܝܵܐ ܓܵܘ ܒܘܼܣܵܡܵܐ، ܡܝܼܬܬܵܐ ܝܠܵܗ̇ ܟܲܕ ܗ̇ܝ ܒܸܚܵܝܵܐ.
TRL: Eena hay deelaha bikhaya gaw boesama, meetta-ylaha kad hay bikhaya.
ENG: But she that giveth herself to pleasure is dead while she liveth.

ASY: ܦܩܘܿܕ ܐܲܢܹܐ ܠܐ݇ܢܵܫܹ̈ܐ، ܕܠܵܐ ܗܵܘܝܼ ܠܗܘܿܢ ܠܵܘܡܵܐ.
TRL: Pqood ane lnashe, dla hawee-lhoon lawma.
ENG: These things also command, that they may be without reproach.

ASY: ܐܝܼܢܵܐ ܐܸܢ ܐܝܼܬ ܐ݇ܢܵܫܵܐ ܕܠܹܐ ܝܠܹܗ ܬܲܓܒܘܼܪܹܐ ܠܐ݇ܢܵܫܹ̈ܐ ܕܓܵܢܹܗ، ܘܒܘܼܫ ܙܵܘܕܵܐ ܠܐ݇ܢܵܫܹ̈ܐ ܕܒܲܝܬܹܗ، ܐܵܗܵܐ ܣܪܝܼܒ݂ܘܼܗ̇ ܝܠܹܗ ܗܲܝܡܵܢܘܼܬܵܐ ܘܒܘܼܫ ܚܸܪܒܵܐ ܝܠܹܗ ܡ̣ܢ ܗ̇ܘ ܕܠܹܐ ܗܲܡܸܢ.
TRL: Eena in eet nasha dle-yleh tagboere lnashe dganeh, o boesh zawda lnashe dbayteh, aha sreewoeha-yleh haymanoeta o boesh khirba-yleh min haw dle hamin.
