ENG: But if any provideth not for his own, and specially his own household, he hath denied the faith, and is worse than an unbeliever.

ASY: ܚܕܵܐ ܐܲܪܡܸܠܬܵܐ ܦܵܝܫܵܐ ܡܘܼܥܒܸܪܬܵܐ ܒܣܸܕܪܵܐ ܕܚܸܫܒܘܼܢܵܐ ܐܸܢ ܠܵܐ ܗܵܘܝܵܐ ܒܘܼܫ ܒܵܨܘܿܪܬܵܐ ܡ̣ܢ ܐܸܫܬܝܼ ܫܸܢܹ̈ܐ، ܘܓܒ݂ܝܼܪܬܵܐ ܝܗ݇ܘܵܐ ܠܚܲܕ ܓܲܒ݂ܪܵܐ،
TRL: Khda armilta paysha moe'birta bsidra dkhishboena in la hawya boesh baṣoorta min ishtee shine, o gweerta ywa lkhad gawra,
ENG: Let none be enrolled as a widow under threescore years old, having been the wife of one man,

ASY: ܘܐܝܼܬ ܠܵܗ̇ ܣܵܗܕܘܼܬܵܐ ܕܦܘܼܠܚܵܢܹ̈ܐ ܫܲܦܝܼܪܹ̈ܐ: ܓܘܼܪܘܸܣܬܵܐ ܝܠܵܗ̇ ܝܵܠܹ̈ܕ݇ܐ، ܡܘܼܫܪܝܼܬܵܐ ܝܠܵܗ̇ ܢܘܼܟ݂ܪ̈ܵܝܹܐ، ܚܘܼܠܸܠܬܵܐ ܝܠܵܗ̇ ܐܲܩܠܵܬܹ̈ܐ ܕܩܲܕܝܼܫܹ̈ܐ، ܡܘܼܢܝܸܚܬܵܐ ܝܠܵܗ̇ ܠܡܘܼܠܝܸܨܹ̈ܐ، ܘܬܒܝܼܥܬܵܐ ܝܠܵܗ̇ ܠܟܠ ܦܘܼܠܚܵܢܵܐ ܛܵܒ݂ܵܐ.
TRL: O eet-laha sahdoeta dpoelkhane shapeere: goerwista-ylaha yale, moeshreeta-ylaha noekhraye, khoelilta-ylaha aqlate dqadeeshe, moenyikhta-ylaha lmoelyiṣe, o tbee'ta-ylaha lkl poelkhana ṭawa.
ENG: well reported of for good works; if she hath brought up children, if she hath used hospitality to strangers, if she hath washed the saints’ feet, if she hath relieved the afflicted, if she hath diligently followed every good work.

ASY: ܐܝܼܢܵܐ ܐܲܪ̈ܡܸܠܝܵܬܹܐ ܙܥܘܿܪܹ̈ܐ ܒܫܸܢܹ̈ܐ ܠܵܐ ܚܵܒ݂ܫܹܬ ܠܗܘܿܢ ܒܐܵܗܵܐ ܣܸܕܪܵܐ، ܣܵܒܵܒ ܐܝܼܡܲܢ ܕܪ̈ܓ݂ܵܫܝܵܬܲܝܗܝ ܦܲܓ݂ܪ̈ܵܢܵܝܹܐ ܓ݂ܵܠܒܝܼ ܠܫܠܵܡܬܲܝܗܝ ܠܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ، ܒܸܬ ܒܵܥܝܼ ܕܓܵܒ݂ܪܝܼ.
TRL: Eena armilyate z'oore bshine la khawshet-lhoon baha sidra, sabab eeman drghashyatayhy paghranaye ghalbee lshlamtayhy lmsheekha, bit ba'ee dgawree.
ENG: But younger widows refuse: for when they have waxed wanton against Christ, they desire to marry;

ASY: ܗܲܕܟ݂ܵܐ ܟܹܐ ܡܲܝܬܝܼ ܕܝܵܢܬܵܐ ܠܓܵܢܲܝܗܝ ܣܵܒܵܒ ܫܒ݂ܝܼܩ ܠܗܘܿܢ ܠܩܵܘܠܲܝܗܝ ܩܵܕ݇ܡܵܝܵܐ.
TRL: Hadkha ke maytee dyanta lganayhy sabab shweeq-lhoon lqawlayhy qamaya.
ENG: having condemnation, because they have rejected their first faith.

ASY: ܘܐܘܼܦ ܟܹܐ ܝܵܠܦܝܼ ܒܲܛܝܼܠܘܼܬܵܐ، ܒܸܚܕܵܪܵܐ ܡ̣ܢ ܒܲܝܬܵܐ ܠܒܲܝܬܵܐ. ܘܠܵܐ ܐܲܚܟ̰ܝܼ ܟܹܐ ܗܵܘܝܼ ܒܲܛܝܼܠܹ̈ܐ، ܐܝܼܢܵܐ ܟܹܐ ܡܲܙܝܸܕܝܼ ܗܹܡܸܙܡܵܢܹ̈ܐ ܣܦܝܼܩܹ̈ܐ، ܘܚܲܦܛܝܼ ܒܫܘܼܠܵܢܹ̈ܐ ܕܠܹܐ ܝܠܵܗ̇ ܥܲܠܲܝܗܝ ܠܸܚܒ݂ܵܛܵܐ ܓܵܘܲܝܗܝ، ܘܗܲܡܙܸܡܝܼ ܗܹܡܸܙܡܵܢܹ̈ܐ ܕܠܹܐ ܝܠܵܗ̇ ܚܫܝܼܚܬܵܐ ܐܸܠܲܝܗܝ ܠܗܲܡܙܘܼܡܹܐ.
TRL: O oep ke yalpee baṭeeloeta, bikhdara min bayta lbayta. O la akhchee ke hawee baṭeele, eena ke mazyidee hemizmane speeqe, o khapṭee bshoelane dle-ylaha 'alayhy likhwaṭa gawayhy, o hamzimee hemizmane dle-ylaha khsheekhta ilayhy lhamzoeme.
ENG: And withal they learn also to be idle, going about from house to house; and not only idle, but tattlers also and busybodies, speaking things which they ought not.

ASY: ܒܘܼܬ ܐܵܗܵܐ ܒܵܥܹܝܢ ܕܐܲܪ̈ܡܸܠܝܵܬܹܐ ܚܵܡܵܬܹ̈ܐ ܓܵܒ݂ܪܝܼ، ܗܲܨܠܝܼ ܝܵܠܹ̈ܕ݇ܐ، ܘܬܲܓܒܸܪܝܼ ܒܲܝܬܲܝܗܝ، ܕܠܵܐ ܝܵܗ݇ܒ݂ܝܼ ܥܸܠܬܵܐ ܠܕܸܫܡܸܢ ܕܗܲܡܙܸܡ ܒܠܵܘܡܵܐ.
TRL: Boet aha ba'eyn darmilyate khamate gawree, haṣlee yale, o tagbiree baytayhy, dla yawee 'ilta ldishmin dhamzim blawma.
ENG: I desire therefore that the younger widows marry, bear children, rule the household, give none occasion to the adversary for reviling:

ASY: ܣܵܒܵܒ ܒܫܲܪܝܼܪܘܼܬܵܐ ܚܲܕ݇ܟܡܵܐ ܩܠܝܼܒ ܠܗܘܿܢ ܒܵܬ݇ܪ ܣܵܛܵܢܵܐ.
TRL: Sabab bshareeroeta khakma qleeb-lhoon bar saṭana.
ENG: for already some are turned aside after Satan.

ASY: ܐܸܢ ܒܲܟ݂ܬܵܐ ܡܗܘܼܡܸܢܬܵܐ ܐܝܼܬ ܠܵܗ̇ ܐܲܪ̈ܡܸܠܝܵܬܹܐ ܓܵܘ ܒܲܝܬܘܼܗ̇، ܬܲܪܣܝܼܵܐ ܠܗܘܿܢ ܘܠܵܐ ܥܵܒ݂ܕܵܐ ܝܘܼܩܪܵܐ ܠܥܹܕܬܵܐ، ܕܥܹܕܬܵܐ ܬܲܪܣܝܼܵܐ ܠܐܵܢܝܼ ܕܫܲܪܝܼܪܵܐܝܼܬ ܐܲܪ̈ܡܸܠܝܵܬܹܐ ܝܢܵܐ.
TRL: In bakhta mhoeminta eet-laha armilyate gaw baytoeha, tarseea-lhoon o la 'awda yoeqra l'edta, d'edta tarseea lanee dshareeraeet armilyate yna.
ENG: If any woman that believeth hath widows, let her relieve them, and let not the church be burdened; that it may relieve them that are widows indeed.

ASY: ܚܘܵܪ̈ܕܸܩܢܹܐ ܕܬܲܓܒܘܼܪܹܐ ܝܢܵܐ ܨܦܵܝܝܼ، ܚܲܕ ܒܬܪܹܝ ܚܫܝܼܚܹܐ ܝܢܵܐ ܠܐܝܼܩܵܪܵܐ، ܒܘܼܫ ܙܵܘܕܵܐ ܐܵܢܝܼ ܕܝܼܢܵܐ ܒܠܝܼܓܹܐ ܒܡܲܟܪܲܙܬܵܐ ܘܒܡܲܠܲܦܬܵܐ.
TRL: Khwardiqne dtagboere yna ṣpayee, khad btrey khsheekhe yna leeqara, boesh zawda anee deena bleege bmakrazta o bmalapta.
ENG: Let the elders that rule well be counted worthy of double honour, especially those who labour in the word and in teaching.

ASY: ܣܵܒܵܒ ܟܬܵܒ݂ܵܐ ܒܹܐܡܵܪܵܐ ܝܠܹܗ: ܠܵܐ ܐܵܣܪܹܬ ܦܘܼܡܵܐ ܕܬܵܘܪܵܐ ܟܲܕ ܒܸܕܘܵܪܵܐ، ܘܐܘܼܦ: ܦܵܥܠܵܐ ܚܫܝܼܚܵܐ ܝܠܹܗ ܠܦܘܼܪܥܵܢܹܗ.
TRL: Sabab ktawa bemara-yleh: la asret poema dtawra kad bidwara, o oep: pa'la khsheekha-yleh lpoer'aneh.
ENG: For the scripture saith, Thou shalt not muzzle the ox when he treadeth out the corn. And, The labourer is worthy of his hire.

ASY: ܠܵܐ ܩܲܒܠܸܬ ܩܒ݂ܵܠܬܵܐ ܥܲܠ ܚܘܵܪܕܸܩܢܵܐ ܐܸܠܵܐ ܥܲܠ ܦܘܼܡܵܐ ܕܬܪܹܝ ܝܲܢ ܬܠܵܬܵܐ ܣܵܗܕܹ̈ܐ.
TRL: La qablit qwalta 'al khwardiqna ila 'al poema dtrey yan tlata sahde.
ENG: Against an elder receive not an accusation, except at the mouth of two or three witnesses.

ASY: ܠܐܵܢܝܼ ܕܚܵܛܝܼ ܡܲܢܟܸܣ ܩܵܕ݇ܡ ܟܠܲܝܗܝ ܐ݇ܢܵܫܹ̈ܐ، ܗܲܕܟ݂ܵܐ ܕܐ݇ܚܹܪ̈݇ܢܹܐ ܙܵܕܥܝܼ.
TRL: Lanee dkhaṭee mankis qam klayhy nashe, hadkha dkhene zad'ee.
ENG: Them that sin reprove in the sight of all, that the rest also may be in fear.

ASY: ܚܲܦܘܼܛܹܐ ܝܘܸܢ ܐܸܠܘܼܟ݂ ܩܵܕ݇ܡ ܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ ܘܝܼܫܘܿܥ ܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ ܘܡܲܠܲܐܟܹ̈ܐ ܓܘܼܒܝܹ̈ܐ، ܕܢܵܛܪܹܬ ܠܐܲܢܹܐ، ܘܠܵܐ ܕܵܝܢܹܬ ܡ̣ܢ ܩܵܕ݇ܡ ܫܡܵܥܬܵܐ، ܘܠܵܐ ܥܵܒ݂ܕܹܬ ܡܸܢܕܝܼ ܒܚܙܵܝܬܵܐ ܕܦܵܬܵܐ.
TRL: Khapoeṭe ywin iloekh qam Alaha o eeshoo' msheekha o malake goebye, dnaṭret lane, o la daynet min qam shma'ta, o la 'awdet mindee bkhzayta dpata.
ENG: I charge thee in the sight of God, and Christ Jesus, and the elect angels, that thou observe these things without prejudice, doing nothing by partiality.

ASY: ܠܵܐ ܡܲܠܝܸܙܸܬ ܒܡܲܬܲܒ݂ܬܵܐ ܕܐܝܼܕܵܐ ܥܲܠ ܐ݇ܢܵܫܵܐ، ܘܠܵܐ ܗܵܘܹܝܬ ܫܲܪܝܼܟܵܐ ܒܚܛܝܼܵܬܹ̈ܐ ܕܐ݇ܢܵܫܹ̈ܐ ܐ݇ܚܹܪ̈݇ܢܹܐ. ܢܛܘܿܪ ܠܓܵܢܘܼܟ݂ ܒܕܸܟ݂ܝܘܼܬܵܐ.
TRL: La malyizit bmatawta deeda 'al nasha, o la haweyt shareeka bkhṭeeate dnashe khene. Nṭoor lganoekh bdikhyoeta.
ENG: Lay hands hastily on no man, neither be partaker of other men’s sins: keep thyself pure.

ASY: ܠܵܐ ܫܵܬܹܝܬ ܐܲܚܟ̰ܝܼ ܡ̈ܝܼܵܐ، ܐܸܠܵܐ ܡܲܦܠܸܚ ܚܲܕ݇ܟ̰ܵܐ ܚܲܡܪܵܐ ܒܘܼܬ ܐܸܣܛܘܼܡܟܘܼܟ݂ ܘܒܘܼܬ ܡܲܪ̈ܥܹܐ ܕܒܸܗܘܵܝܘܼܟ݂ ܝܼܢܵܐ ܪܵܒܵܐ ܓܵܗܹ̈ܐ.
TRL: La shateyt akhchee meea, ila maplikh khacha khamra boet isṭoemkoekh o boet mar'e dbihwayoekh eena raba gahe.
ENG: Be no longer a drinker of water, but use a little wine for thy stomach’s sake and thine often infirmities.

ASY: ܚܛܝܼܵܬܹ̈ܐ ܕܚܲܕ݇ܟܡܵܐ ܐ݇ܢܵܫܹ̈ܐ ܦܝܼܫܹܐ ܝܢܵܐ ܝ݇ܕܝܼܥܹܐ ܡ̣ܢ ܩܵܕ݇ܡ ܥܕܵܢܵܐ، ܘܟܹܐ ܐܵܙܠ݇ܝܼ ܡ̣ܢ ܩܵܕ݇ܡ ܡܸܢܲܝܗܝ ܠܕܝܼܘܵܢ؛ ܘܚܛܝܼܵܬܹ̈ܐ ܕܚܲܕ݇ܟܡܵܐ ܐ݇ܚܹܪ̈݇ܢܹܐ ܟܹܐ ܐܵܙܠ݇ܝܼ ܡ̣ܢ ܒܵܬ݇ܪ ܡܸܢܲܝܗܝ.
TRL: Khṭeeate dkhakma nashe peeshe yna dee'e min qam 'dana, o ke azee min qam minayhy ldeewan; o khṭeeate dkhakma khene ke azee min bar minayhy.
ENG: Some men’s sins are evident, going before unto judgment; and some men also they follow after.

ASY: ܗܲܕܟ݂ܵܐ ܐܘܼܦ ܦܘܼܠܚܵܢܹ̈ܐ ܛܵܒܹ̈ܐ ܦܝܼܫܹܐ ܝܢܵܐ ܝ݇ܕܝܼܥܹܐ ܡ̣ܢ ܩܵܕ݇ܡ ܥܕܵܢܵܐ، ܘܐܵܢܝܼ ܕܠܹܐ ܝܢܵܐ ܦܝܼܫܹܐ ܝ݇ܕܝܼܥܹܐ ܠܹܐ ܡܵܨܝܼ ܦܵܝܫܝܼ ܛܸܫܝܹܐ.
TRL: Hadkha oep poelkhane ṭabe peeshe yna dee'e min qam 'dana, o anee dle yna peeshe dee'e le maṣee payshee ṭishye.
ENG: In like manner also there are good works that are evident; and such as are otherwise cannot be hid.

ASY: ܟܠܲܝܗܝ ܐܵܢܝܼ ܕܝܼܢܵܐ ܬܚܘܿܬ ܢܝܼܪܵܐ ܕܥܲܒ݂ܕܘܼܬܵܐ، ܡܝܲܩܪܝܼ ܠܡܵܪ̈ܵܘܵܬܲܝܗܝ ܒܟܠ ܥܕܵܢܵܐ، ܕܠܵܐ ܦܵܐܹܫ ܓܕܝܼܦܵܐ ܫܸܡܵܐ ܕܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ ܘܝܘܼܠܦܵܢܲܢ.
TRL: Klayhy anee deena tkhoot neera d'awdoeta, myaqree lmarawatayhy bkl 'dana, dla paesh gdeepa shima dalaha o yoelpanan.
ENG: Let as many as are servants under the yoke count their own masters worthy of all honour, that the name of God and the doctrine be not blasphemed.

ASY: ܘܐܵܢܝܼ ܕܐܝܼܬ ܠܗܘܿܢ ܡܵܪ̈ܵܘܵܬܹܐ ܡܗܘܼܡܢܹ̈ܐ، ܠܵܐ ܡܲܣܠܝܼ ܠܗܘܿܢ، ܣܵܒܵܒ ܐܲܚܘܿܢܘܵܬܹ̈ܐ ܝܢܵܐ، ܐܸܠܵܐ ܥܵܒ݂ܕܝܼ ܠܗܘܿܢ ܚܸܠܡܲܬ ܒܘܼܫ ܨܦܵܝܝܼ، ܣܵܒܵܒ ܡܗܘܼܡܢܹ̈ܐ ܘܡܘܼܚܸܒܹ̈ܐ ܝܢܵܐ ܘܫܲܪ̈ܝܼܟܹܐ ܒܝܘܼܬܪܵܢܵܐ. ܐܲܢܹܐ ܡܲܠܸܦ ܘܒܥܝܼ ܡܸܢܲܝܗܝ.
TRL: O anee deet-lhoon marawate mhoemne, la maslee-lhoon, sabab akhoonwate yna, ila 'awdee-lhoon khilmat boesh ṣpayee, sabab mhoemne o moekhibe yna o shareeke byoetrana. Ane malip o b'ee minayhy.
ENG: And they that have believing masters, let them not despise them, because they are brethren; but let them serve them the rather, because they that partake of the benefit are believing and beloved. These things teach and exhort.

ASY: ܐܸܢ ܐ݇ܢܵܫܵܐ ܡܲܠܸܦ ܝܘܼܠܦܵܢܵܐ ܐ݇ܚܹܪ݇ܢܵܐ ܘܠܵܐ ܬܵܒܹܥ ܠܗܹܡܸܙܡܵܢܹ̈ܐ ܫܲܪܝܼܪܹ̈ܐ ܕܡܵܪܲܢ ܝܼܫܘܿܥ ܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ ܘܠܝܘܼܠܦܵܢܵܐ ܕܐܝܼܬ ܒܝܼܹܗ ܙܕܘܼܥܬܵܐ ܕܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ،
TRL: In nasha malip yoelpana khena o la tabe' lhemizmane shareere dmaran eeshoo' msheekha o lyoelpana deet bee-eh zdoe'ta dalaha,
ENG: If any man teacheth a different doctrine, and consenteth not to sound words, even the words of our Lord Jesus Christ, and to the doctrine which is according to godliness;

ASY: ܐܵܗܵܐ ܐ݇ܢܵܫܵܐ ܡܸܠܝܵܐ ܝܠܹܗ ܫܘܼܒ݂ܗܵܪܵܐ، ܘܡܸܢܕܝܼ ܠܹܐ ܝܵܕܹܥ، ܐܸܠܵܐ ܡܪܝܼܥܵܐ ܝܠܹܗ ܒܕܘܼܪ̈ܵܫܹܐ ܘܒܡܲܦܠܲܫܬܵܐ ܕܗܹܡܸܙܡܵܢܹ̈ܐ، ܕܡܸܢܲܝܗܝ ܟܹܐ ܒܵܪܝܼ ܒܲܚܸܠܵܢܘܼܬܵܐ، ܘܡܲܩܲܪܵܨܘܼܬܵܐ، ܓܘܼܕܵܦܹ̈ܐ ܘܚܘܼܫܵܒܹ̈ܐ ܒܝܼܫܹ̈ܐ،
TRL: Aha nasha milya-yleh shoewhara, o mindee le yade', ila mree'a-yleh bdoerashe o bmaplashta dhemizmane, dminayhy ke baree bakhilanoeta, o maqaraṣoeta, goedape o khoeshabe beeshe,
ENG: he is puffed up, knowing nothing, but doting about questionings and disputes of words, whereof cometh envy, strife, railings, evil surmisings,

ASY: ܘܕܘܼܪ̈ܵܫܹܐ ܕܠܵܐ ܩܛܵܥܬܵܐ ܒܹܝܠ ܐ݇ܢܵܫܹ̈ܐ ܡܘܼܚܪܸܒܹܐ ܒܪܸܥܝܵܢܵܐ، ܐܵܢܝܼ ܕܦܝܼܫ ܠܗܘܿܢ ܣܠܝܼܒܹܐ ܡ̣ܢ ܫܪܵܪܵܐ ܘܕܒܸܚܫܵܒ݂ܵܐ ܝܢܵܐ ܕܙܕܘܼܥܬܵܐ ܕܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ ܐܘܼܪܚܵܐ ܝܠܵܗ̇ ܠܩܢܵܝܬܵܐ ܕܥܘܼܬܪܵܐ.
TRL: O doerashe dla qṭa'ta beyl nashe moekhribe bri'yana, anee dpeesh-lhoon sleebe min shrara o dbikhshawa yna dzdoe'ta dalaha oerkha-ylaha lqnayta d'oetra.
ENG: wranglings of men corrupted in mind and bereft of the truth, supposing that godliness is a way of gain.

ASY: ܐܝܼܢܵܐ ܙܕܘܼܥܬܵܐ ܕܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ ܥܲܡ ܣܒ݂ܝܼܥܘܼܬܵܐ ܩܢܵܝܬܵܐ ܓܘܼܪܬܵܐ ܝܠܵܗ̇.
TRL: Eena zdoe'ta dalaha 'am swee'oeta qnayta goerta-ylaha.
ENG: But godliness with contentment is great gain:

ASY: ܣܵܒܵܒ ܠܵܐ ܡܘܼܥܒܸܪܲܢ ܡܸܢܕܝܼ ܥܲܡܲܢ ܠܕܘܼܢܝܹܐ، ܘܠܹܐ ܡܵܨܲܚ ܕܦܲܠܛܲܚ ܡܸܢܕܝܼ ܡܸܢܘܼܗ̇.
TRL: Sabab la moe'biran mindee 'aman ldoenye, o le maṣakh dpalṭakh mindee minoeha.
ENG: for we brought nothing into the world, for neither can we carry anything out;

ASY: ܒܲܣ ܐܸܢ ܐܝܼܬ ܠܲܢ ܡܹܐܟ݂ܘܼܠܬܵܐ ܘܠܒ݂ܝܼܫܬܵܐ، ܗܵܘܲܚ ܣܒ݂ܝܼܥܹܐ ܒܝܼܲܝܗܝ.
TRL: Bas in eet lan mekhoelta o lweeshta, hawakh swee'e bee-ayhy.
ENG: but having food and covering we shall be therewith content.

ASY: ܐܝܼܢܵܐ ܐܵܢܝܼ ܕܒܵܥܝܼ ܗܵܘܝܼ ܥܲܬܝܼܪܹ̈ܐ ܟܹܐ ܢܵܦܠܝܼ ܒܓ̰ܘܼܪܵܒܵܐ، ܘܒܢܸܫܒ݂ܵܐ ܘܓܵܘ ܪܵܒܵܐ ܫܲܗܘܲܬܝܵܬܹ̈ܐ ܣܲܟ݂ܠܹ̈ܐ ܘܚܲܙܕܸܓܵܢܹ̈ܐ ܕܟܹܐ ܡܲܛܒܸܥܝܼ ܠܐ݇ܢܵܫܹ̈ܐ ܒܛܠܵܩܵܐ.
TRL: Eena anee dba'ee hawee 'ateere ke naplee bjoeraba, o bnishwa o gaw raba shahwatyate sakhle o khazdigane dke maṭbi'ee lnashe bṭlaqa.
ENG: But they that desire to be rich fall into a temptation and a snare and many foolish and hurtful lusts, such as drown men in destruction and perdition.

ASY: ܣܵܒܵܒ ܚܘܼܒܵܐ ܕܙܘܼܙܵܐ ܥܸܩܪܵܐ ܕܟܠܲܝܗܝ ܓܸܢܣܹ̈ܐ ܕܒܝܼܫܵܬܹ̈ܐ ܝܠܹܗ، ܗ̇ܘ ܕܚܲܕ݇ܟܡܵܐ ܕܫܘܼܗܘܸܬ ܠܗܘܿܢ ܐܸܠܹܗ، ܘܚܠܝܼܛ ܠܗܘܿܢ ܡ̣ܢ ܗܲܝܡܵܢܘܼܬܵܐ، ܘܡܘܼܥܒܸܪܵܐ ܠܗܘܿܢ ܓܵܢܲܝܗܝ ܒܓ̰ܘܼܢܓ̰ܵܪܹ̈ܐ ܪܵܒܵܐ.
TRL: Sabab khoeba dzoeza 'iqra dklayhy ginse dbeeshate-yleh, haw dkhakma dshoehwit-lhoon ileh, o khleeṭ-lhoon min haymanoeta, o moe'bira-lhoon ganayhy bjoenjare raba.
ENG: For the love of money is a root of all kinds of evil: which some reaching after have been led astray from the faith, and have pierced themselves through with many sorrows.

ASY: ܐܝܼܢܵܐ ܐܲܢ݇ܬ، ܝܵܐ ܐ݇ܢܵܫܵܐ ܕܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ، ܥܪܘܿܩ ܡ̣ܢ ܐܲܢܹܐ، ܘܪܚܘܿܛ ܒܵܬ݇ܪ ܙܲܕܝܼܩܘܼܬܵܐ، ܘܙܕܘܼܥܬܵܐ ܕܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ، ܘܗܲܝܡܵܢܘܼܬܵܐ، ܘܚܘܼܒܵܐ، ܘܚܡܵܠܬܵܐ ܘܡܲܟܝܼܟ݂ܘܼܬܵܐ.
TRL: Eena at, ya nasha dalaha, 'rooq min ane, o rkhooṭ bar zadeeqoeta, o zdoe'ta dalaha, o haymanoeta, o khoeba, o khmalta o makeekhoeta.
ENG: But thou, O man of God, flee these things; and follow after righteousness, godliness, faith, love, patience, meekness.

ASY: ܦܠܘܿܫ ܦܠܵܫܵܐ ܛܵܒ݂ܵܐ ܒܘܼܬ ܗܲܝܡܵܢܘܼܬܵܐ، ܘܕܒ݂ܘܿܩ ܒܚܲܝܹ̈ܐ ܥܵܠܡܝܼܢܵܝܹ̈ܐ ܕܐܸܠܲܝܗܝ ܦܝܼܫܵܐ ܝܘܸܬ ܗ݇ܘܵܐ ܓܘܼܒܝܵܐ، ܘܡܘܼܕܹܐ ܠܘܼܟ݂ ܡܵܘܕܵܝܬܵܐ ܫܲܪܝܼܪܬܵܐ ܩܵܕ݇ܡ ܪܵܒܵܐ ܣܵܗܕܹ̈ܐ.
TRL: Ploosh plasha ṭawa boet haymanoeta, o dwooq bkhaye 'almeenaye dilayhy peesha ywit wa goebya, o moede-loekh mawdayta shareerta qam raba sahde.
ENG: Fight the good fight of the faith, lay hold on the life eternal, whereunto thou wast called, and didst confess the good confession in the sight of many witnesses.

ASY: ܦܲܩܘܼܕܹܐ ܝܘܸܢ ܐܲܢܹܐ ܐܸܠܘܼܟ݂ ܩܵܕ݇ܡ ܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ، ܗ̇ܘ ܕܟܹܐ ܡܲܚܹܐ ܟܠ ܡܸܢܕܝܼ، ܘܩܵܕ݇ܡ ܝܼܫܘܿܥ ܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ، ܗ̇ܘ ܕܣܗܝܼܕ ܠܹܗ ܩܵܕ݇ܡ ܦܵܢܛܝܼܘܿܣ ܦܝܼܠܵܛܘܿܣ ܣܵܗܕܘܼܬܵܐ ܫܲܦܝܼܪܬܵܐ،
TRL: Paqoede ywin ane iloekh qam Alaha, haw dke makhe kl mindee, o qam eeshoo' msheekha, haw dsheed-leh qam panṭeeoos peelaṭoos sahdoeta shapeerta,
ENG: I charge thee in the sight of God, who quickeneth all things, and of Christ Jesus, who before Pontius Pilate witnessed the good confession;

ASY: ܕܢܵܛܪܹܬ ܠܹܗ ܐܵܗܵܐ ܦܘܼܩܕܵܢܵܐ ܕܠܵܐ ܠܲܟܵܐ ܘܕܠܵܐ ܠܵܘܡܵܐ ܗܲܠ ܓܸܠܝܵܢܵܐ ܕܡܵܪܲܢ ܝܼܫܘܿܥ ܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ.
TRL: Dnaṭret-leh aha poeqdana dla laka o dla lawma hal gilyana dmaran eeshoo' msheekha.
ENG: that thou keep the commandment, without spot, without reproach, until the appearing of our Lord Jesus Christ:

ASY: ܗ̇ܘ ܓܸܠܝܵܢܵܐ ܕܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ ܒܸܬ ܓܵܠܹܐ ܠܹܗ ܒܥܕܵܢܹܗ، ܗ̇ܘ ܕܝܼܠܹܗ ܡܒܘܼܪܟ݂ܵܐ ܘܒܢܲܦ̮ܫܹܗ ܚܲܝܠܬܵܢܵܐ، ܡܲܠܟܵܐ ܕܡܲܠܟܹ̈ܐ ܘܡܵܪܵܐ ܕܡܵܪ̈ܵܘܵܬܹܐ،
TRL: Haw gilyana dalaha bit gale-leh b'daneh, haw deeleh mboerkha o bnawsheh khayltana, malka dmalke o mara dmarawate,
ENG: which in its own times he shall shew, who is the blessed and only Potentate, the King of kings, and Lord of lords;

ASY: ܗ̇ܘ ܕܒܢܲܦ̮ܫܹܗ ܠܵܐ ܡܵܝܘܿܬܵܐ ܝܠܹܗ، ܘܟܹܐ ܥܵܡܹܪ ܒܒܲܗܪܵܐ ܕܐ݇ܢܵܫܵܐ ܠܹܐ ܡܵܨܹܐ ܩܲܪܒܸܢ ܐܸܠܹܗ، ܗ̇ܘ ܕܐ݇ܢܵܫܵܐ ܠܹܐ ܝܠܹܗ ܚܸܙܝܹܗ، ܐܘܼܦ ܠܹܐ ܡܵܨܹܐ ܠܸܚܙܵܝܹܗ. ܐܸܠܹܗ ܐܝܼܩܵܪܵܐ ܘܚܲܝܠܵܐ ܠܥܵܠܲܡ ܥܵܠܡܝܼܢ. ܐܵܡܹܝܢ.
TRL: Haw dbnawsheh la mayoota-yleh, o ke 'amer bbahra dnasha le maṣe qarbin ileh, haw dnasha le-yleh khizyeh, oep le maṣe likhzayeh. Ileh eeqara o khayla l'alam 'almeen. Ameyn.
ENG: who only hath immortality, dwelling in light unapproachable; whom no man hath seen, nor can see: to whom be honour and power eternal. Amen.

ASY: ܦܲܩܸܕ ܠܐܵܢܝܼ ܕܝܼܢܵܐ ܥܲܬܝܼܪܹ̈ܐ ܒܐܵܗܵܐ ܙܲܒ݂ܢܵܐ، ܕܠܵܐ ܗܵܘܝܼ ܫܲܒ݂ܗܸܪ̈ܵܢܹܐ، ܘܕܠܵܐ ܕܵܪܝܼ ܗܹܒ݂ܝܼܲܝܗܝ ܥܲܠ ܥܘܼܬܪܵܐ ܕܠܲܝܬ ܒܝܼܹܗ ܗܹܒ݂ܝܼ، ܐܸܠܵܐ ܕܵܪܝܼ ܗܹܒ݂ܝܼܲܝܗܝ ܥܲܠ ܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ، ܗ̇ܘ ܕܟܹܐ ܝܲܗ݇ܒܸܠ ܠܲܢ ܟܠ ܡܸܢܕܝܼ ܒܥܘܼܬܪܵܐ ܠܒܘܼܣܵܡܲܢ.
TRL: Paqid lanee deena 'ateere baha zawna, dla hawee shawhirane, o dla daree hewee-ayhy 'al 'oetra dlayt bee-eh hewee, ila daree hewee-ayhy 'al Alaha, haw dke yabil lan kl mindee b'oetra lboesaman.
ENG: Charge them that are rich in this present world, that they be not highminded, nor have their hope set on the uncertainty of riches, but on God, who giveth us richly all things to enjoy;

ASY: ܦܲܩܸܕ ܕܥܵܒ݂ܕܝܼ ܦܘܼܠܚܵܢܹ̈ܐ ܛܵܒܹ̈ܐ، ܘܕܗܵܘܝܼ ܥܲܬܝܼܪܹ̈ܐ ܒܫܘܼܠܵܢܹ̈ܐ ܫܲܦܝܼܪܹ̈ܐ، ܘܗܵܘܝܵܐ ܐܝܼܕܲܝܗܝ ܦܬܘܼܚܬܵܐ ܘܗܕܝܼܪܹ̈ܐ ܠܫܲܪܘܼܟܹܐ.
TRL: Paqid d'awdee poelkhane ṭabe, o dhawee 'ateere bshoelane shapeere, o hawya eedayhy ptoekhta o hdeere lsharoeke.
ENG: that they do good, that they be rich in good works, that they be ready to distribute, willing to communicate;

ASY: ܒܐܵܗܵܐ ܐܘܼܪܚܵܐ ܒܸܬ ܡܲܬܒ݂ܝܼ ܠܓܵܢܲܝܗܝ ܣܝܼܡܬܵܐ ܐܲܝܟ݂ ܚܕܵܐ ܒܸܢܝܲܬ ܨܦܵܝܝܼ ܩܵܐ ܕܲܥܬܝܼܕ، ܕܕܵܒ݂ܩܝܼ ܠܚܲܝܹ̈ܐ ܫܲܪܝܼܪܹ̈ܐ.
TRL: Baha oerkha bit matwee lganayhy seemta aykh khda binyat ṣpayee qa da'teed, ddawqee lkhaye shareere.
ENG: laying up in store for themselves a good foundation against the time to come, that they may lay hold on the life which is life indeed.

ASY: ܝܵܐ ܛܝܼܡܵܬܹܐܘܿܣ، ܢܛܘܿܪ ܡܸܢܕܝܼ ܕܦܝܼܫ ܠܹܗ ܣܘܼܦܝܵܐ ܒܝܼܘܼܟ݂، ܘܪܚܘܿܩ ܡ̣ܢ ܗܹܡܸܙܡܵܢܹ̈ܐ ܣܦܝܼܩܹ̈ܐ ܘܒܲܛܝܼܠܹ̈ܐ، ܘܚܘܼܫܵܒܹ̈ܐ ܕܲܠܩܘܼܒ݂ܠܵܝܹ̈ܐ ܒܚܸܠܛܵܐ ܦܝܼܫܹܐ ܩܸܪܝܹܐ ܝ݇ܕܲܥܬܵܐ،
TRL: Ya ṭeemateoos, nṭoor mindee dpeesh-leh soepya beeoekh, o rkhooq min hemizmane speeqe o baṭeele, o khoeshabe dalqoewlaye bkhilṭa peeshe qirye da'ta,
ENG: O Timothy, guard that which is committed unto thee, turning away from the profane babblings and oppositions of the knowledge which is falsely so called;

ASY: ܐܲܝܢܝܼ ܕܚܲܕ݇ܟܡܵܐ ܡܘܼܕܹܐ ܠܗܘܿܢ ܒܝܼܘܼܗ̇ ܘܒܘܼܬ ܐܵܗܵܐ ܚܠܝܼܛ ܠܗܘܿܢ ܡ̣ܢ ܗܲܝܡܵܢܘܼܬܵܐ ܓܹܒܵܐ. ܫܵܦܵܩܲܬ ܥܲܡܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ. ܐܵܡܹܝܢ.
TRL: Aynee dkhakma moede-lhoon beeoeha o boet aha khleeṭ-lhoon min haymanoeta geba. Shapaqat 'amawkhoon. Ameyn.
ENG: which some professing have erred concerning the faith. Grace be with you.

ASY: ܦܵܘܠܘܿܣ، ܫܠܝܼܚܵܐ ܕܝܼܫܘܿܥ ܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ ܒܨܸܒ݂ܝܵܢܵܐ ܕܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ، ܘܐܲܝܟ݂ ܩܵܘܠܵܐ ܕܚܲܝܹ̈ܐ ܒܝܼܫܘܿܥ ܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ،
TRL: Pawloos, shleekha deeshoo' msheekha bṣiwyana dalaha, o aykh qawla dkhaye beeshoo' msheekha,
ENG: Paul, an apostle of Christ Jesus by the will of God, according to the promise of the life which is in Christ Jesus,

ASY: ܠܛܝܼܡܵܬܹܐܘܿܣ ܒܪܘܿܢܝܼ ܡܘܼܚܸܒܵܐ. ܫܵܦܵܩܲܬ ܘܪ̈ܲܚܡܹܐ ܘܫܠܵܡܵܐ ܡ̣ܢ ܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ ܒܵܒܵܐ ܘܡ̣ܢ ܡܵܪܲܢ ܝܼܫܘܿܥ ܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ.
TRL: Lṭeemateoos broonee moekhiba. Shapaqat o rakhme o shlama min Alaha baba o min Maran eeshoo' msheekha.
ENG: to Timothy, my beloved child: Grace, mercy, peace, from God the Father and Christ Jesus our Lord.

ASY: ܫܲܟܘܼܪܹܐ ܝܘܸܢ ܠܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ، ܗ̇ܘ ܕܐܸܠܹܗ ܒܸܥܒ݂ܵܕܵܐ ܝܘܸܢ ܚܸܠܡܲܬ ܒܐܸܢܝܲܬ ܕܟ݂ܝܼܬܵܐ، ܐܲܝܟ݂ ܕܐܲܒ݂ܵܗܵܬܝܼ̈ ܥܒ݂ܝܼܕ ܠܗܘܿܢ، ܟܲܕ ܕܠܵܐ ܫܠܵܝܬܵܐ ܟܹܐ ܕܵܟ݂ܪܹܢܘܼܟ݂ ܒܨܠܵܘܵܬܝܼ̈ ܒܠܲܝܠܹܐ ܘܒܐܝܼܡܵܡܵܐ،
TRL: Shakoere ywin lalaha, haw dileh bi'wada ywin khilmat binyat dkheeta, aykh dawahatee 'weed-lhoon, kad dla shlayta ke dakhrenoekh bṣlawatee blayle o beemama,
ENG: I thank God, whom I serve from my forefathers in a pure conscience, how unceasing is my remembrance of thee in my supplications, night and day

ASY: ܘܟܲܕ ܒܸܕܟ݂ܵܪܵܐ ܕܸܡ̈ܥܹܐ ܕܥܲܝܢܘܼ̈ܟ݂، ܫܲܗܘܘܼܬܹܐ ܝܘܸܢ ܠܸܚܙܵܝܘܼܟ݂، ܕܦܵܝܫܹܢ ܡܸܠܝܵܐ ܚܲܕܘܼܬܵܐ.
TRL: O kad bidkhara dim'e d'aynoekh, shahwoete ywin likhzayoekh, dpayshen milya khadoeta.
ENG: longing to see thee, remembering thy tears, that I may be filled with joy;

ASY: ܒܸܕܟ݂ܵܪܵܐ ܝܘܸܢ ܠܗܲܝܡܵܢܘܼܬܵܐ ܫܲܪܝܼܪܬܵܐ ܕܐܝܼܬ ܒܝܼܘܼܟ݂، ܗ̇ܝ ܕܩܵܕ݇ܡܵܝܬܵܐ ܫܪܹܐ ܠܵܗ̇ ܒܝܸܡܵܐ ܕܝܸܡܘܼܟ݂ ܠܘܿܐܝܼܣ، ܘܒܝܸܡܘܼܟ݂ ܐܹܘܢܝܼܩܹܐ، ܘܚܵܬܸܪܓ̰ܲܡܥ ܝܼܘܸܢ ܕܐܵܕܝܼܵܐ ܒܸܥܡܵܪܵܐ ܝܠܵܗ̇ ܐܘܼܦ ܒܝܼܘܼܟ݂.
TRL: Bidkhara ywin lhaymanoeta shareerta deet beeoekh, hay dqamayta shre-laha byima dyimoekh looees, o byimoekh ewneeqe, o khatirjam' eewin dadeea bi'mara-ylaha oep beeoekh.
ENG: having been reminded of the unfeigned faith that is in thee; which dwelt first in thy grandmother Lois, and thy mother Eunice; and, I am persuaded, in thee also.

ASY: ܒܘܼܬ ܐܵܗܵܐ ܡܲܕܟ݂ܘܼܪܘܼܟ݂ ܝܼܘܸܢ ܕܡܲܠܗܹܝܬ ܡܵܘܗܲܒ݂ܬܵܐ ܕܡ̣ܢ ܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ ܕܝܼܠܵܗ̇ ܒܝܼܘܼܟ݂ ܒܝܲܕ ܡܲܬܲܒ݂ܬܵܐ ܕܐܝܼܕܝܼ.
TRL: Boet aha madkhoeroekh eewin dmalheyt mawhawta dmin Alaha deelaha beeoekh byad matawta deedee.
ENG: For the which cause I put thee in remembrance that thou stir up the gift of God, which is in thee through the laying on of my hands.

ASY: ܣܵܒܵܒ ܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ ܠܵܐ ܝܘܼܗ݇ܒܸܠ ܠܹܗ ܐܸܠܲܢ ܪܘܼܚܵܐ ܕܙܕܘܼܥܬܵܐ، ܐܸܠܵܐ ܪܘܼܚܵܐ ܕܚܲܝܠܵܐ ܘܕܚܘܼܒܵܐ ܘܕܕܒ݂ܵܩܬܵܐ ܕܓܵܢܵܐ.
TRL: Sabab Alaha la yoebil-leh ilan roekha dzdoe'ta, ila roekha dkhayla o dkhoeba o ddwaqta dgana.
ENG: For God gave us not a spirit of fearfulness; but of power and love and discipline.

ASY: ܒܘܼܬ ܐܵܗܵܐ ܠܵܐ ܢܵܟ݂ܦܹܬ ܠܝܼܵܗ݇ܒ݂ܵܐ ܣܵܗܕܘܼܬܵܐ ܒܘܼܬ ܡܵܪܲܢ، ܘܐܘܼܦ ܠܵܐ ܒܝܼܝܼ ܕܝܼܘܸܢ ܐܲܣܝܼܪܹܗ، ܐܸܠܵܐ ܗܘܝܼ ܫܲܪܝܼܟܵܐ ܒܓ̰ܘܼܢܓ̰ܵܪܹ̈ܐ ܒܘܼܬ ܚܵܬܸܪ ܕܐܹܘܲܢܓܲܠܝܼܘܿܢ ܐܲܝܟ݂ ܕܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ ܝܲܗ݇ܒܸܠ ܠܘܼܟ݂ ܚܲܝܠܵܐ،
TRL: Boet aha la nakhpet leeawa sahdoeta boet Maran, o oep la beeee deewin aseereh, ila hwee shareeka bjoenjare boet khatir dewangaleeoon aykh dalaha yabil-loekh khayla,
ENG: Be not ashamed therefore of the testimony of our Lord, nor of me his prisoner: but suffer hardship with the gospel according to the power of God;

ASY: ܗ̇ܘ ܕܩܲܡ ܦܲܪܸܩ ܠܲܢ ܘܩܲܡ ܩܵܪܹܐ ܠܲܢ ܒܩܪܵܝܬܵܐ ܩܲܕܝܼܫܬܵܐ، ܠܵܐ ܒܝܲܕ ܦܘܼܠܚܵܢܲܢ، ܐܝܼܢܵܐ ܒܝܲܕ ܨܸܒ݂ܝܵܢܵܐ ܕܓܵܢܹܗ ܘܫܵܦܵܩܲܬܹܗ، ܗ̇ܝ ܕܦܝܼܫ ܠܵܗ̇ ܝܘܼܗ݇ܒܸܠܬܵܐ ܐܸܠܲܢ ܒܝܼܫܘܿܥ ܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ ܡ̣ܢ ܩܵܕ݇ܡ ܙܲܒ݂ܢܵܐ ܕܥܵܠܡܹ̈ܐ،
TRL: Haw dqam pariq lan o qam qare lan bqrayta qadeeshta, la byad poelkhanan, eena byad ṣiwyana dganeh o shapaqateh, hay dpeesh-laha yoebilta ilan beeshoo' msheekha min qam zawna d'alme,
ENG: who saved us, and called us with a holy calling, not according to our works, but according to his own purpose and grace, which was given us in Christ Jesus before times eternal,

ASY: ܐܝܼܢܵܐ ܐܵܕܝܼܵܐ ܦܝܼܫ ܠܵܗ̇ ܓܠܝܼܬܵܐ ܒܓܸܠܝܵܢܵܐ ܕܦܵܪܘܿܩܲܢ ܝܼܫܘܿܥ ܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ، ܗ̇ܘ ܕܒܘܼܛܸܠ ܠܹܗ ܠܡܵܘܬܵܐ ܘܡܘܼܚܙܹܐ ܠܹܗ ܚܲܝܹ̈ܐ ܘܠܵܐ ܚܪܵܒ݂ܬܵܐ ܒܐܹܘܲܢܓܲܠܝܼܘܿܢ.
TRL: Eena adeea peesh-laha gleeta bgilyana dparooqan eeshoo' msheekha, haw dboeṭil-leh lmawta o moekhze-leh khaye o la khrawta bewangaleeoon.
ENG: but hath now been manifested by the appearing of our Saviour Christ Jesus, who abolished death, and brought life and incorruption to light through the gospel,

ASY: ܠܐܵܗܵܐ ܐܹܘܲܢܓܲܠܝܼܘܿܢ ܦܝܼܫ ܠܝܼ ܪܫܝܼܡܵܐ ܟܵܪܘܿܙܵܐ ܘܫܠܝܼܚܵܐ ܘܡܲܠܦܵܢܵܐ ܕܐܸܡܘܵܬܹ̈ܐ.
TRL: Laha ewangaleeoon peesh-lee rsheema karooza o shleekha o malpana dimwate.
ENG: whereunto I was appointed a preacher, and an apostle, and a teacher.

ASY: ܒܘܼܬ ܐܵܗܵܐ ܩܲܒܘܼܠܲܝ ܝܘܸܢ ܐܲܢܹܐ، ܐܝܼܢܵܐ ܠܹܐ ܝܘܸܢ ܒܸܢܟ݂ܵܦܵܐ، ܣܵܒܵܒ ܟܹܐ ܝܵܕܥܹܢ ܒܡܵܢܝܼ ܗܘܼܡܸܢܵܐ ܝܘܸܢ، ܘܚܵܬܸܪܓ̰ܲܡܥ ܝܼܘܸܢ ܕܟܹܐ ܡܵܨܹܐ ܢܵܛܹܪ ܗܲܝܡܲܢܬܝܼ ܗܲܠ ܗ̇ܘ ܝܵܘܡܵܐ.
TRL: Boet aha qaboelay ywin ane, eena le ywin binkhapa, sabab ke yad'en bmanee hoemina ywin, o khatirjam' eewin dke maṣe naṭer haymantee hal haw yawma.
ENG: For the which cause I suffer also these things: yet I am not ashamed; for I know him whom I have believed, and I am persuaded that he is able to guard that which I have committed unto him against that day.

ASY: ܗܹܡܸܙܡܵܢܹ̈ܐ ܕܫܡܝܼܥ ܠܘܼܟ݂ ܡܸܢܝܼ ܗܵܘܝܼ ܐܸܠܘܼܟ݂ ܛܘܼܦ̮ܣܵܐ ܕܝܘܼܠܦܵܢܵܐ ܓܡܝܼܪܵܐ ܒܗܲܝܡܵܢܘܼܬܵܐ ܘܒܚܘܼܒܵܐ ܒܝܼܫܘܿܥ ܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ.
TRL: Hemizmane dshmee' loekh minee hawee iloekh ṭoewsa dyoelpana gmeera bhaymanoeta o bkhoeba beeshoo' msheekha.
ENG: Hold the pattern of sound words which thou hast heard from me, in faith and love which is in Christ Jesus.

ASY: ܢܛܘܿܪ ܨܦܵܝܝܼ ܠܗ̇ܝ ܗܲܝܡܲܢܬܵܐ ܒܝܲܕ ܪܘܼܚܵܐ ܕܩܘܼܕܫܵܐ ܕܒܸܥܡܵܪܵܐ ܝܠܹܗ ܒܝܼܲܢ.
TRL: Nṭoor ṣpayee lhay haymanta byad roekha dqoedsha dbi'mara-yleh bee-an.
ENG: That good thing which was committed unto thee guard through the Holy Ghost which dwelleth in us.

ASY: ܒܝܼܕܵܥܵܐ ܝܘܸܬ ܕܩܠܝܼܒ ܠܗܘܿܢ ܡܸܢܝܼ ܟܠܲܝܗܝ ܐܵܢܝܼ ܕܓܵܘ ܐܵܣܝܼܵܐ، ܡܸܢܲܝܗܝ ܦܹܘܓܹܠܘܿܣ ܘܗܲܪܡܵܓܹܢܝܼܣ.
TRL: Beeda'a ywit dqleeb-lhoon minee klayhy anee dgaw aseea, minayhy pewgeloos o harmagenees.
ENG: This thou knowest, that all that are in Asia turned away from me; of whom are Phygelus and Hermogenes.

ASY: ܡܵܪܲܢ ܡܲܚܙܹܐ ܪ̈ܲܚܡܹܐ ܠܒܲܝܬܵܐ ܕܐܵܢܹܣܝܼܦܵܪܘܿܣ، ܣܵܒܵܒ ܩܲܡ ܡܲܢܝܸܚ ܠܝܼ ܪܵܒܵܐ ܓܵܗܹ̈ܐ، ܘܠܵܐ ܢܟ݂ܝܼܦ ܠܹܗ ܒܫܹܫܠܵܬܝܼ̈،
TRL: Maran makhze rakhme lbayta daneseeparoos, sabab qam manyikh-lee raba gahe, o la nkheep-leh bsheshlatee,
ENG: The Lord grant mercy unto the house of Onesiphorus: for he oft refreshed me, and was not ashamed of my chain;

ASY: ܘܐܝܼܡܲܢ ܕܐ݇ܬܹܐ ܠܹܗ ܠܪܗ݇ܘܿܡܹܐ، ܒܚܲܦܵܛܘܼܬܵܐ ܛܥܹܐ ܠܹܗ ܗܲܠ ܕܡܘܼܫ݇ܟ̰ܸܚ ܠܹܗ ܐܸܠܝܼ.
TRL: O eeman dte-leh lroome, bkhapaṭoeta ṭ'e-leh hal dmoechikh-leh ilee.
ENG: but, when he was in Rome, he sought me diligently, and found me

ASY: ܥܵܒܹܕ ܡܵܪܲܢ ܕܡܲܫ݇ܟ̰ܸܚ ܪ̈ܲܚܡܹܐ ܡ̣ܢ ܡܵܪܲܢ ܒܗ̇ܘ ܝܵܘܡܵܐ. ܘܟܹܐ ܝܵܕܥܹܬ ܪܵܒܵܐ ܨܦܵܝܝܼ ܟܡܵܐ ܗܘܼܝܸܪܹܗ ܐܸܠܝܼ ܓܵܘ ܐܵܦܸܣܘܿܣ.
TRL: 'Abed Maran dmachikh rakhme min Maran bhaw yawma. O ke yad'et raba ṣpayee kma hoeyireh ilee gaw apisoos.
ENG: (the Lord grant unto him to find mercy of the Lord in that day); and in how many things he ministered at Ephesus, thou knowest very well.

ASY: ܗܲܕܟ݂ܵܐ ܐܲܢ݇ܬ، ܒܪܘܿܢܝܼ، ܗܘܝܼ ܚܲܝܠܵܢܵܐ ܒܫܵܦܵܩܲܬ ܕܝܼܠܵܗ̇ ܒܝܼܫܘܿܥ ܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ.
TRL: Hadkha at, broonee, hwee khaylana bshapaqat deelaha beeshoo' msheekha.
ENG: Thou therefore, my child, be strengthened in the grace that is in Christ Jesus.

ASY: ܘܡܸܢܕܝܼ ܕܫܡܝܼܥ ܠܘܼܟ݂ ܡܸܢܝܼ ܩܵܕ݇ܡ ܪܵܒܵܐ ܣܵܗܕܹ̈ܐ، ܣܲܦܝܼ ܒܐ݇ܢܵܫܹ̈ܐ ܡܗܘܼܡܢܹ̈ܐ، ܐܵܢܝܼ ܕܡܵܨܝܼ ܡܲܠܦܝܼ ܐܘܼܦ ܠܐ݇ܢܵܫܹ̈ܐ ܐ݇ܚܹܪ̈݇ܢܹܐ.
TRL: O mindee dshmee' loekh minee qam raba sahde, sapee bnashe mhoemne, anee dmaṣee malpee oep lnashe khene.
ENG: And the things which thou hast heard from me among many witnesses, the same commit thou to faithful men, who shall be able to teach others also.

ASY: ܗܘܝܼ ܫܲܪܝܼܟܵܐ ܒܓ̰ܘܼܢܓ̰ܵܪܹ̈ܐ ܐܲܝܟ݂ ܕܲܚܫܵܐ ܛܵܒ݂ܵܐ ܕܝܼܫܘܿܥ ܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ.
TRL: Hwee shareeka bjoenjare aykh dakhsha ṭawa deeshoo' msheekha.
ENG: Suffer hardship with me, as a good soldier of Christ Jesus.

ASY: ܗܸܟ̃ ܚܲܕ ܠܹܐ ܥܵܒܹܕ ܕܲܚܫܘܼܬܵܐ ܘܐܵܣܹܪܵܗ̇ ܓܵܢܹܗ ܒܫܘܼܠܵܢܹ̈ܐ ܕܐܲܢܹܐ ܚܲܝܹ̈ܐ، ܐܸܠܵܐ ܟܹܐ ܫܵܦܹܪ ܠܗ̇ܘ ܕܓܘܼܒܹܐ ܠܹܗ ܐܸܠܹܗ ܠܦܵܠܚܘܼܬܵܐ.
TRL: Hich khad le 'abed dakhshoeta o aseraha ganeh bshoelane dane khaye, ila ke shaper lhaw dgoebe-leh ileh lpalkhoeta.
ENG: No soldier on service entangleth himself in the affairs of this life; that he may please him who enrolled him as a soldier.

ASY: ܘܐܸܢ ܐܲܬܠܹܝܛܵܐ ܥܵܒܹܕ ܐܵܓ݂ܘܿܢܵܐ ܓܵܘ ܡܲܝܕܵܢ، ܠܹܐ ܩܲܒܸܠ ܟܠܝܼܠܵܐ ܐܸܢ ܠܵܐ ܩܵܢܘܿܢܵܐܝܼܬ ܥܵܒܹܕ ܐܵܓ݂ܘܿܢܵܐ.
TRL: O in atleyṭa 'abed aghoona gaw maydan, le qabil kleela in la qanoonaeet 'abed aghoona.
ENG: And if also a man contend in the games, he is not crowned, except he have contended lawfully.

ASY: ܘܐܲܟܵܪܵܐ ܕܟܹܐ ܦܵܠܹܚ ܩܸܫܝܵܐ، ܘܵܠܹܐ ܝܠܵܗ̇ ܕܩܵܕ݇ܡܵܝܬܵܐ ܫܲܪܸܟ ܒܛܥܘܼܢܝܵܬܹ̈ܐ.
TRL: O akara dke palekh qishya, wale-ylaha dqamayta sharik bṭ'oenyate.
ENG: The husbandman that laboureth must be the first to partake of the fruits.

ASY: ܬܲܚܡܸܢ ܥܲܠ ܐܲܢܹܐ ܕܒܹܐܡܵܪܵܐ ܝܘܸܢ، ܣܵܒܵܒ ܡܵܪܲܢ ܒܸܬ ܝܲܗ݇ܒܸܠ ܠܘܼܟ݂ ܦܲܪܡܵܝܬܵܐ ܒܟܠ ܡܸܢܕܝܼ.
TRL: Takhmin 'al ane dbemara ywin, sabab Maran bit yabil-loekh parmayta bkl mindee.
ENG: Consider what I say; for the Lord shall give thee understanding in all things.

ASY: ܕܟ݂ܘܿܪ ܠܝܼܫܘܿܥ ܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ ܡ̣ܢ ܙܲܪܥܵܐ ܕܕܵܘܝܼܕ، ܗ̇ܘ ܕܩܝܼܡ ܠܹܗ ܡ̣ܢ ܓܵܘ ܡܝܼܬܹ̈ܐ. ܐܵܗܵܐ ܝܠܹܗ ܐܹܘܲܢܓܲܠܝܼܘܿܢ ܕܝܼܝܼ.
TRL: Dkhoor leeshoo' msheekha min zar'a ddaweed, haw dqeem-leh min gaw meete. Aha-yleh ewangaleeoon deeee.
ENG: Remember Jesus Christ, risen from the dead, of the seed of David, according to my gospel:

ASY: ܒܘܼܬ ܐܵܗܵܐ ܐܹܘܲܢܓܲܠܝܼܘܿܢ ܩܲܒܘܼܠܹܐ ܝܘܸܢ ܓ̰ܘܼܢܓ̰ܵܪܹ̈ܐ ܗܲܠ ܕܡܵܛܝܵܐ ܐܘܼܦ ܠܐܸܣܘܼܪܹ̈ܐ، ܐܲܝܟ݂ ܚܲܕ ܥܵܒ݂ܕܵܢܵܐ ܕܒܝܼܫܵܬܹ̈ܐ، ܐ݇ܣܝܼܪܵܐ ܒܫܹܫܠܵܬܹ̈ܐ. ܐܝܼܢܵܐ ܗܹܡܸܙܡܵܢ ܕܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ ܠܹܐ ܝܠܵܗ̇ ܐ݇ܣܝܼܪܬܵܐ.
TRL: Boet aha ewangaleeoon qaboele ywin joenjare hal dmaṭya oep lisoere, aykh khad 'awdana dbeeshate, seera bsheshlate. Eena hemizman dalaha le-ylaha seerta.
ENG: wherein I suffer hardship unto bonds, as a malefactor; but the word of God is not bound.

ASY: ܒܘܼܬ ܐܵܗܵܐ ܩܲܒܘܼܠܹܐ ܝܘܸܢ ܟܠ ܡܸܢܕܝܼ ܒܘܼܬ ܚܵܬܸܪ ܕܓܘܼܒܝܹ̈ܐ، ܕܐܘܼܦ ܐܵܢܝܼ ܩܲܒܠܝܼ ܦܘܼܪܩܵܢܵܐ ܒܝܼܫܘܿܥ ܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ، ܥܲܡ ܚܸܩܪܵܐ ܥܵܠܡܝܼܢܵܝܵܐ.
TRL: Boet aha qaboele ywin kl mindee boet khatir dgoebye, doep anee qablee poerqana beeshoo' msheekha, 'am khiqra 'almeenaya.
ENG: Therefore I endure all things for the elect’s sake, that they also may obtain the salvation which is in Christ Jesus with eternal glory.

ASY: ܫܲܪܝܼܪܬܵܐ ܝܠܵܗ̇ ܐܵܗܵܐ ܗܹܡܸܙܡܵܢ: ܐܸܢ ܡܝܼܬ ܠܲܢ ܥܲܡܹܗ، ܐܘܼܦ ܒܸܬ ܚܵܝܲܚ ܥܲܡܹܗ.
TRL: Shareerta-ylaha aha hemizman: in meet lan 'ameh, oep bit khayakh 'ameh.
ENG: Faithful is the saying: For if we died with him, we shall also live with him:

ASY: ܐܸܢ ܚܵܡܠܲܚ، ܐܘܼܦ ܒܸܬ ܥܵܒ݂ܕܲܚ ܡܲܠܟܘܼܬܵܐ ܥܲܡܹܗ. ܐܸܢ ܣܵܪܒܲܚ ܠܹܗ، ܐܘܼܦ ܗ̇ܘ ܒܸܬ ܣܵܪܹܒ݂ ܠܲܢ.
TRL: In khamlakh, oep bit 'awdakh malkoeta 'ameh. In sarbakh-leh, oep haw bit sarew lan.
ENG: if we endure, we shall also reign with him: if we shall deny him, he also will deny us:

ASY: ܐܸܢ ܠܵܐ ܗܲܡܸܢܲܚ، ܗ̇ܘ ܒܸܬ ܦܵܐܹܫ ܡܗܘܼܡܢܵܐ، ܣܵܒܵܒ ܠܹܐ ܡܵܨܹܐ ܣܵܪܹܒ݂ ܠܵܗ̇ ܓܵܢܹܗ.
TRL: In la haminakh, haw bit paesh mhoemna, sabab le maṣe sarew-laha ganeh.
ENG: if we are faithless, he abideth faithful; for he cannot deny himself.

ASY: ܐܲܢܹܐ ܗܵܘܹܝܬ ܡܲܕܟ݂ܘܼܪܲܝ، ܘܒܸܣܗܵܕܵܐ ܐܸܠܲܝܗܝ ܩܵܕ݇ܡ ܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ، ܕܠܵܐ ܗܵܘܝܼ ܡܲܩܪܘܼܨܹܐ ܒܘܼܬ ܗܹܡܸܙܡܵܢܹ̈ܐ ܕܠܲܝܬ ܠܗܘܿܢ ܝܘܼܬܪܵܢܵܐ، ܘܟܹܐ ܬܵܠܚܝܼ ܠܐܵܢܝܼ ܕܫܵܡܥܝܼ ܠܗܘܿܢ.
TRL: Ane haweyt madkhoeray, o bishada ilayhy qam Alaha, dla hawee maqroeṣe boet hemizmane dlayt-lhoon yoetrana, o ke talkhee lanee dsham'ee-lhoon.
ENG: Of these things put them in remembrance, charging them in the sight of the Lord, that they strive not about words, to no profit, to the subverting of them that hear.

ASY: ܓ̰ܲܪܸܒ ܒܩܸܫܝܘܼܬܵܐ ܕܡܲܩܪܸܒܸܬ ܓܵܢܘܼܟ݂ ܦܲܠܵܚܵܐ ܓܡܝܼܪܵܐ ܩܵܕ݇ܡ ܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ ܕܠܵܐ ܢܟ݂ܝܼܦܬܵܐ، ܬܪܘܼܨܵܐܝܼܬ ܦܲܫܘܼܩܹܐ ܗܹܡܸܙܡܵܢ ܕܫܪܵܪܵܐ.
TRL: Jarib bqishyoeta dmaqribit ganoekh palakha gmeera qam Alaha dla nkheepta, troeṣaeet pashoeqe hemizman dshrara.
ENG: Give diligence to present thyself approved unto God, a workman that needeth not to be ashamed, handling aright the word of truth.

ASY: ܪܚܘܿܩ ܡ̣ܢ ܗܹܡܸܙܡܵܢܹ̈ܐ ܣܦܝܼܩܹ̈ܐ ܘܒܲܛܝܼܠܹ̈ܐ، ܣܵܒܵܒ ܐܵܢܝܼ ܒܸܬ ܡܲܙܝܸܕܝܼ ܥܵܘܠܵܐ،
TRL: Rkhooq min hemizmane speeqe o baṭeele, sabab anee bit mazyidee 'awla,
ENG: But shun profane babblings: for they will proceed further in ungodliness,

ASY: ܘܝܘܼܠܦܵܢܲܝܗܝ ܒܸܬ ܦܵܪܹܣ ܐܲܝܟ݂ ܚܲܠܵܕܝܼܬܵܐ. ܡܸܢܲܝܗܝ ܝܢܵܐ ܗܹܘܡܹܢܹܐܘܿܣ ܘܦܝܼܠܹܛܘܿܣ،
TRL: O yoelpanayhy bit pares aykh khaladeeta. Minayhy yna hewmeneoos o peeleṭoos,
ENG: and their word will eat as doth a gangrene: of whom is Hymenaeus and Philetus;

ASY: ܐܵܢܝܼ ܕܚܠܝܼܛ ܠܗܘܿܢ ܡ̣ܢ ܫܪܵܪܵܐ، ܒܹܐܡܵܪܵܐ ܕܩܝܵܡܬܵܐ ܥܒ݂ܝܼܪܬܵܐ ܝܠܵܗ̇، ܘܗܲܕܟ݂ܵܐ ܡܘܼܚܪܸܒ݂ ܠܗܘܿܢ ܠܗܲܝܡܵܢܘܼܬܵܐ ܕܚܲܕ݇ܟܡܵܐ.
TRL: Anee dkhleeṭ-lhoon min shrara, bemara dqyamta 'weerta-ylaha, o hadkha moekhriw-lhoon lhaymanoeta dkhakma.
ENG: men who concerning the truth have erred, saying that the resurrection is past already, and overthrow the faith of some.

ASY: ܐܝܼܢܵܐ ܫܲܬܐܸܣܬܵܐ ܕܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ ܩܘܝܼܬܵܐ ܝܠܵܗ̇، ܚܬܝܼܡܬܵܐ ܒܐܵܗܵܐ ܚܵܬܡܵܐ: ܟܹܐ ܝܵܕܹܥ ܡܵܪܝܵܐ ܠܐܵܢܝܼ ܕܝܼܢܵܐ ܕܝܼܹܗ. ܐܘܼܦ، ”ܟܠ ܡ̇ܢ ܕܩܵܪܹܐ ܒܫܸܡܵܐ ܕܡܵܪܲܢ ܪܵܚܹܩ ܡ̣ܢ ܥܵܘܠܵܐ.“
TRL: Eena shatista dalaha qweeta-ylaha, khteemta baha khatma: ke yade' Marya lanee deena dee-eh. Oep, ”kl man dqare bshima dmaran rakheq min 'awla.“
ENG: Howbeit the firm foundation of God standeth, having this seal, The Lord knoweth them that are his: and, Let every one that nameth the name of the Lord depart from unrighteousness.

ASY: ܓܵܘ ܒܲܝܬܵܐ ܓܘܼܪܵܐ، ܠܵܐ ܐܲܚܟ̰ܝܼ ܐܝܼܬ ܡܵܐܢܹ̈ܐ ܕܕܲܗܒ݂ܵܐ ܘܕܣܹܐܡܵܐ، ܐܝܼܢܵܐ ܐܘܼܦ ܕܩܲܝܣܵܐ ܘܕܛܝܼܢܵܐ، ܚܲܕ݇ܟܡܵܐ ܠܐܝܼܩܵܪܵܐ ܘܚܲܕ݇ܟܡܵܐ ܠܡܲܣܠܵܝܬܵܐ.
TRL: Gaw bayta goera, la akhchee eet mane ddahwa o dsema, eena oep dqaysa o dṭeena, khakma leeqara o khakma lmaslayta.
ENG: Now in a great house there are not only vessels of gold and of silver, but also of wood and of earth; and some unto honour, and some unto dishonour.

ASY: ܐܸܢ ܐ݇ܢܵܫܵܐ ܕܲܟܹܐ ܠܵܗ̇ ܓܵܢܹܗ ܡ̣ܢ ܡܸܢܕܝܼܵܢܹ̈ܐ ܕܡܲܣܠܵܝܬܵܐ، ܒܸܬ ܗܵܘܹܐ ܡܵܐܢܵܐ ܠܐܝܼܩܵܪܵܐ، ܡܩܘܼܕܫܵܐ، ܘܡܵܪܹܐ ܝܘܼܬܪܵܢܵܐ ܠܡܵܪܹܗ، ܘܗܘܼܕܪܵܐ ܠܟܠ ܦܘܼܠܚܵܢܵܐ ܛܵܒ݂ܵܐ.
TRL: In nasha dake-laha ganeh min mindeeane dmaslayta, bit hawe mana leeqara, mqoedsha, o mare yoetrana lmareh, o hoedra lkl poelkhana ṭawa.
ENG: If a man therefore purge himself from these, he shall be a vessel unto honour, sanctified, meet for the master’s use, prepared unto every good work.

ASY: ܗܲܕܟ݂ܵܐ ܥܪܘܿܩ ܡ̣ܢ ܫܲܗܘܲܬܝܵܬܹ̈ܐ ܕܥܠܲܝܡܘܼܬܵܐ ܘܪܚܘܿܛ ܒܵܬ݇ܪ ܙܲܕܝܼܩܘܼܬܵܐ، ܘܗܲܝܡܵܢܘܼܬܵܐ، ܘܚܘܼܒܵܐ، ܘܫܠܵܡܵܐ، ܥܲܡ ܐܵܢܝܼ ܕܩܵܪܝܼ ܠܡܵܪܲܢ ܒܠܸܒܵܐ ܕܸܟ݂ܝܵܐ.
TRL: Hadkha 'rooq min shahwatyate d'laymoeta o rkhooṭ bar zadeeqoeta, o haymanoeta, o khoeba, o shlama, 'am anee dqaree lmaran bliba dikhya.
ENG: But flee youthful lusts, and follow after righteousness, faith, love, peace, with them that call on the Lord out of a pure heart.

ASY: ܐܝܼܢܵܐ ܕܘܼܪ̈ܵܫܹܐ ܣܲܟ݂ܠܹ̈ܐ ܘܕܠܵܐ ܒܸܢܝܲܬ، ܠܵܐ ܗܵܘܹܐ ܠܘܼܟ݂ ܫܘܼܠܵܐ ܒܝܼܲܝܗܝ، ܣܵܒܵܒ ܟܹܐ ܝܵܕܥܹܬ ܕܟܹܐ ܡܲܒܪܝܼ ܦܠܵܫܹ̈ܐ.
TRL: Eena doerashe sakhle o dla binyat, la hawe-loekh shoela bee-ayhy, sabab ke yad'et dke mabree plashe.
ENG: But foolish and ignorant questionings refuse, knowing that they gender strifes.

ASY: ܘܠܹܐ ܝܠܵܗ̇ ܚܫܝܼܚܬܵܐ ܠܪܹܓܵܐ ܕܡܵܪܲܢ ܕܦܵܠܹܫ، ܐܸܠܵܐ ܕܗܵܘܹܐ ܡܲܟܝܼܟ݂ܵܐ ܠܟܸܣ ܟܠܲܝܗܝ ܐ݇ܢܵܫܹ̈ܐ، ܡܵܨܝܵܢܵܐ ܠܡܲܠܘܼܦܹܐ، ܩܲܒܠܵܢܵܐ،
TRL: O le-ylaha khsheekhta lrega dmaran dpalesh, ila dhawe makeekha lkis klayhy nashe, maṣyana lmaloepe, qablana,
ENG: And the Lord’s servant must not strive, but be gentle towards all, apt to teach, forbearing,

ASY: ܒܡܲܟܝܼܟ݂ܘܼܬܵܐ ܡܲܠܘܼܦܹܐ ܠܕܲܠܩܘܼܒ݂ܠܵܝܹ̈ܐ. ܩܵܘܡܵܐ ܕܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ ܝܲܗ݇ܒܸܠ ܠܗܘܿܢ ܬܝܵܒ݂ܘܼܬܵܐ ܕܝܵܕܥܝܼ ܠܫܪܵܪܵܐ،
TRL: Bmakeekhoeta maloepe ldalqoewlaye. Qawma dalaha yabil-lhoon tyawoeta dyad'ee lshrara,
ENG: in meekness correcting them that oppose themselves; if peradventure God may give them repentance unto the knowledge of the truth,

ASY: ܘܪܵܥܫܝܼ ܠܓܵܢܲܝܗܝ، ܘܕܵܝܪܝܼ ܡ̣ܢ ܢܸܫܒܹ̈ܐ ܕܐܵܟܹܠܩܲܪܨܵܐ، ܕܒܝܼܹܗ ܦܝܼܫܹܐ ܝܢܵܐ ܕܒ݂ܝܼܩܹܐ ܕܥܵܒ݂ܕܝܼ ܨܸܒ݂ܝܵܢܹܗ.
TRL: O ra'shee lganayhy, o dayree min nishbe dakelqarṣa, dbee-eh peeshe yna dweeqe d'awdee ṣiwyaneh.
ENG: and they may recover themselves out of the snare of the devil, having been taken captive by the Lord’s servant unto the will of God.

ASY: ܐܝܼܢܵܐ ܝ݇ܕܸܥ ܐܵܗܵܐ، ܕܒܸܬ ܐܵܬܝܼ ܙܲܒ݂ܢܹ̈ܐ ܩܸܫܝܹ̈ܐ ܒܝܵܘܡܵܢܹ̈ܐ ܐ݇ܚܵܪ̈ܵܝܹܐ.
TRL: Eena di' aha, dbit atee zawne qishye byawmane kharaye.
ENG: But know this, that in the last days grievous times shall come.

ASY: ܣܵܒܵܒ ܐ݇ܢܵܫܹ̈ܐ ܒܸܬ ܗܵܘܝܼ ܐܵܢܵܝܹ̈ܐ، ܡܲܚܸܒܵܢܹ̈ܐ ܕܙܘܼܙܵܐ، ܫܲܒ݂ܗܸܪ̈ܵܢܹܐ، ܚܵܬܪ̈ܵܢܹܐ، ܓܵܕܦܵܢܹ̈ܐ، ܠܵܐ ܡܲܨܝܸܬܵܢܹ̈ܐ ܠܐܲܒ݂ܵܗܲܝ̈ܗܝ، ܠܵܐ ܛܵܥܢܵܢܹ̈ܐ ܕܡܸܢܬܵܐ، ܪ̈ܲܫܝܼܥܹܐ،
TRL: Sabab nashe bit hawee anaye, makhibane dzoeza, shawhirane, khatrane, gadpane, la maṣyitane lawahayhy, la ṭa'nane dminta, rashee'e,
ENG: For men shall be lovers of self, lovers of money, boastful, haughty, railers, disobedient to parents, unthankful, unholy,

ASY: ܕܠܵܐ ܚܘܼܒܵܐ ܟܝܵܢܵܝܵܐ، ܠܵܐ ܦܲܚܠܵܢܹ̈ܐ، ܡܵܚܝܵܢܹ̈ܐ ܕܕܲܪܗܲܩ، ܠܵܐ ܙܲܒܛܸܢܵܢܹ̈ܐ ܕܓܵܢܲܝܗܝ، ܟܹܘܝܼܹ̈ܐ، ܣܵܢܝܵܢܹ̈ܐ ܕܛܵܒ݂ܵܬܹ̈ܐ،
TRL: Dla khoeba kyanaya, la pakhlane, makhyane ddarhaq, la zabṭinane dganayhy, kewee-e, sanyane dṭawate,
ENG: without natural affection, implacable, slanderers, without self-control, fierce, no lovers of good,

ASY: ܣܲܦܝܵܢܹ̈ܐ، ܡܲܠܝܸܙܵܢܹ̈ܐ، ܚܵܬܪ̈ܵܢܹܐ، ܡܲܚܸܒܵܢܹ̈ܐ ܕܒܘܼܣܵܡܹ̈ܐ ܒܘܼܫ ܡ̣ܢ ܕܡܲܚܸܒܝܼ ܠܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ؛
TRL: Sapyane, malyizane, khatrane, makhibane dboesame boesh min dmakhibee lalaha;
ENG: traitors, headstrong, puffed up, lovers of pleasure rather than lovers of God;

ASY: ܐܝܼܬ ܠܗܘܿܢ ܐܸܣܟܝܼܡܵܐ ܕܙܕܘܼܥܬܵܐ ܕܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ ܐܝܼܢܵܐ ܒܸܣܪܵܒ݂ܵܐ ܝܢܵܐ ܚܲܝܠܵܐ ܕܝܼܘܼܗ̇. ܪܚܘܿܩ ܡ̣ܢ ܗܲܕܟ݂ܵܐ ܐ݇ܢܵܫܹ̈ܐ.
TRL: Eet-lhoon iskeema dzdoe'ta dalaha eena bisrawa yna khayla deeoeha. Rkhooq min hadkha nashe.
ENG: holding a form of godliness, but having denied the power thereof: from these also turn away.

ASY: ܣܵܒܵܒ ܚܲܕ݇ܟܡܵܐ ܡܸܢܲܝܗܝ ܡܐܲܝܟ݂ ܓܹܢܵܒܹ̈ܐ ܟܹܐ ܥܵܒ݂ܪܝܼ ܓܵܘ ܒܵܬܹ̈ܐ ܘܣܵܠܒܝܼ ܒܲܟ݂ܬܵܬܹ̈ܐ ܣܲܟ݂ܠܹ̈ܐ، ܕܦܝܼܫܹܐ ܝܢܵܐ ܡܘܼܛܥܸܢܹܐ ܒܚܛܝܼܵܬܹ̈ܐ ܘܠܘܼܒܠܹܐ ܒܫܲܗܘܲܬܝܵܬܹ̈ܐ ܦܪ̈ܝܼܫܹܐ.
TRL: Sabab khakma minayhy maykh genabe ke 'awree gaw bate o salbee bakhtate sakhle, dpeeshe yna moeṭ'ine bkhṭeeate o loeble bshahwatyate preeshe.
ENG: For of these are they that creep into houses, and take captive silly women laden with sins, led away by divers lusts,

ASY: ܐܲܢܹܐ ܒܲܟ݂ܬܵܬܹ̈ܐ ܒܟܠ ܙܲܒ݂ܢܵܐ ܒܸܠܝܵܦܵܐ ܝܢܵܐ، ܐܝܼܢܵܐ ܠܹܐ ܡܵܨܝܼ ܡܵܛܝܼ ܠܝ݇ܕܲܥܬܵܐ ܕܫܪܵܪܵܐ.
TRL: Ane bakhtate bkl zawna bilyapa yna, eena le maṣee maṭee lda'ta dshrara.
ENG: ever learning, and never able to come to the knowledge of the truth.

ASY: ܕܵܐܟ݂ܝܼ ܕܝܲܢܹܣ ܘܝܲܡܒܪܹܣ ܩܝܼܡ ܠܗܘܿܢ ܕܲܠܩܘܼܒ݂ܠ ܕܡܘܼܫܹܐ، ܗܲܕܟ݂ܵܐ ܐܘܼܦ ܐܲܢܹܐ ܐ݇ܢܵܫܹ̈ܐ ܒܸܩܝܵܡܵܐ ܝܢܵܐ ܕܲܠܩܘܼܒ݂ܠ ܕܫܪܵܪܵܐ، ܐ݇ܢܵܫܹ̈ܐ ܚܪܝܼܒܹܐ ܒܪܸܥܝܵܢܵܐ، ܘܡܘܼܣܠܝܼܹܐ ܡ̣ܢ ܗܲܝܡܵܢܘܼܬܵܐ ܓܹܒܵܐ.
TRL: Dakhee dyanes o yambres qeem-lhoon dalqoewl dmoeshe, hadkha oep ane nashe biqyama yna dalqoewl dshrara, nashe khreebe bri'yana, o moeslee-e min haymanoeta geba.
ENG: And like as Jannes and Jambres withstood Moses, so do these also withstand the truth; men corrupted in mind, reprobate concerning the faith.

ASY: ܐܝܼܢܵܐ ܠܹܐ ܡܲܢܬܝܼ، ܣܵܒܵܒ ܣܲܟ݂ܠܘܼܬܲܝܗܝ ܒܸܬ ܦܵܝܫܵܐ ܓܠܝܼܬܵܐ ܠܟܠܲܝܗܝ ܐ݇ܢܵܫܹ̈ܐ، ܐܲܝܟ݂ ܕܦܝܼܫ ܠܵܗ̇ ܓܠܝܼܬܵܐ ܣܲܟ݂ܠܘܼܬܵܐ ܕܐܵܢܝܼ ܬܪܹܝ.
TRL: Eena le mantee, sabab sakhloetayhy bit paysha gleeta lklayhy nashe, aykh dpeesh-laha gleeta sakhloeta danee trey.
ENG: But they shall proceed no further: for their folly shall be evident unto all men, as theirs also came to be.

ASY: ܐܝܼܢܵܐ ܐܲܢ݇ܬ ܐ݇ܬܹܐ ܠܘܼܟ݂ ܒܵܬ݇ܪ ܝܘܼܠܦܵܢܝܼ، ܘܕܘܼܒܵܪ̈ܝܼ، ܘܢܝܼܫܝܼ، ܘܗܲܝܡܵܢܘܼܬܝܼ، ܘܡܲܪܝܲܟ݂ܬܵܐ ܕܒܹܐܢܝܼ، ܘܚܘܼܒܝܼ، ܘܚܡܵܠܬܝܼ،
TRL: Eena at te-loekh bar yoelpanee, o doebaree, o neeshee, o haymanoetee, o maryakhta dbenee, o khoebee, o khmaltee,
ENG: But thou didst follow my teaching, conduct, purpose, faith, longsuffering, love, patience,

ASY: ܘܟܵܡܲܪ̈ܝܵܬܝܼ، ܘܓ̰ܘܼܢܓ̰ܵܪ̈ܝܼ، ܐܵܢܝܼ ܕܩܘܼܘܸܡ ܠܗܘܿܢ ܐܸܠܝܼ ܒܐܵܢܛܝܘܿܟ݂ܝ ܘܒܐܝܼܩܵܢܘܿܢ ܘܒܠܘܼܣܛܪܵܐ، ܟܡܵܐ ܪ̈ܕܘܼܦܝܹܐ ܛܥܝܼܢܝܼ، ܐܝܼܢܵܐ ܡܵܪܲܢ ܩܲܡ ܦܲܨܹܐ ܠܝܼ ܡ̣ܢ ܟܠܲܝܗܝ.
TRL: O kamaryatee, o joenjaree, anee dqoewim-lhoon ilee banṭyookhy o beeqanoon o bloesṭra, kma rdoepye ṭ'eenee, eena Maran qam paṣe-lee min klayhy.
ENG: persecutions, sufferings; what things befell me at Antioch, at Iconium, at Lystra; what persecutions I endured: and out of them all the Lord delivered me.

ASY: ܗܹܐ، ܟܠܲܝܗܝ ܐܵܢܝܼ ܕܒܵܥܝܼ ܕܚܵܝܝܼ ܒܙܕܘܼܥܬܵܐ ܕܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ ܒܝܼܫܘܿܥ ܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ ܒܸܬ ܦܵܝܫܝܼ ܟܘܼܡܪܹܐ.
TRL: He, klayhy anee dba'ee dkhayee bzdoe'ta dalaha beeshoo' msheekha bit payshee koemre.
ENG: Yea, and all that would live godly in Christ Jesus shall suffer persecution.

ASY: ܐܝܼܢܵܐ ܐ݇ܢܵܫܹ̈ܐ ܒܝܼܫܹ̈ܐ ܘܡܲܚܠܸܛܵܢܹ̈ܐ ܒܸܬ ܗܵܘܝܼ ܒܘܼܫ ܚܸܪܒܵܐ، ܥܲܠܕܘܼܝܹܐ ܘܦܝܼܫܹܐ ܥܘܼܠܕܝܼܹܐ.
TRL: Eena nashe beeshe o makhliṭane bit hawee boesh khirba, 'aldoeye o peeshe 'oeldee-e.
ENG: But evil men and impostors shall wax worse and worse, deceiving and being deceived.

ASY: ܐܝܼܢܵܐ ܐܲܢ݇ܬ، ܥܲܪܩܸܠ ܒܡܸܢܕܝܼ ܕܝ݇ܠܝܼܦ ܠܘܼܟ݂ ܘܕܦܝܼܫ ܠܹܗ ܡܫܘܼܪܸܪܵܐ ܐܸܠܘܼܟ݂، ܟܲܕ ܒܝܼܕܵܥܵܐ ܡ̣ܢ ܡܵܢܝܼ ܝ݇ܠܝܼܦ ܠܘܼܟ݂،
TRL: Eena at, 'arqil bmindee dleep-loekh o dpeesh-leh mshoerira iloekh, kad beeda'a min manee leep-loekh,
ENG: But abide thou in the things which thou hast learned and hast been assured of, knowing of whom thou hast learned them;

ASY: ܘܕܵܐܟ݂ܝܼ ܡ̣ܢ ܝܵܠܕ݇ܘܼܬܘܼܟ݂ ܝ݇ܕܝܼܥܵܐ ܝܘܸܬ ܟܬܵܒܹ̈ܐ ܩܲܕܝܼܫܹ̈ܐ، ܐܵܢܝܼ ܕܟܹܐ ܡܵܨܝܼ ܥܵܒ݂ܕܝܼ ܠܘܼܟ݂ ܚܲܟܝܼܡܵܐ ܠܦܘܼܪܩܵܢܵܐ ܒܝܲܕ ܗܲܝܡܵܢܘܼܬܵܐ ܒܝܼܫܘܿܥ ܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ.
TRL: O dakhee min yaloetoekh dee'a ywit ktabe qadeeshe, anee dke maṣee 'awdee-loekh khakeema lpoerqana byad haymanoeta beeshoo' msheekha.
ENG: and that from a babe thou hast known the sacred writings which are able to make thee wise unto salvation through faith which is in Christ Jesus.

ASY: ܟܠܹܗ ܟܬܵܒ݂ܵܐ ܩܲܕܝܼܫܵܐ ܢܦܝܼܚܵܐ ܝܠܹܗ ܒܪܘܼܚܵܐ ܕܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ، ܘܡܵܪܹܐ ܝܘܼܬܪܵܢܵܐ ܝܠܹܗ ܠܝܘܼܠܦܵܢܵܐ، ܘܠܡܲܢܟܲܣܬܵܐ، ܘܠܬܘܼܪܵܨܵܐ، ܘܠܬܲܠܡܲܕܬܵܐ ܠܙܲܕܝܼܩܘܼܬܵܐ،
TRL: Kleh ktawa qadeesha npeekha-yleh broekha dalaha, o mare yoetrana-yleh lyoelpana, o lmankasta, o ltoeraṣa, o ltalmadta lzadeeqoeta,
ENG: Every scripture inspired of God is also profitable for teaching, for reproof, for correction, for instruction which is in righteousness:

ASY: ܕܗܵܘܹܐ ܐ݇ܢܵܫܵܐ ܕܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ ܚܫܝܼܚܵܐ ܘܓܡܝܼܪܵܐ ܠܸܥܒ݂ܵܕܵܐ ܟܠ ܦܘܼܠܚܵܢܵܐ ܛܵܒ݂ܵܐ.
TRL: Dhawe nasha dalaha khsheekha o gmeera li'wada kl poelkhana ṭawa.
ENG: that the man of God may be complete, furnished completely unto every good work.

ASY: ܚܲܦܘܼܛܹܐ ܝܘܸܢ ܐܸܠܘܼܟ݂ ܩܵܕ݇ܡ ܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ ܘܝܼܫܘܿܥ ܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ، ܗ̇ܘ ܕܗܕܝܼܪܵܐ ܝܠܹܗ ܕܕܵܐܹܢ ܠܚܵܝܹ̈ܐ ܘܠܡܝܼܬܹ̈ܐ ܒܓܸܠܝܵܢܵܐ ܕܡܲܠܟܘܼܬܹܗ،
TRL: Khapoeṭe ywin iloekh qam Alaha o eeshoo' msheekha, haw dhdeera-yleh ddaen lkhaye o lmeete bgilyana dmalkoeteh,
ENG: I charge thee in the sight of God, and of Christ Jesus, who shall judge the quick and the dead, and by his appearing and his kingdom;

ASY: ܡܲܟܪܸܙ ܗܹܡܸܙܡܵܢ، ܒܸܚܦܵܛܵܐ ܒܙܲܒ݂ܢܵܐ ܘܠܵܐ ܒܙܲܒ݂ܢܵܐ؛ ܡܲܢܟܸܣ، ܡܲܪܥܸܫ، ܗܲܒ݂݇ܠ ܠܸܒܵܐ ܒܟܠܵܗ̇ ܚܡܵܠܬܵܐ ܘܒܡܲܠܲܦܬܵܐ.
TRL: Makriz hemizman, bikhpaṭa bzawna o la bzawna; mankis, mar'ish, hal liba bklaha khmalta o bmalapta.
ENG: preach the word; be instant in season, out of season; reprove, rebuke, exhort, with all longsuffering and teaching.

ASY: ܣܵܒܵܒ ܒܸܬ ܐܵܬܹܐ ܙܲܒ݂ܢܵܐ ܕܐ݇ܢܵܫܹ̈ܐ ܠܹܐ ܡܲܨܝܸܬܝܼ ܠܝܘܼܠܦܵܢܵܐ ܫܲܪܝܼܪܵܐ، ܐܝܼܢܵܐ ܐܲܝܟ݂ ܫܲܗܘܲܬܝܵܬܲܝ̈ܗܝ ܒܸܬ ܡܲܙܝܸܕܝܼ ܩܵܐ ܓܵܢܲܝܗܝ ܡܲܠܦܵܢܹ̈ܐ ܕܗܲܡܙܸܡܝܼ ܐܸܠܲܝܗܝ ܐܲܝܟ݂ ܕܛܵܠܹܒ ܠܸܒܲܝܗܝ،
TRL: Sabab bit ate zawna dnashe le maṣyitee lyoelpana shareera, eena aykh shahwatyatayhy bit mazyidee qa ganayhy malpane dhamzimee ilayhy aykh dṭaleb libayhy,
ENG: For the time will come when they will not endure the sound doctrine; but, having itching ears, will heap to themselves teachers after their own lusts;

ASY: ܘܒܸܬ ܡܲܕܸܪܝܼ ܢܵܬܲܝܗܝ ܡ̣ܢ ܫܪܵܪܵܐ، ܘܒܸܬ ܩܵܠܒܝܼ ܠܗܲܩܝܵܬܹ̈ܐ.
TRL: O bit madiree natayhy min shrara, o bit qalbee lhaqyate.
ENG: and will turn away their ears from the truth, and turn aside unto fables.

ASY: ܐܝܼܢܵܐ ܐܲܢ݇ܬ، ܗܘܝܼ ܪܥܝܼܫܵܐ ܒܟܠܲܝܗܝ ܡܸܢܕܝܼܵܢܹ̈ܐ، ܩܲܒܸܠ ܓ̰ܘܼܢܓ̰ܵܪܹ̈ܐ، ܦܠܘܿܚ ܦܘܼܠܚܵܢܵܐ ܕܚܲܕ ܡܲܟܪܸܙܵܢܵܐ، ܘܡܲܟܡܸܠ ܠܚܸܠܡܲܬܘܼܟ݂.
TRL: Eena at, hwee r'eesha bklayhy mindeeane, qabil joenjare, plookh poelkhana dkhad makrizana, o makmil lkhilmatoekh.
ENG: But be thou sober in all things, suffer hardship, do the work of an evangelist, fulfill thy ministry.

ASY: ܣܵܒܵܒ ܐܵܢܵܐ ܐܵܕܝܼܵܐ ܗܕܝܼܪܵܐ ܝܘܸܢ ܕܦܵܝܫܹܢ ܨܘܼܢܨܸܠܵܐ ܢܘܼܩܵܝܵܐ، ܘܥܕܵܢܵܐ ܕܦܪܵܫܬܝܼ ܡܛܝܼܬܵܐ ܝܠܵܗ̇.
TRL: Sabab ana adeea hdeera ywin dpayshen ṣoenṣila noeqaya, o 'dana dprashtee mṭeeta-ylaha.
ENG: For I am already being offered, and the time of my departure is come.

ASY: ܦܠܵܫܵܐ ܨܦܵܝܝܼ ܦܠܝܼܫܵܐ ܝܘܸܢ، ܪܲܗܛܝܼ ܡܘܼܟܡܸܠܹܗ ܝܘܸܢ، ܗܲܝܡܵܢܘܼܬܝܼ ܢܛܝܼܪܘܼܗ̇ ܝܘܸܢ.
TRL: Plasha ṣpayee pleesha ywin, rahṭee moekmileh ywin, haymanoetee nṭeeroeha ywin.
ENG: I have fought the good fight, I have finished the course, I have kept the faith:

ASY: ܘܐܵܕܝܼܵܐ ܦܝܼܫܵܐ ܝܠܹܗ ܢܛܝܼܪܵܐ ܐܸܠܝܼ ܟܠܝܼܠܵܐ ܕܙܲܕܝܼܩܘܼܬܵܐ، ܐܲܝܢܝܼ ܕܡܵܪܲܢ، ܕܝܼܠܹܗ ܕܲܝܵܢܵܐ ܟܹܐܢܵܐ، ܒܸܬ ܦܵܪܹܥ ܠܝܼ ܒܗ̇ܘ ܝܵܘܡܵܐ؛ ܘܠܵܐ ܐܲܚܟ̰ܝܼ ܐܸܠܝܼ، ܐܝܼܢܵܐ ܐܘܼܦ ܠܟܠܲܝܗܝ ܐܵܢܝܼ ܕܡܲܚܸܒܝܼ ܠܓܸܠܝܵܢܹܗ.
TRL: O adeea peesha-yleh nṭeera ilee kleela dzadeeqoeta, aynee dmaran, deeleh dayana kena, bit pare' lee bhaw yawma; o la akhchee ilee, eena oep lklayhy anee dmakhibee lgilyaneh.
ENG: henceforth there is laid up for me the crown of righteousness, which the Lord, the righteous judge, shall give to me at that day: and not only to me, but also to all them that have loved his appearing.

ASY: ܡܲܠܝܸܙ ܕܐܵܬܹܝܬ ܠܟܸܣ ܠܝܼ ܒܓ̰ܲܠܕܘܼܬܵܐ،
TRL: Malyiz dateyt lkis-lee bjaldoeta,
ENG: Do thy diligence to come shortly unto me:

ASY: ܣܵܒܵܒ ܕܹܐܡܵܐ ܫܒ݂ܝܼܩ ܠܹܗ ܐܸܠܝܼ، ܟܲܕ ܡܘܼܚܸܒ ܠܹܗ ܠܐܵܗܵܐ ܕܘܼܢܝܹܐ ܘܐ݇ܙܝܼܠ ܠܹܗ ܠܬܹܣܵܠܘܿܢܝܼܩܹܐ. ܩܪܝܼܣܦܘܿܣ ܐ݇ܙܝܼܠ ܠܹܗ ܠܓܵܠܵܛܝܼܵܐ، ܘܛܸܛܘܿܣ ܠܕܲܠܡܵܛܝܼܵܐ.
TRL: Sabab dema shweeq-leh ilee, kad moekhib-leh-laha doenye o zeel-leh ltesalooneeqe. Qreespoos zeel-leh lgalaṭeea, o ṭiṭoos ldalmaṭeea.
ENG: for Demas forsook me, having loved this present world, and went to Thessalonica; Crescens to Galatia, Titus to Dalmatia.

ASY: ܐܲܚܟ̰ܝܼ ܠܘܼܩܵܐ ܒܢܲܦ̮ܫܹܗ ܥܲܡܝܼ ܝܠܹܗ. ܫܩܘܿܠ ܠܡܵܪܩܘܿܣ ܘܡܲܝܬܝܼ ܠܹܗ ܥܲܡܘܼܟ݂، ܣܵܒܵܒ ܡܵܪܹܐ ܝܘܼܬܪܵܢܵܐ ܝܠܹܗ ܐܸܠܝܼ ܒܚܸܠܡܲܬ.
TRL: Akhchee loeqa bnawsheh 'amee-yleh. Shqool lmarqoos o maytee-leh 'amoekh, sabab mare yoetrana-yleh ilee bkhilmat.
ENG: Only Luke is with me. Take Mark, and bring him with thee: for he is useful to me for ministering.

ASY: ܛܘܼܟ݂ܝܼܩܘܿܣ ܫܘܼܕܸܪܝܼ ܠܐܵܦܸܣܘܿܣ.
TRL: Ṭoekheeqoos shoediree lapisoos.
ENG: But Tychicus I sent to Ephesus.

ASY: ܐܝܼܡܲܢ ܕܐܵܬܹܝܬ ܡܲܝܬܹܝܬ ܠܵܗ̇ ܥܵܒܵܝܬܵܐ ܕܫܒ݂ܝܼܩܵܐ ܠܝܼ ܠܟܸܣ ܩܵܪܦܘܿܣ ܓܵܘ ܛܪܘܿܐܘܿܣ، ܐܘܼܦ ܡܲܝܬܹܝܬ ܠܗܘܿܢ ܟܬܵܒܹ̈ܐ، ܐܝܼܢܵܐ ܒܘܼܫ ܙܵܘܕܵܐ ܟܬܵܒܹ̈ܐ ܕܓܸܠܕܵܐ.
TRL: Eeman dateyt mayteyt-laha 'abayta dshweeqa-lee lkis qarpoos gaw ṭroooos, oep mayteyt-lhoon ktabe, eena boesh zawda ktabe dgilda.
ENG: The cloke that I left at Troas with Carpus, bring when thou comest, and the books, especially the parchments.

ASY: ܐܵܠܸܟܣܲܢܕܪܘܿܣ ܢܲܚܵܫܵܐ ܥܒ݂ܝܼܕ ܠܹܗ ܪܵܒܵܐ ܒܝܼܫܵܬܹ̈ܐ ܐܸܠܝܼ. ܡܵܪܲܢ ܒܸܬ ܦܵܪܹܥ ܠܹܗ ܐܲܝܟ݂ ܦܘܼܠܚܵܢܘܼ̈ܗܝ.
TRL: Aliksandroos nakhasha 'weed-leh raba beeshate ilee. Maran bit pare' leh aykh poelkhanoehy.
ENG: Alexander the coppersmith did me much evil: the Lord will render to him according to his works:

ASY: ܐܘܼܦ ܐܲܢ݇ܬ ܗܵܘܹܝܬ ܗܸܫܝܵܪ ܡܸܢܹܗ، ܣܵܒܵܒ ܪܵܒܵܐ ܩܝܼܡ ܠܹܗ ܕܲܠܩܘܼܒ݂ܠ ܕܗܹܡܸܙܡܵܢܲܢ̈.
TRL: Oep at haweyt hishyar mineh, sabab raba qeem-leh dalqoewl dhemizmanan.
ENG: of whom be thou ware also; for he greatly withstood our words.

ASY: ܒܝܲܗ݇ܒܲܠܬܵܐ ܕܓ̰ܘܼܘܵܒܝܼ ܩܵܕ݇ܡܵܝܬܵܐ ܐܘܼܦ ܚܲܕ ܠܵܐ ܟܠܹܐ ܠܹܗ ܥܲܡܝܼ. ܟܠܲܝܗܝ ܩܲܡ ܫܵܒ݂ܩܝܼ ܠܝܼ. ܐܵܗܵܐ ܠܵܐ ܦܵܝܫܵܐ ܚܘܼܫܒܸܢܬܵܐ ܓܢܵܗܵܐ ܐܸܠܲܝܗܝ.
TRL: Byabalta djoewabee qamayta oep khad la kle-leh 'amee. Klayhy qam shawqee-lee. Aha la paysha khoeshbinta gnaha ilayhy.
ENG: At my first defence no one took my part, but all forsook me: may it not be laid to their account.

ASY: ܐܝܼܢܵܐ ܡܵܪܲܢ ܟܠܹܐ ܠܹܗ ܒܕܸܦܢܝܼ ܘܩܲܡ ܚܲܠܸܢܝܼ، ܕܒܝܼܝܼ ܡܲܟܪܲܙܬܵܐ ܦܵܝܫܵܐ ܬܘܼܡܸܡܬܵܐ، ܘܟܠܲܝܗܝ ܐܸܡܘܵܬܹ̈ܐ ܫܵܡܥܝܼ؛ ܘܦܝܼܫ ܠܝܼ ܦܘܼܨܝܵܐ ܡ̣ܢ ܦܘܼܡܵܐ ܕܐܲܪܝܵܐ.
TRL: Eena Maran kle-leh bdipnee o qam khalinee, dbeeee makrazta paysha toemimta, o klayhy imwate sham'ee; o peesh-lee poeṣya min poema darya.
ENG: But the Lord stood by me, and strengthened me; that through me the message might be fully proclaimed, and that all the Gentiles might hear: and I was delivered out of the mouth of the lion.

ASY: ܘܒܸܬ ܦܲܨܹܐ ܠܝܼ ܡܵܪܲܢ ܡ̣ܢ ܟܠ ܦܘܼܠܚܵܢܵܐ ܒܝܼܫܵܐ، ܘܒܸܬ ܡܲܡܛܹܐ ܠܝܼ ܨܵܠܵܡܲܬ ܠܡܲܠܟܘܼܬܹܗ ܫܡܲܝܵܢܵܝܬܵܐ. ܐܸܠܹܗ ܚܸܩܪܵܐ ܠܥܵܠܲܡ ܥܵܠܡܝܼܢ. ܐܵܡܹܝܢ.
TRL: O bit paṣe-lee Maran min kl poelkhana beesha, o bit mamṭe-lee ṣalamat lmalkoeteh shmayanayta. Ileh khiqra l'alam 'almeen. Ameyn.
ENG: The Lord will deliver me from every evil work, and will save me unto his heavenly kingdom: to whom be the glory for ever and ever. Amen.

ASY: ܗܲܒ݂݇ܠ ܫܠܵܡܵܐ ܠܦܪܝܼܣܩܸܠܵܐ ܘܠܐܵܩܸܠܘܿܣ، ܘܠܒܲܝܬܵܐ ܕܐܵܢܹܣܝܼܦܵܪܘܿܣ.
TRL: Hal shlama lpreesqila o laqiloos, o lbayta daneseeparoos.
ENG: Salute Prisca and Aquila, and the house of Onesiphorus.

ASY: ܐܵܪܸܣܛܘܿܣ ܦܝܼܫ ܠܹܗ ܓܵܘ ܩܘܿܪܲܢܬܘܿܣ، ܐܝܼܢܵܐ ܠܛܪܘܿܦܝܼܡܘܿܣ ܫܒ݂ܝܼܩ ܠܝܼ ܡܪܝܼܥܵܐ ܓܵܘ ܡܝܼܠܹܛܘܿܣ.
TRL: Arisṭoos peesh-leh gaw qoorantoos, eena lṭroopeemoos shweeq-lee mree'a gaw meeleṭoos.
ENG: Erastus abode at Corinth: but Trophimus I left at Miletus sick.

ASY: ܡܲܠܝܸܙ ܕܐܵܬܹܝܬ ܡ̣ܢ ܩܵܕ݇ܡ ܣܸܬܘܵܐ. ܒܝܼܵܗ݇ܒ݂ܘܼܟ݂ ܝܼܠܹܗ ܫܠܵܡܵܐ ܐܹܘܒܘܿܠܘܿܣ، ܐܘܼܦ ܦܘܿܕܸܣ، ܘܠܝܼܢܘܿܣ، ܘܩܠܵܘܕܝܼܵܐ، ܘܟܠܲܝܗܝ ܐܲܚܘܿܢܘܵܬܹ̈ܐ.
TRL: Malyiz dateyt min qam sitwa. Beeawoekh eeleh shlama ewbooloos, oep poodis, o leenoos, o qlawdeea, o klayhy akhoonwate.
ENG: Do thy diligence to come before winter. Eubulus saluteth thee, and Pudens, and Linus, and Claudia, and all the brethren.

ASY: ܡܵܪܲܢ ܗܵܘܹܐ ܥܲܡ ܪܘܼܚܘܼܟ݂. ܫܵܦܵܩܲܬ ܥܲܡܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ. ܐܵܡܹܝܢ.
TRL: Maran hawe 'am roekhoekh. Shapaqat 'amawkhoon. Ameyn.
ENG: The Lord be with thy spirit. Grace be with you.

ASY: ܦܵܘܠܘܿܣ، ܪܹܓܵܐ ܕܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ، ܘܫܠܝܼܚܵܐ ܕܝܼܫܘܿܥ ܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ، ܩܵܐ ܗܲܝܡܵܢܘܼܬܵܐ ܕܓܘܼܒܝܹ̈ܐ ܕܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ ܘܩܵܐ ܝ݇ܕܲܥܬܵܐ ܕܫܪܵܪܵܐ ܕܙܕܘܼܥܬܵܐ ܕܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ،
TRL: Pawloos, rega dalaha, o shleekha deeshoo' msheekha, qa haymanoeta dgoebye dalaha o qa da'ta dshrara dzdoe'ta dalaha,
ENG: Paul, a servant of God, and an apostle of Jesus Christ, according to the faith of God’s elect, and the knowledge of the truth which is according to godliness,

ASY: ܥܲܠ ܣܲܒ݂ܪܵܐ ܕܚܲܝܹ̈ܐ ܕܠܥܵܠܲܡ، ܕܩܘܼܘܸܠ ܠܹܗ ܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ ܒܫܲܪܝܼܪܘܼܬܵܐ ܡ̣ܢ ܩܵܕ݇ܡ ܙܲܒ݂ܢܹ̈ܐ ܕܥܵܠܡܵܐ،
TRL: 'Al sawra dkhaye dl'alam, dqoewil-leh Alaha bshareeroeta min qam zawne d'alma,
ENG: in hope of eternal life, which God, who cannot lie, promised before times eternal;

ASY: ܐܝܼܢܵܐ ܓܸܠܝܵܐ ܠܹܗ ܗܹܡܸܙܡܵܢܹܗ ܒܙܲܒ݂ܢܘܼܗ̇ ܒܝܲܕ ܟܵܪܘܿܙܘܼܬܵܐ، ܗ̇ܝ ܕܦܝܼܫ ܠܵܗ̇ ܣܘܼܦܝܼܬܵܐ ܒܝܼܝܼ ܒܦܘܼܩܕܵܢܵܐ ܕܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ ܦܵܪܘܿܩܲܢ،
TRL: Eena gilya-leh hemizmaneh bzawnoeha byad karoozoeta, hay dpeesh-laha soepeeta beeee bpoeqdana dalaha parooqan,
ENG: but in his own seasons manifested his word in the message, wherewith I was intrusted according to the commandment of God our Saviour;

ASY: ܠܛܸܛܘܿܣ، ܒܪܘܿܢܵܐ ܫܲܪܝܼܪܵܐ ܒܫܲܪܝܼܟܘܼܬܵܐ ܕܗܲܝܡܵܢܘܼܬܵܐ. ܫܵܦܵܩܲܬ ܘܫܠܵܡܵܐ ܡ̣ܢ ܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ ܒܵܒܵܐ ܘܡܵܪܲܢ ܝܼܫܘܿܥ ܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ ܦܵܪܘܿܩܲܢ.
TRL: Lṭiṭoos, broona shareera bshareekoeta dhaymanoeta. Shapaqat o shlama min Alaha baba o Maran eeshoo' msheekha parooqan.
ENG: to Titus, my true child after a common faith: Grace and peace from God the Father and Christ Jesus our Saviour.

ASY: ܫܒ݂ܝܼܩ ܠܝܼ ܐܸܠܘܼܟ݂ ܓܵܘ ܩܪܹܛܹܐ ܕܡܲܪܝܸܙܸܬ ܡܸܢܕܝܼܵܢܹ̈ܐ ܕܝܼܗ݇ܘܵܘ ܒܵܨܘܿܪܹ̈ܐ، ܘܕܡܲܩܸܡܸܬ ܚܘܵܪ̈ܕܸܩܢܹܐ ܒܟܠ ܡܕܝܼܢ݇ܬܵܐ ܕܵܐܟ݂ܝܼ ܕܩܲܡ ܦܲܩܕܸܢܘܼܟ݂.
TRL: Shweeq-lee iloekh gaw qreṭe dmaryizit mindeeane deewaw baṣoore, o dmaqimit khwardiqne bkl mdeeta dakhee dqam paqdinoekh.
ENG: For this cause left I thee in Crete, that thou shouldest set in order the things that were wanting, and appoint elders in every city, as I gave thee charge;

ASY: ܚܘܵܪܕܸܩܢܵܐ ܘܵܠܹܐ ܝܠܵܗ̇ ܕܗܵܘܹܐ ܕܠܵܐ ܠܵܘܡܵܐ، ܓܲܒ݂ܪܵܐ ܕܚܕܵܐ ܒܲܟ݂ܬܵܐ، ܘܐܝܼܬ ܠܹܗ ܝܵܠܹ̈ܕ݇ܐ ܡܗܘܼܡܢܹ̈ܐ ܕܠܲܝܬ ܥܲܠܲܝܗܝ ܠܵܘܡܵܐ ܕܐܵܣܘܿܛܘܼܬܵܐ ܝܲܢ ܕܥܵܨܝܼܘܼܬܵܐ.
TRL: Khwardiqna wale-ylaha dhawe dla lawma, gawra dkhda bakhta, o eet-leh yale mhoemne dlayt 'alayhy lawma dasooṭoeta yan d'aṣeeoeta.
ENG: if any man is blameless, the husband of one wife, having children that believe, who are not accused of riot or unruly.

ASY: ܣܵܒܵܒ ܘܵܠܹܐ ܝܠܵܗ̇ ܠܐܲܦܸܣܩܘܿܦܵܐ ܕܗܵܘܹܐ ܕܠܵܐ ܠܵܘܡܵܐ ܐܲܝܟ݂ ܪܲܒ ܒܲܝܬܵܐ ܕܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ، ܠܵܐ ܪܸܩܝܼܵܢܵܐ، ܠܵܐ ܟܲܪܒܵܢܵܐ، ܘܠܵܐ ܡܲܚܸܒܵܢܵܐ ܕܚܲܡܪܵܐ، ܠܵܐ ܚܸܡܬܵܢܵܐ، ܘܠܵܐ ܡܲܚܸܒܵܢܵܐ ܕܩܢܵܝܬܵܐ ܕܛܲܢܦܘܼܬܵܐ،
TRL: Sabab wale-ylaha lapisqoopa dhawe dla lawma aykh rab bayta dalaha, la riqeeana, la karbana, o la makhibana dkhamra, la khimtana, o la makhibana dqnayta dṭanpoeta,
ENG: For the bishop must be blameless, as God’s steward; not selfwilled, not soon angry, no brawler, no striker, not greedy of filthy lucre;

ASY: ܐܸܠܵܐ ܡܲܫܪܝܼܵܢܵܐ ܕܢܘܼܟ݂ܪ̈ܵܝܹܐ، ܡܲܚܸܒܵܢܵܐ ܕܛܵܒ݂ܵܬܹ̈ܐ، ܨܲܠܝܼܠܵܐ، ܙܲܕܝܼܩܵܐ، ܕܸܟ݂ܝܵܐ ܘܙܲܒܛܸܢܵܢܵܐ ܕܓܵܢܹܗ،
TRL: Ila mashreeana dnoekhraye, makhibana dṭawate, ṣaleela, zadeeqa, dikhya o zabṭinana dganeh,
ENG: but given to hospitality, a lover of good, soberminded, just, holy, temperate;

ASY: ܕܒ݂ܝܼܩܵܐ ܒܗܹܡܸܙܡܵܢ ܕܫܪܵܪܵܐ ܐܲܝܟ݂ ܕܦܝܼܫܬܵܐ ܝܠܵܗ̇ ܡܘܼܠܸܦܬܵܐ، ܗܲܕܟ݂ܵܐ ܕܡܵܨܹܐ ܝܲܗ݇ܒܸܠ ܠܸܒܵܐ ܠܐ݇ܚܹܪ̈݇ܢܹܐ ܒܝܘܼܠܦܵܢܵܐ ܨܸܦܝܵܐ، ܘܡܲܢܟܸܣ ܠܕܲܠܩܘܼܒ݂ܠܵܝܹ̈ܐ.
TRL: Dweeqa bhemizman dshrara aykh dpeeshta-ylaha moelipta, hadkha dmaṣe yabil liba lkhene byoelpana ṣipya, o mankis ldalqoewlaye.
ENG: holding to the faithful word which is according to the teaching, that he may be able both to exhort in the sound doctrine, and to convict the gainsayers.

ASY: ܣܵܒܵܒ ܐܝܼܬ ܪܵܒܵܐ ܐ݇ܢܵܫܹ̈ܐ ܡܵܪ̈ܘܿܕܹܐ، ܗܲܡܙܸܡܵܢܹ̈ܐ ܒܲܛܝܼܠܹ̈ܐ ܘܡܲܚܠܸܛܵܢܹ̈ܐ، ܒܘܼܫ ܙܵܘܕܵܐ ܐܵܢܝܼ ܕܡ̣ܢ ܒܢܲܝ̈ ܓܙܘܼܪܬܵܐ ܝܢܵܐ.
TRL: Sabab eet raba nashe maroode, hamzimane baṭeele o makhliṭane, boesh zawda anee dmin bnay gzoerta yna.
ENG: For there are many unruly men, vain talkers and deceivers, specially they of the circumcision,

ASY: ܐܲܢܹܐ ܘܵܠܹܐ ܝܠܵܗ̇ ܕܦܵܝܫܝܼ ܡܘܼܫܬܸܩܹܐ، ܣܵܒܵܒ ܒܸܬܠܵܚܵܐ ܝܢܵܐ ܠܟܠܲܝܗܝ ܒܵܬܹ̈ܐ، ܡܲܠܘܼܦܹܐ ܡܸܢܕܝܼܵܢܹ̈ܐ ܕܠܹܐ ܝܢܵܐ ܚܫܝܼܚܹܐ ܠܡܲܠܘܼܦܹܐ، ܐܸܠܵܐ ܩܵܐ ܩܢܵܝܬܵܐ ܫܸܚܬܵܢܬܵܐ.
TRL: Ane wale-ylaha dpayshee moeshtiqe, sabab bitlakha yna lklayhy bate, maloepe mindeeane dle yna khsheekhe lmaloepe, ila qa qnayta shikhtanta.
ENG: whose mouths must be stopped; men who overthrow whole houses, teaching things which they ought not, for filthy lucre’s sake.

ASY: ܚܲܕ ܡ̣ܢ ܢܒ݂ܝܼܹ̈ܐ ܕܓܵܢܲܝܗܝ ܐ݇ܡܝܼܪܹܗ، ”ܒܢܲܝ̈ ܩܪܹܛܹܐ ܗܲܡܵܫܵܐ ܕܲܓܵܠܹ̈ܐ ܝܢܵܐ، ܗܲܝܘܵܢܹ̈ܐ ܒܝܼܫܹ̈ܐ، ܘܒܵܠܘܿܥܵܢܹ̈ܐ ܡܲܟܣܸܠܵܢܹ̈ܐ.“
TRL: Khad min nwee-e dganayhy meereh, ”bnay qreṭe hamasha dagale yna, haywane beeshe, o baloo'ane maksilane.“
ENG: One of themselves, a prophet of their own, said, Cretans are alway liars, evil beasts, idle gluttons.

ASY: ܫܲܪܝܼܪܬܵܐ ܝܠܵܗ̇ ܐܵܗܵܐ ܣܵܗܕܘܼܬܵܐ. ܒܘܼܬ ܐܵܗܵܐ ܗܵܘܹܝܬ ܡܲܢܟ݂ܘܼܣܲܝ ܒܩܸܫܝܘܼܬܵܐ، ܕܗܵܘܝܼ ܓܡܝܼܪܹ̈ܐ ܒܗܲܝܡܵܢܘܼܬܵܐ،
TRL: Shareerta-ylaha aha sahdoeta. Boet aha haweyt mankhoesay bqishyoeta, dhawee gmeere bhaymanoeta,
ENG: This testimony is true. For which cause reprove them sharply, that they may be sound in the faith,

ASY: ܘܠܵܐ ܡܲܨܝܸܬܝܼ ܠܗܲܩܝܵܬܹ̈ܐ ܕܝܗܘܼܕܵܝܹ̈ܐ، ܘܠܦܘܼܩܕܵܢܹ̈ܐ ܕܐ݇ܢܵܫܹ̈ܐ ܕܡܲܦܟ̰ܸܠܝܼ ܠܫܪܵܪܵܐ.
TRL: O la maṣyitee lhaqyate dyhoedaye, o lpoeqdane dnashe dmapchilee lshrara.
ENG: not giving heed to Jewish fables, and commandments of men who turn away from the truth.

ASY: ܟܠ ܡܸܢܕܝܼ ܕܸܟ݂ܝܵܐ ܝܠܹܗ ܠܕܸܟ݂ܝܹ̈ܐ، ܐܝܼܢܵܐ ܠܟ̰ܲܦܵܠܹ̈ܐ ܘܠܐܵܢܝܼ ܕܠܹܐ ܝܢܵܐ ܡܗܘܼܡܢܹ̈ܐ ܠܲܝܬ ܡܸܢܕܝܼ ܕܸܟ݂ܝܵܐ، ܐܝܼܢܵܐ ܟ̰ܲܦܵܠ ܝܼܢܵܐ ܪܸܥܝܵܢܲܝܗܝ ܘܐܸܢܝܲܬܲܝܗܝ.
TRL: Kl mindee dikhya-yleh ldikhye, eena lchapale o lanee dle yna mhoemne layt mindee dikhya, eena chapal eena ri'yanayhy o inyatayhy.
ENG: To the pure all things are pure: but to them that are defiled and unbelieving nothing is pure; but both their mind and their conscience are defiled.

ASY: ܟܹܐ ܡܵܘܕܝܼ ܕܟܹܐ ܝܵܕܥܝܼ ܠܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ، ܐܝܼܢܵܐ ܒܦܘܼܠܚܵܢܲܝ̈ܗܝ ܟܹܐ ܣܵܪܒ݂ܝܼ ܠܹܗ. ܟ̰ܘܼܦܠܸܢܹ̈ܐ ܝܢܵܐ ܘܕܠܵܐ ܡܲܨܝܲܬܬܵܐ، ܘܠܹܐ ܝܢܵܐ ܚܫܝܼܚܹܐ ܠܟܠ ܦܘܼܠܚܵܢܵܐ ܛܵܒ݂ܵܐ.
TRL: Ke mawdee dke yad'ee lalaha, eena bpoelkhanayhy ke sarwee-leh. Choepline yna o dla maṣyatta, o le yna khsheekhe lkl poelkhana ṭawa.
ENG: They profess that they know God; but by their works they deny him, being abominable, and disobedient, and unto every good work reprobate.

ASY: ܐܝܼܢܵܐ ܐܲܢ݇ܬ ܡܲܠܸܦ ܡܸܢܕܝܼܵܢܹ̈ܐ ܕܝܼܢܵܐ ܚܫܝܼܚܹ̈ܐ ܠܝܘܼܠܦܵܢܵܐ ܓܡܝܼܪܵܐ،
TRL: Eena at malip mindeeane deena khsheekhe lyoelpana gmeera,
ENG: But speak thou the things which befit the sound doctrine:

ASY: ܚܘܵܪ̈ܕܸܩܢܹܐ ܗܵܘܝܼ ܨܲܠܝܼܠܹ̈ܐ، ܚܫܝܼܚܹ̈ܐ ܠܐܝܼܩܵܪܵܐ، ܪܥܝܼܫܹܐ ܒܚܘܼܫܵܒܲܝ̈ܗܝ، ܓܡܝܼܪܹܐ ܒܗܲܝܡܵܢܘܼܬܵܐ ܘܒܚܘܼܒܵܐ ܘܒܚܡܵܠܬܵܐ.
TRL: Khwardiqne hawee ṣaleele, khsheekhe leeqara, r'eeshe bkhoeshabayhy, gmeere bhaymanoeta o bkhoeba o bkhmalta.
ENG: that aged men be temperate, grave, soberminded, sound in faith, in love, in patience:

ASY: ܡܲܠܸܦ ܐܘܼܦ ܣܵܒ݂ܝܵܬܹ̈ܐ ܗܵܘܝܼ ܗܲܕܟ݂ܵܐ ܒܸܚܵܝܵܐ ܒܕܘܼܒܵܪܹ̈ܐ ܕܚܵܫܚܝܼ ܠܐܝܼܩܵܪܵܐ، ܠܵܐ ܠܵܝܡܵܢܹ̈ܐ، ܠܵܐ ܥܲܒ݂ܕܹ̈ܐ ܠܚܲܡܪܵܐ، ܐܸܠܵܐ ܡܲܠܦܵܢܹ̈ܐ ܕܡܸܢܕܝܼܵܢܹ̈ܐ ܛܵܒܹ̈ܐ،
TRL: Malip oep sawyate hawee hadkha bikhaya bdoebare dkhashkhee leeqara, la laymane, la 'awde lkhamra, ila malpane dmindeeane ṭabe,
ENG: that aged women likewise be reverent in demeanour, not slanderers nor enslaved to much wine, teachers of that which is good;

ASY: ܕܡܲܠܦܝܼ ܠܚܵܡܵܬܹ̈ܐ ܕܗܵܘܝܼ ܡܲܚܘܼܒܹܐ ܠܓܲܒ݂ܪ̈ܵܢܲܝܗܝ ܘܠܝܵܠܵܕ݇ܝ̈ܗܝ،
TRL: Dmalpee lkhamate dhawee makhoebe lgawranayhy o lyalayhy,
ENG: that they may train the young women to love their husbands, to love their children,

ASY: ܘܕܗܵܘܝܼ ܢܵܟ݂ܘܿܦܹ̈ܐ، ܕܸܟ݂ܝܹ̈ܐ، ܬܲܓܒܘܼܪܹܐ ܨܦܵܝܝܼ ܒܵܬܲܝ̈ܗܝ، ܙܲܒܛ ܠܓܲܒ݂ܪ̈ܵܢܲܝܗܝ، ܗܲܕܟ݂ܵܐ ܕܐ݇ܢܵܫܵܐ ܠܵܐ ܓܵܕܹܦ ܥܲܠ ܗܹܡܸܙܡܵܢ ܕܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ.
TRL: O dhawee nakhoope, dikhye, tagboere ṣpayee batayhy, zabṭ lgawranayhy, hadkha dnasha la gadep 'al hemizman dalaha.
ENG: to be soberminded, chaste, workers at home, kind, being in subjection to their own husbands, that the word of God be not blasphemed:

ASY: ܗܲܕܟ݂ܵܐ ܐܘܼܦ ܦܩܘܿܕ ܠܗܘܿܢ ܥܠܲܝܡܹ̈ܐ ܕܗܵܘܝܼ ܢܵܟ݂ܘܿܦܹ̈ܐ.
TRL: Hadkha oep pqood-lhoon 'layme dhawee nakhoope.
ENG: the younger men likewise exhort to be soberminded:

ASY: ܒܟܠ ܡܸܢܕܝܼ ܡܲܚܙܝܼ ܓܵܢܘܼܟ݂ ܐܲܝܟ݂ ܚܲܕ ܛܘܼܦ̮ܣܵܐ ܟܲܕ ܒܸܥܒ݂ܵܕܵܐ ܟܠ ܡܸܢܕܝܼ ܛܵܒ݂ܵܐ، ܒܝܘܼܠܦܵܢܵܐ ܨܸܦܝܵܐ، ܡܵܪܹܐ ܐܝܼܩܵܪܵܐ،
TRL: Bkl mindee makhzee ganoekh aykh khad ṭoewsa kad bi'wada kl mindee ṭawa, byoelpana ṣipya, mare eeqara,
ENG: in all things shewing thyself an ensample of good works; in thy doctrine shewing uncorruptness, gravity,

ASY: ܒܗܹܡܸܙܡܵܢܹ̈ܐ ܫܲܦܝܼܪܹ̈ܐ ܕܠܹܐ ܦܵܝܫܝܼ ܡܘܼܣܠܝܼܹܐ، ܗܲܕܟ݂ܵܐ ܕܢܵܟ݂ܦܝܼ ܕܲܠܩܘܼܒ݂ܠܵܝܹ̈ܐ، ܣܵܒܵܒ ܠܹܐ ܗܵܘܹܐ ܠܗܘܿܢ ܗܸܟ̃ ܡܸܢܕܝܼ ܚܸܪܒܵܐ ܠܗܲܡܙܘܼܡܹܐ ܒܘܼܬ ܕܝܼܲܢ.
TRL: Bhemizmane shapeere dle payshee moeslee-e, hadkha dnakhpee dalqoewlaye, sabab le hawe-lhoon hich mindee khirba lhamzoeme boet dee-an.
ENG: sound speech, that cannot be condemned; that he that is of the contrary part may be ashamed, having no evil thing to say of us.

ASY: ܡܲܠܸܦ ܠܥܲܒ݂ܕܹ̈ܐ ܕܗܵܘܝܼ ܙܲܒܛ ܠܡܵܪ̈ܵܘܵܬܲܝܗܝ ܒܟܠ ܡܸܢܕܝܼ، ܘܗܵܘܝܼ ܒܸܫܦܵܪܵܐ ܐܸܠܲܝܗܝ، ܘܠܵܐ ܡܲܕܸܪܝܼ ܓ̰ܘܼܘܵܒ،
TRL: Malip l'awde dhawee zabṭ lmarawatayhy bkl mindee, o hawee bishpara ilayhy, o la madiree joewab,
ENG: Exhort servants to be in subjection to their own masters, and to be well-pleasing to them in all things; not gainsaying;

ASY: ܘܠܵܐ ܓܵܢܒ݂ܝܼ، ܐܸܠܵܐ ܡܲܚܙܝܼ ܡܗܘܼܡܢܘܼܬܵܐ ܛܵܒ݂ܬܵܐ ܒܟܠ ܡܸܢܕܝܼ، ܕܣܲܩܠܝܼ ܠܹܗ ܝܘܼܠܦܵܢܵܐ ܕܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ ܦܵܪܘܿܩܲܢ ܒܟܠ ܡܸܢܕܝܼ.
TRL: O la ganwee, ila makhzee mhoemnoeta ṭawta bkl mindee, dsaqlee-leh yoelpana dalaha parooqan bkl mindee.
ENG: not purloining, but shewing all good fidelity; that they may adorn the doctrine of God our Saviour in all things.

ASY: ܣܵܒܵܒ ܫܵܦܵܩܲܬ ܕܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ ܕܟܹܐ ܡܲܝܬܝܵܐ ܦܘܼܪܩܵܢܵܐ ܦܝܼܫ ܠܵܗ̇ ܓܠܝܼܬܵܐ ܠܟܠܲܝܗܝ ܐ݇ܢܵܫܹ̈ܐ،
TRL: Sabab shapaqat dalaha dke maytya poerqana peesh-laha gleeta lklayhy nashe,
ENG: For the grace of God hath appeared, bringing salvation to all men,

ASY: ܡܲܠܘܼܦܲܢ ܝܼܠܵܗ̇ ܕܣܵܪܒܲܚ ܠܥܵܘܠܵܐ ܘܠܫܲܗܘܲܬܝܵܬܹ̈ܐ ܕܕܘܼܢܝܹܐ، ܘܚܵܝܲܚ ܒܢܲܟ݂ܦܘܼܬܵܐ ܘܒܙܲܕܝܼܩܘܼܬܵܐ ܘܒܙܕܘܼܥܬܵܐ ܕܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ ܓܵܘ ܐܵܗܵܐ ܙܲܒ݂ܢܵܐ،
TRL: Maloepan eelaha dsarbakh l'awla o lshahwatyate ddoenye, o khayakh bnakhpoeta o bzadeeqoeta o bzdoe'ta dalaha gaw aha zawna,
ENG: instructing us, to the intent that, denying ungodliness and worldly lusts, we should live soberly and righteously and godly in this present world;

ASY: ܟܲܕ ܒܸܣܦܵܪܵܐ ܝܘܲܚ ܠܣܲܒ݂ܪܵܐ ܒܪܝܼܟ݂ܵܐ، ܕܝܼܠܹܗ ܓܸܠܝܵܢܵܐ ܕܚܸܩܪܵܐ ܕܐܲܠܵܗܲܢ ܓܘܼܪܵܐ ܘܦܵܪܘܿܩܲܢ، ܝܼܫܘܿܥ ܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ،
TRL: Kad bispara ywakh lsawra breekha, deeleh gilyana dkhiqra dalahan goera o parooqan, eeshoo' msheekha,
ENG: looking for the blessed hope and appearing of the glory of our great God and Saviour Jesus Christ;

ASY: ܗ̇ܘ ܕܝܘܼܗ݇ܒ݂ܵܐ ܠܹܗ ܓܵܢܹܗ ܡ̣ܢ ܓܹܒܲܢ ܕܦܲܪܸܩ ܗ݇ܘܵܐ ܠܲܢ ܡ̣ܢ ܟܠ ܥܵܘܠܵܐ ܘܕܲܟܹܐ ܗ݇ܘܵܐ ܩܵܐ ܓܵܢܹܗ ܚܲܕ ܛܵܝܸܦܵܐ ܦܪܝܼܫܵܐ، ܛܲܢܵܢܵܐ ܠܸܥܒ݂ܵܕܵܐ ܦܘܼܠܚܵܢܹ̈ܐ ܛܵܒܹ̈ܐ.
TRL: Haw dyoewa-leh ganeh min geban dpariq wa lan min kl 'awla o dake wa qa ganeh khad ṭayipa preesha, ṭanana li'wada poelkhane ṭabe.
ENG: who gave himself for us, that he might redeem us from all iniquity, and purify unto himself a people for his own possession, zealous of good works.

ASY: ܐܲܢܹܐ ܗܲܡܙܸܡ، ܘܗܲܒ݂݇ܠ ܠܸܒܵܐ ܘܡܲܢܟܸܣ ܒܟܠ ܫܘܼܠܛܵܢܵܐ. ܠܵܐ ܫܵܒ݂ܩܹܬ ܕܐ݇ܢܵܫܵܐ ܡܲܣܠܹܐ ܐܸܠܘܼܟ݂.
TRL: Ane hamzim, o hal liba o mankis bkl shoelṭana. La shawqet dnasha masle iloekh.
ENG: These things speak and exhort and reprove with all authority. Let no man despise thee.

ASY: ܡܲܕܟܸܪ ܠܐ݇ܢܵܫܹ̈ܐ ܕܗܵܘܝܼ ܫܵܠܡܵܢܹ̈ܐ ܠܪܹ̈ܫܵܢܹܐ ܘܠܫܘܼܠܛܵܢܹ̈ܐ، ܘܡܲܨܝܸܬܝܼ ܐܸܠܲܝܗܝ، ܘܗܵܘܝܼ ܗܕܝܼܪܹܐ ܠܟܠ ܦܘܼܠܚܵܢܵܐ ܛܵܒ݂ܵܐ،
TRL: Madkir lnashe dhawee shalmane lreshane o lshoelṭane, o maṣyitee ilayhy, o hawee hdeere lkl poelkhana ṭawa,
ENG: Put them in mind to be in subjection to rulers, to authorities, to be obedient, to be ready unto every good work,

ASY: ܘܠܵܐ ܥܵܒ݂ܕܝܼ ܟܦܘܼܪܝܵܐ ܠܐܘܼܦ ܚܲܕ، ܠܵܐ ܗܵܘܝܼ ܡܲܩܪܸ̈ܨܵܢܹܐ، ܐܸܠܵܐ ܗܵܘܝܼ ܡܲܟܝܼܟܹ̈ܐ، ܡܲܚܙܘܼܝܹܐ ܟܠܵܗ̇ ܒܲܣܝܼܡܘܼܬܲܝܗܝ ܠܟܠܲܝܗܝ ܐ݇ܢܵܫܹ̈ܐ.
TRL: O la 'awdee kpoerya loep khad, la hawee maqriṣane, ila hawee makeeke, makhzoeye klaha baseemoetayhy lklayhy nashe.
ENG: to speak evil of no man, not to be contentious, to be gentle, shewing all meekness toward all men.

ASY: ܣܵܒܵܒ ܐܘܼܦ ܐܲܚܢܲܢ ܩܵܕ݇ܡܵܝܬܵܐ ܣܲܟ݂ܠܹ̈ܐ ܝܘܲܚ ܗ݇ܘܵܘ، ܠܵܐ ܡܲܨܝܸܬܵܢܹ̈ܐ، ܦܝܼܫܹܐ ܡܘܼܚܠܸܛܹܐ، ܒܸܦܠܵܚܵܐ ܐܲܝܟ݂ ܥܲܒ݂ܕܹ̈ܐ ܠܫܲܗܘܲܬܝܵܬܹ̈ܐ ܘܠܒܘܼܣܵܡܹ̈ܐ ܦܪ̈ܝܼܫܹܐ، ܒܸܚܵܝܵܐ ܓܵܘ ܒܝܼܫܬܵܐ ܘܒܲܚܸܠܵܢܘܼܬܵܐ، ܦܝܼܫܹܐ ܣܸܢܝܹܐ ܘܒܸܣܢܵܝܵܐ ܚܲܕ ܠܗ̇ܘ ܐ݇ܚܹܪ݇ܢܵܐ.
TRL: Sabab oep akhnan qamayta sakhle ywakh waw, la maṣyitane, peeshe moekhliṭe, biplakha aykh 'awde lshahwatyate o lboesame preeshe, bikhaya gaw beeshta o bakhilanoeta, peeshe sinye o bisnaya khad lhaw khena.
ENG: For we also were aforetime foolish, disobedient, deceived, serving divers lusts and pleasures, living in malice and envy, hateful, hating one another.

ASY: ܐܝܼܢܵܐ ܐܝܼܡܲܢ ܕܦܝܼܫ ܠܗܘܿܢ ܓܸܠܝܹܐ ܒܲܣܝܼܡܘܼܬܵܐ ܕܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ ܦܵܪܘܿܩܲܢ ܘܚܘܼܒܵܐ ܕܐܝܼܬ ܠܹܗ ܩܵܐ ܒܢܲܝ̈ܢܵܫܵܐ،
TRL: Eena eeman dpeesh-lhoon gilye baseemoeta dalaha parooqan o khoeba deet-leh qa bnaynasha,
ENG: But when the kindness of God our Saviour, and his love toward man, appeared,

ASY: ܦܘܼܪܸܩ ܠܹܗ ܐܸܠܲܢ، ܠܵܐ ܒܦܘܼܠܚܵܢܹ̈ܐ ܕܙܲܕܝܼܩܘܼܬܵܐ ܕܥܒ݂ܝܼܕ ܠܲܢ، ܐܸܠܵܐ ܒܪ̈ܲܚܡܹܐ ܕܝܼܹܗ ܩܲܡ ܦܲܪܸܩ ܠܲܢ، ܒܣܚܵܝܬܵܐ ܕܡܵܘܠܵܕܵܐ ܕܡܸܢܕܪܸܫ، ܘܒܚܵܕܲܬܬܵܐ ܒܝܲܕ ܪܘܼܚܵܐ ܕܩܘܼܕܫܵܐ،
TRL: Poeriq-leh ilan, la bpoelkhane dzadeeqoeta d'weed lan, ila brakhme dee-eh qam pariq lan, bskhayta dmawlada dmindrish, o bkhadatta byad roekha dqoedsha,
ENG: not by works done in righteousness, which we did ourselves, but according to his mercy he saved us, through the washing of regeneration and renewing of the Holy Ghost,

ASY: ܗ̇ܘ ܕܡܘܼܫܦܸܟ݂ ܠܹܗ ܥܲܠܲܢ ܒܦܸܪܝܘܼܬܵܐ ܒܝܲܕ ܝܼܫܘܿܥ ܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ ܦܵܪܘܿܩܲܢ،
TRL: Haw dmoeshpikh-leh 'alan bpiryoeta byad eeshoo' msheekha parooqan,
ENG: which he poured out upon us richly, through Jesus Christ our Saviour;

ASY: ܗܲܕܟ݂ܵܐ ܕܦܵܝܫܲܚ ܡܘܼܟܫܸܛܹܐ ܒܫܵܦܵܩܲܬܹܗ، ܘܗܵܘܲܚ ܝܵܪ̈ܘܿܬܹܐ ܘܗܵܘܹܐ ܠܲܢ ܗܹܒ݂ܝܼ ܕܚܲܝܹ̈ܐ ܕܠܥܵܠܲܡ.
TRL: Hadkha dpayshakh moekshiṭe bshapaqateh, o hawakh yaroote o hawe lan hewee dkhaye dl'alam.
ENG: that, being justified by his grace, we might be made heirs according to the hope of eternal life.

ASY: ܡܗܘܼܡܸܢܬܵܐ ܝܠܵܗ̇ ܐܵܗܵܐ ܗܹܡܸܙܡܵܢ، ܘܒܵܥܹܝܢ ܕܡܲܩܘܹܝܬ ܠܗܘܿܢ ܐܲܢܹܐ ܒܚܲܦܵܛܘܼܬܵܐ، ܗܵܕܵܐ ܕܐܵܢܝܼ ܕܗܘܼܡܸܢܗܘܿܢ ܒܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ ܗܵܘܝܼ ܗܸܫܝܵܪ ܠܸܢܛܵܪܵܐ ܦܘܼܠܚܵܢܹ̈ܐ ܛܵܒܹ̈ܐ. ܐܲܢܹܐ ܝܢܵܐ ܡܸܢܕܝܼܵܢܹ̈ܐ ܛܵܒܹ̈ܐ ܘܡܵܪܹ̈ܐ ܝܘܼܬܪܵܢܵܐ ܠܟܠ ܐ݇ܢܵܫܵܐ.
TRL: Mhoeminta-ylaha aha hemizman, o ba'eyn dmaqweyt-lhoon ane bkhapaṭoeta, hada danee dhoeminhoon balaha hawee hishyar linṭara poelkhane ṭabe. Ane yna mindeeane ṭabe o mare yoetrana lkl nasha.
ENG: Faithful is the saying, and concerning these things I will that thou affirm confidently, to the end that they which have believed God may be careful to maintain good works. These things are good and profitable unto men:

ASY: ܐܝܼܢܵܐ ܪܚܘܿܩ ܡ̣ܢ ܒܘܼܩܵܪܹ̈ܐ ܣܲܟ݂ܠܹ̈ܐ، ܘܡ̣ܢ ܬܲܫܥܝܼܵܬܹ̈ܐ ܕܫܲܪ̈ܒܵܬܹܐ، ܘܡ̣ܢ ܡܲܩܲܪ̈ܵܨܘܼܝܵܬܹܐ، ܘܡ̣ܢ ܦܠܵܫܹ̈ܐ ܒܘܼܬ ܢܵܡܘܿܣܵܐ، ܣܵܒܵܒ ܠܲܝܬ ܝܘܼܬܪܵܢܵܐ ܒܝܼܲܝܗܝ ܘܒܲܛܝܼܠܹ̈ܐ ܝܢܵܐ.
TRL: Eena rkhooq min boeqare sakhle, o min tash'eeate dsharbate, o min maqaraṣoeyate, o min plashe boet namoosa, sabab layt yoetrana bee-ayhy o baṭeele yna.
ENG: but shun foolish questionings, and genealogies, and strifes, and fightings about the law; for they are unprofitable and vain.

ASY: ܡܲܢܟܸܣ ܠܐ݇ܢܵܫܵܐ ܣܵܪܒ݂ܵܢܵܐ ܚܕܵܐ ܓܵܗܵܐ ܘܬܲܪܬܹܝ. ܡ̣ܢ ܒܵܬ݇ܪ ܗܵܕܵܐ، ܠܵܐ ܗܵܘܹܐ ܠܘܼܟ݂ ܫܘܼܠܵܐ ܒܝܼܹܗ.
TRL: Mankis lnasha sarwana khda gaha o tartey. Min bar hada, la hawe-loekh shoela bee-eh.
ENG: A man that is heretical after a first and second admonition refuse;

ASY: ܗܵܘܹܝܬ ܒܝܼܕܵܥܵܐ ܕܗܲܕܟ݂ܵܐ ܐ݇ܢܵܫܵܐ ܚܪܝܼܒ݂ܵܐ ܝܠܹܗ ܘܚܲܛܵܝܵܐ، ܘܕܝܼܢܘܼܗ̇ ܝܠܹܗ ܓܵܢܹܗ ܒܓܵܢܹܗ.
TRL: Haweyt beeda'a dhadkha nasha khreewa-yleh o khaṭaya, o deenoeha-yleh ganeh bganeh.
ENG: knowing that such a one is perverted, and sinneth, being self-condemned.

ASY: ܐܝܼܡܲܢ ܕܫܲܕܪܸܢ ܠܟܸܣ ܠܘܼܟ݂ ܠܐܵܪܛܝܼܡܵܐ ܝܲܢ ܠܛܘܼܟ݂ܝܼܩܘܿܣ، ܡܲܠܝܸܙ ܕܐܵܬܹܝܬ ܠܟܸܣ ܠܝܼ ܠܢܝܼܩܵܦܘܿܠܝܼܣ، ܣܵܒܵܒ ܡܘܼܬܒ݂ܵܐ ܝܘܸܢ ܒܠܸܒܝܼ ܕܦܵܝܫܹܢ ܬܵܡܵܐ ܒܣܸܬܘܵܐ.
TRL: Eeman dshadrin lkis-loekh larṭeema yan lṭoekheeqoos, malyiz dateyt lkis-lee lneeqapoolees, sabab moetwa ywin blibee dpayshen tama bsitwa.
ENG: When I shall send Artemas unto thee, or Tychicus, give diligence to come unto me to Nicopolis: for there I have determined to winter.

ASY: ܡܲܦܫܸܛ ܠܙܹܐܢܵܐ ܢܵܡܘܿܣܵܝܵܐ ܘܠܐܵܦܲܠܘܿ ܒܓ̰ܲܠܕܘܼܬܵܐ، ܘܚܙܝܼ ܕܠܵܐ ܗܵܘܹܐ ܡܸܢܕܝܼ ܒܵܨܘܿܪܵܐ ܐܸܠܲܝܗܝ.
TRL: Mapshiṭ lzena namoosaya o lapaloo bjaldoeta, o khzee dla hawe mindee baṣoora ilayhy.
ENG: Set forward Zenas the lawyer and Apollos on their journey diligently, that nothing be wanting unto them.

ASY: ܝܵܠܦܝܼ ܐܵܢܝܼ ܕܝܼܢܵܐ ܕܝܼܲܢ ܕܗܵܘܝܼ ܒܸܥܒ݂ܵܕܵܐ ܦܘܼܠܚܵܢܹ̈ܐ ܛܵܒܹ̈ܐ ܠܣܢܝܼܩܘܼܝܵܬܹ̈ܐ ܐܵܢܲܢܩܵܝܹ̈ܐ، ܕܠܵܐ ܗܵܘܝܼ ܕܠܵܐ ܛܥܘܼܢܝܵܬܹ̈ܐ.
TRL: Yalpee anee deena dee-an dhawee bi'wada poelkhane ṭabe lsneeqoeyate ananqaye, dla hawee dla ṭ'oenyate.
ENG: And let our people also learn to maintain good works for necessary uses, that they be not unfruitful.

ASY: ܒܝܼܵܗ݇ܒ݂ܵܐ ܝܢܵܐ ܫܠܵܡܵܐ ܐܸܠܘܼܟ݂ ܟܠܲܝܗܝ ܐܵܢܝܼ ܕܝܼܢܵܐ ܥܲܡܝܼ. ܗܲܒ݂݇ܠ ܫܠܵܡܵܐ ܠܐܵܢܝܼ ܕܡܲܚܸܒܝܼ ܠܲܢ ܒܗܲܝܡܵܢܘܼܬܵܐ. ܫܵܦܵܩܲܬ ܥܲܡ ܟܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ.
TRL: Beeawa yna shlama iloekh klayhy anee deena 'amee. Hal shlama lanee dmakhibee lan bhaymanoeta. Shapaqat 'am klawkhoon.
ENG: All that are with me salute thee. Salute them that love us in faith. Grace be with you all.

ASY: ܒܕܲܥܒܲܪ ܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ ܗܘܼܡܙܸܡ ܠܹܗ ܥܲܡ ܐܲܒ݂ܵܗܵܬܲܢ̈ ܒܝܲܕ ܢܒ݂ܝܼܹ̈ܐ ܒܪܵܒܵܐ ܥܕܵܢܵܬܹ̈ܐ ܦܪ̈ܝܼܫܹܐ ܘܒܐܘܼܪ̈ܚܵܬܹܐ ܦܪ̈ܝܼܫܹܐ،
TRL: Bda'bar Alaha hoemzim-leh 'am awahatan byad nwee-e braba 'danate preeshe o boerkhate preeshe,
ENG: God, having of old time spoken unto the fathers in the prophets by divers portions and in divers manners,

ASY: ܐܝܼܢܵܐ ܒܐܲܢܹܐ ܝܵܘܡܵܢܹ̈ܐ ܐ݇ܚܵܪ̈ܵܝܹܐ ܗܘܼܡܙܸܡ ܠܹܗ ܥܲܡܲܢ ܒܝܲܕ ܒܪܘܿܢܹܗ، ܗ̇ܘ ܕܪܫܝܼܡ ܠܹܗ ܐܸܠܹܗ ܝܵܪܘܿܬܵܐ ܕܟܠ ܡܸܢܕܝܼ، ܘܐܘܼܦ ܒܝܼܹܗ ܒܪܹܐ ܠܹܗ ܠܥܵܠܡܹ̈ܐ،
TRL: Eena bane yawmane kharaye hoemzim-leh 'aman byad brooneh, haw drsheem-leh ileh yaroota dkl mindee, o oep bee-eh bre-leh l'alme,
ENG: hath at the end of these days spoken unto us in his Son, whom he appointed heir of all things, through whom also he made the worlds;

ASY: ܗ̇ܘ ܕܝܼܠܹܗ ܫܲܦ̮ܩܵܐ ܕܫܘܼܒ݂ܚܹܗ، ܘܨܲܠܡܵܐ ܓܡܝܼܪܵܐ ܕܐܝܼܬܘܼܬܹܗ، ܡܘܼܩܘܹܐ ܠܹܗ ܟܠ ܡܸܢܕܝܼ ܒܚܲܝܠܵܐ ܕܗܹܡܸܙܡܵܢܹܗ. ܡ̣ܢ ܒܵܬ݇ܪ ܕܩܲܡ ܕܲܟܹܐ ܠܲܢ ܡ̣ܢ ܚܛܝܼܵܬܹ̈ܐ، ܝ݇ܬܝܼܒ݂ ܠܹܗ ܥܲܠ ܝܲܡܝܼܢܵܐ ܕܥܸܠܵܝܵܐ ܒܲܡܪ̈ܵܘܡܹܐ.
TRL: Haw deeleh shawqa dshoewkheh, o ṣalma gmeera deetoeteh, moeqwe-leh kl mindee bkhayla dhemizmaneh. Min bar dqam dake lan min khṭeeate, teew-leh 'al yameena d'ilaya bamrawme.
ENG: who being the effulgence of his glory, and the very image of his substance, and upholding all things by the word of his power, when he had made purification of sins, sat down on the right hand of the Majesty on high;

ASY: ܒܘܼܬ ܐܵܗܵܐ ܗܘܹܐ ܠܹܗ ܒܘܼܫ ܓܘܼܪܵܐ ܡ̣ܢ ܡܲܠܲܐܟܹ̈ܐ، ܕܵܐܟ݂ܝܼ ܕܫܸܡܵܐ ܕܩܘܼܒܸܠ ܠܹܗ ܠܝܵܪܬܘܼܬܵܐ ܒܘܼܫ ܓܘܼܪܵܐ ܝܠܹܗ ܡ̣ܢ ܫܸܡܲܝܗܝ.
TRL: Boet aha hwe-leh boesh goera min malake, dakhee dshima dqoebil-leh lyartoeta boesh goera-yleh min shimayhy.
ENG: having become by so much better than the angels, as he hath inherited a more excellent name than they.

ASY: ܣܵܒܵܒ ܠܐܲܝܢܝܼ ܡ̣ܢ ܡܲܠܲܐܟܹ̈ܐ ܗܸܟ̃ ܐ݇ܡܝܼܪܹܗ ܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ: ”ܒܪܘܿܢܝܼ ܝܘܸܬ ܐܲܢ݇ܬ، ܐܵܢܵܐ ܐܸܕܝܘܿܡ ܩܲܡ ܡܲܠܸܕܸܢܘܼܟ݂“؟ ܘܡܸܢܕܪܸܫ: ܐܵܢܵܐ ܒܸܬ ܗܵܘܹܝܢ ܐܸܠܹܗ ܒܵܒܵܐ، ܘܗ̇ܘ ܒܸܬ ܗܵܘܹܐ ܐܸܠܝܼ ܒܪܘܿܢܵܐ؟
TRL: Sabab laynee min malake hich meereh Alaha: ”broonee ywit at, ana idyoom qam malidinoekh“? O mindrish: ana bit haweyn ileh baba, o haw bit hawe ilee broona?
ENG: For unto which of the angels said he at any time, Thou art my Son, This day have I begotten thee? and again, I will be to him a Father, And he shall be to me a Son?

ASY: ܘܡܸܢܕܪܸܫ، ܐܝܼܡܲܢ ܕܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ ܫܲܕܸܪ ܒܪܘܿܢܹܗ ܒܘܼܟ݂ܪܵܐ ܠܕܘܼܢܝܹܐ، ܐܵܡܹܪ: ܕܐܸܠܹܗ ܣܵܓ݂ܕܝܼ ܟܠܲܝܗܝ ܡܲܠܲܐܟܹ̈ܐ ܕܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ.
TRL: O mindrish, eeman dalaha shadir brooneh boekhra ldoenye, amer: dileh saghdee klayhy malake dalaha.
ENG: And when he again bringeth in the firstborn into the world he saith, And let all the angels of God worship him.

ASY: ܘܒܘܼܬ ܡܲܠܲܐܟܹ̈ܐ ܐ݇ܡܝܼܪܹܗ: ܟܹܐ ܥܵܒܹܕ ܡܲܠܲܐܟ݂ܘܼ̈ܗܝ ܦܵܘܚܹ̈ܐ، ܘܥܵܒ݂ܕܵܢܹ̈ܐ ܕܚܸܠܡܲܬܹܗ ܠܵܗܵܐ ܕܢܘܼܪܵܐ.
TRL: O boet malake meereh: ke 'abed malakhoehy pawkhe, o 'awdane dkhilmateh-laha dnoera.
ENG: And of the angels he saith, Who maketh his angels winds, And his ministers a flame of fire:

ASY: ܐܝܼܢܵܐ ܒܘܼܬ ܒܪܘܿܢܵܐ ܐ݇ܡܝܼܪܹܗ: ܬܪܘܿܢܘܿܣܘܼܟ݂، ܝܵܐ ܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ، ܠܥܵܠܲܡ ܥܵܠܡܝܼܢ ܝܼܠܹܗ، ܘܚܘܼܛܪܵܐ ܕܙܲܕܝܼܩܘܼܬܵܐ، ܚܘܼܛܪܵܐ ܕܡܲܠܟܘܼܬܘܼܟ݂.
TRL: Eena boet broona meereh: troonoosoekh, ya Alaha, l'alam 'almeen eeleh, o khoeṭra dzadeeqoeta, khoeṭra dmalkoetoekh.
ENG: but of the Son he saith, Thy throne, O God, is for ever and ever; And the sceptre of uprightness is the sceptre of thy kingdom.

ASY: ܡܘܼܚܸܒ ܠܘܼܟ݂ ܙܲܕܝܼܩܘܼܬܵܐ ܘܣܢܹܐ ܠܘܼܟ݂ ܥܵܘܠܵܐ؛ ܒܘܼܬ ܐܵܗܵܐ، ܝܵܐ ܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ، ܐܲܠܵܗܘܼܟ݂ ܡܫܝܼܚ ܠܹܗ ܐܸܠܘܼܟ݂ ܒܡܸܫܚܵܐ ܕܚܲܕܘܼܬܵܐ ܒܘܼܫ ܙܵܘܕܵܐ ܡ̣ܢ ܠܚܲܒ݂ܪ̈ܵܘܵܬܘܼܟ݂.
TRL: Moekhib-loekh zadeeqoeta o sne-loekh 'awla; boet aha, ya Alaha, alahoekh msheekh-leh iloekh bmishkha dkhadoeta boesh zawda min lkhawrawatoekh.
ENG: Thou hast loved righteousness, and hated iniquity; Therefore God, thy God, hath anointed thee With the oil of gladness above thy fellows.

ASY: ܘܡܸܢܕܪܸܫ: ܐܲܢ݇ܬ، ܝܵܐ ܡܵܪܝܵܐ، ܡ̣ܢ ܒܪܵܫܝܼܬ ܫܘܼܬܐܸܣ ܠܘܼܟ݂ ܠܐܲܪܥܵܐ، ܘܫܡܲܝܹ̈ܐ ܦܘܼܠܚܵܢܵܐ ܕܐܝܼܕܵܬܘܼ̈ܟ݂ ܝܼܢܵܐ.
TRL: O mindrish: at, ya Marya, min brasheet shoetis-loekh lar'a, o shmaye poelkhana deedatoekh eena.
ENG: And, Thou, Lord, in the beginning hast laid the foundation of the earth, And the heavens are the works of thy hands:

ASY: ܐܵܢܝܼ ܒܸܬ ܚܵܪܒ݂ܝܼ، ܐܝܼܢܵܐ ܐܲܢ݇ܬ ܦܵܝܫܵܢܵܐ ܝܘܸܬ؛ ܘܟܠܲܝܗܝ ܐܲܝܟ݂ ܠܒ݂ܝܼܫܬܵܐ ܒܸܬ ܒܵܠܝܼ؛
TRL: Anee bit kharwee, eena at payshana ywit; o klayhy aykh lweeshta bit balee;
ENG: They shall perish; but thou continuest: And they all shall wax old as doth a garment;

ASY: ܐܲܝܟ݂ ܥܵܒܵܝܬܵܐ ܒܸܬ ܛܵܥܦܹܬ ܠܗܘܿܢ؛ ܘܐܲܝܟ݂ ܠܒ݂ܝܼܫܬܵܐ ܒܸܬ ܫܲܚܠܸܦܝܼ. ܐܝܼܢܵܐ ܐܲܢ݇ܬ ܒܸܬ ܗܵܘܹܝܬ ܐܲܝܟ݂ ܕܝܼܘܸܬ، ܘܫܸܢܘܼ̈ܟ݂ ܠܹܐ ܬܵܝܡܝܼ.
TRL: Aykh 'abayta bit ṭa'pet-lhoon; o aykh lweeshta bit shakhlipee. Eena at bit haweyt aykh deewit, o shinoekh le taymee.
ENG: And as a mantle shalt thou roll them up, As a garment, and they shall be changed: But thou art the same, And thy years shall not fail.

ASY: ܐܝܼܢܵܐ ܠܐܲܝܢܝܼ ܡ̣ܢ ܡܲܠܲܐܟܹ̈ܐ ܗܸܟ̃ ܐ݇ܡܝܼܪܹܗ: ”ܝ݇ܬܘܿܒ݂ ܡ̣ܢ ܝܲܡܝܼܢܝܼ ܗܲܠ ܕܡܲܬܒܸܢ ܕܸܫܡܸܢܘܼ̈ܟ݂ ܟܘܼܒ݂ܫܵܐ ܬܚܘܿܬ ܐܲܩܠܵܬܘܼ̈ܟ݂“؟
TRL: Eena laynee min malake hich meereh: ”toow min yameenee hal dmatbin dishminoekh koewsha tkhoot aqlatoekh“?
ENG: But of which of the angels hath he said at any time, Sit thou on my right hand, Till I make thine enemies the footstool of thy feet?

ASY: ܠܹܐ ܝܢܵܐ ܟܠܲܝܗܝ ܐܲܢܹܐ ܪ̈ܘܼܚܵܬܹܐ ܡܫܲܡܫܵܢܹ̈ܐ ܦܝܼܫܹܐ ܫܘܼܕܪܹܐ ܕܥܵܒ݂ܕܝܼ ܚܸܠܡܲܬ ܠܐܵܢܝܼ ܕܝܼܢܵܐ ܗܕܝܼܪܹܐ ܕܗܵܘܝܼ ܝܵܪ̈ܘܿܬܹܐ ܕܦܘܼܪܩܵܢܵܐ؟
TRL: Le yna klayhy ane roekhate mshamshane peeshe shoedre d'awdee khilmat lanee deena hdeere dhawee yaroote dpoerqana?
ENG: Are they not all ministering spirits, sent forth to do service for the sake of them that shall inherit salvation?

ASY: ܒܘܼܬ ܐܵܗܵܐ ܘܵܠܹܐ ܝܠܵܗ̇ ܕܗܵܘܲܚ ܒܘܼܫ ܙܵܘܕܵܐ ܗܸܫܝܵܪ ܠܡܸܢܕܝܼܵܢܹ̈ܐ ܕܫܡܝܼܥ ܠܲܢ ܕܠܵܐ ܗܵܘܝܵܐ ܕܪܵܚܩܲܚ ܠܛܠܵܩܵܐ.
TRL: Boet aha wale-ylaha dhawakh boesh zawda hishyar lmindeeane dshmee' lan dla hawya drakhqakh lṭlaqa.
ENG: Therefore we ought to give the more earnest heed to the things that were heard, lest haply we drift away from them.

ASY: ܣܵܒܵܒ ܐܸܢ ܗܹܡܸܙܡܵܢ ܕܦܝܼܫ ܠܵܗ̇ ܗܘܼܡܙܸܡܬܵܐ ܒܝܲܕ ܡܲܠܲܐܟܹ̈ܐ ܗܘܹܐ ܠܵܗ̇ ܩܘܝܼܬܵܐ، ܘܟܠ ܥܒ݂ܵܪܬܵܐ ܥܲܠܘܼܗ̇ ܘܠܵܐ ܡܲܨܝܲܬܬܵܐ ܩܘܼܒܸܠ ܠܵܗ̇ ܦܘܼܪܥܵܢܵܐ ܒܗܵܩܘܼܬܵܐ،
TRL: Sabab in hemizman dpeesh-laha hoemzimta byad malake hwe-laha qweeta, o kl 'warta 'aloeha o la maṣyatta qoebil-laha poer'ana bhaqoeta,
ENG: For if the word spoken through angels proved stedfast, and every transgression and disobedience received a just recompense of reward;

ASY: ܕܵܐܟ݂ܝܼ ܐܲܚܢܲܢ ܒܸܬ ܥܵܪܩܲܚ ܐܸܢ ܡܲܣܠܲܚ ܠܗܲܕܟ݂ܵܐ ܦܘܼܪܩܵܢܵܐ ܓܘܼܪܵܐ؟ ܐܵܗܵܐ ܦܘܼܪܩܵܢܵܐ ܩܵܕ݇ܡܵܝܬܵܐ ܦܝܼܫ ܠܹܗ ܗܘܼܡܙܸܡܵܐ ܒܝܲܕ ܡܵܪܝܵܐ، ܘܦܝܼܫ ܠܹܗ ܡܘܼܩܘܝܼܵܐ ܐܸܠܲܢ ܒܐܵܢܝܼ ܕܩܲܡ ܫܵܡܥܝܼ ܠܹܗ،
TRL: Dakhee akhnan bit 'arqakh in maslakh lhadkha poerqana goera? Aha poerqana qamayta peesh-leh hoemzima byad Marya, o peesh-leh moeqweea ilan banee dqam sham'ee-leh,
ENG: how shall we escape, if we neglect so great salvation? which having at the first been spoken through the Lord, was confirmed unto us by them that heard;

ASY: ܟܲܕ ܐܘܼܦ ܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ ܣܗܝܼܕ ܠܹܗ ܥܲܡܲܝܗܝ ܒܝܲܕ ܢܝܼܫܲܢܩܹ̈ܐ ܘܕܘܼܡܵܪܹ̈ܐ، ܘܚܲܝܠܹ̈ܐ ܓܘܼܪܹ̈ܐ ܦܪ̈ܝܼܫܹܐ، ܘܒܡܵܘܗܒ݂ܵܬܹ̈ܐ ܕܡ̣ܢ ܪܘܼܚܵܐ ܕܩܘܼܕܫܵܐ ܦܠܝܼܥܹܐ ܐܲܝܟ݂ ܨܸܒ݂ܝܵܢܹܗ.
TRL: Kad oep Alaha sheed-leh 'amayhy byad neeshanqe o doemare, o khayle goere preeshe, o bmawhwate dmin roekha dqoedsha plee'e aykh ṣiwyaneh.
ENG: God also bearing witness with them, both by signs and wonders, and by manifold powers, and by gifts of the Holy Ghost, according to his own will.

ASY: ܣܵܒܵܒ ܠܵܐ ܡܘܼܬܒ݂ܵܐ ܠܹܗ ܕܘܼܢܝܹܐ ܕܐܵܬܝܵܐ ܬܚܘܿܬ ܫܘܼܠܛܵܢܵܐ ܕܡܲܠܲܐܟܹ̈ܐ، ܗ̇ܝ ܕܒܘܼܬ ܕܝܼܘܼܗ̇ ܗܲܡܙܘܼܡܹܐ ܝܘܲܚ.
TRL: Sabab la moetwa-leh doenye datya tkhoot shoelṭana dmalake, hay dboet deeoeha hamzoeme ywakh.
ENG: For not unto angels did he subject the world to come, whereof we speak.

ASY: ܐܝܼܢܵܐ ܚܲܕ ܣܗܝܼܕܵܐ ܝܠܹܗ ܒܚܕܵܐ ܕܘܼܟܵܐ، ܒܹܐܡܵܪܵܐ: ܡܘܿܕܝܼ ܝܠܹܗ ܐ݇ܢܵܫܵܐ ܕܕܵܟ݂ܪܹܬ ܠܹܗ، ܝܲܢ ܒܲܪܢܵܫܵܐ ܕܢܵܛܪܹܬ ܠܹܗ؟
TRL: Eena khad sheeda-yleh bkhda doeka, bemara: moodee-yleh nasha ddakhret-leh, yan barnasha dnaṭret-leh?
ENG: But one hath somewhere testified, saying, What is man, that thou art mindful of him? Or the son of man, that thou visitest him?

ASY: ܥܒ݂ܝܼܕ ܠܘܼܟ݂ ܐܸܠܹܗ ܚܲܕ݇ܟ̰ܵܐ ܒܵܨܘܿܪܵܐ ܡ̣ܢ ܡܲܠܲܐܟܹ̈ܐ، ܘܒܚܸܩܪܵܐ ܘܒܐܝܼܩܵܪܵܐ ܒܘܼܢܦܸܪܘܼܟ݂ ܐܸܠܹܗ.
TRL: 'weed-loekh ileh khacha baṣoora min malake, o bkhiqra o beeqara boenpiroekh ileh.
ENG: Thou madest him a little lower than the angels; Thou crownedst him with glory and honour, And didst set him over the works of thy hands:

ASY: ܡܘܼܬܸܒ݂ ܠܘܼܟ݂ ܟܠܲܝܗܝ ܡܸܢܕܝܼܵܢܹ̈ܐ ܬܚܘܿܬ ܐܲܩܠܵܬܹ̈ܗ. ܣܵܒܵܒ ܙܘܼܒܛܸܢܹܗ ܟܠܲܝܗܝ ܡܸܢܕܝܼܵܢܹ̈ܐ ܐܸܠܹܗ، ܠܵܐ ܫܒ݂ܝܼܩ ܠܹܗ ܡܸܢܕܝܼ ܕܠܹܐ ܝܠܹܗ ܙܘܼܒܛܸܢܵܐ ܐܸܠܹܗ. ܐܝܼܢܵܐ ܐܵܕܝܼܵܐ ܗܹܫ ܠܹܐ ܝܘܲܚ ܒܸܚܙܵܝܵܐ ܟܠܲܝܗܝ ܡܸܢܕܝܼܵܢܹ̈ܐ ܦܝܼܫܹܐ ܙܲܒܛ ܐܸܠܹܗ.
TRL: Moetiw-loekh klayhy mindeeane tkhoot aqlateh. Sabab zoebṭineh klayhy mindeeane ileh, la shweeq-leh mindee dle-yleh zoebṭina ileh. Eena adeea hesh le ywakh bikhzaya klayhy mindeeane peeshe zabṭ ileh.
ENG: Thou didst put all things in subjection under his feet. For in that he subjected all things unto him, he left nothing that is not subject to him. But now we see not yet all things subjected to him.

ASY: ܐܝܼܢܵܐ ܗ̇ܘ ܕܦܝܼܫ ܠܹܗ ܥܒ݂ܝܼܕܵܐ ܚܲܕ݇ܟ̰ܵܐ ܒܘܼܫ ܒܵܨܘܿܪܵܐ ܡ̣ܢ ܡܲܠܲܐܟܹ̈ܐ، ܒܸܚܙܵܝܹܗ ܝܘܲܚ ܒܘܼܢܦܸܪܵܐ ܒܬܸܫܒܘܿܚܬܵܐ ܘܒܐܝܼܩܵܪܵܐ ܣܵܒܵܒ ܩܘܼܒܸܠ ܠܹܗ ܚܲܫܵܐ ܕܡܵܘܬܵܐ، ܗܵܕܵܐ ܕܒܫܵܦܵܩܲܬ ܕܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ ܛܵܥܹܡ ܡܵܘܬܵܐ ܡ̣ܢ ܓܹܒܵܐ ܕܟܠ ܚܲܕ ܐ݇ܢܵܫܵܐ.
TRL: Eena haw dpeesh-leh 'weeda khacha boesh baṣoora min malake, bikhzayeh ywakh boenpira btishbookhta o beeqara sabab qoebil-leh khasha dmawta, hada dbshapaqat dalaha ṭa'em mawta min geba dkl khad nasha.
ENG: But we behold him who hath been made a little lower than the angels, even Jesus, because of the suffering of death crowned with glory and honour, that by the grace of God he should taste death for every man.

ASY: ܣܵܒܵܒ ܚܫܝܼܚܬܵܐ ܝܗ݇ܘܵܐ ܕܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ، ܗ̇ܘ ܕܝܼܹܗ ܝܢܵܐ ܘܒܝܼܹܗ ܝܢܵܐ ܟܠܲܝܗܝ ܡܸܢܕܝܼܵܢܹ̈ܐ، ܕܡܲܝܬܹܐ ܪܵܒܵܐ ܒܢܘܿܢܹ̈ܐ ܠܬܸܫܒܘܿܚܬܵܐ، ܘܥܵܒܹܕ ܠܪܹܫܵܐ ܕܦܘܼܪܩܵܢܲܝܗܝ ܓܡܝܼܪܵܐ ܒܚܲܫܵܐ.
TRL: Sabab khsheekhta ywa dalaha, haw dee-eh yna o bee-eh yna klayhy mindeeane, dmayte raba bnoone ltishbookhta, o 'abed lresha dpoerqanayhy gmeera bkhasha.
ENG: For it became him, for whom are all things, and through whom are all things, in bringing many sons unto glory, to make the author of their salvation perfect through sufferings.

ASY: ܣܵܒܵܒ ܗ̇ܘ ܕܟܹܐ ܡܩܲܕܸܫ، ܘܐܵܢܝܼ ܕܦܝܵܫܵܐ ܝܢܵܐ ܡܩܘܼܕܫܹܐ، ܡ̣ܢ ܚܲܕ ܫܸܪܫܵܐ ܝܢܵܐ ܟܠܲܝܗܝ؛ ܒܘܼܬ ܐܵܗܵܐ ܠܹܐ ܢܵܟܹܦ ܕܩܵܪܹܐ ܠܗܘܿܢ ܐܲܚܘܿܢܘܵܬܹ̈ܐ،
TRL: Sabab haw dke mqadish, o anee dpyasha yna mqoedshe, min khad shirsha yna klayhy; boet aha le nakep dqare-lhoon akhoonwate,
ENG: For both he that sanctifieth and they that are sanctified are all of one: for which cause he is not ashamed to call them brethren,

ASY: ܒܹܐܡܵܪܵܐ: ܒܸܬ ܗܲܩܹܝܢ ܫܸܡܘܼܟ݂ ܠܐܲܚܘܿܢܘܵܬܝܼ̈؛ ܒܓܵܘܵܐ ܕܥܹܕܬܵܐ ܒܸܬ ܫܲܒܚܸܢܘܼܟ݂.
TRL: Bemara: bit haqeyn shimoekh lakhoonwatee; bgawa d'edta bit shabkhinoekh.
ENG: saying, I will declare thy name unto my brethren, In the midst of the congregation will I sing thy praise.

ASY: ܘܡܸܢܕܪܸܫ: ܒܸܬ ܕܵܪܹܝܢ ܗܹܒ݂ܝܼ ܥܲܠܘܼܗܝ. ܘܡܸܢܕܪܸܫ: ܗܵܐ، ܐܵܢܵܐ ܘܝܵܠܹ̈ܕ݇ܐ ܕܝܘܼܗ݇ܒܸܠ ܠܹܗ ܐܸܠܝܼ ܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ.
TRL: O mindrish: bit dareyn hewee 'aloehy. O mindrish: ha, ana o yale dyoebil-leh ilee Alaha.
ENG: And again, I will put my trust in him. And again, Behold, I and the children which God hath given me.

ASY: ܘܣܵܒܵܒ ܝܵܠܹ̈ܕ݇ܐ ܫܲܪ̈ܝܼܟܹܐ ܝܢܵܐ ܒܕܸܡܵܐ ܘܒܸܣܪܵܐ، ܗܲܕܟ݂ܵܐ ܐܘܼܦ ܗ̇ܘ ܫܘܼܪܸܟ ܠܹܗ ܒܐܲܢܹܐ ܡܸܢܕܝܼܵܢܹ̈ܐ، ܕܒܡܵܘܬܹܗ ܒܲܛܸܠ ܗ݇ܘܵܐ ܠܗ̇ܘ ܕܐܝܼܬ ܠܹܗ ܚܲܝܠܵܐ ܕܡܵܘܬܵܐ، ܕܝܼܠܹܗ ܐܵܟܹܠܩܲܪܨܵܐ،
TRL: O sabab yale shareeke yna bdima o bisra, hadkha oep haw shoerik-leh bane mindeeane, dbmawteh baṭil wa lhaw deet-leh khayla dmawta, deeleh akelqarṣa,
ENG: Since then the children are sharers in flesh and blood, he also himself in like manner partook of the same; that through death he might bring to nought him that had the power of death, that is, the devil;

ASY: ܘܥܵܒܹܕ ܗ݇ܘܵܐ ܚܹܐܪܹ̈ܐ ܠܟܠܲܝܗܝ ܐܵܢܝܼ ܕܓܵܘ ܥܲܒ݂ܕܘܼܬܵܐ ܝܗ݇ܘܵܘ ܟܠܲܝܗܝ ܚܲܝܲܝ̈ܗܝ ܡ̣ܢ ܙܕܘܼܥܬܵܐ ܕܡܵܘܬܵܐ.
TRL: O 'abed wa khere lklayhy anee dgaw 'awdoeta ywaw klayhy khayayhy min zdoe'ta dmawta.
ENG: and might deliver all them who through fear of death were all their lifetime subject to bondage.

ASY: ܣܵܒܵܒ ܒܬܪܘܼܨܬܵܐ، ܠܹܐ ܝܠܹܗ ܗܲܝܘܼܪܹܐ ܠܡܲܠܲܐܟܹ̈ܐ ܐܸܠܵܐ ܠܒܢܘܿܢܹ̈ܐ ܕܐܲܒ݂ܪܵܗܵܡ.
TRL: Sabab btroeṣta, le-yleh hayoere lmalake ila lbnoone dawraham.
ENG: For verily not of angels doth he take hold, but he taketh hold of the seed of Abraham.

ASY: ܒܘܼܬ ܐܵܗܵܐ ܘܵܠܹܐ ܝܗ݇ܘܵܐ ܕܦܵܐܹܫ ܗ݇ܘܵܐ ܡܘܼܕܡܝܼܵܐ ܠܐܲܚܘܿܢܘܵܬܹ̈ܗ ܒܟܠ ܐܘܼܪܚܵܐ، ܗܲܕܟ݂ܵܐ ܕܗܵܘܹܐ ܗ݇ܘܵܐ ܓܘܼܪܵܐ ܕܟܵܗܢܹ̈ܐ ܡܪܲܚܡܵܢܵܐ ܘܡܗܘܼܡܢܵܐ ܒܡܸܢܕܝܼܵܢܹ̈ܐ ܕܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ، ܕܥܵܒܹܕ ܗ݇ܘܵܐ ܚܘܼܣܵܝܵܐ ܕܚܛܝܼܵܬܹ̈ܐ ܕܛܵܝܸܦܵܐ.
TRL: Boet aha wale ywa dpaesh wa moedmeea lakhoonwateh bkl oerkha, hadkha dhawe wa goera dkahne mrakhmana o mhoemna bmindeeane dalaha, d'abed wa khoesaya dkhṭeeate dṭayipa.
ENG: Wherefore it behoved him in all things to be made like unto his brethren, that he might be a merciful and faithful high priest in things pertaining to God, to make propitiation for the sins of the people.

ASY: ܣܵܒܵܒ ܟܲܕ ܩܘܼܒܸܠ ܠܹܗ ܚܲܫܵܐ ܐܝܼܡܲܢ ܕܦܝܼܫ ܠܹܗ ܓ̰ܘܼܪܒܵܐ، ܟܹܐ ܡܵܨܹܐ ܗܲܝܸܪ ܠܐܵܢܝܼ ܕܝܼܢܵܐ ܦܝܵܫܵܐ ܓ̰ܘܼܪܒܹܐ.
TRL: Sabab kad qoebil-leh khasha eeman dpeesh-leh joerba, ke maṣe hayir lanee deena pyasha joerbe.
ENG: For in that he himself hath suffered being tempted, he is able to succour them that are tempted.

ASY: ܗܲܕܟ݂ܵܐ، ܐܲܚܘܿܢܘܵܬܹ̈ܐ ܩܲܕܝܼܫܹ̈ܐ، ܫܲܪ̈ܝܼܟܹܐ ܒܟ̰ܝܵܕܬܵܐ ܫܡܲܝܵܢܵܝܬܵܐ، ܡܲܬܒ݂ܘܼܢ ܪܸܥܝܵܢܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܥܲܠ ܝܼܫܘܿܥ، ܫܠܝܼܚܵܐ ܘܟܵܗܢܵܐ ܓܘܼܪܵܐ ܕܟܹܐ ܡܵܘܕܲܚ ܒܝܼܹܗ،
TRL: Hadkha, akhoonwate qadeeshe, shareeke bchyadta shmayanayta, matwoen ri'yanawkhoon 'al eeshoo', shleekha o kahna goera dke mawdakh bee-eh,
ENG: Wherefore, holy brethren, partakers of a heavenly calling, consider the Apostle and High Priest of our confession, even Jesus;

ASY: ܗ̇ܘ ܕܝܼܗ݇ܘܵܐ ܡܗܘܼܡܢܵܐ ܠܡ̇ܢ ܕܡܘܼܬܸܒ݂ ܠܹܗ ܐܸܠܹܗ، ܕܵܐܟ݂ܝܼ ܕܐܘܼܦ ܡܘܼܫܹܐ ܡܗܘܼܡܢܵܐ ܝܗ݇ܘܵܐ ܒܟܠܹܗ ܒܲܝܬܵܐ ܕܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ.
TRL: Haw deewa mhoemna lman dmoetiw-leh ileh, dakhee doep moeshe mhoemna ywa bkleh bayta dalaha.
ENG: who was faithful to him that appointed him, as also was Moses in all his house.

ASY: ܣܵܒܵܒ ܗ̇ܘ ܚܫܝܼܚܵܐ ܝܗ݇ܘܵܐ ܠܐܝܼܩܵܪܵܐ ܒܘܼܫ ܙܵܘܕܵܐ ܡ̣ܢ ܡܘܼܫܹܐ، ܕܵܐܟ݂ܝܼ ܕܚܲܕ ܒܵܢܝܵܢܵܐ ܕܒܲܝܬܵܐ ܚܫܝܼܚܵܐ ܝܠܹܗ ܠܐܝܼܩܵܪܵܐ ܒܘܼܫ ܙܵܘܕܵܐ ܡ̣ܢ ܒܸܢܝܵܢܵܐ.
TRL: Sabab haw khsheekha ywa leeqara boesh zawda min moeshe, dakhee dkhad banyana dbayta khsheekha-yleh leeqara boesh zawda min binyana.
ENG: For he hath been counted worthy of more glory than Moses, by so much as he that built the house hath more honour than the house.

ASY: ܣܵܒܵܒ ܟܠ ܒܲܝܬܵܐ ܟܹܐ ܦܵܐܹܫ ܒܸܢܝܵܐ ܒܚܲܕ ܐ݇ܢܵܫܵܐ، ܐܝܼܢܵܐ ܒܵܢܝܵܢܵܐ ܕܟܠܲܝܗܝ ܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ ܝܠܹܗ.
TRL: Sabab kl bayta ke paesh binya bkhad nasha, eena banyana dklayhy Alaha-yleh.
ENG: For every house is builded by some one; but he that built all things is God.

ASY: ܡܘܼܫܹܐ ܪܹܓܵܐ ܡܗܘܼܡܢܵܐ ܝܗ݇ܘܵܐ ܒܟܠܹܗ ܒܲܝܬܵܐ ܕܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ، ܠܣܵܗܕܘܼܬܵܐ ܕܡܸܢܕܝܼܵܢܹ̈ܐ ܕܦܵܝܫܝܼ ܗ݇ܘܵܘ ܗܘܼܡܙܸܡܹܐ ܒܕܲܥܬܝܼܕ.
TRL: Moeshe rega mhoemna ywa bkleh bayta dalaha, lsahdoeta dmindeeane dpayshee waw hoemzime bda'teed.
ENG: And Moses indeed was faithful in all his house as a servant, for a testimony of those things which were afterward to be spoken;

ASY: ܐܝܼܢܵܐ ܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ ܡܗܘܼܡܢܵܐ ܝܠܹܗ ܐܲܝܟ݂ ܒܪܘܿܢܵܐ ܥܲܠ ܒܲܝܬܵܐ ܕܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ، ܘܒܲܝܬܹܗ ܐܲܚܢܲܢ ܝܼܘܲܚ، ܐܸܢ ܕܵܒ݂ܩܲܚ ܩܸܘܝܵܐ ܒܓ̰ܘܼܪܐܲܬ ܘܒܗܹܒ݂ܝܼ ܕܒܝܼܲܝܗܝ ܟܹܐ ܥܵܒ݂ܕܲܚ ܫܘܼܒ݂ܗܵܪܵܐ.
TRL: Eena msheekha mhoemna-yleh aykh broona 'al bayta dalaha, o bayteh akhnan eewakh, in dawqakh qiwya bjoerat o bhewee dbee-ayhy ke 'awdakh shoewhara.
ENG: but Christ as a son, over his house; whose house are we, if we hold fast our boldness and the glorying of our hope firm unto the end.

ASY: ܒܘܼܬ ܐܵܗܵܐ ܒܹܐܡܵܪܵܐ ܝܠܹܗ ܪܘܼܚܵܐ ܕܩܘܼܕܫܵܐ: ܐܸܕܝܘܿܡ ܐܸܢ ܫܵܡܥܝܼܬܘܿܢ ܩܵܠܹܗ،
TRL: Boet aha bemara-yleh roekha dqoedsha: idyoom in sham'eetoon qaleh,
ENG: Wherefore, even as the Holy Ghost saith, Today if ye shall hear his voice,

ASY: ܠܵܐ ܡܲܩܫܹܝܬܘܿܢ ܠܸܒܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܐܲܝܟ݂ ܕܥܒ݂ܝܼܕ ܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܒܡܵܪܘܿܕܘܼܬܵܐ ܓܵܘ ܒܲܪܝܼܵܐ ܒܥܕܵܢܵܐ ܕܓ̰ܘܼܪܵܒܵܐ،
TRL: La maqsheytoon libawkhoon aykh d'weed lawkhoon bmaroodoeta gaw bareea b'dana djoeraba,
ENG: Harden not your hearts, as in the provocation, Like as in the day of the temptation in the wilderness,

ASY: ܐܝܼܡܲܢ ܕܐܲܒ݂ܵܗܵܬܵܘ̈ܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܓ̰ܘܼܪܸܒ ܠܗܘܿܢ ܘܨܘܼܚܨܹܐ ܠܗܘܿܢ ܐܸܠܝܼ ܘܚܙܹܐ ܠܗܘܿܢ ܦܘܼܠܚܵܢܝܼ̈ ܐܲܪܒܥܝܼ ܫܸܢܹ̈ܐ.
TRL: Eeman dawahatawkhoon joerib-lhoon o ṣoekhṣe-lhoon ilee o khze-lhoon poelkhanee arb'ee shine.
ENG: Wherewith your fathers tempted me by proving me, And saw my works forty years.

ASY: ܒܘܼܬ ܐܵܗܵܐ ܟܪܝܼܒ ܠܝܼ ܡ̣ܢ ܗ̇ܝ ܫܲܪܒܬܵܐ ܘܐ݇ܡܝܼܪܝܼ، ”ܒܟܠ ܙܲܒ݂ܢܵܐ ܟܹܐ ܚܵܠܛܝܼ ܒܠܸܒܲܝܗܝ، ܘܠܹܐ ܝܵܕܥܝܼ ܐܘܼܪ̈ܚܵܬܝܼ.“
TRL: Boet aha kreeb-lee min hay sharbta o meeree, ”bkl zawna ke khalṭee blibayhy, o le yad'ee oerkhatee.“
ENG: Wherefore I was displeased with this generation, And said, They do alway err in their heart: But they did not know my ways;

ASY: ܗܲܕܟ݂ܵܐ ܝ݇ܡܹܐ ܠܝܼ ܓܵܘ ܟܲܪܒܝܼ، ”ܠܹܐ ܥܵܒ݂ܪܝܼ ܠܢܝܵܚܬܝܼ.“
TRL: Hadkha me-lee gaw karbee, ”le 'awree lnyakhtee.“
ENG: As I sware in my wrath, They shall not enter into my rest.

ASY: ܗܘܹܝܡܘܼܢ ܗܸܫܝܵܪ ܐܲܚܘܿܢܘܵܬܹ̈ܐ، ܠܵܐ ܗܵܘܝܵܐ ܕܗܵܘܹܐ ܒܗܸܟ̃ ܚܲܕ ܡܸܢܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܠܸܒܵܐ ܒܝܼܫܵܐ ܘܠܵܐ ܗܲܡܸܢܵܢܵܐ، ܕܪܵܚܩܹܢ ܡ̣ܢ ܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ ܚܵܝܵܐ.
TRL: Hweymoen hishyar akhoonwate, la hawya dhawe bhich khad minawkhoon liba beesha o la haminana, drakhqen min Alaha khaya.
ENG: Take heed, brethren, lest haply there shall be in any one of you an evil heart of unbelief, in falling away from the living God:

ASY: ܐܝܼܢܵܐ ܗܲܒ݂݇ܠܘܼܢ ܠܸܒܵܐ ܚܲܕ ܠܗ̇ܘ ܐ݇ܚܹܪ݇ܢܵܐ ܝܵܘܡܵܐܝܼܬ، ܟܡܵܐ ܕܐܝܼܬ ܠܲܢ ܥܕܵܢܵܐ، ܕܗܸܟ̃ ܚܲܕ ܡܸܢܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܠܵܐ ܦܵܐܹܫ ܡܘܼܩܫܝܼܵܐ ܒܥܲܠܕܵܝܬܵܐ ܕܚܛܝܼܬܵܐ.
TRL: Eena haloen liba khad lhaw khena yawmaeet, kma deet lan 'dana, dhich khad minawkhoon la paesh moeqsheea b'aldayta dkhṭeeta.
ENG: but exhort one another day by day, so long as it is called Today; lest any one of you be hardened by the deceitfulness of sin:

ASY: ܣܵܒܵܒ ܗܘܹܐ ܠܲܢ ܫܲܪ̈ܝܼܟܹܐ ܒܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ ܐܸܢ ܟܵܠܲܚ ܡܩܵܘܝܵܢܹ̈ܐ ܒܚܵܬܸܪܓ̰ܲܡܥܘܼܬܲܢ ܡ̣ܢ ܫܘܼܪܵܝܵܐ ܘܗܲܠ ܚܲܪܬܵܐ.
TRL: Sabab hwe lan shareeke bmsheekha in kalakh mqawyane bkhatirjam'oetan min shoeraya o hal kharta.
ENG: for we are become partakers of Christ, if we hold fast the beginning of our confidence firm unto the end:

ASY: ܕܵܐܟ݂ܝܼ ܕܝܼܠܹܗ ܐ݇ܡܝܼܪܵܐ: ܐܸܕܝܘܿܡ ܐܸܢ ܫܵܡܥܝܼܬܘܿܢ ܩܵܠܹܗ، ܠܵܐ ܡܲܩܫܹܝܬܘܿܢ ܠܸܒܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ، ܐܲܝܟ݂ ܕܥܒ݂ܝܼܕ ܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܒܝܵܘܡܵܐ ܕܡܵܪܘܿܕܘܼܬܵܐ.
TRL: Dakhee deeleh meera: idyoom in sham'eetoon qaleh, la maqsheytoon libawkhoon, aykh d'weed lawkhoon byawma dmaroodoeta.
ENG: while it is said, Today if ye shall hear his voice, Harden not your hearts, as in the provocation.

ASY: ܡܵܢܝܼ ܝܗ݇ܘܵܘ ܐܵܢܝܼ ܕܫܡܝܼܥ ܠܗܘܿܢ ܘܥܒ݂ܝܼܕ ܠܗܘܿܢ ܡܵܪܘܿܕܘܼܬܵܐ؟ ܠܹܐ ܝܗ݇ܘܵܘ ܟܠܲܝܗܝ ܐܵܢܝܼ ܕܡܘܼܫܹܐ ܦܘܼܠܛܲܝ ܠܹܗ ܡ̣ܢ ܡܸܨܪܹܝܢ؟
TRL: Manee ywaw anee dshmee' lhoon o 'weed-lhoon maroodoeta? Le ywaw klayhy anee dmoeshe poelṭay-leh min miṣreyn?
ENG: For who, when they heard, did provoke? nay, did not all they that came out of Egypt by Moses?

ASY: ܘܡ̣ܢ ܡܵܢܝܼ ܟܪܝܼܒ ܠܹܗ ܩܵܐ ܐܲܪܒܥܝܼ ܫܸܢܹ̈ܐ؟ ܠܹܐ ܝܗ݇ܘܵܐ ܡ̣ܢ ܐܵܢܝܼ ܕܚܛܹܐ ܠܗܘܿܢ، ܘܫܠܲܕܲܝ̈ܗܝ ܢܦܝܼܠ ܠܗܘܿܢ ܓܵܘ ܒܲܪܝܼܵܐ؟
TRL: O min manee kreeb-leh qa arb'ee shine? Le ywa min anee dkhṭe-lhoon, o shladayhy npeel-lhoon gaw bareea?
ENG: And with whom was he displeased forty years? was it not with them that sinned, whose carcases fell in the wilderness?

ASY: ܘܒܘܼܬ ܡܵܢܝܼ ܝ݇ܡܹܐ ܠܹܗ ܕܠܹܐ ܥܵܒ݂ܪܝܼ ܗ݇ܘܵܘ ܠܢܝܵܚܬܹܗ ܫܒ݂ܘܿܩ ܒܘܼܬ ܐܵܢܝܼ ܕܠܵܐ ܡܘܼܨܝܸܬ ܠܗܘܿܢ؟
TRL: O boet manee me-leh dle 'awree waw lnyakhteh shwooq boet anee dla moeṣyit-lhoon?
ENG: And to whom sware he that they should not enter into his rest, but to them that were disobedient?

ASY: ܗܲܕܟ݂ܵܐ ܒܸܚܙܵܝܵܐ ܝܘܲܚ، ܠܵܐ ܡܨܹܐ ܠܗܘܿܢ ܥܵܒ݂ܪܝܼ ܒܘܼܬ ܠܲܝܬܵܝܘܼܬܵܐ ܕܗܲܝܡܵܢܘܼܬܲܝܗܝ.
TRL: Hadkha bikhzaya ywakh, la mṣe-lhoon 'awree boet laytayoeta dhaymanoetayhy.
ENG: And we see that they were not able to enter in because of unbelief.

ASY: ܣܵܒܵܒ ܩܵܘܠܵܐ ܕܥܒ݂ܵܪܬܵܐ ܠܢܝܵܚܬܹܗ ܡܩܵܘܝܵܢܵܐ ܝܠܹܗ، ܗܵܘܲܚ ܗܸܫܝܵܪ ܕܐܘܼܦ ܚܲܕ ܡܸܢܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܠܵܐ ܡܲܒܝܸܢ ܕܦܝܼܫܵܐ ܝܠܹܗ ܡ̣ܢ ܠܸܥܒ݂ܵܪܵܐ.
TRL: Sabab qawla d'warta lnyakhteh mqawyana-yleh, hawakh hishyar doep khad minawkhoon la mabyin dpeesha-yleh min li'wara.
ENG: Let us fear therefore, lest haply, a promise being left of entering into his rest, any one of you should seem to have come short of it.

ASY: ܣܵܒܵܒ ܐܹܘܲܢܓܲܠܝܼܘܿܢ ܦܝܼܫ ܠܹܗ ܡܘܼܫܚܸܕܵܐ ܐܸܠܲܢ ܐܘܼܦ ܐܲܝܟ݂ ܠܐܵܢܝܼ، ܐܝܼܢܵܐ ܡܲܟܪܲܙܬܵܐ ܠܲܝܬ ܗ݇ܘܵܐ ܠܵܗ̇ ܗܸܟ̃ ܚܲܕ ܝܘܼܬܪܵܢܵܐ ܩܵܬܲܝܗܝ، ܣܵܒܵܒ ܐܵܢܝܼ ܕܫܡܝܼܥܵܐ ܠܗܘܿܢ ܠܵܐ ܡܙܝܼܓ݂ܵܐ ܠܗܘܿܢ ܒܗܲܝܡܵܢܘܼܬܵܐ.
TRL: Sabab ewangaleeoon peesh-leh moeshkhida ilan oep aykh lanee, eena makrazta layt wa-laha hich khad yoetrana qatayhy, sabab anee dshmee'a-lhoon la mzeegha-lhoon bhaymanoeta.
