ENG: But if ye are without chastening, whereof all have been made partakers, then are ye bastards, and not sons.

ASY: ܘܐ݇ܚܹܪ݇ܢܵܐ، ܟܠܲܢ ܐܝܼܬ ܗ݇ܘܵܐ ܠܲܢ ܒܵܒܵܘܵܬܹ̈ܐ ܦܲܓ݂ܪܵܢܵܝܹܐ ܕܟܹܐ ܬܲܥܠܸܡܝܼ ܗ݇ܘܵܘ ܠܲܢ، ܘܐܲܚܢܲܢ ܟܹܐ ܡܝܲܩܪܲܚ ܗ݇ܘܵܘ ܠܗܘܿܢ. ܒܲܣ ܠܹܐ ܝܠܵܗ̇ ܘܵܠܹܐ ܕܫܵܠܡܲܚ ܠܒܵܒܵܐ ܪܘܼܚܵܢܵܝܵܐ، ܘܚܵܝܲܚ؟
TRL: O khena, klan eet wa lan babawate paghranaye dke ta'limee waw lan, o akhnan ke myaqrakh waw-lhoon. Bas le-ylaha wale dshalmakh lbaba roekhanaya, o khayakh?
ENG: Furthermore, we had the fathers of our flesh to chasten us, and we gave them reverence: shall we not much rather be in subjection unto the Father of spirits, and live?

ASY: ܣܵܒܵܒ ܐܵܢܝܼ ܬܘܼܥܠܸܡ ܠܗܘܿܢ ܐܸܠܲܢ ܩܵܐ ܚܲܕ ܙܲܒ݂ܢܵܐ ܟܸܪܝܵܐ ܐܲܝܟ݂ ܕܒܣܝܼܡ ܠܵܗ̇ ܠܗܘܿܢ؛ ܐܝܼܢܵܐ ܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ ܟܹܐ ܬܲܥܠܸܡ ܠܲܢ ܠܝܘܼܬܪܵܢܵܐ ܕܓܵܢܲܢ ܕܫܲܪܸܟܲܚ ܒܩܲܕܝܼܫܘܼܬܹܗ.
TRL: Sabab anee toe'lim-lhoon ilan qa khad zawna kirya aykh dbseem-laha-lhoon; eena Alaha ke ta'lim lan lyoetrana dganan dsharikakh bqadeeshoeteh.
ENG: For they verily for a few days chastened us as seemed good to them; but he for our profit, that we may be partakers of his holiness.

ASY: ܟܠ ܬܲܥܠܲܡܬܵܐ ܠܹܐ ܡܲܒܝܸܢܵܐ ܒܲܣܝܼܡܬܵܐ ܒܥܕܵܢܘܼܗ̇ ܐܸܠܵܐ ܡܲܦܫܸܡܵܢܬܵܐ؛ ܐܝܼܢܵܐ ܒܚܲܪܬܵܐ ܟܹܐ ܡܲܝܬܝܵܐ ܛܥܘܼܢܬܵܐ ܕܙܲܕܝܼܩܘܼܬܵܐ ܘܕܫܠܵܡܵܐ ܠܐܵܢܝܼ ܕܦܵܝܫܝܼ ܬܘܼܥܠܸܡܹܐ ܒܝܼܘܼܗ̇.
TRL: Kl ta'lamta le mabyina baseemta b'danoeha ila mapshimanta; eena bkharta ke maytya ṭ'oenta dzadeeqoeta o dshlama lanee dpayshee toe'lime beeoeha.
ENG: All chastening seemeth for the present to be not joyous, but grievous: yet afterward it yieldeth peaceable fruit unto them that have been exercised thereby, even the fruit of righteousness.

ASY: ܒܘܼܬ ܐܵܗܵܐ ܚܲܠܸܢܘܼܢ ܐܝܼܕܵܬܵܘ̈ܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܪܸܦܝܹܐ ܘܒܘܼܪ̈ܟܵܟܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܡܚܝܼܠܹ̈ܐ.
TRL: Boet aha khalinoen eedatawkhoon ripye o boerkakawkhoon mkheele.
ENG: Wherefore lift up the hands that hang down, and the palsied knees;

ASY: ܘܡܲܫܘܹܝܡܘܼܢ ܐܘܼܪ̈ܚܵܬܹܐ ܩܵܐ ܐܲܩܠܵܬܵܘ̈ܟ݂ܘܿܢ، ܕܠܵܐ ܩܵܠܹܒ ܗ̇ܘ ܕܝܼܠܹܗ ܫܦܝܼܠܵܐ، ܐܸܠܵܐ ܦܵܐܹܫ ܒܘܼܣܡܵܐ.
TRL: O mashweymoen oerkhate qa aqlatawkhoon, dla qaleb haw deeleh shpeela, ila paesh boesma.
ENG: and make straight paths for your feet, that that which is lame be not turned out of the way, but rather be healed.

ASY: ܪܚܘܿܛܘܼܢ ܒܵܬ݇ܪ ܫܠܵܡܵܐ ܥܲܡ ܟܠܲܝܗܝ ܐ݇ܢܵܫܹ̈ܐ، ܘܒܵܬ݇ܪ ܩܲܕܝܼܫܘܼܬܵܐ ܕܠܵܐ ܒܕܝܼܘܼܗ̇ ܐ݇ܢܵܫܵܐ ܠܡܵܪܲܢ ܠܹܐ ܚܵܙܹܐ.
TRL: Rkhooṭoen bar shlama 'am klayhy nashe, o bar qadeeshoeta dla bdeeoeha nasha lmaran le khaze.
ENG: Follow after peace with all men, and the sanctification without which no man shall see the Lord:

ASY: ܗܵܘܹܝܬܘܿܢ ܗܸܫܝܵܪ ܕܠܵܐ ܗܵܘܹܐ ܐ݇ܢܵܫܵܐ ܒܵܨܘܿܪܵܐ ܡ̣ܢ ܫܵܦܵܩܲܬ ܕܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ، ܕܐܘܼܦ ܠܵܐ ܗܸܟ̃ ܘܲܪܝܼܕܵܐ ܕܡܲܪܝܼܪܘܼܬܵܐ ܡܲܓ̰ܝܸܢ ܘܚܲܙܕܸܓ ܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܘܟ̰ܲܦܠܸܢܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ؛
TRL: Haweytoon hishyar dla hawe nasha baṣoora min shapaqat dalaha, doep la hich wareeda dmareeroeta majyin o khazdig lawkhoon o chaplinawkhoon;
ENG: looking carefully lest there be any man that falleth short of the grace of God; lest any root of bitterness springing up trouble you, and thereby the many be defiled;

ASY: ܘܠܵܐ ܗܵܘܹܐ ܓܵܘܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܐ݇ܢܵܫܵܐ ܙܲܢܵܝܵܐ ܘܪܸܦܝܵܐ ܐܲܝܟ݂ ܥܹܣܘܿ، ܗ̇ܘ ܕܩܵܐ ܚܕܵܐ ܡܹܐܟ݂ܘܼܠܬܵܐ ܙܘܼܒܢܵܐ ܠܹܗ ܒܘܼܟ݂ܪܘܼܬܹܗ.
TRL: O la hawe gawawkhoon nasha zanaya o ripya aykh 'esoo, haw dqa khda mekhoelta zoebna-leh boekhroeteh.
ENG: lest there be any fornicator, or profane person, as Esau, who for one mess of meat sold his own birthright.

ASY: ܐܲܝܟ݂ ܕܟܹܐ ܝܵܕܥܝܼܬܘܿܢ، ܒܵܬ݇ܪ ܗܵܕܵܐ ܐܝܼܡܲܢ ܕܒܥܹܐ ܠܹܗ ܝܵܪܹܬ ܗ݇ܘܵܐ ܠܒܘܼܪܟܬܹܗ، ܦܝܼܫ ܠܹܗ ܡܘܼܚܦܸܠܵܐ، ܣܵܒܵܒ ܠܵܐ ܡܘܼܫ݇ܟ̰ܸܚ ܠܹܗ ܕܘܼܟܵܐ ܠܬܝܵܒ݂ܘܼܬܵܐ، ܐܵܦܸܢ ܕܛܥܹܐ ܠܹܗ ܒܵܬ݇ܪܘܼܗ̇ ܒܕܸܡܥܹ̈ܐ.
TRL: Aykh dke yad'eetoon, bar hada eeman db'e-leh yaret wa lboerkteh, peesh-leh moekhpila, sabab la moechikh-leh doeka ltyawoeta, apin dṭ'e-leh baroeha bdim'e.
ENG: For ye know that even when he afterward desired to inherit the blessing, he was rejected (for he found no place of repentance), though he sought it diligently with tears.

ASY: ܣܵܒܵܒ ܐܲܚܬܘܿܢ ܠܵܐ ܩܘܼܪܒܸܢܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܠܛܘܼܪܵܐ ܕܦܵܐܹܫ ܕܩܝܼܪܵܐ ܘܒܸܠܗܵܝܵܐ ܒܢܘܼܪܵܐ، ܘܠܵܐ ܠܚܸܫܟܵܐ ܘܠܥܲܡܛܵܢܵܐ ܘܠܒܘܼܪܵܢ،
TRL: Sabab akhtoon la qoerbinawkhoon lṭoera dpaesh dqeera o bilhaya bnoera, o la lkhishka o l'amṭana o lboeran,
ENG: For ye are not come unto a mount that might be touched, and that burned with fire, and unto blackness, and darkness, and tempest,

ASY: ܘܠܵܐ ܠܩܵܠܵܐ ܕܫܝܼܦܘܿܪܵܐ ܘܠܵܐ ܠܩܵܠܵܐ ܕܗܹܡܸܙܡܵܢܹ̈ܐ، ܗܲܕܟ݂ܵܐ ܐܵܢܝܼ ܕܫܡܝܼܥ ܠܗܘܿܢ ܦܘܼܪܦܸܠ ܠܗܘܿܢ ܕܠܵܐ ܦܵܝܫܝܼ ܫܡܝܼܥܹܐ ܗܹܡܸܙܡܵܢܹ̈ܐ ܐ݇ܚܹܪ̈݇ܢܹܐ،
TRL: O la lqala dsheepoora o la lqala dhemizmane, hadkha anee dshmee' lhoon poerpil-lhoon dla payshee shmee'e hemizmane khene,
ENG: and the sound of a trumpet, and the voice of words; which voice they that heard entreated that no word more should be spoken unto them:

ASY: ܣܵܒܵܒ ܠܵܐ ܡܨܹܐ ܠܗܘܿܢ ܠܩܲܒܘܼܠܹܐ ܡܸܢܕܝܼ ܕܦܝܼܫܵܐ ܝܗ݇ܘܵܐ ܦܩܝܼܕܵܐ: ܐܘܼܦ ܐܸܢ ܕܗܲܝܘܵܢ ܕܵܩܹܪ ܒܛܘܼܪܵܐ، ܒܸܬ ܦܵܐܹܫ ܪܓ̰ܝܼܡܵܐ.
TRL: Sabab la mṣe-lhoon lqaboele mindee dpeesha ywa pqeeda: oep in dhaywan daqer bṭoera, bit paesh rjeema.
ENG: for they could not endure that which was enjoined, If even a beast touch the mountain, it shall be stoned;

ASY: ܗܲܕܟ݂ܵܐ ܣܲܗܡܵܢܵܐ ܝܗ݇ܘܵܐ ܚܸܙܘܵܐ، ܕܡܘܼܫܹܐ ܐ݇ܡܝܼܪܹܗ: ܐܵܢܵܐ ܒܸܪܓܵܕܵܐ ܝܘܸܢ ܡ̣ܢ ܙܕܘܼܥܬܵܐ.
TRL: Hadkha sahmana ywa khizwa, dmoeshe meereh: ana birgada ywin min zdoe'ta.
ENG: and so fearful was the appearance, that Moses said, I exceedingly fear and quake:

ASY: ܐܝܼܢܵܐ ܐܲܚܬܘܿܢ ܩܘܼܪܒܸܢܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܠܛܘܼܪܵܐ ܕܨܸܗܝܘܿܢ، ܠܡܕܝܼܢ݇ܬܵܐ ܕܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ ܚܵܝܵܐ، ܠܐܘܿܪܸܫܠܸܡ ܫܡܲܝܵܢܵܝܬܵܐ، ܘܠܪܸ̈ܒܘܵܬܹܐ ܕܡܲܠܲܐܟܹ̈ܐ،
TRL: Eena akhtoon qoerbinawkhoon lṭoera dṣihyoon, lmdeeta dalaha khaya, loorishlim shmayanayta, o lribwate dmalake,
ENG: but ye are come unto mount Zion, and unto the city of the living God, the heavenly Jerusalem, and to innumerable hosts of angels,

ASY: ܘܠܟܢܘܼܫܝܵܐ ܦܨܝܼܚܵܐ، ܘܠܥܹܕܬܵܐ ܕܒܘܼܟ݂ܪܹ̈ܐ ܕܫܸܡܵܢܲܝ̈ܗܝ ܦܝܼܫܹܐ ܝܢܵܐ ܟܬܝܼܒܹܐ ܒܫܡܲܝܹ̈ܐ، ܘܠܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ، ܕܲܝܵܢܵܐ ܕܟܠܲܝܗܝ ܐ݇ܢܵܫܹ̈ܐ، ܘܠܪ̈ܘܼܚܹܐ ܕܟܹܐܢܹ̈ܐ ܕܦܝܼܫܹܐ ܝܢܵܐ ܡܘܼܓܡܸܪܹܐ،
TRL: O lknoeshya pṣeekha, o l'edta dboekhre dshimanayhy peeshe yna kteebe bshmaye, o lalaha, dayana dklayhy nashe, o lroekhe dkene dpeeshe yna moegmire,
ENG: to the general assembly and church of the firstborn who are enrolled in heaven, and to God the Judge of all, and to the spirits of just men made perfect,

ASY: ܘܠܝܼܫܘܿܥ، ܡܸܨܥܵܝܵܐ ܕܘܲܥܕܵܐ ܚܵܕ݇ܬܵܐ، ܘܠܕܸܡܵܐ ܡܘܼܪܝܸܣܵܐ، ܗ̇ܘ ܕܗܲܡܙܘܼܡܹܐ ܝܠܹܗ ܒܘܼܫ ܨܦܵܝܝܼ ܡ̣ܢ ܕܸܡܵܐ ܕܗܵܒܹܝܠ.
TRL: O leeshoo', miṣ'aya dwa'da khata, o ldima moeryisa, haw dhamzoeme-yleh boesh ṣpayee min dima dhabeyl.
ENG: and to Jesus the mediator of a new covenant, and to the blood of sprinkling that speaketh better than that of Abel.

ASY: ܦܘܼܫܘܼܢ ܙܗܝܼܪܹܐ ܕܠܵܐ ܡܲܚܦܸܠܝܼܬܘܿܢ ܠܗ̇ܘ ܕܗܲܡܙܘܼܡܹܐ ܝܠܹܗ. ܣܵܒܵܒ ܐܸܢ ܠܵܐ ܦܝܼܫ ܠܗܘܿܢ ܦܘܼܨܝܹܐ ܐܵܢܝܼ ܕܡܘܼܚܦܸܠ ܠܗܘܿܢ ܠܗ̇ܘ ܕܡܘܼܟܪܸܙ ܠܹܗ ܥܲܠ ܐܲܪܥܵܐ، ܟܡܵܐ ܒܘܼܫ ܙܵܘܕܵܐ ܐܲܚܢܲܢ ܠܹܐ ܦܵܝܫܲܚ ܦܘܼܨܝܹܐ ܐܸܢ ܡܲܚܦܸܠܲܚ ܡ̣ܢ ܩܵܒܲܠܬܵܐ ܕܗ̇ܘ ܕܗܲܡܙܘܼܡܹܐ ܝܠܹܗ ܡ̣ܢ ܫܡܲܝܵܐ.
TRL: Poeshoen zheere dla makhpileetoon lhaw dhamzoeme-yleh. Sabab in la peesh-lhoon poeṣye anee dmoekhpil-lhoon lhaw dmoekriz-leh 'al ar'a, kma boesh zawda akhnan le payshakh poeṣye in makhpilakh min qabalta dhaw dhamzoeme-yleh min shmaya.
ENG: See that ye refuse not him that speaketh. For if they escaped not, when they refused him that warned them on earth, much more shall not we escape, who turn away from him that warneth from heaven:

ASY: ܒܗ̇ܝ ܥܕܵܢܵܐ ܩܵܠܹܗ ܡܘܼܫܥܸܫ ܠܹܗ ܠܐܲܪܥܵܐ، ܐܝܼܢܵܐ ܐܵܕܝܼܵܐ ܩܘܼܘܸܠܵܐ ܝܠܹܗ، ܒܹܐܡܵܪܵܐ: ܚܕܵܐ ܓܵܗܵܐ ܐ݇ܚܹܪ݇ܬܵܐ ܒܸܬ ܡܲܫܥܸܫܸܢ ܠܵܐ ܐܲܚܟ̰ܝܼ ܠܐܲܪܥܵܐ، ܐܝܼܢܵܐ ܐܘܼܦ ܠܫܡܲܝܹ̈ܐ.
TRL: Bhay 'dana qaleh moesh'ish-leh lar'a, eena adeea qoewila-yleh, bemara: khda gaha kheta bit mash'ishin la akhchee lar'a, eena oep lshmaye.
ENG: whose voice then shook the earth: but now he hath promised, saying, Yet once more will I make to tremble not the earth only, but also the heaven.

ASY: ܐܲܢܹܐ ܚܲܒܪܹ̈ܐ، ”ܚܕܵܐ ܓܵܗܵܐ ܐ݇ܚܹܪ݇ܬܵܐ،“ ܡܲܕܘܼܥܹܐ ܝܢܵܐ ܫܲܚܠܲܦܬܵܐ ܕܡܸܢܕܝܼܵܢܹ̈ܐ ܕܟܹܐ ܦܵܝܫܝܼ ܫܥܝܼܫܹܐ، ܕܝܼܢܵܐ ܡܸܢܕܝܼܵܢܹ̈ܐ ܦܝܼܫܹܐ ܥܒ݂ܝܼܕܹܐ، ܗܵܕܵܐ ܕܡܸܢܕܝܼܵܢܹ̈ܐ ܕܠܹܐ ܦܵܝܫܝܼ ܫܥܝܼܫܹܐ ܟܵܠܝܼ.
TRL: Ane khabre, ”khda gaha kheta,“ madoe'e yna shakhlapta dmindeeane dke payshee sh'eeshe, deena mindeeane peeshe 'weede, hada dmindeeane dle payshee sh'eeshe kalee.
ENG: And this word, Yet once more, signifieth the removing of those things that are shaken, as of things that have been made, that those things which are not shaken may remain.

ASY: ܒܘܼܬ ܐܵܗܵܐ، ܣܵܒܵܒ ܩܘܼܒܸܠ ܠܲܢ ܡܲܠܟܘܼܬܵܐ ܕܠܹܐ ܦܵܝܫܵܐ ܫܥܝܼܫܬܵܐ، ܫܲܟܪܲܚ ܠܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ ܕܥܵܒ݂ܕܲܚ ܚܸܠܡܲܬ ܩܘܼܒܸܠܬܵܐ ܐܸܠܹܗ ܒܢܲܟ݂ܦܘܼܬܵܐ ܘܒܙܕܘܼܥܬܵܐ.
TRL: Boet aha, sabab qoebil lan malkoeta dle paysha sh'eeshta, shakrakh lalaha d'awdakh khilmat qoebilta ileh bnakhpoeta o bzdoe'ta.
ENG: Wherefore, receiving a kingdom that cannot be shaken, let us have grace, whereby we may offer service well-pleasing to God with reverence and awe:

ASY: ܣܵܒܵܒ ܐܲܠܵܗܲܢ ܢܘܼܪܵܐ ܐܵܟ݂ܘܿܠܵܐ ܝܠܹܗ.
TRL: Sabab alahan noera akhoola-yleh.
ENG: for our God is a consuming fire.

ASY: ܫܒ݂ܘܿܩܘܼܢ ܚܘܼܒܵܐ ܕܐܲܚܘܿܢܘܼܬܵܐ ܥܲܪܩܸܠ ܓܵܘܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ.
TRL: Shwooqoen khoeba dakhoonoeta 'arqil gawawkhoon.
ENG: Let love of the brethren continue.

ASY: ܠܵܐ ܡܲܢܫܹܝܬܘܿܢ ܡܲܫܪܵܝܬܵܐ ܕܢܘܼܟ݂ܪ̈ܵܝܹܐ، ܣܵܒܵܒ ܗܲܕܟ݂ܵܐ ܚܲܕ݇ܟܡܵܐ ܡܘܼܫܪܹܐ ܠܗܘܿܢ ܡܲܠܲܐܟܹ̈ܐ ܟܲܕ ܠܵܐ ܒܝܼܕܵܥܵܐ ܕܡܲܠܲܐܟܹ̈ܐ ܝܗ݇ܘܵܘ.
TRL: La mansheytoon mashrayta dnoekhraye, sabab hadkha khakma moeshre-lhoon malake kad la beeda'a dmalake ywaw.
ENG: Forget not to shew love unto strangers: for thereby some have entertained angels unawares.

ASY: ܕܟ݂ܘܿܪܘܼܢ ܠܐܵܢܝܼ ܕܝܼܢܵܐ ܐܲܣܝܼܪܹ̈ܐ، ܐܲܝܟ݂ ܕܐܸܢ ܐܲܣܝܼܪܹ̈ܐ ܝܬܘܿܢ ܥܲܡܲܝܗܝ، ܘܠܐܵܢܝܼ ܕܝܼܢܵܐ ܡܘܼܠܝܸܨܹ̈ܐ، ܐܲܝܟ݂ ܕܐܸܢ ܐܲܚܬܘܿܢ ܓ̰ܲܢܓ̰ܘܼܪܹܐ ܝܬܘܿܢ ܐܲܝܟ݂ ܕܝܼܲܝܗܝ.
TRL: Dkhooroen lanee deena aseere, aykh din aseere ytoon 'amayhy, o lanee deena moelyiṣe, aykh din akhtoon janjoere ytoon aykh dee-ayhy.
ENG: Remember them that are in bonds, as bound with them; them that are evil entreated, as being yourselves also in the body.

ASY: ܗܵܘܹܐ ܓܒ݂ܵܪܵܐ ܡܝܘܼܩܪܵܐ ܒܟܠ، ܘܫܘܝܼܬܵܐ ܕܟ݂ܝܼܬܵܐ، ܣܵܒܵܒ ܠܙܲܢܵܝܹ̈ܐ ܘܠܓܲܝܵܪܹ̈ܐ ܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ ܒܸܬ ܕܵܐܹܢ.
TRL: Hawe gwara myoeqra bkl, o shweeta dkheeta, sabab lzanaye o lgayare Alaha bit daen.
ENG: Let marriage be had in honour among all, and let the bed be undefiled: for fornicators and adulterers God will judge.

ASY: ܠܵܐ ܥܵܒܹܪ ܚܘܼܒܵܐ ܕܙܘܼܙܵܐ ܓܵܘ ܚܲܝܵܘ̈ܟ݂ܘܿܢ، ܐܸܠܵܐ ܡܵܠܹܐ ܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܡܸܢܕܝܼ ܕܐܝܼܬ ܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ، ܣܵܒܵܒ ܐ݇ܡܝܼܪܹܗ ܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ ܒܓܵܢܹܗ: ܗܸܟ̃ ܠܹܐ ܫܵܒ݂ܩܹܢܘܼܟ݂، ܘܐܘܼܦ ܠܹܐ ܪܲܦܹܝܢ ܐܝܼܕܵܐ ܡܸܢܘܼܟ݂.
TRL: La 'aber khoeba dzoeza gaw khayawkhoon, ila male lawkhoon mindee deet lawkhoon, sabab meereh Alaha bganeh: hich le shawqenoekh, o oep le rapeyn eeda minoekh.
ENG: Be ye free from the love of money; content with such things as ye have: for himself hath said, I will in no wise fail thee, neither will I in any wise forsake thee.

ASY: ܗܲܕܟ݂ܵܐ ܒܸܬ ܐܵܡܪܲܚ ܒܓ̰ܘܼܪܐܲܬ: ܡܵܪܝܵܐ ܗܲܝܸܪܵܢܝܼ ܝܠܹܗ؛ ܠܹܐ ܙܵܕܥܹܢ. ܡܘܿܕܝܼ ܒܸܬ ܥܵܒܹܕ ܐܸܠܝܼ ܒܲܪܢܵܫܵܐ؟
TRL: Hadkha bit amrakh bjoerat: Marya hayiranee-yleh; le zad'en. Moodee bit 'abed ilee barnasha?
ENG: So that with good courage we say, The Lord is my helper; I will not fear: What shall man do unto me?

ASY: ܕܟ݂ܘܿܪܘܼܢ ܠܬܲܓܒܸܪ̈ܵܢܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ، ܐܵܢܝܼ ܕܗܘܼܡܙܸܡ ܠܗܘܿܢ ܐܸܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܗܹܡܸܙܡܵܢ ܕܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ. ܓܲܫܩܘܼܢ ܒܕܘܼܒܵܪ̈ܲܝܗܝ ܘܗܘܹܝܡܘܼܢ ܕܵܡܝܵܢܹ̈ܐ ܒܗܲܝܡܵܢܘܼܬܲܝܗܝ.
TRL: Dkhooroen ltagbiranawkhoon, anee dhoemzim-lhoon ilawkhoon hemizman dalaha. Gashqoen bdoebarayhy o hweymoen damyane bhaymanoetayhy.
ENG: Remember them that had the rule over you, which spake unto you the word of God; and considering the issue of their life, imitate their faith.

ASY: ܝܼܫܘܿܥ ܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ ܗܲܪ ܗ̇ܘ ܝܼܠܹܗ، ܐ݇ܬܸܡܵܠܝ ܘܐܸܕܝܘܿܡ ܘܗܲܠ ܥܵܠܲܡ.
TRL: Eeshoo' msheekha har haw eeleh, timaly o idyoom o hal 'alam.
ENG: Jesus Christ is the same yesterday and today, yea and for ever.

ASY: ܠܵܐ ܦܵܝܫܝܼܬܘܿܢ ܠܘܼܒܠܹܐ ܒܝܘܼܠܦܵܢܹ̈ܐ ܦܪ̈ܝܼܫܹܐ ܘܢܘܼܟ݂ܪ̈ܵܝܹܐ، ܣܵܒܵܒ ܨܦܵܝܝܼ ܝܠܵܗ̇ ܕܠܸܒܲܢ ܦܵܐܹܫ ܡܘܼܩܘܝܼܵܐ ܒܫܵܦܵܩܲܬ، ܠܵܐ ܒܡܹܐܟ݂ܘܼܠܝܵܬܹ̈ܐ ܛܲܟ݂ܣܵܢܵܝܹ̈ܐ، ܕܠܵܐ ܩܘܼܒܸܠ ܠܗܘܿܢ ܝܘܼܬܪܵܢܵܐ ܐܵܢܝܼ ܕܟܹܐ ܚܵܝܝܼ ܒܝܼܲܝܗܝ.
TRL: La paysheetoon loeble byoelpane preeshe o noekhraye, sabab ṣpayee-ylaha dliban paesh moeqweea bshapaqat, la bmekhoelyate ṭakhsanaye, dla qoebil-lhoon yoetrana anee dke khayee bee-ayhy.
ENG: Be not carried away by divers and strange teachings: for it is good that the heart be stablished by grace; not by meats, wherein they that occupied themselves were not profited.

ASY: ܐܝܼܬ ܠܲܢ ܡܲܕܒܚܵܐ ܕܠܲܝܬ ܠܗܘܿܢ ܦܣܵܣܵܐ ܠܹܐܟ݂ܵܠܵܐ ܡ̣ܢ ܡܸܢܕܝܼ ܕܥܲܠܘܼܗܝ، ܐܵܢܝܼ ܕܟܹܐ ܥܵܒ݂ܕܝܼ ܚܸܠܡܲܬ ܓܵܘ ܡܲܫܟܢܵܐ.
TRL: Eet lan madbkha dlayt-lhoon psasa lekhala min mindee d'aloehy, anee dke 'awdee khilmat gaw mashkna.
ENG: We have an altar, whereof they have no right to eat which serve the tabernacle.

ASY: ܣܵܒܵܒ ܦܲܓ݂ܪܹ̈ܐ ܕܗܲܝܘܵܢܹ̈ܐ ܕܕܸܡܲܝܗܝ ܦܵܐܹܫ ܡܘܼܐܬܝܵܐ ܠܒܹܝܬ ܩܘܼܕܫܵܐ ܒܝܲܕ ܓܘܼܪܵܐ ܕܟܵܗܢܹ̈ܐ ܡܒܵܕܵܠ ܕܚܛܝܼܬܵܐ، ܟܹܐ ܦܵܝܫܝܼ ܡܘܼܩܕܹܐ ܠܒܲܕܲܪ ܡ̣ܢ ܡܲܫܪܝܼܬܵܐ.
TRL: Sabab paghre dhaywane ddimayhy paesh moetya lbeyt qoedsha byad goera dkahne mbadal dkhṭeeta, ke payshee moeqde lbadar min mashreeta.
ENG: For the bodies of those beasts, whose blood is brought into the holy place by the high priest as an offering for sin, are burned without the camp.

ASY: ܗܲܕܟ݂ܵܐ ܐܘܼܦ ܝܼܫܘܿܥ ܓ̰ܘܼܢܓ̰ܸܪܹܗ ܠܒܲܕܲܪ ܡ̣ܢ ܬܲܪܥܵܐ ܕܡܕܝܼܢ݇ܬܵܐ ܕܡܩܲܕܸܫ ܗ݇ܘܵܐ ܠܛܵܝܸܦܵܐ ܒܕܸܡܵܐ ܕܓܵܢܹܗ.
TRL: Hadkha oep eeshoo' joenjireh lbadar min tar'a dmdeeta dmqadish wa lṭayipa bdima dganeh.
ENG: Wherefore Jesus also, that he might sanctify the people through his own blood, suffered without the gate.

ASY: ܒܲܣ ܟܲܕ ܛܥܝܼܢܹܐ ܠܵܘܡܹܗ ܐܵܙܲܠ݇ܚ ܠܟܸܣ ܠܹܗ ܠܒܲܕܲܪ ܡ̣ܢ ܡܲܫܪܝܼܬܵܐ.
TRL: Bas kad ṭ'eene lawmeh azakh lkis-leh lbadar min mashreeta.
ENG: Let us therefore go forth unto him without the camp, bearing his reproach.

ASY: ܣܵܒܵܒ ܠܐܲܟ݂ܵܐ ܠܲܝܬ ܠܲܢ ܡܕܝܼܢ݇ܬܵܐ ܦܵܝܫܵܢܬܵܐ، ܐܸܠܵܐ ܒܸܛܥܵܝܵܐ ܝܘܲܚ ܠܗ̇ܝ ܕܲܥܬܝܼܕ.
TRL: Sabab lakha layt lan mdeeta payshanta, ila biṭ'aya ywakh lhay da'teed.
ENG: For we have not here an abiding city, but we seek after the city which is to come.

ASY: ܒܲܣ ܒܝܲܕ ܝܼܫܘܿܥ، ܡܲܩܪܸܒܲܚ ܠܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ ܕܸܒ݂ܚܵܐ ܕܬܸܫܒܘܿܚܬܵܐ ܒܟܠ ܙܲܒ݂ܢܵܐ. ܐܵܗܵܐ ܝܠܵܗ̇ ܛܥܘܼܢܬܵܐ ܕܣܸܦܘܵܬܹ̈ܐ ܕܡܵܘܕܝܼ ܒܫܸܡܹܗ.
TRL: Bas byad eeshoo', maqribakh lalaha diwkha dtishbookhta bkl zawna. Aha-ylaha ṭ'oenta dsipwate dmawdee bshimeh.
ENG: Through him then let us offer up a sacrifice of praise to God continually, that is, the fruit of lips which make confession to his name.

ASY: ܘܠܵܐ ܡܲܢܫܹܝܬܘܿܢ ܠܸܥܒ݂ܵܕܵܐ ܛܵܒ݂ܬܵܐ ܘܫܲܪܸܟܝܼܬܘܿܢ ܥܲܡ ܐ݇ܚܹܪ̈݇ܢܹܐ، ܣܵܒܵܒ ܒܗܲܕܟ݂ܵܐ ܕܸܒ݂ܚܹ̈ܐ ܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ ܟܹܐ ܒܵܣܡܵܐ ܠܹܗ.
TRL: O la mansheytoon li'wada ṭawta o sharikeetoon 'am khene, sabab bhadkha diwkhe Alaha ke basma-leh.
ENG: But to do good and to communicate forget not: for with such sacrifices God is well pleased.

ASY: ܡܲܨܝܸܬܘܼܢ ܠܬܲܓܒܸܪ̈ܵܢܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܘܫܠܘܿܡܘܼܢ ܐܸܠܲܝܗܝ، ܣܵܒܵܒ ܐܵܢܝܼ ܟܹܐ ܥܵܒ݂ܕܝܼ ܫܵܗܲܪܬܵܐ ܥܲܠ ܓܵܢܵܬܵܘ̈ܟ݂ܘܿܢ، ܐܲܝܟ݂ ܐܵܢܝܼ ܕܒܸܬ ܝܵܗ݇ܒ݂ܝܼ ܚܸܫܒܘܼܢܵܐ. ܫܠܘܿܡܘܼܢ ܐܸܠܲܝܗܝ ܕܥܵܒ݂ܕܝܼ ܦܘܼܠܚܵܢܲܝܗܝ ܒܚܲܕܘܼܬܵܐ ܘܠܵܐ ܒܦܵܫܲܡܬܵܐ، ܣܵܒܵܒ ܠܹܐ ܗܵܘܹܐ ܠܝܘܼܬܪܵܢܵܐ ܐܸܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ.
TRL: Maṣyitoen ltagbiranawkhoon o shloomoen ilayhy, sabab anee ke 'awdee shaharta 'al ganatawkhoon, aykh anee dbit yawee khishboena. Shloomoen ilayhy d'awdee poelkhanayhy bkhadoeta o la bpashamta, sabab le hawe lyoetrana ilawkhoon.
ENG: Obey them that have the rule over you, and submit to them: for they watch in behalf of your souls, as they that shall give account; that they may do this with joy, and not with grief: for this were unprofitable for you.

ASY: ܨܲܠܹܝܡܘܼܢ ܒܘܼܬ ܕܝܼܲܢ، ܣܵܒܵܒ ܚܵܬܸܪܓ̰ܲܡܥ ܝܼܘܲܚ ܕܐܝܼܬ ܠܲܢ ܐܸܢܝܲܬ ܛܵܒ݂ܬܵܐ ܘܒܵܥܲܚ ܕܚܵܝܲܚ ܒܨܸܦܝܘܼܬܵܐ ܒܟܠ ܐܘܼܪܚܵܐ.
TRL: Ṣaleymoen boet dee-an, sabab khatirjam' eewakh deet lan inyat ṭawta o ba'akh dkhayakh bṣipyoeta bkl oerkha.
ENG: Pray for us: for we are persuaded that we have a good conscience, desiring to live honestly in all things.

ASY: ܘܒܘܼܫ ܙܵܘܕܵܐ، ܦܲܪܦܘܼܠܹܐ ܝܘܸܢ ܒܝܼܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܕܨܲܠܹܝܬܘܼܢ ܨܠܘܼܬܵܐ، ܕܒܓ̰ܲܠܕܘܼܬܵܐ ܦܵܝܫܹܢ ܡܘܼܕܸܪܵܐ ܠܟܸܣ ܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ.
TRL: O boesh zawda, parpoele ywin beeawkhoon dṣaleytoen ṣloeta, dbjaldoeta payshen moedira lkis lawkhoon.
ENG: And I exhort you the more exceedingly to do this, that I may be restored to you the sooner.

ASY: ܘܐܵܕܝܼܵܐ ܐܲܠܵܗܵܐ ܕܫܠܵܡܵܐ، ܗ̇ܘ ܕܡܘܼܩܸܡ ܠܹܗ ܠܡܵܪܲܢ ܝܼܫܘܿܥ ܡ̣ܢ ܡܝܼܬܹ̈ܐ، ܕܝܼܠܹܗ ܪܵܥܝܵܐ ܓܘܼܪܵܐ ܕܡܲܪܥܝܼܬܵܐ ܒܫܵܦܲܟ݂ܬܵܐ ܕܕܸܡܹܗ، ܗ̇ܘ ܕܸܡܵܐ ܕܒܝܼܹܗ ܦܝܼܫܵܐ ܝܠܹܗ ܚܬܝܼܡܵܐ ܘܲܥܕܵܐ ܥܵܠܡܝܼܢܵܝܵܐ،
TRL: O adeea Alaha dshlama, haw dmoeqim-leh lmaran eeshoo' min meete, deeleh ra'ya goera dmar'eeta bshapakhta ddimeh, haw dima dbee-eh peesha-yleh khteema wa'da 'almeenaya,
ENG: Now the God of peace, who brought again from the dead the great shepherd of the sheep with the blood of the eternal covenant, even our Lord Jesus,

ASY: ܡܲܟܡܸܠ ܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܒܟܠ ܦܘܼܠܚܵܢܵܐ ܛܵܒ݂ܵܐ ܕܥܵܒ݂ܕܝܼܬܘܿܢ ܨܸܒ݂ܝܵܢܹܗ، ܘܦܵܠܹܚ ܒܝܼܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܡܸܢܕܝܼ ܕܫܵܦܹܪ ܠܟܸܣ ܠܹܗ، ܒܝܼܫܘܿܥ ܡܫܝܼܚܵܐ، ܐܸܠܹܗ ܚܸܩܪܵܐ ܠܥܵܠܲܡ ܥܵܠܡܝܼܢ. ܐܵܡܹܝܢ.
TRL: Makmil lawkhoon bkl poelkhana ṭawa d'awdeetoon ṣiwyaneh, o palekh beeawkhoon mindee dshaper lkis-leh, beeshoo' msheekha, ileh khiqra l'alam 'almeen. Ameyn.
ENG: make you perfect in every good thing to do his will, working in us that which is well-pleasing in his sight, through Jesus Christ; to whom be the glory for ever and ever. Amen.

ASY: ܦܲܪܦܘܼܠܹܐ ܝܘܸܢ ܒܝܼܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ، ܐܲܚܘܿܢܘܵܬܝܼ̈، ܕܡܲܨܝܸܬܝܼܬܘܿܢ ܨܦܵܝܝܼ ܠܗܹܡܸܙܡܵܢܹ̈ܐ ܕܢܵܨܝܼܗܲܬ، ܣܵܒܵܒ ܟܬܝܼܒ݂ ܠܝܼ ܐܸܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܟܬܵܒ݂ܵܐ ܟܸܪܝܵܐ.
TRL: Parpoele ywin beeawkhoon, akhoonwatee, dmaṣyiteetoon ṣpayee lhemizmane dnaṣeehat, sabab kteew-lee ilawkhoon ktawa kirya.
ENG: But I exhort you, brethren, bear with the word of exhortation: for I have written unto you in few words.

ASY: ܒܵܥܹܝܢ ܝܵܕܥܝܼܬܘܿܢ ܕܐܲܚܘܿܢܲܢ ܛܝܼܡܵܬܹܐܘܿܣ ܦܝܼܫ ܠܹܗ ܫܸܪܝܵܐ. ܐܸܢ ܐܵܬܹܐ ܒܓ̰ܲܠܕܘܼܬܵܐ، ܥܲܡܹܗ ܒܸܬ ܚܵܙܹܝܢܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ.
TRL: Ba'eyn yad'eetoon dakhoonan ṭeemateoos peesh-leh shirya. In ate bjaldoeta, 'ameh bit khazeynawkhoon.
ENG: Know ye that our brother Timothy hath been set at liberty; with whom, if he come shortly, I will see you.

ASY: ܗܲܒ݂݇ܠܘܼܢ ܫܠܵܡܵܐ ܠܟܠܲܝܗܝ ܬܲܓܒܸܪ̈ܵܢܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ، ܘܠܟܠܲܝܗܝ ܩܲܕܝܼܫܹ̈ܐ. ܒܝܼܵܗ݇ܒ݂ܵܐ ܝܢܵܐ ܫܠܵܡܵܐ ܐܸܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ ܟܠܲܝܗܝ ܐܵܢܝܼ ܕܡ̣ܢ ܐܝܼܛܵܠܝܼܵܐ.
TRL: Haloen shlama lklayhy tagbiranawkhoon, o lklayhy qadeeshe. Beeawa yna shlama ilawkhoon klayhy anee dmin eeṭaleea.
ENG: Salute all them that have the rule over you, and all the saints. They of Italy salute you.

ASY: ܫܵܦܵܩܲܬ ܥܲܡ ܟܠܵܘܟ݂ܘܿܢ. ܐܵܡܹܝܢ.
TRL: Shapaqat 'am klawkhoon. Ameyn.
ENG: Grace be with you all. Amen.
